Why+Agile+in+corporates+doesn%27t+work%2C+yet. %3Cp%3EConsider+the+prevalence+of+technology+in+our+lives+and+businesses+today.+Eventually%2C+every+business+will+be+a+technology+business.+The+proliferation+of+technology+has+moved+software+out+of+being+just+a+business+support+function%2C+to+one+that+can+define+a+business%26rsquo%3Bs+capability.+This+makes+high-quality+software+pivotal+to+a+business%26rsquo%3Bs+success+and+means+that+every+corporate+in+South+Africa+requires+a+significant+software+development+workforce+to+remain+relevant+in+today%26rsquo%3Bs+market.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EShift+to+Agile%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAll+CIOs+are+aware+that+quality+software+requires+an+organisation+to+follow+an+Agile+development+methodology.+As+a+result%2C+all+IT+divisions+in+the+progressive+corporates+are+fully+committed+to+adopting+Agile+and+are+at+various+levels+on+their+journeys.+However%2C+the+fundamental+issue+with+implementing+Agile+in+a+corporate+is+the+necessity+for+full+buy-in+from+the+entire+organisation.+It+is+an+organisational+shift.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ECorporate+strategy+evangelists+promote+the+concept+of+%26lsquo%3Balignment%26rsquo%3B%3A+how+well+an+organisation+is+coordinated+to+achieve+its+goals.+A+central+feature+of+any+business+strategy+is+the+ability+to+effectively+execute+the+core+of+the+business+while+being+able+to+adapt+to+trends+and+changes+in+the+market.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EFit+for+purpose%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOrganisational+alignment+pulls+together+business+strategies%2C+organisational+capabilities%2C+resources+and+management+systems+%26ndash%3B+all+of+which+need+to+be+arranged+to+support+the+enterprise%26rsquo%3Bs+purpose.%26nbsp%3BIt+is+not+possible+for+the+organisation+to+move+quickly+if+it+is+not+aligned+and+does+not+demonstrate+%26lsquo%3Bfitness%26rsquo%3B+-+the+capacity+to+change+to+fit+new+circumstances+quickly%2C+and+thereby+remain+competitive.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESimilarly%2C+an+Agile+methodology+advocates+adaptive+planning%2C+evolutionary+development%2C+early+delivery%2C+continuous+improvement%2C+and+rapid+and+flexible+response+to+change.+This+is+achieved+through+a+culture+of+intellectual+curiosity%2C+collaboration%2C+effective+communication+and+always+being+ready+to+challenge+the+status+quo.+Importantly%2C+it+allows+and+requires+teams+to+break+from+old+habits+before+they+become+counterproductive.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EAgile+not+just+about+software%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMost+business+units+embrace+the+flexibility+that+an+Agile+approach+allows.+However%2C+the+typical+approach+is+to+expose+systems+teams+to+barrages+of+training+sessions+to+upskill+those+who+present+an+obvious+or+immediate+need.+But+what+is+often+overlooked+is+that+Agile+development+requires+a+culture+shift+across+the+entire+organisation+and+the+skills+need+to+be+applied+more+broadly+than+just+the+central+software+team.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EUnfortunately%2C+the+standard+modus+operandi+across+most+corporates+today+is+that+a+business+unit+innovates+a+product+in+isolation%2C+making+commitments+about+delivery+timelines+with+minimal+systems+input+and+then+finally+pushing+the+team+for+an+unrealistic+deadline.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+scenario+plays+out+to+different+extents+in+various+organisations.+However%2C+the+result+often+is+that+it+sustains+any+business+siloes+that+may+exist%2C+deadlines+are+missed%2C+or+there+is+a+mass+exodus+of+developers+at+the+end+of+the+project%2C+leaving+the+sentiment+that+Agile+is+bad.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EBuy-in+is+key+to+success%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAdmittedly%2C+much+progress+has+been+achieved+across+various+organisations+but+the+key+point+is+that+both+systems+and+business+teams+need+to+be+realistic+about+how+delivery+is+managed+and+come+up+with+a+process+that+works+in+a+corporate.+Only+when+everyone+-+from+the+individual+who+first+comes+up+with+a+product+idea+to+the+systems+team+-+buys+into+changing+the+way+they+approach+software+development%2C+will+an+organisation+benefit+from+Agile+development.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOften%2C+%26lsquo%3Bpure%26rsquo%3B+Agile+is+not+feasible+in+a+corporate+because+expectations+across+senior+management+and+exec+level+are+always+tied+to+budgets+and+defined+deliverables%2C+something+that+Agile+struggles+to+represent.+But+communication+-+and+the+ability+to+communicate+your+project+in+a+language+that+various+business+teams+understand+%26ndash%3B+is+crucial+to+creating+buy-in.+Development+managers+typically+have+a+spreadsheet+that+converts+story+points+to+hours+so+that+they+can+report+in+a+way+the+CFO+appreciates%2C+which+helps.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EBe+agile+about+Agile%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETherefore%2C+Agile+in+various+forms+can+work+in+a+corporate%2C+but+one+needs+to+be+agile+around+implementing+Agile.+In+the+specific+case+of+software%26rsquo%3Bs+Agile+methodology%2C+often+it+is+the+organisational+capability+and+resource+architecture+and+management+systems+that+prevent+the+organisation+from+being+able+to+fully+adopt+and+gain+the+full+benefit+of+an+Agile+approach+to+software+development.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAn+organisation+that+can+transform+to+a+truly+Agile+culture+will+recognise+it+needs+to+be+complemented+by+strong+and+sound+operational+processes+throughout+all+functional+areas+of+the+business.+CIOs+need+to+understand+the+importance+Agile+has+on+the+greater+operations+of+their+business+and+why+it+can+be+a+game-changer+if+the+organisation+can+get+it+right.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EConsider+your+business+tomorrow.+What+is+your+organisation%26rsquo%3Bs+capability%3B+do+you+have+the+resources+to+adapt+to+a+shift+in+direction%2C+tomorrow%3F+If+not%2C+then+you+probably+don%26rsquo%3Bt+have+a+fully+Agile+culture.%3C%2Fp%3E Custom+software+development+vs+off-the-shelf+products%2C+which+will+help+elevate+your+business+ahead+of+its+competitors%3F %3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+choice+between+custom+software+development+versus+an+off-the-shelf+product+is+an+ongoing+debate+for+start-up%26%2339%3Bs%2C+SMME%26%2339%3Bs%2C+and+big+corporates.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+conversation+heats+up+when+scaling+comes+into+the+frame+and+scope+requirements+become+broader.+Add+to+that+an+increasing+user+base%2C+the+ability+to+innovate%2C+the+need+to+adapt+business+offerings+as+the+company+grows%2C+then+the+decision+becomes+even+more+complex.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ELook+at+successful+businesses.+Firstly%2C+what+distinguish+whether+the+business+is+successful%3F+Is+it+one+with+an+innovative+and+agile+approach%2C+or+one+with+revolutionary+products%3F+What+is+the+driving+force+behind+this%3F+Perhaps+the+software+they+use%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ECustomers+have+no+knowledge+on+how+a+company%26rsquo%3Bs+software+operates%2C+or+if+it+is+an+off-the-shelf+or+custom+development+solution.+The+important+thing+is+that+the+user+experience+is+great%2C+and+the+solution+meets+your+needs+and+requirements+as+a+business.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESo+how+then%2C+does+a+business+decide+whether+they+should+be+investing+in+a+customized+software+solution+or+an+off-the-shelf+product%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E5+factors+to+consider+when+deciding+if+a+bespoke+solution+is+right+for+you%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E1.+Determine+an+accurate+comparison+for+the+cost.+You+need+to+look+beyond+the+purchase+price%2C+but+the+whole-life+costs+%28WLC%29.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E2.+Some+benefits%2C+such+as+competitive+advantage%2C+are+worth+spending+the+time+to+get+right.+Although+time+to+market+is+important%2C+the+pace+of+change+determined+by+the+market+may+mean+you+need+to+change+and+redirect+your+software+development+needs.+Bespoke+software+takes+longer+to+develop+and+structure+than+off-the-shelf+products%2C+but+it+aligns+to+your+business+needs.+Designing+the+software+correctly%2C+enables+agility+and+quicker+turn-around+time+as+the+software+grows+and+evolves.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E3.+Bespoke+seems+riskier.+While+a+solution+built+for+1000%26rsquo%3Bs+of+companies+apparently+presents+less+risk+in+terms+of+the+functionality%2C+the+risk+presents+itself+in+application.+Each+company+will+use+the+package+differently.+Therefore%2C+how+relevant+it+is+for+your+business+will+determine+the+risk+in+the+long-run%2C+especially+if+the+pre-determined+features+cannot+adapt+to+your+business+needs.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E4.+There+are+so+many+software+products+out+there%2C+why+go+custom%3F+Software+products+built+for+the+masses+are+done+so+with+the+intent+to+spend+the+minimum+development+cost+on+changes+needed.+If+the+product+covers+85%25+of+the+business+needs+out+there+it%26%2339%3Bs+good+enough+to+be+used+in+the+market.+85%25+is+the+basic+features+that+keep+your+business+running.+But%2C+this+means+you%26rsquo%3Bre+competing+with+the+same+tools.+The+innovation+required+that+elevates+you+ahead+of+your+competitors+will+be+a+custom+build.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E5.+The+resources+that+a+bespoke+developer+can+spend+on+meeting+my+objectives+are+orders+of+magnitude+lower+than+off-the-shelf+products.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIf+you+have+analyzed+each+question%2C+and+are+still+not+sure+why+bespoke+software+is+better+for+your+business%2C+then+you+need+to+consider+some+aspects+that+may+affect+the+future+of+your+business+more+closely.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E5+reasons+customized+solutions+will+help+you+to+future-proof+your+organization%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E1.+With+customized+solutions%2C+you+only+pay+for+what+you+need.+Whereas%2C+off-the-shelf+software+solutions+cater+for+various+needs+of+many+businesses%2C+meaning+there+are+features+and+functions+that+you+will+never+use.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E2.+Using+a+tailored+solution+means+you+can+satisfy+your+own+business+model%2C+rather+than+that+of+a+product.+There+will+be+times+when+you+have+to+adjust+features+based+on+your+business+needs%2C+or+as+your+business+grows.+This+results+in+you+being+at+the+mercy+of+the+vendor+to+satisfy+your+needs.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E3.+To+meet+your+current+and+future+business+needs%2C+customized+solutions+enable+you+to+align+the+software+to+your+own+brand+and+specifically%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+market+positioning.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E4.+Applying+a+solution+that+is+specific+to+your+processes+and+people+is+central+to+your+business+structure+and+growth+strategy.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E5.+Customized+solutions%2C+for+all+the+reasons+above%2C+enable+your+business+to+innovate+from+within+and+not+be+dependent+on+the+product+to+slowly+evolve.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+the+last+5-10+years%2C+much+has+changed+in+terms+of+software+packages%2C+open+source+and+custom+services+that+specialize+in+a+single+service+only.+Most+of+these+are+free+or+come+at+a+low+price.+It+integrates+well+into+your+software+and+simplifies+the+work+for+you.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETake+Authentication+for+example%3A+AuthO+is+a+single+sign+on+%26amp%3B+Token+based+authentication+as+a+service.+That+means+your+authentication+for+your+system+or+application+is+handled%2C+managed+and+taken+care+of.+There+is+no+need+to+build+your+own.+This+allows+you+to+focus+on+your+business+needs+and+build+out+the+solution+which+fits+your+business.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EWhich+option+is+right+for+your+needs%3F%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EYou+should+think+carefully+about+your+individual+business+requirements+before+making+a+choice%2C+because+you+will+need+software+that+helps+you+achieve+maximum+results+in+line+with+your+business+strategy.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBespoke+applications+can+offer+huge+commercial+and+business+benefits%2C+giving+you+a+competitive+advantage.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIf+you+find+a+professional+with+best+practice+standards+who+can+develop+the+software%2C%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3Eand+meet+your+growing+business+needs+by+providing+regular+software+updates%2C+then+a+bespoke+solution+could+be+much+more+cost+efficient+in+the+long+run.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E Trends+in+Enterprise+Software.+What+we+can+expect+to+see+in+2018. %3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EBy+Nico+Mulder+%28Entelect%2C+Delivery+Manager%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+year+is+likely+to+be+another+revolutionary+year+in+the+enterprise+software+space.+Underpinned+by+trends+ranging+from+cognitive+technologies+to+machine+learning%2C+we+can+expect+to+see+businesses+shift+to+building+consumer-centric+software+solutions+with+an+increased+focus+on+user+experience.%26nbsp%3BEnterprises+have+started+to+recognise+they+can+gain+operational+advantages+from+applying+consumer+offerings+internally.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETypically%2C+enterprise+software+development+responds+to+software+needs+in+a+B2B+environment%2C+but+this+has+constrained+thinking+for+software+innovation.+While+companies+use+technology+trends+such+as+chat+bots+to+improve+their+external+and+consumer+facing+initiatives%2C+they+have+overlooked+the+advantages+these+kinds+of+approaches+can+have+on+their+internal+operations.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAs+such%2C+much+of+what+we+saw+in+2017+will+continue+to+progress%3B+Agile+development%2C+Mobility+and+Custom+software+development.+But+two+core+driving+forces+behind+these+trends+for+2018+will+be+the+renewed+focus+on+user+experience+within+enterprises+mimicking+consumer+offerings.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EWhy+enterprises+will+start+to+mimic+consumer+offerings%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EUntil+recently%2C+CRM+software+was+all+pushed+to+the+cloud%2C+simply+because+it+seemed+to+be+the+ideal+environment+for+so+much+data.+Companies+were+so+focussed+on+their+operations%2C+they+lost+sight+of+the+consumer+side.+But+with+more+millennials+coming+into+the+workforce%2C+this+is+changing.+Millennials+operate+in+a+world+where+their+entire+lives+are+optimised.+They+expect+this+of+their+employers+and+working+environments+too.+And+importantly%2C+companies+have+realised+that+applying+more+UX+thinking+to+their+enterprise+solutions+will+improve+operational+efficiencies.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEnterprise+Software+used+to+dictate+how+the+software+works+and+the+usability.+It+wasn%26rsquo%3Bt+built+for+the+end-user%2C+but+built+to+service+the+business+and+variances+of+a+business+process.+The+employee+had+to+perform+a+job%2C+and+the+software+enabled+them+to+do+so%2C+irrespective+of+the+user+experience.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+the+past%2C+business+objectives+driving+consumer+offerings+have+typically+been%3B+to+improve+customer+experience%2C+to+optimize+the+user+journey%2C+or+to+optimise+offerings+to+the+customer.+But+companies+are+starting+to+ask+the+question+%26ndash%3B+what+if+we+apply+this+thinking+to+our+employees+and+their+operations%3F+Suddenly+the+objectives+become%3B+to+improve+employee+experience%2C+to+optimise+the+employee+journey%2C+or+to+optimise+the+offerings+to+the+employee.+This+can+all+lead+to+improved+internal+efficiencies+and+productivity.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EConsequently%2C+businesses+will+start+to+create+internal+systems+that+not+only+reflect+consumer+offerings%2C+but+also+have+a+high+user+experience+factor%2C+to+enable+quick+adoption+and+improved+productivity.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMobile+CRM+platforms+are+a+great+example+of+the+ways+modern+enterprise+software+is+starting+to+mimic+consumer+offerings+for+operational+advantages.+Real-time+collaboration+on+any+device+is+becoming+a+more+important+for+productivity.+Most+jobs+require+teamwork+and+communication+and+tools+that+enable+this+are+going+to+put+businesses+at+an+advantage.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EUnfortunately%2C+while+trends+like+Mobility+are+on+the+rise+in+terms+of+mimicking+consumer+offerings%2C+it+won%26rsquo%3Bt+yet+stretch+as+far+as+applied+use+of+social+media.+In+fact%2C+social+media+within+enterprise+software+hasn%26%2339%3Bt+taken+off+as+much+as+one+would+like.+Yes%2C+corporates+are+improving+their+social+interactions+and+employee+experience+within+the+company%2C+but+enterprise+software+doesn%26%2339%3Bt+yet+leverage+the+impact+and+insights+of+social+media+as+much+as+it+can.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ESo+what+are+the+technology+trends+that+are+going+to+underpin+this+shift+for+enterprises+in+2018%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EAgile%2C+Digital+Transformation%3C%2Fstrong%3E+within+the+corporate+environment.+This+transformation+is+rapidly+transforming+and+driving+enterprise+software+towards+consumerism.+CIO%26%2339%3Bs+and+CTO%26%2339%3Bs+are+becoming+more+closely+involved+with+the+design+of+products+and+systems%2C+ensuring+the+build+and+roll+out+is+done+within+an+Agile+environment.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ELess+offshore+development+%3C%2Fstrong%3Eand+more+in-house+capability+and+re-use+of+%26lsquo%3BSoftware+as+a+Service%26rsquo%3B+is+starting+to+infiltrate+and+customize+enterprise+software.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ECustom+Software+development+%3C%2Fstrong%3Efor+enterprise+software.+Replacing+and+moving+away+from+off-the-shelf+products%2C+which+require+a+high+degree+of+integration+and+customization+and+don%26rsquo%3Bt+focus+on+user+experience.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ECognitive+technologies%3C%2Fstrong%3E+focused+on+Product%2C+Process%2C+and+Insight+will+have+a+massive+spike+in+the+user+experience+initiatives+which+haven%26rsquo%3Bt+been+adopted+yet.+Overall%2C+Cognitive+Technologies+encourage+a+greater+use+of+the+existing+services+and+streamline+continuous+feedback+and+information+gathering.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ELower+infrastructure+costs%3C%2Fstrong%3E%26nbsp%3Bachieved+through+more+efficient+utilization+of+IT+resources%2C+and+an+increase+in+capacity+to+handle+peak+demands.+The+use+of+Containerisation+will+definitely+increase+in+2018.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EAI+and+Machine+Learning%3C%2Fstrong%3E+will+become+a+mandatory+business+aspect+with+the+rise+of+chatbots+and+business+bots+automating+various+features+and+customer+self-service+portals.+We%26rsquo%3Bve+already+seen+this+in+the+past+years+but+expect+to+see+the+trend+continue+in+2018.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EMobility+%3C%2Fstrong%3Ewill+play+a+big+factor+in+the+enterprise+software+space%2C+as+the+need+to+improve+UX+for+employee+productivity+will+be+a+necessity.+Some+businesses%2C+in+the+agricultural+and+healthcare+industries+have+started+making+this+move%2C+but+in+2018%2C+we+can+expect+to+see+businesses+in+other+industries+such+as+automotive+and+short-term+insurance%2C+which+will+recognise+the+advantages+of+having+a+mobility+solution+built-in+for+their+teams.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ENeedless+to+say%2C+2018+will+definitely+be+another+groundbreaking+year%2C+trying+to+play+catch+up+with+renewed+and+improved+technological+companies.+Companies+wishing+to+attract+the+best+talent+will+be+seeking+to+improve+their+employee+experience+by+mimicking+consumer+offerings.+The+extent+to+which+the+seven+tech+trends+will+impact+the+move+to+consumer+offerings+and+UX+is+yet+to+be+seen%2C+but+suffice+to+say%2C+we+can+expect+them+to+be+key+features+to+some+degree+or+another.%3C%2Fp%3E Working+from+home+-+is+there+a+verdict%3F %3Cdiv%3E%3Cstrong%3EBy+Nico+Mulder+%28Entelect+Delivery+Manager%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3ETele-working+and+Telecommuting+are+both+popular+thanks+to+technology+tools+that+facilitate+communication+and+collaboration.+But+it+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt+necessarily+mean+both+deliver+the+same+results+in+terms+of+employee+engagement+and+productivity.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Telecommuting%2C+also+known+as+remote+work%2C+is+when+work+is+undertaken+at+a+different+location+than+the+head+office+to+reduce+the+commuting+time.+Tele-working+is+a+working+arrangement+where+employees+do+not+commute+or+travel+at+all.%26nbsp%3B+Although+the+terms+are+used+interchangeably%2C+they+are+in+fact+two+very+different+things.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Telecommuting+was+first+introduced+in+the+early+1970%26%2339%3Bs%2C+when+technology+allowed+linked+satellite+offices+to+connect+to+downtown+mainframes+through+dumb+terminals+using+telephone+lines+as+a+network+bridge.%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Then%2C+in+the+1980%26%2339%3Bs%2C+the+continued+decrease+in+hardware+costs+and+increased+network+speed+has+allowed+employees+to+use+computers+to+connect+to+their+offices+from+the+convenience+of+their+own+home.+These+days+fibre+to+the+home+enables+high-speed+internet+to+the+home%2C+thereby+facilitating+conference+calls%2C+videos+calls%2C+and+high-speed+video+streaming%2C+furthering+the+potential+for+telecommuting.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Technology+undoubtedly%2C+has+enabled+working+from+home+possible%26nbsp%3B+as+it+provides%26nbsp%3B+a+platform+to+deliver+fluent+communication+and+collaboration+of+employees%2C+for+example%3A%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3BSkype%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3BWhatsApp+-+Groups%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3BSlack%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3BEmail%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3BVideo+Conferencing+Applications%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E21st+century+digital+work%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3EFrom+an+employer%26%2339%3Bs+perspective%2C+there+are+several+benefits+for+a+company+to+embrace+telecommuting%3A%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E1.%3Cstrong%3E+Real-estate.+%3C%2Fstrong%3EA+reduction+in+required+desk+space%2C+in+some+instances+as+much+as+40%25+of+a+workforce+has+been+known+to+work+remotely.+That+is+nearly+40%25+of+your+employee+costs.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+2.+%3Cstrong%3EAutonomy+and+freedom.%3C%2Fstrong%3E+Giving+your+employees+the+freedom+to+work+from+their+most+productive+space+each+day%2C+and+to+enjoy+the+benefits+of+flexible+working+hours%2C+feeds+employee+satisfaction+and+trust.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+3.+%3Cstrong%3ESaving+travel+time.%3C%2Fstrong%3E+Employees+who+need+to+commute+for+long+hours+a+day+can+be+more+productive+if+they+can+save+unnecessary+travel+time.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+There+are+several+varieties+of+%26lsquo%3Bworking+from+home%26rsquo%3B+structures%3A%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+1.+%3Cstrong%3EWork+from+home+on+a+needs+basis+only%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E+For+instance%2C+when+the+plumber+needs+to+fix+something%2C+you+are+waiting+for+a+package+to+be+delivered+to+your+house%2C+or+when+the+kids+are+sick.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+2.+%3Cstrong%3EWork+from+home+for+2-3+days+of+the+week%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E+A+hybrid+approach+like+this+saves+time+on+travel+and+commuting%2C+but+means+the+employee+is+available+in+the+office+for+the+other+days+of+the+week.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+3.+%3Cstrong%3EWork+from+home%2C+full-time%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E+Also+known+as+Tele-working.+In+this+structure%2C+the+employee+is+only+required+to+be+in+the+office+for+meetings+when+video+calls+or+conference+calls+aren%26rsquo%3Bt+an+option.%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3ETimes+have+changed.+Tools+for+collaboration+are+in+full+swing%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+IBM+used+to+be+a+big+supporter+of+the+work+from+home+initiative.+In+2009+IBM+boasted+that+40%25+of+its+employee+base+didn%26%2339%3Bt+have+an+office.+IBM%2C+as+a+consultancy%2C+advised+their+clients+that+working+from+home+was+a+great+initiative%2C+and+that+leading+by+example+was+great+for+marketing.+But+by+2015+IBM+rolled+back+on+their+decision+to+work+from+home.+IBM%26%2339%3Bs+revenue+had+fallen+20+quarters+in+a+row%2C+and+although+IBM+wanted+to+imitate+a+Google+or+Apple%2C+neither+Google+nor+Apple+supported+working+from+home+to+the+extent+that+IBM+had+implemented.%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Similarly%2C+Yahoo+reversed+it%26%2339%3Bs+working+from+home+policy+in+2013+after+the+company+had+to+cut+their+workforce+by+2+000+employees+due+to+financial+troubles+in+2012.%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3EFacebook%26rsquo%3Bs+approach+was+different.+It+focussed+on+driving+collaboration+and+social+engagement+and+so%2C+created+the+world%26rsquo%3Bs+largest+open-plan+offices.+While+flexibility+remains+crucial+to+the+modern+working+style%2C+Facebook+recognised+that+human+interaction+and+engagement+was+also+important+in+getting+things+done+and+for+creative+thinking.%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%3Cstrong%3EIt%26rsquo%3Bs+still+about+connecting+with+people%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3EWith+technology+available+to+make+remote+work+faster%2C+less+expensive+and+more+effective%2C+the+Facebook+example+shows+that+we+don%26%2339%3Bt+connect+with+people+just+by+being+at+your+desk%2C+we+connect+with+people+by+talking+to+them.+So+this+is+where+environments+like+the+coffee+machine+and+cafeteria+work+well.+While+technology+enables+virtual+collaboration+and+communication%2C+it+is+not+entirely+a+replacement+for+human+interaction.+There+are+some+things+that+we%2C+as+humans%2C+essentially+require+to+collaborate+effectively.+We+call+this+collaborative+efficiency%2C+and+its+critical+to+effective+teams.%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3EBack+in+1977%2C+MIT+professor+Thomas+J.+Allen+looked+at+communication+patterns+among+scientists+and+engineers+and+found+that+the+farther+apart+their+desks+were%2C+the+less+likely+they+were+to+communicate.+At+the+30-meter+mark%2C+the+likelihood+of+regular+communication+approached+zero.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+automatic+expectation+has+been+that+technology+should+improve+communication+and+remove+distance.+But+the+study+revealed+that+people+use+these+tools+to+connect+with+people+they+see+face-to-face+as+well.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Michelle+Peluso%2C+IBM%2C+Chief+Marketing+Officer+believes+that%2C+%26quot%3BThere+is+something+about+a+team+being+more+powerful%2C+more+impactful%2C+more+creative%2C+and+frankly+hopefully+having+more+fun+when+they+shoulder+to+shoulder.%26quot%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In+the+working+environment+of+today%2C+employees+are+always+working+in+teams.+The+lone+worker+has+by+in+large+fallen+away.+Now-days%2C+employees+in+most+industries%2C+and+especially+in+the+software+space%2C+prefer+to+work+in+Agile+team+structures+that+are+multi-disciplinary.%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3ECreative+problem+solving%2C+quick+delivery%2C+and+the+application+of+judgement+on+complex+business+situations+requires+employee+interaction+and+sometimes%2C+this+can+only+be+truly+effective+in+an+environment+designed+to+support+creative+collaborative+efficiency.%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%3Cstrong%3EThe+intersection+between+flexible+hours+and+team+collaboration%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3ECertainly+the+nature+of+work+has+changed.+We+will+never+return+to+a+system+where+people+all+work+a+9-5+day%2C+based+at+the+offce.+But+with+that%2C+companies+have+recognised+the+importance+of+collaboration.+We+can+expect+to+see+companies+investing+in+developing+intelligent+working+spaces+that+offer+productive%2C+collaborative%2C+environments+for+their+employees.+Enabling+them+to+jump+into+quick+meetings%2C+quick+coffee+catch-ups%2C+and+host+interactive+sessions+for+creative+planning%2C+when+they+are+at+the+office.%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3EThere+is+the+old+saying...two+heads+are+better+than+one.+Collaborating+in+your+teams+is+vital.+There+are+smaller+offices%2C+and+spaces+where+one+can+experience+a+quiet+focused+environment%2C+but+also+collaborate+and+interact.%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3EEqually%2C+employees+shouldn%26rsquo%3Bt+see+offices+only+as+a+place+for+meetings+and+companies+should+look+at+how+they+can+create+creative+and+collaborative+working+environments+that+add+value.%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E Nico+Mulder+%28Entelect+Delivery+Manager%29%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E+Tele-working+and+Telecommuting+are+both+popular+thanks+to+technology+tools+that+facilitate+communication+and+collaboration.+But+it+doesn%E2%80%99t+necessarily+mean+both+deliver+the+same+results+in+terms+of+employee+engagement+and+productivity. Choose+your+digital+transformation+starting+point tives.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+As+you+connect+all+the+assets+that+make+up+your+business%2C+therein+lies+the+value+to+transform.+From+creating+better+efficiencies+around+delivery+times+and+device+utilisation+or+implementing+technologies+like+IOT+%28Internet+of+things%29+to+reduce+costs.+Once+connected%2C+organisations+will+be+able+to+leverage+the+connections+and+data+to+open+up+new+revenue+streams+from+mining+data+or+just+exposing+the+data+across+the+value+chain+for+better+correlations+and+efficiency.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Col+start%3D%222%22+type%3D%221%22%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3EAutonomous+%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Fol%3E+%3Cp%3EAs+we+move+into+a+world+where+machines+become+%26lsquo%3Bsmarter%26rsquo%3B+with+the+likes+of+ML+and+AI%2C+there+exists+many+opportunities.+From+automating+mundane+human+processes+to+complex+AI+scenarios%2C+such+as+the+use+of+drones+for+the+security+industry+for+facial+recognition+or+perimeter+and+zone+defence+systems%2C+the+use+cases+are+plentiful.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Just+as+the+machines+make+human+efficiency+better+it+is+important+to+also+note+the+converse.+A+machine+is+only+as+good+as+what+it+has+been+taught+to+do.+With+the+rise+of+AI+and+machine+learning%2C+organisations+can+leverage+these+forms+of+autonomous+technologies+to+gain+competitive+advantages%2C+unlock+new+revenue+streams+or+just+cut+costs+with+better+efficiencies.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Col+start%3D%223%22+type%3D%221%22%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3EEmpowered%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Fol%3E+%3Cp%3EOrganisations+who+empower+their+clients+create+exponential+growth+in+terms+of+value-add.+As+an+example%2C+in+the+medical+field%2C+Apple%26rsquo%3Bs+new+series+4+watch+has+the+ability+to+conduct+an+ECG+%28Electrocardiogram%29.+This+gives+the+user+the+pre-emptive+ability+to+be+aware+of+health-related+heart+conditions+before+it%26rsquo%3Bs+too+late.+This+not+only+saves+lives+but+also+medical+costs.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Apple+has+empowered+their+consumers+through+the+use+of+technology%2C+giving+them+relevant+information%2C+thereby+empowering+them+to+be+proactive+instead+of+reactive.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Col+start%3D%224%22+type%3D%221%22%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3EProgrammable+%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Fol%3E+%3Cp%3EFor+organisations+that+choose+to+go+the+programmable+route+as+a+starting+point%2C+it+is+important+to+note+that+business+and+operating+model+changes+become+a+focus.+The+objective+is+to+allow+other+parties+to+leverage+your+assets+in+order+to+deliver+value+to+your+organisation.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+This+is+generally+done+by+means+of+API%26rsquo%3Bs+%28application+programming+interfaces%29+that+give+3rd+parties+the+ability+to+unlock+value+from+what+you+have+exposed+to+them.+Examples+of+this+are+banks+which+expose+services+through+API%26rsquo%3Bs+like+charging+for+each+call+for+digital+identity+verifications+or+bank+account+verifications.+This+unlocks+new+revenue+streams+and+new+business+models+to+work+with.%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+There+is+no+simple+formula+to+Digital+Transformation.+There+is+only+the+starting+point.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EWhich+one+will+be+yours%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E the+largest+gains+for+instant+recognition%2C+immediately+leverageable+by+the+marketing+and+sales+teams.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Medium+to+long+term+would+be+to+%28thereafter%29+stabilise+these+gains+for+sustainable+growth+%28through+systemization%29.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EProcess+Efficiency%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Identifying+and+streamlining+any+system%2C+or+people+related+processes%2C+with+an+effort+to+reduce+spend+and+alleviate+user+frustration+is+the+current+trend+for+a+service+demanding+and+app-fickle+generation.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Push+for+those+cost-controls+and+cost-reduction+initiatives%2C+but+continue+to+show+improvements+in+system+efficiencies+to+continually+buy+favour+in+your+user+base.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+This+is+always+a+tough+ask+for+already+sunk+costs+and+ageing+equipment+-+but+an+easier+ask+if+the+sourcing+team+has+already+considered+feature+enhancements+while+in+the+original+purchasing+phase+of+any+organisations+systems.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EProcess+efficiency+is+now+a+top-down+approach+as+business+stakeholders+have+an+appetite+to+consider+a+short-term+offering+dynamism%2C+driven+by+a+realisation+that+the+ME+needs+to+differentiate+in+a+saturated+market.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+For+custom+solutioning%2C+aligning+a+sourcing+%28partnership%29+strategy+with+the+business+direction+will+look+to+create+harmony+between+technology+goals+the+correct+solution+partner.+Efficiently+reducing+wasteful+redesign+or+rework+with+an+established+and+experienced+provider+that+has+proven+itself+in+the+services+market+before.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ETransformation%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESolutioning+that+looks+to+increase+market+share+%28or+capture+a+market%29%2C+increase+profit%2Freturns+or+increase+company+revenue%2C+are+all+top-of-mind+for+C-Suiters+and+are+a+top+priority+due+to+the+highest+value+returns.Unfortunately+only+a+few+CIOs+are+considering+new+technologies+and+advancements+to+accomplish+this%2C+instead+focussing+on+overall+stability+to+meet+these+goals.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+ME+transformation+strategy+is+to+change+business+goals+towards+faster+services+%26amp%3B+solutioning.+The+large+effort+will+come+with+transforming+the+current+business+delivery+culture+into+smaller%2C+in-house+entities+for+small%2C+quick+solutioning+teams+for+faster+gains.+These+teams+can+always+be+absorbed+into+the+legacy+business+stable%2C+or+become+the+new+engine+at+a+later+stage.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FEntelectNewsletter1.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESource%3A+Gartner%2C+May+2018+%5Bhttps%3A%2F%2Fwww.gartner.com%2Fdoc%2F3877164%3Fref%3DclientFriendlyURL%5D%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EIn+summary%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EYour+competitor%26rsquo%3Bs+faster%2C+collaborative+teams+are+eating+away+at+your+market+share.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EUltimately+a+pragmatic+approach+to+assign+budget+spend+to+the+correct+value-initiative+is+always+unique+to+the+business+and+often+based+on+the+overall+maturity+of+the+organisation.+It+is%2C+however%2C+becoming+more+important+to+rather+bias+this+spend+towards+business+value+generators+and+not+necessarily+ROI%3A+and+to+consider+this+factor+%28value%29+as+well+as%3A+type%2C+size+and+complexity+of+each+solution%2C+to+deliver+the+most+organisational+impact.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFinding+the+right+talent%2C+using+the+appropriate+systems+%28at+the+right+price+point%29+and+combining+these+to+develop+a+solution-based+culture+is+fundamental+to+the+success+of+medium-sized+enterprises+in+2019.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E In+recent+years+it+has+become+critical+for+Medium+Enterprises+%28MEs%29+to+accurately+analyse+their+technology-related+spend+to+rather+detail+the+desired+value-generators.+This+value+perspective+aids+the+decision-making+process+and+also+ensures+the+spend+is+aligned+with+the+desired+organisational+goals. Reasons+to+upgrade+your+legacy+systems %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FReasonstoupgradeyourlegacysystems.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+800px%3B+height%3A+418px%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EUpgrading+your+legacy+systems%3A+A+digital+advantage+or+giant+waste+of+money%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFor+most+enterprises%2C+the+thought+of+upgrading+a+longstanding+legacy+system+is+quite+daunting.+It+can+be+a+highly+cumbersome+process+with+lots+of+moving+parts+to+account+for%2C+generally+leading+to+an+%3Cem%3Eif+it+ain%26rsquo%3Bt+broke%2C+don%26rsquo%3Bt+fix+it%3C%2Fem%3E+mindset.+The+process+of+upgrading+is+also+infamous+for+often+being+a+costly+exercise+%26ndash%3B+causing+many+business+leaders+to+cling+to+their+deteriorating+systems.+When+a+legacy+system+still+meets+the+current+requirements%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+hard+to+justify+spending+resources+to+stay+up+to+date.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EGlobally%2C+IT+has+earned+a+poor+reputation+by+making+headlines+for+money+being+wasted+on+major+legacy+upgrades%2C+often+massively+impacting+customers+due+to+rushed+projects.+This+is+due+to+a+misperception+that+digitisation+has+to+include+scrapping+existing+technology+and+starting+over.+But+your+upgrade+could+find+a+happy+medium+by+adopting+a+hybrid+approach+between+legacy+and+modern+systems.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAlthough+your+ageing+digital+tools+may+get+the+job+done%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+important+to+recognise+when+your+business+has+the+need+for+a+modernised+alternative.+Deteriorating+legacy+systems+and+processes+you+currently+have+in+place+can+only+take+you+so+far+until+they+start+falling+behind.+This+will+impede+your+business+from+thriving+in+the+long+run.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EFour+reasons+to+upgrade+your+legacy+system%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+There+are+many+justifications+for+system+upgrades%2C+but+your+main+driving+forces+to+consider+are%3A%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E1.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BUpgrades+reduce+security+risks%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Legacy+software+was+initially+focused+on+functionality+more+than+security+and+is+often+vulnerable+to+attack+from+cyber+criminals.+Underpinning+technology+stacks+could+also+be+nearing+end+of+life+and+will+not+see+future+upgrades.+For+businesses+operating+under+some+of+the+more+recent+regulatory+compliance+requirements+such+as+POPI+and+GDPR%2C+outdated+technologies+can+lead+to+repercussions+in+the+form+of+penalties+and+reputational+damage.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E2.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BThere+is+a+shrinking+talent+pool+to+service+legacy+systems%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+skills+needed+to+support+ageing+systems+are+becoming+scarce+and+expensive.+There+are+many+of+these+solutions+still+in+service%2C+but+the+number+IT+professionals+who+can+understand+and+update+the+code+dwindles+as+the+modern+workforce+moves+towards+relevant+and+transferrable+technology+skillsets.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E3.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BOperating+and+maintaining+legacy+systems+is+costly%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+cost+of+legacy+technology+maintenance%2C+in+the+form+of+licensing+and+expensive+specialised+hardware%2C+often+outweighs+the+upgrade+investment%2C+even+over+shorter+timeframes.+The+biggest+cost+risk+is+of+course+that+of+the+potential+failure+of+a+legacy+system+and+the+resulting+business+losses.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E4.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BInnovation+is+stifled%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Older+technologies+and+systems+will+limit+the+level+of+innovation+and+not+able+to+take+advantage+of+more+modern+solutions+that+customers+have+become+accustomed+to.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EHow+to+navigate+an+upgrade+project%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Before+starting+your+upgrade%2C+consider+the+following+to+ensure+your+business+stays+up+and+running%3A%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BAvoid+one+massive+upgrade%2C+and+the+%26ldquo%3Bbig+bang%26rdquo%3B+approach.+Rather+focus+on+constantly+making+smaller+innovations+and+renewing+as+you+go.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BDo+enough+research+and+don%26rsquo%3Bt+fall+for+fancy+buzzwords+like+artificial+intelligence+or+robotic+process+automation%2C+because+the+chances+are+you+won%26rsquo%3Bt+actually+need+it.+Rather+understand+what+your+business+truly+needs+to+grow.+There+are+no+silver+bullets.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BEnsure+any+new+solutions+are+designed+around+compatibility+with+current+systems+to+create+a+more+seamless+transition.+Start+with+a+complete+audit+of+your+technology+landscape+to+gain+a+clear+picture+of+potential+impact.+This+ensures+that+no+surprise+failures+pop+up+when+going+live+with+a+new+system.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThere+are+many+obvious+and+not-so-obvious+reasons+for+upgrading+your+legacy+system%2C+and+it%26rsquo%3Bs+better+to+make+a+decision+to+upgrade+your+system+now+than+to+have+the+decision+forced+upon+you+later.+But+being+old+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt+mean+technology+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt+add+value+either.+Sometimes+changes+in+business+processes+are+more+important+than+technological+changes.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EConsidering+whether+to+upgrade+or+replace+legacy+systems+is+a+daunting+task+for+many%2C+but+if+you+do+embark+on+an+upgrade%2C+success+will+come+from+moving+methodically+and+pragmatically.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E Upgrading+your+legacy+systems%3A+A+digital+advantage+or+giant+waste+of+money%3F+For+most+enterprises%2C+the+thought+of+upgrading+a+longstanding+legacy+system+is+quite+daunting.+It+can+be+a+highly+cumbersome+process+with+lots+of+moving+parts+to+account+for%2C+generally+leading+to+an+if+it+ain%E2%80%99t+broke%2C+don%E2%80%99t+fix+it+mindset.+The+process+of+upgrading+is+also+infamous+for+often+being+a+costly+exercise+%E2%80%93+causing+many+business+leaders+to+cling+to+their+deteriorating+systems.+When+a+legacy+system+still+meets+the+current+requirements%2C+it%E2%80%99s+hard+to+justify+spending+resources+to+stay+up+to+date. ["Innovation in business"] Reasons to upgrade your legacy systems.png
A+South+African+perspective+on+traditional+IT+versus+digital+transformation %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FTraditionalITvsadigitaltransformation%28002%29.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EA+South+African+perspective+on+traditional+IT+versus+digital+transformation%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESouth+Africa+has+quite+a+few+very+large+and+very+old+organisations.+They+tend+to+be+quite+federated%2C+and+a+cursory+glance+over+their+unique+histories+explains+why.+Some+departments+and+business+units+were+acquired+or+merged%2C+some+were+started+as+silos+and+others+just+evolved+along+a+different+vector.+Therein+lies+a+problem+of+companies+with+long+histories%3A+divergence.+Customer+channels+evolve+faster+than+mainframes%2C+payments+evolve+faster+than+compliance%2C+and+insurance+faster+than+banking.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EUltimately%2C+if+we+assume+any+rate+of+improvement+of+one+area+over+another%2C+the+technological+gap+between+these+areas+widens+over+time.+The+older+the+organisation%2C+the+wider+the+gap%2C+and+the+more+complex+and+expensive+digital+transformation+becomes.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHere+are+a+few+considerations+when+designing+digital+technology+initiatives+that+deliver+change+and+close+the+gap%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EStrategic+dimension%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cul%3E+%3Cli%3EDevelop+a+bold%2C+clear+strategic+mandate+the+organisation+can+get+excited+about+at+all+levels%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Ctable+border%3D%220%22+cellpadding%3D%225%22+cellspacing%3D%225%22+style%3D%22margin-left%3A20px%3B+color%3A+%23888%3B+font-family%3AArial%2C+Helvetica%2C+sans-serif%3B+color%3A+%23888%3Bfont-size%3A+0.938em%3B+font-weight%3A+300%3B+line-height%3A1.667em%3B%22+width%3D%22100%25%22%3E+%3Ctbody%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3Ctd%3E-%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3Ctd+style%3D%22color%3A%23888%3B+font-size%3A+0.938em%3B%22%3EIf+you%26rsquo%3Bre+going+to+change+an+organisation+without+derailing+it%2C+you+need+cooperation%2C+understanding+and+championship.+CIOs+must+become+the+champions+of+the+transformation+agenda+and+spend+time+creating+understanding+with+their+managers+%3Cul%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3Ctd%3E-%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3Ctd+style%3D%22color%3A%23888%3B+font-size%3A+0.938em%3B%22%3ECampaign+for+the+strategy+internally%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3C%2Ftbody%3E+%3C%2Ftable%3E+%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cul+style%3D%22line-height%3A+1.667em%3B%22%3E+%3Cli%3EDevelop+an+implementation+plan%2C+prioritisation+matrix+and+budget+in+collaboration+with+all+CIOs%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B+%3Ctable+border%3D%220%22+cellpadding%3D%225%22+cellspacing%3D%225%22+style%3D%22margin-left%3A20px%3B+color%3A+%23888%3B+font-family%3AArial%2C+Helvetica%2C+sans-serif%3B+color%3A+%23888%3Bfont-size%3A+0.938em%3B+font-weight%3A+300%3B+line-height%3A1.667em%3B%22+width%3D%22100%25%22%3E+%3Ctbody%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3Ctd%3E-%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3Ctd+style%3D%22color%3A%23888%3B+font-size%3A+0.938em%3B%22%3EDigital+initiatives+cut+through+the+entire+organisation%2C+from+customer+channels+to+mainframes.+It+is+instructive+to+include+all+participants+in+the+process+%3Cul%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3Ctd%3E-%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3Ctd+style%3D%22color%3A%23888%3B+font-size%3A+0.938em%3B%22%3EMake+CIOs+accountable+for+planning+their+contributions+and+deciding+their+obligations+to+the+digital+initiatives.+This+creates+a+shares+sense+of+purpose%2C+obligation+and+commitment%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3C%2Ftbody%3E+%3C%2Ftable%3E+%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3ESet+shared+targets+and+incentives+across+departments+to+encourage+collaboration+and+vanquish+non-strategic+agendas%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ETechnological+dimension%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cul+style%3D%22line-height%3A+1.667em+%21impor y%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3Ctd%3E-%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3Ctd+style%3D%22color%3A%23888%3B+font-size%3A+0.938em%3B%22%3EUsing+the+five+principles+of+design-thinking+methodology%2C+ensure+that+your+organisation+is+building+digital+assets+that+are+proven+to+connect+with+and+help+your+customer.+Take+some+of+the+guesswork+out+of+implementation%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3C%2Ftbody%3E+%3C%2Ftable%3E%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cli+style%3D%22line-height%3A+1.667em+%21important%3B%22%3EConsider+platforms+and+APIs%3A+%3Cbr%3E+%3Cbr%3E+%3Ctable+border%3D%220%22+cellpadding%3D%225%22+cellspacing%3D%225%22+style%3D%22margin-left%3A20px%3B+color%3A+%23888%3B+font-family%3AArial%2C+Helvetica%2C+sans-serif%3B+color%3A+%23888%3Bfont-size%3A+0.938em%3B+font-weight%3A+300%3B+line-height%3A1.667em%3B%22+width%3D%22100%25%22%3E+%3Ctbody%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3Ctd%3E-%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3Ctd+style%3D%22color%3A%23888%3B+font-size%3A+0.938em%3B%22%3EDigital+solutions+should+be+equipped+to+evolve+quickly.+The+ability+for+third-parties+and+other+business+units+to+extend+and+integrate+with+your+solutions+is+an+important+currency+in+the+digital+world%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3C%2Ftbody%3E+%3C%2Ftable%3E+%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cli+style%3D%22line-height%3A+1.667em+%21important%3B%22%3ECentralise%2C+aggregate+and+use+your+data%3A+%3Cbr%3E+%3Cbr%3E+%3Ctable+border%3D%220%22+cellpadding%3D%225%22+cellspacing%3D%225%22+style%3D%22margin-left%3A20px%3B+color%3A+%23888%3B+font-family%3AArial%2C+Helvetica%2C+sans-serif%3B+color%3A+%23888%3Bfont-size%3A+0.938em%3B+font-weight%3A+300%3B+line-height%3A1.667em%3B%22+width%3D%22100%25%22%3E+%3Ctbody%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3Ctd%3E-%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3Ctd+style%3D%22color%3A%23888%3B+font-size%3A+0.938em%3B%22%3EAs+you+enable+more+digitalisation+within+your+organisation%2C+you+open+up+the+taps+to+more+meaningful+data.+Ensuring+a+single-view+of+the+customer+across+a+large+federated+organisation+is+an+important+business+objective%2C+and+one+that+can+be+enabled+with+the+right+tools+and+approach+to+data+management%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3C%2Ftbody%3E+%3C%2Ftable%3E+%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDigital+transformation+within+large%2C+traditional+South+African+corporates+is+a+far+cry+from+a+cake-walk%2C+and+one+needs+to+consider+both+the+political+and+the+technological+dimensions+of+a+programme+of+this+magnitude.+Organisations+can+improve+their+probability+of+success+by+driving+a+clear+and+collaborative+approach+from+the+highest+levels%2C+breaking+down+silo-thinking%2C+and+aligning+priorities+and+incentives.+From+a+technology+perspective+it%26rsquo%3Bs+all+about+the+understanding+and+implementation+of+modern+approaches+to+the+SDLC+including+feature+teams%2C+DevOps%2C+design-thinking%2C+APIs+and+big+data.%3C%2Fp%3E South+Africa+has+quite+a+few+very+large+and+very+old+organisations.+They+tend+to+be+quite+federated%2C+and+a+cursory+glance+over+their+unique+histories+explains+why.+Some+departments+and+business+units+were+acquired+or+merged%2C+some+were+started+as+silos+and+others+just+evolved+along+a+different+vector.+Therein+lies+a+problem+of+companies+with+long+histories%3A+divergence.+Customer+channels+evolve+faster+than+mainframes%2C+payments+evolve+faster+than+compliance%2C+and+insurance+faster+than+banking. ["Innovation in business"] Traditional IT vs a digital transformation.png
Build+and+buy%3A+Where+custom+software+belongs+in+your+universe %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FBuildandBuy-Wherecustomsoftwarebelongsinyouruniverse-FINAL-15.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+As+businesses+evolve%2C+they+will+need+software+as+a+foundation+of+their+strategy.+Whether+it%26rsquo%3Bs+a+product%2C+supporting+a+service%2C+or+driving+efficiency+in+business+processes%2C+there+is+no+avoiding+it.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHistorically%2C+custom+software+has+been+infamous+for+being+costly+and+redundant+in+the+presence+of+an+ever-growing+variety+and+quality+of+packaged+software+solutions.+There+are+several+areas+in+your+overall+architecture+where+packaged+solutions+still+make+the+most+sense.+These+include+systems+supporting+generic+business+functions+such+as+payroll%2C+call+centre%2C+and+systems-of-record.+In+these+areas%2C+the+business+needs+industry-standard+and+proven+systems+which+are+unlikely+to+require+much+customisation.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+recent+times%2C+custom+development+approaches+have+proven+to+be+back+in+favour+as+a+critical+component+of+any+holistic+IT+architecture.+The+key+consideration+is+where.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+a+modern+enterprise+architecture%2C+custom+software+is+essential+for+innovation%2C+differentiation+and+integration%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E1.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BInnovation%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+You+are+building+customer+surface+areas+or+digital+channels+that+need+to+be+truly+innovative.+This+is+software+that+defines+your+business.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E2.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BDifferentiation%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+You+are+currently+in+a+competitive+environment+with+a+niche+product+or+service.+You+need+a+solution+that+differentiates+yourself+from+competitors+to+stand+out+from+the+crowd+and+win+customers.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E3.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BIntegration%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+You+have+your+packaged+solutions+selected+and+working+well+independently%2C+but+need+to+present+a+more+rationalised+and+streamlined+experience+to+your+users.+You+will+need+well-designed+custom+software+to+achieve+this.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EInterestingly%2C+there+is+a+parallel+to+be+drawn+here+with+how+we+often+approach+investment+strategies%2C+and+consider+risk+versus+reward+over+the+long+term.+There+is+a+popular+portfolio-building+strategy+called+Core+%26amp%3B+Satellite.+The+premise+is+to+build+a+portfolio+designed+to+minimise+volatility+and+cost%2C+while+balancing+risk+between+active+and+passive+funds+to+provide+an+opportunity+to+outperform+the+market+as+a+whole.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAt+the+%26lsquo%3Bcore%26rsquo%3B+of+your+investment+strategy+should+be+assets+that+are+cost-effective%2C+proven%2C+robust%2C+best-practice%2C+and+relatively+risk-free.+Similarly%2C+you+need+dependable+and+functional+packaged+software+as+the+building+blocks+of+your+architecture.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAt+the+%26lsquo%3Bsatellites%26rsquo%3B+around+these+building+blocks%2C+you+need+custom+solutions+in+order+to+innovate+and+to+truly+differentiate+yourself.+You+need+non-standard+and+memorable+experiences+which+offer+greater+impact+and+reward%2C+but+come+with+some+degree+of+risk.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBalanced+correctly%2C+both+your+IT+and+investment+architectures+are+geared+to+yield+generous+returns.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FBuildandBuyINFOGRAPHIC.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EYou+need+the+robust+and+cost-effective%2C+but+static+and+unexciting+packaged+products.+You+also+need+to+deploy+custom+systems+and+differentiated+user+experiences+to+succeed.+Ultimately%2C+your+ambition+should+be+to+build+and+buy%2C+to+create+a+holistic+strategy+which+correctly+exploits+both+approaches.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
