DevOps%3A+buzzword+of+the+moment The+overall+impact+was+potentially+less+than+today%26rsquo%3Bs+demand+for+accuracy+and+expediency%2C+however%2C+the+interactions+and+flow+of+people%2C+processes+and+systems+were+just+as+important+as+they+are+today.+The+combination+and+intra-workings+of+the+development+process+and+the+dependency+on+operational+components+form+the+basis+for+the+logical+grouping+of+these+functions+into+one+%26mdash%3B+DevOps.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+basic+principles+of+software+delivery%26ndash%3B+analyse%2C+code%2C+test+and+deploy+%26ndash%3B+haven%26rsquo%3Bt+changed+dramatically+over+the+past+few+years.+However%2C+there+has+been+a+tremendous+maturity+seen+in+the+supporting+process+and+tools.+This+is+most+prevalent+in+the+more+modern+and+controlled+software+development+environments%2C+which+have+shortened+release+cycles+from+weeks+to+hours+without+compromising+on+the+same+quality+delivery+%26ndash%3B+all+as+a+result+of+a+high+level+of+DevOps+automation.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+DevOps+tools+have+also+subsequently+gained+focus+by+being+further+developed+to+accompany+and+enhance+the+preferred+development+methodologies.+Including+tasks+such+as+automated+quality+assurance+%28QA%29+processes%2C+measuring+code+coverage+and+also+performing+code-compilation+tasks%2C+issue+tracking+and+the+final+deployment+and+configuration+of+compiled+systems+are+now+the+norm.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Efficiently+grouping+all+these+requirements+together%2C+while+also+coordinating+the+project%26rsquo%3Bs+tasks%2C+was+traditionally+the+responsibility+of+development+managers.+However%2C+we+have+seen+the+empowerment+of+development+teams+to+accomplish+the+same+or+similar+outcomes.+Reporting+metrics+%26ndash%3B+including+backlog%2C+delivery+rate%2C+and+the+related+costs+%26ndash%3B+to+chief+information+officers+has+also+been+made+easier.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Once+it+is+understood+that+every+software+team+has+some+form+of+DevOps%2C+many+with+varying+levels+of+maturity+or+slants+in+implementation%2C+the+next+step+is+to+understand+the+overriding+objective%3A+to+make+your+software+delivery+life+cycle+%28or+preferably+an+iterative+cycle%29+and+the+operational+requirements%2C+as+efficient+and+painless+as+possible.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In+our+experience%2C+clients+frequently+ask+how+quickly+they+can+get+what+they+want%2C+and+depend+on+your+rapid+response+to+change+while+you%26rsquo%3Bre+balancing+development+scope%2C+time+to+implement+and+the+cost%2C+as+efficiently+as+possible.+The+software+development+industry+has+been+forced+to+embrace+the+creation+of+internal+facilities+to+allow+for+this+change+to+inevitably+deal+with+scope+creep+or+scope+change.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+underpinning+of+your+DevOps%2C+and+the+capabilities+of+your+staff%2C+will+facilitate+change+without+the+need+for+embarking+on+another+complete+analysis+phase.+We+are+finding+that+there+is+a+trend+of+pushing+the+develop-to-specification+%28traditionally+a+binding+contract%2C+accurate+to+the+last+full-stop%29+to+the+sidelines.+Emerging+businesses+need+to+be+in+an+entrepreneurial+position+to+change+according+to+market-related+direction+and+pressures.+As+such%2C+so+do+the+companies+supporting+the+development+of+their+software+projects.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+This+change-management+complexity+exists+in+every+operations+hub+within+software+companies+worldwide.+The+industry%26%2339%3Bs+reaction+is+to+consider+and+implement+Agile%2C+Scrum+or+Kanban+methodologies+to+structure+the+flow+of+design+principles%2C+manage+issue+%28defect%29+and+change+tracking%2C+and+efficiently+allow+the+flow+into+release+management%2C+which+ultimately+results+in+a+solid+product+or+valuable+service+to+a+client.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Principles+of+continuous+integration+and+continuous+build+have+become+an+integral+part+of+modern+DevOps.+If+you%26rsquo%3Bre+not+currently+doing+these%2C+you%26rsquo%3Bre+behind+the+curve+of+collaborative+development+and+are+likely+to+be+diminishing+your+production+quality+by+increasing+technical+debt%2C+substituting+automated+operations+for+man-power%2C+and+increasing+costs+unnecessarily. %3Cstrong%3EMark+Beets+%28GM%3A+Business+Development%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E+%3Cbr%2F%3E%3Cbr%2F%3E+DevOps+has%2C+in+principle%2C+been+around+for+decades.+In+the+early+1980%E2%80%99s%2C+DevOps+was+a+rudimentary+end-to-end+process.+It+started+with+punching+holes+into+cards+%28representations+of+code+and+data%29%2C+quality+assuring+their+correctness%2C+an+then+physically+transporting+the+cards+to+be+fed+into+an+IBM+mainframe.+All+the+while+ensuring+that+nothing+fell+out+or+was+blown+away%2C+breaking+the+program+and+causing+delays+in+delivery. ["New technology"] Mark.jpg
Business+Intelligence%3A+getting+back+to+thinking+inside+the+box The+typical+BI+solution+consolidates+multiple+data+sources%2C+cleans+the+data+to+ensure+accuracy+and+quality+and+then+disseminates+the+information+into+a+time-variant+data+store.+The+%26lsquo%3Btraditional%26rsquo%3B+approach+has+several+pros+and+cons.+When+implemented+correctly+and+time+variance+works+well%2C+it+can+compensate+for+integration+shortfalls+within+source+systems%2C+allowing+an+organisation+to+gather+huge+insights+into+its+customer+base+by+storing+history+and+gathering+trends.+A+good+example+of+this+was+when+the+retail+group+Target+sent+a+teenage+customer+a+pregnancy-coupon+kit%2C+before+she+had+even+let+her+own+father+know+she+was+pregnant.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+converse+side+is+that+all+too+often%2C+BI+solutions+become+a+%26lsquo%3Bwhite+elephant%26rsquo%3B+in+organisations.+This+is+largely+due+to+the+fact+that+there+is+a+longer+time+to+market+and+companies+cannot+keep+up+with+the+ever-changing+businesses.+When+not+implemented+correctly%2C+BI+solutions+can+become+a+hindrance+to+use+and+difficult+to+extract+information+from.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+It+is+becoming+more+and+more+challenging+to+keep+track+of+all+the+BI+tools+that+connect+and+report+directly+off+an+organisation%26rsquo%3Bs+source+systems.+These+tools+are+attractive+and+usually+quick+to+implement.+Within+a+matter+of+weeks%2C+a+CFO+can+have+a+dashboard+that+tells+him+or+her+everything+there+is+to+know+about+the+organisation%26rsquo%3Bs+finances%2C+an+operations+manager+can+quickly+see+the+performance+of+the+department%2C+a+call-centre+manager+can+understand+which+agents+are+performing+well+and+a+sales+department+will+have+a+good+representation+of+how+good+its+sales+actually+are.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Whilst+these+tools+work%2C+and+they+usually+work+well%2C+there+are+several+fundamentals+that+need+to+be+in+place+for+these+tools+to+provide+an+effective+solution%3A+accurate+and+integrated+data+in+the+source+systems+needs+to+be+perfect.+If+this+cannot+be+guaranteed%2C+a+separate+level+of+abstraction+is+required%2C+and+this+is+achieved+through+a+traditional+BI+solution.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+It+is+important+to+understand+the+motivation+for+organisations+wanting+to+implement+a+BI+system.+One+of+the+challenges+faced+by+many+organisations+is+calculating+the+true+profitability+of+a+customer%2C+that+is+how+much+money+the+customer+actually+spends+with+the+organisation%2C+and+how+much+does+the+cost+of+sales+actually+cost+the+organisation.+Costs+associated+with+a+customer+include+the+cost+of+the+actual+product+or+service+being+sold%2C+the+commissions+paid+to+the+sales+people%2C+the+organisation%26rsquo%3Bs+fixed+costs+that+need+to+be+distributed+across+all+customers+and+then+there+are+additional+variable+costs.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Only+once+we+have+done+Activity+Based+Costing+and+incorporated+all+fixed+and+variable+costs%2C+can+we+truly+get+an+accurate+reflection+of+a+customer%26rsquo%3Bs+profitability.+In+addition+to+trying+to+find+out+a+customer%26rsquo%3Bs+true+profitability%2C+analysing+information+to+understand+inefficiencies+in+a+business+is+a+big+motivator.+Which+of+the+products+are+not+moving+fast+enough+and+therefore+costing+too+much+to+store%3F+When+will+the+company+run+out+of+stock+and+what+are+the+cross-sell+opportunities%3F+Which+debtor%26rsquo%3Bs+agents+are+performing+and+which+aren%26rsquo%3Bt%3F+These+are+all+questions+that+organisations+are+trying+to+answer.+These+are+all+questions+that+good+a+BI+solution+should+be+able+to+provide+answers+to.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+To+successfully+implement+a+BI+solution%2C+management+needs+to+understand+the+disparate+systems+in+their+organisation.+Instead+of+trying+to+go+for+the+quick+win%2C+they+need+to+keep+their+long-term+strategy+in+mind.+No+one+in+an+organisation+should+have+%26lsquo%3Bconsolidating+data+not+available+in+the+BI+solution%26rsquo%3B+as+part+of+his+or+her+job+description.+Before+teams+try+to+get+dashboards+out%2C+they+need+to+understand+the+underlying+systems+in+the+organisation+and+the+Data+Supply+Chain.+Data+needs+to+be+100+per+cent+accurate+and+integrated%2C+with+sufficient+history+maintained+to+enable+the+discovery+of+important+trends.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+An+effective+BI+solution+should+be+able+to+drive+innovation+in+your+organisation+and+simplify+people%26rsquo%3Bs+lives.+The+purpose+of+a+BI+solution+is+far+more+than+a+presentation+layer+on+top+of+your+data.+While+your+organisation+is+busy+trying+to+impress+each+other+with+pie+charts%2C+someone+else%2C+a+more+innovative+and+forward-thinking+organisation%2C+is+focusing+on+transforming+data+into+information+and+letting+that+information+drive+innovation.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Implementing+an+effective+BI+solution+should+not+be+difficult+if+you+keep+the+fundamentals+in+mind+and+make+sure+it+is+not+an+afterthought.+An+efficient+BI+solution+will+also+enable+you+to+create+additional+service+offerings%2C+find+new+opportunities+in+the+market+and+validate+strategic+business+decisions. %3Cstrong%3ERyan+Naude+%28Manager%3A+Data+Solutions%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E+%3Cbr%2F%3E%3Cbr%2F%3E+The+landscape+of+Business+Intelligence+%28BI%29+is+shifting.+More+and+more+companies+are+looking+for+a+rapid+implementation+of+a+BI+solution.+While+the+request+to+see+a+return+on+investment+in+a+solution+as+quickly+as+possible+is+not+unfounded%2C+organisations+are+starting+to+forget+what+goes+into+the+foundation+of+a+robust+BI+solution. ["New technology"] Ryan.jpg
So+you%27re+still+running+SQL+Server+2008%3F Crucially%2C+it+means+no+more+hotfixes%2C+no+more+cumulative+updates+and+no+more+service+packs.+If+a+bug+is+identified%2C+it+will+not+be+fixed%2C+even+if+it+is+a+critical+bug+that+severely+hinders+normal+operation.+For+those+businesses+running+critical+operations%2C+this+may+be+unacceptable%2C+and+so+upgrading+to+a+newer+version+is+clearly+the+answer.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+preferred+version+to+upgrade+to+at+this+point+in+time+would+be+SQL+Server+2014.+There+are+two+main+editions%3A+Standard+and+Enterprise.+Standard+edition+is+intended+for+non-mission+critical+workloads+and+small+organisations.+It+lacks+many+of+the+scalability+and+availability+features+in+Enterprise+edition.+Enterprise+edition+is+aimed+at+the+important+workloads+where+minimising+downtime+and+maximising+performance+is+critical.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Switching+to+SQL+Server+2014+is+not+insanely+bleeding-edge.+With+releases+now+coming+every+two+years+now%2C+there+are+few+good+reasons+to+upgrade+to+an+older+version.+The+habit+of+waiting+for+SP1+is+old+fashioned.+Service+packs+are+released+less+frequently+and+are+replaced+with+more+regular+and+smaller+cumulative+updates.+Of+course%2C+staying+within+support+is+not+the+only+reason+one+would+upgrade%2C+the+features+that+appear+in+newer+versions+are+an+incentive+to+upgrade%2C+too.+There+have+been+some+great+enhancements+made+in+SQL+Server+2014+that+make+it+worth+considering%2C+these+include%3A+%3Cul+id%3D%22careersList%22%3E+%3Cli%3EMemory-optimised+tables%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EColumnstore+indexes%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EBuffer+pool+extension%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EEncrypted+backups%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EAlwaysOn+for+HA%2FDR%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Memory-optimised+tables+and+Columnstore+indexes+are+two+aspects+of+SQL+Server%26rsquo%3Bs+in-memory+offering+%26ndash%3B+see+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.entelect.co.za%2FNews%2FDisplayNewsItem.aspx%3Fniid%3D33889%22%3Ehttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.entelect.co.za%2FNews%2FDisplayNewsItem.aspx%3Fniid%3D33889.+%3C%2Fa%3EMemory-optimised+tables+enable+transaction+processing+at+the+very+highest+level+and+Columnstore+indexes+allow+for+incredibly+fast+analytics.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+Buffer-pool+extension+allows+both+Standard+and+Enterprise+editions+to+use+solid-+state+devices+as+if+they+were+memory%2C+offering+improved+scalability+and+throughput+for+both+OLTP+and+reporting+workloads.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+While+SQL+Server+has+offered+compressed+backups+for+multiple+versions%2C+encrypted+backups+have+been+a+long-standing+request.+With+increasing+numbers+of+data+thefts+and+breeches%2C+it+is+more+important+than+ever+to+properly+protect+backups%2C+and+that+protection+starts+by+encrypting+the+backup+at+creation+time.+This+can+now+be+done+in+SQL+Server+2014%2C+in+both+Standard+and+Enterprise+editions.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+AlwaysOn%2C+available+from+SQL+Server+2012%2C+allows+for+both+high+availability+and+scale-out+of+reporting+workloads+with+its+combination+of+synchronous+and+asynchronous+replicas.+It+also+allows+for+the+offloading+of+a+backup+workload+so+that+the+primary+server+can+continue+serving+the+business+and+customers+without+interruption.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Although+the+end+of+support+for+SQL+2008+is+drawing+nearer%2C+the+exciting+features+available+in+SQL+Server+2012+and+2014%2C+make+upgrading+a+sound+proposition. %3Cstrong%3EGail+Shaw+%28Entelect+Technical+Lead%3A+SQL+Server%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E+%3Cbr%2F%3E%3Cbr%2F%3E+Mainstream+support+for+both+SQL+Server+2008+and+SQL+Server+2008+R2+ends+in+July+2014%2C+so+it+is+important+to+understand+exactly+what+this+means. ["New technology"] Gail.jpg
Internet+of+Things+%E2%80%93+it%E2%80%99s+all+about+the+data %3Ch3%3E+Gathering+the+data%3C%2Fh3%3E+Crowdsourcing%2C+a+term+coined+in+2005%2C+describes+a+process+used+to+obtain+services%2C+ideas+and+content+by+soliciting+contributions+from+a+population+of+people%2C+knowingly+or+unknowingly%2C+on+the+part+of+the+participant.+The+emergence+of+the+Internet+has+made+crowdsourcing+a+common+approach+to+obtain+these+services%2C+ideas+and+content%2C+regardless+what+the+crowdsourcer+may+use+them+for.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+There+is+a+vast+amount+of+information+that+is+gathered+using+crowdsourcing+projects%2C+for+example%3A+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cul+id%3D%22careersList%22%3E+%3Cli%3E+Wikipedia+is+the+most+popular+referenced+site+on+the+Internet+today%2C+with+close+to+5+million+content+pages+being+maintained+by+users+at+an+average+of+21.78+edits+per+day+and+an+excess+of+732+million+page+edits+since+its+inception.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E+TripAdvisor%2C+the+Internet%26rsquo%3Bs+largest+travel+site%2C+allows+potential+travellers+to+plan+their+journeys+by+offering+trusted+advice+from+people+who+have+been+to+the+place+in+question.+TripAdvisor+hosts+more+than+170+million+reviews+and+opinions+on+more+than+4+million+businesses+in+more+than+140%2C000+destinations.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E+Microsoft%26rsquo%3Bs+Most+Valuable+Professional+%28MVP%29+programme+enables+MVPs+to+answer+millions+of+questions+each+year.+The+MVPS+provide+vital+feedback+reflecting+the+needs+of+Microsoft+customers.+MVPs+are+not+paid%2C+instead%2C+they+answer+questions+to+share+their+knowledge+with+others+and+for+the+recognition+they+receive.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E+Waze%2C+which+was+recently+acquired+by+Google%2C+allows+its+50+million+users+to+share+information+about+daily+traffic+incidents+and+situations+on+roads.+This+information+assists+other+users+in+travelling+around+efficiently.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+It+is+clear+that+we+are+living+in+an+age+of+Big+Data.+Crowdsourcing+is+a+very+efficient+way+of+gathering+information+that+can+be+utilised+for+economic+benefit+or+to+benefit+communities+as+a+whole+and+to+make+our+lives+easier.+The+original+nature+of+crowdsourcing+is+to+use+willing+participants.+Those+who+are+can+spend+time+and+resources+assisting+in+gathering+and+submitting+information+%26ndash%3B+whatever+the+crowdsourcer+needs.+With+what+some+might+describe+as+a+revolution+of+the+IoT%2C+all+of+this+has+already+changed.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Ch3%3E+Possibilities%3C%2Fh3%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Imagine+a+world+where+everybody+with+Internet+connectivity+has+the+ability+to%2C+with+a+whole+army+of+their+own+devices%2C+submit+information+with+minimal+effort+as+frequently+as+they+like+or+even+in+real-time+and+on+demand+%26ndash%3B+this+is+crowdsourcing+on+a+whole+new+scale%21+In+other+words%2C+we+could+start+modelling+the+world+and+build+an+online+state+model+of+the+world+in+which+we+live.+This+would+be+possible+by+making+use+of+and+connecting+consumer%26rsquo%3Bs+everyday+devices%2C+leading+to+a+massive+explosion+of+data.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+data+can+include+almost+any+type+of+information%2C+such+as+weather+conditions%2C+ocean+currents+and+wildlife+locations.+Health+information+and+the+tracking+of+individuals%26rsquo%3B+medical+history+can+make+medical+practitioners+aware+of+their+patients%26rsquo%3B+condition+and+may+even+assist+in+warning+of+conditions+before+the+patient+becomes+aware+of+his+or+her+symptoms.+The+data+can+also+help+researchers+gain+insight+into+any+population+or+any+items%26rsquo%3B+attributes.+This+could+help+us+make+assumptions+and+draw+correlations+between+patterns+we+never+even+knew+existed.+Imagine+being+able+to+query+a+model+of+the+world+at+your+convenience.+This+means+you+can+access+information+someone+or+someTHING+logged%2C+for+example%2C+on+the+route+you+might+take+on+holiday+or+to+work.+You+could+access+the+data+for+whatever+reason+you+need+the+specific+information%26hellip%3B+if+you+can+measure+it%2C+you+can+include+it.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Ch3%3E+Remote+controlling+%26lsquo%3BThings%26rsquo%3B+based+on+information%3C%2Fh3%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+When+you+can+request+information+from+devices+in+real-time%2C+you+can+also+send+commands.+This+means+that+we+can+start+controlling+devices+remotely.+We+can+set+up+rules+in+the+cloud+to+perform+specific+tasks+based+on+our+observations+of+our+%26lsquo%3Bworld+model%26rsquo%3B%2C+which+is+representing+the+state+of+the+world.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Ch3%3E+Speaking+to+everything%3C%2Fh3%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Interaction+between+devices+will+mean+that+they+will+be+able+to+%26lsquo%3Bspeak%26rsquo%3B+to+one+another%2C+and+that+devices+will+have+the+ability+to+act+and+to+be+controlled+based+on+the+state+of+everything+around+them+%26ndash%3B+for+example%2C+this+could+mean%3A+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cul+id%3D%22careersList%22%3E+%3Cli%3E+We+could+control+traffic+lights+based+on+specific+traffic+conditions.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E+We+could+monitor+the+health+of+workers+and+stop+access+to+hazardous+work+environments+should+there+be+any+condition+present+that+endangers+a+workforce.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E+We+could+monitor+the+environments+for+less-than-ideal+conditions.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E+Autonomous+cars+can+use+information+they+obtain+from+other+cars+and+conditions+around+them+to+drive+safely+without+any+human+intervention+%26ndash%3B+something+major+players+such+as+Google+are+already+developing.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Some+of+these+things+are+already+happening+but+they+occur+in+isolation+where+integrating+all+of+the+data%2C+or+at+least+a+platform+to+allow+systems+to+do+their+own+integration+and+correlation%2C+can+mean+decision+making+and+automation+processes+are+much+smarter.+A+whole+plethora+of+possibilities+opens+up+%26ndash%3B+for+example%2C+think+about%3A+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cul+id%3D%22careersList%22%3E+%3Cli%3E+Convenience+%28home+automation%2C+stock-monitoring+systems%29%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E+Safety+%28warning+systems+monitoring+various+factors%29%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E+Security+%28online+motion+sensors%2C+cameras+and+tracking+of+items%29%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E+Controlling+devices+based+on+%26lsquo%3Bawareness%26rsquo%3B+of+present+company%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E+Energy+and+resource+usage+optimisation+%28energy+monitoring+on+electronics%2C+effective+irrigation+control+based+on+conditions%29%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E+Health+monitoring%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E+Occupational+hygiene+monitoring%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E+Wildlife+preservation+%28tracking+of+animals+and+their+vital+statistics%29%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Ch3%3E+Futuristic+but+already+affordable%3C%2Fh3%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+There+are+probably+many+more+%26lsquo%3Bfuturistic%26rsquo%3B+uses+but+the+fact+is%2C+the+technology+is+already+here+and+it+is+becoming+more+and+more+affordable+and+less+power+hungry.+It+is+becoming+cheaper+and+easier+to+implement.+One+way+is+to+use+the+technology+that+already+exists.+Waze+is+already+doing+this+without+most+of+us+even+realising.+Our+smartphones+and+their+sensory+inputs+are+being+used+as+%26lsquo%3BThings%26rsquo%3B+on+the+Internet.+When+using+Waze%2C+without+submitting+traffic+information+manually%2C+you+are+doing+so+by+just+using+the+application.+It+will+log+information+with+regards+to+your+travel+using+the+sensory+inputs+on+your+phone.+Smartphones+are%2C+in+many+ways%2C+some+of+the+earliest+%26lsquo%3BThings%26rsquo%3B+on+the+Internet.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Companies%2C+including+Google%2C+are+spending+money+on+mesh+networks+and+are+acquiring+companies%2C+such+as+Nest+Labs+amongst+others%2C+to+assist+with+their+research+and+development+in+this+area.+Many+ways+are+being+researched+by+big+companies+and+hobbyists+to+make+wireless+communications+cheaper+and+less+power+hungry.+Hobbyists+can+already%2C+with+reasonable+ease+in+their+own+homes%2C+use+Wi-Fi%2C+Bluetooth+LE+and+low+frequency+RF+communications+to+gather+sensory+data.+Using+development+platforms+such+as+Raspberry+Pi%2C+Arduino+and+Beaglebone%2C+these+different+communication+media+are+being+used+by+hobbyists+to+relay+information+and+receive+commands+via+the+Internet.+Fitness-tracking+devices+are+becoming+increasingly+popular+for+active+people.+The+traditional+fitness+computer%2Ffitness+watch+manufactures+have+their+hands+full+keeping+up+with+new+functionality+being+made+available+by+a+range+of+new+entrants+at+affordable+prices+into+their+market.+These+are+all+connected+to+the+Internet+in+some+way%2C+some+real-time%2C+others+delayed%2C+but+they+are+all+examples+of+%26lsquo%3BThings%26rsquo%3B+already+on+the+Internet.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Ch3%3E+Barriers+to+entry%3C%2Fh3%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+It+is+obvious+that+the+obstacles+to+implementing+these+futuristic+ideas+are+not+technological.+Each+hobbyist+can+already+create+a+model+of+his+or+her+world.+There+are+even+products+out+there+that+give+you+access+to+devices+in+your+home+via+the+Internet.+However%2C+this+is+not+where+the+power+of+the+IoT+lies.+Individuals+using+these+products+would+probably+be+able+to+control+everything+in+their+houses+remotely%2C+they+can+probably+sense+conditions+remotely+and+can+as+a+result%2C+with+some+server+side+processing%2C+set+up+some+rules+to+automate+and+manage+their+world.+This+is+very+impressive%2C+but+probably+also+regarded+as+very+%26lsquo%3Bgeeky%26rsquo%3B+by+most.+The+true+power+lies+in+taking+everybody%26rsquo%3Bs+small+worlds+and+integrating+them+into+one+integrated+world+on+the+Internet.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Ch3%3E+Protocols%3C%2Fh3%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+integration+medium+is+already+there+in+the+form+of+the+Internet+but+currently%2C+the+problem+lies+in+the+protocols+used+to+get+the+information+onto+the+Internet.+Some+would+argue+to+use+the+same+protocols+as+the+rest+of+the+Internet+but+there+are+difficulties+with+this.+Our+%26lsquo%3BThings%26rsquo%3B+need+to+be+low+powered+and+cheap%2C+therefore+we+would+need+lightweight+protocols+to+move+information+efficiently+to+a+single+point+on+our+local+network%2C+before+passing+it+onto+our+traditional+Internet.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+At+the+moment%2C+many+protocols+exist+but+we+are+in+the+process+of+seeing+which+one+will+emerge+as+the+most+used.+This+is+important+because+consumers+would+want+to%2C+without+thinking+about+it%2C+have+their+devices+or+things+able+to+use+the+same+point+of+access+to+the+Internet+and+able+to+talk+to+each+other%2C+or+at+the+least+to+use+each+other%2C+as+a+mesh+networking+node.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Ch3%3E+Socioeconomics%3C%2Fh3%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Other+important+questions+include%3A+are+people+ready+for+this%3F+Will+they+embrace+this+change%3F+The+chances+are+that+many+will+feel+that+this+impacts+their+privacy%2C+and+would+not+want+to+share+information.+They+believe+that+%26lsquo%3Bif+it%26rsquo%3Bs+no+longer+on+my+premises%2C+I+do+not+have+control+over+who+sees+it%26rsquo%3B.+This+notion%2C+however%2C+seems+to+be+taking+a+backseat+with+organisations+moving+to+utilise+the+benefits+of+cloud+computing.+The+difference+here%2C+is+that+the+IoT%2C+does+not+only+involve+organisations+but+it+also+includes+end+consumers.+Therefore+a+similar+mind+shift+%26ndash%3B+cloud-based+computing+required+from+organisations+%26ndash%3B+is+required+from+consumers+of+these+products+and+devices.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Ch3%3E+Security%3C%2Fh3%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Consumers+are+scared+because+they+do+not+comprehend+the+likelihood%2C+or+the+impact+of+risks+regarding+security.+As+a+result%2C+they+also+do+not+understand+how+to+minimise+the+likelihood+of+these+risks.+With+privacy+being+such+a+major+concern%2C+security+is+important+to+put+device+owners+in+compete+control+of+who+can+see+their+data.+With+no+single+protocol+at+the+moment+being+the+norm%2C+it+is+very+difficult+to+have+a+single+way+to+implement+security+in+such+a+way%2C+at+device+level+%28especially+wireless+devices%29+that+is+trusted+to+the+same+degree+as+the+security+on+the+Internet.+Also%2C+the+impact+of+security+breaches%2C+especially+on+the+remote-control+side+of+devices%2C+may+also+have+a+greater+impact+%26ndash%3B+imagine+cars+and+access+control+being+hacked.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Ch3%3E+An+extension+of+our+Internet%3C%2Fh3%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Adoption+of+the+IoT+will+probably+change+our+world+in+such+a+way+that+we+cannot+imagine+right+now.+In+essence%2C+it+is+an+extension+of+our+Internet%2C+as+we+have+always+known+it.+However%2C+the+IoT+can+control+and+read+values+of+real-+life+things+and+it+can+be+used+to+access+more+information+than+just+what+was+posted+by+humans.+Suddenly+a+whole+new+range+of+data+sources+can+be+made+available+on+the+Internet+over+HTTP+and+other+protocols%2C+and+this+data+will+be+accessible+similarly+to+how+we+make+information+in+databases+available.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In+the+same+way+the+software+world+moved+at+an+incredible+pace%2C+the+hardware+and+embedded+world+started+moving+at+the+same+pace+with+open+source+prototyping+platforms%2C+3D+printers+and+laser+cutters.+People+are+making+their+projects+available+open+source.+Everybody+is+collaborating+and+working+on+new+devices%2C+their+communications+and+this+%26lsquo%3Bnew+extension%26rsquo%3B+of+our+Internet.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Users+should+be+prepared+for+a+range+of+new+solutions+needed+in+the+cloud+to+support+all+of+the+data+gathered+and+innovations+resulting+from+new+opportunities+made+possible+by+the+IoT.+Exciting+times+are+ahead+and+in+the+same+way+we+converged+on+a+set+of+standards+on+the+Web%2C+we+will+converge+on+a+set+of+standards+for+the+IoT+that+will+integrate+with+our+existing+Web+standards.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Cisco+estimates+that+by+2020+we+will+have+more+than+50+billion+devices+connected+to+the+Internet.+Some+might+argue+that+50+billion+is+optimistic+but+it+does+give+you+an+idea+of+the+level+of+belief+Cisco+has+in+the+IoT+growing.+Cisco+is+not+alone+and+companies+including+Google%2C+IBM%2C+Microsoft%2C+have+all+made+announcements+regarding+some+sort+of+IoT+innovation%2C+and%2For+shown+intention+on+capitalising+on+the+growth+of+the+IoT.+Effectively%2C+the+IoT+will+move+us+from+having+smartphones%2C+smartTVs%2C+connected+cars%2C+and+wearables+to+having+smartcars%2C+smarthomes%2C+smartcities%2C+smartoffices%2C+smartfactories%2C+and+other+smartenvironments. %3Cstrong%3EHennie+Lessing+%28Entelect+Team+Lead%3A+Software+Development%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E+%3Cbr%2F%3E%3Cbr%2F%3E+Before+we+can+understand+the+Internet+of+Things+%28IoT%29%2C+we+need+to+know+a+little+more+about+where+the+information+that+is+used+comes+from+%E2%80%93+after+all%2C+the+IoT+is+all+about+the+data%21 ["New technology"] Hennie.jpg
Big+Data+and+the+Vs After+having+many+discussions+about+the+topic+of+Big+Data+with+Entelect%26rsquo%3Bs+CTO%2C+Martin+Naude%2C+I+decided+to+visit+my+go-to+website%2C+Wikipedia%2C+for+a+%26lsquo%3Btidy%26rsquo%3B%2C+encyclopedic+definition.+According+to+Wiki%2C+the+concept+of+Big+Data+has+been+around+since+2001.+Initially%2C+there+were+three+V%26%2339%3Bs+that+defined+Big+Data.+These+were+volume%2C+velocity+and+variety.+However%2C+this+is+where+the+main+dilemma+begins%26hellip%3B+no+one+can+define+any+of+these+V%26%2339%3Bs+for+me.+There+is+no+concise+definition+of+what+each+one+means+or+entails.+So+after+all+the+research+and+more+discussions%2C+I+have+decided+to+throw+the+dictionary+%28and+Wiki%29+out+of+the+window+on+this+one+and+come+up+with+simpler%2C+more+realistic+definitions+of+all+the+V%26%2339%3Bs+and+at+the+same+time%2C+hopefully+make+sense+of+Big+Data.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+While+researching+the+%26lsquo%3Bvolume%26rsquo%3B+side+of+Big+Data%2C+I+found+quite+a+few+definitions.+Some+say+the+data+must+be+terabytes%2C+petabytes+and+even+larger.+However%2C+%26lsquo%3Bvolume%26rsquo%3B+was+set+as+a+pillar+back+in+2001%2C+and+when+I+look+back+on+my+career%2C+in+the+early+2000s+if+someone+had+100+gigabytes+of+data+in+a+data+store%2C+he+or+she+was+on+the+bleeding+edge+and+would+probably+asked+to+be+a+keynote+speaker+at+a+conference+to+explain+how+he+or+she+actually+got+it+right.+Today%2C+we+are+in+a+more+privileged+environment.+For+just+US%243500+we+can+buy+a+small+footprint+hard+drive+that+can+store+all+the+music+that+the+world+has+ever+produced.+With+the+uptake+of+solid+state+drives%2C+we+are+able+to+equip+a+server+that+has+the+ability+to+store+and+access+tons+of+data+without+breaking+the+bank.+So+my+definition+of+volume+is+more+around+the+%3Cem%3Eability%3C%2Fem%3E+to+store+and+access+large+volumes+of+data%2C+and+not+purely+a+focus+on+the+amount+of+data+that+constitutes+Big+Data.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26lsquo%3BVelocity%26rsquo%3B+refers+to+rapidly+changing+data+that+is+processed+at+a+very+quick+rate.+It+won%26rsquo%3Bt+come+as+a+shock+to+find+that+I+have+an+issue+with+this+one%2C+too%21+Where+is+the+line+in+the+sand+to+say+we+are+processing+quickly%3A+is+it+6+gigabytes+a+second+as+in+the+case+of+the+Large+Hadron+Collider%2C+is+it+1%2C000+transactions+a+second+or+is+it+once+a+month%3F+I+believe+that+velocity+is+less+of+an+important+consideration+and+rather+that+it+is+the+ability+to+process%2C+analyse+and+output+the+transactions+at+a+required+rate+over+a+specific+required+timeframe.+For+example%2C+transactional+fraud+detection+is+important+and+we+may+need+near-real-time+algorithms+to+run+against+the+transactions+processing%2C+otherwise%2C+our+risk+exposure+would+increase+dramatically.+For+geofencing+applications+we+need+near-real+time%2C+too.+However%2C+if+we+want+to+analyse+a+debtors%26rsquo%3B+book%2C+an+acceptable+time+of+a+day+or+two+to+run+certain+scenarios+and+put+plans+in+place+for+results+processing+is+fine.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+When+we+look+at+velocity%2C+we+also+need+to+take+into+account+several+external+factors.+These+include+infrastructure+and+Internet+speeds%2C+storage+ability+and+processing+speeds.+This+is+where+software+meets+hardware+and+fortunately%2C+we+are+in+the+middle+of+a+software+boom%3A+new+data+storage+engines+are+being+released+every+month+and+we+now+have+the+likes+of+Mongo%2C+NewSQL%2C+NoSQL%2C+Hadoop+and+many+more+that+challenge+our+preconceptions+of+storing+data+in+non-traditional+formats.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26lsquo%3BVariety%26rsquo%3B+is+the+one+%26lsquo%3BV%26rsquo%3B+that+has+really+matured+over+the+last+ten+years.+We+now+have+the+Internet+of+Things+%28IoT%29+and+in+sensor-driven+manufacturing%2C+we+have+the+ability+to+pull+in+social+media+information+to+take+our+understanding+of+our+customer+to+the+next+level%2C+and+we+also+have+many+more+lines+of+business+systems+that+we+did+ten+years+ago.+This+is+where+the+real+challenge+starts+from+a+Business+Intelligence+%28BI%29%2C+analytics+and+Big+Data+point+of+view.+We+can+no+longer+pick+a+technology+and+run+with+it.+Historically%2C+organisations+were+a+Microsoft+or+an+Oracle+outfit+but+they+are+now+faced+with+the+challenge+of+running+side-by-side+appliances+that+are+appropriate+for+the+relevant+variety+of+data+they+are+attempting+to+consolidate+and+relate.+Today%2C+organisations+need+to+start+diversifying+from+a+single-vendor+solution+%28although+I+don%26rsquo%3Bt+think+believe+traditional+relational+database+will+ever+die%29%2C+to+face+a+new+challenge+of+taking+that+traditional+relational+data+and+relating+it+to+unstructured+data+%28for+example%2C+on+a+Hadoop+appliance%29+and+yet+still+provide+the+results+through+a+mechanism+that+business+users+can+understand+while+remaining+intuitive.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+I+am+not+sure+what+happened+in+2012+but+another+V+was+added+to+the+list+%26ndash%3B+%26lsquo%3BVeracity%26rsquo%3B.+This+means+that+the+data+needs+to+conform+to+the+truth+and+the+data+has+to+be+trusted.+This%2C+to+me%2C+brings+everything+back+together+and+forms+the+foundation+for+a+Big+Data+implementation.+In+everything+we+are+doing%2C+we+need+to+ensure+that+what+we+are+providing+to+business+conforms+to+the+truth+and+can+be+trusted.+If+we+look+up+some+successful+Big+Data+applications+and+implementations%2C+we+just+need+to+ask+the+question+%26lsquo%3Bwhat+if+the+data+was+wrong%3F%26rsquo%3B+and+we+will+quickly+understand+the+importance+of+this.+When+President+Obama+ran+his+micro-targeting+campaigns%2C+there+was+very+little+room+for+error+and+the+data+had+to+be+correct.+This+is+also+the+case+with+Amazon.com%2C+which+is+trialling+delivering+goods+before+customers+order+them.+To+do+this+effectively%2C+the+company+has+written+such+great+algorithms+to+predict+what+customers+are+going+to+order+%28and+when+they+will+order%29%2C+that+if+the+data+is+only+90+per+cent+accurate%2C+the+company%2C+stands+to+lose+a+lot+of+money.+Then+we+have+Uber%2C+a+company+that+is+setting+a+benchmark+for+others%2C+innovating+in+several+industries+as+not+just+another+taxi+service.+Uber+published+the+algorithm+for+predicting+a+client%26rsquo%3Bs+destination%2C+and+can+now+begin+to+offer+car-pool+services.+The+value+of+accurate+and+correct+data+is+easily+understood.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+With+all+these+V%26rsquo%3Bs+in+place%2C+there+seem+to+be+many+more+marketable+V%26%2339%3Bs+that+can+easily+be+strapped+onto+the+existing+foundation.+%26lsquo%3BVisualisation%26rsquo%3B+is+important%3A+can+we+provide+business+with+the+information+in+a+format+that+makes+sense%3F+Businesses+are+spoilt+with+the+number+of+technologies+available+to+use+for+a+presentation+layer.+However%2C+this+also+brings+another+conundrum+%26ndash%3B+which+visualisation+tool+do+they+use%3F+And+this+is+where+we+start+balancing+cutting+edge+with+bleeding+edge.+At+least+once+a+month%2C+I+speak+to+a+potential+client+who+mentions+a+new+visualisation+tool+and+asks+if+we+at+Entelect+have+expertise+in+it.+Each+tool+has+its+own+pros+and+cons%2C+and+here+is+where+we+need+to+take+a+step+back+and+define+what+functionality+we+are+actually+looking+for+in+a+visualization+tool.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+I+have+done+countless+implementations+where+self-service+BI+was+a+hard+requirement%2C+so+the+tools+were+selected+and+the+universe+of+data+provided.+Then%2C+however%2C+when+I+checked+in+a+few+months+later%2C+the+company+had+employed+report+writers+because+they+didn%26rsquo%3Bt+actually+want+to+write+their+own+reports+or+their+IT+department+was+experiencing+headaches+because+everyone+was+applying+different+filters+to+the+data+and+expecting+the+same+result.+Do+we+actually+need+interactive+charts+and+graphs%2C+with+drill+down+and+drill+through%2C+bottom-up+and+top-down+reporting%3F+For+many%2C+these+requirements+are+a+must%2C+until+you+mention+the+price+of+the+potential+tool%2C+then+they+quickly+move+to+a+show+value+first+and+add+the+sexy+visualisations+later.+I+have+never+seen+a+successful+revenue+assurance+implementation+run+on+anything+other+than+raw+data.+What+I+am+trying+to+emphasise+is+that+companies+need+to+keep+their+short-term+goals+in+mind%2C+and+before+they+fork+out+a+lot+of+money+on+a+visualisation+tool%2C+make+sure+that+the+path+they+are+going+down+is+going+to+add+value+to+the+business.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26lsquo%3BValue%26rsquo%3B+has+also+been+added+to+the+list+of+V%26%2339%3Bs.+Now+that+we+have+all+the+data+and+it+is+available+to+look+at%2C+how+do+we+actually+extract+value+from+this%3F+New+roles+are+being+created+within+organisations%2C+for+example%2C+we+now+have+chief+data+officers+and+the+role+of+the+data+scientist+is+also+gaining+business+traction.+Once+again%2C+before+businesses+go+out+and+spend+money+on+someone+with+a+quants+or+risk+qualification%2C+they+need+to+look+internally+for+the+person+I+like+call+the+%26lsquo%3BMiss+Congeniality%26rsquo%3B+of+your+company.+This+is+someone+who+has+been+at+the+company+for+many+years+and+worked+across+the+majority+of+the+departments.+This+is+the+person+who+best+understands+the+lower+levels+of+the+business.+He+or+she+is+one+who+understands+how+the+insurance+department+influences+the+credit+department+and+the+implications+thereof.+This+person+will+create+the+foundation+before+the+data+scientists+arrive.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In+the+field+of+data+analytics%2C+many+companies+have+invested+in+out-of-the-box+analytics+that+will+provide+a+perceived+%26lsquo%3Beasy+way%26rsquo%3B+to+analyse+data.+It+is+quick+to+push+out+a+time+series+forecast+or+a+decision+tree+and+to+cluster+the+base.+This+is+great%2C+but+keep+in+mind+that+there+is+no+competitive+advantage.+Out-of-the-box+tools+are+available+to+anyone+who+is+willing+to+pay+for+them.+Know+up+front+that+if+you+want+something+different%2C+it+is+going+to+have+to+be+bespoke.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+So+now+we+have+all+the+theory+and+the+best-case+scenario+examples.+The+number+of+success+stories+I+have+read+are+countless.+However%2C+the+number+I+have+seen+properly+implemented+are+far+fewer.+We+all+know+the+benefits+of+using+this+data+to+drive+sales%2C+increase+revenue+during+down+times+and+to+engage+customers+more+effectively.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In+South+Africa+we+have+access+to+exactly+the+same+technology+as+the+rest+of+the+world%2C+we+have+people+in+this+country+who+are+able+to+create+the+custom+algorithms+and+to+stand+up+as+the+true+data+scientists.+The+question+remains%2C+%26lsquo%3Bwhy+are+we+still+behind+the+curve+on+this%2C+why+are+we+not+the+benchmark%3F%26rsquo%3B+My+pledge+to+the+data+community+of+South+Africa+is+to+invest+in+Big+Data+competency+over+the+next+12+months+and+keep+you+updated+each+step+of+the+way%2C+I+hope+to+further+learn+what+actually+works+and+what+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt%2C+in+practical+and+real-world+environments.+With+a+bit+of+luck+and+a+lot+of+hard+work%2C+we+will+be+able+to+position+South+Africa+as+the+world+leaders+in+Big+Data. %3Cstrong%3ERyan+Naud%C3%A9+%28Entelect+Manager%3A+Data+Solutions%29+%3C%2Fstrong%3E+%3Cbr%2F%3E%3Cbr%2F%3E+%E2%80%98Big+Data%E2%80%99+may+no+longer+be+a+buzzword+%E2%80%93+the+concept+of+Big+Data%2C+creating+Big+Data+stores+and+analysing+against+these+effectively+is+common+practice.+However%2C+%E2%80%98Big+Data%E2%80%99%2C+is+still+a+bit+of+a+%E2%80%98fuzzword%E2%80%99%2C+as+I+like+to+call+it%2C+because+there+are+no+industry-accepted+or+concrete+definitions+to+tick+off+and+go+through+and+finally+say%2C+%E2%80%98I+have+Big+DataBig+Data.%E2%80%99+Lately%2C+I%E2%80%99ve+been+on+a+quest+to+try+and+understand+what+this+monster+is+and+what+would+be+the+key+factors+that+would+enable+a+successful+Big+Data+implementation. ["New technology"] Ryan.jpg
Why+Big+Data+should+be+a+priority+at+the+moment The+reason+for+the+belief+in+the+data+age+is+that+as+each+millionth+of+a+second+passes%2C+almost+everything+we+see%2C+hear+and+touch+is+generating+data.+Using+PCs%2C+mobile+handsets%2C+tablets%2C+GPS+devices%2C+servers+and+sensors+attached+to+vehicles%2C+buildings+and+satellites%2C+leads+to+huge+amounts+of+data+being+stored+across+multiple+databases+and+data+stores+worldwide.+The+speed+at+which+this+data+is+being+generated+is+increasing+rapidly+and+so+is+the+volume+and+array+of+different+structured+and+unstructured+data+types%2C+which+are+commonly+referred+to+as+Big+Data.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In+theory%2C+Big+Data+means+having+tons+and+tons+of+data+at+your+disposal.+However%2C+in+practice%2C+this+data+is+next+to+useless+if+businesses+cannot+apply+analytics+to+benefit+and+gain+insight+from+it.+Businesses+must+find+a+%26lsquo%3Bmechanism%26rsquo%3B+that+can+perform+collaborative+filtering+to+%26lsquo%3Bnet%26rsquo%3B+vital+information+and+trends+and+to+answer+key+questions.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+But%2C+how+easy+is+it+to+find+this+mechanism%3F+Currently%2C+there+are+frameworks+that+have+been+developed+to+store+and+retrieve+the+data+using+MapReduce+algorithms.+Apache+Hadoop+is+one+of+the+frameworks+of+choice%2C+and+some+of+the+large+tech+and+social+media+companies+have+shown+a+keen+interest+in+it.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Hadoop+is+so+popular+because+of+the+speed+at+which+it+can+load+the+volume+and+variety+of+data+compared+with+other+ETL+%28extract-transform-load%29+tools+and+frameworks.+Hadoop+can+load+data+much+quicker+than+relational+databases+because+it+has+no+gatekeeping+rules.+It+stores+the+data+on+its+HDFS+%28Hadoop+Distributed+File+System%29+without+needing+to+match+the+destination+structure+with+the+source+structure+%26ndash%3B+a+relational+database+would+require+%26lsquo%3BTable+B%26rsquo%3B+to+be+the+same+as+%26lsquo%3BTable+A%26rsquo%3B+in+order+to+transfer+data+across.+Instead%2C+Hadoop+stores+the+data+across+numerous+data+nodes+using+key-value+pairs.+Initially%2C+querying+data+on+HDFS+was+slow+and+involved+a+great+deal+of+effort.+To+complete+the+task%2C+a+more+SQL-like+language+was+needed.+However%2C+over+the+years%2C+many+contributions+have+been+made+to+this+open-source+software+framework.+Currently+there+are+many+%26lsquo%3BSQL+on+Hadoop%26rsquo%3B+languages%2C+such+as+Apache+Hive%2C+Stinger%2C+Apaches+Drill+and+Spark+SQL%2C+which+have+improved+data-retrieval+performance+considerably.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Hadoop%26rsquo%3Bs+architecture+is+very+scalable+so+this+allows+for+millions+of+servers+to+work+together+instead+of+running+one+high-specced+server.+Hadoop+is+also+fault+tolerant%2C+storing+multiple+copies+of+each+piece+of+data+in+different+nodes.+If+one+node+goes+down%2C+the+framework+will+automatically+switch+over+to+another+in+the+most+efficient+manner.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In+recent+times%2C+Hadoop+has+received+a+lot+of+buy-in+from+the+big-player+analytics+and+visualisations+vendors.+Cloudera+is+partnering+with+NoSQL+creator+MongoDB%2C+and+Hortonworks+has+collaborated+with+Tableau.+Other+vendors%2C+such+as+Qlikview%2C+Spotfire+and+Microstrategy%2C+have+some+ODBC+configuration+to+connect+to+Hadoop.+Cloudera+has+released+a+universal+ODBC+driver+that+enables+the+connection+of+many+applications%2C+such+as+Teradata+Parallel+Transporter+%28TPT%29%2C+SSIS%2C+IBM+DataStage%2C+Ab+Initio%2C+Informatica+PowerCenter%2C+SAP+Data+Services%2C+Business+Objects%2C+OBIEE%2C+Cognos%2C+SAS%2C+SPSS%2C+Unica%2C+Linked+Server%2C+Oracle+Database+Gateway+and+many+more.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+This+all+sounds+very+exciting+and+convincing+that+Hadoop+is+the+way+to+go.+However%2C+although+Big+Data+has+been+around+for+years%2C+it+has+still+not+taken+off+in+the+South+African+market+as+initially+predicted.+If+you+or+your+company+is+equipped+with+skill+set+similar+to+these+large+tech+and+social+media+companies%2C+then+implementing+a+Big+Data+solution+is+not+an+issue.+However%2C+the+question+is+how+many+companies+are+actually+equipped+with+a+skill+set%3F+The+answer+is+not+many+and+the+market+is+showing+a+massive+demand+for+Big+Data+resources.+Global+management+consulting+firm+McKinsey+%26amp%3B+Company+has+predicted+that+by+the+year+2018%2C+the+shortfall+of+Big+Data+experts+will+be+at+anywhere+from+140%2C000+to+190%2C000.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+good+news+is+that+tertiary+institutions+are+now+including+Big+Data+in+their+curricula+and+post-graduate+degrees%2C+so+we+can+expect+the+Big+Data+resource+pool+to+grow+over+time+as+these+students+complete+their+studies.+Until+this+happens%2C+companies+are+investing+in+their+current+staff+compliment+to+fill+the+gap.+However%2C+learning+Big+Data+via+frameworks%2C+such+as+Apache+Hadoop%2C+is+quite+a+steep+learning+curve+compared+with+traditional%2C+structured+BI+involving+SQL%2C+ETL+and+OLAP+tools%2C+and+to+a+certain+degree%2C+it+requires+a+mindset+shift.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Companies+do+have+other+options.+They+can+opt+for+a+cloud+solution+like+Microsoft%26rsquo%3Bs+HDInsight+sitting+on+their+Azure+platform.+This+option+has+its+pros+and+cons.+On+the+plus+side%2C+it+collects+and+stores+your+data+at+a+reasonable+price+on+your+HDInsight+cluster.+There+is+no+need+to+understand+the+background+processing+and+architecture+of+Hadoop.+Microsoft+has+also+developed+a+way+to+combine+and+query+both+non-relational+data+%28HDInsight%29+with+structured+SQL+Server+Parallel+Data+Warehouse+in+the+form+of+Polybase.+This+integrates+perfectly+with+the+latest+version+of+Microsoft+Excel+and+an+assortment+of+PowerBI+tools%2C+such+as+PowerPivot+and+PowerQuery.+One+of+the+biggest+negatives+for+this+option+is+the+cost+involved+in+processing+and+retrieving+the+answers+you+looking+for.+There+is+also+the+security+element+of+storing+sensitive+data+on+an+off-site+server%2C+perhaps+half-way+across+the+globe.+Implementing+data+governance+can+also+be+tricky+with+regard+to+unstructured+data+and+defining+which+users+are+authorised+to+see+which+data.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Another+option+companies+may+choose+is+to+engage+with+consulting+companies+that+have+already+invested+time%2C+research+and+development+in+Hadoop+and+its+architecture.+Consultancy+firms+allow+their+staff+autonomy+to+play+around+with+cutting-edge+technologies+and+often+give+them+carte+blanche+to+find+innovative+ways+of+solving+tomorrow%26rsquo%3Bs+business+needs.+This+allows+companies+to+use+this+expertise+and+knowledge+without+wasting+unnecessary+time+and+money.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Whichever+option+you+choose+to+invest+in%2C+I+believe+Big+Data+is+the+must-have+component+that+should+be+found+in+every+company%26rsquo%3Bs+BI+architectural+framework.+Due+to+the+current+skill+shortage+and+reluctance+to+opt+for+a+cloud+solution%2C+Big+Data+may+not+be+a+priority+for+companies+at+the+moment%2C+but+it+will+definitely+become+a+must+in+the+future.+The+quicker+businesses+get+their+Big+Data+solution+up+and+running%2C+the+faster+they+will+be+able+to+gain+a+substantial+leading+edge+over+their+competitors.+The+race+is+on+for+companies+to+find+the+answers+of+tomorrow+based+on+the+data+that+was+always+there+but+could+never+before+be+analysed. %3Ch3%3E+Shane+Moodley+%28Entelect+Team+Lead+%E2%80%93+Data+Solutions%29+%3C%2Fh3%3E+%3Cbr%2F%3E%3Cbr%2F%3E+History+has+seen+a+stone+age%2C+which+was+considered+an+age+of+innovation%2C+and+this+stone+age+was+followed+by+the+bronze+and+iron+ages.+Many+people+believe+that+today%2C+we+are+living+in+the+%E2%80%98data+age%E2%80%99. ["New technology"] shane.moodley.jpg
My%2C+what+Big+Data+you+have%21 Research+is+critically+important+and+companies+need+to+start+asking+the+right+questions+before+they+engage+a+software+supplier.+The+main+objective+is+to+choose+a+software+supplier+that+will+help+to+grow+your+business+and+ultimately%2C+create+a+mutually+beneficial+partnership.+Choosing+the+most+appealing+supplier+is+a+process%2C+and+careful+considerations+need+to+be+made.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EAdding+value%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+You+need+to+ask+yourself+which+supplier+will+add+the+most+value+to+your+business+and+why+they+will+add+value.+One+way+to+narrow+down+your+selection+is+to+determine+each+supplier%26rsquo%3Bs+main+or+unique+characteristics.+Are+these+characteristics+well-matched+to+your+organisation+and+will+they+make+the+supplier+the+best+candidate+to+handle+your+Big+Data%3F+Does+the+supplier+have+a+documented+procedure+for+the+service+it+provides+and%2C+if+so%2C+are+its+current+customers+fully+satisfied%3F+Another+important+factor+is+to+make+sure+your+supplier+shares+your+vision+for+your+Big+Data+outcomes.+This+is+very+important+as+it+will+ensure+all+parties+are+invested+from+the+get+go.+Often%2C+choosing+a+local+partner+has+a+range+of+significant+benefits%2C+from+better+and+more+insightful+communication+to+shorter+delivery+timeframes.+However%2C+for+many%2C+distance+is+not+a+deterrent+and+other+factors+are+more+important.+%3Cdiv%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EMore+than+technology%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In+choosing+your+supplier+you+need+to+be+aware+that+Big+Data+is+not+just+a+technological+problem+but+a+data+engineering+problem%2C+too+%26ndash%3B+it+is+not+just+Hadoop+but+instead%2C+has+many+layers+and+aspects+to+it.+Whoever+you+choose+as+your+supplier+of+talent%2C+make+sure+that+the+company+has+a+full-circle+service+offering.+This+must+include+analysis%2C+development+and+data+competency.+Judging+by+the+current+market%2C+it+will+serve+your+organisation+well+to+make+sure+that+the+supplier+is+competent+in+all+Cloud+platforms+because+these+will+be+an+integral+part+of+your+Big+Data%2FInternet+of+Things+solution.%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EQuality+and+quantity%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Another+key+indicator+is%2C+of+course%2C+the+quality+of+the+supplier%26rsquo%3Bs+service+as+well+as+the+size+and+skill+set+of+its+staff.+You+need+to+ask+the+supplier+about+its+track+record+on+delivery.+The+real+differentiator+is+the+qualification+of+the+organisation%26rsquo%3Bs+staff%2C+its+intellectual+property+and+its+professional+approach+to+solving+complex+software+problems.+If+a+company+really+is+as+BIG+as+it+claims+to+be%2C+then+the+proof+will+be+in+the+data+management.%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+One+also+needs+to+bear+in+mind+the+support+structures+of+the+organisation.+Are+there+relevant+experts+who+can+be+called+upon+%26ndash%3B+these+experts+should+range+from+extremely+technically+minded+employees+to+those+with+excellent+financial+and+mathematical+skills.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Do+a+bit+of+research+on+the+supplier%26rsquo%3Bs+staff+members%2C+too.+Do+they+have+blogs+and+are+they+actively+sharing+their+knowledge+with+the+development+community%3F+This+is+critical+as+it+will+help+assess+the+long-term+engagement+strategy+with+the+supplier.+Again%2C+make+sure+there+are+shared+values+between+your+organisation+and+the+supplier.%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EDo+you+know+where+they%26rsquo%3Bve+been%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Client+referrals+are+always+a+must+when+it+comes+to+reviewing+the+authenticity+of+a+supplier%26rsquo%3Bs+claims.+Delve+deeper+into+the+supplier%26rsquo%3Bs+closet+and+see+if+there+are+any+skeletons+roaming+around.+If+a+client+was+not+fully+serviced%2C+it+would+most+definitely+be+neighbourhood+gossip.+The+converse+is+true%2C+too%3A+when+a+client+is+fully+satisfied%2C+the+results+will+be+evident+in+the+suppliers%26%2339%3B+client+retention+as+well+as+client+referrals.%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Although+there+is+plenty+of+talent+in+South+Africa+when+it+comes+to+software+engineering%2C+Big+Data+is+such+a+new+concept+in+South+Africa+that+the+tech+skills+may+not+be+there+completely.+To+this+end%2C+organisations+should+look+for+a+supplier+than+can+plug+into+all+the+different+aspects+of+it%2C+including%3A+high-speed+data+processing%2C+strong+data+governance+and+s+pedantic+and+pragmatic+approach.+Ultimately%2C+who+you+choose+will+come+down+the+supplier+that+ticks+all+the+Big+Data+boxes+that+your+organisation+values+most.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E Ryan+Naud%C3%A9+%3Cbr%2F%3E+Entelect+Manager%3A+Data+Solutions%3Cbr%2F%3E+%3Cbr%2F%3E%3Cbr%2F%3E+Since+the+dawning+of+the+digital+age%2C+companies+have+realised+the+importance+of+investing+in+effective+Big+Data+solutions.+The+real+question%2C+however%2C+is+WHO+do+you+choose+for+this+Big+task%3F ["New technology"] Ryan.jpg
Decoding+tech+buzzwords Sometimes%2C+a+buzzword+emerges+out+of+necessity+%26ndash%3B+there+simply+is+no+other+way+to+describe+a+new+phenomenon+or+trend.+In+many+cases%2C+however%2C+it+is+a+shift+in+thinking+or+a+reincarnation+of+an+old+concept+that+provides+the+marketing+fraternity+with+a+fresh+opportunity+to+create+a+%26lsquo%3Bbuzz%26rsquo%3B.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Instead+of+fostering+a+real+understanding%2C+the+use+of+buzzwords+and+jargon+can+create+misconceptions+that+ultimately+slow+down+the+decision-making+process.+At+best%2C+people+waste+time+trying+to+understand+what+is+essentially+something+very+simple.+At+worst%2C+they+miss+an+opportunity.+Either+way%2C+new+terms+can+be+confusing%2C+so+I+have+decoded+some+of+the+IT+industry%26rsquo%3Bs+up-and-coming+jargon+and+buzzwords.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E1.+Big+Data%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3A+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.entelect.co.za%2FNews%2FDisplayNewsItem.aspx%3Fniid%3D39759%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3EBig+Data%3C%2Fa%3E+refers+to+the+large+amounts+of+data+that+are+typically+collected+from+events+triggered+by+particular+actions+or+devices+monitoring+some+phenomena%2C+often+stored+in+a+loosely+structured+format.+Traditional+techniques+for+processing+these+large+data+sets+are+ineffective+and+new+approaches+are+necessary+to+collect%2C+retrieve%2C+summarise+and+visualise+%26ndash%3B+turning+the+data+into+something+more+meaningful.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+generally+accepted+defining+properties+of+Big+Data+are+known+as+the+Three+Vs%2C+which+Gartner+analyst+Doug+Laney+originally+coined%3A%3F+%3Cul+id%3D%22careersList%22%3E+%3Cli%3EVolume+%26ndash%3B+the+amount+of+data+stored%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EVelocity+%26ndash%3B+the+rate+at+which+data+is+generated+and+processed%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EVariety+%26ndash%3B+the+type+and+source+of+the+data.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+If+each+of+these+properties+is+increasing+significantly%2C+the+information+can+be+considered+to+be+Big+Data.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Aside+from+the+fact+that+companies+are+collecting+vast+amounts+of+information+on+customers%26rsquo%3B+movements%2C+behaviour+and+buying+habits%2C+why+is+Big+Data+important+from+a+business+perspective%3F+The+old+adage+of+%26lsquo%3Bknowledge+is+power%26rsquo%3B+holds+true.+The+more+equipped+people+are+to+make+decisions%2C+the+better+the+outcome+for+their+business.+What+is+relevant+in+the+case+of+Big+Data+however%2C+is+making+sense+of+the+information+%28separating+the+noise+from+the+meaningful%29%2C+the+timing+of+the+information%2C+and+how+to+use+the+information+effectively+to+improve+a+product+or+service.+The+current+movement+in+Big+Data+aims+to+address+these+issues+and+is+reshaping+our+understanding+of+how+to+process+information+on+a+much+larger+scale.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E2.+Prescriptive+Analytics%3A+%3C%2Fstrong%3EMaking+sense+of+the+information+leads+us+to+the+field+of+data+analytics+%26ndash%3B+the+tools+and+techniques+that+are+used+to+extract+meaning+from+huge+volumes+of+data.+Analytics+efforts+can+be+broadly+classified+into+one+of+three+main+categories+%26ndash%3B+descriptive%2C+predictive+and+prescriptive.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Descriptive+analytics+tells+us+what+has+happened+and+possibly+why+it+has+happened.+It+usually+involves+reporting+on+historical+data+to+provide+insights+into+various+business+metrics.+Predictive+analytics+attempts+to+tell+us+what+may+happen+in+the+future%2C+taking+historical+data+into+account+and+applying+algorithms+and+various+statistical+models+to+predict+the+future.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Prescriptive+analytics%2C+the+third+and+most+recent+focus+area+of+data+analytics%2C+takes+it+to+the+next+level+by+recommending+a+course+of+action%2C+and+presenting+the+likely+outcomes+of+choosing+such+action%2C+incorporating+any+constraints+of+the+current+environment+%28financial+or+regulatory%2C+for+example%29.+An+actual+person+still+has+to+make+the+decisions+but+prescriptive+analytics+can+provide+valuable+input+into+scenario+planning+and+optimisation+exercises%2C+by+combining+business+rules%2C+statistical+models+and+machine+learning+to+quantify+the+impact+of+future+decisions.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+There+is+a+variety+of+organisations+that+have+invested+significant+effort+in+descriptive+analytics+and+reporting+solutions+to+provide+insight+into+historical+data%2C+and+many+are+starting+to+explore+the+opportunities+that+predictive+analytics+has+to+offer.+Both+are+necessary+precursors+to+prescriptive+analytics%2C+which+requires%2C+at+a+minimum%2C+the+capability+to+capture+and+summarise+large+data+sets+efficiently.+The+data+can+then+be+used+as+input+to+prescriptive+analytic+engines.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E3.+Software-defined+infrastructure+%28SDI%29%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E+Software-defined+infrastructure+builds+on+the+capabilities+of+virtualisation+and+cloud-based+services+to+define+IT+infrastructure+requirements.+These+requirements+include+computing+power%2C+as+well+as+network+and+storage+capacity%2C+at+the+software+level.+SDI+allows+application+developers+to+describe+their+expectations+of+infrastructure+in+a+standard+and+systematic+way%2C+turning+computing+resources+into+logical+components+that+can+be+provisioned+on+the+fly+without+human+intervention.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Take+today%26rsquo%3Bs+scenario+of+having+to+configure+each+element+of+infrastructure+to+support+an+application+%26ndash%3B+machines+and+images%2C+storage+and+mount+points%2C+firewalls+and+load+balancers+to+name+a+few+%26ndash%3B+and+replace+it+with+the+simple+action+of+identifying+an+SDI-enabled+data+centre+and+clicking+%26lsquo%3Bdeploy%26rsquo%3B.+Each+resource+is+automatically+configured+as+required+and%2C+more+importantly%2C+can+reconfigure+itself+as+the+application+and+usage+changes.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Defining+these+requirements+based+on+policies+and+expected+usage+patterns+at+the+software+level+and+incorporating+them+into+the+deployable+artefacts%2C+means+that+IT+organisations+can+respond+more+quickly+to+peaks+and+troughs+in+throughput+and+achieve+repeatable+and+reliable+application+deployments+by+automating+many+infrastructure+related+activities.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Furthermore%2C+SDI-enabled+data+centres+can+optimise+resource+usage%2C+which+will+drive+down+the+cost+of+infrastructure.+Specialists+can+focus+on+optimising+specific+elements+of+the+infrastructure%2C+such+as+network+or+storage%2C+rather+than+reactively+wiring+and+rewiring+configurations+to+support+evolving+application+requirements.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+As+was+the+case+with+Java+and+the+standardised+APIs+%28Application+Programming+Interfaces%29+that+make+up+the+Java+Enterprise+Edition+framework%2C+SDI+will+require+a+concerted+effort+to+ensure+inter-operability+between+the+tools%2C+platforms+and+processes+that+make+up+the+virtual+data+centres+of+the+future.+As+with+cloud+services%2C+there+is+a+vendor+battle+brewing+to+capture+the+lion%26rsquo%3Bs+share+of+what+is+likely+to+be+a+significant+market+for+SDI-capable+services.+Those+vendors+who+actively+drive+and+support+open+interfaces+and+APIs+will+have+the+advantage+in+the+long+term.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E4.+DevOps%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E+The+term+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.entelect.co.za%2FNews%2FDisplayNewsItem.aspx%3Fniid%3D32819%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3EDevOps%3C%2Fa%3E+has+been+around+for+some+time+now+and+the+concept%2C+even+longer.+However%2C+only+in+recent+years+has+it+started+gaining+widespread+acceptance+as+standard+practice+in+the+development+communities.+DevOps+is+to+development+and+operations+teams+as+Agile+is+to+development+teams+and+business.+Where+the+Agile+movement+promotes+increased+collaboration+between+development+teams+and+business+users%2C+DevOps+looks+at+integrating+operations+activities+much+earlier+and+more+tightly+into+the+software-development+life+cycle.+Both+have+the+same+goal+of+enabling+software+projects+to+respond+more+effectively+to+change.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In+reality%2C+DevOps+is+an+extension+of+Agile+as+we+know+it+today.+However%2C+it+also+includes+operations+and+support+functions.+The+authors+of+the+Agile+Manifesto+certainly+never+explicitly+excluded+operations+and+support+from+their+widely+accepted+list+of+values+and+principles+but+in+the+experience+of+many%2C+the+focus+on+Agile+projects+has+always+been+biased+towards+improving+the+collaboration+between+business+users+and+the+development+team%2C+rather+than+the+development+team+and+the+operations+team.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Yes%2C+it+is+true+that+the+operations+team+is+implicitly+included+in+the+concept+of+cross-functional+development+teams+%28see+below%29%2C+but+in+reality%2C+IT+operations+in+many+organisations+are+still+very+much+an+isolated+function%2C+which+is+exactly+the+barrier+that+DevOps+is+trying+to+eliminate.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E5.+Cross-functional+teams%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E+The+concept+of+a+cross-functional+team+is+simple.+The+development+team+has+all+the+skills+necessary+to+deliver+a+piece+of+working+software+into+production%2C+which+may+include+activities+such+as+user+experience+design%2C+database+design%2C+server+configuration+and%2C+of+course%2C+writing+code.+Where+product+development+teams+are+concerned%2C+businesses+adopting+Agile+practices+should+be+assembling+cross-functional+teams.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+This+is+not+an+excuse+for+hiring+fewer+individuals+and+expecting+them+to+be+Jacks-of-all-trades%3A+specialisation+is+important+and+a+necessity+when+solving+complex+problems+that+require+focus+and+experience.+Having+a+single%2C+co-located+team+that+can+take+something+from+concept+to+reality%2C+eliminates+external+dependencies+that+plague+many+software+development+teams+of+today%2C+especially+in+large+organisations.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Aside+from+efficiency+and+knowledge+sharing%2C+the+argument+for+isolated+teams+defined+by+skill+or+technology+is+the+degree+of+control+of+standards+and+governance+within+a+particular+domain.+This+argument+is+valid+but+only+for+operational+and+%26lsquo%3Bcommoditised%26rsquo%3B+services%2C+such+as+desktop+support+and+hardware+infrastructure.+As+soon+as+product+development+enters+the+mix%2C+the+effectiveness+of+the+team+becomes+more+important+than+the+efficiency+of+the+team.+Assuming+differentiation+is+one+of+the+main+objectives%2C+product+development+teams+should+be+optimised+for+effectiveness+rather+than+efficiency%2C+since+development+in+this+scenario+is+a+creative+process%2C+one+that+should+not+be+constrained+by+red+tape+and+corporate+IT+governance.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+If+companies+want+to+increase+their+chances+of+creating+a+product+that+delights+their+customers%2C+they+should+include+specialists+and+designers+in+the+team+as+full-time+members+until+their+services+are+no+longer+deemed+critical%2C+which+will+probably+be+only+after+several+production+releases.+If+you+want+to+minimise+your+IT+costs+at+the+expense+of+rapid+innovation%2C+create+a+dedicated+team+that+out-sources+its+services+to+several+internal+development+teams.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+While+the+occurrence+of+new+%26lsquo%3Bbuzzwords%26rsquo%3B+in+the+ICT+space+is+on-going%2C+it+is+crucial+that+decision+makers+ensure+a+practical+and+simplified+understanding+before+making+any+kind+of+investment+on+behalf+of+their+organisation.+Often+designed+to+excite+and+compel%2C+these+buzzwords+often+do+not+describe+the+actual+function+or+benefits+of+a+particular+concept.+At+Entelect%2C+we+encourage+business+leaders+to+screen+potential+IT+suppliers+not+by+the+terminology+and+complicated+jargon+they+offer%2C+but+rather+by+how+simply+and+understandably+they+are+able+to+communicate+their+solutions. %3Ch3%3E+Doug+Crawford+%28Entelect+Manager+of+Service+Delivery%29+%3C%2Fh3%3E+Every+day%2C+we+are+bombarded+with+jargon+and+buzzwords.+Each+industry+has+its+fair+share+of+jargon%2C+but+none+so+much+as+the+IT+industry. ["New technology"] Doug.jpg
How+data+lakes+can+form+a+culture+of+innovation %3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%3Cem%3EWhile+data+lakes+are+becoming+more+popular%2C+they+should+not+be+a+tick-box+exercise.+Effective+use+of+a+data+lake+can+provide+insights+that+make+significant+improvements+to+your+organizational+strategy.+But%2C+this+can+only+be+achieved+with+the+right+resources.%26nbsp%3B+Business+often+talks+about+having+%26lsquo%3Bthe+right+people%2C+in+the+right+seats+on+the+bus%26rsquo%3B%2C+but+it%26rsquo%3Bs+also+about+making+sure+the+ride+stays+interesting.+%3C%2Fem%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3EAt+this+year%26rsquo%3Bs+Chief+Data+Officer+Forum+Africa%2C+the+subject+of+data+lakes+was+a+hot+topic%2C+as+was+retaining+top+talent.+But%2C+while+businesses+become+aware+of+the+advantages+of+data+lakes%2C+many+do+not+understand+how+to+leverage+them+for+maximum+results.+So+although%2C+these+may+seem+like+separate+topics%2C+they+are+in+fact+interconnected.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3EIn+the+big+data+environment%2C+many+companies+are+starting+to+pull+away+from+the+traditional+approach+of+Extract+Transform+Load+%28ETL%29+towards+Extract%26nbsp%3BLoad%26nbsp%3BTransform+%28ELT%29.+But+the+emergence+of+the+Data+Lake+in+this+shift+towards+ELT+shouldn%26rsquo%3Bt+just+be+viewed+as+a+tick+box.+In+fact%2C+it+should+be+a+strategic+play+to+provide+your+organisation+with+comprehensive+and+unique+insights+to+be+more+competitive.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3EOnce+a+company+appreciates+the+potential+of+a+data+lake%2C+it+is+in+a+position+to+pull+incredibly+exciting+insights.+However%2C+to+leverage+a+data+lake+to+its+fullest+requires+a+diversity+of+people+and+skill+sets.+In+this+sense%2C+a+culture+of+innovation+that+drives+continuous+learning+and+collaboration+should+be+considered+the+%26lsquo%3Bbest+friend%26rsquo%3B+of+exceptional+data+science.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3EThis+is+why+the+topic+of+data+lakes+become+inextricably+linked+with+attracting+and+retaining+top+talent%2C+since+extracting+insights+will+be+dependent+on+the+capability+of+the+data+science+team.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3EFinding+a+data+scientist+is+tough.+In+fact%2C+the+role+is+most+effectively+delivered+through+two+roles%2C%26nbsp%3Ba+data+engineer+and+a+data+analyst.+Where+a+data+engineer+can+populate+the+data+lake+and+perform+the+ELT+operations%2C+the+data+analyst+can+communicate+the+results+to+the+business+in+such+a+way+that+strategic+financial+and+operational+decisions+can+be+made.+Consequently%2C+these+two+roles+require+different+stimulation+to+sustain+high+productivity%2C+continuous+innovation+and+ultimately%2C+ensure+retention.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3ERetention+therefore%2C+is+about+making+sure+the+%26lsquo%3Bride+stays+interesting%26rsquo%3B.+Data+engineers+and+analysts+are+working+in+a+highly+evolving+industry+so+the+culture+they+operate+in+needs+to+support+this.+It+requires+a+strong+focus+on+innovating+within+roles+and+structures%2C+which+is+why+the+best+fit+for+this+industry+are+environments+that+create+a+culture+of+innovation.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3EWhile+big+business+is+under+constant+pressure+to+sweat+its+assets%2C+a+consultancy+firm+has+more+flexibility+to+invest+in+retention+strategies+such+as+continual+learning+and+a+flexible+working+environment.+Consultancies+know+that+best+practices+are+what+differentiate+them+from+their+competitors%2C+so+these+are+investments+they+are+willing+to+make.+Similarly%2C+big+businesses+can+be+assured+of+a+data+science+team+that+is+constantly+stimulated+and+in-touch+with+best+practice.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3ESome+ways+that+outsourced+consultancies+create+a+culture+of+innovation%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E1.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+Consulting+companies+pride+themselves+in+investing+heavily+in+in-house+training+programmes+that+ensure+clients+are+impressed+with+the+skills+provided.+This+serves+the+dual+purpose+of+improving+delivery+and+keeping+the+staff+continually+growing+and+learning.+Staff+should+be+incentivised+to+attend+conferences%2C+get+involved+in+the+development+community.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E2.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+Regarding+the+work+environment+for+data+engineers+and+analysts%2C+flexibility+and+freedom+will+encourage+and+incentivise+the+team+to+come+up+with+new+ideas.+Providing+them+with+spare+time+to+implement+these%2C+whether+it+be+playing+around+with+facial+recognition+software+or+thinking+of+different+ways+to+analyse+tweet+streams+for+certain+topics%2C+is+key+to+creating+a+flexible+environment.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E3.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+Outsourcing+is+also+beneficial+to+leverage+the+strengths+of+the+skills+effectively.+In+build+phase%2C+a+consulting+firm+can+allocate+someone+who+is+strong+at+ELT%26rsquo%3Bs%2C+mainly+setting+up+and+optimising+the+data+into+the+data+lake.+Once+it%26rsquo%3Bs+in+the+data+lake%2C+you+can+bring+on+the+analysts.+This+%26lsquo%3Broll-on%2C%26nbsp%3Broll-off%26rsquo%3B+approach+ensures+the+client+always+has+the+best+person+for+the+job+and+means+consultancies+can+be+as+agile+as+the+client+requires.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E4.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+Lastly%2C+knowledge+transference+is+critical%2C+because+support+and+maintenance+tasks+are+not+for+everyone.+Transferring+the+IP+back+to+clients+by+including+them+in+training+sessions%2C+and+walking+the+journey+together+to+build+up+the+internal+capacity%2C+means+consultancies+and+clients+can+both+get+the+most+out+of+the+partnership.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3EThe+world+of+Big+Data+is+changing+quickly.+I+believe+that+if+you+are+looking+to+select+a+partner+to+accompany+you+on+the+journey+of+implementing+a+meaningful+big+data+solution%2C+you+need+to+find+a+company+with+a+culture+of+innovation+that+is+always+looking+for+new+ways+to+do+things%2C+learning+new+technologies%2C+and+staying+up-to-date+with+trends.+While+the+inclusion+of+a+data+lake+may+provide+great+opportunities+for+business%2C+a+data+science+team+that+can+adapt+to+industry+culture+and+remain+relevant+will+keep+the+ride+interesting+and+provide+you+with+the+best+results.%3C%2Fp%3E SQL+2016+upgrade %3Cp%3EThe+main+draw+for+SQL+Server+2016%2C+at+least+from+my+point+of+view%2C+is+the+Query+Store.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EQuery+Store+allows+us+to+answer+the+question+of+how+queries+were+performing+in+the+past%2C+to+easily+track+and+fix+query+performance+regressions%2C+to+see+total+resource+consumption+over+time+and+to+identify+expensive+queries.+Previously+we+would+have+needed+to+run+Extended+Event+sessions+over+periods+of+time%2C+import+the+results+and+aggregate+them+and+then+analyse+the+results%2C+and+that%26rsquo%3Bs+prone+to+missing+queries+if+they+don%26rsquo%3Bt+run+all+the+time.+DMVs+don%26rsquo%3Bt+have+that+problem%2C+but+the+data+they+contain+is+not+persisted%2C+and+is+lost+when+the+server+restarts.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EQuery+Store%2C+once+it+is+enabled%2C+captures+queries%2C+plans+and+performance+characteristics+and+persists+them+into+the+database.+Since+it%26rsquo%3Bs+persisted+and+running+all+the+time%2C+we+don%26rsquo%3Bt+need+to+worry+about+whether+there+was+an+extended+event+session+running+when+a+query+showed+a+problem%2C+or+whether+the+server+has+been+restarted+since+the+problem+started.+The+data+showing+historical+query+performance+is+a+query+away.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAnd+that%26rsquo%3Bs+far+from+the+only+feature+added+in+this+version.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe+received+temporal+tables%2C+tables+that+automatically+keep+a+history+and+which+are+queryable+for+how+the+data+in+the+table+looked+at+any+point+in+time.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EStretch+DB+was+introduced%2C+the+ability+to+stretch+a+table+into+Azure+so+that+cold+data+can+be+stored+in+the+cloud%2C+transparently+to+users.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAlways+Encrypted+finally+provides+an+answer+to+preventing+the+DBA+from+seeing+data+by+transparently+encrypting+the+data+in+the+application+and+storing+only+encrypted+data+in+the+database.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ERow+level+security+allows+users+to+be+assigned+rights+to+read+or+modify+subsets+of+the+data+in+tables.+No+more+need+to+add+views+for+security.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ELive+query+statistics+makes+diagnosing+current+query+problems+easier%2C+as+there%26rsquo%3Bs+no+need+to+wait+for+the+query+to+finish+to+get+the+run-time+statistics.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThere+are+also+improvements+to+Columnstore+indexes%2C+In-memory+OLTP%2C+Always+On+Availability+Groups+and+a+pile+of+internal+optimisations+that+make+SQL+Server+2016+just+run+faster.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBut%2C+upgrading+is+risky%2C+especially+with+the+cardinality+estimator+changes+in+SQL+Server+2014.+Testing+for+broken+functionality+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+hard+if+the+apps+have+good+test+coverage%2C+but+testing+for+performance+has+been+really+difficult.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EUntil+now+with+Query+Store.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETesting+performance+for+the+SQL+Server+2016+upgrade+is+as+easy+as+restoring+a+copy+of+the+DB+to+a+testing+server%2C+enabling+Query+Store%2C+running+the+workload+under+old+and+new+compatibility+levels%2C+and+then+using+the+built-in+Query+Store+reports+to+identify+queries+that+experienced+performance+regressions.+What+could+take+days+of+work+to+identify+the+regressions+in+previous+versions%2C+can+now+be+done+by+looking+at+a+single+built+in+report.+In+some+cases%2C+fixing+the+performance+regression+may+also+be+easily+done+with+Query+Store%2C+using+the+plan+forcing+feature.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThat+was+the+story+at+RTM%2C+a+compelling+case+for+upgrading%2C+and+a+feature+that+makes+it+far+easier+to+test+for+that+upgrade+than+ever+before.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThen+SP1+was+released.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+big+news+of+SP1+wasn%26rsquo%3Bt+the+new+features+it+had%2C+though+the+features+were+interesting.+The+big+news+o
