First+Raspberry+Pi+Jam+comes+to+South+Africa %3Cp%3EWillie+Strydom+was+awarded+the+prize+for+the+most+innovative+build+at+the+first+ever+Raspberry+Pi+Jam+to+be+hosted+in+South+Africa.+Willie%26rsquo%3Bs+project+in+%26lsquo%3Bhome+automation%26rsquo%3B+is+designed+to+consolidate+various+home+automation+applications+into+a+single+user+interface+that+can+be+accessed+from+an+app+on+your+iPhone+or+Apple+watch+and+was+selected+as+the+winning+entry+based+on+its+relevance%2C+usefulness%2C+and+future+potential.+Willie+won+a+%26lsquo%3BLimited+Edition%26rsquo%3B+Raspberry+Pi%2C+only+1000+have+been+produced+globally+and+a+voucher+to+spend+at+RS+Components+for+his+next+project.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+%26lsquo%3BRaspberry+Pi%26rsquo%3B+is+a+credit-card-size+computer+board+that+can+run+the+same+basic+functions+as+a+PC+but+costs+a+fraction+of+the+price.+The+device+has+been+used+in+numerous+applications+from+setting+up+computer+labs+to+home+automation%2C+and+from+atmospheric+monitoring+to+robot+cars.%26nbsp%3B+A+Raspberry+Pi+Jam+is+an+organised+community+event+where+people+get+together+and+share+knowledge%2C+learn+new+things+and+meet+other+Raspberry+Pi+enthusiasts.+This+particular+event+was+structured+as+a+show+and+tell%2C+meaning+that+participants+were+given+the+opportunity+to+demonstrate+their+Pi+projects+and+discuss+them+with+other+like-minded+Pi+enthusiasts.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EJointly+hosted+by+RS+Components+and+Entelect+Software%2C+nine+Pi+projects+were+presented+and+the+event+kicked+off+with+a+keynote+address+by+Eben+Upton%2C+the+illustrious+inventor+of+the+Raspberry+Pi.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EUpton%26rsquo%3Bs+address%2C+provided+the+guests+with+an+insight+into+the+initial+concept+of+the+Pi+and+the+start-up+phase+of+the+Raspberry+Pi+Foundation.+He+explained+that+the+idea+of+the+Raspberry+Pi+came+about+in+trying+to+solve+a+particular+problem+which+was+to+boost+an+interest+in+computer+programming+and+STEM+learning+in+young+learners.+The+concept+was+to+create+an+affordable+computer+at+%2435%2C+which+needed+to+be+both+functional+and+simple+enough+for+a+child+to+learn+coding.+The+team+initially+envisioned+selling+1000+Raspberry+Pi+boards%2C+but+demand+peaked+quite+rapidly+to+10%26nbsp%3B000+boards+and+5+years+later+they+have+sold+over+15+million+units+around+the+world.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDuring+the+event%2C+RS+Components+and+Entelect+Software+representatives+shared+their+expert+knowledge+with+the+participants+to+provide+some+insight+on+where+to+next+with+each+of+the+projects+presented.+Projects+were+judged+by+a+panel+according+to+predetermined+criteria%2C+such+as%2C+novelty%2C+creativity%2C+technology+choices%2C+user+experience%2C+simplicity+and+future+potential.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESecond+place+went+to+Gareth+Stephenson%2C+who+presented+his+%26lsquo%3BPi+Cluster%26rsquo%3B+project+which+tested+the+concept+of+cluster+computing+using+Raspberry+Pis.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThird+place+went+to%3A+Schalk+van+Heerden+with+his+%26lsquo%3BCherry+Pi+Brewery%26rsquo%3B+project+which+is+a+prototype+concept+for+a+fully+automated+micro-brewery.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOther+notable+projects+were%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EA+self-driving+car%2C+developed+by+Philip+Booysen.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAn+offline+library+developed+for+underprivileged+students%2C+designed+by+Yoshiaki+Nagasawa%2C+a+Japanese+student%2C+currently+living+in+Cape+Town.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EExplaining+where+the+idea+came+from+to+host+the+first+Raspberry+Jam+in+South+Africa%2C+Brian+Andrew%2C+General+Manager%2C+RS+Components+South+Africa%2C+said%3A+%26ldquo%3BSince+the+day+the+Raspberry+Pi+was+launched+in+South+Africa+in+2012%2C+it+was+an+instant+hit+with+design+engineers%2C+makers+and+anyone+who+loves+tech+gadgets+because+of+its+cost+and+the+fact+that+it+functions+as+a+mini+computer.+Although+it+was+initially+designed+to+promote+STEM+learning+and+coding%2C+it+has+successfully+been+used+in+both+business+and+home+applications.+We+realised+that+as+a+global+distributor+of+the+Pi+computer+board%2C+we+needed+to+initiate+a+platform+in+South+Africa+for+Pi+fanatics+to+get+together+and+share+their+knowledge+and+ideas.%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMark+Beets%2C+General+Manager+at+Entelect+Software%2C+agreed%3A+%26ldquo%3BWe%26rsquo%3Bre+passionate+about+the+future+of+technology+and%2C+for+us%2C+this+means+doing+whatever+we+can+to+help+the+tech+community+grow%2C+and+creating+environments+where+people+can+share+their+innovations+with+like-minded+people.+The+Raspberry+Pi+is+an+awesome+tool+that+enables+tech+enthusiasts+to+create+some+really+cool+innovations%2C+which+is+exactly+what+we+saw+today.%26rdquo%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAlthough+the+date+for+the+next+Raspberry+Pi+Jam+hasn%26rsquo%3Bt+been+set+yet%2C+there+are+plans+in+the+pipeline.+Both+Andrew+and+Beets+agree+that+these+community+platforms+are+where+some+of+the+best+innovations+happen%2C+so+watch+this+space.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIf+you+would+like+to+be+informed+about+future+Raspberry+Pi+Jams%2C+please+register+on+the+following+link%3A+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fbit.ly%2FRPiJamSA%22%3Ehttp%3A%2F%2Fbit.ly%2FRPiJamSA%3C%2Fa%3E.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E How+the+blockchain+can+put+an+end+to+identity+theft %3Cp%3EYou+and+I+could+be+among+the+30%26nbsp%3Bmillion+South+Africans+whose+personal+information+was+compromised+in+the+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.itweb.co.za%2Findex.php%3Foption%3Dcom_content%26amp%3Bview%3Darticle%26amp%3Bid%3D165695%22%3Ecountry%26rsquo%3Bs+largest+data+breach%3C%2Fa%3E+to+date.+Look+at+that+number+again%3A+30+million+%26ndash%3B+more+than+half+of+the+country%26rsquo%3Bs+population.+Actually%2C+the+security+researcher+who+exposed+the+breach+%26ndash%3B+let%26rsquo%3Bs+call+them+the+Hunt+Files%2C+after+the+researcher+%26ndash%3B+expects+this+number+to+be+a+lot+higher.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+a+very+real+possibility+that+our+information+is+on+that+list%3A+our+ID+numbers%2C+names%2C+addresses%2C+genders%2C+birth+dates%2C+ethnicities%2C+occupations%2C+marital+status+and+more.%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cbr%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22font-size%3A12.0pt%3B%22%3EGreatest+threat%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cbr%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+hack+has+brought+cybersecurity+into+the+spotlight+once+again.+South+Africa+has+the+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fmybroadband.co.za%2Fnews%2Findustrynews%2F219598-cyber-theft-the-fastest-growing-crime-around-the-globe.html%22%3Ethird+highest+number+of+cybercrime+victims+worldwide%3C%2Fa%3E+and+loses+more+than+R2.2+billion+to+internet+fraud+and+phishing+attacks+annually%2C+according+to+the+South+African+Banking+Risk+Information+Centre.+Gartner+predicts+that+cybercrime+might+become+the+greatest+threat+to+every+person%2C+place+and+thing+in+the+world+within+the+next+five+years.%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cbr%3E+%3Cp%3EClearly%2C+something+has+to+change.%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cbr%3E+%3Cp%3EEnter+the+blockchain%2C+a+shared%2C+digital%2C+decentralised%2C+secure+online+ledger+that+facilitates+online+transactions+%26ndash%3B+and+not+just+monetary+ones.+Had+the+Hunt+Files+been+stored+on+the+blockchain%2C+the+hack+would+never+have+happened.%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cbr%3E+%3Cp%3EHere%26rsquo%3Bs+why%3A%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cbr%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22font-size%3A12.0pt%3B%22%3EDecentralised%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cbr%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+Hunt+Files+were+stored+on+a+central+database+with+questionable+security%2C+which+is+why+it+was+possible+to+access+all+the+information+easily+and+in+one+go.%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cbr%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+blockchain+is+stored+on+a+decentralised+database+%26ndash%3B+the+blockchain%2C+comprising+thousands+%26ndash%3B+if+not+hundreds+of+thousands+%26ndash%3B+of+nodes%2C+scattered+all+over+the+world.+An+attacker+will+need+to+control+more+than+51%25+of+the+nodes+in+order+to+compromise+the+database%2C+and+the+chance+of+that+happening+is+virtually+impossible.%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cbr%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22font-size%3A12.0pt%3B%22%3ESecure%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cbr%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+blockchain+uses+public-key+cryptography%2C+which+is+one+of+the+strongest+form+of+encryptions+available+today.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+used+to+secure+websites%2C+certificates+and+just+about+everything+on+the+Internet.+Together+with+the+decentralised+nature+of+the+blockchain%2C+this+means+that+not+even+the+combined+power+of+the+world%26rsquo%3Bs+supercomputers+could+crack+the+chain.+It+has+stood+the+test+of+time+for+the+past+nine+years%2C+securing+hundreds+of+billions+of+dollars%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cbr%3E+%3Cp%3EWithout+the+blockchain%2C+our+data+is+%26ldquo%3Bowned%26rdquo%3B+by+hundreds+of+different+service+providers+%26ndash%3B+banks%2C+telcos%2C+e-commerce+stores+and+more.+This+means+our+information+is+stored+on+potentially+thousands+of+different+databases+that%2C+hopefully%2C+have+robust+security+in+place.+Clearly%2C+some+don%26rsquo%3Bt.%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cbr%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22font-size%3A12.0pt%3B%22%3EPower+shift%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cbr%3E+%3Cp%3EWith+the+blockchain+%26ndash%3B+and+with+apps+like+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.civic.com%2F%22%3ECivic%3C%2Fa%3E+%26ndash%3B+consumers+regain+control+of+their+data.+They+decide+who+can+access+it%2C+for+what+purposes+and+for+how+long.+And%2C+when+we+no+longer+need+the+service+%28e.g.+we+switch+banks%29%2C+we+take+our+information+with+us%2C+rather+than+leaving+a+copy+of+it+on+the+bank%26rsquo%3Bs+database.%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cbr%3E+%3Cp%3ECivic+makes+it+as+easy+to+log+into+a+website+as+it+is+to+log+in+with+Facebook%2C+except+our+information+is+stored+on+our+phones+and+not+in+a+public+database.+When+we+log+in+with+Civic%2C+we+scan+a+barcode+on+the+website+that+allows+the+site+to+only+access+the+bare+minimum+information.+If+it+only+needs+our+email+address+to+log+in%2C+that%26rsquo%3Bs+all+it+gets.+If+we+were+to+log+in+with+Facebook%2C+we+share+a+lot+more+about+ourselves+than+the+site+needs+to+know+%26ndash%3B+like+personal+information%2C+interests+and+connections.%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cbr%3E+%3Cp%3EFrom+next+year%2C+Civic+will+be+able+to+process+Know+Your+Customer+%28KYC%29+and+anti-money-laundering+%28AML%29+requests%2C+making+it+a+viable+option+for+quick%2C+cheap+and+secure+compliance+and+regulatory+verifications.%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cbr%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22font-size%3A12.0pt%3B%22%3EChallenges%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cbr%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+biggest+challenge+hampering+the+wide+scale+uptake+of+the+blockchain+is+throughput.+The+fastest+blockchain+platforms+currently+available+can+process+around+1%2C000+transactions+a+second.+When+we+first+started+using+blockchain+for+transaction+processing%2C+it+could+only+handle+around+seven+transactions+%26ndash%3B+making+it+ideal+for+the+processing+of+cryptocurrency+transactions+at+the+time.%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cbr%3E+%3Cp%3EWhile+we%26rsquo%3Bve+come+a+long+way+in+a+short+space+of+time%2C+we%26rsquo%3Bre+still+far+from+the+40%2C000+transactions+processed+every+second+by+the+likes+of+Visa+and+Mastercard.+But+at+the+current+rate+of+development%2C+we+anticipate+serious+contenders+by+the+end+of+2018.%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cbr%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22font-size%3A12.0pt%3B%22%3EStart+now%2C+start+here%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cbr%3E+%3Cp%3EMany+people+still+believe+that+the+blockchain+only+has+financial+applications.+But+because+of+the+reduced+cost+and+ease+of+developing+decentralised+apps+%28Dapps%29%2C+we%26rsquo%3Bre+already+seeing+a+lot+more+use+cases%2C+across+every+industry%2C+including+government%2C+healthcare%2C+manufacturing%2C+supply+chain+and+identify+verification.%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cbr%3E+%3Cp%3ELike+the+Internet+of+Things%2C+artificial+intelligence+and+machine+learning%2C+the+blockchain+is+going+to+radically+change+many+industries%2C+and+now+is+as+good+a+time+as+any+for+businesses+to+start+exploring+its+use+cases+and+opportunities+%26ndash%3B+especially+if+they%26rsquo%3Bre+still+running+their+operations+on+legacy+infrastructure.%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cbr%3E+%3Cp%3EBefore+embarking+on+a+blockchain+project%2C+ensure+your+team+has+the+skills+to+develop+Dapps+and+that+they+understand+cryptography.+Chances+are%2C+if+you+handle+any+kind+of+sensitive+information%2C+the+blockchain+will+provide+an+unmatched+level+of+security+and+user+control%2C+helping+you+to+meet+governance+requirements+and+to+gain+the+trust+of+your+customers.%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cbr%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+blockchain+is+going+to+fundamentally+challenge+traditional+power+structures+by+giving+control+of+information+back+to+the+consumer.+Innovating+in+this+space+is+a+business%26rsquo%3B+best+defence+mechanism.+If+businesses+don%26rsquo%3Bt+embrace+the+blockchain%2C+they+may+very+likely+have+their+own+Kodak+moment.%3C%2Fp%3E Wahjid+Nasser+%28Entelect%2C+Technical+Lead%29+%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E+Somebody+could+be+using+your+personal+information+right+now+to+commit+fraud.+The+scary+thing+is%2C+you+wouldn%E2%80%99t+know+until+it+was+too+late+%E2%80%93+maybe+you+get+a+credit+card+bill+running+into+the+thousands+or+an+exorbitant+cellphone+account+for+a+number+you+don%E2%80%99t+own. What+will+the+skills+base+of+the+future+look+like%3F %3Cp%3EThe+workforce+of+the+future+is+going+to+be+dependent+on+its+adaptability.+While+it%26rsquo%3Bs+true+that+many+jobs+of+today+will+no+longer+exist%2C+in+the+short+term%2C+one+should+worry+less+about+the+relevance+of+a+current+job+and+rather+focus+on+priming+the+next+generation+to+follow+careers+that+meet+the+needs+of+the+technology+revolution.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+today%26rsquo%3Bs+job+market%2C+many+jobs+include+manual+labour%2C+tedious+repetition+of+tasks%2C+or+basic+decision-making%2C+all+of+which+are+prime+for+replacement+via+automation+or+artificial+intelligence.+This+is+because+a+machine+will+almost+always+be+better+in+performance+at+jobs+of+this+nature.+Equally+however%2C+with+the+rise+of+automation+and+artificial+intelligence%2C+jobs+involving+architecting+systems%2C+and+systems+maintenance%2C+will+become+more+important.%26nbsp%3B+People+are+also+required+to+have+a+deep+understanding+of+domains%2C+the+ability+to+make+strategic+decisions%2C+and+translate+a+strategy+into+something+that+machines+can+understand+and+can+work+towards.+So%2C+these+roles+will+remain+crucial.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhile+it%26rsquo%3Bs+difficult+to+name+explicit+jobs+of+the+future%2C+some+essential+skills+will+be+required%3A%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22margin-left%3A+40px%3B%22%3E%26bull%3B+IT+and+domain-based+skills.+The+ability+to+understand+intricacies+in+different+domains+is+important+to+ensure+that+the+technology+we+build+to+address+problems+is+suitable.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22margin-left%3A+40px%3B%22%3E%26bull%3B+Communication+skills+are+vital+in+translating+ideas+and+a+strategic+vision+to+something+tangible.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22margin-left%3A+40px%3B%22%3E%26bull%3B+The+ability+to+apply+logic%2C+as+well+as+strong+problem-solving+abilities%2C+are+needed+to+design%2C+engineer%2C+and+bring+these+technologies+to+life.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ECreativity+is+also+something+difficult+to+simulate+in+a+machine.+The+ideation+of+possibilities+whilst+simultaneously+considering+the+impacts+of+it+is+a+complex+thought-process+which+is+difficult+to+simulate+in+a+machine.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHowever%2C+a+study+conducted+by+Ad+agency%2C+McCann%2C+in+Japan%2C+pitched+its+creative+planner+to+the+world%26rsquo%3Bs+first+AI+creative+director+to+develop+a+TV+commercial.+In+an+anonymous+vote+the+AI+creative+director%26rsquo%3Bs+TV+Ad+won%2C+using+only+algorithms+to+respond+to+the+brief+and+determine+the+elements+of+the+TV+Ad.+However%2C+in+creative+scenarios+such+as+this%2C+the+algorithms+will+be+created+by+humans%2C+so+arguably%2C+people+remain+at+the+heart+of+AI%26rsquo%3Bs+efficacy+and+humans+with+these+skills+remain+important+for+the+future.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+concept%2C+of+technology+replacing+the+human+mind%2C+is+a+definite+possibility+in+the+distant+future.+We+may+be+able+to+upload+our+minds+to+machines%2C+we+may+develop+algorithms+that+learn+how+to+think+generally+like+humans+do.+There+are+many+examples+of+early+stages+of+general+intelligence+technology+today+such+as+Google%26rsquo%3Bs+Alpha+Go.+Currently%2C+we+are+harnessing+automation+and+artificial+intelligence+to+tackle+narrow+domains+and+contexts.+As+we+get+better+at+building+these+systems%2C+a+more+general+intelligence+similar+to+the+human+mind+becomes+more+realistic.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+the+longer+term%2C+individuals+who+want+to+remain+relevant+and+an+asset+to+their+organisation+need+to+undergo+a+mind+shift.+Fundamentally%2C+it+all+comes+down+to+one+thing%3A+Innovation+and+future+thinking.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBy+being+open+to+change+and+harnessing+it+for+the+benefit+of+the+organisation%2C+every+person+can+be+an+asset.+Being+stuck+in+a+traditional+way+of+thinking+and+doing+things+quickly+becomes+a+hindrance+to+innovation.+Often%2C+an+organisation+can+operate+fine%2C+unaware+of+its+sloth%2C+until+it%26rsquo%3Bs+disrupted+by+another+organisation+that+embraces+innovation.+By+that+time%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+too+late.+Companies+need+to+invest+in+skunk+works%2C+or+at+least+the+culture+that+encourages+people+to+innovate+from+within+because+organisations+also+have+a+role+to+play+in+developing+the+skills+of+the+future.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBeing+open+to+rethinking+the+way+we+work%2C+the+value+we+add%2C+and+the+vision+we+work+towards+is+almost+expected+for+the+future+of+an+organisation.+Be+part+of+the+revolution%2C+or+be+consumed+by+it.%3C%2Fp%3E Pair-programming+makes+light%28er%29+work+of+sprint+zero %3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EBy+Kale-Ab+Tessera+%28Entelect%2C+Intermediate+Software+Engineer%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESoftware+Engineers+are+notorious+for+being+antisocial.+We+are+known+to+work+in+isolation%2C+with+our+headphones+on+and+enough+coffee+and+snacks+to+sustain+us.+However%2C+with+the+increased+adoption+of+Agile+and+Extreme+Programming%2C+pair+programming+has+increased+in+popularity%2C+challenging+the+lone-programmer+mindset.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMy+team+and+I+were+challenged+to+deliver+an+MVP+in+16+weeks+for+a+large+South+African+mobile+communications+company.+The+challenges+included+a+tight+timeline%2C+high-quality+delivery%2C+acute+and+effective+problem-solving+and+somewhere+amongst+all+this%2C+team+growth.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESprint+zero+is+often+the+hardest+%26ndash%3B+in+order+to+develop+a+MVP%2C+teams+have+to+conduct+client+interviews%2C+story+mapping+with+UX+designs%2C+setup+of+the+delivery+pipeline+for+the+squad%2C+continuous+Integration+and+delivery%2C+deployments%2C+identifying+and+implementing+communication+channels+such+as+Slack%2C+with+integrations+into+the+delivery+pipeline.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEssentially%2C+pair+programming+is+where+two+people+simultaneously+working+together+on+the+same+piece+of+code.+One+person+%28the+driver%29+codes%2C+while+another+person+%28the+navigator%29+makes+suggestions%2C+corrections+and+improvements+to+the+code+written.+These+two+roles+can+also+switch+at+certain+intervals+allowing+both+individuals+to+get+a+chance+at+coding+and%2C+making+suggestions.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe+believed+pair-programming+would+help+overcome+key+challenges+synonymous+with+%26lsquo%3Bsprint+zero%26rsquo%3B%2C+such+as+distribution+of+knowledge%2C+code+quality%2C+and+team+communication%2C+but+we+uncovered+some+other+benefits+along+the+way+too.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EAdopting+new+technology+and+acquiring+new+skills%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOn+this+project%2C+many+of+the+team+were+new+to+React+and+Spring+Boot.+Pair+programming+allowed+us+to+learn+and+rapidly+distribute+our+knowledge+in+the+team.+Once+someone+had+learned+how+a+part+of+a+framework+works%2C+he%2Fshe+would+pair+with+an+individual+who+didn%26rsquo%3Bt+and+this+would+quickly+distribute+the+knowledge+in+the+team%2C+meaning+in+a+few+weeks%2C+we+all+knew+the+fundamentals+of+the+frameworks+we+were+using.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAlong+with+quick+distribution+of+knowledge%2C+this+approach+also+reduces+key+man+dependency%2C+whereby+only+one+individual+knows+how+a+certain+part+of+a+system+works.+Pair+programming+transforms+the+effectiveness+of+the+entire+team+by+ensuring+at+least+two+people+have+seen+or+worked+through+each+part+of+the+system.+Distribution+of+knowledge+also+supports+the+development+of+high-quality+code+under+tight+deadlines.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAnother+advantage+we+had+as+a+result+of+pair+programming+was+increased+project+momentum.+We+have+all+been+in+situations+where+we+have+spent+too+much+time+stuck+on+a+technical+task.+Rather+than+asking+a+coworker+for+help%2C+we+tend+to+push+through+and+waste+valuable+time.+Pair+programming+ensures+that+if+one+person+is+stuck+or+struggling%2C+another+person+is+able+to+help+or+is+at+least+aware+of+the+situation.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EMaintaining+code+quality%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESixteen+weeks+is+a+tight+deadline+for+any+team+to+develop+a+MVP+and+makes+achieving+good+code+quality+quite+difficult.+In+addition+to+Unit%2C+Integration+and+Acceptance+Tests%2C+pair+programming+allowed+us+to+ensure+quality+was+maintained+as+we+coded+in+pairs+and+checked+each+other%26rsquo%3Bs+code+and+logic.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIt+is+inevitable+that+having+multiple+people+working+on+the+same+piece+of+code%2C+increases+the+likelihood+to+pick+up+bugs+earlier%2C+while+decreases+the+chance+of+using+obscure+hacks+%28two+people+need+to+agree+to+these+hacks%29.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFurthermore%2C+both+parties+can+share+their+knowledge%2C+tips+and+tricks+with+one+another%2C+creating+a+code+base+using+the+shared+knowledge+of+both+parties.+Even+the+intern+could+teach+you+about+some+design+pattern+or+tool+he+or+she+read+about+the+night+before.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ETeam+communication%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEffective+team+communication+is+a+critical+part+of+any+successful+project.+Pair+programming+encourages+individuals+to+discuss+problems+together+and+solve+them+in+a+way+that+both+parties+are+happy.+This+also+ensures+a+better+spread+of+knowledge+of+what+is+going+on+in+the+system%2C+ensuring+that+more+people+are+in+the+loop+with+the+inner+working+of+the+system+and+what+the+business+requires.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+was+especially+relevant+to+our+project%2C+as+it+had+complicated+business+rules%2C+which+the+team+needed+to+master+quickly.+When+pairing%2C+we+would+spread+and+build+on+our+understanding+of+these+complicated+rules+and+we+could+discuss+possible+ways+of+representing+these+rules.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWorking+in+tight-knit+pairs+and+communicating+closely+also+helps+keep+the+teams+focused.+We+found+that+it+is+much+easier+for+a+pair+to+stay+highly+focused+for+longer%2C+than+a+larger+team+where+people+work+as+individuals+and+some+people+on+the+periphery+fade+away.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EA+perfect+solution%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ENaturally%2C%26nbsp%3B+there+are+risks+too.+The+most+significant+risk+with+pair-programming+that+we+have+identified+is+slower+development+time.+Research+has+shown+that+pair+programming+has+a+15%25+development+time+cost+%28https%3A%2F%2Fcollaboration.csc.ncsu.edu%2Flaurie%2FPapers%2FXPSardinia.PDF%29.+This+is+because+less+tasks+can+be+worked+on+concurrently.+Additionally%2C+whether+it+is+due+to+different+experience%2C+skill+levels+or+just+programming+speed%2C+pair+programming+can+also+slow+down+the+faster+of+the+pair.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAdditionally%2C+Pair+programming+inherently+involves+a+lot+of+discussion%2C+but+it+is+important+to+ensure+majority+of+this+talk+is+related+to+tackling+the+issues+at+hand.+A+major+risk+of+pair+programming%2C+is+having+one+person+doing+all+the+work+or+driving%2C+while+the+other+individual+is+disinterested+or+on+their+phones.+This+could+lead+to+a+wasted+resource+and+no+real+value+received+from+pair+programming.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAnd+we+know+that+some+engineers+prefer+working+alone%2C+so+Pair+Programming+will+be+a+big+shift+for+some+team+members.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EUndeniably%2C+Pair+Programming+is+an+investment%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEven+with+the+possible+risks+of+slightly+slower+development+times%2C+workload+imbalance+or+off+topic+discussions%2C+pair+programming+can+increase+quality+of+code+and+ultimately+saves+time+and+money.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EPair+programming+should+definitely+be+viewed+as+an+investment.+The+longer-term+advantages+of+distribution+of+knowledge%2C+code+quality+and+bug+fixes%2C+along+with+team+communication+and+problem-solving+capabilities%2C+converts+a+15%25+development+time+cost%2C+into+an+investment+in+the+present+and+future+capabilities+of+any+team.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETeams+still+need+to+have+the+discipline+and+the+people+skills+to+make+sure+pair+programming+is+beneficial.+In+situations+where+pair+programming+is+not+possible%2C+teams+could+ensure+thorough+code+reviews+are+done+so+that+all+code+has+been+checked+or+at+least+seen+by+more+than+one+person.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIs+pair+programming+suited+for+your+team%3F+Well%2C+maybe.+It+worked+well+for+our+team+and+allowed+us+to+build+a+good+quality+MVP%2C+with+majority+of+the+team+having+a+good+idea+of+the+system+as+a+whole.+Why+not+give+it+a+try%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E roach+to+compare+the+flawed+ideas+from+the+differentiators+with+value.+Consider+the+following+when+preparing+for+your+next+AI-inclusive+software+project%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cul%3E+%3Cli%3ELeverage+AI+within+strategic+initiatives%3A+What+are+the+big+ticket+items+in+the+organisational+strategy%3F+This+is+where+any+AI+solution+should+be+explored.+Don%26rsquo%3Bt+lose+focus+on+the+mission+critical+priorities+just+to+introduce+AI+as+a+side-line+initiative.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cul%3E+%3Cli%3EUnderstand+how+the+given+AI+solution+will+solve+a+specific+challenge%3A+It%26rsquo%3Bs+easy+to+get+lost+in+the+case+studies+and+magic+marketing%2C+especially+from+the+big+players.+But+ensure+there+is+a+set+objective+which+can+and+will+be+met.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cul%3E+%3Cli%3EBe+critical+when+weighing+up+solutions+with+and+without+AI%3A+Consider+whether+there+is+any+material+benefit+to+justify+the+costs.+You+might+find+that+a+%26lsquo%3Bsimple%26rsquo%3B%2C+non-AI+solution+solves+the+problem+without+any+fuss.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cul%3E+%3Cli%3EHave+evaluations+in+place%3A+Ensure+you+are+clear+about+success+criteria%2C+and+have+specific+and+measurable+outcomes+in+place+for+the+AI+components.+The+benefits+of+the+AI+solution+should+be+measurable+against+the+criteria+and+it+should+be+evident+that+the+product+owner+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+only+using+AI+for+the+sake+of+it.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cul%3E+%3Cli%3ESpend+time+on+understanding+the+AI+solution%3A+It+is+important+for+businesses+to+note+that+the+product+will+be+radically+different+from+their+usual+technological+enhancements.+Product+owners+should+take+the+time+to+research+and+understand+the+AI+solution%2C+which+will+enable+them+to+make+informed+decisions.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Whether+creating+new+digital+experiences+for+clients%2C+more+accurate+predictions%2C+or+innovative+ways+to+interact%2C+AI+is+already+changing+the+face+of+industries+and+should+be+utilised.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Ultimately%2C+as+a+participant+in+the+global+technology+industry%2C+at+Entelect+we+have+a+responsibility+to+help+our+clients+and+partners+cut+through+the+hype%2C+and+find+real+and+impactful+applications+of+AI+which+can+make+it+into+production.%3C%2Fp%3E od%2C+blockchain+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+it.+West+Virginia+announced+that+they+would+be+the+first+US+state+to+experiment+with+blockchain+during+their+midterm+elections%2C+allowing+people+serving+in+the+military+to+vote+via+a+smartphone+app.+But+experts+in+both+cybersecurity+and+voting+see+blockchains+as+needlessly+complicated%2C+and+no+more+secure+than+other+online+ballots.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBlockchain+would+work+for+recording+votes%2C+but+would+need+additional+layers+of+technology+for+more+complex+challenges+such+as+voter+validation%2C+ballot+anonymity%2C+and+letting+voters+verify+whether+their+votes+were+recorded.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+final+results+would+be+stored+on+the+blockchain+so+you+can+have+a+permanent+record+of+the+final+result%2C+but+this+does+not+guarantee+that+the+votes+hadn%26rsquo%3Bt+been+altered+before+they+went+on+the+blockchain.+Simply+put%2C+blockchain+would+not+solve+the+double-voting+problem.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThere+are+many+organisations+looking+to+use+blockchain+technology+to+build+products+which+don%26rsquo%3Bt+need+blockchain%2C+gain+nothing+from+it%2C+and+in+some+cases+are+worse+off+because+of+it.+To+help+you%2C+we%26rsquo%3Bre+sharing+some+of+our+experiences.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+below+flowchart+has+a+list+of+questions+you+need+to+ask+before+using+blockchain+to+ensure+your+product+needs+and+benefits+from+the+technology%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FBlockchainflowdiagram.jpg%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ELooking+at+this%2C+the+salad+restaurant+chain+wouldn%26rsquo%3Bt+have+made+it+past+the+first+question%2C+and+secure+voting+has+major+problems+at+the+last+three%2C+as+well+as+a+technical+weakness+just+getting+votes+into+the+blockchain+to+start+with.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBlockchain+is+no+silver+bullet+and+more+often+than+not%2C+there+is+a+simpler+alternative.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+easy+to+be+wooed+by+the+latest+trending+technologies+promising+industry+disruption%2C+but+you+need+to+think+critically+about+how+the+technology+would+help+you.+A+useful+rule+of+thumb+is+to+always+determine+which+distinct+advantages+the+new+technology+brings+with+it%2C+along+with+the+problems.+Overlooking+a+potential+technology+mismatch+in+a+rush+to+get+a+solution+out+is+a+sure+way+to+end+up+over+invested+in+a+product+which+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+actually+fit+for+purpose.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E ike+more+established+technologies%2C+the+immature+and+fast-evolving+nature+of+IoT+solutions+increases+the+risk+of+early+obsolescence.+In+the+age+of+IoT+cloud-based+solutions%2C+future-proofing+is+a+continuous+process+to+maximise+solution+adaptability%2C+while+still+managing+risk.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBelow+are+four+considerations+to+keep+in+mind+to+ensure+a+future-proofed+IoT+landscape.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E1.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BSecurity%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Masses+of+data+means+masses+of+potential+security+threats%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+There%26rsquo%3Bs+a+quip+that+goes%3A+The+%26lsquo%3BS%26rsquo%3B+in+IoT+stands+for+%26lsquo%3Bsecurity%26rsquo%3B.+This+is+because+IoT+adoption+is+widely+criticised+for+the+lack+of+security.+Having+an+IoT+solution+that+does+not+start+with+security+as+first+priority+%26ndash%3B+addressing+authentication%2C+authorisation%2C+and+encryption+of+data+%26ndash%3B+will+not+only+lead+to+obsolescence%2C+but+will+also+risk+putting+the+entire+solution+at+risk.+Future-proofing+your+IoT+security+will+ensure+that+customers%26rsquo%3B+personal+details+don%26rsquo%3Bt+get+leaked.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E2.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BScalability%3Cbr+%2F%3E+IoT+solutions+should+be+based+on+horizontally+scaling+architectures%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+With+the+IoT+wave+growing+quicker+than+expected%2C+there+has+not+only+been+an+increase+in+devices%2C+but+also+an+increase+in+the+amount+of+data+that+is+being+transferred.+There+are+many+considerations+that+go+into+building+up+an+IoT+infrastructure+that+can+scale%2C+but+there%26rsquo%3Bs+a+lot+more+to+consider+than+simply+scaling+servers.+Designing+an+infrastructure+that+can+scale+will+help+ensure+the+success+of+the+business+that+is+built+upon+it.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E3.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BFlexibility%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Rapidly+adopt+new+devices%2C+protocols+and+integration%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+As+more+IoT+applications+emerge%2C+architectures+need+to+be+flexible+enough+to+adapt+to+varying+requirements+and+feature+sets.+There+will+undoubtably+be+new+devices+entering+your+ecosystem+and+your+IoT+solution+must+be+prepared+to+handle+those+devices.+A+lack+of+flexibility+will+result+in+the+rapid+aging+and+obsolescence+of+your+system.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E4.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BPortability%3Cbr+%2F%3E+A+single+deployment+model+is+not+enough%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+universal+shift+to+the+cloud+is+challenging+for+many+large+enterprises.+For+those+looking+to+build+future-proof+IoT%2C+leveraging+cloud-based+technologies+and+the+application+of+real-time+data+analysis+can+enable+autonomous+decision-making%2C+and+create+the+potential+for+new+services+and+revenue+streams.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFortunately%2C+the+frameworks+provided+by+major+technology+players+have+recently+matured.+The+Platform-as-a-Service+offerings+from+Microsoft%2C+Amazon%2C+Google+and+Apache+are+now+truly+production+ready.+They+have+a+large+amount+of+infrastructure%2C+data+and+network+heavy-lifting+available+out+the+box%2C+and+pre-configured+solutions+available+for+other+areas+in+some+instances.+There+are+essentially+fewer+breaking+changes+which+would+affect+your+product%2C+so+there+has+never+been+a+better+time+to+pursue+an+IoT+solution.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFuture-proofing+your+IoT+infrastructure+is+achievable+as+long+as+your+organisation+is+thoroughly+prepared+for+the+changes+that+IoT+brings%2C+or+you+have+an+expert+technology+partner+who+can+guide+you+through+these+four+critical+aspects.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Entelect+is+an+end-to-end+technology+services+provider+delivering+custom+software+across+all+industry+sectors.+Entelect+has+developed+several+large+IoT+enterprise+solutions%2C+leveraging+modern+cloud+infrastructure+to+ensure+future-proofing.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFind+us+at%3A+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.entelect.co.za%22%3Ewww.entelect.co.za+%3C%2Fa%3E%2F+%3Ca+href%3D%22mailto%3Asolutions%40entelect.co.za%22%3Esolutions%40entelect.co.za%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E ["New technology"] 4 ways to future-proof your IoT Solution - FINAL.p...
A+look+at+feature+stores+to+enable+machine+learning %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FAlookatfeaturestorestoenablemachinelearning-FINAL1.jpg%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWorking+with+data+is+messy+and+getting+it+ready+for+any+kind+of+model+building+is+a+painstaking+and+time-consuming+process.+Building+feature+stores+is+meant+to+optimize+this+process+for+all+machine+learning+teams+in+an+organization.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+concept+of+a+feature+store+is+growing+in+popularity+with+Uber+introducing+the+concept+in+2017+as+part+of+the+data+management+layer+in+their+machine+learning+platform%2C+Michelangelo.+Netflix+used+a+similar+concept+called+a+feature+encoder+in+their+time+machine%2C+Delorean.+Other+companies+embracing+feature+stores+include+Linkedin+and+Airbnb.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EWhat+is+a+feature+store%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+A+feature+store+is+a+curated+collection+of+pre-computed+features%2C+stored+in+a+centralized+location.+Features+are+calculated+by+joining+raw+data+sources+and+transforming+them+into+formats+that+can+be+interpreted+by+machine+learning+models.+They+are+then+stored+under+descriptive+names+in+a+central+location%2C+making+them+identifiable+and+accessible+to+the+teams+using+them.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In+addition+to+storing+the+features%2C+the+feature+store+has+the+functionality+to+continuously+update+the+feature+calculations+as+new+data+is+added+and+track+that+data+lineage.+They+also+have+the+functionality+to+create+new+features+and+backfill+them+using+the+historical+data.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EBut+what+is+it+for%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Data+scientists+at+Airbnb+spend+up+to+60%25+of+their+time+engineering+features+to+be+used+for+machine+learning+and+Uber+says+during+model+training+the+most+time+is+spent+transforming+and+selecting+features.+Creating+these+features+is+a+fundamental+part+of+the+machine+learning+workflow+but+also+a+an+inefficient+one.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Feature+stores+solve+several+problems+in+the+machine+learning+workflow%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+1.+If+features+are+calculated+ad-hoc+as+part+of+the+pipeline%2C+they+are+difficult+to+reuse+across+different+pipelines.+This+wastes+time+and+resources+during+the+experimentation+phase.+Feature+stores+standardize+how+features+are+accessed+and+make+them+reusable+across+pipelines+and+teams.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+2.+It+allows+teams+to+share+insights+by+including+new+features+that+they+have+found+useful+in+the+store.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+3.+Feature+stores+also+create+a+consistency+in+data.+Various+teams+may+unknowingly+be+creating+the+same+features%2C+a+waste+of+resources+but+also+various+implementations+may+produce+different+results+obscuring+the+definition+and+understanding+of+the+feature+to+the+teams+and+the+company.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+4.+Features+are+automatically+updated+when+new+data+comes+in%2C+but+the+data+lineage+is+tracked.+This+way+teams+do+not+have+to+redo+all+the+calculations+to+update+their+features%2C+but+they+can+still+replicate+experiments+from+before+data+updates+occur.+This+is+important+for+explaining+model+decisions+and+tracking+model+performance+over+time.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+5.+Features+calculated+during+the+experimentation+phase+in+the+data+scientists+preferred+language+may+not+be+perfectly+replicable+in+the+production+system.+This+causes+an+inconsistency+in+the+features+used+for+training+and+those+calculated+for+live+predictions.+Performance+of+a+model+is+then+difficult+to+measure+accurately+until+it+is+deployed%2C+which+can+be+a+costly+mistake.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+feature+store+makes+it+possible+for+teams+to+search+through+a+catalogue+of+features+for+what+they+need.+Teams+can+gain+insight+from+other+teams+by+browsing+the+existing+features+or+sharing+their+own+when+they+add+new+ones.+The+time+saved+on+feature+engineering+can+then+be+dedicated+to+model+building.+Since+this+is+a+very+experimental+process%2C+the+time+added+to+the+model+building+phase+allows+more+ideas+to+be+tested+and+a+better+solution+built.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EOff-the-shelf+or+custom-built%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Netflix%2C+Uber%2C+and+Airbnb+have+all+created+their+own+custom+feature+store+implementations.+Since+these+companies+were+at+the+forefront%2C+they+did+not+have+an+off-the-shelf+solution+available+to+them.+However%2C+not+every+company+needs+a+completely+custom-built+option+and+now+there+are+off-the-shelf+options+available.+Open-source+feature+store+services+are+available+from+Hopsworks+and+Feast+with+Airbnb+planning+to+open+source+their+solution%2C+Zipline%2C+in+the+future.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Building+a+reliable%2C+speedy+feature+store+could+be+a+massive+undertaking+as+it+will+need+to+malleable+enough+to+create+new+features+and+backfill+them%2C+produce+the+results+in+a+reasonable+amount+of+time+and+be+queryable+from+multiple+platforms+and+finally+be+accessible+to+both+offline+sandboxes+and+online+deployed+models.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Off-the-shelf+options+are+faster+to+get+up+and+running+and+will+show+return+on+investment+sooner%2C+but+they+are+still+quite+new+and+there+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+feedback+yet+on+how+they+are+doing+within+organisations+that+have+adopted+them.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EWant+to+read+more%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFeature+Store%3A+the+missing+data+layer+in+ML+pipelines%3F%3A%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fhttps%3A%2F%2Fwww.logicalclocks.com%2Ffeature-store%2F%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3E+https%3A%2F%2Fwww.logicalclocks.com%2Ffeature-store%2F%3C%2Fa%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Introducing+Feast%3A%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Ftowardsdatascience.com%2Fintroducing-feast-5eb4d539c13f%22%3E+https%3A%2F%2Ftowardsdatascience.com%2Fintroducing-feast-5eb4d539c13f%3C%2Fa%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Meet+Michelangelo%3A+Uber%26rsquo%3Bs+Machine+Learning+Platform%3A+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Feng.uber.com%2Fmichelangelo%2F%22%3Ehttps%3A%2F%2Feng.uber.com%2Fmichelangelo%2F%3C%2Fa%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Distributed+Time+Travel+for+Feature+Generation%3A+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Feng.uber.com%2Fmichelangelo%2F%22%3Ehttps%3A%2F%2Fmedium.com%2Fnetflix-techblog%2Fdistributed-time-travel-for-feature-generation-389cccdd3907%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E Working+with+data+is+messy+and+getting+it+ready+for+any+kind+of+model+building+is+a+painstaking+and+time-consuming+process.+Building+feature+stores+is+meant+to+optimize+this+process+for+all+machine+learning+teams+in+an+organization. How+to+create+the+right+DevOps+culture+in+your+organisation %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FDevOpsCultureArtwork-FINAL.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDevOps+is+a+cultural+shift.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+not+a+matter+of+simply+adopting+agile+planning+or+continuous+delivery%2C+although+those+practices+are+certainly+important.+Creating+a+DevOps+culture+in+your+organisation+is+about+having+shared+understanding%2C+communication+and+collaboration+between+software+engineers+and+operations%2C+and+sharing+responsibility+for+the+software+they+build.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ECreating+such+an+environment+is+a+challenge.+It+requires+assessing+and+realigning+how+people+think+about+their+teams%2C+the+business%2C+and+the+customers.+People+don%26rsquo%3Bt+often+welcome+change%2C+but+it+is+doable+by+following+these+four+steps+to+developing+a+strong+and+effective+DevOps+culture+in+your+organisation.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E1.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BGet+leadership+on+board%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Ensuring+you+have+management+buy-in+is+the+first+step.+Without+it+everything+else+will+fail.+Bringing+DevOps+into+your+organisation+involves+cultural+changes+that+are+usually+more+difficult+for+management+to+adapt+to+than+staff.+Taking+a+DevOps+approach+requires+being+comfortable+working+more+transparently+and+requires+management+to+be+comfortable+with+seeing+certain+team+failures+as+growth+opportunities.+A+top-down+approach+to+initiating+a+DevOps+culture+is+the+ideal+way+to+ensure+that+teams+experience+smooth+integration.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E2.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BStart+simple%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+As+with+adopting+any+new+practices%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+important+not+to+overwhelm+teams+with+sudden%2C+unmanageable+changes.+Explore+the+DevOps+process+with+a+viable+pilot+project+and+constantly+field+feedback+from+team+members+along+the+way.+This+will+allow+you+to+encourage+collaboration+between+teams+and+introduce+reliable+measurements+to+frequently+improve+before+rolling+it+out+to+bigger+projects.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E3.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BUse+DevOps+to+create+a+culture+of+growth%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Implementing+a+DevOps+culture+is+an+opportunity+to+grow+team+members%2C+expand+skillsets+and+expand+responsibilities.+Ensuring+end-to-end+responsibility+for+products+is+essential+in+an+integrated+team+environment.+This+will+allow+software+engineers+to+not+just+do+repetitive+coding%2C+but+to+take+more+accountability+for+the+whole+solution+including+infrastructure%2C+support+and+tooling.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E4.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BBreak+down+silos%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Encourage+forming+horizontal+connections+in+your+company+to+break+down+silos%2C+and+increase+transparency%2C+communication+and+collaboration+across+teams.+Discussions+between+teams+lead+to+valuable+insights+and+inputs+into+the+development+process%2C+allowing+teams+to+avoid+certain+issues+and+inefficiencies+right+from+the+get-go.+Great+software+is+built+by+great+teams%2C+which+are+built+on+great+relationships.+It+drives+down+response+times+and+pushes+sprint+velocity+%28and+talent+retention%29+up.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FDevOpsDiagram.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETeams+who+get+DevOps+right+have+done+so+on+the+back+of+a+strong%2C+reliable+culture%2C+driving+them+to+take+accountability+and+ownership+of+the+end+product.+This+culture+has+to+be+supported+by+managers+who+are+willing+to+learn+alongside+their+teams.+Software+Engineers+should+feel+comfortable+to+reach+outside+of+the+%26ldquo%3Bdevelop%26rdquo%3B+step+of+the+SDLC+and+across+into+other+areas+like+design%2C+testing%2C+configuration%2C+infrastructure+and+deployment.+Mixing+these+roles+and+responsibilities+promotes+the+shared+accountability+that+a+successful+DevOps+culture+requires.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E DevOps+is+a+cultural+shift.+It%E2%80%99s+not+a+matter+of+simply+adopting+agile+planning+or+continuous+delivery%2C+although+those+practices+are+certainly+important.+Creating+a+DevOps+culture+in+your+organisation+is+about+having+shared+understanding%2C+communication+and+collaboration+between+software+engineers+and+operations%2C+and+sharing+responsibility+for+the+software+they+build. ["New technology"] DevOps Culture Artwork - FINAL.png
Understanding+bias+in+artificial+intelligence %3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FAIbias.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EArtificial+Intelligence+%28AI%29+aims+to+learn+how+to+do+things+that+people+are+good+at.+Humans+are+great+at+stringing+together+complex+concepts+and+harnessing+them+towards+a+goal.+With+that+in+mind%2C+we%26rsquo%3Bre+also+moulded+by+our+culture%2C+upbringing%2C+and+history.+This+introduces+bias+in+all+humans.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAI+systems+are+only+as+good+as+the+data+we+use+to+mould+them.+This+all+stems+from+people+deciding+what+data+is+captured%2C+how+it+is+captured%2C+and+to+an+extent%2C+how+it+is+interpreted.+With+the+upsurge+of+AI+in+human-centric+areas%2C+such+as+hiring%2C+finance%2C+and+criminal+justice%2C+society+has+started+to+wrestle+with+just+how+much+human+biases+can+make+their+way+into+these+systems.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EHow+AI+bias+happens%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Bad+data+can+contain+implicit+racial%2C+gender%2C+or+ideological+biases%2C+and+many+AI+systems+will+continue+to+be+trained+using+biased+or+flawed+data%2C+making+this+an+ongoing+problem.+AI+bias+is+often+explained+by+a+poor+understanding+of+the+domain%2C+data%2C+and+how+it%26rsquo%3Bs+being+used.+The+reality+is%2C+bias+can+creep+in+long+before+the+data+is+collected%2C+as+well+as+at+many+other+stages+of+the+machine+learning+process.+Some+of+these+stages+include%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E1.+The+data+collection+stage%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+There+are+two+main+ways+that+bias+shows+up+in+training+data%3A+either+the+data+collected+is+not+an+accurate+representation+of+reality%2C+or+it+reflects+existing+prejudices.+If+a+deep-learning+algorithm+receives+more+photos+of+light-skinned+faces+versus+darker-skinned+%2C+a+facial+recognition+system+would+inevitably+be+worse+at+recognising+darker-skinned+faces+since+it+has+few+examples+to+learn+from.+Addressing+the+second+case+would+be+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.reuters.com%2Farticle%2Fus-amazon-com-jobs-automation-insight%2Famazon-scraps-secret-ai-recruiting-tool-that-showed-bias-against-women-idUSKCN1MK08G%22%3EAmazon%26rsquo%3Bs+internal+recruiting+tool%3C%2Fa%3E+that+dismissed+female+candidates.+Because+the+system+was+trained+on+historical+hiring+decisions%2C+which+favoured+men+over+women+%2C+it+learned+to+do+the+same.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E2.+The+data+preparations+stage%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+data+preparation+stage+involves+selecting+which+data+or+attributes+of+the+data+can+be+engineered+into+features+you+want+the+algorithm+to+consider+when+learning.+Examples+of+%26ldquo%3Battributes%26rdquo%3B+could+be+a+customer%26rsquo%3Bs+age%2C+location%2C+income%2C+gender%2C+education+level+or+years+of+experience.+Choosing+which+attributes+to+consider+or+ignore+can+significantly+influence+a+model%26rsquo%3Bs+prediction+accuracy+but+also+introduce+bias.+Individuals+from+previously+disadvantaged+backgrounds+may+be+discriminated+against+due+to+a+combination+of+attributes+without+intentionally+doing+so.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FDatacollectionDIAGRAM.png%22+style%3D%22border-width%3A+0px%3B+border-style%3A+solid%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EWhy+AI+bias+is+not+an+easy+fix%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Because+AI+is+not+a+brand-new+discovery%2C+it+is+often+believed+that+most+problems+should+have+been+ironed+out+by+now.+But+due+to+the+complexity+of+AI+biases+and+ever-changing+technology+and+social+landscapes%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+not+an+easy+fix.+The+truth+is+%26ndash%3B+you+don%26rsquo%3Bt+know+what+you+don%26rsquo%3Bt+know.+This+is+probably+the+biggest+complexity+organisations+have+to+deal+with+when+trying+to+identify+and+solve+biases+in+systems.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+introduction+of+bias+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+always+obvious+during+a+model%26rsquo%3Bs+construction+because+you+may+not+realise+the+downstream+impacts+of+your+data+and+choices+until+much+later.+Once+biases+are+discovered%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+difficult+to+identify+where+it+came+from+and+how+to+get+rid+of+it.+Similarly%2C+the+way+in+which+engineers+and+scientists+are+taught+to+frame+problems+often+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+compatible+with+the+best+way+to+think+about+social+problems.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+also+not+clear+what+the+absence+of+bias+should+look+like.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMost+foundational+laws+and+regulations+were+established+in+a+different+time%2C+where+the+digital+world+didn%26rsquo%3Bt+exist.+There+have+been+instances+of+governing+bodies+adapting+laws+to+try+battle+AI+biases+and+information+privacy%2C+but+it%26rsquo%3Bs+not+always+easy+to+keep+up+with+rapidly+advancing+technologies.+Laws+and+regulations+struggle+to+keep+up+with+the+pace+of+new+technologies+and+their+uses+that+are+constantly+erupting+and+evolving.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EWhere+to+from+here%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Fortunately%2C+a+strong+group+of+AI+researchers+are+working+hard+to+address+the+problem.+They%26rsquo%3Bve+taken+a+variety+of+approaches%2C+such+as+algorithms+that+help+detect+and+mitigate+the+biases+learned+by+the+model+regardless+of+the+data+quality.+Since+bias+in+AI+has+come+to+the+fore+in+recent+years%2C+more+influential+figures%2C+organisations+and+political+bodies+are+taking+a+serious+look+at+how+to+deal+with+the+problem.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAI+has+many+potential+benefits+for+businesses%2C+the+economy%2C+and+tackling+society%26rsquo%3Bs+most+pressing+social+challenges%2C+including+the+impact+of+human+biases+and+emotional+decisions+that+have+high+global+impact.+But+that+will+only+be+possible+if+people+trust+these+systems+to+produce+reliable%2C+unbiased+results.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E Artificial+Intelligence+%28AI%29+aims+to+learn+how+to+do+things+that+people+are+good+at.+Humans+are+great+at+stringing+together+complex+concepts+and+harnessing+them+towards+a+goal.+With+that+in+mind%2C+we%E2%80%99re+also+moulded+by+our+culture%2C+upbringing%2C+and+history.+This+introduces+bias+in+all+humans. Security+tactics+to+minimise+risks %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FSecuritytactics_Banner123.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+100%25%3B%22+%2F%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+today%26rsquo%3Bs+modern+world%2C+almost+every+business+has+a+digital+presence.+Some+businesses+use+digital+tools+to+support+their+core+offering+and+others+rely+on+digital+technology+as+their+offering+altogether.+These+technologies+include+customer-facing+mobile+and+web+applications%2C+and+back-office+systems+managing+supply%2C+demand+and+critical+calculations.+In+more+and+more+cases%2C+huge+data+processing+transmission%2C+storage%2C+and+processing+is+happening.+In+these+complex+technical+environments+where+data+is+being+transmitted+over+the+internet+and+other+networks%2C+information+security+becomes+a+factor+that+can+pose+risks+and+challenges.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EThe+top+ten+security+concerns+you+should+know+about%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Although+digital+landscapes+can+be+intricate%2C+consisting+of+a+number+of+different+systems+working+together%2C+there+are+some+common+information+security+concerns+that+surface.+A+reliable+and+popular+source+of+these+concerns+is+the+Open+Web+Application+Security+Project+%28OWASP%29+Top+10+vulnerabilities+list.+OWASP+is+an+international+non-profit+organisation+dedicated+to+improving+the+security+of+software.+The+OWASP+Top+10+document+highlights+the+first+steps+towards+building+more+secure+solutions.+Here+are+the+concerns+explained+in+a+relevant+and+human+way+for+business+and+non-technical+users%3A%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FOWASP_Top_10-03.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+100%25%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3ETactics+to+address+security+in+your+solutions%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Security+is+all+too+often+considered+only+when+a+solution+is+about+to+be+released+into+the+wild.+Teams+scramble+to+make+fixes+and+shoehorn+security+features+into+a+solution+to+meet+deadlines+and+expectations.+Information+security+should+be+considered+from+the+start+of+any+project.+By+leveraging+simple+tactics+around+education%2C+collaboration%2C+automation%2C+and+creating+visibility%3B+information+security+can+become+part+of+your+process%2C+rather+than+being+a+dreaded+checkbox+that+compromises+the+solution+and+business+at+large.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FTacticstoaddresssecurity-04.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+100%25%3B%22+%2F%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+knowledge+of+the+common+security+concerns%2C+and+the+tactics+for+incorporating+information+security+practices+into+your+ways+of+work+is+the+beginning.+These+principles+and+practices+must+be+continuously+reinforced+within+the+organisation+and+teams.+The+goal+should+be+to+breed+security+as+a+concern+into+the+culture+of+digital+product+development+and+engineering+teams.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+To+ensure+better+security+implementation%2C+we+need+to+think+not+only+about+how+technology+can+catch+our+mistakes+or+breaches+after+the+fact%2C+but+help+us+work+smarter+and+more+securely+from+the+earliest+stages%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E In+today%E2%80%99s+modern+world%2C+almost+every+business+has+a+digital+presence.+Some+businesses+use+digital+tools+to+support+their+core+offering+and+others+rely+on+digital+technology+as+their+offering+altogether. Unpacking+the+data+deluge%3A+5+reasons+why+big+data+projects+fail %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FUnpackingthedatadeluge-BANNER.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+100%25%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+exponential+growth+of+digital+products+and+services+means+more+data+being+gathered+than+ever+before%3A+customers%2C+usage%2C+patterns%2C+and+problems.+With+this+growth%2C+we+have+needed+to+store+and+manage+it+all%2C+but+more+importantly%2C+to+figure+out+how+to+learn+and+benefit+from+it.+This+has+driven+the+increasing+popularity+and+desire+to+incorporate+machine+learning+%28ML%29%2C+artificial+intelligence+%28AI%29+and+data+science+into+most+new+generation+systems+and+products%2C+these+big+data+projects+are+often+ambitious%2C+and+often+failures.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIndustry+is+scrambling+to+capitalise+on+this+data%2C+causing+a+surge+in+demand+for+skilled+data+scientists%2C+engineers+and+developers+who+can+curate%2C+store%2C+process+and+analyse+data.+However%2C+according+to+a+Gartner+report%2C+at+least+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fdesigningforanalytics.com%2Fresources%2Ffailure-rates-for-analytics-bi-iot-and-big-data-projects-85-yikes%2F%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3E60%25+of+big+data+projects+fail%3C%2Fa%3E+to+even+move+past+preliminary+stages%2C+but+it%26rsquo%3Bs+predicted+that+these+numbers+could+be+closer+to+85%25.+The+overwhelming+hype+has+led+to+unreasonable+expectations+from+the+business%2C+and+change+is+outpacing+the+production+of+competent+professionals.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FBigdata-01.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+100%25%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEven+though+only+a+fraction+of+data+science+and+analytics+models+that+are+developed+actually+make+it+into+production+usage%2C+technology+is+not+the+only+point+of+failure.+In+fact%2C+technology+is+a+minor+cause+of+failure+relative+to+the+real+culprits.+We+unpack+5+key+reasons+why+big+data+projects+fail+below.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E1.+Data+science+weekend+warriors%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Due+to+the+growing+hype+around+data%2C+there+has+been+an+influx+of+interested+people+that+are+learning+and+practicing+data+science+without+experience.+They+can+churn+out+something+that+looks+great+but+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+necessarily+accurate%2C+and+they+struggle+to+productionalise+it.+They+lack+the+theoretical+background+to+understand+which+algorithms+to+use%2C+and+why+certain+algorithms+work+or+don%26rsquo%3Bt+work+in+each+context.+Their+exposure+is+generally+a+narrow+portion+of+ML%2C+limited+to+pet+projects+or+data+that+they%26rsquo%3Bve+been+exposed+to.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E2.+Productionalisation+problems%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Some+data+science+is+only+meant+for+hypothesis+testing+and+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt+need+to+be+taken+into+production%2C+but+there+are+still+multiple+data+science+projects+that+do+need+to+be+productionalised.+These+projects+fail+when+they+can%26rsquo%3Bt+be+productionalised+due+to+data+pipeline+issues.+Most+data+scientists+want+to+deal+with+the+%26lsquo%3Bfun+and+attractive%26rsquo%3B+model+building%2C+without+taking+time+to+understand+the+end-to-end+process.+This+leads+to+hacked+together+%26%2339%3Bproduction%26%2339%3B+solutions+that+often+fail+and+contribute+to+the+large+pool+of+unsuccessful+projects+in+industry.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E3.+Lack+of+data+engineer+skillsets%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Everyone+wants+to+be+a+data+scientist+but+very+few+want+to+be+data+engineers.+Typically%2C+the+industry+needs+double+the+amount+of+data+engineers+to+data+scientists%2C+since+around+60%25+of+the+work+is+prepping+and+pipelining+data%2C+and+only+30%25+is+covered+in+areas+like+machine+learning.+The+skillset+for+data+engineers+is+also+quite+different+from+that+of+data+scientists%2C+and+much+closer+to+a+traditional+software+engineer%2C+mixed+with+DevOps+and+the+understanding+of+ML+algorithms.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E4.+Lack+of+customer+buy-in%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Due+to+the+above+issues%2C+customers+have+been+burnt+by+unsuccessful+data+science+projects+and+are+wary+to+offer+their+support.+Badly+productionalised+solutions+end+up+costing+businesses+more+money+than+anticipated%2C+weekend+warriors+who+lack+proper+skill+and+experience+take+longer+to+reach+a+conclusion+with+their+projects%2C+and+the+lack+of+engineer+skills+makes+deriving+value+from+these+projects+more+difficult.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E5.+Expecting+ML+to+be+a+silver+bullet%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+There+is+a+common+misconception+that+machine+learning+can+do+anything+with+any+data.+This+lack+of+understanding+of+the+meaningful+use+cases+for+ML+can+cause+friction+and+unmet+expectations.+ML+has+its+place%2C+but+if+you+aren%26rsquo%3Bt+sure+what+you+want%2C+any+road+will+get+you+there.+The+proliferation+of+data+makes+this+even+more+difficult%2C+because+people+think+data+implies+ML%2C+without+understanding+the+quality+of+the+data+and+the+problem+they%26rsquo%3Bre+trying+to+address.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FBigdata-02.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+100%25%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAs+more+organisations+turn+to+AI%2C+ML+and+data+science+to+drive+decision+making%2C+introduce+new+products+and+maximise+resources%2C+the+more+important+it+becomes+to+ensure+the+success+of+big+data+projects.+To+avoid+adding+to+the+growing+statistic+of+failed+initiatives%2C+businesses+need+to+have+a+realistic+data+strategy+in+place+to+prepare+for+and+avoid+these+pitfalls.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ERecruit+or+partner+with+experienced+data+professionals+who+have+a+proven+track+record+of+successful+data+projects.+Do+enough+preparation+and+research+before+rushing+models+into+production%2C+and+promote+cross-skilling+within+your+organisation+to+help+fight+the+data+skills+gap.+If+you%26rsquo%3Bre+still+having+trouble+with+gaining+customer+buy-in%2C+move+slower+and+stay+involved+to+ensure+you+remain+on+the+right+path.+Finally%2C+recognise+that+ML+%28or+any+data+approach+for+that+matter%29+is+not+a+silver+bullet%2C+and+time+needs+to+be+invested+to+understand+the+strengths+and+weaknesses+of+the+various+approaches+before+starting+data+projects+without+clear+direction.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E ference+due+to+the+convenience%2C+faster+time-to-market%2C+and+lower+costs+associated+with+them.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHowever%2C+this+is+starting+to+change+once+again.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEnter+platform-as-a-service+%28PaaS%29.+PaaS+is+a+category+of+cloud+computing+services+that+allows+users+to+develop%2C+run%2C+and+manage+applications+without+the+complexity+of+building+and+maintaining+the+infrastructure+associated+with+running+applications.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EPaaS+gives+you+the+opportunity+to+create+a+unique+customer+experience+for+users%2C+without+most+of+the+disadvantages+of+wiring+everything+together.+This+suddenly+makes+custom+development+more+cost-effective.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EPackaged+solutions+still+have+their+place+in+technology+landscapes.+You+would+very+rarely+rebuild+an+HR+or+payroll+system%2C+because+they%26rsquo%3Bre+standard+for+most+organisations+and+don%26rsquo%3Bt+need+any+unique+functionalities.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBut+for+more+functional+systems%2C+such+as+pricing+and+quoting%2C+customer-facing+products+and+services+%28like+your+digital+channels%29%2C+and+specialised+workflows%2C+custom-built+is+once+again+the+more+sensible+route.+In+financial+services%2C+big+names+who+have+been+winning+customers+over+in+the+last+few+years%2C+are+those+who+have+been+creating+innovative+digital+channels.+Leveraging+a+PaaS+approach+provides+the+necessary+flexibility+and+versatility+to+support+such+innovation.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EPaaS+eliminates+the+need+to+build+the+fundamentals+for+applications+from+scratch.+With+back-end+infrastructure+standardised+and+consistent+for+an+entire+ecosystem%2C+it+offers+your+in-house+development+team+new+capabilities%2C+without+the+need+to+hire+specialised+staff+%28usually+on+legacy+frameworks+and+languages%29+or+outsource+activities.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+all+contributes+to+reducing+the+costs+normally+associated+with+custom+development.+Cost+savings+are+a+nice+bonus+when+building+custom+solutions%2C+but+fundamentally%2C+enterprise+PaaS+is+about+exploiting+a+competitive+advantage+through+leveraging+the+consistent+infrastructure+and+integration+strategy+presented.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThanks+to+the+maturing+of+cloud-based+platforms.+Custom+is+now+not+only+cost-effective+for+a+broad+range+of+applications+once+again%2C+but+also+provides+enterprises+with+more+control+over+user+experience%2C+functionality+and+timing.+Custom+has+been+reignited+and+is+here+to+stay%2C+and+will+most+likely+expand+even+more+in+the+years+to+come+to+take+back+more+of+the+market+share+lost+over+the+past+two+decades.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E Entelect+active+launched%3A+sports+management+systems This+project+was+initiated+with+one+of+South+Africa%26%2339%3Bs+biggest+Cycling+Clubs%2C+Club100+and+established+Event+Organisers%2C+Harford+Sports+Promotions+and+Tanjent+Events%2C+who+run+events+like+the+Pick+n+Pay+94.7+Cycle+Challenge+%282nd+biggest+timed+cycle+event+in+the+world%29+as+well+as+the+702+Walk+the+Talk+%28biggest+sport+event+in+South+Africa+attracting+55+000+competitors%29.+Entelect+Software+has+taken+over+the+support+contracts+of+both+these+online+systems%2C+and+from+experiences+gained+here+has+already+started+injecting+its+new+product+suite+into+events+like+the+Zoo+Lake+Criterium+and+the+Citizen+Run.+%26quot%3BThe+benefits+of+this+new+software+are+significant%26quot%3B%2C+says+Tanjent+Evets+partner%2C+Jenni+Green%3A+%26quot%3BI+can+now+manage+the+entire+event+with+Entelect%26%2339%3Bs+software+without+unnecessary+third+party+delays+delays+and+IT+support+expense%26quot%3B.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Entelect+has+appointed+Craig+Wapnick%2C+ex+professional+squash+player+and+Springbok+Captain+to+drive+sales+efforts.+%26quot%3BThis+software+is+phenomenal+in+terms+of+its+functionality%2C+power+and+cost%2C+and+will+fill+a+gaping+hole+in+the+sporting+arena%26quot%3B%2C+says+Wapnick.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26quot%3BWhen+confronted+with+the+problem%2C+our+team+took+on+the+challenge+and+%28in+true+Entelect+fashion%29+instead+of+building+an+instance+of+a+solution+for+Club100+and+HSP%2C+they+took+it+one+step+further+and+built+the+tools+to+provide+them+with+a+solution.+Yes+it+was+a+more+costly+exercise%2C+but+now+it+is+simply+plug+and+play+going+forward%2C+allowing+for+a+scalable+low+cost+solution+for+all+participants%26quot%3B%2C+says+Pritchard. Entelect+has+launched+a+powerful+new+suite+of+sports+management+online+products%2C+aimed+at+giving+sporting+bodies+%28national%2C+provincial%2C+clubs+and+event+organisers%29+the+tools+to+enhance+their+business+processes+and+run+their+own+affairs.+The+offering+is+currently+broken+into+Event+and+Club+Management+Systems.+%22This+software+is+unique+in+that+it+gives+total+control+to+non+technical+people+to+set+up+their+online+presence+and+control+all+aspects+of+their+workflow+through+the+web+-+including+member+or+entrant+management+and+CRM%2C+database+management%2C+online+payments%2C+website+content+management%2C+customised+newsletters+and+SMS%27s%2C+and+a+variety+of+other+front+and+back-office+functions+facilities%22%2C+says+group+CEO+Charles+Pritchard.+%22We+empower+event+organisers+and+sports+administrators+with+powerful+self-managing+software+to+run+their+own+affairs+-+and+cut+out+the+expense+of+bespoke+development+and+support.+We+have+taken+a+suite+of+common+functions+performed+by+these+entities+and+built+our+software+to+support+these+industries%2C+with+a+low+cost+rental+and+sponsorship+model+that+enables+organisations+to+make+use+of+software+that+they+otherwise+could+not+afford.%22 ["News"] 11237.jpg

Entelect+Foundation+committed+to+maths+education Access+to+maths+education%2C+from+an+early+age+and+throughout+a+child%26rsquo%3Bs+school+career%2C+can+lay+the+foundations+for+many+important+life+skills.+Adults+who+have+a+good+understanding+of+maths+are+more+competent+with+their+personal+finances.+Mathematics+teaches+people+to+think+analytically%2C+to+be+good+problem+solvers%3B+they+can+look+at+a+problem+from+many+different+angles+and+will+stick+to+it+until+it+is+finished+instead+of+giving+up+before+they+have+solved+it.+A+child+who+does+well+at+basic+and+complex+maths+will+be+able+to+apply+these+concepts+to+everyday+life.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Literacy+and+scientific+resources+will+also+be+provided+to+school+and+tertiary+level+students+and+communities+who+would+otherwise+not+be+able+to+afford+these.+The+Foundation+is+also+developing+options+for+corporates+who+wish+to+invest+in+the+development+of+their+extended+communities.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Entelect+has+partnered+with+New+Age+Electronic+Entertainment+Technologies+cc+%28NAEET%29+to+provide+robust+projectors+to+3+schools+as+a+proof+of+concept.+These+%26ldquo%3BTeacher+in+a+Box%26rdquo%3B+projectors+will+be+easy+to+use%2C+remotely+controlled%2C+and+loaded+with+high-quality%2C+curriculum-specific+educational+content.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+Entelect+Foundation%26rsquo%3Bs+inaugural+meeting+was+held+on+8+September+2011+where+invited+committee+members+were+ratified+and+the+path+set+for+formal+registration+as+a+not+for+profit+institution.+The+Foundation+will+work+with+business+and+government+to+build+a+self-sustaining%2C+scalable+blueprint+that+works+in+a+South+African+context.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E Less+than+two+months+after+it+was+founded+in+September+2011%2C+the+Entelect+Foundation+is+making+great+strides+in+its+mission+to+empower+South+African+youth+through+education.+The+Foundation+will+be+providing+educational+resources+to+community+centres%2C+schools+and+homes. ntact.aspx%22%3EContact+us+%3C%2Fa%3Eif+you%27d+like+additional+information+or+require+assistance+in+increasing+staff%2Cagent+or+customer+retention%21%3C%2Fp%3E%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E%3C%2Ftbody%3E%3C%2Ftable%3E+%3C%2Fbody%3E%3C%2Fhtml%3E %E2%80%9CThere+has+been+little+investment+in+the+SA+development+community.+We+wanted+to+turn+that+around+with+this+competition+and+inject+a+some+fun+back+into+the+industry.+Game+development+is+still+the+holy+grail+for+a+lot+of+our+guys+and+we+thought+that+this+challenge+would+generate+some%26nbsp%3Bexcitement.+Perhaps+bring+the+community+together+in+a+different+way.+Judging+by+the+success+so+far%2C+I+believe+we+can+turn+this+into+an+annual+event+and+keep+upping+the+stakes%21%E2%80%9D+says+Charles+Pritchard%2C+Entelect%27s+CEO.%26nbsp%3B+%3Cbr+%2F%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3EThe+Entelect+R100K+Challenge+is+for+anyone+who+has+a+keen+interest+in+software+development.+Those+with+a+background+in+Artificial+Intelligence+may+have+an+advantage+in+this+competition%2C+however+there+is+an+abundance+of+information+online+about+the+strategies+and+mechanics+applicable+to+these+types+of+turn-based+games.+A+little+extra+effort+and+foresight+will+go+a+long+way+in+seeing+that+the+ultimate+AI+player+makes+it+through+to+the+finals%21%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%3Cbr+%2F%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3EThe+tournament+play-offs+will+be+hosted+on+the+28th+of+September+to+a+closed+audience+of+entrants.+These+initial+rounds+will+see+players+paired+off+in+a+double-elimination+style+tournament+with+only+the+superior+AI+players+progressing+to+later+rounds.+To+add+to+the+excitement%2C+the+final+rounds+will+be+hosted+LIVE+on+the+main+stage+at+rAge+expo+on+the+6th+of+October+in-front+of+20%26nbsp%3B000+attendees.+The+event+will+also+be+broadcast+live+on+the+internet+for+all+to+see+thanks+to+NAG+Online.+%26nbsp%3B+With+a+closing+date+of+24th+September+there+is+still+plenty+of+time+to+get+your+engines+started.+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fchallenge.entelect.co.za%2F%22%3EAccept+the+challenge+today%3C%2Fa%3E%21 Entelect+makes+high+volume%2C+secure+EFT+online+payments+possible+for+business %E2%80%9CThe+initial+demand+for+this+solution+came+from+a+number+of+clients+that+make+use+of+our+online+event%2C+retail+and+subscription+management+products%E2%80%9D%2C+says+Charles+Pritchard%2C+Entelect%E2%80%99s+CEO.+%E2%80%9CThe+reality+in+South+Africa+is+that+the+bulk+of+our+citizens+are+not+credit+card+enabled+or+even+banked%2C+but+would+like+to+transact+online.+We+have+put+hundreds+of+companies+online+and+an+ability+to+accept+high+volume+EFT+or+cash+deposit+micro+payments+is+a+common+request+that+has+filtered+through+from+our+clients+%E2%80%93+in+particular+big+sports+event+organisers+and+online+retailers+who+process+thousands+of+applications+a+day+in+high+volume+periods.+Until+now+they+have+had+to+manually+reconcile+and+follow+up+the+EFT+portions+of+their+payments%2C+which+come+at+a+significant+administration+cost%E2%80%9D.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3EThis+solution+now+takes+ownership+of+the+whole+collection+and+reconciliation+process+in+an+automated+fashion+for+a+lower+fee+than+credit+card+merchants+are+able+to+offer.+%E2%80%9CWe+use+intelligent+matching+algorithms+that+strongly+couple+our+online+applications+to+bank+account+statements.+What+really+sets+our+solution+apart+from+similar+ones+in+the+market+is+that+the+online+purchaser+does+not+need+to+divulge+his+bank+account+details+or+PIN+codes%2C+thus+leaving+a+high+level+of+comfort+with+the+both+the+purchaser+and+merchant.+Credit+charge-back+fraud+is+no+longer+an+issue.%E2%80%9D+says+Pritchard.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3EEntelect%26nbsp%3Bis+able+to+offer+this+EFT+solution+coupled%26nbsp%3Bwith+credit+card+merchant+facilities%26nbsp%3Bthrough+its+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.entelect.co.za%2FDisplayLink.aspx%3Fgroup%3DSoftware%26amp%3Bname%3DProducts%22%3Eonline+products%3C%2Fa%3E%26nbsp%3Btogether+with%26nbsp%3B%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.myactive.co.za%2F%22%3EMyActive%3C%2Fa%3E+or+as+part+of+a+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.entelect.co.za%2FDisplayLink.aspx%3Fgroup%3DSoftware%26amp%3Bname%3DDevelopment%22%3Especialised+custom+application%3C%2Fa%3E+that+it+builds+for+its+clients.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.entelect.co.za%2Fcontact.aspx%22%3EContact+us%3C%2Fa%3E%26nbsp%3Bfor+more+information%21 Entelect+Software%2C+South+Africa%E2%80%99s+leading+software+solutions+and+consulting+company%2C+has+released+an+innovative+EFT+reconciliation+module+which+uses+a+combination+of+artificial+intelligence+and+traditional+banking+technology+for+use+in+e-commerce+applications%2C+opening+the+doors+for+the+majority+of+South+Africans+to+transact+securely+online. Jaco+Cronje+banks+R100k+courtesy+of+the+Entelect+R100K+Challenge%21 %3Cp%3E+The+atmosphere+at+rAge+was+electric+with+a+packed+to+capacity+audience+and+an+excited+group+of+finalists.+The+event+started+with+attendees+and+finalists+taking+their+seats+against+the+backdrop+of+Daft+Punk%26rsquo%3Bs+Tron+soundtrack.+The+excitement+was+palpable+as+members+of+the+audience+compared+notes+and+bets+on+who+would+be+the+victor.+Minutes+later+Tim+Kroon+%28Entelect+Software%29+took+the+stage+to+talk+about+the+R100K+challenge+and+its+place+in+the+software+development+industry.+Highlighting+a+need+for+a+larger+community+in+South+Africa+and+a+bit+of+fun%2C+he+mentioned+to+a+very+pleased+audience+that+Entelect+would+be+bringing+back+the+Entelect+R100K+Challenge+in+2013+with+a+different+twist.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Shortly+thereafter+the+battles+begun.+The+games+were+shown+on+the+big+screen+with+a+3D+spinning+globe+as+the+players+rode+their+light+cycles+around+in+a+number+of+different+and+intriguing+strategies.+The+tournament+finals+were+particularly+nail-biting+as+each+match+was+a+face-off+between+two+highly+intelligent+light+cycle+programs.+The+results+were+surprising+and+at+the+end+of+the+double-elimination+tournament%2C+we+saw+the+victor+of+the+losing+pool%2C+Jaco+Cronje+%28JC%29%2C+being+crowned+as+tournament+champion.+Second+place+went+to+Gustav+Mauer+%28Gustav%29+and+third+place+went+to+Marcus+Tomlinson+%28Mr+T%29.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+finalists+were+invited+on+stage+and+each+presented+with+medals+while+the+champion+received+a+large+R100+000+cheque%21+Second+prize+was+an+uber+cool+limited+edition%2C+Star+Wars+X-Box+360+game+bundle.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26ldquo%3BThis+was+a+first+for+us+and+judging+from+the+spirited+response+we+plan+to+up+the+stakes%26nbsp%3Beach+year%2C+so+keep+an+eye+out+for+our+2013+Challenge+announcement%21+Contestants+worked+hard+on+their+entries+and+engaged+with+us+from+the+start%2C+which+tells+us+something+about+the+calibre+of+individuals+that+we+have+in+the+South+African+software+engineering+industry.+We%26rsquo%3Bd+like+to+extend+a+big+thank+you+to+NAG+Magazine+for+partnering+with+us+and+assisting+us+to+reach+out+with+this+initiative.+%26rdquo%3B+%26ndash%3B+Charles+Pritchard%2C+Entelect+CEO.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+For+those+of+you+interested+in+staying+tuned+for+the+2013+Entelect+Challenge%2C+subscribe+to+the+mailing+list+at+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fchallenge.entelect.co.za%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3Ehttp%3A%2F%2Fchallenge.entelect.co.za%3C%2Fa%3E%21%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+height%3D%22323%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.entelectonline.co.za%2Fwm-90858-cmsimages%2F100kprize550.jpg%22+width%3D%22550%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E Last+weekend+saw+the+Entelect+R100K+Challenge+finalists+battle+it+out+for+R100+000.00+in+prize+money+at+Africa%E2%80%99s+biggest+gaming+expo%2C+rAge.
