Entelect+announces+60%25+growth+at+year-end+bash %3Cp%3E+In+his+year-end+speech+CEO+Charles+Pritchard+pointed+out+that+the+main+strategic+theme+this+year+was+to+focus+efforts+internally%2C+nurture+talent+and+make+Entelect+a+better+place+to+work.+In+summary%2C+the+following+achievements+were+noted%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E+%3Cstrong%3ERevenues+where+up+by+45%25+in+2012%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3A+With+over+100+successful+projects+delivered%2C+most+of+Entelect%26rsquo%3Bs+new+business+was+as+a+result+of+referrals+and+demands+of+existing+clients.+Biggest+growth+clients+were+Discovery%2C+Momentum%2C+Liberty+and+Paarlmedia%3B+while+Nashua+Mobile%2C+Deloitte+and+FNB+joined%26nbsp%3Bas+three+new+anchor+clients.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E+%3Cstrong%3EStaff+count+grew+by+60%25%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3A+We+can+still+say+with+certainty+that+we+are+still+by+far+the+most+educated+software+company+in+SA%2C+enjoying+more+university+degrees+and+cum+laudes+per+head+than+any+of+our+competitors.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E+%3Cstrong%3E600%25+more+spend+on+career+development+of+staff%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3A+We+ran+14+independent+staff+training+programmes%2C+which+includes+multiple+leadership+programmes%2C+forums%2C+code+retreats+and+DevDays.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E+%3Cstrong%3EThe+Entelect+Foundation+committed+to+seeing+42+disadvantaged+children+through+school%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3A+These+children+were+put+forward+by+our+extended+communities+and+we+are+looking+forward+to+providing+financial+and+mentorship+support+to+these+children+and+their+parents+in+the+upcoming+year%21%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E+%3Cstrong%3E1Up%3C%2Fstrong%3E%2C+our+own+in-house+staff+rewards+programme+was+launched+in+the+middle+of+the+year+with+great+success.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E+%3Cstrong%3EThe+Entelect+R100k+%26ldquo%3Bthink+you+can+code%26rdquo%3B+Challenge%3C%2Fstrong%3E+went+off+successfully%2C+gaining+significant+media+exposure+and+goodwill+in+the+developer+community.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E+Entelect+has+ambitious+plans+for+2013%2C+in+particular+solidifying+its+position+as+South+Africa%26rsquo%3Bs+best+software+engineering+and+solutions+company%2C+both+from+a+client+and+staff+satisfaction+perspective.+Expect+a+number+of+exciting+new+announcements+in+2013.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E +head+start+into+their+professional+careers.%3C%2Fp%3E Entelect+has+used+its+extensive+university+networks+to+hire+fifteen+of+the+top+Computer+Science+and+Engineering+graduates+in+the+country.+The+range+of+graduates+came+from+UJ%2C+Wits%2C+UKZN%2C+Rhodes+and+NMMU%2C+and+all+were+in+the+top+10%25+of+their+respective+classes.+Over+December+and+January%2C+they+were+all+put+through+a+series+of+training+sessions+affectionately+known+as+our+Development+Bootcamp.+The+Bootcamp+comprised+of+a+series+of+lectures+and+practical+projects+designed+to+teach+the+graduates+not+only+the+basics+of+software+engineering+but+also+the+issues+facing+software+engineers+in+the+enterprise+development+environment. lowing+contenders+will+be+going+through+to+the+finals+and+will+stand+a+chance+to+win+the+grand+prize+of+R100+000+at+rAge%21%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E+G-J+van+Rooyen+%28scalvin%29%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E+Jan+Gutter+%28The+Dalek%29%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E+Jaco+Cronje+%28JC%29%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E+Hendrik+Coetzee+%28demaniak%29%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E+Werner+Stoop+%28Wernsey%29%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E+Marius+Potgieter+%28Monkey%29%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E+Pierre+Pretorius+%28Pierre%29%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E+Lucas+Dreyer+%28Lucas%29%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+For+more+information+visit+the+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fchallenge.entelect.co.za%2F%22%3EChallenge+Page%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fdiv%3E Entelect+BootCamp+graduates+are+in+big+demand+in+South+Africa %3Cdiv%3E+%26lsquo%3BEvery+year+we+handpick+and+hire+about+20+of+the+top+BSc+Computer+Science%2C+Engineering+and+BCom+Information+Systems+graduates+from+all+mainstream+universities+around+the+country+for+the+Graduate+BootCamp.+The+graduates+attend+intensive+training+for+two+months+while+on+full+salaries.+After+this%2C+they+work+on+client+projects+free+of+charge+for+three+months+under+the+mentorship+of+our+team+leads.+At+the+end+of+this+period%2C+clients+are+given+the+opportunity+to+retain+them+on+our+projects+at+our+standard+junior+rates%2C%26rsquo%3B+says+Entelect+MD%2C+Shashi+Hansjee.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E+Entelect+CEO%2C+Dr+Charles+Pritchard+%26lsquo%3BOur+clients+benefit+as+they+get+to+work+with+the+country%26rsquo%3Bs+top+graduates+on+a+risk-free+basis+for+an+initial+period+before+they+commit.+Our+graduates+escalate+their+technical+careers%2C+while+our+seniors+also+benefit+personally+from+from+helping+junior+colleagues+in+the+specialist+areas+that+they+are+most+passionate+about.%26rsquo%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E+The+BootCamp+course+covers+both+the+practical+and+theoretical+side+of+business+analysis%2C+programming+concepts%2C+Microsoft.NET%2C+Java+Enterprise+Edition+and+SQL+development.+All+graduates+work+through+this+full+syllabus%2C+regardless+of+which+solutions+stream+they+will+be+working+on%2C+giving+them+a+rounded+understanding+of+the+full+software+development+life+cycle.+%26lsquo%3BBy+the+time+the+graduates+have+moved+through+the+programme%2C+they+will+have+collaborated+to+write+components+of+systems+in+various+languages+and+platforms%2C+all+of+which+would+have+been+vetted+and+code-reviewed+by+various+technical+leads%2C%26rsquo%3B+says+Hansjee.%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E+%26lsquo%3BOf+course+there+is+a+downside+risk.+It+takes+us+about+a+year+to+recover+our+investment+in+each+graduate%2C+so+if+the+graduate+leaves+early%2C+we+lose+financially.+That+said%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+a+risk+with+which+we+are+comfortable+as+we+go+to+great+lengths+to+live+up+to+our+goal+of+being+the+best+company+in+South+Africa+to+work+for.+Despite+the+high+demand+for+engineers%2C+we+manage+to+maintain+high+staff+retention+rates+%26ndash%3B+not+an+easy+task+considering+the+dynamics+of+the+industry%2C%26rsquo%3B+says+Pritchard.%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E+Entelect%26rsquo%3Bs+client+base+is+amongst+the+best+blue-chips+in+South+Africa.+Their+appetite+for+the+development+of+big+custom+systems+that+differentiate+them+in+the+marketplace+keeps+climbing%2C+hence+the+demand+for+software+engineers.+The+culture+of+ongoing+training+and+mentorship+that+spans+more+than+15+career-enhancement+programmes%2C+is+a+real+differentiator+for+Entelect+employees.+These+range+from+leadership+programmes+to+technology+accelerators+and+specialist+technical+forums.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E+Asked+about+the+current+state+of+skills+in+South+Africa%2C+Pritchard+says%2C+%26lsquo%3BThere+is+a+severe+shortage+of+high-end+software+engineering+skills+in+this+country.+Our+problem+is+not+the+pursuit+of+new+projects+as+word+gets+out+that+we+consistently+do+a+great+job+but+instead%2C+one+of+finding+quality+engineers+to+help+us+deliver+on+our+order+pipeline.+If+we+could+hire+30+people+today%2C+we+would+take+them%21+Technology+is+becoming+such+an+integral+part+of+everyone%26rsquo%3Bs+lives%2C+and+businesses+simply+cannot+run+without+an+innovation+focus+in+this+industry.+We+believe+investing+more+in+quality+software+engineering+training+programmes+as+a+national+priority%2C+and+if+we+don%26rsquo%3Bt+embrace+it+as+an+industry+and+government+collective%2C+we+as+a+nation+will+lose+out+on+the+significant+employment+opportunities+available+in+the+IT+sector.+South+Africa+has+this+massive+potential+just+waiting+to+be+unleashed%21%26rsquo%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E Entelect+is+leading+the+way+in+fast-tracking+graduate+computer+scientists%2C+software+engineers+and+analysts+into+the+South+African+market+place.+Considering+that+these+are+some+of+the+most+in-demand+skills+in+the+world%2C+it%E2%80%99s+a+big+investment+that+comes+with+the+associated+business+and+financial+risks+but+is+paying+off+in+the+long+run. %3Cp+class%3D%22MsoNormal%22%3E+The+Challenge+is+co-hosted+by+Entelect+Software+and+NAG+Magazine%2C+South+Africa%26rsquo%3Bs+authority+on+current+trends+in+computer%2C+console%2C+online+and+mobile+gaming+and+technology-related+entertainment.+%26ldquo%3BWe+are+extremely+excited+to+be+a+part+of+the+Entelect+100K+Challenge+for+yet+another+exciting+year%21+This+is+no+doubt+a+great+career+starter+for+those+who+have+what+it+takes+to+be+the+ultimate+coder%2C%26rdquo%3B+says+Geoff+Burrows%2C+editor+of+NAG+magazine.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+class%3D%22MsoNormal%22%3E+The+Challenge+is+open+to+all+coders+and+gamers+who+think+they+have+what+it+takes+to+build+the+ultimate+artificially+intelligent+player.+Participants+are+required+to+write+an+innovative+artificially+intelligent+program+worthy+of+playing+against+any+opponent+in+a+game+designed+specifically+for+the+Entelect+R100K+Challenge.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+class%3D%22MsoNormal%22%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26ldquo%3BThis+year%26rsquo%3Bs+competition+sees+entrants+compete+in+the+classic+game+of+Pacman%2C+with+a+twist.+Entrants+will+be+divided+into+two+separate+pools+based+on+their+abilities%2C+with+each+pool+yielding+grand-prize+winners+of+the+2014+Challenge.+This+effectively+allows+beginner+programmers+and+AI+enthusiasts+to+compete+against+each+other%2C+with+a+better+chance+of+making+it+into+the+final+four+than+previous+years%2C+with+the+winner+taking+home+a+cash+prize+of+R50%2C000.+Similarly%2C+the+more+advanced+entrants+will+pair+off+against+each+other+in+the+advanced+pool+for+the+grand+prize+of+R100%2C000%2C%26rdquo%3B+says+Tim+Kroon%2C+general+manager+at+Entelect+Solutions.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+class%3D%22MsoNormal%22%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Pool+A+will+contain+the+more+advanced+entries+in+the+challenge+and+Pool+B+will+feature+the+remainder.+Each+pool+will+be+run+as+a+separate%2C+double-elimination+tournament%2C+with+individual+prizes.+Entelect+will+determine+the+appropriate+pool+and+rank+for+each+entrant+based+on+the+ability+of+the+entry+and+by+playing+each+entry+against+a+set+of+reference+players.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+class%3D%22MsoNormal%22%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+This+year%2C+Entelect+will+be+opening+up+the+opportunity+for+programmers+and+designers+to+build+their+own+Graphical+User+Interface+%28GUI%29+for+the+game+and+will+be+presenting+the+special+Gooey+%28GUI%29+award+for+the+Best+GUI+at+rAge+%28Really+Awesome+Gaming+Expo%29+in+October+2014.+This+is+the+first+award+of+this+nature+in+the+R100K+Challenge+%26mdash%3B+the+winner+will+be+taking+home+a+R15%2C000+cash+prize+and+will+be+featured+at+the+challenge+play-offs+press+event.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+class%3D%22MsoNormal%22%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Successful+entrants+into+the+challenge+will+take+part+in+a+tournament+with+scheduled+play-offs+held+on+13+September+2014+at+the+Fire+%26amp%3B+Ice+Hotel+in+Melrose+Arch.+The+entrants+will+compete+against+each+other+in+an+online+environment+and+fight+for+a+place+in+the+grand+finale+on+4+October+2014+at+rAge.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+class%3D%22MsoNormal%22%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26ldquo%3BIt+was+a+great+achievement+to+be+named+the+winner+of+last+year%26rsquo%3Bs+challenge.+The+competition+was+demanding+but+extremely+exciting.+I+wish+all+the+entrants+the+best+of+luck+for+this+year%26rsquo%3Bs+challenge+and+may+the+best+coder+win%2C%26rdquo%3B+says+Pierre+Pretorius%2C+winner+of+the+2013+Entelect+R100k+Challenge.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cdiv%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Entries+for+the+Entelect+100K+Challenge+will+close+on+16+August+2014+and+entrants+will+be+notified+of+their+pools+by+1+September.+To+enter+the+competition%2C+please+visit%26nbsp%3B%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fchallenge.entelect.co.za%2F%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3Ehttp%3A%2F%2Fchallenge.entelect.co.za%3C%2Fa%3E.+For+further+information+please+contact+the+official+challenge+mailing+list+on%26nbsp%3B%3Ca+href%3D%22mailto%3Achallenge%40entelect.co.za%22%3Echallenge%40entelect.co.za%3C%2Fa%3E.%3C%2Fdiv%3E Entelect+attains+CPD+validation This+validation+is+good+news+for+those+seeking+to+renew+their+Engineering+Council+of+South+Africa+%28ECSA%29+membership+and+comply+with+the+Council%26%2339%3Bs+CPD+requirements.+The+CPD+requirements+were+put+in+place+by+ECSA+in+2006+to+ensure+that+those+who+practise+as+engineers%2C+stay+abreast+of+developments+and+advancements+within+their+profession+and+are+continuously+maintaining+and+developing+their+knowledge+within+the+field+of+practice.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+A+further+requirement+from+ECSA+is+that+organisations+are+encouraged+to+present+CPD+activities%2C+as+well+as+to+assist+their+members+in+identifying+CPD+activities+initiated+by+private+providers.+To+this+end%2C+Entelect+ensures+that+its+training+sessions+are+of+a+high+standard+and+it+is+especially+good+to+see+that+the+company%26rsquo%3Bs+internal+forums+are+given+value+by+independent+organisations.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+accreditation+means+that+professionals+can+now+grow+their+CPD+level+by+attending+in-house+training.+Gail+Shaw%2C+technical+lead+%28SQL+Server%29+at+Entelect+presents+the+course+to+all+Entelect+employees+free+of+charge.+Shaw+is+well+regarded+in+the+industry+and+is+a+Microsoft+Certified+Master%3A+SQL+Server.+This+particular+validation+is+only+the+beginning+as+Entelect+is+in+the+process+of+accrediting+a+number+of+other+forums. %3Cstrong%3EYatish+Parshotam+%28Entelect+General+Manager%3A+Communications%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E+%3Cbr%2F%3E%3Cbr%2F%3E+Entelect%E2%80%99s+course+Understanding+Transact+SQL%2C+Database+Optimisation+and+Database+Design+has+now+been+validated+by+SAIEE+for+continuous+professional+development+%28CPD%29. ng%3ERishal+Hurbans+%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3Ctd%3E+3D+Programming+with+JS+3js+%26amp%3B+Canon+Js+Libs%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3Ctd%3E+%3Cstrong%3EJustin+Worthe+%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3Ctd%3E+HTML5+JS+Game+Dev+%28Pacman%29%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3Ctd%3E+%3Cstrong%3ECharles+Okot+%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3Ctd%3E+Cutting+Edge+Tech+-+Android+Development+Flow+and+Morter+With+Dagger+%26amp%3B+Gradle%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3Ctd%3E+%3Cstrong%3EMartin+Naude+%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3Ctd%3E+Restful+Services+%26amp%3B+node.js+Rest+Lvl+III.+Paradigm%2C+verbs.+Options.+Json+schema.+Implications.+Json+Schema+Demo.%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3Ctd%3E+%3Cstrong%3EMatt+van+der+Westhuizen+%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3Ctd%3E+Node+driven+CMS+platform%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3Ctd%3E+%3Cstrong%3EJoshua+Goodman+%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3Ctd%3E+Raspberry+Pi+Torrent+Box%3A+How+to.%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3Ctd%3E+%3Cstrong%3EMatthew+Butler+%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3Ctd%3E+DOTA+Match+Tracker%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3Ctd%3E+%3Cstrong%3EMark+Beets+%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3Ctd%3E+Raspberry+Pi+Home+Security%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3C%2Ftbody%3E+%3C%2Ftable%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+We+look+forward+to+all+our+staff+joining+us+for+this+exciting+event+on+8+August+2014+at+12pm%21 DevDay+is+Entelect%27s+internal+tech+conference%2C+which+is+held+three+times+a+year+and+provides+our+employees+with+the+opportunity+to+present+technical%2C+conceptual+or+generally+interesting+topics. Entelect+confirmed+as+the+world%27s+best+loyalty+practitioners LoyaltyGames+is+a+global%2C+online+competition+that+was+created+for+students+and+professionals+to+put+their+loyalty+and+gamification+skills+to+the+test%2C+while+fostering+innovation+and+positive+knowledge+sharing.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+early+rounds+of+this+year%26rsquo%3Bs+LoyaltyGames+were+held+simultaneously+across+the+globe%2C+with+a+variety+of+time+limitations+and+detailed+deliverables+required.+Contestants+were+challenged+with+a+series+of+multiple-choice+questions+and+case-study+analyses%2C+which+were+designed+to+test+their+understanding+of+loyalty+marketing%2C+enterprise+strategy+and+innovation+in+the+fields+of+customer+analytics+and+gamification+techniques.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Naude%2C+who+comes+from+a+background+specialising+in+loyalty+rewards+and+computer+science%2C+was+selected+from+more+than+1%2C500+candidates+from+around+the+world+to+create+his+final+submission+as+one+of+the+World+Top+12+Finalists.+The+competition+was+fierce+but+Naude+impressed+the+judges+with+his+%26lsquo%3BPin%26rsquo%3B+concept+presentation+and+was+crowned+world+champion%2C+with+Krzysztof+Przybylski+of+Poland+and+Daria+Demina+from+Russia+as+runners-up.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Naude+explains+that+taking+part+in+the+LoyaltyGames+has+solidified+his+belief+in+the+importance+of+innovation+in+ever-evolving+industries%2C+such+as+gamification%2C+loyalty+marketing+and+consumer+engagement.+%26lsquo%3BNot+only+is+it+incredibly+exciting+to+make+it+through+to+the+finals+and+to+actually+win%2C+but+the+value+of+the+experience+in+building+on+expertise+cannot+be+underestimated%2C%26rsquo%3B+says+Naude%2C+%26lsquo%3BI+feel+honoured+to+have+competed+against+such+remarkable+industry+minds%2C+and+I%26rsquo%3Bd+certainly+encourage+others+to+take+part+in+the+LoyaltyGames+to+challenge+their+own+skills+and+push+themselves+to+create+exciting+new+ideas.%26rsquo%3B+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Naude+currently+heads+up+Entelect%26rsquo%3Bs+Encentivize+business%2C+a+world+leading+platform+offering+that+enables+companies+to+implement+turnkey+staff%2C+customer+or+agent+loyalty+solutions.+To+find+out+more+about+this+solution+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.encentivize.co.za%2F%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3Eclick+here%3C%2Fa%3E. 2014+SQLBits The+keynote+was+on+the+architecture+and+infrastructure+of+SQL+Azure%26hellip%3B+or+whatever+it%26rsquo%3Bs+named+this+week.+The+architecture+is+fascinating%2C+as+is+their+attitude+to+failure.+They+use+commodity+hardware%2C+not+server-grade+hardware.+This+naturally+makes+failures+more+common.+They+expect+failure+and+they+actually+plan+for+it.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+It%26rsquo%3Bs+a+very+different+design+from+most+on-premises+data+centres%2C+where+a+failure+is+a+major+problem.+With+the+Azure+data+centres%2C+a+hardware+failure+may+be+left+unattended+to+for+up+to+two+weeks.+The+architecture+is+built+around+the+concept+of+%26lsquo%3Bself-healing%26rsquo%3B.+Servers+that+fail+are+simply+left+until+the+next+scheduled+maintenance.+Any+databases+that+are+affected+by+the+failed+server+have+a+new+replica+built%2C+completely+transparently.+There%26rsquo%3Bs+a+complex+quorum+mechanism+to+ensure+that+only+up-to-date+replicas+are+used.+Writes+are+done+to+all+replicas+and+reads+can+be+done+from+any+synchronised+replica.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+After+the+keynote+%28and+fresh+coffee%29%2C+Denny+Cherry+dived+into+SQL+Server%26rsquo%3Bs+Availability+Groups%2C+detailing+the+features%2C+limitations+and+improvements+in+SQL+2014.+He+also+covered+a+few+case+studies%2C+implementations+of+both+the+SQL+2012+version+and+the+SQL+2014+version.+A+complete+start-to-finish+demo+of+setting+up+an+Availability+Group+finished+that+session.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+After+Denny%26rsquo%3Bs+session%2C+it+was+final+checks+and+rehearsal+for+my+first+session.This+session+on+database+corruption+was+to+a+fairly+small+audience.+Lots+and+lots+of+questions+though+%26ndash%3B+I+ended+up+skipping+the+last+couple+of+slides+because+of+all+the+questions%21%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.entelectonline.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2Fgayle_bits_pic.jpg%22+width%3D%22100%25%22+%2F%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Which+reminds+me%2C+I+still+need+to+check+whether+the+statement+in+Books+Online%2C+which+states+that+checksum+is+always+enabled+for+compressed+backups%2C+is+actually+correct%26hellip%3B+I+have+a+vague+recollection+that+either+the+statement+is+incorrect+or+there+are+some+other+caveats.+By+the+time+I+finished+with+all+the+questions+and+discussions+afterwards%2C+the+last+session+of+the+day+was+well+underway+and+both+sessions+I+wanted+to+go+to+were+full+%26ndash%3B+thankfully%2C+there+are+always+the+recordings%21+Instead%2C+I+ended+up+spending+the+rest+of+the+afternoon+chatting+with+Brent+Ozar+and+a+few+other+MVPs+in+the+coffee+area%2C+so+it+wasn%26%2339%3Bt+all+bad.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Friday+evening+was+the+SQLBits+party.+The+steampunk+theme+was+appropriate+for+a+conference+venue%2C+which+is+near+to+where+the+industrial+revolution+began.+Long+coats%2C+hats+and+goggles+were+in+abundance.+While+some+made+just+a+token+attempt+at+a+costume%2C+some+came+decked+out+to+the+nines.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Saturday+started+with+a+session+on+T-SQL+tricks+by+Itzik+Ben-Gan.+Itzik+is+always+full+of+fun+new+techniques+and+this+session+was+no+exception.+All+of+the+tips+were+around+the+Windowing+functions+%28Row_Number%2C+Rank%2C+etc.%29+along+with+their+SQL+2012+enhancements%2C+LEAD%2C+LAG+and+the+window+bounds+definitions.+Half+of+the+tips+he+showed+us+were+ways+of+handling+complicated+%26lsquo%3Bgaps+and+islands%26rsquo%3B+type+problems%2C+where+a+data+set+has+a+sequential+series+of+numbers+with+gaps%2C+and+the+rows+need+to+be+%26lsquo%3Bgrouped%26rsquo%3B+into+sets+delimited+by+the+gaps+in+the+sequence.+This+used+to+be+a+very+difficult+problem+before+the+introduction+of+the+windowing+functions+but+now+it%26rsquo%3Bs+fairly+trivial.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+After+Itzik%26rsquo%3Bs+session%2C+it+was+time+for+final+prep+%28and+more+coffee%29+for+my+session+on+problematic+execution+plans.+I+thought+this+session+went+very+well%2C+better+than+the+corruption+one+%26ndash%3B+the+room+was+packed.+There+weren%26rsquo%3Bt+too+many+questions%2C+which+was+good+as+there+was+a+lot+of+material+to+get+through.+That+said%2C+there+were+quite+a+few+questions+after+the+session%2C+so+I+missed+Steve+Jones%26rsquo%3B+session%2C+which+I%26rsquo%3Bd+hoped+to+attend%26hellip%3B+more+recordings+to+get%21%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+After+lunch%2C+it+was+time+to+sit+in+Brent+Ozar%26rsquo%3Bs+session+on+hardware+choices+for+SQL+Server.+He+made+some+very+valid+points+about+SANs+no+longer+being+the+only+option+for+high-end+SQL+Server+machines%2C+something+that+should+be+kept+in+mind+when+planning+new+servers.+SANs+are+expensive+and%2C+if+not+configured+properly+for+SQL+Server%2C+can+become+a+serious+bottleneck.+With+the+price+of+enterprise-grade+SSDs+dropping+and+the+improvements+in+SMB+3%2C+internal+storage+or+a+NAS+built+with+SSDs+may+be+comparable+in+price+with+a+SAN+but+they+perform+much+better.+Staying+to+chat+with+Brett+about+hardware+and+his+experiences+with+large+corporates+meant+I+missed+the+last+session.+Still%2C+the+sessions+are+all+recorded+and+the+chat+with+Brett+was+really+valuable.%26nbsp%3BBy+the+end+of+the+day%2C+the+strain+was+getting+to+some%26hellip%3B+It+didn%26rsquo%3Bt+help+that+the+demand+on+the+coffee+machines+had+resulted+in+three+out+of+the+four+breaking+down.%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+All+in+all%2C+it+was+a+very+well-run%2C+well-organised+conference%2C+with+interesting+sessions+and+good+presenters.+Because+all+the+sessions+were+recorded+%28video+camera+and+desktop+capture%29+it+meant+there+wasn%26rsquo%3Bt+massive+pressure+to+attend+a+session+if+there+was+an+opportunity+instead+to+chat+directly+with+any+of+the+%28many%29+MVPs+and+MCMs+who+were+there. 2014+Entelect+open+day+for+graduates One+of+the+most+anticipated+initiatives+of+the+Entelect+GRP+is+the+highly+successful+annual+open+day+for+upcoming+university+graduates%2C+held+at+our+offices+in+Melrose+Arch%2C+Johannesburg.+The+main+objective+of+the+open+day+is+for+the+graduates+to+gain+a+better+understanding+of+the+software+industry%26nbsp%3Band+how+to+enter+the+job+market.+They+can+also+share+some+of+their+insights+and+meet+our+team+in+an+actual+business+environment.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+This+year%2C+the+response+was+overwhelming+and+we+were+compelled+to+schedule+not+one%2C+but+three+open+days%21+A+record-breaking+number+of+graduates+attended+the+open+days+%26ndash%3B+Entelect+was+bursting+at+its+seams+with+all+the+enthusiastic+students+in+attendance%21%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Our+graduate+intake+for+2015+promises+to+be+very+strong+and+we+hope+to+offer+our+new+and+existing+clients+these+eager%2C+well-qualified+minds+via+the+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.entelect.co.za%2FNews%2FDisplayNewsItem.aspx%3Fniid%3D30348%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3EEntelect+BootCamp+Programme%3C%2Fa%3E.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.entelectonline.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2F2014-09-0216.29.09.jpg%22+%2F%3E %3Cstrong%3EShashi+Hansjee+%28Entelect+Managing+Director%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E+%3Cbr%2F%3E%3Cbr%2F%3E+Over+the+past+five+years%2C+Entelect+has+worked+on+its+Graduate+Recruitment+Programme+%28GRP%29+to+engage+and+potentially+recruit+the+top+talent+from+the+most+prestigious+universities+in+South+Africa. ndash%3B+there+are+plenty+of+things+we+don%26rsquo%3Bt+know+about%21+I+thought+the+full+CMS+and+that+3D+Programming+is+available+in+the+browsing+was+awesome%21+For+me%2C+Matt+stood+out+as+the+best+speaker+and+his+presentation+was+very+impressive.+For+the+next+DevDay%2C+I+would+like+to+see+more+cutting-edge+ways+in+which+we+can+do+our+jobs.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EName%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E+Megan+Van+Rooyen+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EDesignation%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E+Software+Engineer+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+This+was+my+first+DevDay+and+it+was+a+great+chance+for+people+to+show+off+the+innovations+they+are+busy+with+outside+of+work+and+boots.+The+3D+GS%2C+Web+GL+and+Team+Building+presentations+impressed+me.+I+learned+how+to+use+JavaScript+Libraries+and+Browser-use%2C+too.+For+me%2C+Rishal+stood+out+as+the+best+presenter.+He+presented+on+new+innovations+in+a+way+that+everyone+could+understand.+For+the+next+DevDay%2C+I+would+like+to+see+something+on+Oculus+Rift+and+Google+Phone+Blocks.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EName%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E+Joe+Niemand+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EDesignation%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E+Software+Engineer+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+DevDay+gives+me+time+to+join+the+rest+of+the+team+and+find+out+all+about+new+technologies+and+calibration.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+an+incredible+chance+to+learn+and+also+get+some+1-UP+points+in+one+go%21+The+presentation+%26lsquo%3BWhat+Makes+a+Successful+Team%26rsquo%3B+was+brilliant.+I+learned+what+it+takes+to+be+a+charismatic+leader%2C+which+is+a+key+factor+in+any+successful+team.+For+the+next+DevDay%2C+I+would+like+to+see+even+more+of+the+innovative+ideas+presented+at+every+DevDay%21+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EName%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E+Gail+Shaw+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EDesignation%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E+Technical+Lead+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+DevDay+is+a+break+from+the+ordinary%2C+giving+people+the+opportunity+to+showcase+%26lsquo%3Bnot-so-serious%26rsquo%3B+presentations+in+a+less+formal+setting.+I+enjoy+attending+DevDay+because+I+am+able+to+gain+more+presentation+experience+and+practice%2C+which+helps+me+to+improve+on+my+presenting+skills.+I+was+impressed+with+the+automatic+movie+downloader+and+also+came+to+realise+that+I+can%26rsquo%3Bt+read+code%21+Rishal+stood+out+as+the+best+presenter+%26ndash%3B+not+only+is+he+engaging+but+his+knowledge+is+also+very+impressive.+For+the+next+DevDay%2C+I+would+like+to+see+anything+ground-breaking+and+cutting-edge.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EName%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E+Chester+Cobus+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EDesignation%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E+Software+Engineer+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+I+see+DevDay+as+an+opportunity+to+learn+all+about+new+technologies+and+I+looked+forward+to+the+awesome+presentations+and+technologies+that+were+covered+during+the+day.+I+learned+so+much+from+the+presentations+on+3D+technology%2C+3D+games+in+JavaScript+and+light+control+through+a+website.+It+was+amazing+stuff%21+Rishal+stood+out+as+the+best+presenter+because+his+enthusiasm+and+passion+is+contagious%21+For+the+next+DevDay%2C+I+would+to+see+more+around+mobile+technology.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EName%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E+Lwazi+Prusent+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EDesignation%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E+Software+Engineer+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+I+like+attending+DevDay+because+we+get+to+learn+about+new+things%2C+new+frameworks+and+then+of+course%2C+there+are+always+the+gourmet+milkshakes+at+the+end%21+I+was+blown+away+by+the+Web+GL%2C+the+JavaScript+Libraries+and+the+Automatic+Movie+Downloader.+Gail+stood+out+as+the+best+presenter.+I+think+she%26rsquo%3Bs+witty+and+canny%2C+and+I+think+PSOs+are+so+cool%21+For+the+next+DevDay%2C+I+would+like+to+see+a+greater+focus+on+gaming.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EName%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E+Jonathan+Counihan+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EDesignation%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E+Team+Lead+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+DevDay+gives+us+the+chance+to+learn+about+new+projects%2C+listen+to+interesting+topics+and+socialise+with+teams+we+don%26rsquo%3Bt+get+to+see+very+often.+Earning+1-UP+points+for+attending+is+another+add Deloitte+confirms+that+Entelect+is+the+best+company+to+work+for+in+Southern+Africa Entelect+was+ranked+overall+winner+in+all+three+categories+of+the+Survey+in+which+its+employees+participated.+These+were+the+%26lsquo%3BBest+Company+to+Work+For+in+SA+%2850%26ndash%3B300+staff%29%26rsquo%3B%2C+the+%26lsquo%3BBest+Small+Company+to+Work+For+in+Southern+Africa%26rsquo%3B%2C+as+well+as+the+%26lsquo%3BBest+Information+Technology+Company+to+Work+For+%28all+sizes%29%26rsquo%3B.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+annual+survey%2C+conducted+by+Deloitte+%28%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.deloitte.co.za%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3Ehttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.deloitte.co.za%3C%2Fa%3E%29+since+2000%2C+is+regarded+as+the+leading+survey+of+its+kind+in+Southern+Africa+and+includes+participating+companies+from+South+Africa%2C+Namibia+and+Botswana.+The+survey+aims+to+provide+an+objective+measure+of+employee%26rsquo%3Bs+experiences+against+the+market+norm.+The+primary+areas+of+evaluation+included+are%3A%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cul+id%3D%22careersList%22%3E+%3Cli%3E+Employees%26rsquo%3B+sense+of+confidence+in+the+organisation%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E+The+company%26rsquo%3Bs+organisational+ethics+and+integrity%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E+The+company%26rsquo%3Bs+operational+effectiveness%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E+Employees%26rsquo%3B+relationship+with+manager%2Fsupervisor%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E+Employees%26rsquo%3B+sense+of+inclusion+in+the+organisation%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E+Employees%26rsquo%3B+overall+job+satisfaction%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E+Career+development%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E+Employee+work-life+balance%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E+Performance+and+recognition%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E+Remuneration%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cp%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Employees+complete+the+survey+anonymously+and+the+participating+companies+are+then+judged+on+their+strong+leadership%2C+empowerment+of+new+leaders+from+within+their+organisation%2C+giving+back+to+the+community%2C+their+ability+to+remain+dynamic+and+the+quality+and+morale+of+its+employees.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26lsquo%3BWe+are+incredibly+honoured+to+be+recognised+by+these+outstanding+awards+and+would+like+to+say+a+huge+thank+you+to+all+our+staff+members%2C+who+make+Entelect+the+company+that+it+is%2C%26rsquo%3B+says+Shashi+Hansjee%2C+managing+director+at+Entelect.+Hansjee+says%2C+%26lsquo%3BThis+recognition+reflects+our+core+goal+of+making+our+company+an+innovative%2C+exciting+and+influential+environment+for+the+incredible+talent+we+house%2C+and+we+couldn%26rsquo%3Bt+be+more+proud+of+this+achievement.%26rsquo%3B%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+These+prestigious+accolades+follow+the+company%26rsquo%3Bs+ongoing+success+and+growth+within+the+South+African+and+global+customised+software+development+field.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+height%3D%22387%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.entelectonline.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2Fawards.jpg%22+width%3D%22977%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E When+Entelect+Software+was+founded+in+2001%2C+the+long-term+vision+was+for+Entelect+to+be+the+world%27s+best+software+engineering+and+solutions+company%2C+measured+by+the+value+the+company+delivers+to+its+clients%2C+employees+and+the+greater+community.+On+16+October+2014%2C+the+company+took+a+step+closer+to+realising+this+vision+when+Entelect+was+awarded+not+one%2C+but+three%2C+prestigious+awards+in+the+Deloitte+Best+Company+to+Work+For+Survey+for+the+Southern+African+region. About+the+PASS+Summit The+big+conference+in+the+SQL+Server+world+is+the+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.sqlpass.org%2Fsummit%2F2014%2FHome.aspx%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3EPASS+Summit%3C%2Fa%3E.+In+%26nbsp%3Bprevious+years%2C+the+conference+boasted+more+than+5%2C000+attendees.+Back+in+its+usual+haunt+of+Seattle%2C+this+year%26rsquo%3Bs+PASS+Summit+promises+three+days+of+the+best+technical+sessions+available.+With+more+than+200+technical+sessions+across+three+days%2C+there+is+nothing+else+like+it.+As+usual%2C+there+will+be+too+much+material+packed+into+too+little+time%2C+but+all+the+sessions+will+be+recorded+and+attendees+can+download+them+free+of+charge%2C+so+missing+a+session+is+not+a+major+problem.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+I%26rsquo%3Bm+presenting+a+400-level+session+%28classified+%26lsquo%3BExpert%26rsquo%3B+level%29+on+the+Friday+afternoon.+The+session+is+on+the+internals+of+one+aspect+of+the+Query+Optimiser+%26ndash%3B+the+Cardinality+Estimator.+The+presentation+is+an+expanded+version+of+the+one+I+did+for+the+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.sqlpass.org%2F24hours%2F2014%2Fsummitpreview%2FAbout.aspx%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3E24+Hours+of+PASS+Summit+Preview%3C%2Fa%3E+and+goes+into+detail+on+how+SQL+Server+estimates+the+number+of+rows+that+will+be+affected+by+a+query+operator%2C+how+it+uses+statistics+to+get+accurate+row+estimations+and+what+happens+when+it+can%26rsquo%3Bt+use+the+statistics.+The+idea+of+the+presentation+is+that+once+people+know+how+SQL+Server+generates+the+row+estimations%2C+they%26rsquo%3Bre+much+better+equipped+to+solve+problems+when+they+encounter+queries+with+incorrect+row+estimations.+The+session+will+be+shown+on+PASStv+and+so+anyone%2C+whether+they%26rsquo%3Bre+attending+or+not%2C+can+watch+it.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+This+year%2C+PASS+Summit+is+not+the+only+conference+in+early+November+in+Seattle.+Microsoft+has+moved+its+MVP+Summit+from+its+usual+February%2FMarch+timeframe+to+the+same+week+as+PASS+Summit.+The+MVP+Summit+is+a+private+conference+for+the+recipients+of+Microsoft%26rsquo%3Bs+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fmvp.microsoft.com%2Fen-us%2Foverview.aspx%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3EMost+Valuable+Professional%3C%2Fa%3E+award.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+MVP+Summit+is+an+opportunity+to+sit+with+the+SQL+Server+development+team+for+presentations+on+future+plans+and+upcoming+features.+Everything+during+the+MVP+summit+is+under+NDA%2C+including+the+agenda%2C+so+unfortunately%2C+no+details+can+be+given+on+what+will+be+shown+and+discussed+there.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+To+make+it+a+triple+punch%2C+Red+Gate+is+holding+the+Seattle+leg+of+its+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fsqlinthecity.red-gate.com%2Fseattle-2014%2F%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3ESQL+in+the+City%3C%2Fa%3E+mini-conference+during+the+same+week.+SQL+in+the+City+is+a+technical+conference+with+a+dash+of+marketing.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+run+by+Red+Gate+and+there+are+sessions+that+promote+their+tools+but+not+all+sessions+are+marketing+related.+That+said%2C+even+the+ones+that+aren%26rsquo%3Bt%2C+are+usually+completely+marketing+focused%21%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+This+year+I%26rsquo%3Bm+co-presenting+a+%28hopefully%29+half-humorous%2C+half-serious%2C+zero-marketing+session+on+transaction+log+management+entitled+%26lsquo%3BYou+did+WHAT+to+my+transaction+log%3F%21%3F%21%3F%21%3F%26rsquo%3B+in+which+Tony+Davis+and+I+look+at+the+various+ways+people+mismanage+their+logs%2C+the+consequences+of+doing+this+and+what+the+recommended+practices+are+for+log+management.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+It%26rsquo%3Bs+a+long+road+to+Seattle%26hellip%3B+but+it%26rsquo%3Bs+well+worth+it+for+the+wealth+of+knowledge+available+to+everyone+attending+the+three+conferences. Entelect+moves+offices The+company+didn%26rsquo%3Bt+have+to+move+far+%26ndash%3B+Entelect+remains+at+3+Melrose+Boulevard+but+is+now+in+number+13.+Although+the+move+was+only+100+metres+and+had+a+few+minor+teething+problems%2C+the+company%26rsquo%3Bs+brilliant+team+worked+tirelessly+to+overcome+the+challenges.+It+didn%26rsquo%3Bt+take+the+team+long+to+organise%2C+install+and+add+the+Entelect+touch+to+create+a+fresh+professional+setting.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Entelect+now+has+more+meeting+rooms%2C+a+larger+boardroom+and+kitchen%2C+more+space+for+the+development+team%2C+all+new+furniture+and+a+revamped+bar+and+chill-out+area.+The+staff+quickly+and+comfortably+settled+in+and+seamlessly+continued+working+with+clients+on+current+projects.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+office+was+officially+opened+on+the+17+October+2014%2C+where+employees+%28and+some+clients+who+happened+to+be+in+the+area%21%29+joined+Managing+Director+Shashi+Hansjee+in+a+ceremonial+ribbon+cutting+and+raised+a+glass+to+Entelect%26rsquo%3Bs+continued+success.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+event+was+also+cause+for+another+celebration.+Entelect+won+the+2014+%26ldquo%3BBest+Company+To+Work+For%26rdquo%3B+award+for+the+Southern+Africa+region+in+the+annual+Deloitte+Best+Company+to+Work+for+Survey+%26ndash%3B%26nbsp%3B%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.entelect.co.za%2FNews%2FDisplayNewsItem.aspx%3Fniid%3D40834%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3Ehttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.entelect.co.za%2FNews%2FDisplayNewsItem.aspx%3Fniid%3D40834%3C%2Fa%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+With+the+team+enjoying+the+new+facilities+and+business+carrying+on+at+full+steam%2C+Entelect+looks+forward+to+welcoming+its+clients+and+partners+to+this+new+space+and+sharing+some+of+its+famous+coffee+blends+over+project+demos+and+requirements+discussions.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Ciimg+style%3D%22border%3Asolid+thin+%23CCC%3B%22+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.entelectonline.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2Foffice-opening.jpg%22+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E At+the+beginning+of+October+2014%2C+Entelect+moved+into+new+offices.+A+bigger+and+better+space+in+the+familiar+surroundings+of+Melrose+Arch%2C+the+move+proved+to+be+perfectly+timed.+Over+the+years%2C+the+company+has+grown+to+a+staff+of+more+than+200+employees+and+as+such%2C+required+more+space. Entelect+ends+the+year+with+a+25+per+cent+growth+and+announces+a+new+CEO .%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E+Entelect+CTO%2C+Martin+Naude%2C+won+an+award+as+the+world%26rsquo%3Bs+best+loyalty+practitioner.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E+Entelect+featured+in+the+press%2C+with+Entelect-related+articles+appearing+in+leading+magazines+and+newspapers.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E+Staff+seamlessly+moved+to+new+offices%2C+which+will+better+accomodate+the+company%26rsquo%3Bs+increasing+staff.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E+The+Entelect+Foundation+has+continued+to+grow%2C+with+10+per+cent+of+Entelect%26rsquo%3Bs+profits+being+committed+to+social+upliftment+projects+every+year.+Successes+include+putting+a+number+of+children+through+school%2C+weekly+mentorship+by+staff+volunteers%2C+issuing+study+scholarships%2C+assisting+families+financially%2C+running+a+feeding+scheme+for+unemployed+people%3B+sponsorship+of+a+new+graphic+design+centre+at+the+Frances+Vorwerg+school+for+the+disabled%2C+and+donating+45+percent+of+the+shares+of+Entelect%26%2339%3Bs+contracting+company+to+a+community+development+education+trust.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E+The+hosting+of+many+more+events+by+the+company%26%2339%3Bs+social+committee+throughout+the+year%2C+from+braais+and+sports+events+to+family+days.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Before+closing+off+the+day%26rsquo%3Bs+proceedings%2C+Pritchard+congratulated+the+top+1Up+contenders+for+their+efforts+in+going+beyond+the+call+of+duty+for+Entelect%2C+with+the+winning+employee+announced+as+Warren+Bonn.+In+closing%2C+Pritchard+made+special+mention+of+Managing+Director+Shashi+Hansjee%2C+announcing+that+Hansjee+will+be+taking+over+as+CEO.+Pritchard+praised+Hansjee+saying%2C+%26ldquo%3BShashi+joined+Entelect+in+2005+as+a+software+engineer+and+has+had+an+illustrious+career+at+Entelect+since.+In+a+short+space+of+time+he+was+leading+big+projects%2C+was+promoted+to+technical+director+and+later+managing+director.%26rdquo%3B+Pritchard+noted%2C+%26ldquo%3BShashi+was+particularly+successful+in+his+role+as+MD+because+he+is+prepared+to+do+operations+and+administrative+work+as+well+as+set+the+direction+for+the+business%2C+and+most+importantly%2C+he+understands+people.+He+has+done+a+brilliant+job+in+selecting+and+nurturing+our+current+management+team%2C+and+until+recently%2C+he+made+the+time+to+see+every+single+employee+in+regular+performance+reviews+%26ndash%3B+something+very+few+MDs+of+a+company+this+size+would+and+could+do.+Today%2C+I+can+say+with+confidence+that+Shashi+runs+the+ship%2C+and+will+continue+to+run+and+steer+the+Entelect+in+the+right+direction.%26rdquo%3B+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Pritchard+continued%2C+%26ldquo%3BIt+is+for+this+reason+that+I+am+bidding+farewell+to+my+position+as+CEO+and+am+officially+handing+over+the+reins+to+Shashi+today%21+I+will+be+staying+on+as+chairman+of+the+board%2C+and+of+course+will+always+be+involved+with+Entelect+and+will+continue+to+provide+guidance+and+support+to+our+management+team.%26rdquo%3B+Pritchard+closed+off+by+announcing+that+his+next+personal+mission+is+to+help+people+get+closer+to+God+and+to+further+help+the+poor+of+South+Africa.+He+explained%2C+%26ldquo%3BIn+October+last+year%2C+I+was+graced+with+a+vision+of+Christ+on+the+cross%2C+which+has+had+a+profound+effect+on+my+life+over+the+last+year+and+literally+has+lit+the+fire+in+my+heart+to+pursue+this+mission+with+God+at+its+centre.%26rdquo%3B+He+affirmed%2C+%26ldquo%3BI+feel+that+the+company%26rsquo%3Bs+success+is+purely+as+a+result+of+God%26rsquo%3Bs+grace+because+of+the+way+we+conduct+our+business+%26ndash%3B+with+integrity+and+in+true+service+of+others%2C+be+it+towards+staff%2C+clients+or+our+extended+communities+%26ndash%3B+and+is+the+reason+why+Entelect+will+continue+to+be+successful+in+the+future.%26rdquo%3B+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Hansjee+thanked+Pritchard+for+his+contributions+and+noted%2C+%26ldquo%3BIt%26rsquo%3Bs+great+to+see+our+founder+using+his+time+and+resources+to+do+good%26rdquo%3B.+He+added+that+this+will+be+a+seamless+transition%2C+and+that+Entelect%26rsquo%3Bs+strong+management+team+will+continue+to+drive+the+business+forward.+Hansjee+says+that+Entelect+will+continue+developing+its+presence+as+the+place+to+be+for+South+Africa%26rsquo%3Bs+top+software+talent%2C+with+further+emphasis+on+showcasing+Entelect%26rsquo%3Bs+technical+capability.+In+addressing+the+staff%2C+Hansjee+said%2C+%26ldquo%3BI+am+honoured+and+excited+to+continue+to+work+with+all+of+you+to+drive+this+great+organisation+towards+the+greatness+I+know+we+can+achieve.%26rdquo%3B Entelect%E2%80%99s+Technology+Accelerator+Programme+is+a+huge+hit A+Technology+Accelerator+project+is+a+software+project+that+must+be+developed+to+achieve+a+predefined+outcome%2C+for+example+to+learn+a+new+technology%2C+showcase+a+framework%2C+solve+a+business+problem%2C+complete+a+fully+specified+system+or+create+a+potential+product.+Employees+are+given+time+during+working+their+week+to+work+on+their+Technology+Accelerator+projects.+They+have+the+full+support+of+Entelect+senior+managers+and+technical+leads%2C+who+guide+and+mentor+them+through+the+process.+Employees+can+also+join+forces+and+work+together+on+single+projects.+Employees+can+join+the+programme+at+any+time+from+the+beginning+of+the+year+but+the+projects+must+be+completed+and+ready+to+present+to+a+judging+panel+by+mid-October.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Judging+this+year+was+held+at+the+African+Pride+Hotel+in+Melrose+Arch%2C+where+renowned+tech+journalist+Nafisa+Akabor+and+TechHuman.com+editor+Brendon+Ambrose+joined+the+Entelect+senior+management+judges+%26ndash%3B+Shashi+Hansjee+%28CEO%29%2C+Yatish+Parshotam+%28GM%3A+Communications%29%2C+Sheldon+Lyne+%28GM%3A+Operations%29+and+Matthew+Butler+%28GM%3A+Projects%29.+Each+participant+was+given+15+minutes+to+present+their+projects+and+these+projects+were+judged+on+technology+innovation%2C+complexity%2C+completeness+and+quality+of+presentation%2C+among+other+criteria.+Scores+were+tallied+and+the+results+and+prizes+were+handed+out+at+Entelect%26rsquo%3Bs+year-end+function+at+the+Askari+Lodge+%28%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.entelect.co.za%2FNews%2FDisplayNewsItem.aspx%3Fniid%3D43012%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3Ehttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.entelect.co.za%2FNews%2FDisplayNewsItem.aspx%3Fniid%3D43012%3C%2Fa%3E%29.%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+winner+of+the+best+group+project+was+handed+to+project+%26ldquo%3BBeep%26rdquo%3B+by+Rishal+Hurbans%2C+Rushil+O%26rsquo%3BJageer+and+Ross+Badenhorst%2C+and+the+team+took+away+a+prize+of+R30%2C000+to+share.+Beep+is+a+highly+extensible+notifications+framework+that+provides+real-time+notifications+of+new+content+from+various+sources.+The+prize+for+the+best+individual+project+went+to+the+Projects+Dashboard%2C+which+is+already+used+at+Entelect+HQ+to+track+the+health+of+the+builds+of+our+various+projects.+Duane+McKibbin+walked+away+with+a+prize+of+R15000.+The+second+place+prize+of+R10000+went+to+Grant+Marais%26rsquo%3B+JavaScript+music+visualiser%2C+Pulsar.+All+other+participants+received+R1000+worth+of+1Up+points+%28Entelect%26rsquo%3Bs+internal+rewards+programme%29.+%3Cdiv%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E+This+was+the+first+year+that+Entelect+has+run+this+programme+and+it+was+a+huge+success.+New+technologies+were+learnt%2C+working+systems+were+completed%2C+there+were+laughs+and+tears%2C+and+all+participants+agreed+that+the+Technology+Accelerator+should+stay+as+part+of+Entelect%26rsquo%3Bs+internal+suite+of+training+for+the+long+term.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.entelectonline.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2Ftech-accelerator.jpg%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fdiv%3E This+year+was+the+first+year+that+Entelect%E2%80%99s+Technology+Accelerator+Programme+was+run.+The+Programme+is+a+platform+for+Entelect%E2%80%99s+employees+to+learn+and+understand+new+technology%2C+solve+problems+and+create+a+future+product+outside+of+their+day-to-day+responsibilities. A+trio+of+conferences The+trio+of+conferences+started+on+the+Sunday+morning+with+the+MVP+Summit.+This+is+Microsoft%26rsquo%3Bs+annual+gathering+of+MVPs%2C+where+the+company+shows+off+new+and+upcoming+features+of+its+products+and+elicits+comments%2C+suggestions+and+criticisms+from+the+MVPs.+In+the+case+of+the+SQL+group%2C+there%26rsquo%3Bs+often+a+lot+of+criticism%21+While+everything+discussed+during+the+MVP+summit+is+under+NDA+%28which+results+in+some+amusing+tweets+during+the+conference%29%2C+some+of+the+highlights+of+the+conference+have+since+been+announced+publically+and+so+can+be+discussed.+These+include%3A+%3Cul+id%3D%22careersList%22%3E+%3Cli%3ESharding+for+Windows+Azure+SQL+Database+%28%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fblogs.msdn.com%2Fb%2Ffrcogno%2Farchive%2F2014%2F11%2F04%2Fsneak-peek-horizontal-scale-using-azure-sql-database-elastic-scale-preview-day-1.aspx%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3Ehttp%3A%2F%2Fblogs.msdn.com%2Fb%2Ffrcogno%2Farchive%2F2014%2F11%2F04%2Fsneak-peek-horizontal-scale-using-azure-sql-database-elastic-scale-preview-day-1.aspx%3C%2Fa%3E%29%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EUpdatable%2C+non-clustered+columnstore+indexes%2C+including+for+Hekaton+tables%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EStretching+tables+from+a+physical+SQL+installation+to+Azure+SQL+DB+%28%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fsqlblog.com%2Fblogs%2Frob_farley%2Farchive%2F2014%2F11%2F06%2Fpass-summit-keynote.aspx%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3Ehttp%3A%2F%2Fsqlblog.com%2Fblogs%2Frob_farley%2Farchive%2F2014%2F11%2F06%2Fpass-summit-keynote.aspx%3C%2Fa%3E%29.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+On+the+Monday%2C+Red+Gate+ran+the+Seattle+leg+of+its+SQL+in+the+City.+These+mini-conferences+are+a+mixture+of+technical+training+and+marketing+material+and+there%26rsquo%3Bs+usually+a+good+balance+between+the+two.+Tony+Davis+%28editor+for+Red+Gate+Software%29+and+I+presented+a+technical+session+entitled+%26lsquo%3BYou+did+WHAT+to+my+transaction+log%3F%21%3F%21%3F%26rsquo%3B+The+session+aimed+to+show+just+how+bad+things+can+become+if+people+try+quick+solutions+to+log+growth%2C+without+bothering+to+understand+how+the+log+is+used+and+how+it+works.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+annual+PASS+Summit+started+with+a+bang+on+the+Wednesday+morning%2C+but+fizzled+out+with+the+boring%2C+marketing-focused+keynote+that+followed.+One+of+these+days+we+will+have+technical+keynotes+on+both+days%2C+but+until+then%26hellip%3B+As+an+aside%2C+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcwebbbi.wordpress.com%2F2014%2F11%2F06%2Fpass-summit-2014-day-2-keynote-a-masterclass-in-cloud-databases-and-also-a-masterclass-in-tech-marketing%2F%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3EChris+Webb%26rsquo%3Bs+blog+post%3C%2Fa%3E+on+some+of+the+reasons+why+the+Wednesday+keynote+was+badly+received+makes+for+an+interesting+and+enlightening+read.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+As+expected%2C+nothing+major+was+announced+at+the+PASS+Summit+because+we+are+halfway+through+a+development+cycle+for+SQL+Server+%26ndash%3B+no+dates+were+given+for+vNext.+There+were+some+Windows+Azure+SQL+Database+announcements+%28unfortunately+these+did+not+include+a+shorter+name+for+it%29%2C+but+they+did+include+sharding+and+some+hints+as+to+the+features+that+will+be+in+vNext.+These+could+incorporate+updatable%2C+nonclustered+columnstore+indexes+and+stretch+tables+to+Windows+Azure+SQL+Database.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Without+much+effort%2C+the+rest+of+Wednesday+far+exceeded+the+keynote+in+interest.+Buck+Woody+discussed+relevant+data+storage+options%2C+making+the+very%2C+very+important+point+that+not+everything+should+be+shoehorned+into+a+single+solution+just+because+that+is+the+hammer.+If+part+of+an+application%26rsquo%3Bs+data+persistence+fits+naturally+into+a+document+database+and+half+into+a+graph+database%2C+that+is+where+they+should+go%2C+and+they+shouldn%26rsquo%3Bt+both+be+crammed+into+something+inappropriate.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Conor+Cunningham%2C+architect+on+the+SQL+team%2C+introduced+a+feature+for+SQL+Server+vNext%2C+called+the+Query+Store.+In+a+nutshell%2C+Query+Store+is+a+persisted+record+of+query+performance%2C+broken+down+by+object+and+query+and+user-chosen+interval.+This+feature+will%2C+in+most+cases%2C+make+it+unnecessary+to+run+trace%2Fextended+events+sessions+to+capture+a+system%26rsquo%3Bs+query+workload%2C+because+it+will+be+done+continually+in+the+background.+Its+best+feature+is+that+since+it%26rsquo%3Bs+persisted%2C+a+database+backup+will+contain+all+the+Query+Store+information+with+no+additional+work+required.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Thursday+started+with+a+technical+keynote+from+Dr+Rimma+Nehme%2C+who+works+at+the+Microsoft+Jim+Gray+Systems+Lab.+She+gave+an+excellent+technical+presentation+on+cloud+computing+%26mdash%3B+for+the+record%2C+she+says+we+should+blame+the+network+people+for+the+name+%26lsquo%3BCloud%26rsquo%3B.+The+rest+of+the+day+was+just+as+good%2C+with+Paul+Randal+talking+about+advanced+recovery+options+%28including+using+hex+editors+on+database+files%29+and+Bob+Ward+spending+three+hours+talking+about+SQL+Server+IO.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+By+Friday%2C+although+many+delegates+were+worn+out%2C+there+was+still+a+good-size+audience+for+my+session+on+the+cardinality+estimator.+However%2C+the+later+scheduling+of+the+session+could+have+been+the+reason+for+there+being+fewer+questions+and+interaction+than+I+would+have+liked.+That+said%2C+all+in+all%2C+the+three+conferences+made+another+excellent+week+of+technical+training%2C+friendship+and+learning.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B+%3Ctable+align%3D%22left%22+border%3D%220%22+cellpadding%3D%221%22+cellspacing%3D%221%22+style%3D%22width%3A+100%25%3B%22%3E+%3Ctbody%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3Ctd%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+height%3D%22300%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.entelectonline.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FPassSummit.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3Ctd%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+height%3D%22300%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.entelectonline.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FPassPresentation.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3Ctd%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+height%3D%22300%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.entelectonline.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FGailPassSummit.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3C%2Ftbody%3E+%3C%2Ftable%3E+%3Ctable+align%3D%22middle%22+border%3D%220%22+cellpadding%3D%221%22+cellspacing%3D%221%22+style%3D%22width%3A+50%25%3B%22%3E+%3Ctbody%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3Ctd+style%3D%22width%3A+100%25%3B+text-align%3A+center%3B%22%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+height%3D%22300%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.entelectonline.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FPassCommunityWall.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3C%2Ftbody%3E+%3C%2Ftable%3E Query+Store+%E2%80%93+the+best+thing+for+performance+tuning+since+Extended+Events %3Cdiv%3ETo+understand+what+makes+the+Query+Store+such+a+revolution%2C+a+little+background+on+SQL%26rsquo%3Bs+built-in+performance+monitoring+is+necessary.+To+start+with%2C+by+default%2C+there+are+no+traces+or+event+sessions+that+record+query+performance.+The+argument+has+always+been+that+the+overhead+is+unacceptable.+The+only+traces+and+event+sessions+that+are+enabled+by+default+are+a+default+trace+and+a+very+light-weight+system+health+extended+events+session.+SQL+tracks+query+performance+stats+but+only+in+an+aggregated+form.+Aggregated+since+the+query+plan+was+cached%2C+which+for+a+frequently+run+query+could+be+just+after+the+server+started.+Additionally%2C+these+performance+stats+are+not+persisted%2C+so+if+SQL+is+restarted+%28as+too+often+happens+when+there%26rsquo%3Bs+a+performance-related+incident%29%2C+they+are+all+lost.%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3EIf+someone+asks+me+to+help+them+to+identify+the+cause+of+a+performance+problem+that+they+had+the+previous+day%2C+at+the+moment+the+answer+would+be%2C+%26lsquo%3BThere%26rsquo%3Bs+no+way+to+do+so.%26rsquo%3B+Unless+the+person+had+traces+or+extended+events+sessions+running%2C+third-party+monitoring+tools+or+custom+benchmarks%2C+there+won%26rsquo%3Bt+be+enough+information+available+a+day+later+to+identify+the+cause+of+performance+problems.+However%2C+with+the+Query+Store%2C+SQL+automatically+tracks+the+run-time+performance+characteristics+of+queries%2C+including+CPU+usage%2C+duration%2C+reads%2C+row+count%2C+degree+of+parallelism+and+memory+usage.+These+stats+are+stored+per+statement+and+object%2Fbatch+and+persisted+within+the+database%2C+aggregated+over+a+time+interval+chosen+by+the+DBA%2C+defaulting+to+one+hour.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3EThe+Query+Store+includes+the+same+query+hash+that+we+have+had+in+the+query+stats+DMVs+since+SQL+2008%2C+allowing+easy+identification+of+%26lsquo%3Bsimilar%26rsquo%3B+queries+%26ndash%3B+queries+that+have+the+same+form+but+differ+by+embedded+constants.+This+is+fantastic%3A+it+means+that+when+the+previously+mentioned+scenario+occurs%2C+the+answer+is+no+longer+that+there%26rsquo%3Bs+no+way+to+do+so%2C+but+rather%2C+%26lsquo%3BCan+you+get+me+a+backup+of+the+DB+from+after+that+performance+problem%3F%26rsquo%3B+or+if+backups+cannot+be+provided%2C+%26lsquo%3BCan+you+run+these+queries+and+send+me+the+results%3F%26rsquo%3B+It+means+that+it+is+possible+to+diagnose+the+cause+of+performance+problems+days%2C+weeks%2C+even+months+after+the+incident+occurred.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+If+that+is+not+enough%2C+the+Query+Store+allows+for+the+forcing+of+a+plan.+Not+using+complex+WITH+PLAN+hints+or+by+creating+plan+guides%2C+but+simply+by+associating+a+query+ID%2C+from+the+Query+Store%2C+with+a+plan+ID%2C+also+from+the+Query+Store.+The+selected+plan+is+then+forced+for+that+query+until+the+association+is+removed.+Forcing+plans+is+still+something+of+a+last+resort+for+query+tuning%2C+but+at+least+now+it%26rsquo%3Bs+easier+to+do.%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3EThe+Query+Store%2C+when+it+is+available%2C+will+be+a+massive+improvement+in+the+area+of+performance+tuning+for+SQL+databases.+It+alone+would+make+upgrading+to+the+next+version+of+SQL+worthwhile%2C+even+if+there+were+no+other+new+features+at+all.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+just+that+good%21%3C%2Fdiv%3E By+Gail+Shaw%3Cbr%2F%3E+Microsoft+Certified+Master%3A+SQL+Server+2008%3Cbr%2F%3E+Microsoft+Most+Valued+Professional+for+SQL+Server%3Cbr%2F%3E+Entelect+Technical+Lead%3A+SQL+Server+%3Cbr%2F%3E%3Cbr%2F%3E+On+the+Thursday+at+the+annual+PASS+Summit%2C+Principal+Software+Architect+on+the+SQL+Server+Team%2C+Conor+Cunningham%2C+presented+a+session+titled+%E2%80%98Query+Store+%E2%80%93+A+New+SQL+Query+Tuning+Feature%E2%80%99. SQL+Europe %3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.sqlsaturday.com%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3ESQLSaturday%3C%2Fa%3E+is+a+free+mini-conference+run+by+the+local+SQL+usergroup+and+as+the+name+suggests%2C+it+is+usually+held+on+a+Saturday+%28though+there+have+been+a+couple+held+on+a+Friday%29.+To+date%2C+there+have+been+around+370+SQLSaturdays+held+on+six+continents+and+around+40+more+are+scheduled+or+in+the+planning+phase.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+SQLSaturday+has+more+than+20+sessions%2C+ranging+from+DBA-centric+to+data+analysis+and+cloud+computing%2C+along+with+a+pre-con+day+on+the+Friday%2C+which+offers+a+full-day%26rsquo%3Bs+training%2C+though+not+for+free.+Along+with+a+number+of+local+and+other+international+speakers%2C+I%26rsquo%3Bll+be+giving+a+presentation+there.+I%26rsquo%3Bll+be+talking+about+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.sqlsaturday.com%2Fviewsession.aspx%3Fsat%3D374%26amp%3Bsessionid%3D27444%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3Edatabase+corruption%3C%2Fa%3E%2C+what+should+be+done+to+ensure+that+a+DBA+is+prepared+if+corruption+strikes+and+what+the+DBA+should+do+if+a+database+really+does+become+corrupt.+The+presentation+covers+backup+strategies+and+the+need+for+tested+backups%2C+options+for+consistency+checks%2C+monitoring+and+alerts.+It+also+covers+what+a+DBA+should%2C+and+most+importantly+shouldn%26rsquo%3Bt+do%2C+should+the+database+become+corrupt.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+week+following+SQLSaturday+Vienna+is+the+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fsqlbits.com%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3ESQL+Bits%3C%2Fa%3E+conference.+SQL+Bits%2C+one+of+the+largest+SQL+conferences+in+Europe%2C+is+back+in+London+this+year+with+an+expanded+agenda.+With+two+training+days+offering+full-day+presentations%2C+two+days+of+general+sessions+and+the+free+Community+Day+on+Saturday%2C+SQL+Bits+has+a+lot+to+offer.+SQLBits+runs+from+4%26ndash%3B7+March+2015+and+is+held+at+the+ExCeL+London+Exhibition+and+Convention+Centre.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+SQLBits+has+grown+from+strength+to+strength+over+the+years+and+it+boasts+ and+how+they+interact+with+isolation+levels+and+error+handling+The+indexing+presentation+is+one+of+SQLBit%26rsquo%3Bs+new+double-length+sessions.+In+it+I%26rsquo%3Bll+be+covering+index+architecture+and+then+looking+at+how+that+architecture+affects+choices+for+the+clustered+index.+Most+of+the+session+will+be+spent+looking+at+how+nonclustered+indexes+are+used+and+how+they+should+be+selected+to+give+the+best+possible+improvement+to+the+application+performance.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+With+so+much+to+look+forward+to+and+so+many+presentations+to+plan%2C+it+looks+like+March+is+going+to+be+a+busy+month%21 The+2015+R100K+Challenge+is+out+of+this+world With+the+competition+now+officially+open+for+entries%2C+this+year%26rsquo%3Bs+challenge+plays+homage+to+the+classic+arcade+game+Space+Invaders%2C+and+will+once+again+see+both+novice+and+professional+coders+stretch+their+artificial+intelligence+%28AI%29+skills%2C+battling+it+out+for+the+coveted+R100%2C000+prize.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+increasingly+popular+Entelect+R100K+Challenge+series+was+originally+launched+in+2012.+It+is+aimed+at+the+coding%2C+software+development+and+gaming+communities+in+South+Africa.+According+to+Entelect%26rsquo%3Bs+General+Manger+of+Resourcing%2C+Tim+Kroon%2C+entries+have+increased+exponentially+each+year.+Kroon+says%2C+%26lsquo%3BWe+are+really+excited+about+what+this+year%26rsquo%3Bs+challenge+will+bring.+This+is+set+to+be+our+biggest+R100K+Challenge+yet+and+we+are+sure+that+our+carefully+selected+2015+Space+Invaders+theme+will+inspire+innovative+and+creative+ideas+from+all+entrants.%26rsquo%3B%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Entrants+to+this+year%26rsquo%3Bs+R100K+Challenge+will+once+again+be+required+to+write+an+AI+player+-+or+bot+-+for+the+provided+Space+Invaders+platform.+%26lsquo%3BEach+entrant%26rsquo%3Bs+bot+will+need+to+be+designed+specifically+to+outsmart+and+outplay+its+opponents%2C+and+only+the+most+intelligent%2C+effective+and+innovative+bots+will+survive+and+make+it+into+the+semi-finals+for+our+advanced+pool.+However%2C+we+do+have+a+beginners%26rsquo%3B+pool+that+will+allow+less-experienced+contestants+to+have+a+shot+at+a+prize+of+R50%2C000%2C+so+there+really+is+an+opportunity+for+everyone+to+get+involved+this+year%2C%26rsquo%3B+explains+Kroon.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+To+even+the+playing+field%2C+entrants+are+categorised+into+novice+and+advanced+skill+pools%2C+A+and+B+respectively.+A+separate+category+will+be+opened+to+GUI+%28Graphical+User+Interface%29+challengers.+This+will+allow+developers+with+a+creative+flair+to+try+their+hand+at+crafting+the+style%2C+look+and+feel+of+the+game.+Entelect+will+also+focus+on+students+for+this+year%26rsquo%3Bs+Challenge+because+the+company+has+recognised+the+incredible%2C+untapped+range+of+AI+skills+among+this+network.+The+company+invites+all+students+and+school-goers+to+take+part+and+test+their+theoretical+knowledge+on+a+practical+platform.+Kroon+says%2C+%26lsquo%3BNot+only+is+this+a+great+opportunity+to+enjoy+a+challenging+gaming+experience+and+network+with+some+of+the+best+South+Africa+has+to+offer+in+the+field%2C+but+you+could+also+be+the+next+winner%21%26rsquo%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26lsquo%3BEntelect+is+incredibly+proud+to+partner+once+again+with+leading+publication%2C+NAG%2C+which+continues+to+provide+fantastic+support+and+visibility+for+the+R100K+Challenge%2C%26rsquo%3B+says+Kroon.+%26lsquo%3BIn+addition%2C+we+are+pleased+to+announce+that+Sony+Mobile+has+come+on+board+as+this+year%26rsquo%3Bs+product+sponsor+and+will+be+providing+a+host+of+fantastic+prizes+from+their+latest+Xperia+range.%26rsquo%3B%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+competition+is+now+open.+Following+a+knock-out+tournament%2C+a+semi-final+event+will+be+held+in+September+2015%2C+showcasing+the+%26lsquo%3Bentrants+to+watch%26rsquo%3B+and+their+leading+bots.+Thereafter%2C+the+competition+will+reach+its+climax+at+the+2015+rAge%2C+where+the+finals+will+be+held+and+this+year%26rsquo%3Bs+winners+of+R100%2C000+%28Pool+A%29%2C+R50%2C000+%28Pool+B%29+and+runner-up+prizes+will+be+announced.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+For+more+information+or+to+enter%2C+please+visit+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fchallenge.entelect.co.za%2F%22+target%3D%22blank%22%3Ehttp%3A%2F%2Fchallenge.entelect.co.za.%3C%2Fa%3E SA+companies+get+creative+to+attract+young+ICT+talent The+need+for+more+tech-savvy+employees%2C+who+possess+the+required+skill+sets+to+effectively+work+in+dynamic%2C+highly+technical+environments%2C+has+increased+exponentially.+%26lsquo%3BHowever%2C+while+Africa+offers+boundless+opportunities+within+the+ICT+space%2C+there+is+a+critical+skills+shortage%2C+particularly+in+South+Africa+when+compared+to+our+counterparts+across+Africa%2C%26rsquo%3B+explains+Tim+Kroon%2C+General+Manager+of+Resourcing+at+Entelect.+%26lsquo%3BWith+a+youth+unemployment+rate+of+more+than+one-third+of+young+South+Africans%2C+mainly+as+a+result+of+a+lack+of+skills%2C+we+are+seeing+some+compelling+efforts+from+the+private+sector+to+improve+ICT+education+levels+and+attract+more+young+people+to+a+field+that+provides+opportunities+across+every+business+sector.%26rsquo%3B%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26lsquo%3BVarious+companies+and+institutions+have+set+up+ICT-focussed+educational+funds+and+charities%2C+skills+development+programmes+and+upskilling+incentives%2C%26rsquo%3B+says+Kroon.+Among+the+most+successful+of+these+is+Entelect%26rsquo%3Bs+annual+R100K+Challenge%2C+supported+by+partners+Sony+Mobile+and+NAG+magazine.+Now+in+its+fourth+year%2C+the+R100K+Challenge+hopes+to+encourage+students+to+pursue+a+career+in+ICT%2C+as+well+as+help+professional+programmers+to+continuously+learn+and+develop+their+own+skills.+Kroon+elaborates%2C+%26lsquo%3BThere+are+specific+skills+required+to+take+part+in+a+challenge+such+as+this%2C+which+we+hope+will+encourage+more+young+people+to+improve+their+skills+within+the+science%2C+technology%2C+engineering%2C+and+mathematics+%28STEM%29+disciplines%2C+with+a+view+towards+entering+the+ICT+skills+arena+once+their+studies+are+complete.%26rsquo%3B%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Kroon+goes+on+to+explain+that+the+R100K+Challenge+plays+an+important+role+in+attracting+people+to+the+local+development+community.+He+says+that+it+presents+a+compelling+incentive+to+student+or+novice+coders+and+professional+developers+alike.+This+year%2C+the+R100K+Challenge%26rsquo%3Bs+retro-gaming+theme+of+Space+Invaders+is+specifically+designed+to+test+the+artificial+intelligence+%28AI%29+skills+of+entrants+in+a+face-off+competition%2C+where+candidates+are+required+to+write+the+code+for+their+own+designed+bot.%26nbsp%3B%26lsquo%3BThe+necessary+skills+to+win+the+R100K+Challenge+are+relevant+to+the+industry+at+large.+Winning+requires+not+only+the+ability+to+write+the+code%2C+but+also+to+think+strategically.+Entrants+will+need+to+engage+their+skills+of+critical+analysis+and+a+structured+process+of+testing+and+optimisation%2C%26rsquo%3B+says+Kroon.+As+the+competition+grows+each+year%2C+so+it+is+modified+to+cater+to+its+entrants.+For+example%2C+this+year+the+Player+Portal+has+been+launched.+Here%2C+players+are+able+to+upload+their+code+and+test+it+properly%2C+offering+the+chance+to+iron+out+any+flaws.+These+elements+are+reflective+of+the+industry+and+could+help+prepare+entrants+for+making+the+leap+into+the+marketplace+of+software+engineering%2C+where+professionals+are+primarily+responsible+for+writing%2C+designing+and+testing+of+computer+programs.%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+With+the+global+ICT+industry+now+producing+trillions+of+rands%26rsquo%3B+worth+of+value+within+a+myriad+of+industries%2C+Kroon+says+that+it+is+Entelect%26rsquo%3Bs+hope+that+the+increasingly+popular+R100K+Challenge+will+continue+to+encourage+and+introduce+more+young+people+to+the+field+of+programming+and+development%2C+and+that+it+will+highlight+the+massive+opportunities+for+them+in+this+essential+industry.+%26lsquo%3BChoosing+to+study+within+the+field+of+ICT+disciplines+puts+students+at+a+great+advantage+when+entering+the+marketplace%2C+while+simultaneously+improving+South+Africa%26rsquo%3Bs+capabilities+and+economic+outlook%2C%26rsquo%3B+says+Kroon.+%26lsquo%3BThere+are+significant+professional+benefits+to+mastering+computer+programming+topics%2C+such+as+logic%2C+patterns+and+problem+solving.+For+students+moving+into+computer+science+at+tertiary+level%2C+having+a+background+or+introduction+to+computer+programming+at+a+high-school+level+will%2C+of+course%2C+be+a+distinct+advantage.%26rsquo%3B%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+increase+in+local+skills+will+play+an+important+role+in+enhancing+South+Africa%26rsquo%3Bs+competitiveness+on+the+global+ICT+stage.+This+will+promote+job+creation+and+the+opportunity+for+South+Africa+to+ensure+the+country+is+able+to+depend+on+its+own+local+products+and+services+to+meet+its+ICT+needs%2C+rather+than+outsourcing+skills+from+other+countries.+It+may+even+create+the+capacity+for+South+Africa+to+export+these+skills.+Kroon+concludes%2C+%26lsquo%3BThis+ability+will+drastically+improve+our+economic+outlook+in+the+age+of+the+knowledge+economy%2C+and+as+such%2C+we+encourage+other+public+sector+organisations+to+take+part+in+the+drive+to+attract+young+people+to+our+industry%2C+through+supporting+existing+incentives+and+programmes+or+creating+their+own.%26rsquo%3B The+SQLSaturday+events+are+free%2C+one-day+mini-conferences+hosted+by+the+various+SQL+Server+usergroups+across+the+world.+So+far+there+have+been+400+SQL+Saturday+events+across+six+continents.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+On+the+28+February%2C+the+Austrian+SQL+Server+usergroups+hosted+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.sqlsaturday.com%2F374%2Feventhome.aspx%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3ESQL+Saturday+in+Vienna%3C%2Fa%3E.+There+were+more+than+300+attendees+from+all+across+Austria+and+beyond.+My+presentation+on+database+corruption+had+a+large+and+enthusiastic+audience.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+database+corruption+session+is+mostly+about+things+that+DBAs+can+do+so+that+if+their+database+ever+does+become+corrupt%2C+they+can+recover+easily.+The+focus+of+the+presentation+is+around+backups%2C+recovery+plan%2C+monitoring+and+alerts.+The+second+part+is+on+what+to+do+if+corruption+is+detected%2C+and+the+focus+there+is+on+understanding+the+errors+and+ensuring+that+actions+taken+don%26rsquo%3Bt+make+the+problem+worse.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+keynote+was+given+by+Mark+Souza+of+Microsoft%26rsquo%3Bs+Customer+Advisory+Team%2C+who+discussed+a+number+of+features+that+may+or+may+not+be+coming+in+future+versions+of+SQL+Server.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+After+SQL+Saturday%2C+it+was+time+to+make+the+trip+across+Europe+to+London+for+the+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fsqlbits.com%2F%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3ESQL+Bits%3C%2Fa%3E+conference.+I+had+two+accepted+sessions+for+the+conference%3A+a+regular+session+on+transactions+and+a+double-length+session+on+indexes.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+session+on+transactions+had+a+small+but+attentive+audience.+In+it%2C+I+covered+the+concept+of+atomicity+and+how+transactions+guarantee+atomicity.+I+also+looked+at+how+locks%26nbsp%3Blocks+interact+with+transactions+and+ended+with+an+examination+of+error+handling+and+the+necessarily+of+catching+errors+that+can+occur+within+transactions.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+indexing+session+was+full%2C+standing-room+only%21%26nbsp%3BThe+session+covered+index+architecture+in+brief%2C+touching+on+how+index+trees+work.+A+good+understanding+of+index+architecture+often+makes+figuring+out+how+and+why+SQL+uses+particular+indexes+easy.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3BDespite+some+minor+AV+problems%2C+the+session+went+spectacularly%3A+attentive+audience%2C+good+questions%2C+great+feedback%2C+even+if+I+did+find+a+mistake+on+one+of+the+slides.+With+index+architecture+out+of+the+way%2C+I+spent+the+rest+of+the+session+looking+at+design+considerations+for+the+clustered+index+and+then+looking+at+how+the+queries+that+run+against+a+table+will+affect+the+nonclustered+indexes+chosen+for+it.+The+video+recording+of+the+session+is+available+on+the+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fsqlbits.com%2FSessions%2FEvent14%2FAll_about_Indexes%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3ESQLBits+site%3C%2Fa%3E.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+All+in+all%2C+it+was+another+very+successful+SQLBits+conference+and+I%26rsquo%3Bm+looking+forward+to+the+next+one.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.entelectonline.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2Fsqlbits.jpg%22+style%3D%22max-width%3A1170px%22+width%3D%22100%25%22+%2F%3E SQL+Saturdays+in+South+Africa %3Cdiv%3EThe+SQLSaturday+conferences+are+free%2C+one-day+conferences%2C+and+as+their+name+suggests%2C+usually+on+a+Saturday+%28though+Hawaii+ran+its+conference+on+a+Friday%29%2C+run+by+the+local+SQL+Server+usergroups.+They+provide+high-quality+training+run+entirely+by+volunteers.+To+date%2C+there+have+been+more+than+400+SQLSaturday+events+on+six+continents+since+the+first+one+was+held+in+Orlando+in+late+2007.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3EThis+will+be+the+fifth+year+in+a+row+that+there%26rsquo%3Bs+a+SQLSaturday+held+in+Johannesburg.+However%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+the+first+year+that+we+have+three+events+running+in+South+Africa.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Johannesburg+is+up+first+on+5+September.+I%26rsquo%3Bm+presenting+several+sessions+there%3A+a+full+day+preconference+session+on+the+Friday%2C+as+well+as+two+sessions+on+the+Saturday.+The+precon+is+titled+%26lsquo%3BAll+about+Execution+Plans%26rsquo%3B+and+that%26rsquo%3Bs+what+it+is.+I%26rsquo%3Bll+be+talking+the+entire+day+on+execution+plans%2C+starting+with+how+and+why+they+are+generated%2C+and+ending+with+a+detailed+look+at+the+operators+that+can+appear+in+the+plans%2C+what+they+mean+and+how+to+read+them.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+first+session+on+the+Saturday%2C+titled+%26lsquo%3BWhat+backups%3F%26rsquo%3B%2C+covers+SQL%26rsquo%3Bs+backup+options%2C+the+full%2C+differential+and+log+backups%2C+what+they+each+do+and+when+they%26rsquo%3Bd+be+used%2C+as+well+as+a+discussion+on+restore+paths+for+different+kinds+of+backup.+The+second+session+on+the+Saturday+is+a+more+advanced+session+called+%26lsquo%3BLies%2C+damned+lies+and+statistics%26rsquo%3B.+It+looks+at+SQL%26rsquo%3Bs+statistics+objects%2C+what+they+are+and+what+they+are+used+for.+It+goes+into+detail+on+the+part+that+the+statistics+play+in+the+optimisation+process+and+what+can+%28and+will%29+go+wrong+when+statistics+are+out+of+date.%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3EThe+second+Saturday+of+September+sees+SQLSaturday+moving+to+Cape+Town.+Again%2C+I%26rsquo%3Bll+be+delivering+my+talk+on+statistics.To+complete+the+trio%2C+on+the+19+September%2C+the+very+first+SQLSaturday+Durban+will+be+held.+In+addition+to+the+sessions+on+backups+and+statistics%2C+I%26rsquo%3Bm+also+doing+a+two-hour+presentation+on+execution+plans.+The+first+half+is+focussed+on+how+to+read+execution+plans+and+the+second%2C+on+using+the+execution+plan+to+identify+performance+problems+with+queries.%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+To+end+the+month+on+a+very+different+note%2C+I+have+the+pleasure+of+presenting+an+AI+paper+at+the+SAICSIT+conference+in+Stellenbosch+%26hellip%3B+a+change+from+the+usual+SQL+conferences+indeed.%3C%2Fdiv%3E ears%26rsquo%3B+experience+with+those+five+years+made+up+of+you+having+the+first+year%26rsquo%3Bs+experience+five+times+over%21%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Lastly%2C+and+possibly+most+importanty%2C+find+a+job+that+you+enjoy+%26ndash%3B+one+that+you+feel+passionate+about+and+want+to+work+at. li%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+sessions+aren%26rsquo%3Bt+the+only+part+of+the+PASS+Summit%2C+though.+There%26rsquo%3Bs+the+SQL+Clinic+where+the+top+CSS+engineers+will+be+available+to+help+with+any+SQL+Server+problems.+There+is+also%26nbsp%3Bthe+Customer+Advisory+Team+that+can+help+with+designs+for+SQL+implementations+and+features+big+and+small%2C+and+there%26rsquo%3Bs+the+community+area+where+there%26rsquo%3Bs+sure+to+be+several+SQL+professionals+at+any+time%2C+willing+to+share+their+knowledge.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+Friday+keynote+is+going+to+be+a+treat.+Dr+DeWitt%2C+from+the+Jim+Grey+lab+has+given+the+last-day+keynote+on+multiple+occasions%2C+always+to+critical+acclaim+and+usually+to+a+standing+ovation.+Last+year%2C+one+of+his+co-workers%2C+Dr+Nehme+presented+the+keynote+and%2C+if+anything%2C+outdid+Dr+DeWitt.+This+year%2C+they+will+present+the+final-day+keynote+together+on+the+Internet+of+Things+%28IoT%29.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+week+after+PASS+Summit%2C+the+action+moves+across+the+lakes+to+Bellevue+and+Redmond%2C+for+Microsoft%26rsquo%3Bs+annual+MVP+Summit.+This+is+where+Microsoft+talks+to+its+MVP+award+holders+about+its+plans+for+the+future+of+the+company%26rsquo%3Bs+various+products.+Everything+that+occurs+during+the+MVP+summit+is+under+NDA+%28including+the+lunch+menu%29+but+that+just+means+that+Microsoft+is+free+to+talk+about+things+that+the+company+is+not+ready+to+make+public.+It+also+gives+the+the+MVPs+a+chance+comment+on%2C+and+often+criticise%2C+those+plans.%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+While+the+agenda+is+NDA%2C+what+I%26rsquo%3Bm+expecting+and+hoping+to+see+is+a+mixture+of+features+coming+in+SQL+2016+and+longer-term+plans+for+the+future+of+SQL+Server+and+entire+data+platform+as+a+whole.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAll+in+all%2C+between+PASS+and+the+MVP+summit%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+going+to+be+a+busy%2C+but+great%2C+trip.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E ores.+%3Cbr%2F%3E%3Cbr%2F%3E+Overall%2C+Entelect+has+been+awarded+the+Gold+Achiever+Award+and+the+company%26rsquo%3Bs+highest+individual+score+was+for+%3Cem%3EValues+and+Culture%3C%2Fem%3E+%26ndash%3B+earning+a+total+score+of+4.57.+This+subsection+measures+how+aligned+an+organisation%26rsquo%3Bs+employees+are+to+the+company%26rsquo%3Bs+values+and+culture.+Entelect+prides+itself+on+its+strong+company+values+and+culture%2C+and+this+high+score+reflects+that+the+culture+of+the+company+has+filtered+down+from+management+to+other+employees.+%3Cbr%2F%3E%3Cbr%2F%3E+Entelect%26rsquo%3Bs%26nbsp%3Bnext-highest+score+was+for+%3Cem%3ELeadership%3C%2Fem%3E+and+the+total+score+of+4.51+shows+that+employee%26rsquo%3Bs+generally+have+good+relationships+with+managers%2C+and+feel+that+they+are+being+guided+to+achieve+their+career+goals.+Entelect+scored+a+total+of+4.48+for+%3Cem%3EEngagement%3C%2Fem%3E%2C+which+is+a+reflection+on+the+company%26rsquo%3Bs+active+social+committee+as+well+as+the+team+leads+and+account+managers.+About+this+high+score%2C+Entelect%26rsquo%3Bs+Data+Manager%2C+Ryan+Naud%26eacute%3B+said%2C+%26lsquo%3BKeeping+all+Entelectuals+engaged+has+been+a+priority+since+day+one%26nbsp%3Band+it%26rsquo%3Bs+great+to+be+able+to+measure+this+and+see+that+the+approach+is+working.%26rsquo%3B+%3Cbr%2F%3E%3Cbr%2F%3E+As+with+any+job%2C+employee+satisfaction+is+crucial+to+the+overall+success+of+the+company.+Keeping+a+growing+workforce+happy+can+be+difficult+but+Entelect%26rsquo%3Bs+score+of+4.33+for+the+%3Cem%3EEmployee+Satisfaction%3C%2Fem%3E+subsection+shows+that+management+is+committed+to+ensuring+that+the+majority+of+the+work+the+company+takes+on%2C+provides+personal+fulfillment+to+its+staff.+%3Cbr%2F%3E%3Cbr%2F%3E+As+a+result+of+Entelect%26rsquo%3Bs+growth+over+the+past+year%2C+the+company+had+nearly+50+percent+more+respondents.+It+has+also+increased+its+overall+score+from+last+year%26rsquo%3Bs+4.33+to+4.40+this+year+%26ndash%3B+making+Entelect+truly+one+of+the+best+companies+to+work+for+in+Southern+Africa.+%3Cbr%2F%3E%3Cbr%2F%3E SQL+server+conferences%2C+European+style
