Educating+and+empowering+the+youth+starts+with+us %3Cp%3ESouth+Africa+has+one+of+the+worst+youth+unemployment+problems+in+the+world%2C+with+some+estimates+holding+that+less+than+half+the+population+under+35+are+employed.+The+percentage+of+black+African+professional%2C+managerial+and+technical+workers+aged+25+to+34+has+dropped+by+2%25+over+the+past+20+years%2C+leaving+that+generation+less+skilled+than+previous+ones+%26ndash%3B+and+less+skilled+than+every+other+race+and+age+group%2C+according+to+a+recently+survey+by+Statistics+South+Africa.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ELittle+has+changed+since+2009+when+Stats+SA+last+did+the+survey.+As+in+2009%2C+57%25+of+people+with+less+than+matric+remain+unemployed%2C+while+those+with+a+matric+recorded+unchanged+unemployment+levels+of+38%25.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMore+than+98%25+of+children+who+should+be+getting+a+primary+education+do+attend+school+-+but+simply+being+in+school+is+not+enough.+We+need+our+children+to+be+educated+properly.+Only+35%25+of+children+in+Grade+3+are+able+to+pass+the+literacy+and+numeracy+tests+for+that+age+group.+Where+are+the+skills+going+to+come+from+that+we+so+desperately+need+to+create+jobs+in+SA+now+and+in+future+generations%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBusiness+has+a+clear+role+to+play+in+improving+the+situation.+Strategically+aligned+corporate+social+investment+initiatives+can+go+a+long+way+towards+educational+upliftment+in+our+country.+The+Entelect+Foundation%2C+for+example%2C+provides+curriculum+tutoring%2C+life+skills+advice+and+basic+support+to+pupils+and+their+parents+in+a+number+of+communities+in+Johannesburg.+We+spend+10%25+of+all+pre-tax+profits+on+school+fees+and+basic+expenses+such+as+food+and+transport+for+these+kids.+It+might+seem+like+a+small+contribution+when+taken+in+context+of+the+country%26rsquo%3Bs+dire+needs%2C+but+for+those+families+who+receive+the+benefits%2C+it+means+the+world.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAs+the+economy+moves+from+primary+and+secondary-based+to+tertiary+based%2C+opportunities+for+unskilled+and+semi-skilled+workers+will+decrease.+Many+citizens+aspire+to+a+university+education%2C+seeing+it+as+a+cure-all+for+unemployment.+But+it%26rsquo%3Bs+becoming+increasingly+evident+that+a+back-to-basics+approach+is+needed%3A+a+strong+focus+on+equipping+South+Africans+with+a+solid+education+from+the+ground+up%2C+particularly+when+it+comes+to+literacy+and+numeracy.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EYouth+must+also+be+encouraged+to+complete+their+schooling+by+providing+them+with+a+quality+learning+experience.+As+for+tertiary+education%2C+youth+who+choose+to+study+so-called+scarce+skills%2C+like+maths+and+science%2C+will+have+the+edge+in+the+job+market.+To+help+this+process%2C+we+sit+on+university+advisory+boards+to+help+ensure+that+tertiary+education+and+industry+are+aligned.+More+than+30%25+of+our+current+staff+base+joined+as+graduates+with+no+prior+work+experience.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EGovernment+and+business+need+to+work+together+to+improve+the+employment+situation.+Government+has+the+scale+to+reach+the+young+and+unemployed+and+make+the+long-term+commitment+needed+to+educate+our+children.+The+business+community+knows+which+skills+are+needed+and+what+it+takes+to+make+someone+employable.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThere+is+a+mismatch+between+formal-sector+industry+expectations+and+the+understanding+of+first-time+workers+in+terms+of+professionalism%2C+specifically%2C%26nbsp%3Btimekeeping%2C+etiquette%2C+accountability.+Many+youth+also+believe+that+rising+through+the+ranks+is+effortless.+They+are+unprepared+to+start+at+the+bottom+and+work+their+way+up.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMore+businesses+should+also+start+focusing+on+training+talented+people+who+lack+skills+and+experience%2C+rather+than+poaching+experienced+employees+from+other+companies.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHowever%2C+businesses+need+support+to+do+this.+By+improving+subsidies%2C+tax+incentives%2C+BBBEE+initiatives+as+well+as+a+loosening+of+laws+that+impede+hiring+in+small+businesses%2C+the+government+can+encourage+companies+to+support+skills+development+and+job+creation%2C+particularly+for+black+South+Africans.+There+are+a+number+of+programmes+that+can+assist+with+this%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Encourage+businesses+to+provide+input+into+the+way+schools+are+run.+Using+expertise+gained+from+years+in+the+private+sector%2C+many+businesses+have+the+capability+to+provide+effective+support+structures+to+schools+to+transform+their+management+capabilities+and+make+a+real+difference.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Campaign+for+people+to+pursue+teaching+careers%2C+improve+teaching+salaries%2C+while+investing+in+improving+current+teachers%26rsquo%3B+skills%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Assist+companies+to+employ+and+train+unskilled+labour+in+a+way+that+makes+sense+for+each+industry%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Support+entrepreneurs+who+create+jobs+for+themselves+and+others%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESmall+business+has+the+greatest+potential+for+large-scale+job+creation.+There+is+a+lot+that+government+can+do+to+create+an+enabling+environment+for+SMEs+to+access+finance+and+training%2C+among+other+things%2C+to+help+them+do+better+business.+However%2C+there+is+also+a+lot+that+business+can+do+to+contribute+to+solving+the+underlying+problems+in+education+and+skills+development.+We+can+only+make+widespread+improvements+if+we+work+together.+This+problem+affects+us+all.%3C%2Fp%3E Girl+code+event+for+Women%E2%80%99s+month %3Cp%3EGirlcode+held+it%26%2339%3Bs+third+annual+event+at+the+beginning+of+August.+The+Hackathon+was+timed+to+coincide+with+Women%26rsquo%3Bs+month+and+is+part+of+a+number+of+initiatives+to+encourage+more+girls+to+take+a+prominent+role+in+the+tech+industry.+This+year%26rsquo%3Bs+event+saw+five+teams+taking+part%2C+and+the+winning+team+was+awarded+R10%2C000+cash+prize.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEvents+like+these+are+a+great+platform+to+promote+inclusivity+and+diversity+in+the+industry.+Although+there+are+still+far+too+few+women+in+the+technology+space%2C+the+Girl+Code+Hackathon+is+a+great+way+to+bring+the+female+tech+community+together+and+give+them+the+chance+to+flex+their+tech+muscles.+The+presentations+at+this+year%26rsquo%3Bs+event+is+proof+that+diversity+breeds+relevant%2C+real-world+innovations.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAll+teams+presented+ideas+that+spoke+directly+to+women%26rsquo%3Bs+needs%3B+from+female+health%2C+to+domestic+violence+and+the+provision+of+sanitary+items+for+underprivileged+girls+in+rural+schools.+The+ideas+got+to+the+heart+of+women%26rsquo%3Bs+issues+in+South+Africa+and+used+technology+in+simple+accessible+forms%2C+to+address+real+needs.+The+winning+team%2C+%26lsquo%3BSupported%26rsquo%3B%2C+pitched+an+alert+app+for+women+facing+domestic+violence.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMost+remarkable+was+the+intuitive+focus+on+women%26rsquo%3Bs+issues+and+the+development+of+real+world+solutions.+A+number+of+the+ideas+presented+were+highly+functional+and+have+the+potential+to+offer+immediate+benefits+to+society.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+Hackathon+took+place+over+24+hours+but+despite+the+competitive+element%2C+participants+were+keen+to+share+their+knowledge+with+one+another%3B+across+team+divides+in+some+instances.+It+is+community+events+like+these+that+demonstrate+the+power+of+women+inspiring+women.+Ultimately%2C+the+participants+just+want+to+share+their+knowledge+in+order+to+generate+the+best+idea+for+society.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEntelect+is+proud+to+support+these+initiatives+and+serving+the+larger+development+community+through+its+attendance%2C+sponsorships+and+hosting+of+tech+related+events.+We+look+forward+to+many+more+in+the+future.%3C%2Fp%3E Entelect+takes+its+DevDay+to+the+public %3Cp%3EThe+event+was+part+showcase%2C+part+science+show%2C+part+geek+club%2C+part+maker+club%2C+offering+a+range+of+lightening+talks+on+cutting-edge+technologies+as+well+as+a+variety+of+interactive+exhibition+stands+where+people+could+discover+the+latest+creative+innovations+in+technology.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDevDay+was+the+brainchild+of+Entelect+software+and+the+first+event+took+place+in+2014.+Since+then+it+has+grown+well-beyond+the+company+and+into+something+for+the+broader+community.+This+DevDay+took+the+concept+one+step+further+and+provided+the+South+African+community+with+a+platform+to+showcase+their+innovations.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26ldquo%3BThe+initial+purpose+of+DevDay+was+to+give+our+employees+an+opportunity+to+explore+aspects+of+the+industry+that+they+might+not+get+exposed+to+in+their%26nbsp%3Bday%26nbsp%3Bjob%2C+and+to+showcase+their+technology-based+interests.+However%2C+the+success+of+the+event+internally+showed+us+its+immense+worth+to+the+community+as+a+whole+and+so+we+decided+to+open+it+to+the+public.%26rdquo%3B+Explains+Sheldon+Lyne%2C+General+Manger%2C+Operations%2C+Entelect.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+keynote+speaker+for+the+event+was+Uncle+Bob+who%2C+in+the+last+40+years%2C+has+worked+in+various+capacities+on+literally+hundreds+of+software+projects.+In+2001%2C+he+initiated+the+meeting+of+the+group+that+created+Agile+Software+Development+from+Extreme+Programming+techniques+and+served+as+the+first+chairman+of+the+Agile+Alliance.%26nbsp%3B+He+is+also+a+leading+member+of+the+Worldwide+Software+Craftsmanship+Movement%2C+Clean+Code%3B+is+a+regular+speaker+at+international+conferences+and+trade+shows%3B+and+is+the+founder%2C+CEO%2C+and+president+of+Uncle+Bob+Consulting%2C+LLC+and+Object+Mentor+Incorporated.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHis+presentation+at+DevDay+was+centred+around+the+theme+of+encouraging+Professionalism+in+the+software+industry%2C+specifically+talking+on+the+topic+of+Estimations.+According+to+Uncle+Bob%2C+the+vast+majority+of+software+developers+have+yet+to+learn+the+practices+and+disciplines+that+constitute+professional+behavior.+In+his+talk+he+focused+on+the+practice+of+estimation+and+how+these+can+be+better+managed+by+software+developers.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOther+speakers+at+DevDay+2016+included%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Gail+Shaw+looking+at+what+Big+Data+is%2C+and+isn%26rsquo%3Bt%2C+and+how+the+meaning+of+the+term+has+changed+over+time.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+House4Hack+presented+on+its+%26lsquo%3BFive+phun+projects+at+House4Hack+using+the+Raspberry+Pi%3A+PiScope%2C+3d+printing+with+LCARS%2C+WifiBroadCast%2C+FPV+Cars+and+PiFM.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Kristina+Georgieva%26nbsp%3Btalking+on+what+convolutional+neural+networks+are%2C+how+are+they+used+and+what+those+in+the+industry+could+use+to+play+around+with+them.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Evan+Knowles+presentation+was+titled%2C+%26lsquo%3BMore+than+one+way+to+skin+a+QR%26rsquo%3B+and+everything+you+ever+wanted+to+know+about+QR.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Philip+Robinson%2C+who+went+into+detail+about+the+technology+used+and+development+process+of+an+interactive+LED+art+installation+built%2C+from+scratch%2C+for+Afrikaburn+2015.+His+talk+included+a+breakdown+of+the+design+and+manufacture+of+the+custom+electronics+built+for+the+installation%2C+the+construction+of+the+artwork+itself+and+the+realities+of+bringing+a+fancy+toy+into+the+middle+of+the+desert.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Duncan+Gillies+and+Nicolle+Garber+discussed+data+science+techniques+and+approaches+while+using+a+BI+and+visualization+tool+to+simplify+the+methodology+for+non-technical+users.+In+an+interesting+twist+he+used+IMBD%26rsquo%3Bs+movie+data+set+to+try+cluster+and+predict+a+variety+of+metrics.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Dino+Fizzotti+whose+talk+was+titled+%26ldquo%3B%26rsquo%3BBlink+the+LED%26rsquo%3B+right%3F%26rdquo%3B+covered+how+he+learnt+to+write+software%2C+from+making+hardware+and+developed+his+use+his+16shades+project.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Pieter+Koornhof%2C+who%2C+in+his+lightning+talk%2C+looked+at+why+developers+should+consider+working+code+in+production%2C+maintainable+code%2C+and+having+fun%2C+the+three+most+important+things+in+their+normal+day-to-day.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAs+well+as+a+variety+of+talks%2C+there+were+a+number+of+interactive+exhibition+stands.+Both+House4hack+and+Sterkinekor+contribute+to+the+interactive+exhibition+with+their+stands+which+were+greatly+appreciated+by+everyone+there.+Alongside+this%2C+there+were+LED+lights%2C+a+3D+printer%2C+a+code-off%2C+a+game+jam%2C+board+games+and+a+whole+bunch+of+other+cool+tech-centric+and+interactive+stands.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26ldquo%3BAt+Entelect%2C+we+believe+that+communities+can+be+a+powerful+place+to+keep+learning+and+stay+ahead+of+the+curve.+The+stronger+and+more+diverse+a+community+network%2C+the+greater+chance+we+engineers+and+developers+have+to+remain+relevant+in+such+a+fast-paced+sector.%26rdquo%3B+Says+Lyne.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26ldquo%3BAs+developers+and+leaders+in+the+industry%2C+we+need+to+take+ownership+to+drive+these+initiatives+because+we+have+so+much+knowledge+to+share+and+so+many+upcoming+developers.+There+is+a+shortfall+in+good+developers+in+South+Africa+but+no+shortage+of+jobs+for+great+developers.+Events+like+these+are+designed+to+help+bridge+this+gap+and+grow+the+industry+to+its+full+potential.%26rdquo%3B+Concludes+Lyne.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E TempDB+%26+Query+Store+at+this+year%E2%80%99s+Pass+Summit %3Cp%3EAnother+year%2C+another+October+trip+to+Seattle.+As+the+rain+falls+across+the+city%2C+database+professionals+descend+upon+the+Downtown+area+for+the+annual+Pass+Summit.+The+Pass+Summit+is+one+of+the+biggest+database+conferences+in+the+world%2C+offering+industry-leading+speakers%2C+in-depth+training%2C+technical+insights%2C+and+is+attended+by+data+novices+and+pros+alike.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+year%2C+I%26rsquo%3Bm+presenting+two+sessions+at+the+Pass+Summit%3A+TempDB+and+Query+Store.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+first+is+a+deep+dive+into+TempDB%2C+looking+at+what+uses+TempDB+and+why.+Then+looking+at+two+kinds+of+contention+that+can+be+seen+with+TempDB%3B+IO+contention+and+allocation+contention.+IO+contention+comes+from+driving+the+IO+subsystem+harder+than+it+is+capable+of%2C+resulting+in+slow+response+when+reading+or+writing+to+disk.+Whereas%2C+Allocation+contention+comes+from+SQL%26rsquo%3Bs+file+structures%2C+and+occurs+when+tables+are+being+created+at+a+high+frequency%2C+resulting+in+processes+waiting+to+access+key+allocation+pages+in+the+database.+The+two+different+forms+of+contention+require+very+different+approaches+to+resolving+them%2C+and+mis-identifying+the+problem+can+result+in+a+lot+of+wasted+time.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+second+presentation+I%26rsquo%3Bm+giving+is+on+the+Query+Store%2C+a+new+feature+in+SQL+server+2016+that+promises+to+change+the+way+query+performance+monitoring+is+done.+This+presentation+looks+at+how+Query+Store+is+configured%2C+how+it+works%2C+and+shows+how+to+debug+a+query+performance+regression+using+the+Query+Store%26rsquo%3Bs+built+in+reports.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+addition%2C+a+group+of+MVPs+are+putting+on+a+1-day+%26lsquo%3Bfreecon%26rsquo%3B+on+the+Monday+before+Pass+Summit%2C+for+those+who+aren%26rsquo%3Bt+attending+a+preconference+session+but+still+want+to+spend+the+day+learning.+I%26rsquo%3Bm+presenting+there+as+well%2C+specifically%2C+a+session+on+misunderstood+wait+stats+and+why+some+waits+are+not+as+concerning+as+they+appear+to+be.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E Entelect+awarded+for+the+third+year+in+Deloitte+Best+Company+Survey %3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEntelect+awarded+for+the+third+year+in+Deloitte+Best+Company+Survey%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEntelect+have+been+awarded+two+Platinum+Seals+in+the+2016+Deloitte+Best+Company+Survey.+The+seals+were+awarded+for+Best+Company+and+Employee+Engagement.+The+Platinum+seal+was+introduced+in+2016+to+mark+organizational+attractiveness+far+beyond+the+traditional+bronze%2C+silver+and+gold+awards.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+Deloitte+Best+Company+Survey+has+been+conducted+annually+since+2000+and+is+regarded+as+the+pre-eminent+survey+of+its+kind+due+to+its+independence+and+comprehensive+analysis+and+insights.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEntelect+have+chosen+to+participate+in+this+survey+for+the+past+three+years+because+it+provides+a+unique+opportunity+to+engage+in+an+objective+and+transparent+manner+with+our+employees.+The+survey+responses+are+completely+anonymous%2C+and+the+results+report+provides+in-depth%2C+constructive+insights+that+enable+the+team+to+introduce+changes+that+have+a+direct+impact+on+our+employees%26rsquo%3B+well-being+and+satisfaction+at+work.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOverall+the+survey+unpacks+four+main+dimensions+through+which+organisational+attractiveness+are+assessed+and+managed%3A+Accomplishment+and+growth%2C+Care+and+feedback%2C+Culture+and+values%2C+and+Fairness+and+integrity.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+the+2016+report%2C+Entelect+achieved+outstanding+results+in+the+following+areas%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Best+Company+Index%3A+Entelect+achieved+77.76%25+where+the+industry+benchmark+is+62.2%25%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Employee+Engagement+Index%3A+81.28%25%2C+where+the+industry+benchmark+is+67.78%25%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAnd%2C%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+86.4%25+of+employees+were+classed+as+positive+contributors+%28i.e.+High+flyers%29+where+the+industry+benchmark+sits+at+only+61%25%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+Best+Company+Index+award+measures+a+company%26rsquo%3Bs+attractiveness+among+its+employees.+It+is+an+expression+of+employee%26rsquo%3Bs+alignment+with+the+organization+and+internal+brand.+Where+organisational+attractiveness+is+considered+a+key+driver+for+employee+engagement.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+Employee+engagement+award+is+a+particularly+important+one+for+Entelect.+Over+the+years%2C+the+company+has+been+built+by+its+employees.+The+culture%2C+the+opportunities+for+growth+and+accomplishment%2C+and+maintaining+the+drive+for+excellent+service+and+professionalism%2C+are+all+features+that+contribute+towards+personal+growth+and+job+satisfaction.+In+the+Best+Company+Survey%2C+this+award+reflects+our+employees%26rsquo%3B+state+of+mind+which+influences+their+work+related+behaviours+and+associated+discretionary+effort.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESome+of+the+other+top+results+across+the+four+dimensions+include%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+93%25+of+respondents+felt+that+in+the+last+year+they%26rsquo%3Bd+had+the+opportunity+to+grow+and+learn%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+94%25+of+employees+believed+that+this+company+cares+about+developing+people+for+long-term+careers%2C+not+just+the+current+job%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+96%25+of+people+answered+that+they+felt+this+organization+attracts+the+best+people%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+94%25+of+respondents+felt+that+there+is+a+feeling+of+trust+throughout+this+organization%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26ldquo%3BThe+level+of+attraction+achieved+by+Entelect+is+an+extraordinary+performance.%26nbsp%3B+Results+of+this+quality+are+very+unusual+and+have+only+been+achieved+in+very+few+organisations.%26rdquo%3B+Leslie+Yuill%2C+Actuarial%2C+Reward+and+Analytics+Lead%2C+Deloitte.+%26ldquo%3BEntelect+have+a+challenge+ahead+to+continually+improve+so+that+they+can+maintain+this+status.+Although+it+is+an+exceptional+challenge%2C+the+results+demonstrate+that+they+have+the+tools+in+play+to+help+them+achieve+this+goal.%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAs+an+organization%2C+we%26rsquo%3Bve+always+been+driven+by+the+belief+that+our+employees+make+this+company+what+it+is.+These+results+are+testament+to+the+commitment+our+employees+put+in+daily%2C+to+ensure+that+the+culture+remains+strong+and+true+to+its+values+of+growth%2C+delivery+and+relationships.+These+results+reflect+that+our+employees+continue+to+feel+a+deep+sense+of+ownership+towards+the+company+and+we+welcome+survey%26rsquo%3Bs+such+as+these+which+provide+us+with+insights+on+ways+we+can+continually+improve.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E Get+Your+Kids+Excited+About+Coding%21 %3Cp%3EWe+are+still+very+much+in+the+midst+of+the+Digital+Revolution.+This+change+to+the+economy+has+pushed+not+only+technology+companies+to+the+forefront%2C+but+also+traditional-industry+companies+who+have+embraced+technology.+Many+South+Africans+still+do+not+consider+a+career+in+IT+a+viable+option+%28%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fentelect.co.za%2FNews%2FDisplayNewsItem.aspx%3Fniid%3D55168%22%3EEducating+and+empowering+the+youth%3C%2Fa%3E%29%2C+but+it%26rsquo%3Bs+clear+that+these+skills+will+become+more+and+more+integral+to+the+growth+of+our+economy+in+the+future.+Who+knows%2C+in+more+developed+economies%2C+coding+might+even+become+as+fundamental+to+early+education+as+literacy+and+mathematics.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESo+how+does+one+spark+a+child%26rsquo%3Bs+interest+in+coding%3F+Fortunately%2C+there+are+a+huge+number+of+apps+and+websites+dedicated+to+this+nowadays.+But+just+leaving+a+child+in+front+of+a+tablet+or+PC+and+hoping+for+the+best+is+unlikely+to+inspire+a+real+interest.+Here+are+some+tips+to+help+them+discover+their+potential%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E1.+Emphasise+the+creative+and+fun+aspects%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESome+of+the+most+satisfying+elements+of+programming+are+the+creative+element+and+the+instant+gratification+behind+it.+Coding+taught+in+a+monotonous+academic+way+often+misses+out+on+those+elements+and+results+in+kids+becoming+overwhelmed+or+indifferent.+Most+children+love+creating+things%2C+and+love+to+see+their+creations+in+action+%26ndash%3B+think+painting+or+Lego.+Look+for+tools+that+encourage+exploration%2C+that+enable+curiosity+%28%26ldquo%3BI+wonder+what+will+happen+if+I+do+this%3F%26rdquo%3B%29+and+allow+the+child+to+actually+see+the+output+of+what+they+have+just+done.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFor+very+young+children%2C+there+are+Apps+such+as+Bit-by-bit+or+Fisher+Price%26rsquo%3Bs+Code-a-pillar%2C+and+for+kids+aged+6-10%2C+tools+like+ScratchJr+%28web-based%29%2C+Daisy+the+Dinosaur+%28iPad%29+and+HopScotch+%28iPad%29+work+really+well.+For+slightly+older+children%2C+Scratch%2C+Lightbot+and+Tynker+%28all+web-based%29+are+great+options+while+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.lego.com%2Fen-us%2Fmindstorms%2F%3Fdomainredir%3Dmindstorms.lego.com%22%3ELego+Mindstorms%3C%2Fa%3E%26nbsp%3Bbring+a+whole+new+feature+to+an+old+classic.+For+a+comprehensive+list+and+reviews+of+each+option%2C+head+here%3A+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.commonsensemedia.org%2Flists%2Fcoding-apps-and-websites%22%3Ecommonsensemedia%3C%2Fa%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EScratch+and+Tynker+also+bring+in+the+gaming+element%2C+which+is+something+many+kids+enjoy.+Imagine+the+pride+involved+with+creating+their+own+computer+game.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E2.+Make+it+social%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EGroup+projects+can+be+even+more+rewarding%2C+and+help+both+the+creative+process+and+ensure+that+there+is+immediate+support+should+a+child+get+stuck.+Look+for+mentors+%26ndash%3B+many+families+will+have+a+developer+in+there+somewhere+who+will+more+than+likely+be+happy+to+assist.+Most+developers+understand+how+important+coding+skills+are+to+our+country%26rsquo%3Bs+future.+A+good+mentor+can+really+make+the+difference+between+a+prolonged+interest+and+becoming+overwhelmed+and+bored.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAlternatively%2C+look+for+local+kids+coding+groups+or+hackathons.+This+is+an+area+where+South+Africa+is+lacking%2C+but+there+are+a+few+out+there.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcode.org%2Feducate%22%3ECode.org%3C%2Fa%3E+is+an+online+platform+that+offers+tutorials+for+elementary+school+level+through+to+high+school+level.+And+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fafricacodeweek.org%2Factivities%2Fonline-courses%2F%22%3EAfrica+Code+week%3C%2Fa%3E+offers+online+courses+for+8-11+year+olds+and+upwards%3B+both+are+designed+to+teach+coding+skills+to+budding+young+programmers.+Locally%2C+Entelect+are+running+a+series+of+Schools+engagement+programmes%2C+where+employees+take+time+to+talk+to+children+at+schools+about+possible+futures+in+coding.+A+number+of+schools+are+also+starting+to+incorporate+coding+into+their+curriculum%2C+so+look+out+for+these+opportunities+where+available.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E3.+Don%26rsquo%3Bt+force+things%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEvery+child+is+different.+Not+all+kids+like+to+paint+or+play+sports+or+read%2C+so+not+every+child+will+like+to+code+either.+Exposing+the+child+to+the+tools%2C+and+showing+them+enough+support+to+let+them+make+their+own+mind+up+is+key.+If+they+don%26rsquo%3Bt+show+immediate+interest%2C+they+at+least+know+what+it%26rsquo%3Bs+all+about+and+may+even+revisit+it+at+a+later+stage+of+their+education.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIntroducing+children+to+programming+can+open+up+paths+for+them+in+the+future+as+these+skills+become+integral+to+the+growth+of+our+economy.+The+skills+they+can+learn+around+critical+thinking%2C+problem+solving+and+creativity+are+likely+to+be+beneficial+in+all+sorts+of+walks+of+life.+The+key+is+to+make+it+enjoyable.+Place+an+emphasis+on+making+it+easy+for+kids+to+create+something%3B+allowing+them+see+and+feel+the+fruits+of+their+labour%2C+and+discover+their+potential.+Fortunately%2C+there+is+an+emergence+of+learning+opportunities+available+to+children%2C+but+don%26rsquo%3Bt+force+kids+to+program+%26ndash%3B+it%26rsquo%3Bs+a+great+skill+to+have%2C+but+by+no+means+is+it+the+only+way+to+succeed+in+this+world%21%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E ormation+regarding+this+Strategic+Alliance%2F+Supplier+Development+initiative.%3C%2Fp%3E Bs+what+makes+the+Entelect+Challenge+so+appealing+to+coders+of+all+levels.%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESecond+place+went+to+Dion+van+Huyssteen%2C+who+was+awarded+R35%2C000+in+prize+bounty.+Van+Huyssteen%26rsquo%3Bs+bot%2C+%26lsquo%3BHeat+Seeking+bot%26rsquo%3B%2C+built+in+C%2B%2B%2C+actually+went+into+the+finals+with+stronger+stats+than+Louw%26rsquo%3Bs+bot%3A+228+wins+out+of+256+matches+and+a+total+of+73%2C310+points.+But%2C+on+the+day%2C+Louw%26rsquo%3Bs+strategy+was+stronger.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EA+word+from+the+winners%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+was+the+third+time+Louw+competed+in+the+Entelect+Challenge.+%26ldquo%3BMy+first+Challenge+was+Pacman%2C+then+Space+Invaders+and+now+Battleships.+For+me%2C+the+best+part+of+the+Challenge+is+to+get+into+the+head+of+your+opponent.+My+strategy+this+year+was+helped+by+the+tournament+stages%3B+so+first%2C+I+built+a+basic+shooting+strategy%2C+then+a+weapons+strategy%2C+then%2C+in+the+third+round%2C+I+had+to+work+out+when+to+use+the+shield.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26ldquo%3BI+figured+out+that+I+needed+to+place+my+bots+statically+in+strategic+locations+and+then+I+needed+to+start+shooting+from+the+outside-in%2C+not+the+inside-out%2C+as+one+would+normally+think+to+do.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26ldquo%3BI+didn%26rsquo%3Bt+do+very+well+in+the+first+two+rounds%2C+so+I+wasn%26rsquo%3Bt+even+expecting+to+get+into+the+finals%2C+but+was+really+surprised+to+win%2C%26rdquo%3B+says+Louw.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESecond+place+winner%2C+Van+Huyssteen%2C+describes+his+bot+strategy%3A+%26ldquo%3BI+started+with+a+standard+heat-seeking+strategy%2C+but+as+the+game+went+on%2C+I+started+applying+modifiers+to+that.+The+initial+idea+was+to+modify+the+heat+maps+with+a+bunch+of+variables%2C+which+I+could+iterate+through+and+automate%2C+but+I+ran+out+of+time.+So%2C+I+ended+up+with+something+that+cleared+the+edges+and+then+worked+its+way+inwards+after+that.%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ETop+awards+all+round%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThird+place+went+to+Anesu+Jairosi%2C+who+says+this+was+the+third+time+he+has+entered+the+Challenge.+%26ldquo%3BI+hate+losing%2C+but+I+love+coding+so+much%2C+so+I%26rsquo%3Bve+entered+three+times+now%2C+since+Pacman.+This+year%2C+my+strategy+was+based+on+probability%2C+specifically+where+competitors+will+place+their+ships.+But+then+I+adapted+this+as+I+realised+a+human+player+will+not+place+their+ship+in+the+middle%2C+so+I+started+aiming+around+the+edges.%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFourth+place+winner%2C+Jaco+Mostert%2C+said%3A+%26ldquo%3BI%26rsquo%3Bve+enjoyed+every+Challenge+I%26rsquo%3Bve+entered%3B+it%26rsquo%3Bs+very+entertaining+just+competing+in+the+Challenge+and+having+the+chance+to+write+the+code.+Personally%2C+I+don%26rsquo%3Bt+get+a+chance+to+do+any+AI+in+my+job+but+it%26rsquo%3Bs+something+I+am+interested+in%2C+so+the+Challenge+allows+me+the+opportunity+to+play+with+AI.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26ldquo%3BIn+the+second+battle%2C+I+focused+on+the+side+of+the+map%2C+and+gauged+the+performance+and+found+my+bot+did+a+lot+better.+For+the+final+battle%2C+I+scaled+it+down+a+bit+to+focus+on+the+inside+a+little+more+but+still+with+a+good+focus+on+the+outside.%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESixth+place+went+to+Wynand+Wolmarans%2C+who+won+The+Battle+of+Tortuga+mini+challenge.+%26ldquo%3BI+quickly+realised+that+a+great+algorithm+alone+will+not+be+enough+to+win+the+Challenge+this+year.+I+spent+a+lot+of+time+tweaking+and+adjusting+my+bot+but+the+most+difficult+part+was+choosing+and+sticking+with+a+strategy+because+it+could+blow+up+in+my+face+at+any+point.+The+secret+to+success+is+starting+with+a+basic+strategy%2C+testing+your+bot+against+it+and+then+letting+your+imagination+take+over.%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+final+rankings+in+the+2017+competition+were+as+follows%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E1st%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3BRyan+Louw%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3BR70%2C000%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E2nd%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+Dion+van+Huyssteen+%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B+R35%2C000%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E3rd%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+Anesu+Jairosi%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3BR25%2C000%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E4th%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+Jaco+Mostert+%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BR25%2C000%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E5th%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+Willie+Theron+%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3 participants+than+last+year.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26ldquo%3BThis+year%2C+the+hackathons+worked+really+well%3B+people+were+not+only+recruiting+and+challenging+others%2C+but+also+helping+others+set+up+their+bots.+Thanks+to+these+hackathons%2C+participants+were+able+to+collaborate+and+compete+on+a+whole+new+level.+We%26rsquo%3Bre+looking+forward+to+taking+some+of+these+concepts+further+next+year%2C%26rdquo%3B+concluded+Ravic.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E %27Colonel+Panic%27+won+this+year%E2%80%99s+Entelect+Challenge+competition%2C+the+finals+of+which+were+played+out+at+rAge+Expo+on+7+October. With+a+wealth+of+experience+in+digital+media%2C+Lars+joined+the+team+in+2011+and+helped+the+company+achieve+explosive+growth.+In+Danish%2C+LEGO+loosely+translates+to+%26amp%3Bquot%3Bplay+well%26amp%3Bquot%3B+%26amp%3Bamp%3B+and+is+the+foundation+of+their+philosophy.+By+rethinking+everything+they+do%2C+LEGO+has+transformed+itself+in+the+eye+of+the+consumer+and+Lars+has+been+at+the+forefront+of+the+latter+part+of+this+transformation.+As+recently+as+2011%2C+LEGO+had+absolutely+no+presence+in+social+media%2C+but+under+his+stewardship%2C+Lars+moved+it+to+one+of+the+leading+brands+in+the+world+on+social+media+in+just+a+few+years.+His+approach+is+to+constantly+challenge+the+status+quo.+A+great+example+of+this+being+when+he+famously+ran+the+%24100+marketing+campaign%2C+forcing+his+team+to+think+outside+traditional+marketing+parameters.+This+approach+has+helped+transform+the+LEGO+brand+at+a+time+in+its+history+when+the+brand+was+recuperating+after+near+failure.+Currently%2C+Lars+is+taking+the+brand+on+another+journey+to+reposition+itself+in+the+value+chain%2C+from+block+builder+to+much+more.+The+83-year-old+Scandinavian+company+from+Billund%2C+Denmark%2C+has+survived+factory+fires%2C+economic+hardship+during+World+War+II%2C+kept+the+company+thriving+through+four+family+generations%2C+and+recovered+from+near+bankruptcy+in+2004.+Nowadays%2C+it+is+nothing+less+than+iconic+and+an+industry+leader+in+innovative+thinking.+We+are+looking+forward+to+spending+time+with+Lars+and+challenging+our+thinking+about+the+status+quo%21 Entelect%E2%80%99s+last+speaker+event+of+the+year+will+be+with+Lars+Silberbauer%2C+Senior+Global+Director+of+social+media+%26+video+at+LEGO+Group. lucky+to+work+with+so+many+businesses+and+it%26rsquo%3Bs+hard+not+to+be+inspired+by+what+we+see%2C%26rdquo%3B+says+Hansjee.+%26ldquo%3BThere+are+people+creating+jobs%2C+training+in+IT+skills%2C+using+technology+to+improve+healthcare%2C+education%2C+financial+literacy.+Our+industry+really+has+a+part+to+play+in+improving+this+country%2C+and+that%26rsquo%3Bs+an+exciting+thing+to+be+part+of%26rdquo%3B.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ECharacteristically%2C+Hansjee+believes+this+award+wouldn%26rsquo%3Bt+be+possible+without+the+work+of+the+extended+team+around+him.+%26ldquo%3BThe+work+we+do+at+Entelect+is+thanks+to+the+exciting+opportunities+presented+to+us+by+our+customers%2C+and+the+team+that+deliver+above+and+beyond+every+day.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26ldquo%3BOrganisations+like+IITPSA+have+also+done+incredible+work+over+the+years+to+grow+the+industry+and+nurture+professionalism+in+IT.+Thanks+to+this%2C%26nbsp%3Bthe+South+African+IT+industry%26nbsp%3Bis+world-class.%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E ith+these+insights%2C%26rdquo%3B+explained+Tomislav+Ravic.+%26ldquo%3BAt+Entelect%2C+we+work+hard+to+ensure+our+culture+and+brand+resonates+with+the+values+of+young+and+dynamic+software+engineers.+These+sentiments+are+exactly+in+line+with+the+kind+of+workplace+people+are+looking+for+these+days.%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%26nbsp%3B+%3Cp%3EPerhaps+most+outstanding+though%2C+is+that+the+vast+majority+of+Entelect%26rsquo%3Bs+employees+are+highly+engaged+and+67%25+of+Entelect%26rsquo%3Bs+employees+are+measured+to+be+in+the+High+Flyers+category+on+the+engagement+matrix.+The+benchmark+is+34%25.+Typically%2C+those+categorised+as+Highly+Engaged+see+a+purpose+in+the+work+they+do+and+feel+that+they+matter+to+their+organisation.+They+have+high+levels+of+pride+in+the+work+they+do+and+are+optimistic+receptive+and+enthusiastic.%3C%2Fp%3E+%26nbsp%3B+%3Cp%3E%26ldquo%3BThis+reflects+the+culture+and+heart+of+our+organisation%2C%26rdquo%3B+says+Ravic.+%26ldquo%3BDaily%2C+our+employees+award+%26lsquo%3BKudos%26rsquo%3B+points+to+each+other+on+our+internal+platforms+in+acknowledgement+of+a+good+job+well+done.+This+has+created+a+positive+culture+driving+purpose+and+achievement%2C+and+we%26rsquo%3Bre+really+happy+to+see+it+come+through+in+the+Deloitte+survey.%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%26nbsp%3B+%3Cp%3EUltimately%2C+the+management+team+at+Entelect+know+that+these+results+are+only+possible+because+of+the+passion+and+effort+each+team+member+contributes+every+day.+%26ldquo%3BSeeing+such+great+scores+across+categories+such+as+Accomplishment+and+Growth+is+because+the+employees+themselves+work+hard+to+create+a+positive+environment+for+their+fellow+employees.%26rdquo%3B+Says+Ravic.%3C%2Fp%3E+%26nbsp%3B+%3Cp%3EEntelect%26rsquo%3Bs+company+values+are%3B+Growth+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+optional%2C+Get+things+done%2C+and+Relationships+and+collaboration+sets+us+apart.%3C%2Fp%3E+%26nbsp%3B+%3Cp%3E%26ldquo%3BThe+results+of+this+survey+show+us+that+our+employees+are+living+these+values+every+day.+This+Platinum+seal+is+testament+to+the+culture+that+our+employees+are+responsible+for.+This+Platinum+Seal+goes+to+every+member+of+Entelect+who+go+above+and+beyond+every+day%2C%26rdquo%3B+concludes+Ravic.%3C%2Fp%3E +It+also+touched+on+some+cultural+aspects+that+Facebook+cultivates+for+better+development+teams.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E4.+You+were+also+a+judge+at+Dev+Week%26rsquo%3Bs+Hackathon+%26ndash%3B+tell+us+about+the+ideas+and+prototypes+competing%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThere+were+some+very+cool+ideas%2C+and+there+were+some+very+practical+ideas.+Some+of+the+teams+wanted+to+build+something+that+wouldn%26%2339%3Bt+necessary+solve+a+burning+need+but+allowed+them+to+tinker+with+new+technology+and+learn.+Other+teams+decided+to+tackle+a+real-world+problem+using+AI%2C+Blockchain%2C%26nbsp%3BAR%2C+or+IoT+technology+to+name+a+few.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+hackathon+only+allowed+teams+24+hours+to+develop+the+solution.+Given+the+time+constraint%2C+the+teams+that+did+best%2C+were+teams+that+focused+on+tackling+a+small+part+of+the+problem+and+prototyping+it+in+the+simplest+way+possible%26hellip%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOne+team+tried+to+tackle+the+problem+of+slouching+in+front+of+your+desk+by+using+an+Intel+depth+perception+camera.+They+got+a+prototype+working%2C+and+personally+I+appreciated+that+since+slouching+is+a+problem+I+try+to+fix+as+well.+Another%26nbsp%3Bused%26nbsp%3BOculus+Rift+VR+to+make+remote+meetings+more+personal+by+placing+people+in+the+%26lsquo%3Bsame+room%26rsquo%3B+using+virtual+and+augmented+reality.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAnother+team+created+an+open+source+JavaScript+plugin+for+cryptocurrency+websites+to+better+standardise+the+way+their+charts+represent+currencies+for+better+interaction+by+users.+And+another+tinkered+with+IoT+sensors+to+better+measure+the+contents+of+physical+containers+and+monitor+it+via+a+real-time+dashboard.+Lastly%2C+a+team+created+a+map-based+restaurant+suggestion+app+with+a+twist+-+it+only+shows+you+the+worst+restaurants+in+a+category%21%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThere+were+no+rankings+issued+but+various+companies+sponsored+prize+money+and+some+categories+included+using+an+SDK+from+that+company.+Here+is+a+list+of+the+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.developerweek.com%2Fdeveloperweek-hackathon-winners%2F%22%3Ewinners%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E5.+Tell+us+some+things+you%26rsquo%3Bll+be+bringing+back+to+your+dev+teams+in+South+Africa%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFor+one%2C+I+can+say+that+South+Africa+has+talented+developers+that+are+on+par+with+Silicon+Valley+in+terms+of+stature+and+the+technology+we+use.+I+learnt+a+lot+from+talks+I+attended%2C+but+mostly+from+people+I+spoke+to%3B+I+plan+on+%26lsquo%3Bupping+our+game%26rsquo%3B+in+terms+of+cultivating+the+development+community+in+South+Africa%2C+and+better+scaling+and+growing+our+teams+at+Entelect.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EI%26%2339%3Bve+realised+that+the+culture+we+have+at+Entelect+is+really+special+-+something+that+can+easily+be+compared+to+companies+in+Silicon+Valley%2C+and+I%26%2339%3Bd+like+to+take+it+beyond+that.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E ist+in+building+the+business+in+a+part+time+capacity.+%26ldquo%3BWe+expect+the+transition+to+be+smooth+as+some+of+the+software+engineers+at+Fixx+iT%2C+are+in+fact+South+African%26rdquo%3B+says+Shashi+Hansjee.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Through+this+purchase%2C+Entelect+is+taking+another+step+towards+achieving+its+goal+of+becoming+the+world%26rsquo%3Bs+best+software+engineering+and+solutions+company.+The+company+continues+to+strive+to+prove+that+software+development+is+not+synonymous+with+non-delivery%2C+and+that+it+is+possible+to+have+a+great+culture+without+sacrificing+delivery+and+customer+satisfaction%2C+while+being+both+successful+and+doing+good+for+people.+%26ldquo%3BWe+want+to+lead+the+way+in+being+different+and+making+a+difference%26rdquo%3B+says+Hansjee.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+This+deal+creates+the+opportunity+to+attract+more+foreign+income+into+South+Africa+by+connecting+customers+in+Europe+to+the+core+team.+It+also+gives+Entelect+people+the+opportunity+to+explore+new+cultures+and+experiences+by+transferring+between+offices+and+will+give+current+and+prospective+customers+access+to+global+thinking+and+talent.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26ldquo%3BOur+team+at+Fixx+is+extremely+proud+of+what+we%26rsquo%3Bve+achieved+since+we+launched+in+2005%2C+and+we+are+excited+to+see+what+the+future+holds+with+Entelect%2C%26rdquo%3B+says+Fixx+iT%26rsquo%3Bs+founder%2C+Ronald+Kuyper.+%26ldquo%3BTheir+values+completely+align+with+ours+and+we+look+forward+to+embracing+the+Entelect+mission%2C+working+together+to+serve+our+customer%26rsquo%3Bs+needs%2C+and+opening+up+growth+opportunities+for+all+our+people+across+our+office+locations.%26rdquo%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Globally%2C+there+is+a+growing+need+for+enterprise+software+engineering+services%2C+including+custom+data+solutions+and+experienced+agile+development+teams%2C+to+create+solutions+that+allow+companies+to+serve+the+needs+of+their+customers+and+their+people.+The+competitive+landscape+for+firms+to+attract+and+retain+the+best+talent+and+give+their+people+the+greatest+opportunities+for+growth+is+challenging.+With+the+addition+of+Fixx+iT+to+the+existing+teams+in+South+Africa+and+New+Zealand%2C+Entelect+is+uniquely+positioned+in+the+Sub-Saharan+Africa+market+to+provide+industry+leading%2C+end-to-end+technology+services+and+solutions+to+customers+around+the+world+and+opportunities+for+software+professionals%2C+to+experience+global+projects+and+cultures.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EAbout+Fixx+iT%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Fixx+iT+is+a+software+engineering+and+professional+services+company+based+in+Zeist%2C+Netherlands.+They+build+the+bridge+between+ideas+and+reality+by+taking+on+the+challenges+of+everyday+business%2C+by+providing+consulting+services%2C+guidance+on+custom+projects%2C+and+assisting+in+the+deployment+of+specialist+skills+into+existing+large-scale+projects.%26nbsp%3B+Fixx+iT%26rsquo%3Bs+multi-talented+team+has+experience+in+delivering+solutions+using+solid+development+and+architectural+methodologies+on+platforms+and+technologies+such+as+cloud%2C+enterprise%2C+SaaS%2C+and+security.%26nbsp%3B+Working+closely+with+businesses+by+means+of+collaboration%2C+they+develop+solutions+that+suit+your+business.+Their+approach+is+based+on+in-depth+analyses+of+your+business+processes%2C+infrastructure+and+requirements+gathering.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EAbout+Entelect%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Entelect+understands+the+true+impact+that+non-delivery+has+on+reputation+and+in+the+form+of+missed+opportunities.+Their+teams+have+a+proven+track+record+of+delivery+in+all+aspects+of+creating+technology+solutions%2C+from+strategy+and+design+to+development%2C+testing+and+rollout.+Entelect+support+great+modern+businesses+in+every+industry+who+are+differentiating+themselves+through+technology.+With+an+agile+and+pragmatic+approach%2C+honed+over+delivering+hundreds+of+concurrent+projects+successfully%2C+they+partner+with+you+and+offer+end-to-end+technology+services+and+solutions+through+a+set+of+best-practice%2C+team-based+engagement+models+that+help+their+customers+go+from+good+to+great.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.entelect.co.za%22%3E%3Cstrong%3Ewww.entelect.co.za%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fp%3E ir+bot+is+fairing.+After+each+playoff+event%2C+a+new+strategy+component+will+be+launched%2C+for+instance%2C+the+ability+to+introduce+new+weapons+or+cloaking+devices.+Thereby+upping+the+competition+by+adding+in+more+bot+strategies.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+year+the+Entelect+Challenge+University+cup+will+be+hosted+for+the+second+time.+The+University+Cup+is+a+one-day+hackathon+where+teams+of+students+from+various+universities+around+the+country+are+challenged+to+solve+a+coding+problem.+With+it+we+hope+to+give+our+future+technology+leaders+a+chance+to+flex+their+brain+muscles+and+participate+in+something+fun+and+rewarding%21%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAs+before+the+Player+Portal+will+be+available+to+contestants+to+test+their+bots%2C+and+the+community+forum+for+contestants+to+chat+about+their+builds+and+discuss+ideas.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26ldquo%3BWhat+a+lot+of+people+don%26rsquo%3Bt+realize+is+that+competing+successfully+in+the+Entelect+Challenge+is+not+about+having+the+smartest%2C+most+supersonic+bot.+It+is+actually+all+about+player+strategies.+Your+bot+may+be+really+simple+in+design%2C+but+its+strategy+could+be+highly+effective.%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EPrize+money+for+this+years%26rsquo%3B+event+is+R200+000+which+will+be+divided+across+the+mini-playoffs+series+and+finals%2C+with+the+biggest+component+awarded+at+the+Finals+at+Comic+Con+Africa.+First+prize+will+be+R70+000%2C+R35+000+will+go+to+second+place+and+third+place+will+be+awarded+R25+000.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEntelect+runs+the+Challenge+every+year+as+a+fun+way+to+bring+the+software+community+together%2C+but+also+to+demystify+the+world+of+coding+and+AI.+%26ldquo%3BWe+want+as+many+people+to+enter+this+competition+as+possible+and+discover+a+whole+new+world+of+machine+learning+and+AI%2C%26rdquo%3B+says+Hurbans.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMachine+learning+is+a+term+that+is+often+used+interchangeably+with+AI+but+they+are+actually+very+different.%26nbsp%3B+Machine+learning+is+a+type+of+AI+that+provides+computers+with+the+ability+to+learn+without+being+explicitly+programmed+by+focusing+on+the+development+of+computer+programs+that+can+change+when+exposed+to+new+data.%26nbsp%3B+By+comparison%2C+AI+is+the+simulation+of+human+intelligence+processes+by+machines%2C+especially+computer+systems.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhile+AI+is+seeing+an+exciting+growth%2C+Machine+Learning+is+all+around+us+and+changing+the+way+we+live+and+work.+There+is+no+doubt+that+jobs+of+the+future+will+rely+on+Machine+Learning+to+a+greater+or+lesser+extent.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+Entelect+challenge+shouldn%26rsquo%3Bt+be+viewed+as+something+that+only+super+coding+geeks+can+enter.+This+competition+is+designed+for+anyone+with+a+basic+level+of+programming+who+is+interested+in+the+world+of+machine+learning+and+the+future+of+software.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+year+we+expect+a+wide+variety+of+people+from+different+backgrounds+to+enter+which+is+going+to+make+the+player+strategies+really+exciting.+Who+could+win+is+anyone%26rsquo%3Bs+guess.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E Top+international+HR+Awards+announces+Entelect+the+2019+winner %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FHRAwards.jpg%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Last+night+at+the+5th+annual+Future+of+HR+Awards%2C+southern+Africa%26rsquo%3Bs+most+outstanding%2C+inspiring+and+effective+leaders+in+human+capital+management%2C+HR+innovation+and+HR+tech+were+honoured.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEntelect+were+announced+the+winner+for+Best+Graduate+Development+Programme.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFollowing+the+Future+of+HR+Summit%2C+the+awards+brought+together+CEOs%2C+CTOs%2C+HR+directors+and+personnel+from+South+Africa+and+beyond+to+celebrate+and+explore+the+hyper-responsive%2C+agile+workplace+of+the+future.+Having+received+a+bevy+of+outstanding+entries+for+both+organisations+and+individuals%2C+this+year%26rsquo%3Bs+winners+represent+the+very+best+of+the+best+in+the+South+African+HR+industry.%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+event+seeks+to+celebrate+industry+leaders+achieving+exceptional+standards+of+people+management+by+showcasing+strategies+that+make+a+direct+impact+on+business+performance.+These+innovative+practices+set+new+standards+for+the+HR+industry%2C+reshaping+HR+into+a+cutting-edge+strategic+business+component.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ECommenting+on+Entelect%26rsquo%3Bs+achievement+last+night%2C+Sheldon+Lyne+said%3A+%26ldquo%3BWe+are+honoured+to+have+received+this+award.+Some+of+our+Senior+Managers%2C+Team+Leads%2C+Tech+Leads+and+Solutions+Architects+joined+Entelect+as+Graduates+%26ndash%3B+so+taking+in+graduates+is+at+the+very+core+of+who+we+are.+This+programme+is+one+we+have+kept+refining+over+the+years%2C+and+we+are+proud+that+our+industry-leading+efforts+in+this+space+have+been+recognised.%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFor+years+Entelect+has+run+South+Africa%26rsquo%3Bs+leading+Graduate+programme.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+We+take+on+some+of+South+Africa%26rsquo%3Bs+brightest+young+university+graduates%2C+who+join+us+with+a+mix+of+engineering%2C+science+and+commerce+degrees.+They+get+to+participate+in+this+training+programme%2C+structured+to+accelerate+their+careers+%26ndash%3B+giving+them+a+clear+advantage+over+their+university+peers.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+specifically+designed+to+immerse+Software+Engineering+and+Business+Analyst+graduates+into+real-world+software+development.+By+the+time+the+graduates+have+moved+through+the+programme%2C+they+would+have+been+exposed+to+several+languages+and+cutting-edge+frameworks%2C+which+are+actively+being+used+in+the+industry.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Ftheloreof.entelect.co.za%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3Ewww.culture.entelect.co.za%3C%2Fa%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Ftheloreof.entelect.co.za%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3Ehttps%3A%2F%2Ftheloreof.entelect.co.za%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHear+about+what+our+previous+graduates+had+to+say+about+the+Graduate+Program+in+the+videos+below%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Ctable+align%3D%22left%22+border%3D%220%22+cellpadding%3D%2210%22+cellspacing%3D%2210%22+style%3D%22width%3A+800px%3B%22%3E+%3Ctbody%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3Ctd%3E%3Ciframe+allow%3D%22accelerometer%3B+autoplay%3B+encrypted-media%3B+gyroscope%3B+picture-in-picture%22+allowfullscreen%3D%22%22+frameborder%3D%220%22+height%3D%22400%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fembed%2FUGDP5Ji70u8%22+width%3D%22800%22%3E%3C%2Fiframe%3E%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3Ctd%3E%3Ciframe+allow%3D%22accelerometer%3B+autoplay%3B+encrypted-media%3B+gyroscope%3B+picture-in-picture%22+allowfullscreen%3D%22%22+frameborder%3D%220%22+height%3D%22400%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fembed%2Fe5cvW62xCYM%22+width%3D%22800%22%3E%3C%2Fiframe%3E%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3Ctd%3E%3Ciframe+allow%3D%22accelerometer%3B+autoplay%3B+encrypted-media%3B+gyroscope%3B+picture-in-picture%22+allowfullscreen%3D%22%22+frameborder%3D%220%22+height%3D%22400%2 The+2019+Entelect+Challenge+University+Cup+Winners+Announced %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FUniversityCupWinners.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EThe+2019+Entelect+Challenge+University+Cup+Winners+Announced%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWorms%2C+this+years%26rsquo%3B+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fchallenge.entelect.co.za%2F%22%3EEntelect+Challenge%3C%2Fa%3E+finals+are+almost+upon+us.+The+grand+finale+will+yet+again+take+place+at+Comic+Con+Africa+%28%40AfricaComicCon%29.+Over+60+000+people+are+expected+to+attend%2C+so+if+you+plan+on+making+your+way+through+on+the+21st+of+September%2C+come+find+us+on+the+centre+stage+in+Hall+5+at+the+Gallagher+Convention+Centre+at+11am%21%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26ldquo%3BEach+year+we+aim+to+build+the+Challenge+around+a+popular+game+theme%2C+and+this+year%26rsquo%3Bs+theme+was+Worms%2C%26rdquo%3B+says+Rishal+Hurbans%2C+Team+Lead+of+the+Entelect+Challenge.+%26ldquo%3BThe+idea+behind+the+chosen+theme+was+not+just+to+make+it+appealing+to+those+of+us+who+love+gaming%2C+but+to+also+choose+a+game+with+rules+that+are+simple%2C+so+that+anyone+with+a+basic+understanding+of+programming+can+enter.%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFollowing+the+success+of+the+main+Entelect+Challenge+event%2C+Entelect+introduced+the+Entelect+Challenge+University+Cup+in+2018+and+held+it+for+the+second+time+this+year.+The+University+Cup+is+a+one-day+hackathon+where+student+teams+from+various+universities+around+the+country+are+challenged+to+solve+a+coding+problem.+The+aim+of+the+University+Cup+was+to+give+our+future+technology+leaders+a+chance+to+flex+their+brain+muscles%2C+and+participate+in+something+fun+and+rewarding.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe+are+proud+to+announce+the+winners+of+the+2019+University+Cup%3A+the+University+of+Cape+Town%26rsquo%3Bs+Andrew+McKracken%2C+Bronson+Rudner+and+Emile+Tredoux+from+team+The+Enigmatic+Bees+of+Anarchy%21+Titanium+Purple+Tractors+also+from+the+University+of+Cape+Town+came+in+at+second+place+and+team+%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FHappy_Emoji.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+20px%3B+height%3A+20px%3B%22+%2F%3E+from+Stellenbosch+University+came+in+at+third.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEntelect+will+continue+to+run+the+annual+University+Cup+to+not+only+bring+different+universities+and+students+together%2C+but+also+to+demystify+the+world+of+coding+and+AI.+%26ldquo%3BWe+want+as+many+students+as+possible+to+enter+this+competition%2C+and+help+them+to+discover+a+whole+new+world+of+machine+learning+and+artificial+intelligence%2C%26rdquo%3B+says+Bianca+McFadyen%2C+Marketing+Manager+at+Entelect.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+challenge+is+not+only+aimed+at+certain+groups+of+students.+It+is+designed+for+anyone+with+a+basic+level+of+programming+who+is+interested+in+the+world+of+machine+learning+and+the+future+of+software.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIf+you+want+to+enter+next+year%2C+here+is+how%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BLog+into+the+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fhttps%3A%2F%2Fchallenge.entelect.co.za%2Flogin%22%3EEntelect+Challenge%3C%2Fa%3E+player+portal%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BRegister+for+the+University+Cup+tournament%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BWe+will+open+team+creation+closer+the+hackathon%2C+but+find+some+friends+to+be+part+of+your+team+for+2020%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BYou+will+receive+email+alerts+when+team+creation+opens%2C+when+the+practice+problem+is+released%2C+and+info+with+the+exact+date+and+logistics+for+the+University+Cup+event%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.culture.entelect.co.za%22%3Ewww.culture.entelect.co.za%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FEntelectChallenge2019.JPG%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E Willie+Theron+wins+the+2019+Entelect+Challenge %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FEntelectChallengeBanner.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+800px%3B+height%3A+420px%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWillie+Theron%2C+the+founder+of+CyberDevs%2C+and+a+web+developer+by+profession+was+announced+as+the+winner+of+this+year%26rsquo%3Bs+Entelect+Challenge.+The+finals+were+played+out+at+Comic+Con+Africa+on+the+21st+of+September+with+hundreds+of+fans+supporting.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Theron%26rsquo%3Bs+bot%2C+%26lsquo%3BMetamorp%26rsquo%3B%2C+built+in+JavaScript%2C+competed+in+all+four+rounds+of+this+year%26rsquo%3Bs+Challenge+and+stormed+to+first+place%2C+winning+him+R70%2C000.+Willie+has+been+entering+the+Entelect+Challenge+for+years+and+was+thrilled+to+finally+come+out+on+top%21%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBased+on+the+hugely+popular+classic+%26lsquo%3BWorms%26rsquo%3B+game%2C+the+2019+Entelect+Challenge+brought+together+novice+coders+and+experienced+professionals+as+they+competed+against+each+other+by+coding+an+artificial+intelligence+%28AI%29+player%2C+or+bot%2C+to+challenge+other+bots.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ECoding+and+AI+hobbyists+and+enthusiasts+have+spent+the+last+six+months+building+their+bots%2C+with+the+goal+of+winning+their+share+of+the+R200%2C000+prize+bounty.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EThe+winning+strategy%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Theron%26rsquo%3Bs+bot+went+into+the+finals+with+strong+stats%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B+121+wins+out+of+125+matches+played%3B+and%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B+284%2C915+points+won+up+to+the+final+match%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26ldquo%3BHe+had+one+of+the+strongest+player+strategies+in+the+competition+this+year%2C%26rdquo%3B+says+Renette+Ros+and+Edwin+Fullard%2C+Project+Leads+for+the+Entelect+Challenge.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26ldquo%3BCompeting+successfully+in+the+Challenge+is+not+just+about+the+best+code%2C%26rdquo%3B+says+Entelect%26rsquo%3Bs+Marketing+Manager%2C+Bianca+McFadyen.+%26ldquo%3BIt%26rsquo%3Bs+about+the+players%26rsquo%3B+strategies.+Your+bot+may+be+really+simple+in+its+design+but+its+strategy+could+be+highly+effective.+That%26rsquo%3Bs+what+makes+the+Entelect+Challenge+so+appealing+to+coders+of+all+levels.%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EThe+final+rankings+in+the+2019+Worms+competition+were+as+follows%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Ctable+border%3D%220%22+cellpadding%3D%225%22+cellspacing%3D%225%22+style%3D%22width%3A+300px+%21important%3B%22%3E+%3Ctbody%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3Ctd%3E1st%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3Ctd%3EWillie+Theron%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3Ctd%3ER70%2C000%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3Ctd%3E2nd%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3Ctd%3EMarvin+Thobejane%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3Ctd%3ER35%2C000%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3Ctd%3E3rd%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3Ctd%3EJean-Paul+Conceicao%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3Ctd%3ER25%2C000%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3Ctd%3E4th%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3Ctd%3EAndre+Makaal%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3Ctd%3ER25%2C000%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3Ctd%3E5th%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3Ctd%3EMallin+Moolman%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3Ctd%3ER10%2C000%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3Ctd%3E6th%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3Ctd%3EGawie+Jooste%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3Ctd%3ER10%2C000%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3Ctd%3E7th%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3Ctd%3ELeon+Wessels%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3Ctd%3ER10%2C000%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3Ctr%3E+%3Ctd%3E8th%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3Ctd%3ERiaan+Nel%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3Ctd%3ER10%2C000%3C%2Ftd%3E+%3C%2Ftr%3E+%3C%2Ftbody%3E+%3C%2Ftable%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ENot+everyone+has+to+be+a+coding+wizard%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+This+year%2C+the+competition+ran+the+same+to+allow+relatively+low-level+coders+the+opportunity+to+enter.+There+were+three+tournament+battles%2C+each+one+increasing+the+level+of+complexity.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26ldquo%3BThe+staggered+strategy+component+that+we+introduced+to+the+Challenge+continues+to+be+well+received+by+the+players%2C+as+it+gives+them+a+chance+to+refine+and+test+their+bots+before+entering+the+playoffs%2C%26rdquo%3B+said+McFadyen.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EAbout+Entelect%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+We+are+a+tribe+of+technology+professionals+who+appreciate+the+skills+we+bring+to+the+table%2C+help+grow+each+other%2C+deliver+awesome+solutions+using+best+practices+and+have+a+good+time+doing+it.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EAbout+the+Entelect+Challenge+University+Cup%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+Entelect+Challenge+University+Cup+is+a+one-day+hackathon+where+teams+of+students+from+various+universities+around+the+country+are+challenged+to+solve+a+coding+problem.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+We+have+created+this+unique+initiative+specifically+for+students+as+we+noticed+that+there+is+a+lot+of+interest+in+the+main+challenge+but+time+commitments+can+be+problematic+given+academic+schedules.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+We+hope+to+give+our+future+technology+leaders+a+chance+to+flex+their+brain+muscles+and+participate+in+something+fun+and+rewarding%21%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E DevDay+2019+%E2%80%93+hosted+in+two+cities+twice+a+year%21 %3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FImageHeader.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+577px%3B+height%3A+211px%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EDevDay+2019+%26ndash%3B+hosted+in+two+cities+twice+a+year%21%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+DevDay+is+an+in-house+technology+conference+organised%2C+presented+and+attended+by+Entelect%26rsquo%3Bs+own+people+where+the+technologist%2C+inventor%2C+hobbyist%2C+engineer+or+artist+in+you+can+come+to+the+fore.+The+event+is+part+showcase%2C+part+science+show%2C+part+geek+club%2C+part+makers+club%3B+offering+a+range+of+lightning+talks+on+cutting-edge+technologies%2C+as+well+as+a+variety+of+interactive+exhibition+stands+where+people+can+discover+the+latest+creative+innovations+in+technology.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+first+event+took+place+in+2014%2C+and+as+the+company+has+continued+to+grow%2C+so+has+our+conference.+DevDay+2019+celebrated+its+fifth+birthday+and+is+now+hosted+twice+a+year+in+both+our+Western+Cape+and+Gauteng+offices%2C+with+over+550+people+in+attendance.+Our+next+steps+would+be+to+replicate+this+conference+in+our+European+and+New+Zealand+offices.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+topics+this+year+were+better+than+ever%2C+and+catered+for+all+our+engineers+and+also+our+non-technical+people.+A+few+of+the+presentations+included%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BHow+to+be+a+10x+ninja+rockstar+developer%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BMentoring+and+influence%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BAn+image+is+worth+1000px%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BGoing+passwordless%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BDriving+design+convergence+using+web+components%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Our+Tech+Accelerator+judging+also+takes+place+during+DevDay%2C+as+well+as+a+bit+of+competitive+game+jamming+in+the+middle+of+the+show.+The+Tech+Accelerator+is+a+platform+to+work+on+pet+projects.+Pet+projects+can+be+incubators+to+new+businesses%2C+social+initiatives+or+even+just+building+something+as+an+excuse+to+play+around+with+cool+new+tech.+Projects+are+completed+over+the+year%2C+and+during+that+time+we+host+a+series+of+hackathons+where+the+pizza+flows%2C+ideas+are+shared%2C+projects+are+accelerated%2C+and+trolls+are+attacked+with+Nerf+guns.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+point+of+the+Tech+Accelerator+is+to+learn%2C+so+the+idea+and+IP+belongs+to+the+participants+and+not+Entelect.+The+projects+are+evaluated+on+several+categories+such+as+technical+innovation%2C+cool+factor+and+utility.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe%26rsquo%3Bre+already+looking+forward+to+all+our+next+events+in+2020%21%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Watch+our+DevDay+video+at+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fculture.entelect.co.za%2Fstories%2Fentelect-devday%2F%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3Ehttps%3A%2F%2Fculture.entelect.co.za%2Fstories%2Fentelect-devday%2F%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FCompanyPic.jpg%22+style%3D%22width%3A+600px%3B+height%3A+450px%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E esburg+and+holds+a+BSc+IT+%28Hons%29+Cum+Laude+from+the+University+of+Johannesburg.+He+has+delivered+exceptional+results+in+his+areas+of+work+and+has+helped+the+business+to+grow+through+his+passion+for+galvanising+people+and+teams.+This+made+the+decision+of+his+appointment+to+join+the+executive+team+a+clear+one.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EAbout+Entelect%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEntelect+understands+the+true+impact+that+non-delivery+has+on+reputation+and+in+the+form+of+missed+opportunities.+Their+teams+have+a+proven+track+record+of+delivery+in+all+aspects+of+creating+technology+solutions%2C+from+strategy+and+design+to+development%2C+testing+and+rollout.+Entelect+supports+great+modern+businesses+in+every+industry+who+are+differentiating+themselves+through+technology.+With+an+agile+and+pragmatic+approach%2C+honed+over+delivering+hundreds+of+concurrent+projects+successfully%2C+they+partner+with+you+and+offer+end-to-end+technology+services+and+solutions+through+a+set+of+best-practice%2C+team-based+engagement+models+that+help+their+customers+go+from+good+to+great.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.entelect.co.za%22%3E%3Cstrong%3Ewww.entelect.co.za%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3C%2Fdiv%3E 64+top+graduates+join+Entelect+in+2020 %3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E64+top+graduates+join+Entelect+in+2020%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Each+year%2C+Entelect+takes+on+some+of+South+Africa%26rsquo%3Bs+brightest+young+university+graduates%2C+who+join+us+with+a+mix+of+engineering%2C+science+and+commerce+degrees.+These+graduates+participate+in+the+intensive+Entelect+Graduate+Programme+for+six+weeks%2C+aimed+at+accelerating+their+careers.+This+training+programme+is+structured+to+prepare+them+for+the+diverse+real-world+technology+delivery+environments%2C+and+the+critical+thinking%2C+teamwork+and+technical+skills+required+to+succeed.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Kicking+off+2020%2C+64+top+graduates+joined+our+South+African+operations.+The+programme+first+formalised+in+2013%2C+later+reached+30+top-of-the-class+graduates+in+2016%2C+and+grew+further+to+our+current+intake.+Given+the+current+economic+climate+and+number+of+students+in+South+Africa+unable+to+find+work%2C+we+are+proud+to+welcome+this+many+graduates+to+Entelect.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+We+recently+calculated+that+35%25+of+our+staff+started+off+as+graduates+at+Entelect.+Some+of+our+Senior+Managers%2C+Team+Leads%2C+Tech+Leads+and+Solutions+Architects+kicked+off+their+careers+with+us.+Our+commitment+to+growing+and+refining+our+graduate+programme+has+earned+Entelect+the+%26lsquo%3BBest+Graduate+Development+Programme%26rsquo%3B+award+at+the+Future+of+HR+Summit+in+2019.+We+are+honoured+to+have+one+of+the+best+graduate+programmes+in+the+country+and+are+committed+to+continue+growing+the+initiative+into+the+future.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FGradsCopped-PressRelease%28Sheldon%29RR.jpg%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+About+the+Entelect+Graduate+Programme%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+Entelect+Graduate+Boot+Camp+starts+in+January+every+year.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+designed+to+immerse+Software+Engineering%2C+UX+Engineering+and+Business+Analysis+graduates+into+real-world+software+development.+By+the+time+the+graduates+have+moved+through+the+6-week+programme%2C+they+would+have+been+exposed+to+several+languages+and+cutting-edge+frameworks%2C+which+are+actively+being+used+in+the+industry.+There+are+projects+along+the+way+with+clear+deliverables%2C+all+of+which+are+vetted+and+code-reviewed+by+various+Technical+Leads.We+want+all+of+our+graduates+to+become+more%26reg%3B+when+joining+us.%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+For+more+information%2C+please+visit+culture.entelect.co.za%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EAbout+Entelect%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Entelect+understands+the+true+impact+that+non-delivery+has+on+reputation+and+missed+opportunities.+Our+teams+have+a+proven+track+record+of+delivery+in+all+aspects+of+creating+technology+solutions%2C+from+strategy+and+design+to+development%2C+testing+and+rollout.+Entelect+supports+great+modern+businesses+in+every+industry+who+are+differentiating+themselves+through+technology.+With+an+agile+and+pragmatic+approach%2C+honed+over+delivering+hundreds+of+concurrent+projects+successfully%2C+we+partner+with+you+and+offer+end-to-end+technology+services+and+solutions+through+a+set+of+best-practice%2C+team-based+engagement+models+that+help+our+customers+go+from+good+to+great.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+www.entelect.co.za%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E Each+year%2C+Entelect+takes+on+some+of+South+Africa%E2%80%99s+brightest+young+university+graduates%2C+who+join+us+with+a+mix+of+engineering%2C+science+and+commerce+degrees.+These+graduates+participate+in+the+intensive+Entelect+Graduate+Programme+for+six+weeks%2C+aimed+at+accelerating+their+careers.+This+training+programme+is+structured+to+prepare+them+for+the+diverse+real-world+technology+delivery+environments%2C+and+the+critical+thinking%2C+teamwork+and+technical+skills+required+to+succeed. Google+Hash+Code+and+the+Entelect+Hubs %3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FPreferred_1colour_rev.jpg%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EGoogle+Hash+Code+and+the+Entelect+Hubs%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+For+the+past+few+years%2C+Entelect+has+supported+and+participated+in+Hash+Code%2C+Google%26rsquo%3Bs+annual+coding+competition.+We+set+up+hubs+in+our+Johannesburg%2C+Pretoria+and+Cape+Town+offices%2C+and+we+have+Entelectuals+participating+in+the+competition+every+year.+Hash+Code+is+a+fun+challenge+aimed+at+everyone+that+is+16+years+and+older%2C+and+is+open+to+engineers+at+any+skill+level.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EWhat+is+Hash+Code%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Hash+Code+is+Google%26rsquo%3Bs+team-based+programming+competition+that+allows+you+to+share+your+skills+and+connect+with+other+coders+as+you+work+together+to+solve+a+problem+modelled+off+a+real+Google+engineering+challenge%21+In+small+teams+of+two+to+four%2C+coders+all+over+the+world+tackle+the+first+problem+through+an+Online+Qualification+Round.+Although+this+round+is+hosted+online%2C+teams+can+come+together+to+compete+side-by-side+in+locally+coordinated+Hash+Code+hubs.+This+is+where+Entelect+plays+a+part+%26ndash%3B+we+create+these+hubs+for+teams+to+get+together+and+collaborate.+The+top+teams+from+this+round+are+invited+to+join+at+an+international+Google+office+for+the+final+round.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EJoin+a+hub%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Entelect+host+hubs+at+all+our+South+African+offices+for+the+online+qualification+round+of+Hash+Code.+Remember%2C+this+is+a+relaxed+competition+where+you+DON%26rsquo%3BT+need+to+be+a+wizard+of+AI+to+participate%21+The+prize+money+is+also+well+worth+it%2C+so+get+your+teams+together+and+register+at+one+of+our+hubs+below.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EThe+qualification+round%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+online+qualification+round+takes+place+on+20+February+2020+at+19%3A30+SAST+and+registered+teams+are+invited+to+participate+from+one+of+our+hubs.+The+hubs+are+available+to+anyone+over+the+age+of+16+and+you+don%26rsquo%3Bt+have+to+be+an+Entelectual+to+join.+Top+scoring+teams+from+the+online+qualification+round+will+then+be+invited+to+Google%26rsquo%3Bs+office+to+compete+in+the+final+round+of+the+competition+on+the+25+April+2020.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EInterested%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+If+you%26rsquo%3Bre+interested+in+joining+one+of+our+hubs%2C+put+together+a+team+of+2-4+people+and+be+sure+that+you+all+register+individually+on+the+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcodingcompetitions.withgoogle.com%2Fhashcode%2F%22%3EHash+Code+website%3C%2Fa%3E.+You%26rsquo%3Bll+then+need+to+select+your+applicable+hub+from+the+list+of+hubs+in+the+judge%26rsquo%3Bs+system%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+Entelect+JHB%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+Entelect+PTA%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+Entelect+CT%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Registration+closes+on+the+17th+February%2C+but+space+is+limited+so+register+soon.+We+hope+to+see+as+many+of+you+at+one+of+our+hubs+for+some+pizza+and+collaboration%21%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+For+more+information+on+this+event+at+Entelect%2C+visit+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fculture.entelect.co.za%2Fevents-calendar%2F%22%3Ehttps%3A%2F%2Fculture.entelect.co.za%2Fevents-calendar%2F%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E For+the+past+few+years%2C+Entelect+has+supported+and+participated+in+Hash+Code%2C+Google%E2%80%99s+annual+coding+competition.+We+set+up+hubs+in+our+Johannesburg%2C+Pretoria+and+Cape+Town+offices%2C+and+we+have+Entelectuals+participating+in+the+competition+every+year.+Hash+Code+is+a+fun+challenge+aimed+at+everyone+that+is+16+years+and+older%2C+and+is+open+to+engineers+at+any+skill+level.
