The+2020+Entelect+Challenge+Launches %3Ciframe+allow%3D%22accelerometer%3B+autoplay%3B+encrypted-media%3B+gyroscope%3B+picture-in-picture%22+allowfullscreen%3D%22%22+frameborder%3D%220%22+height%3D%22393%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fembed%2FBXWoGjYkZmY%22+width%3D%22700%22%3E%3C%2Fiframe%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOverdrive%2C+this+years%26rsquo%3B+Entelect+Challenge+%28%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fchallenge.entelect.co.za%2F%22%3Ehttps%3A%2F%2Fchallenge.entelect.co.za%2F%3C%2Fa%3E%29+launches+today.+The+event+will+run+from+the+19th+of+March%2C+and+the+finals+will+take+place+at+Comic+Con+Africa+%28%40AfricaComicCon%29+on+the+26th+September+at+11am+on+the+center+stage.+This+year+it+is+again+being+held+at+the+Gallagher+Convention+Centre.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26ldquo%3BEach+year+we+look+to+build+the+Challenge+around+a+popular+game+theme%2C+and+this+year+is+%26ldquo%3BOverdrive%2C%26rdquo%3B+says+Bianca+McFadyen%2C+Marketing+Manager%2C+Entelect.+%26ldquo%3BThe+idea+behind+the+theme+is+not+just+to+make+it+appealing+to+those+of+us+who+love+gaming%2C+but+to+also+provide+a+game+with+simple+enough+rules+that+anyone+with+a+basic+understanding+of+programming+can+enter.%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+year%2C+we+will+be+running+with+a+mini-playoffs+series%2C+a+staggered+strategy+component.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+mini-playoffs+series+will+provide+more+opportunities+for+contestants+to+win.+As+per+last+year%2C+the+contestants+get+the+opportunity+to+win+a+golden+ticket+in+each+of+the+first+two+mini-playoffs+and+in+the+third+mini-playoff+the+top+six+will+win+a+golden+ticket.+This+makes+up+the+final+eight+that+will+compete+at+Comic+Con+in+the+final+event.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThere+will+be+3+mini-playoffs+during+the+year.+The+first+will+be+in+May%2C+known+as+Box+Carting+and+the+second+in+June%2C+called+The+Furious+and+the+Fast+42%2C+with+the+third+one+taking+place+in+August%2C+called+Vrrrpa%21+Wanna+dice+chaana%3F+At+these+playoffs%2C+contestants+will+be+able+to+pitch+their+bots+against+one+another+in+a+Round-Robin+format.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+phases+are+designed+to+help+contestants+see+how+their+bot+is+fairing.+After+each+playoff+event%2C+a+new+strategy+component+will+be+launched%2C+thereby+upping+the+competition+by+adding+in+more+bot+strategies.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+year+the+Entelect+Challenge+University+cup+will+be+hosted+for+the+third+time.+The+University+Cup+is+a+one-day+hackathon+where+teams+of+students+from+various+universities+around+the+country+are+challenged+to+solve+a+coding+problem.+With+it+we+hope+to+give+our+future+technology+leaders+a+chance+to+flex+their+brain+muscles+and+participate+in+something+fun+and+rewarding%21%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAs+before+the+Player+Portal+will+be+available+to+contestants+to+test+their+bots%2C+and+the+community+forum+for+contestants+to+chat+about+their+builds+and+discuss+ideas.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26ldquo%3BWhat+a+lot+of+people+don%26rsquo%3Bt+realize+is+that+competing+successfully+in+the+Entelect+Challenge+is+not+about+having+the+smartest%2C+most+supersonic+bot.+It+is+actually+all+about+player+strategies.+Your+bot+may+be+really+simple+in+design%2C+but+its+strategy+could+be+highly+effective.%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EPrize+money+for+this+years%26rsquo%3B+event+is+R200+000+which+will+be+divided+across+the+mini-playoffs+series+and+finals%2C+with+the+biggest+component+awarded+at+the+Finals+at+Comic+Con+Africa.+First+prize+will+be+R70+000%2C+R35+000+will+go+to+second+place%2C+third+and+fourth+place+will+be+awarded+R25+000+and+5th+place+is+R10+000.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEntelect+runs+the+Challenge+every+year+as+a+fun+way+to+bring+the+software+community+together%2C+but+also+to+demystify+the+world+of+coding+and+AI.+%26ldquo%3BWe+want+as+many+people+to+enter+this+competition+as+possible+and+discover+a+whole+new+world+of+machine+learning+and+AI%2C%26rdquo%3B+says+McFadyen.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMachine+learning+is+a+term+that+is+often+used+interchangeably+with+AI+but+they+are+actually+very+different.%26nbsp%3B+Machine+learning+is+a+type+of+AI+that+provides+computers+with+the+ability+to+learn+without+being+explicitly+programmed+by+focusing+on+the+development+of+computer+programs+that+can+change+when+exposed+to+new+data.%26nbsp%3B+By+comparison%2C+AI+is+the+simulation+of+human+intelligence+processes+by+machines%2C+especially+computer+systems.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhile+AI+is+seeing+an+exciting+growth%2C+Machine+Learning+is+all+around+us+and+changing+the+way+we+live+and+work.+There+is+no+doubt+that+jobs+of+the+future+will+rely+on+Machine+Learning+to+a+greater+or+lesser+extent.+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+Entelect+challenge+shouldn%26rsquo%3Bt+be+viewed+as+something+that+only+super+coding+geeks+can+enter.+This+competition+is+designed+for+anyone+with+a+basic+level+of+programming+who+is+interested+in+the+world+of+machine+learning+and+the+future+of+software.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+year+we+expect+a+wide+variety+of+people+from+different+backgrounds+to+enter+which+is+going+to+make+the+player+strategies+really+exciting.+Who+could+win+is+anyone%26rsquo%3Bs+guess%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fchallenge.entelect.co.za%2F%22%3Ehttps%3A%2F%2Fchallenge.entelect.co.za%2F%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fchallenge.entelect.co.za%2F%22%3Ehttps%3A%2F%2Fforum.entelect.co.za%2Fc%2Fentelect-challenge-2020%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fchallenge.entelect.co.za%2F%22%3Ehttps%3A%2F%2Fculture.entelect.co.za%2F%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E Entelect%E2%80%99s+Tech+Accelerator+Programme %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FTechAcceleratorLogoSml.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+Entelect+Tech+Accelerator+is+a+platform+for+our+people+to+work+on+pet+projects.+Pet+projects+can+be+anything+from+incubators+to+new+businesses%2C+social+initiatives+or+even+just+building+something+as+an+excuse+to+play+around+with+cool+new+tech%21%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+We+allocate+eight+hours+a+month+to+work+on+pet+projects%2C+sponsor+a+budget+for+any+hardware+or+tooling+%28R2000+per+person+on+the+team%29+and+assign+Tech+Lead+time+to+each+project.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+programme+runs+each+year+and+signing+up+is+as+simple+as+pitching+an+idea+and+letting+the+Project+Leads+know+the+tooling%2C+hardware+and+infrastructure+required.+Projects+are+completed+over+the+year%2C+and+during+that+time+we+host+a+series+of+hackathons+where+the+pizza+flows%2C+friends+are+made%2C+ideas+are+shared%2C+projects+are+accelerated%2C+and+trolls+are+attacked+with+Nerf+guns.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+point+of+the+Entelect+Tech+Accelerator+is+to+learn+and+grow%2C+so+the+idea+and+IP+belongs+to+the+participants+and+not+Entelect.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+Tech+Accelerator+culminates+in+a+yearend+event+%28which+is+sometimes+off+the+back+of+our+second+DevDay%29+where+projects+are+showcased+and+judged+by+all+competitors%2C+fellow+Entelectuals%2C+and+the+greater+Leadership+Team.%26nbsp%3B+The+projects+are+evaluated+on+several+categories+such+as+technical+innovation%2C+cool+factor+and+utility.+Don%26rsquo%3Bt+worry%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+not+a+serious+event+but+simply+a+fun+gathering+where+people+show+off+their+achievements.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+This+year%2C+we+have+adapted+and+will+be+running+it+a+little+differently.+We+will+be+hosting+the+first+event+as+a+digital+hackathon.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+judges+scores+are+tallied%2C+and+the+winners+are+announced+at+the+yearend+funct 2021+Entelect+graduate+applications+are+open+after+this+year%E2%80%99s+Boot+Camp+class+graduates emote+Open+Day+soon.+Our+graduate+intake+for+2021+promises+to+be+very+strong+and+due+to+our+Vacation+Work+Programme+we+have+already+offered+several+graduates+roles+for+next+year.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EWhat+is+the+Entelect+Graduate+Boot+Camp+programme%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Each+year%2C+we+appoint+some+of+the+top+BSc+Computer+Science%2C+Engineering+and+BCom+Information+Systems+graduates+from+all+mainstream+universities+around+the+country+for+our+graduate+Boot+Camp.+These+graduates+start+out+as+full-time+Entelect+employees%2C+but+first+complete+two+months+of+training+and+upskilling+during+our+Boot+Camp.+After+completing+the+Boot+Camp+programme%2C+the+graduates+get+to+work+on+client+or+internal+projects+under+the+mentorship+of+our+team+and+technical+leads.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOur+clients+benefit+as+they+get+to+work+with+the+country%26rsquo%3Bs+top+graduates+who+have+escalated+their+technical+careers+through+the+programme%2C+while+our+seniors+also+benefit+personally+from+helping+or+people+in+the+specialist+areas+that+they+are+most+passionate+about.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBoot+Camp+covers+both+the+practical+and+theoretical+side+of+end-to-end+technology+solutions.+All+graduates+work+through+this+full+syllabus%2C+regardless+of+which+solutions+stream+they+will+be+working+on%2C+giving+them+a+rounded+understanding+of+the+full+software+development+lifecycle.+By+the+time+the+graduates+have+moved+through+the+programme%2C+they+will+have+collaborated+to+write+components+of+systems+in+various+languages+and+platforms%2C+all+of+which+would+have+been+vetted+and+code-reviewed+by+various+technical+leads.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EWhy+do+we+run+this+programme%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Entelect%26rsquo%3Bs+client+base+are+among+the+best+blue-chip+corporates+in+South+Africa.+Their+appetite+for+the+development+of+big+bespoke+systems+that+differentiate+them+in+the+marketplace+keeps+climbing%2C+hence+the+demand+for+talented+software+engineers.+Our+extensive+training+and+mentorship+programmes+are+a+real+differentiator+for+Entelectuals.+Our+culture+of+continuous+learning+and+growing+our+people+is+something+that+is+instilled+throughout+the+company.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+There+is+still+a+severe+shortage+of+high-end+software+engineering+skills+in+South+Africa.+This+is+why+we+believe+investing+in+quality+software+engineering+training+programmes+is+a+global+priority.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+When+building+software%2C+engineers+need+to+consider+issues+such+as+maintainability%2C+quality%2C+stability%2C+performance%2C+consistent+standards%2C+security%2C+and+scalability.+To+build+a+perfect+solution+requires+the+engineer+to+do+all+these+things+in+parallel%2C+which+is+true+craftsmanship+and+takes+years+of+experience.%26nbsp%3B+It+requires+significant+thought+to+be+applied+to+the+architecture+and+design%2C+the+ability+to+apply+computer+science+principles+and+a+strong+problem-solving+ability.+As+such%2C+mastering+the+skills+required+to+deliver+great+software+is+a+highly+adapted+talent.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+Entelect+Graduate+Boot+Camp+Programme+was+created+to+help+build+great+software+engineers%2C+who+can+solve+the+toughest+problems%2C+deliver+quality+software+using+best+practises%2C+and+who+are+supported+by+our+other+650+top+engineers+all+over+the+world.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ca+class%3D%22button-box2+button-box%22+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fculture.entelect.co.za%2Fapply-now%2F%22%3EApply+Now%3C%2Fa%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%26nbsp%3B+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FGrads2020.jpg%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E sonal+experience%2C+as+he+brought+us+into+his+home%2C+showed+us+around+his+cool+setup+and+gave+us+a+few+tips+of+how+we+could+set+up+our+own+WFH+spaces.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EScott+asked+that+we+only+sponsor+a+local+community+group+that+assist+people+to+learn+how+to+code+in+exchange+for+being+our+guest+speaker+on+the+day.+We+donated+to+GirlCode+on+his+behalf%2C+and+will+be+assisting+several+girls+in+a+boot+camp+this+year+to+teach+them+how+to+code.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+DevDay+is+an+in-house+technology+conference+organised%2C+presented+and+attended+by+Entelect%26rsquo%3Bs+own+people+where+the+technologist%2C+inventor%2C+hobbyist%2C+engineer%2C+or+artist+in+you+can+come+to+the+fore.+The+event+is+part+showcase%2C+part+science+show%2C+part+geek+club%2C+part+makers+club%3B+offering+a+range+of+lightning+talks+on+cutting-edge+technologies%2C+as+well+as+a+variety+of+interactive+exhibition+stands+where+people+can+discover+the+latest+creative+innovations+in+technology.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+first+event+took+place+6+years+ago%2C+and+as+the+company+has+continued+to+grow%2C+so+has+our+conference.+DevDay+is+now+hosted+twice+a+year+in+both+our+Western+Cape+and+Gauteng+offices%2C+with+over+750+people+in+attendance.+Our+next+steps+would+be+to+replicate+this+conference+in+our+European+and+New+Zealand+offices+once+it+is+responsible+to+do+so+%26ndash%3B+and+we+hope+to+see+this+in+play+in+2021.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Watch+our+DevDay+video+at+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fculture.entelect.co.za%2Fstories%2Fentelect-devday%2F%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3Ehttps%3A%2F%2Fculture.entelect.co.za%2Fstories%2Fentelect-devday%2F%3C%2Fa%3E%26nbsp%3Band+become+more%26reg%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EAbout+Scott+Hanselman%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+My+name+is+Scott+Hanselman.+I+am+a+programmer%2C+teacher%2C+and+speaker.+I+work+out+of+my+home+office+in+Portland%2C+Oregon+for+the+Web+Platform+Team+at+Microsoft%2C+but+this+blog%2C+its+content+and+opinions+are+my+own.+I+blog+about+technology%2C+culture%2C+gadgets%2C+diversity%2C+code%2C+the+web%2C+where+we+are+going+and+where+we+have+been.+I+am+excited+about+community%2C+social+equity%2C+media%2C+entrepreneurship+and+above+all%2C+the+open+web.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.hanselman.com%22%3Ehttps%3A%2F%2Fwww.hanselman.com%2F%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EYou+can+also+find+Scott+on+Twitter%2C+Instagram%2C+and+Facebook.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EAbout+GirlCode%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+GirlCode+is+a+registered+NPO+%28158-642%29+aimed+at+empowering+women+through+technology.+We+believe+that+the+more+women+get+involved+with+tech%2C+design%2C+development+and+leadership%2C+the+more+successful+and+diverse+companies+and+their+products+will+be+in+the+future.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fgirlcode.co.za%2F%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3Ehttps%3A%2F%2Fgirlcode.co.za%2F%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EAbout+Entelect%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Entelect+understands+the+true+impact+that+non-delivery+has+on+reputation+and+in+the+form+of+missed+opportunities.+Their+teams+have+a+proven+track+record+of+delivery+in+all+aspects+of+creating+technology+solutions%2C+from+strategy+and+design+to+development%2C+testing+and+rollout.+Entelect+supports+great+modern+businesses+in+every+industry+who+are+differentiating+themselves+through+technology.+With+an+agile+and+pragmatic+approach%2C+honed+over+delivering+hundreds+of+concurrent+projects+successfully%2C+they+partner+with+you+and+offer+end-to-end+technology+services+and+solutions+through+a+set+of+best-practice%2C+team-based+engagement+models+that+help+their+customers+go+from+good+to+great.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.entelect.co.za%22%3Ewww.entelect.co.za%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E re+of+Entelect%3C%2Fa%3E.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhat+our+people+had+this+to+say+about+Troy+and+his+presentation%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cul%3E+%3Cli%3E%26lsquo%3BI+enjoyed+how+his+approach+was+full+of+humour%2C+kept+me+glued+to+my+screen+for+the+full+duration%21%26rsquo%3B%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E%26lsquo%3BIt+was+just+awesome+to+gain+insight+into+data+security+from+the+master.%26rsquo%3B%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E%26lsquo%3BI+found+the+talk+to+be+very+interesting%2C+especially+since+it+related+to+events+in+our+country.+Troy+raised+some+good+points+around+security+in+applications+that+we+develop%26rsquo%3B%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E%26lsquo%3BI+enjoyed+his+extensive+knowledge+in+his+field+as+well+as+the+easy+and+pragmatic+way+he+made+it+real+and+applicable+to+us.+His+enthusiasm+was+well+received%2C+and+his+accent+was+quirky.%26rsquo%3B%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E%26lsquo%3BDude%21+It%26%2339%3Bs+TROY+HUNT%21%26rsquo%3B%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAll+Entelect+offices+across+South+Africa%2C+New+Zealand+and+The+Netherlands+joined+in+on+the+day%2C+and+we+had+Twitter+competitions+and+spot+prize+giveaways+throughout.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+DevDay+is+an+in-house+technology+conference+organised%2C+presented+and+attended+by+Entelect%26rsquo%3Bs+own+people+where+the+technologist%2C+inventor%2C+hobbyist%2C+engineer%2C+or+artist+in+you+can+come+to+the+fore.+The+event+is+part+showcase%2C+part+science+show%2C+part+geek+club%2C+part+makers+club%3B+offering+a+range+of+lightning+talks+on+cutting-edge+technologies%2C+as+well+as+a+variety+of+interactive+exhibition+stands+where+people+can+discover+the+latest+creative+innovations+in+technology.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+first+event+took+place+6+years+ago%2C+and+as+the+company+has+continued+to+grow%2C+so+has+our+conference.+DevDay+is+now+hosted+twice+a+year+in+both+our+Western+Cape+and+Gauteng+offices%2C+with+over+750+people+in+attendance.+Our+next+steps+would+be+to+replicate+this+conference+in+our+European+and+New+Zealand+offices+once+it+is+responsible+to+do+so+%26ndash%3B+and+we+hope+to+see+this+in+play+in+2021.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Watch+our+DevDay+video+at+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fculture.entelect.co.za%2Fstories%2Fentelect-devday%2F%22%3Ehttps%3A%2F%2Fculture.entelect.co.za%2Fstories%2Fentelect-devday%2F%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EAbout+Troy+Hunt%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+I%26%2339%3Bm+Troy+Hunt%2C+an+Australian+Microsoft+Regional+Director+and+Microsoft+Most+Valuable+Professional+for+Developer+Security.+I+don%26%2339%3Bt+work+for+Microsoft%2C+but+they%26%2339%3Bre+kind+enough+to+recognise+my+community+contributions+by+way+of+their+award+programs+which+I%26%2339%3Bve+been+a+part+of+since+2011.+You%26%2339%3Bll+regularly+find+me+in+the+press+talking+about+security+and+even+testifying+before+US+Congress+on+the+impact+of+data+breaches.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.troyhunt.com%2F%22%3Ehttps%3A%2F%2Fwww.troyhunt.com%2F%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+You+can+also+find+Troy+on+Twitter+and+Instagram%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EAbout+Entelect%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Entelect+understands+the+true+impact+that+non-delivery+has+on+reputation+and+in+the+form+of+missed+opportunities.+Their+teams+have+a+proven+track+record+of+delivery+in+all+aspects+of+creating+technology+solutions%2C+from+strategy+and+design+to+development%2C+testing+and+rollout.+Entelect+supports+great+modern+businesses+in+every+industry+who+are+differentiating+themselves+through+technology.+With+an+agile+and+pragmatic+approach%2C+honed+over+delivering+hundreds+of+concurrent+projects+successfully%2C+they+partner+with+you+and+offer+end-to-end+technology+services+and+solutions+through+a+set+of+best-practice%2C+team-based+engagement+models+that+help+their+customers+go+from+good+to+great.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.entelect.co.za%22%3Ewww.entelect.co.za%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp% The+State+of+Artificial+Intelligence %3Cdiv+id%3D%22publitas-embed-auguue9z9v%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cscript+data-cfasync%3D%22false%22+data-height%3D%22undefined%22+data-publication%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fview.publitas.com%2Fentelect%2Fstate-of-artificial-intelligence-introduced-by-entelect%2F%22+data-publication-aspect-ratio%3D%221.5454545454545454%22+data-responsive%3D%22true%22+data-width%3D%22undefined%22+data-wrapperId%3D%22publitas-embed-auguue9z9v%22+publitas-embed+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fview.publitas.com%2Fembed.js%22+type%3D%22text%2Fjavascript%22%3E%3C%2Fscript%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EArtificial+Intelligence+has+really+woken+up+as+an+industry+topic+in+the+last+two+years%2C+and+it%26rsquo%3Bs+clear+there+is+still+a+lot+of+confusion+about+what+AI+really+means+to+us+as+consumers+and+businesses.+Are+we+going+to+lose+our+jobs+or+become+subjects+of+a+runaway+robotic+overmind+in+our+lifetimes%3F%21+I+think+a+key+challenge+we+face%2C+especially+as+technology+experts+in+industry+right+now+is+to+demystify+AI+for+everybody%2C+to+separate+applications+of+it+into+things+we+can+all+understand.+For+example%2C+we%26rsquo%3Bre+starting+to+see+that+there+is+a+clear+difference+between+an+AI+that+follows+rules+and+an+AI+that+learns.%26nbsp%3B%3Co%3Ap%3E%3C%2Fo%3Ap%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3Co%3Ap%3E%3C%2Fo%3Ap%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+rules+AI+has+a+strict+set+framework+and+leverages+formulaic+computational+strength+to+win+out+in+an+algorithmically+intensive+battle+between+a+database+and+a+human+mind%2C+but+it+is+still+very+bounded.+A+well-known+example+is+grand+master+chess+player+Garry+Kasparov+losing+to+IBM%26rsquo%3Bs+deep+blue+AI.+While+it%26rsquo%3Bs+despairing+to+know+we+may+never+beat+Windows+at+chess+again%2C+in+many+ways+these+tools+should+replace+menial+tasks+and+jobs+for+us%2C+and+we+should+be+happy+for+it+because+we%26rsquo%3Bre+then+free+as+a+workforce+to+do+things+that+have+more+meaning%3A+like+planning+and+interpreting.+Businesses+should+be+excited+about+these%2C+not+because+it+is+sexy+AI%2C+but+because+it+is+efficient.+We+rejoice+as+repetitive+tasks+disappear+from+our+daily+work%2C+but+as+Kasparov+himself+pointed+out%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+one+thing+to+design+a+computer+to+play+chess+at+Grand+Master+level%2C+but+it%26rsquo%3Bs+another+to+call+it+intelligence+in+the+pure+sense.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+simply+throwing+computer+power+at+a+problem+and+letting+a+machine+do+what+it+does+best.%3Co%3Ap%3E%3C%2Fo%3Ap%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3Co%3Ap%3E%3C%2Fo%3Ap%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+learning+AI+is+a+little+more+interesting+and+wild%2C+and+we%26rsquo%3Bre+really+at+the+early+stages+of+how+to+apply+something+like+this.+Also+borne+from+newly+accessible+computational+power%2C+these+AI+systems+actually+teach+themselves+through+observation+and+data.+Some+famous+examples+are+Microsoft+Tay%2C+which+famously+became+racist+on+Twitter+in+less+than+24+hours%2C+and+Google%26rsquo%3Bs+image+recognition+platform+which+we%26rsquo%3Bre+all+training+each+time+we+click+pictures+to+ironically+prove+we%26rsquo%3Bre+not+a+robot+online.+For+businesses+looking+to+apply+AI+like+this%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+where+things+become+tricky.+First+recognising+that+what+you+need+is+an+AI+that+learns+rather+than+an+AI+that+repeats+tasks+with+no+experimentation%2C+and+then+when+taking+the+next+step+to+accept+that+learning+AI+is+still+trained+by+its+inputs.+In+the+software+industry+we+have+a+widely+shared+philosophy+of+%26ldquo%3Bgarbage+in%2C+garbage+out%26rdquo%3B+and+this+still+holds+true%3A+just+refer+back+to+Microsoft%26rsquo%3Bs+Tay.+This+is+where+Google+and+Tesla+are+doing+things+right%2C+they%26rsquo%3Bre+sourcing+as+much+data+as+possible%2C+with+huge+variety+and+volume+to+train+their+systems%2C+giving+autonomous+driving+and+image+recognition+the+best+possible+chance+of+succeeding.%3Co%3Ap%3E%3C%2Fo%3Ap%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3Co%3Ap%3E%3C%2Fo%3Ap%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EUltimately%2C+as+a+participant+in+the+global+technology+industry%2C+we+have+this+responsibility+to+help+our+customers+and+partners+cut+through+the+hype%2C+find+real+applications+of+what+is+incredible+tech+which+can+make+it+into+production.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Co%3Ap%3E%3C%2Fo%3Ap%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22font-size%3A10.0pt%3Bfont-family%3A%26quot%3BHelvetica%26quot%3B%2C%26quot%3Bsans-serif%26quot%3B%3B+color%3Ablack%22%3E-+Matthew+Butler%2C+General+Manager+at+Entelect%3Co%3Ap%3E%3C%2Fo%3Ap%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fp%3E Entelect+introduces+the+%22State+of+Artificial+Intelligence%22+2018 ["Publications"] 1-cover.jpg
Retrospectives+2018 %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2Fretros.jpg%22+style%3D%22width%3A+600px%3B+height%3A+338px%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3Eby+Sheldon+Lyne.+General+Manager+at+Entelect%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHere+at+Entelect%2C+we+have+a+vision+%26ndash%3B+to+build+something+great%21+We+do+this+by+driving+a+culture+of+growth%2C+relationships+and+a+never-ending+will+to+deliver+value+to+our+clients.+This+year+has+been+a+record+year+for+us+where+many+new+initiatives+have+been+undertaken.+These+have+been+crucial+to+our+continued+growth+and+vital+in+pushing+us+towards+our+goal+%26ndash%3B+to+be+a+prominent%2C+multi-national+end-to-end+technology+services+and+solutions+provider.+Through+these%2C+we+have+been+able+to+transfer+our+philosophy%2C+our+core+values+and+culture+across+new+areas+within+the+spectrum+of+the+IT+industry+as+well+as+new+locations+around+the+globe.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+To+be+able+to+reflect+on+an+entire+year+across+all+divisions+and+departments+in+a+company+of+close+to+500%2C+is+truly+a+unique+opportunity.+In+our+Retrospective%2C+I+get+to+stop+and+look+back+at+the+year+and+see+what+we+have+all+achieved.+It+is+one+of+those+rare+moments+that+I+get+to+pause%2C+from+helping+to+run+an+ever-growing+organisation+and+reflect+on+all+those+things+that+have+transpired.+It+is+at+this+exact+moment+that+I+am+overwhelmed+with+pride.+2018+has+been+a+year+where+I+have+seen+people+grow%2C+empower+themselves+and+those+around+them.+They+have+achieved+their+goals+in+their+career+and+exceeded+their+own+expectations.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Yes%2C+we+are+a+technology+company+and+there+has+been+a+diverse+range+of+advancements+in+our+technical+knowledge%2C+but+this+is+not+the+only+area+in+which+I+have+seen+growth%2C+and+this+excites+me%21+Each+year+we+welcome+a+cohort+of+45+top+graduates+around+Africa.+In+general%2C+these+individuals+arrive+at+Entelect%2C+and+are+a+little+nervous+about+what+career+they+are+about+to+be+launched+into.+I+have+had+the+privilege+to+watch+many+of+these+graduates+from+a+few+years+back+grow+into+true+professionals%2C+who+are+confident+in+their+skill+set%2C+are+capable+of+driving+large+teams+to+successful+deliveries%2C+are+ready+to+drop+everything+to+grow+the+people+around+them%2C+and+assist+others+that+are+going+through+a+similar+time+in+their+career+that+they+did.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+I+have+seen+individuals+show+incredible+bravery+in+stepping+out+of+their+comfort+zones.+Whether+this+has+been+taking+some+hard+feedback+on+the+chin+and+finding+a+way+to+do+something+about+it+or+getting+into+a+bigger+project+than+they+have+ever+worked+on+before+%28and+they+have+made+an+absolute+success+of+it%29.+I+have+witnessed+people+step+into+leadership+roles+and+take+responsibility+for+growing+the+people+around+them+as+well+as+people+moving+into+new+environments+and+influencing+positive+change+-+as+if+doing+this+was+a+part+of+their+normal+day.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+At+the+end+of+2018%2C+I+cannot+be+more+proud+to+be+working+alongside+the+passionate+professionals+that+have+chosen+to+be+part+of+our+journey.+In+sharing+our+passion+of+making+IT+better+than+it+has+ever+been.+In+believing+that+we+are+a+company+that+proves+that+software+development+is+not+synonymous+with+non-delivery.+In+helping+us+prove+that+it+is+possible+to+have+a+great+culture+without+sacrificing+delivery+and+customer+satisfaction.+In+adopting+that+we+can+be+both+successful+and+do+good+for+people.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EVisit+Retrospectives+2018+here%3A+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fretrospectives.entelect.co.za%22%3Ehttps%3A%2F%2Fretrospectives.entelect.co.za%3C%2Fa%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E Here+at+Entelect%2C+we+have+a+vision+%E2%80%93+to+build+something+great%21+We+do+this+by+driving+a+culture+of+growth%2C+relationships+and+a+never-ending+will+to+deliver+value+to+our+clients.+This+year+has+been+a+record+year+for+us+where+many+new+initiatives+have+been+undertaken.+These+have+been+crucial+to+our+continued+growth+and+vital+in+pushing+us+towards+our+goal+%E2%80%93+to+be+a+prominent%2C+multi-national+end-to-end+technology+services+and+solutions+provider.+Through+these%2C+we+have+been+able+to+transfer+our+philosophy%2C+our+core+values+and+culture+across+new+areas+within+the+spectrum+of+the+IT+industry+as+well+as+new+locations+around+the+globe. From+Here+to+There%3A+A+guide+to+creating+disruptive+software %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FTechPub-Post1-TW.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+800px%3B+height%3A+400px%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAs+a+mature+organisation+who+has+had+success+in+a+traditional+business+model+over+the+years%2C+you+see+a+need+to+evolve+with+the+ever-changing+demands+of+customers+through+technology.+Furthermore%2C+technology+is+able+to+unlock+hidden+value+within+the+business%2C+and+present+new+potential+offerings+and+revenue+streams.+By+using+abductive+thinking%2C+with+a+focus+on+design%2C+carefully+understanding+customers%2C+and+evaluating+the+strengths+of+the+business%2C+novel+solutions+surface+which+often+serve+as+key+differentiators+for+the+organisation.+People+and+technology+are+crucial+components+to+creating+disruptive+software+while+iteratively+improving+and+learning.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+journey+starts+now.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ca+class%3D%22button-box2+button-box%22+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Feolstoragewe.blob.core.windows.net%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FFromHeretoThere-Aguidetocreatingdisruptivesoftwareinenterprise.pdf%22%3EDownload+the+Publication%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E Technology+has+the+ability+to+unlock+hidden+potential+within+businesses+and+present+new+offerings.+Learn+about+the+journey+of+creating+disruptive+software+solutions+in+enterprise%E2%80%A6 ["Publications"] Tech Pub - Post 1- TW.png
Creating+a+vision %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FTechPub3-TW.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+800px%3B+height%3A+400px%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIt+all+starts+with+a+vision.+Often+business-as-usual+includes+putting+out+fires%2C+making+sure+the+small+things+are+happening%2C+and+meeting+short-term+targets.+For+an+organisation+to+truly+be+disruptive%2C+it+needs+an+overarching+vision+of+where+it+wants+to+be+%26ndash%3B+no+matter+how+ambitious+it+might+be.+Without+an+ambitious+vision%2C+organisations+tend+to+wither+away+over+time.+Let%26rsquo%3Bs+explore+the+facets+that+can+guide+defining+a+vision.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E01.+WE+ARE+ALL+PEOPLE%2C+WE+ARE+ALL+USERS%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+As+users%2C+we+all+know+what+it+feels+like+to+get+frustrated+with+technology%2C+but+we+also+know+the+immense+joy+and+empowerment+it+can+bring+to+our+lives+when+a+solution+is+done+right.+We+have+apps+on+our+phone+that+we+simply+cannot+live+without%2C+other+apps+that+are+deleted+within+3+seconds+of+downloading%2C+and+apps+that+are+simply+relegated+to+the+app+graveyard.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAs+people%2C+we+don%26rsquo%3Bt+care+about+features%2C+we+care+about+accomplishing+a+goal.+It+might+be+communicating+with+loved+ones%2C+managing+finances%2C+or+sharing+your+memories.+The+technical+bits+that+make+these+things+happen+mean+nothing.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+key+to+the+success+of+a+digital+solution+is+adoption+by+users+and+that+can+only+be+enabled+through+empathy+for+all+involved%2C+using+robust+qualitative+research+%28research+that%26rsquo%3Bs+more+opinion%29+and+quantitative+research+%28research+that%26rsquo%3Bs+more+empirical%29.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2F1.png%22+style%3D%22padding%3A+0px+15px%3B+width%3A+300px%3B+float%3Aright%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22margin-top%3A20px%22%3E%3Cstrong%3E02.+HOW+IDEAS+ARE+SHAPED%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+life+of+a+solution+begins+with+an+idea%3B+the+business+recognises+a+challenge+and+feels+it+may+be+solved+through+technology.+Business+stakeholders+may+already+have+a+clear+idea+of+what+form+the+solution+should+take%2C+what+type+of+tech+to+use+and+what+the+eventual+outcome+may+look+like.+The+important+factors+often+forgotten+are+seeing+the+solution+as+a+vehicle+for+strategic+innovation+by+empathising+with+the+people+actually+involved+in+the+trenches+and+being+open-minded+about+who+the+customers+are%2C+what+their+goals+are%2C+and+how+these+ideas+can+address+those+issues+while+providing+business+value.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E03.+THE+ROLE+OF+UX+ENGINEERING%3A+UNDERSTANDING%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+UX+engineering+means+to+be+involved+with+business+and+technical+stakeholders+from+the+very+beginning+to+understand+the+potential+constraints+and+opportunities+for+any+potential+solution.+This+can+take+many+forms%2C+such+as+stakeholder+interviews+or+focus+groups%2C+heuristic+evaluation+%28expert+assessments+of+existing+systems%29+and+analysis+of+existing+user+data%2C+and+business+or+technical+processes.+This+will+allow+the+construction+of+a+broad+framework+to+direct+research+and+design+goals.+Without+this+step%2C+the+solution+is+at+risk+of+being+designed+solely+for+the+assumed+requirements+and+not+the+ecosystem+in+which+the+solution+must+live.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhile+a+thorough+understanding+of+the+business+and+technology+is+vital%2C+it+should+not+affect+the+necessary+objectivity+or+empathy+required+when+engaging+with+the+users+or+potential+users+of+the+solution.+To+retain+objectivity+and+guide+a+user-centred+design+approach%2C+we+must+employ+rigorous+research+methods+ranging+from+large+quantitative+data-gathering+to+smaller%2C+more+targeted+qualitative+exercises.+The+type+of+research+methods+selected+are+as+important+as+the+research+itself+and+the+project+should+have+a+strategic+UX+plan+to+guide+that+process.+The+next+diagram+shows+where+different+research+approaches+fit+within+the+UX+research+landscape.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2F2.png%22+style%3D%22padding%3A+0px+15px%3B+width%3A+400px%3B+float%3Aleft%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22margin-top%3A20px%3B%22%3EThere+are+many+considerations+when+choosing+which+research+method+to+use+and+the+following+should+be+considered+at+the+start+of+every+project%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BWhat+is+this+research+method+typically+used+for%3F%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BWhat+will+implementing+this+method+cost%3F%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BHow+difficult+will+it+be+to+collect+the+data%3F%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BHow+difficult+will+it+be+to+analyse+the+data%3F%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BWhat+type+of+research+category+does+this+fall+into%3F%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BWhat+is+the+context+of+use+of+the+method%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+addition+to+classic+UX+research+methods%2C+there+are+many+new+ways+in+which+UX+engineers+engage+with+both+stakeholders+and+users.+One+that+has+gained+traction+over+recent+years+is+Design+Sprints.+Design+Sprints+were+created+to+condense+and+target+various+UX+methods+such+as+stakeholder+engagement+and+user+testing+into+a+fast+and+furious+5+days.+More+on+this+coming+up.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E04.+THE+ROLE+OF+UX+ENGINEERING%3A+INTERPRETING+AND+EXTERNALISING%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+activities+and+artefacts+generated+through+UX+engineering+include+valuable+information+from+different+dimensions+of+the+business+and+project.+These+finding+are+invaluable+references+for+making+critical+decisions+about+features+and+direction.+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BContextual+inquiries%3A+Data-gathering+technique+combing+observational+research+and+semi-structured+interviews+in+the+user%26rsquo%3Bs+context+of+use%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BOne+on+one+interviews+and%2For+focus+group+transcripts+and+analysis%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BThematic+analysis%3A+Ways+to+organise+research+gathered%2C+such+as+interviews+or+observations+into+useful+and+consistent+themes%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BPersonas%3A+Consolidating+research+on+users+into+imagined+users+to+represent+a+larger+set+of+data%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BUser+journeys%3A+Mapping+the+entire+journey+that+a+user%2Fcustomer+takes+during+their+use+of+a+product+or+service%2C+which+aids+in+understanding+sentiment%2C+needs+and+goals%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22margin-top%3A20px%22%3E%3Cstrong%3E05.+DESIGN+SPRINT%3A+PARTICIPATORY+DESIGN%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2F3.png%22+style%3D%22padding%3A+0px+15px%3B+width%3A+250px%3B+float%3Aright%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EA+Design+Sprint+is+an+excellent+tool+in+the+case+where+the+business+needs+to+be+involved+in+ideation.+As+mentioned+previously%2C+this+is+a+5-day+design+process+including+all+those+that+will+be+involved+in+making+the+project+a+success.+Prior+to+beginning+the+sprint%2C+those+involved+must+have+consumed+the+research+gathered+in+the+previous+phase+of+the+design+lifecycle+and+now+have+solid+grasp+of+their+users.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EDay+One%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+We+define+our+goals+both+for+the+business+and+the+users.+We+then+define+the+actors+involved+in+the+business+problem+and+then+map+their+journey+towards+the+defined+goals.+We+will+also+come+up+with+questions+and+ideas+through+a+process+called+%26quot%3BHow+Might+We%26quot%3B+%28HMW%29.+This+involves+crowd+sourcing+thoughts+in+a+structured+way+to+provide+detailed+context+about+a+process.+Additionally%2C+it+highlights+areas+of+interest+through+a+voting+process.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EDay+Two%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+We%26rsquo%3Bll+begin+sketching+out+possible+solutions+to+the+problem.+There+are+many+methods+we+use+to+encourage+creativity+and+allow+stakeholders+to+explore+their+ability+to+ideate%2C+free+of+constraints.+We+will+then+display+the+works%2C+present+them+and+vote+on+them.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EDay+Three%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+We%26rsquo%3Bll+do+the+final+round+of+voting+and+then+begin+storyboarding+the+solution+using+the+best+parts+of+each+idea+or+sketch.+As+you+can+see%2C+we+start+with+individuals+working+collectively+to+form+individual+ideas%2C+that+are+then+voted+on+and+consolidated+into+a+single+vision+%26ndash%3B+this+is+why+the+eventual+storyboard+is+so+powerful.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EDay+Four%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+On+the+fourth+day%2C+our+design+team+prototypes+the+solution.+The+other+stakeholders+may+be+involved+if+they+so+desire+or+if+it+is+necessary+to+the+goal%2C+but+it+is+often+just+the+design+team+that+manages+this+part+of+the+process.+We+design+a+working+prototype+to+test+with+real+users+the+next+day.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EDay+Five%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+On+the+fifth+day%2C+we+venture+out+into+real-world+operations+where+the+solution+may+be+used.+User+testing+is+conducted+and+provides+an+opportunity+to+learn+and+validate+solutions.+This+gives+us+crucial+insights+into+the+viability+of+a+solution+or+part+of+a+solution+which+can+then+be+reported+back+to+the+stakeholders.+In+this+way%2C+we+can+know+what+works+and+what+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt+with+little+time+wasted+if+the+idea+fails+and+much+gained+if+it+is+a+success.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EPrototyping+and+testing+are+however+more+involved+processes+for+the+solution+as+a+whole.+So%2C+while+the+Design+Sprint+offers+a+way+to+tackle+innovation+and+collaboration+on+specific+areas+of+a+solution%2C+dedicated+and+extensive+prototyping+and+testing+is+still+required.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E06.+TEST+AND+REFINE%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22margin-left%3A20px%22%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+power+of+the+prototype+is+that+one+can+create+a+testable+design+in+significantly+less+time+than+it+takes+to+develop+a+solution+in+code.+According+to+Dr+Susan+Weinschenk+in+her+paper+Usability%3A+A+Business+Case%2C+50%25+of+development+time+can+be+saved+by+doing+UX+research+upfront.+Testing+can+take+many+forms%2C+much+like+the+user+research+mentioned+above.+Some+of+the+same+techniques+we+saw+in+the+user+research+phase+can+and+will+be+repeated+here%2C+for+example%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22margin-left%3A20px%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2F4.png%22+style%3D%22padding%3A+0px+15px%3B+width%3A+250px%3B+float%3Aright%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BUsability-lab+studies%3A+Controlled+and+observed+test+of+users%2C+using+your+prototype.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BEye+tracking%3A+Users+eye+movements+are+tracked+while+using+a+prototype%2C+to+understand+focus+areas+and+how+to+optimise+the+design.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BA%2FB+testing%3A+Testing+variations+of+your+prototype+or+elements+of+it%2C+to+see+which+designs+users+favour.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBased+on+the+testing+done+on+the+prototypes%2C+the+UX+engineer+can+continue+to+refine+the+designs+until+they+have+been+optimised.+The+reporting+done+during+the+prototype+testing+is+again+hugely+valuable+for+the+understanding+of+all+stakeholders+as+to+why+certain+design+decisions+have+been+taken.+In+fact%2C+it+is+ideal+if+the+product+owner+and+team+attend+some+of+the+user+tests%2C+as+this+engenders+empathy+and+understanding+directly.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E07.+THE+RECURSIVE+VALUE+OF+UX%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+If+a+UX+engineer+is+included+in+the+process%2C+it+will+have+continuous+value+to+all+those+involved+in+the+project+later+down+the+line.+The+result+should+be+a+set+of+validated+and+tested+prototypes+that+consolidate+all+stakeholders+needs+into+a+design+vision.+It+should+also+enable+decision+makers%2C+architects%2C+developers+and+analysts+to+add+value+to+the+solution+in+new+and+innovative+ways%2C+driven+by+a+robust+body+of+research.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ERead+the+full+From+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fculture.entelect.co.za%2Four-engineering%2Fdisruptive-software-2019%2F%22%3EHere+%3C%2Fa%3Eto+There+publication+here.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E It+all+starts+with+a+vision.+Often+business-as-usual+includes+putting+out+fires%2C+making+sure+the+small+things+are+happening%2C+and+meeting+short-term+targets.+For+an+organisation+to+truly+be+disruptive%2C+it+needs+an+overarching+vision+of+where+it+wants+to+be+%E2%80%93+no+matter+how+ambitious+it+might+be.+Without+an+ambitious+vision%2C+organisations+tend+to+wither+away+over+time.+Let%E2%80%99s+explore+the+facets+that+can+guide+defining+a+vision. ["Publications"] Tech Pub 3 - TW.png
Retrospectives+2019 %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FRetrospectives2019-LI-FB.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+800px%3B+height%3A+418px%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWith+technology+ever-changing%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+always+good+to+take+a+step+back+and+look+at+a+snapshot+of+where+we+are+right+now.+We+look+back+at+the+approaches%2C+languages%2C+frameworks%2C+tools+and+everything+else+we+need+to+create+quality+software+that+has+delivered+real+business+value.+Doing+this+each+year+allows+us+to+identify+trends+in+technologies+and+their+adoptions+-+retrospection%21%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETowards+the+end+of+each+year%2C+we+ask+our+600+professionals+to+complete+a+%26ldquo%3BState+of+Technology%26rdquo%3B+survey%2C+asking+a+variety+of+questions+from+the+tools+and+processes+we+put+to+use%2C+to+some+fun+and+interesting+practices.+We+have+spent+the+year+working+across+multiple+industries+and+tech+stacks%2C+in+both+local+and+global+organisations.+This+has+equipped+us+with+a+plethora+of+knowledge+and+experience+to+derive+and+share+meaningful+insights+via+the+survey.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEntelect+focuses+on+building+large-scale%2C+robust+enterprise+software+utilising+best+industry+practices+and+fit-for-purpose+technologies.+We+deliver+end-to-end+solutions+by+considering+all+facets+involved+in+solving+real-world+business+problems+that+help+organisations+unlock+potential.+Learn+more+about+how+we+take+organisations+From+Here+to+There.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHere+are+some+industry+observations+we%26rsquo%3Bve+seen+in+2019.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ECloud+adoption+is+definitely+on+the+way+up%2C+with+a+number+of+South+African+corporates+embracing+it%2C+no+doubt+aided+by+the+launching+of+new+local+data+centres.+Microsoft+Azure+launched+in+the+South+African+North+and+West+regions%2C+and+Amazon+Web+Services+%28AWS%29+is+expected+to+launch+in+Cape+Town+in+the+first+half+of+2020.+This+helps+fuel+the+DevOps+movement+to+automate+integration+and+deployment+processes%2C+with+containerisation+and+orchestration+continuing+to+be+a+big+theme+of+2019.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAppetite+for+an+API+economy+is+still+on+the+rise%2C+especially+with+financial+institutions+looking+to+grow+business-to-business+partnerships+by+exposing+some+of+their+data+and+functionality.+API+managers+and+gateways+are+becoming+commonplace+with+controlled+access+to+underlying+%28micro%29services.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+focus+on+the+end-users+has+led+to+a+big+drive+in+the+fields+of+customer+and+user+experience+%28CX+%26amp%3B+UX%29%2C+with+more+and+more+projects+kicking+off+with+the+goal+of+ensuring+user+needs+coupled+with+long-term+strategic+vision+are+front+and+centre.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWith+respect+to+coding+languages+being+utilised%2C+expect+no+big+surprises+with+C%23%2C+Java%2C+JavaScript+and+SQL+still+dominating+the+industry.+Kotlin+and+Swift+are+of+course+now+the+languages+to+use+when+starting+out+new+native+Android+and+iOS+applications+respectively+%28over+Java+and+Objective-C%29.+We+do+expect+to+see+a+bit+more+usage+of+Go%2C+Scala+and+Python+in+2019+going+through+to+2020.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESingle-page+applications+are+becoming+the+norm+for+web+development%2C+with+React+probably+making+gains+on+Angular+as+the+framework+of+choice+for+new+projects.+TypeScript+of+course+has+always+been+popular+after+Angular+took+the+baton+from+AngularJS%2C+but+is+recently+drawing+more+favour+from+the+rest+of+the+JavaScript+community%2C+including+usage+with+React+and+Node.js.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWith+support+and+maturity+increasing+for+Progressive+Web+Apps%2C+they+have+been+growing+in+popularity+with+Apple+seemingly+also+turning+the+corner+after+historically+not+embracing+them+as+much+as+Android.+Native+mobile+development+is+the+preference+in+general+for+consumer+focused+products+of+larger+organisations+who+can+support+multiple%2Fhybrid+app+teams.+In+terms+of+hybrid+and+cross-platform+offerings%2C+React+Native+seems+to+be+the+most+favoured+over+Cordova%2FPhoneGap%2C+with+some+interest+spiking+in+Google%26rsquo%3Bs+Flutter.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+the+data+space%2C+data+lakes+are+being+utilised+more+and+more%2C+while+PowerBI+is+being+embraced+by+more+organisations+over+Qlik+and+Tableau+tools.+This+year+augmented+analytics+%28with+the+use+of+enabling+technologies+such+as+AI+and+Machine+Learning%29+has+been+making+insights+more+prevalent+and+increasing+data+literacy+across+organisations.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBeing+in+a+fast-paced+environment%2C+it+is+important+to+keep+up+with+the+latest+trends+and+skills+required+to+deliver+quality+software.+Here%26rsquo%3Bs+looking+forward+to+an+exciting+2020%21%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E-+Greg+Schroder.+Manager%3A+Solutions+Architecture+at+Entelect%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ca+class%3D%22button-box2+button-box%22+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fretrospectives.entelect.co.za%22%3EClick+here+to+read+the+full+publication+%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E With+technology+ever-changing%2C+it%E2%80%99s+always+good+to+take+a+step+back+and+look+at+a+snapshot+of+where+we+are+right+now.+We+look+back+at+the+approaches%2C+languages%2C+frameworks%2C+tools+and+everything+else+we+need+to+create+quality+software+that+has+delivered+real+business+value.+Doing+this+each+year+allows+us+to+identify+trends+in+technologies+and+their+adoptions+-+retrospection%21+Towards+the+end+of+each+year%2C+we+ask+our+600+professionals+to+complete+a+%E2%80%9CState+of+Technology%E2%80%9D+survey%2C+asking+a+variety+of+questions+from+the+tools+and+processes+we+put+to+use%2C+to+some+fun+and+interesting+practices.+We+have+spent+the+year+working+across+multiple+industries+and+tech+stacks%2C+in+both+local+and+global+organisations.+This+has+equipped+us+with+a+plethora+of+knowledge+and+experience+to+derive+and+share+meaningful+insights+via+the+survey. ["Publications"] Retrospectives 2019- LI - FB.png
The+business+perspective%3A+Ambition+and+differentiation %3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FTechPub4-TW.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+800px%3B+height%3A+401px%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+As+outlined+in+the+previous+chapter%2C+the+life+of+a+disruptive+solution+in+an+established+enterprise+should+always+start+with+a+vision.+The+vision+for+where+an+organisation+wants+to+be%2C+what+it+looks+like%2C+and+what+it+offers+in+future+is+where+innovation+happens%2C+as+opposed+to+putting+out+fires+and+only+addressing+the+problems+that+exist+now.+The+business+aspect+in+the+lifecycle+is+critical+to+the+success+of+the+solution.+Ultimately%2C+the+solution+is+simply+a+tool+to+facilitate+the+ambitions+of+the+business+and+possibly+differentiate+from+competitors.+This+chapter+looks+at+the+important+facets+in+a+successful+solution+regarding+alignment%2C+evaluating+value%2C+mitigating+risk%2C+assigning+accountability%2C+and+understanding+the+operations+of+the+business.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FBusinessPerspective-01.png%22+style%3D%22padding%3A+0px+15px%3B+width%3A+400px%3B+float%3Aright%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E01.+Alignment%3A+Stakeholder+buy-in+and+alignment%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22margin-right%3A100px%3B%22%3EAfter+the+process+of+exploring+and+defining+a+vision+-+which+stakeholders+from+different+areas+in+the+business+should+be+part+of+-+a+consensus+must+be+agreed+upon+by+the+stakeholders.+Key+decision-makers%2C+including+executives%2C+managers%2C+and+operations%2C+must+have+an+understanding+of+exactly+what+is+trying+to+be+achieved+and+how+it+will+impact+their+respective+areas.+The+proposed+solution+should+be+well+understood+and+in+alignment+with+existing+initiatives+and+tactics%2C+or+at+very+least%2C+not+directly+hinder+them.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Innovative+solutions+usually+challenge+the+status+quo+which+causes+uneasiness+among+stakeholders%2C+and+challenges+the+existing+tried+and+trusted+ways+of+doing+things.+However%2C+if+the+need+for+change+is+embraced%2C+driven+top-down+and+transparent%2C+then+the+energy+and+willingness+of+teams+are+boosted%2C+which+usually+reduces+friction.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22margin-right%3A100px%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22margin-right%3A100px%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FBusinessPerspective-02.png%22+style%3D%22padding%3A+0px+15px%3B+width%3A+200px%3B+float%3Aleft%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22margin-left%3A100px%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22margin-left%3A100px%3B%22%3E%3Cstrong%3E02.+Value%3A+Data-driven+decisions%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+It+tends+to+be+easy+to+make+decisions+based+on+gut-feel+and+push+your+ideas+because%2C+well%2C+they%26rsquo%3Bre+your+ideas+%26ndash%3B+you+want+to+add+value+and+be+recognised+for+doing+so.+But+this+becomes+dangerous+when+an+idea%2C+or+at+least+the+core+mechanics+of+the+idea%2C+have+not+been+validated.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIt+can%26rsquo%3Bt+be+disputed+that+people+with+years+of+experience+in+an+industry+or+business+understand+underlying+trends+and+invisible+consequences+of+actions%2C+but+that+intuition+is+based+on+the+past.+Businesses+have+thrived+via+traditional+models+while+making+small+tweaks+to+react+to+the+market+and+demands+of+the+consumer.+But+rapid+advances+in+technology+require+one+to+take+a+step+back%2C+and+apply+knowledge+and+experience+while+taking+some+risk+in+trying+something+unheard+of.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+risk+can+be+mitigated+by+making+decisions+based+on+data.+By+utilising+data+from+sales%2C+retention%2C+behaviour+and+usage%2C+operations%2C+and+the+respective+costs+for+those+areas%2C+decisions+can+be+based+on+facts+rather+than+a+hunch.+Analysing+competitor+performance+where+they+have+adopted+similar+approaches+is+also+useful+in+validating+the+viability+of+a+solution.+Although+these+techniques+do+not+eliminate+risk+completely%2C+they+provide+guidance+and+informs+decisions+going+forward.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E03.+Cost+vs+value%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+One+of+the+primary+considerations+for+embarking+on+an+innovation+project+is+the+cost+versus+value+to+execute.+What+is+the+return+on+investment%3F+When+will+it+start+making+a+difference%3F+As+with+anything%2C+a+return+on+investment%2C+especially+a+big+one%2C+is+not+guaranteed.+However%2C+there+are+different+approaches+to+consider+that+can+reduce+costs%2C+and+ease+sceptical+minds.+These+approaches+include+design+sprints+where+ideas+are+fleshed+out%2C+prototyped%2C+tested%2C+and+reported+on+during+the+week+before+a+large+project+is+undertaken.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAnother+approach+is+minimum+viable+product+%28MVP%29+based+development.+The+controversy+%26ndash%3B+MVP+is+often+misunderstood+as+%26ldquo%3Bwhat+we+have+plus+these+things%26rdquo%3B.+An+MVP+should+simply+contain+the+%26ldquo%3Bwhat+we+have%26rdquo%3B%2C+or+the+%26ldquo%3Bplus+these+things%26rdquo%3B%2C+or+do+something+different.+Migrating+existing+features+to+a+new+technology+is+not+an+%26ldquo%3Binnovation%26rdquo%3B+project%3B+it+is+good+practice+if+a+legacy+system+is+no+longer+viable.+Sure%2C+this+might+enable+future+innovation%2C+but+we%26rsquo%3Bre+talking+about+truly+doing+something+differentiating.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+most+successful+approach+is+to+embrace+change+and+accept+failure.+To+accomplish+this%2C+you+commission+a+team+to+work+on+the+new+project%2C+but+priorities+are+decided+on+at+each+sprint%2C+or+each+month.+If+they+need+improvement%2C+great+%26ndash%3B+iterate.+If+they+don%26rsquo%3Bt+work%2C+throw+them+away.+If+the+entire+idea+is+doomed%2C+disassemble+the+team.+The+cost+of+running+a+team+on+a+month-to-month+basis+while+testing+ideas+and+reacting+to+them+is+always+cheaper+than+commissioning+a+team+for+a+long+period+of+time%2C+with+a+constrained+specification+and+no+room+to+adapt+to+the+ever-changing+business+and+technology+landscape.+Every+cost+that+yields+learning+is+valuable+%26ndash%3B+the+trick+is+to+strike+a+balance.+Cost+of+learning+must+be+accepted%2C+however%2C+learning+and+never+leveraging+it+for+business+value+can+be+detrimental.+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E04.+Risk%3A+Change+management+and+service+design%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Apart+from+the+cost+of+development%2C+the+biggest+risks+in+these+projects+are+more+related+to+change+management+or+service+design.+The+individuals+in+the+organisation+have+learnt+the+lay+of+the+land%2C+and+it+is+human+nature+to+resist+change.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+management+of+training%2C+education%2C+and+roll-out+with+everyone+on+the+same+page+is+a+difficult+feat+if+not+enough+attention+is+paid+to+it.+This+is+true+for+customers+as+well.+Organisations+often+change+their+offerings+and+receive+backlash+from+customers+even+though+the+new+solution+is+objectively+better+%26ndash%3B+humans+don%26rsquo%3Bt+like+change.+Strategic+thinking+and+a+pragmatic+approach+are+needed.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FBusinessPerspective-03.png%22+style%3D%22padding%3A+0px+15px%3B+width%3A+400px%3B+float%3Aright%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E05.+Risk%3A+Consistency+over+big+bang%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Another+risk+is+in+setting+immovable+deadlines+for+releases+of+big+chunks+of+the+solution.+This+usually+ends+in+a+sub-par+experience%2C+poor+technical+quality%2C+or+unmet+expectations.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAn+approach+to+mitigate+this+is+to+release+smaller+iterations+faster%2C+test+the+behaviour+and+impact%2C+refine%2C+and+repeat+for+every+aspect+of+the+solution.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+implementation%2C+this+can+make+expectations+difficult+to+manage+%26ndash%3B+but+if+it+was+easy%2C+everyone+would+be+a+world-class%2C+bleeding+edge+enterprise.+More+often+than+not%2C+consistency+is+more+sustainable+and+successful+in+the+long+run+over+big+bang+releases.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E06.+Accountability%3A+Decision+making%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Although+there+should+be+buy-in+and+alignment+among+a+variety+of+stakeholders%2C+there+must+be+an+individual+owner+and+decider.+This+person+should+have+the+strategic+insight+of+the+organisation%2C+have+autonomy+in+making+critical+decisions%2C+and+influence+change.+This+individual+must+lean+on+others+for+different+insights+and+direction%2C+but+ultimately%2C+projects+that+rely+on+many+people+for+approvals+typically+create+blockers%2C+lose+momentum%2C+and+drain+energy+due+to+bureaucracy.+Making+decisions+as+a+committee+is+almost+always+nuanced+causing+long+wait+times+or+poor+outcomes+due+to+a+single+individual+not+being+invested+and+held+accountable.+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+decision-maker+must+be+available+and+decisive.+Do+you+need+to+allocate+office+space+for+this+special+project%3F+This+person+should+be+able+to+make+the+call.+Need+to+provision+an+account+for+a+specific+technology+or+platform%3F+This+person+should+be+able+to+make+the+call.+This+individual+is+ultimately+responsible+and+accountable+for+the+solution+and+people+involved+in+making+it+happen.+Furthermore%2C+the+individuals+that+comprise+the+team+should+have+autonomy+and+use+their+discretion+for+micro+decisions+that+need+to+be+made+on+a+daily+and+hourly+basis.+By+embracing+this%2C+measuring+solution+performance%2C+and+being+open+to+iterate+and+fail%2C+magic+happens.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E07.+Priority+and+communication%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Friction+in+priority+and+communication+are+common+themes+in+innovation+projects.+Everyone+is+excited+and+looking+for+how+they+can+leverage+the+initiative.+Having+a+single+solution+provide+direct+value+to+multiple+stakeholders+in+different+departments+within+the+organisation+can+be+problematic.+It+is+obvious+that+each+stakeholder+will+look+out+for+their+own+department+first+and+negotiate+for+their+priorities.+A+strong+owner+must+be+able+to+understand+the+needs+of+the+different+stakeholders%2C+prioritise%2C+and+communicate+what+will+happen%2C+when+it+will+happen%2C+and+why+that+decision+is+preferable.+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E08.+Business+Analysis%3A+Understand+operations+at+all+levels%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+It+is+important+to+understand+the+operations+of+the+business+from+all+levels.+For+example%2C+what+are+the+economies+within+the+business%2C+what+is+the+average+customer+acquisition+cost%2C+what+is+the+process+followed+in+branches%2C+what+daily+planning+happens+for+different+teams.+A+general+understanding+of+these+facets+reveals+hidden+mechanisms+which+mould+the+solution%2C+helps+address+problems+before+they+happen%2C+and+creates+champions+for+progression+in+the+employee+structure+if+they+are+involved+and+heard+from+the+beginning.+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+After+looking+at+the+processes+that+exist+in+the+business%2C+hidden+business+rules%2C+exception+cases%2C+and+ways+to+handle+them+emerge.+This+understanding+allows+for+consolidation+of+business+rules%2C+simplification%2C+and+leaner+operations.+These+rules+will+also+be+changed+and%2For+developed+into+the+new+solution+being+developed.+With+more+unknowns+comes+more+complexity%2C+cases+to+cater+for%2C+and+uncertainty.+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Although+embracing+iterative+development%2C+failure%2C+and+learning+is+good%2C+this+does+not+negate+the+need+for+a+concise+and+understandable+functional+specification.+This+could+be+a+document%2C+but+more+preferably%2C+user+stories+that+both+business+and+technology+teams+can+understand.+The+use+of+collaborative+tools+to+track+stories+and+share+details+about+them+is+invaluable+to+productivity.+These+can+manifest+in+story+boards%2C+wikis%2C+and+other+tools+that+improve+the+productivity+of+everyone+%26ndash%3B+do+what+works+for+the+people.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FBusinessPerspective-04.png%22+style%3D%22padding%3A+0px+15px%3B+width%3A+350px%3B+float%3Aleft%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E09.+IT+and+technology%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+There+is+a+chapter+about+technology+later%2C+but+at+this+point+in+the+journey%2C+it+is+critical+to+involve+and+build+rapport+with+the+existing+IT+teams.+Generally%2C+IT+divisions+have+been+a+function+within+the+company+that+took+care+of+the+infrastructure+to+enable+individuals+within+the+organisation.+This+included+overarching+concerns+such+as+provisioning+of+computers%2C+managing+networks%2C+managing+software+licences%2C+and+sometimes+developing+solutions.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+this+day+and+age%2C+IT+is+part+of+almost+every+business+function.+IT+skills+and+decision+makers+are+mandated+to+build+and+maintain+technology.+For+this+to+be+successful%2C+business+and+technology+must+work+together+and+cannot+be+separated+concerns+anymore.+Involving+IT+teams+in+at+the+beginning+creates+ownership%2C+buy-in%2C+and+energy+to+work+together+rather+than+receiving+tasks+with+little+context+over+a+wall.+Understanding+the+existing+IT+landscape+is+useful+in+planning+ahead.+Existing+adopted+technology+should+not+stifle+the+technology+decisions+for+the+solution%2C+but+planning+for+how+it+can+be+incorporated+as+seamlessly+as+possible+is+a+real+need+which+is+better+embarked+on+earlier+rather+than+later.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EUltimately%2C+the+success+of+any+solution%2C+whether+it+involves+technology+or+not%2C+is+centred+around+people.+We+need+to+facilitate+communication+and+alignment+in+understanding%2C+mitigate+risk%2C+forecast+value%2C+and+learn+from+what+we+do.+With+these+fundamental+principles%2C+solving+hard+problems+becomes+easier.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Read+the+full+%3Cstrong%3EFrom+Here+to+There%3C%2Fstrong%3E+publication+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fculture.entelect.co.za%2Four-engineering%2Fdisruptive-software-2019%2F%22%3Ehere%3C%2Fa%3E.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E As+outlined+in+the+previous+chapter%2C+the+life+of+a+disruptive+solution+in+an+established+enterprise+should+always+start+with+a+vision.+The+vision+for+where+an+organisation+wants+to+be%2C+what+it+looks+like%2C+and+what+it+offers+in+future+is+where+innovation+happens%2C+as+opposed+to+putting+out+fires+and+only+addressing+the+problems+that+exist+now.+The+business+aspect+in+the+lifecycle+is+critical+to+the+success+of+the+solution.+Ultimately%2C+the+solution+is+simply+a+tool+to+facilitate+the+ambitions+of+the+business+and+possibly+differentiate+from+competitors.+This+chapter+looks+at+the+important+facets+in+a+successful+solution+regarding+alignment%2C+evaluating+value%2C+mitigating+risk%2C+assigning+accountability%2C+and+understanding+the+operations+of+the+business.
