Quality+and+certainty+rely+on+a+process %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FTechPub5-FB-LI.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAny+engineering+discipline+requires+a+reliable+process+to+produce+solutions+or+products+that+bring+value+to+an+organisation.+The+chosen+process+should+help+teams+to+deliver+a+quality+solution+or+product+within+a+predictable+timeline+and+at+a+sustainable+pace.+In+software%2C+this+process+is+called+the+Software+Development+Life+Cycle+%28SDLC%29+which+has+process+elements+including+requirements+gathering%2C+design%2C+implementation%2C+testing%2C+deployment+and+maintenance.+Various+nuances+of+these+process+elements+exist+and+are+applied+differently+depending+on+the+environment+the+team+find+themselves+in.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FJan2020-1.png%22+style%3D%22padding%3A+0px+15px%3B+width%3A+400px%3B+float%3Aright%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E01.+Agile+means+being+adaptable%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Software+teams+struggle+when+the+principles+and+values+of+the+chosen+process+are+rooted+in+traditional+manufacturing+and+engineering+disciplines.+The+software+engineering+profession+is+fundamentally+different+in+several+ways+which+causes+traditional+processes+to+fail.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETraditional+planning+is+centred+around+predictable+tasks+or+activities+with+known+manufacturing+times+while+software+projects+usually+start+with+an+end+goal+and+the+tasks+or+activities+are+discovered+and+figured+out+along+the+way.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EProgress+is+not+linear+to+time+because+in+problem+solving%2C+people+generally+start+to+work+faster+as+soon+as+the+problem+is+solved.+In+traditional+manufacturing%2C+the+throughput+rate+is+usually+consistent+and+linear+to+time.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+the+following+sections+we+will+look+at+some+key+considerations+for+implementing+a+successful+software+development+process.+Whether+your+organisation+calls+it+Agile%2C+Waterfall+or+any+hybrid+SDLC+in+between+those+two+extremes%2C+we+advocate+to+focus+on+getting+four+key+considerations+right+for+the+development+process.+They+are+called+considerations+because+this+gives+organisations+the+freedom+to+make+it+work+in+their+context+instead+of+feeling+like+they+are+failing+because+they+do+not+follow+the+Agile+or+Waterfall+textbook.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E02.+Software+Development+Lifecycles%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+first+consideration+is+demystifying+the+noise+around+the+SDLC+and+whether+teams+are+following+an+Agile+approach.+The+reality+is+that+Agile+is+not+a+process%2C+but+rather+a+set+of+values+and+principles+that+a+team+lives+and+applies+daily.+This+gives+the+team+the+freedom+to+follow+any+process+or+methodology+they+like+while+pursuing+continuous+improvement+in+iterative+cycles.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+Agile+manifesto+proposes+the+following+values+for+an+adaptive+team+and+development+lifecycle%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BIndividuals+and+interactions+over+processes+and+tools%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BWorking+software+over+comprehensive+documentation%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BCustomer+collaboration+over+contract+negotiation%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BResponding+to+change+over+following+a+plan%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThat+is%2C+while+there+is+value+in+the+items+on+the+right%2C+we+value+the+items+on+the+left+more.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIf+we+evaluate+the+manifesto+from+a+process+point+of+view%2C+it+is+clear+that+whatever+methodology+you+choose%2C+make+sure+you+have+regular+interactions+with+all+stakeholders+in+the+project.+The+process+should+make+time+in+everyone%26rsquo%3Bs+calendars+to+talk+and+discuss+the+project.+The+goal+is+to+have+effective+conversations+about+the+project+on+a+regular+basis+and+we+have+found+that+co-location+and+face-to-face+discussions+is+the+preferred+approach.+The+best+alternative+to+co-location+and+face-to-face+discussions+is+to+have+video+conferencing+combined+with+an+instant+messaging+platform+geared+towards+group+discussions.+When+working+with+a+distributed+team%2C+the+most+effective+approach+is+when+everyone+is+remote.+A+co-located+group+with+a+minority+of+individuals+remoting+in+tends+to+treat+the+remote+members+as+second-class+citizens.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+process+must+enable+the+delivery+of+working+software+instead+of+creating+documents+which+do+not+solve+business+problems.+Documentation+must+have+an+audience+and+only+describe+concepts+which+do+not+often+change%2C+e.g.+project+vision+and+purpose%2C+logical+system+architecture%2C+and+business+rules+and+key+decisions+made+during+the+project+that+have+a+significant+impact.+Specifying+features+in+detail+will+often+not+be+accurate+and+maintaining+the+documentation+becomes+cumbersome+and+adds+little+value.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEconomic+factors+will+play+a+role+in+customer+collaboration%2C+and+so+contract+negotiation+cannot+be+ignored.+Projects+do+not+have+unlimited+budgets+and+need+to+be+delivered+within+the+economic+constraints+of+the+business.+The+principle+here+is+that+if+customers+are+part+of+the+development+process%2C+then+the+solution+or+project+will+evolve+and+change+with+the+team.+The+scope+negotiated+at+the+start+of+the+project+should+not+be+enforced+to+the+letter+if+the+final+delivered+solution+still+solves+the+business+problem%2C+which+is+typically+not+the+same+as+originally+envisaged+at+inception.+Being+clear+on+the+project+vision+and+purpose+at+the+start+of+the+journey+will+aid+the+team+to+make+decisions+as+the+project+evolves+and+test+their+decisions+against+this+vision+and+purpose.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FJan2020-2.png%22+style%3D%22padding%3A+0px+15px%3B+width%3A+400px%3B+float%3Aleft%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ERegular+planning+sessions+enable+the+team+to+respond+to+change+rather+than+creating+a+plan+up+front+and+sticking+to+it+no+matter+what.+Different+levels+of+planning+from+a+high-level+flight+plan%2C+to+a+sprint+plan+broken+down+into+tasks+all+contribute+to+keeping+the+team+focussed+on+what+must+happen+next+while+keeping+an+eye+on+the+overall+project+progress.+Scope+creep+or+changes+in+direction+need+to+be+embraced+but+must+be+done+in+a+responsible+way.+Changes+in+planning+should+be+done+between+iterations+to+keep+the+team+focussed+during+the+iteration.+Having+a+high-level+flight+plan+coupled+with+a+detailed+sprint+plan+helps+the+team+to+determine+the+impact+of+scope+changes+to+the+overall+project+scope.%26nbsp%3B+The+stakeholders+must+be+involved+in+the+planning+sessions+to+make+decisions+if+plans+need+to+be+adjusted.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E3.+Cross-functional+teams%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Other+considerations+for+software+development+processes+include+skills+and+capability%2C+prioritisation%2C+and+participation+and+transparency.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Any+process+is+only+as+good+as+the+people+who+execute+it%2C+and+making+sure+that+a+team+of+individuals+have+the+right+skill+combinations+for+the+problem+space%2C+is+how+we+build+self-organising+teams.+This+requires+people+to+have+analysis%2C+development%2C+testing%2C+data+and+project+management+skills+within+the+team.+It+does+not+mean+that+one+person+is+responsible+for+each+of+these+disciplines+but+rather+the+team+needs+these+skills+spread+across+individuals.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ELarge+organisations+tend+to+employ+people+to+fulfil+a+specific+responsibility+in+the+SDLC%2C+e.g.+only+do+analysis%2C+development%2C+testing+or+project+management.+This+approach+will+inevitably+lead+to+silos+and+bottle+necks+within+the+organisation%2C+coupled+with+a+large+management+overhead.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+size+of+a+team+is+also+a+factor+which+is+considered.+Having+two+teams+of+5+is+usually+more+effective+than+having+one+team+of+10.+Quality+practices+like+pull+requests%2C+code+reviews+and+interpersonal+communication+are+all+affected+by+the+size+of+a+team.+A+truly+self-organising+team+requires+a+high+level+of+awareness+within+the+team+and+this+becomes+challenging+in+a+large+team.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EPrioritisation+and+clarity%2C+or+a+shared+understanding+of+what+needs+to+be+built%2C+is+the+cornerstone+of+effective+software+teams.+A+self-organising+team+is+about+trusting+the+team+to+figure+out+how+to+solve+a+problem.+It+is+not+about+letting+the+team+figure+out+business+priority+and+what+needs+to+be+solved.+The+process+for+delivering+good+software+ensures+that+a+shared+understanding+is+created+between+the+business+stakeholders+and+development+team%2C+which+is+why+a+good+project+vision+is+key.+Techniques+like+joint+application+design+%28JAD%29+sessions%2C+event+storming+and+user+journeys%2Fstoryboards+are+all+powerful+ways+to+create+a+shared+understanding.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FJan2020-3.png%22+style%3D%22padding%3A+0px+15px%3B+width%3A+400px%3B+float%3Aright%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETo+effectively+prioritise%2C+the+team+and+decision+makers+need+to+gain+insight+into+the+value+vs+effort%2C+as+well+as+dependencies+to+deliver.+Clear+and+concise+acceptance+criteria+for+tasks+or+user+stories+will+enable+the+team+to+estimate+with+a+higher+level+of+confidence+and+point+out+any+dependencies+which+need+to+be+resolved+before+development+can+start.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ECreating+a+backlog+of+user+stories+or+features+with+clear+acceptance+criteria+and+associated+effort+estimations%2C+enables+decision-makers+to+weigh+up+different+options.+This+allows+them+to+decide+on+what+the+team+needs+to+work+on+for+the+next+period.+This+can+only+happen+if+the+decision-makers+are+available+for+the+relevant+ceremonies+conducted+in+the+team+for+project+planning+and+discussions.+Context%2C+continuity+and+authority+to+make+decisions+in+the+business+make+for+successful+projects.+When+decision+making+is+deferred+to+a+group+of+people+who+are+not+involved+in+the+project+on+a+regular+basis%2C+it+usually+results+in+rework%2C+missed+deadlines+and+demotivated+teams.+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E4.+Take+aways%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+final+consideration+for+a+good+process+is+participation+and+transparency+from+all+stakeholders.+People+enjoy+ownership+of+delivery+if+they+are+part+of+the+planning+and+decision-making+process.+Making+commitments+on+behalf+of+the+delivery+team+leaves+them+feeling+like+resources+and+demotivated.+A+process+that+enables+open+feedback+with+regular+demos+and+a+safe+environment+which+values+the+ideas+from+all+stakeholders+lead+to+a+more+refined+solution.+End+users+will+have+a+better+experience+using+the+solution+and+focus+will+be+given+to+high+value+features.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ca+class%3D%22button-box2+button-box%22+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fculture.entelect.co.za%2Four-engineering%2Fdisruptive-software-2019%2F%22%3ERead+the+full+From+Here+to+There+publication+%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E Any+engineering+discipline+requires+a+reliable+process+to+produce+solutions+or+products+that+bring+value+to+an+organisation.+The+chosen+process+should+help+teams+to+deliver+a+quality+solution+or+product+within+a+predictable+timeline+and+at+a+sustainable+pace.+In+software%2C+this+process+is+called+the+Software+Development+Life+Cycle+%28SDLC%29+which+has+process+elements+including+requirements+gathering%2C+design%2C+implementation%2C+testing%2C+deployment+and+maintenance.+Various+nuances+of+these+process+elements+exist+and+are+applied+differently+depending+on+the+environment+the+team+find+themselves+in. ["Publications"] Tech Pub 5 - FB - LI.png
Technology%3A+Understanding+the+digital+landscape %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FTechPub6-FB-LI.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESoftware+plays+a+role+in+almost+every+part+of+every+business.+Technical+teams+are+responsible+for+understanding+the+digital+landscape+within+the+organisation+and+outside+of+it.+This+includes+selecting+the+most+sensible+tools+and+frameworks+to+solve+problems%2C+and+designing+software+using+best+practices+to+enable+maintainable+solutions+that+can+evolve+going+forward.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+order+to+make+system+design+decisions%2C+some+level+of+understanding+is+needed+of+what+the+envisioned+functional+and+non-functional+requirements+are.+The+following+questions+need+to+be+answered%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BWhat+is+the+problem+we+are+trying+to+solve%3F+%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BWho%2Fwhat+will+use+it%3F+%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BWhat+does+the+existing+technology+landscape+look+like+and+what+integrations+are+needed%3F+%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BHow+must+it+scale+and+perform%3F+%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BWho+is+going+to+develop+and+maintain+it%3F+%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BWhat+technical+skills+are+available%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETaking+the+answers+to+these+questions+into+account%2C+we+will+be+able+to+make+critical+decisions+like%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BWhere+the+solution+will+be+deployed+and+hosted%3F%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BWhich+technologies+will+be+used+to+build+the+solution%3F%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BWhat+the+plan+is+for+scaling+up+under+load%3F%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BWhat+security+measures+are+needed%3F%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BHow+does+the+solution+fit+into+the+greater+technology+ecosystem%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThere+are+several+technology+and+deployment+stacks+available+today%2C+each+with+their+own+advantages+and+disadvantages.+There+are+differences+to+what+each+technology+is+good+at+and+the+ease+with+which+they+can+be+used+to+implement+different+types+of+solutions%2C+but+often+the+deciding+factor+is+what+skills+are+available+in+the+team+who+is+to+develop+and+maintain+it+and+where+the+team+is+going+strategically.+As+new+technologies+come+out+frequently+one+does+want+to+be+a+little+conservative%3A+one+should+make+sure+any+proposed+technology+has+a+proven+track+record+with+regards+to+scalability+and+maintainability.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E1.+Architecture%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+When+designing+a+solution+there+are+many+technical+architecture+considerations+known+as+non-functional+requirements+that+need+to+be+considered.+Even+if+most+of+these+requirements+are+not+implemented+at+the+start%2C+it+is+essential+to+keep+them+in+mind+from+the+beginning+and+have+a+clear+understanding+of+how+provision+will+be+made+when+the+time+comes+to+cater+for+them.+This+is+needed+because+these+types+of+requirements+typically+take+much+more+effort+to+implement+later+in+the+life+of+the+solution+if+no+consideration+was+given+to+them+early+on.+Some+examples+are+mentioned+on+the+next+page.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BScalability%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+This+is+how+system+resources+are+added+to+handle+a+growing+amount+of+work%2C+e.g.+adding+memory+to+the+database+host+or+adding+another+node+on+a+cluster.+Some+applications+%28especially+legacy+applications%29+can+only+be+scaled+vertically.+This+means+more+resources+like+memory+or+CPU+power+must+be+added+to+a+single+server+in+order+to+get+better+performance.+However+this+has+physical+limits%2C+and+costs+increase+faster+than+the+improvement+in+performance.+It+is+preferable+for+an+application+to+allow+horizontal+scaling+to+allow+adding+more+average+powered+nodes+to+a+cluster+for+better+performance.+This+is+typically+more+cost-effective+and+has+many+secondary+benefits%2C+such+as+better+availability+and+reliability.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BThroughput%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+rate+at+which+the+system+must+be+able+to+handle+requests%2C+e.g.+the+number+of+transactions+per+second+the+system+must+cater+for.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BPerformance%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+amount+of+useful+work+accomplished+by+the+system+with+a+given+amount+of+resources%2C+e.g.+having+a+low+response+time+or+low+resource+utilisation.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BVolumes%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+How+much+data+the+system+must+be+able+to+handle%2C+e.g.+storing+two+million+records+per+year+or+handle+1MB+file+imports.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BSecurity%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+resilience+the+system+has+against+potential+harm%2C+unwanted+changes+and+data+leaks.+No+system+is+100%25+secure.+The+key+business+risks+need+to+be+understood+for+appropriate+technical+solutions+to+be+implemented.+For+instance%2C+proper+web+security+and+encryption+are+sufficient+for+most+public+facing+web+applications.+However+when+money+is+involved%2C+e.g.+with+a+bank+website%2C+extra+levels+of+authentication%2C+encryption%2C+monitoring+and+auditing+are+required.+Threat+modelling+is+a+technique+for+identifying%2C+preventing+and+mitigating+threats+in+an+optimised+way+by+determining+where+the+most+effort+should+be+applied+as+the+system+and+external+factors+change.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BReliability%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+probability+that+the+system+behaves+as+designed.+No+system+is+100%25+reliable%2C+so+it+needs+to+be+understood+what+the+risk+to+the+business+is+if+a+single+transaction+fails+due+to+system+failure.+The+envisaged+design+needs+to+take+this+into+account+and+find+solutions+to+have+the+desired+reliability%2C+e.g.+the+system+can+automatically+retry+certain+steps+that+are+susceptible+to+network+timeouts.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BAvailability%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+proportion+of+time+a+system+is+in+a+functioning+condition.+No+system+is+100%25+available+so+the+business+risks+related+to+any+downtime+needs+to+be+understood+and+catered+for.+If+the+business+loses+money+for+every+second+the+system+is+down%2C+a+high+availability+like+99.99%25+up-time+may+be+the+service+level+agreement%2C+thus+requiring+many+levels+of+redundancy+in+the+system.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BMaintainability%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+ease+with+which+defects+can+be+fixed+or+new+features+added+to+the+system.+Short-lived+research+applications+might+not+have+the+same+maintainability+requirements+as+a+core+business+application+that+must+last+more+than+10+years.+This+is+a+balancing+act+of+spending+extra+effort+to+make+the+system+more+maintainable+versus+using+the+time+to+add+new+features+faster.+Developers+with+different+personalities+types+tend+to+have+wildly+different+natural+biases+in+this+regard%2C+so+the+vision+of+the+business+must+be+clear+so+that+good+decisions+can+be+made+by+the+team.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BInternationalisation%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Should+the+system+be+able+to+be+adapted+to+various+languages+and+regions+without+engineering+changes%3F+If+a+front-end+does+not+cater+for+this+from+the+start%2C+it+can+be+a+lot+of+effort+to+add+this+later+in+the+lifecycle.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E2.+Front-end%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Most+modern+applications+are+mainly+accessed+via+a+web+front-end+or+a+mobile+application.+Unless+there+are+specific+business+requirements%2C+it+usually+makes+sense+to+start+off+on+a+responsive+web+application+that+works+on+different+devices+%26ndash%3B+the+userbase+should+determine+how+much+effort+to+put+into+making+it+scale+well+to+mobile+devices.+This+is+highly+dependent+on+the+context+of+the+problem+and+the+users+involved.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EA+public+facing+application+will+almost+always+need+to+function+well+on+both+mobile+and+desktop+environments%2C+whereas+a+business+facing+application+might+only+ever+be+accessed+on+a+specific+platform.+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3Eo%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BWeb%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Depending+on+the+business+requirements%2C+there+are+several+options+for+making+the+system+available+online.+Informative+websites+typically+only+contain+static+web+content+which+is+fairly+simple+to+host+on+premises+%28low-medium+volume%29+or+in+the+cloud.+For+high+volume+static+content%2C+a+content+delivery+network+%28CDN%29+might+be+used+which+spreads+the+load+across+the+globe.+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThere+are+different+ways+of+implementing+web+applications+that+support+user+interaction.+Initially+web+applications+were+built+using+frameworks+that+rendered+the+final+HTML+on+the+server+but+this+does+not+scale+well.+Now+we+mostly+host+a+single+static+web+page+containing+a+JavaScript+library+%28SPA%29+on+the+server+and+let+the+final+HTML+rendering+happen+on+the+client+browser.+A+Bootstrap+page+is+loaded+first+and+any+additional+resources+are+retrieved+as+needed.+Data+access+is+achieved+using+data+exchange+paradigms+like+REST+which+is+more+efficient+than+transferring+fully+rendered+web+pages.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+order+to+provide+a+native-feeling+application+via+the+web+browser+one+can+implement+a+progressive+web+application+%28PWA%29.+They+are+built+using+common+web+technologies+including+HTML%2C+CSS+and+JavaScript+so+they+are+intended+to+work+on+any+platform+that+uses+a+modern+standards-compliant+browser.+Functionality+that+a+normal+web+application+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt+typically+provide+but+that+native+mobile+or+desktop+apps+do+provide%2C+can+be+obtained+when+implementing+a+PWA%2C+e.g.+working+offline%2C+push+notifications%2C+device+hardware+access%2C+enabling+creating+user+experiences+similar+to+native+applications+on+desktop+and+mobile+devices.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3Eo%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BMobile%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FIMG2801-1.png%22+style%3D%22padding%3A+0px+15px%3B+width%3A+400px%3B+float%3Aright%3B%22+%2F%3EA+In+order+to+provide+a+mobile+presence%2C+one+can+implement+multiple+native+applications+using+the+platform%26rsquo%3Bs+native+tools.+This+is+typically+the+best+user+experience+for+rich+applications+that+need+a+lot+of+device+interaction+and+offline+capabilities.+However%2C+since+a+completely+different+application+needs+to+be+implemented+for+each+mobile+platform+%28Android%2C+iOS%2C+etc.%29%2C+it+can+be+costly+and+finding+specialised+developers+could+be+a+challenge.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThere+are+alternative+options+like+using+a+cross-platform+framework+where+one+application+is+developed+that+works+on+multiple+mobile+platforms+with+a+lot+less+effort+than+supporting+multiple+native+apps.+The+frameworks+are+not+perfect+as+there+are+limitations+and+potentially+a+slightly+less-than-native+feel+to+the+application%2C+but+depending+on+the+business+requirement+this+could+be+an+option.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAs+mentioned+in+the+web+section%2C+PWAs+are+also+an+option+with+even+less+specialist+skill+requirements+and+effort%2C+but+with+more+limitations.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E3.+Back-end%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+As+applications+have+grown+larger+and+more+complex+over+time%2C+with+higher+demands+on+scalability+and+availability%2C+application+architectures+have+adapted+accordingly+to+support+them.+Instead+of+building+a+monolithic+application+that+is+hard+to+scale+out+and+maintain%2C+applications+are+typically+broken+up+into+several+smaller+applications+or+micro+services+%26ndash%3B+each+with+its+own+focus%2C+maintenance+lifecycle+and+non-functional+requirements+%28scalability%2C+availability%2C+etc.%29+.+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESplitting+up+applications+into+small+pieces+helps+teams+to+understand+what+each+service+does+without+keeping+the+complexity+of+the+entire+application+in+mind.+This+requires+deployments+to+be+automated%2C+services+to+be+automatically+discoverable+and+connections+routed+accordingly.+Asynchronous+communications+help+the+system+to+cope+better+with+spikes+and+overall+stability.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAs+back-end+systems+are+broken+up+into+smaller+pieces+that+can+be+maintained+by+separate+teams%2C+it+can+make+sense+to+also+split+up+the+front-ends.+This+ensures+that+each+team+is+only+responsible+for+maintaining+their+little+piece+and+allowing+different+maintenance+and+framework+upgrade+cycles+%26ndash%3B+which+can+be+difficult+in+a+big+front-end+application.+There+is+typically+an+overarching+application+that+stitches+together+the+individual+pieces.+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FIMG2801-2.png%22+style%3D%22padding%3A+0px+15px%3B+width%3A+400px%3B+float%3Aright%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHistorically+all+applications+were+hosted+in+private+data+centres+that+had+to+be+maintained+by+teams+of+specialised+system+administrators.+Cloud+computing+seeks+to+commoditise+computing+infrastructure+by+implementing+large+scale+data+centres+that+can+be+optimised+and+provide+highly+reliable+and+scalable+infrastructure+with+less+effort+to+get+set+up+and+maintain.+Most+hosting+is+quickly+moving+to+the+cloud%2C+as+it+is+more+cost+effective+and+reliable+in+most+cases.+However%2C+many+businesses+still+use+physical+and+virtual+servers.+Private+cloud+hosting+can+be+an+option%2C+but+one+would+still+need+a+team+that+can+support+it.+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETo+be+cost+effective+in+the+cloud+requires+that+the+application+be+designed+to+work+efficiently+in+the+cloud.+The+traditional+mindset+of+having+a+virtual+server+that+you+maintain+manually+in+the+cloud+will+be+more+costly.+With+the+%26lsquo%3Bserverless%26rsquo%3B+model%2C+the+application+pieces+are+hosted+on+shared+infrastructure+that+is+highly+tuned+for+each+type+of+workload.+That+way+the+business+just+pays+for+each+usage+of+the+system+instead+of+renting+fixed+hardware+that+sits+idle+most+of+the+time.+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E4.+Persistence%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+This+is+an+area+where+incorrect+decisions+can+have+a+long-term+impact%2C+beyond+the+life+of+the+solution+itself.+Data+stores+tend+to+outlive+the+application+itself+and+have+value+to+the+business+outside+of+just+what+the+application+it+was+built+for+does.+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThere+are+some+important+questions+to+ask+when+choosing+a+persistence+layer%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BWhat+is+being+stored%2C+and+for+what+purpose%3F+%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BIs+the+data+heavily+numeric+with+a+requirement+to+perform+complicated+calculations+on+that+data%3F+%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BIs+it+high-volume+event+data+from+IoT+devices+where+the+individual+events+are+less+important+than+trends+and+anomalies%3F+%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BIs+it+unstructured%2C+where+there%26rsquo%3Bs+no+defined+or+expected+schema%2C+or+where+the+schema+is+expected+to+change+frequently%3F+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BTypes+of+persistence%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FIMG2801-3.png%22+style%3D%22padding%3A+0px+15px%3B+width%3A+400px%3B+float%3Aright%3B%22+%2F%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+There+are+several+types+of+databases+available+today.+The+relational+database+-+historically+the+most+popular+database+type+-+is+joined+by+document+databases%2C+graph+databases%2C+key-value+stores+and+more.+The+choice+of+database+type+should+be+guided+by+the+type+of+data+being+stored%2C+not+by+what+is+popular+in+the+media.+A+poor+decision+here+can+have+major+repercussions+throughout+the+application%26rsquo%3Bs+development+and+usage.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BPicking+a+solution%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+type+of+data+being+stored+is+not+the+only+consideration.+Consistency+and+data+security+are+two+other+important+aspects+that+must+be+taken+into+account+before+deciding+on+a+database+platform.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EConsistency+is+about+the+behaviour+of+the+system+under+concurrent+reads+and+writes.+If+three+processes+write+to+the+database+and+then+a+fourth+one+reads%2C+is+it+important+that+the+fourth+process+sees+all+three+of+the+writes%3F+Is+it+going+to+break+anything+in+the+application+if+it+only+sees+the+first+two%3F+Or+if+it+only+sees+the+third+write%3F+Typically%2C+relational+database+engines+only+support+strong+consistency%2C+meaning+that+in+the+example+the+fourth+process+would+always+see+all+three+writes%2C+while+non-relational+databases+support+eventual+consistency%2C+meaning+the+fourth+process+could+see+any+combination+of+the+writes%2C+including+none+of+them.+There+are+exceptions+however%2C+with+some+modern+database+systems+offering+selectable+consistency+models.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EData+security+has+always+been+important%2C+but+the+increasing+frequency+of+data+breaches+and+the+existence+of+laws+such+as+GDPR+have+brought+it+into+focus.+This+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+just+a+matter+of+whether+the+database+engine+has+any+known+security+vulnerabilities.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+also+about+auditing%2C+encryption%2C+granularity+of+permissions+and+a+lot+more.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIs+there+sensitive+data+in+the+database+that+needs+to+be+stored+encrypted%3F+If+so%2C+and+the+database+chosen+does+not+support+such+encryption%2C+then+the+application+development+gains+extra+complexity+as+the+encryption+would+have+to+be+implemented+within+the+application.+Depending+on+the+requirements%2C+it+may+also+be+worth+investigating+how+and+where+keys+can+be+stored%2C+what+kind+of+work+would+be+required+to+rotate+keys%2C+and+whether+the+encryption+protects+the+data+against+the+administrators+of+the+servers+or+not.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDoes+access+to+certain+types+of+data+need+to+be+tracked+and+audited%3F+Do+changes+need+to+be+audited%3F+Do+schema+changes%2C+in+the+case+of+relational+databases%2C+need+to+be+audited%3F+These+are+often+not+obvious+requirements+when+the+initial+application+requirements+are+detailed%2C+but+they+are+critically+important+nonetheless.+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOnce+all+the+technical+requirements+are+out+of+the+way%2C+there%26rsquo%3Bs+also+the+question+of+existing+skills+and+investments.+This+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+just+a+matter+of+what+the+development+team+is+familiar+with%2C+but+also+what+your+operations+teams+are+familiar+with.+Training+is+costly+and+time-consuming%2C+so+introducing+a+completely+new+database+engine+may+not+be+desirable.+This+goes+for+infrastructure+and+cloud+investments+as+well.+What+you+have+in+terms+of+infrastructure+and+where+they%26rsquo%3Bre+investing+in+a+cloud+footprint+%28or+if+you%26%2339%3Bre+staying+completely+on-prem%29+can+also+affect+the+choice+of+database+engine+used+for+the+application.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E5.+Business+intelligence%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FIMG2801-4.png%22+style%3D%22padding%3A+0px+15px%3B+width%3A+400px%3B+float%3Aright%3B%22+%2F%3EToday+businesses+collect+large+amounts+of+data+and+information+that+can+be+used+to+derive+real-world+value.+This+is+what+business+intelligence+%28BI%29+excels+at%2C+as+it+comprises+of+the+strategies+and+technologies+used+by+enterprises+for+data+analysis+of+business+information.%26nbsp%3B+This+information+is+often+used+to+provide+historical%2C+current+and+predictive+views+of+business+operations+and+facilitates+efficient+and+effective+decision-making%2C+and+enables+automation+of+current+business+processes.+Time+to+value%2C+e.g.+BI+projects+have+demonstrated+that+even+in+organisations+that+are+improving+their+BI+maturity%2C+the+time+to+value+is+very+low+and+insights+can+be+obtained+in+a+few+weeks.+However%2C+to+ensure+your+initiatives+are+sustainable%2C+the+organisation+will+eventually+have+to+mature+and+get+the+necessary+infrastructure+in+place.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMost+of+the+market-leading+BI+tools+these+days+are+so+similarly+matched+that+the+biggest+contributing+factors+in+deciding+which+tool+to+use+comes+down+to+how+much+data+transformation+needs+to+be+handled+by+the+tool+itself+and+the+total+cost+of+ownership.+When+a+business+decides+to+embark+on+the+BI+journey%2C+it%26%2339%3Bs+important+to+take+an+approach+that+will+future-proof+the+solution.+This+means+spending+most+of+the+time+curating+your+data+effectively.+Start+by+establishing+a+data+warehouse+solution+whereby+business+principles+and+logic+are+built+into+a+foundation+layer+that+is+centrally+located+and+controlled.%26nbsp%3B+What+this+will+enable+is+the+ability+to+implement+any+BI+tool+on+top+of+this+established+data+warehouse%2C+and+provide+the+versatility+and+flexibility+to+easily+substitute+the+BI+tool+being+used%2C+should+there+be+the+need+to+do+so.+This+ensures+the+sustainability+of+an+entire+BI+solution.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOnce+a+healthy+foundation+is+set%2C+the+BI+tools+themselves+need+to+be+compared+to+determine+which+tool+would+be+the+best+business+fit.+Some+of+the+aspects+that+need+to+be+considered+are%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BDevelopment+time%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+This+involves+the+amount+of+time+required+to+get+the+BI+project+up+and+running.+The+development+time+directly+impacts+the+overall+development+cost+of+the+project.+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BUser+experience%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Choosing+a+BI+tool+that+is+easy+to+use%2C+simple+to+understand+and+aesthetically+pleasing+to+look+at%2C+will+aid+in+the+tools+adoption+rate+and+overall+success+of+the+solution.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BSecurity%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+capability+of+restricting+data+to+only+be+viewed+by+certain+individuals+or+ensuring+that+all+the+data+in+a+BI+model+is+safe+has+become+a+standard+in+all+BI+reporting+tools.+There+are+however+various+methods+that+can+be+used+to+facilitate+this+function.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BSelf-service%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Generally%2C+in+any+business+there+should+be+a+few+%26ldquo%3Bpower+users%26rdquo%3B.+The+ease+with+which+these+users+create+a+particular+view%2C+dashboard+or+develop+their+own+model+to+save+on+development+costs+is+referred+to+as+the+self-service+aspect+of+a+tool.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BLicense+cost%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+costs+associated+with+implementing+and+maintaining+the+tool+generally+involves+a+licensing+cost.+This+could+either+be+a+single+enterprise+wide+licensing+cost+and%2For+licensing+cost+per+user.+This+is+one+of+the+most+important+aspects+to+choosing+the+correct+BI+tool+for+an+organisation.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BFunctionality%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Although+a+lot+of+the+market-leading+BI+tools+share+similar+features+and+have+more+or+less+the+same+capabilities%2C+careful+consideration+should+be+given+to+the+overall+goal+of+the+organisation+and+the+capabilities+that+will+be+required+for+the+particular+task+at+hand.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BCustomisability%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+BI+tools+offer+a+wide+range+of+customisability+in+terms+of+the+look+and+feel.+This+usually+involves+adding+corporate+identity+to+any+model+that+will+be+developed.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BEmbedding%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Embedding+of+models+have+become+a+very+popular+addition+in+many+BI+tools.+This+allows+models+to+be+incorporated+into+a+web+interface+allowing+a+seamless+transition+from%2C+for+example+an+intranet+site+to+the+BI+tool.+This+greatly+improves+the+adoption+rate+within+an+organisation+as+there+is+no+need+to+alternate+between+two+interfaces+to+access+the+tools.+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BPush+reports%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Many+years+ago%2C+it+was+common+to+pull+your+reports+from+the+BI+tools%2C+however%2C+a+shift+has+come+whereby+push+reporting+capabilities+have+been+incorporated.+This+allows+users+to+be+sent+reports+in+various+formats+via+email.+Removing+the+need+to+go+to+the+tool+itself+and+pull+data.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BIntegrations%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+BI+tools+allow+integration+between+other+components+such+as+Python%2C+R+and+other+statistical+tools.+Additionally%2C+the+capabilities+of+connecting+to+various+data+sources+forms+part+of+the+integration+capabilities+and+is+an+important+consideration+as+not+all+of+the+tools+are+able+to+connect+to+an+equal+amount+of+data+sources+and+some+tools+require+additional+expenditure+to+facilitate+connecting+to+particular+source+systems.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E6.+Take+aways%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+A+team+with+experience+using+a+variety+of+technologies+can+give+expert+advice+from+lessons+learned%2C+what+the+new+trends+are+and+common+pitfalls.+Make+sure+the+vision+for+the+solution+is+clear+and+the+functional+and+non-functional+requirements+are+understood+in+advance+to+avoid+future+re-work%2C+but+don%26rsquo%3Bt+try+to+do+everything+at+once%3A+figure+out+what+the+MVP+is+so+that+a+working+application+can+be+delivered+quickly.+Then+feedback+and+changing+business+requirements+can+be+incorporated+to+meet+the+business+demands+as+needed.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ca+class%3D%22button-box2+button-box%22+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fculture.entelect.co.za%2Four-engineering%2Fdisruptive-software-2019%2F%22%3ERead+the+full+From+Here+to+There+publication+%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fp%3E Software+plays+a+role+in+almost+every+part+of+every+business.+Technical+teams+are+responsible+for+understanding+the+digital+landscape+within+the+organisation+and+outside+of+it.+This+includes+selecting+the+most+sensible+tools+and+frameworks+to+solve+problems%2C+and+designing+software+using+best+practices+to+enable+maintainable+solutions+that+can+evolve+going+forward. ["Publications"] Tech Pub 6 - FB -LI.png
Automation+lets+you+move+fast+and+learn+fast %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FTechPub7-FB-LI.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+800px%3B+height%3A+418px%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDevelopers+are+hired+to+solve+business+problems%2C+but+in+the+world+of+software+development+there+often+end+up+being+many+menial%2C+repetitive+tasks.+There+are+multiple+issues+with+developers+performing+these+tasks+manually%3A%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BThey+are+not+providing+direct+value+to+the+business+when+distracted+with+these+tasks%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BHumans+are+prone+to+error+when+doing+the+same+thing+over+and+over+%28as+we+become+familiar%2C+we+become+over-confident+and+make+silly+mistakes%29%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BThe+tasks+are+not+challenging+to+the+mind+of+a+developer+which+can+cause+boredom+and+a+lack+of+job+satisfaction%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFortunately%2C+many+of+these+repetitive+tasks+are+nothing+more+than+a+set+of+well-defined+steps+that+need+to+be+executed+in+a+specific+sequence%2C+often+depending+on+the+output+of+the+previous+step.+These+are+perfect+candidates+for+automation.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+following+war+cry+sums+it+up+well%3A+%26ldquo%3BIf+it%26rsquo%3Bs+important+and+repetitive%2C+then+automate+it%21%26rdquo%3B.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E1.+Foundations+of+software+development+automation%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAn+extremely+important+practice+is+required+to+enable+automation.+This+practice+is+source+control%2C+or+sometimes+called+version+control.+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESource+control+allows+a+team+to+track+changes+made+to+the+source+code+as+features+are+developed.+Developers+can+see+a+comprehensive+history+of+changes+made+as+well+as+jump+around+that+history+to+revert+to+a+specific+point+in+time.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThese+practices+also+allow+for+the+%26ldquo%3Bbranching%26rdquo%3B+of+code+which+enables+developers+to+make+sweeping+changes+without+affecting+the+work+of+others.+There+are+various+strategies+around+branching%2C+each+with+their+own+pros+and+cons%2C+but+the+two+most+popular+are%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+1%29%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BTrunk-based+or+master-based+development%3A+All+work+is+continuously+merged+into+the+main+branch%2C+even+if+the+feature+is+not+yet+complete.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+2%29%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BFeature+branches%3A+Work+is+done+on+a+separate+branch+and+only+merged+into+the+main+branch+once+complete.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBesides+the+primary+benefits+of+a+source+control+system%2C+maintaining+the+source+of+an+application+in+a+centralised%2C+version-controlled+repository+is+the+key+to+unlocking+many+of+the+automations+mentioned+below.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E2.+Types+of+automation%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThere+are+many+kinds+of+tasks+that+are+performed+across+all+software+projects%2C+there+are+also+unique+tasks+per+specific+project.+Most+of+these+tasks+can+be+automated.+Let%26rsquo%3Bs+have+a+look+at+some+generally+accepted+best+practices+for+automation+in+the+life+of+building+a+solution.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BContinuous+integration%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Eventually%2C+most+software+projects+grow+large%2C+and+the+development+teams+expand+to+cope+with+the+demand+for+new+features+and+maintenance.+This+results+in+many+parallel+branches+of+the+code+existing+at+the+same+time+and+in+various+states.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThese+branches+will+have+to+be+merged+together+%28and+back+into+the+main+branch%29+at+some+point.+There+is+a+high+risk+of+merging+errors%2C+as+well+as+logic+bugs+when+this+code+comes+together%2C+especially+if+the+branches+have+lived+alone+for+any+extended+period.+The+solution+is+to+merge+all+branches+regularly+and+to+make+sure+everything+is+always+working+all+the+time.+This+process+is+known+as+%26ldquo%3Bcontinuous+integration%2C%26rdquo%3B+and+is+defined+by+Martin+Fowler+as+%26ldquo%3Ba+software+development+practice+where+members+of+a+team+integrate+their+work+frequently%2C+usually+each+person+integrates+at+least+daily+-+leading+to+multiple+integrations+per+day.+Each+integration+is+verified+by+an+automated+build+%28including+automated+tests%29+to+detect+integration+errors+as+quickly+as+possible.%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAnother+advantage+of+this+automated+integration+is+a+consistent+build.+We+have+a+well-defined+automated+process+that+produces+binaries+to+be+deployed+onto+some+environment.+This+removes+the+risk+of+a+developer+having+some+specific+setup+that+no-one+else+can+replicate+and+resulting+in+only+that+developer+being+able+to+build+for+a+release.+We+also+remove+the+commonly+used+%26ldquo%3Bbut+it+works+on+my+machine%26rdquo%3B+excuse.+If+it+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt+build+on+the+build+server%2C+it+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt+go+to+production.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BAutomated+testing%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FIMG2901-1.png%22+style%3D%22padding%3A+0px+15px%3B+width%3A+300px%3B+float%3Aright%3B%22+%2F%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+An+extremely+important+part+of+continuous+integration+is+the+execution+of+all+automated+tests.+These+tests+should+be+written+by+the+developers+as+a+safety+net+that+gives+them+confidence+to+make+changes+without+accidentally+breaking+something+else+in+the+code+base.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+the+diagram%2C+the+bottom+3+levels+can+be+automated+with+varying+degrees+of+difficulty.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EUnit+tests+are+the+most+straight-forward+to+automate+as+they+should+be+small+self-contained+tests+that+only+confirm+the+functionality+of+a+single+piece+of+code+under+very+specific+conditions.+These+tests+should+have+no+outside+dependencies+%28or+all+dependencies+are+mocked+out%29+so+that+they+can+be+executed+over+and+over+with+no+side-effects.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIntegration+tests+are+used+to+ensure+that+blocks+of+functionality+can+talk+to+each+other+successfully.+This+may+mean+accessing+a+database+or+file+system%2C+or+calling+a+service+over+the+network.+These+types+of+tests+may+also+check+the+flow+of+data+through+the+entire+system.+Automated+integration+tests+are+harder+to+set+up%2C+as+they+often+require+a+valid+database+to+access+%28with+valid+test+data+pre-populated%29+or+real+services+to+call.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAcceptance+tests+exist+to+make+sure+that+the+end-to-end+solution+being+built+meets+the+requirements+specified+by+the+business.+In+systems+with+a+user+interface%2C+these+often+take+the+form+of+scripted+steps+through+a+specific+flow%2C+recording+and+verifying+along+the+way+that+the+system+is+behaving+as+expected.+For+non-UI+systems%2C+these+tests+may+include+loading+production-like+data+into+the+system+and+checking+the+output.+Acceptance+tests+require+a+deployed+instance+of+the+application+to+be+executed+on.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhatever+the+type+of+test%2C+running+them+manually+would+put+a+huge+strain+on+the+team+and+severely+affect+delivery.+Executing+the+tests+on+every+code+check-in+%28or+once+a+day+for+heavier+integration+and+acceptance+tests%29+provides+confidence+in+the+changes+being+made+with+very+little+effort+from+the+team+required+%28beyond+writing+the+tests+when+functionality+is+built%29.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BAutomated+deployment%2Fcontinuous+delivery%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDeploying+an+application+into+an+environment+can+take+many+forms.+In+most+cases+there+is+a+file+copy+involved%2C+and+often+there+are+multiple+steps+involved+before+and+after+the+file+copy.+These+steps+could+theoretically+be+documented+as+a+recipe+for+someone+to+follow+when+deploying%2C+but+there+is+still+room+for+error+when+a+human+gets+involved+with+simple%2C+repetitive+tasks.+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FIMG2901-2.png%22+style%3D%22padding%3A+0px+15px%3B+width%3A+300px%3B+float%3Aright%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAn+application+could+also+be+deployed+to+various+testing+environments+on+its+way+through+the+production+environment.+To+get+feedback+quickly%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+a+good+idea+to+deploy+the+latest+changes+to+a+test+environment+as+they+are+made.+Doing+all+these+deployments+manually+would+be+a+huge+time+sink+for+the+team.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAt+a+minimum%2C+deployments+should+be+executed+by+a+script.+In+an+ideal+world%2C+that+script+should+be+controlled+by+a+system+that+can+put+permissions+and+auditing+around+when+a+script+is+executed%2C+who+executed+it+and+what+the+results+of+that+execution+were.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BProvisioning+and+scaling%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In+this+era+of+cloud-based+computing%2C+it+is+also+possible+to+automate+the+provisioning+of+resources+for+the+consumption+of+our+application.+We+can+spin+up+an+entirely+new+environment+just+to+run+a+set+of+tests+and+then+tear+it+down+again+when+done.+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe+may+have+a+system+that+provides+functionality+for+adding+new+customers+each+with+their+own+dedicated+resources.+These+resources+can+be+automatically+provisioned+on+demand.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BMonitoring%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FIMG2901-3.png%22+style%3D%22padding%3A+0px+15px%3B+width%3A+300px%3B+float%3Aright%3B%22+%2F%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Once+an+application+is+released+into+the+wild%2C+it+is+extremely+important+to+ensure+that+it+continues+running+well+and+that+any+errors+or+unexpected+behaviour+is+picked+up+immediately.+Systems+should+be+put+in+place+that+alert+the+team+to+anomalies%2C+instead+of+requiring+someone+to+watch+dashboards+all+day+or+sift+through+thousands+of+system+generated+error+reports.+Artificial+intelligence+can+also+play+an+important+role+in+identifying+unusual+trends.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E3.+Automation+tooling%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+As+with+many+tools+available+in+the+software+development+world%2C+there+is+a+wide+variety+of+tools+and+systems+that+will+help+a+team+accomplish+its+automation+goals.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BScripting+tools%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Scripts+allow+the+chaining+together+of+commands+into+a+single+parameterised+command.+Initially%2C+the+team+would+execute+the+scripts+themselves+until+they+feel+confident+they+are+performing+as+intended.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BDevOps+tools%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FIMG2901-4.png%22+style%3D%22padding%3A+0px+15px%3B+width%3A+300px%3B+float%3Aright%3B%22+%2F%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+term+DevOps+is+used+to+describe+a+set+of+practices+that+combine+software+development+and+IT+operations+teams+in+order+to+shorten+the+cycle+of+delivering+working+software+and+realising+business+value.+Automation+falls+into+these+practices+and+there+are+many+software+solutions+available+in+this+space.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EA+team+should+invest+in+these+systems+so+that+they+are+able+to+automate+and+control+the+execution+of+the+scripts+%28or+extend+them+with+further+capabilities%29+and+provide+additional+functionality+such+as+permissions%2C+logging%2C+remote+execution%2C+scheduling%2C+etc.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThere+are+many+players+in+this+field+and+the+choice+of+system+would+depend+on+many+factors%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+o%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BWhat+technologies+are+used+to+build+the+application%3F%3Cbr+%2F%3E+o%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BAre+there+operating+system+constraints+on+the+build+tools%3F%3Cbr+%2F%3E+o%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BDoes+the+organisation+have+preferred+software+vendors%3F%3Cbr+%2F%3E+o%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BIs+it+suitable+to+execute+builds+and+tests+in+the+cloud%2C+or+must+it+be+on-prem%3F%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ca+class%3D%22button-box2+button-box%22+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fculture.entelect.co.za%2Four-engineering%2Fdisruptive-software-2019%2F%22%3ERead+the+full+From+Here+to+There+publication+%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E Developers+are+hired+to+solve+business+problems%2C+but+in+the+world+of+software+development+there+often+end+up+being+many+menial%2C+repetitive+tasks.+There+are+multiple+issues+with+developers+performing+these+tasks+manually... Measurement+quantifies+your+success %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FTechPub8-TW.jpg%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOnce+an+idea+has+made+its+journey+into+an+implemented+solution%2C+it+is+necessary+to+make+sure+the+original+need+has+been+met.+Just+because+something+is+in+production%2C+it+does+not+necessarily+mean+it+is+doing+what+it+should+be%2C+and+often+it%26rsquo%3Bs+difficult+to+tell+straight+away.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThere+are+various+techniques+that+can+be+used+to+measure+the+success+of+an+implementation%2C+both+from+a+business+point+of+view+as+well+as+technical.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E1.+Measuring+technical+success%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+There+are+many+things+that+could+potentially+fail+in+a+live+system.+Many+of+these+risks+would+have+been+considered+when+making+technology+stack+choices+and+while+implementing+the+solution.+But+there+is+still+a+very+important+need+to+keep+a+close+eye+on+what+is+happening+in+real+time+and+to+be+prepared+to+act+as+soon+as+something+fails.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BGathering+metrics%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EA+software+system+has+the+potential+to+generate+large+amounts+of+data+related+to+the+way+it+is+functioning.+This+data+can+take+various+forms%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+o%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BText+log+files%3Cbr+%2F%3E+o%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BDatabase+log+entries%3Cbr+%2F%3E+o%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BHardware+performance+metrics%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Gathering+all+this+data+presents+some+unique+challenges%2C+substantial+amounts+of+storage+are+required+and+there+is+a+risk+of+overloading+support+staff+to+the+degree+that+important+information+is+missed+or+ignored.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BMaking+sense+of+metrics%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Simply+gathering+data+is+not+useful+to+the+business+or+technical+team+unless+they+are+able+to+glean+insights+from+it.+The+data+needs+to+be+processed+and+analysed+%28in+an+automated+tool%29+so+that+trends+and+anomalies+are+easily+identified.+Artificial+intelligence+and+statistical+analysis+have+the+potential+to+find+things+in+the+data+that+most+humans+would+miss.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2F0204_1.png%22+style%3D%22padding%3A+0px+15px%3B+width%3A+300px%3B+float%3Aright%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BRadiating+information%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Once+trends+and+worrying+issues+are+identified%2C+the+relevant+stakeholders+need+to+be+made+aware+of+them.+Simply+emailing+reports+is+likely+to+get+them+filtered+away+and+ignored.+The+insights+need+to+be+on+display+all+the+time+and+radiating+throughout+the+workspace+of+the+people+responsible+for+the+health+of+the+solution.+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EPermanent+dashboards+displayed+on+TVs+are+a+great+way+to+radiate+information.+They+do%2C+however%2C+need+to+be+well+thought+out+to+be+the+most+effective.+Make+sure+that+anomalies+are+instantly+visible%2C+show+trends+over+time+so+that+unusual+changes+stick+out.+There+is+also+room+for+showing+successful+metrics+to+promote+confidence+in+the+health+of+the+system.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E2.+Measuring+business+success%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+As+part+of+the+implementation+process%2C+a+business+intelligence+%28BI%29+solution+would+have+been+chosen+and+put+into+place.+Now+is+the+time+to+leverage+that+effort+to+measure+the+business+success+of+the+implemented+idea.+The+chosen+BI+stack+will+allow+stakeholders+to+slice+and+dice+the+data+in+order+to+extract+key+metrics+and+indicators.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2F0204_2.png%22+style%3D%22padding%3A+0px+15px%3B+width%3A+300px%3B+float%3Aright%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BThe+data+pyramid%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+data+pyramid+shows+how+reporting%2C+roles+and+use+cases+for+the+data+change+in+a+mature+data+environment.+The+insights+gained%2C+frequency+and+granularity+of+the+underlying+data%2C+and+audience+viewing+the+reports+change%2C+depending+on+the+layer+of+the+pyramid.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAt+the+bottom+layer%2C+reporting+is+primarily+based+on+transactional+or+%26ldquo%3Bnear+real+time%26rdquo%3B+information.+This+serves+the+purpose+of+showcasing+the+as-is+processes+within+the+business+and+serves+to+improve+visibility+of+business+processes.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOn+the+upper+layers%2C+reporting+becomes+more+analytical+and+strategic+in+nature%2C+providing+a+more+aggregated+view+of+information+which+could+help+better+infer+trends%2C+which+assists+management+in+doing+comparative+analysis+and+scenario+planning%2C+among+others.+This+helps+identify+where+a+business+needs+to+be+and+what+adjustments+need+to+be+made+in+order+to+better+reach+business+goals.+This+is+achieved+by+enabling+an+accurate+view+of+key+indicators+tracked+against+organisational+targets.+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+capstone+of+the+data+pyramid+is+predictive+and+prescriptive+analytics+that+come+into+play+through+the+use+of+data+science.+Predictive+analytics+indicates+what+is+likely+to+happen+in+future+%28i.e.+what+will+happen%29%2C+whereas+prescriptive+analytics+refers+to+recommended+actions+and+strategies+%28i.e.+what+to+do+about+it%29.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+BI+maturity+model+and+the+data+pyramid+work+hand-in-hand.+Having+a+mature+data+environment+naturally+enables+more+analytical+data+use+cases+through+the+insights+journey+below.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2F0204_3.png%22+style%3D%22padding%3A+0px+15px%3B+width%3A+300px%3B+float%3Aright%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BThe+BI+Maturity+Model%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Each+organisation+or+division+is+on+a+journey+to+an+optimised+data+warehouse+%28DWH%29.+Even+a+mature+and+optimised+DWH+will+still+change+as+new+analytical+requirements+are+discovered+and+as+new+trends+emerge+in+the+field.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+reporting+and+analytical+requirements+of+an+entity+change+significantly+as+they+move+through+the+steps+in+the+BI+maturity+model%2C+as+explained+to+the+right.+Please+note+that+an+entity+could+be+in+more+than+one+level+across+different+facets+of+their+business.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EStage+1%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+This+stage+represents+the+pre-data+warehouse+environment+where+an+organisation+relies+entirely+on+operational+reports+for+information.+In+general%2C+these+reports+are+static+and+inflexible+and+show+a+limited+range+of+data+for+a+limited+set+of+processes+providing+little+benefit+to+the+organisation.+During+this+stage+it+is+mostly+spreadsheets+on+local+machines+that+are+used+to+support+the+reporting+requirement+of+the+organisation.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EStage+2%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+entity%26rsquo%3Bs+first+attempt+at+a+BI+solution%2C+where+an+initiative+is+started+by+a+department+without+fully+understanding+all+the+fundamental+requirements+of+a+successful+BI+solution.+The+first+BI+tools+are+introduced+-+primarily+for+ad-hoc+queries%2C+reporting+and+basic+OLAP+-+where+licences+are+given+to+only+a+handful+of+power+users+and+analysts.+Benefits+are+starting+to+be+derived%2C+but+only+by+a+handful+of+people+within+the+organisation.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EStage+3%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+At+this+point%2C+a+business+unit+recognises+the+value+of+consolidating+these+silos+of+information+into+a+single+data+warehouse+to+save+money+and+gain+greater+consistency+in+the+information+it+uses+to+understand+and+analyse+the+business.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EStage+4%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+An+area+is+entered+where+BI%2FDWH+delivers+a+strategic%2C+enterprise+resource+that+enables+organisations+to+achieve+their+key+objectives.+This+is+accomplished+through+a+unified+data+warehousing+architecture+defined+by+a+common+set+of+semantics+and+rules+for+terms+and+metrics+shared+across+the+business.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EStage+5%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+This+phase+completes+the+cycle+by+converting+core+BI%2FDWH+capabilities+into+services%2C+both+technical+and+commercial%2C+and+redistributing+development+back+out+to+the+business+units+via+centres+of+excellence.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EStage+6%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+With+a+well-established+curated+DWH+solution+in+place%2C+true+value+can+be+derived+from+BI+by+using+predictive+and+prescriptive+analytics+that+come+into+play+by+incorporating+data+science.+The+focus+shifts+from+looking+at+the+past%2C+to+trying+to+look+into+the+future+by+learning+from+mistakes+made+or+improving+on+past+successes.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ca+class%3D%22button-box2+button-box%22+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fculture.entelect.co.za%2Four-engineering%2Fdisruptive-software-2019%2F%22%3ERead+the+full+From+Here+to+There+publication+%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E Once+an+idea+has+made+its+journey+into+an+implemented+solution%2C+it+is+necessary+to+make+sure+the+original+need+has+been+met.+Just+because+something+is+in+production%2C+it+does+not+necessarily+mean+it+is+doing+what+it+should+be%2C+and+often+it%E2%80%99s+difficult+to+tell+straight+away. 2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BHeadphones%2Fearphones%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BA+comfortable+workspace+which+is+quiet+enough+for+remote+calls%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EEstablish+a+remote+operating+procedure%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+We+recommend+that+every+team+takes+the+time+to+define+their+remote+operating+procedure%2C+which+outlines+the+following%3A%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BWhen+teams+meet+and+what+they+meet+for%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BNotifications+and+availability+standards%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BHow+to+get+help+and+from+who%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BHow+to+hold+each+other+accountable%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BWho+takes+ownership+of+traditional+team+rituals+and+tasks%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EChoose+the+right+communication+medium%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+hallway-conversations+we%26%2339%3Bre+used+to+can%26%2339%3Bt+become+diarised+meetings.+We%26%2339%3Bve+learned+to+prevent+calendars+being+filled+with+excessive+meetings+by+selecting+the+most+appropriate+communication+tool+for+the+purpose.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FWFH1.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+100%25%3B%22+%2F%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3ERemote+meeting+etiquette%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+We+recognise+team+meetings+are+beneficial+to+keep+everyone+aligned+but+it%26rsquo%3Bs+easy+to+stray+off+topic.+To+help+you+keep+your+meetings+productive+and+professional%2C+here+are+some+guidelines+for+virtual+meeting+etiquette%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FWFH2.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+100%25%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000000%3B%22%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22font-size%3A20px%3B%22%3E%3Cstrong%3EHow+to+prevent+encroachment+of+your+team%26%2339%3Bs+workday+into+personal+time%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+WFH+can+blur+the+lines+between+work+and+home+life%2C+and+so+we+need+to+establish+a+responsible+daily+routine+to+help+the+people+in+our+teams+continue+to+be+productive+in+a+sustainable+way%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BSet+working+hours%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22margin-left%3A+40px+%21important%3B%22%3Eo%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BDecide+on+a+clear+start+and+end+to+your+workday+%28and+try+to+align+this+with+the+rest+of+your+team%29%3Cbr+%2F%3E+o%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BDown+time+is+important.+Take+time+off%2C+even+if+you%26%2339%3Bre+not+going+away%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22margin-left%3A+40px+%21important%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BTake+breaks%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22margin-left%3A+40px+%21important%3B%22%3Eo%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BPlan+how+many+breaks+you+need+and+when+you+will+take+them%3Cbr+%2F%3E+o%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BAlign+breaks+for+sections+of+the+team+and+schedule+no+meetings+for+then%2C+e.g.+have+lunch+between+12pm+and+1pm%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BManage+a+to-do+list%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22margin-left%3A+40px+%21important%3B%22%3Eo%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BStart+each+day+by+planning+your+feasible+must-do+tasks+and+get+them+done%3Cbr+%2F%3E+o%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BIf+you+foresee+that+you+won%26%2339%3Bt+meet+a+deadline%2C+keep+your+team+informed%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BSet+boundaries%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22margin-left%3A+40px+%21important%3B%22%3Eo%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BPut+boundaries+in+place+regarding+when+and+how+you+deal+with+personal+matters+during+the+workday%3Cbr+%2F%3E+o%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%2 3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BUse+the+freed+up+time+from+having+less+meetings+to+reserve+calendar+time+for+these+spontaneous+conversations.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BBe+responsive+and+available+by+checking+your+channels+regularly.+Executives+need+to+role-model+this+behaviour.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BSchedules+that+previously+relied+on+%26quot%3Bcorridor%26quot%3B+or+%26quot%3Bdesk+time%26quot%3B+for+quick+decisions+now+have+to+be+replaced+by+calls+or+IM+conversations+for+spontaneous+input.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EIndividual+decision-making+is+now+more+important+than+ever%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cem%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FCh3-04.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+350px%3B+height%3A+324px%3B+float%3A+right%3Bpadding%3A+10px%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fem%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BRight+now%2C+the+fastest+way+to+save+time+in+meetings+is+to+make+decisions+yourself.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BDon%26rsquo%3Bt+shy+away+from+your+responsibility+to+make+a+judgement+call+by+hiding+behind+consensus.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BDelegate+authority+and+encourage+independent+thinking+within+a+provided+framework.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EA+decision-making+scale%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cem%3EAs+importance+of+decision-making+increases%2C+fewer+people%2C+a+single+channel+and+more+synchronous+communication+is+required+to+make+quicker+decisions.+Synchronous+communication+channels+lend+themselves+better+to+spontaneous+conversation.%3C%2Fem%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E tly.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EOver-deliver+%26ndash%3B+use+extra+hands+to+add+an+added+layer+of+quality+to+your+projects.+This+can+be+achieved+through+polish%2C+features+or+performance.+A+long-term+investment+that+will+be+recognised+by+your+customers+and+pay+dividends+in+the+future.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E%26nbsp%3BA+roadmap+could+also+be+partially+accelerated+in+this+way%2C+if+spare+capacity+was+able+to+pull+planned+future+projects+out+of+sequence+and+start+working+on+them+earlier.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22font-size%3A18px%3B%22%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%239f077d%3B%22%3E02.+Innovate+and+create+opportunities%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cul%3E+%3Cli%3ENow+is+a+great+time+to+innovate%2C+change+and+make+your+environment+more+resilient%2C+more+modern+and+more+stable.+Fix+the+glaring+technical+issues+that+have+been+deprioritised+to+your+%26quot%3Bif+we+have+time%26quot%3B+backlog.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EConsider+offering+your+team%26rsquo%3Bs+expertise+to+other+business+units+to+build+relationship+capital%2C+and+help+other+areas+of+the+business+which+may+be+under+more+pressure+to+deliver.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EYou+should+be+encouraging+teams+to+focus+on+experiments+that+couldn%26%2339%3Bt+get+priority%2C+test+different+methodologies%2C+team+setups%2C+practices+and+culture+innovation%2C+or+small+product+ideas+which+need+to+be+taken+to+a+minimum+viable+product+stage+to+test+the+market.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3ECreate+business+opportunities+by+using+the+sunk+cost+of+capacity+to+try+secure+longer+term+relationships%2C+or+close+sales+opportunities+by+taking+the+short-term+impact+%28which+would+be+borne+anyway%29+to+build+relationships.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22font-size%3A18px%3B%22%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23008c41%3B%22%3E03.+Encourage+cross-skilling%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cul%3E+%3Cli%3EWhen+under+market+pressure%2C+the+businesses+that+are+able+to+adapt+are+usually+the+ones+that+survive+and+succeed.+Most+people%26%2339%3Bs+talents+reach+outside+of+their+current+role%2C+and+most+businesses+will+have+a+shifting+demand+picture+which+could+benefit+from+a+versatile+workforce.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EYou+might+be+surprised+at+the+willingness+of+individuals+and+teams+to+support+the+business+by+rapidly+learning+and+stepping+into+different+roles+for+the+organisation.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3ERedirect+your+most+versatile+resources+to+areas+with+the+most+demand.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3ERecognise+them+and+reward+them.+This+is+life-saving+behaviour+for+the+company.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EFor+many+people%2C+this+is+an+exciting+opportunity+to+learn+new+skills+and+spend+some+time+diversifying+experience%2C+and+doesn%26%2339%3Bt+take+much+convincing.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22font-size%3A18px%3B%22%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%2300909d%3B%22%3E04.+Learn+and+upskill%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cul%3E+%3Cli%3EMaximise+on+otherwise+lost+time+by+allowing+teams+to+grow+themselves+in+preparation+for+future+projects.+There+are+many+options+available+for+short-term+and+high+impact+skills+development+courses.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EThis+doesn%26%2339%3Bt+work+well+for+protracted+time+periods%2C+but+can+be+an+effective+addition+to+a+combined+strategy.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EAs+highlighted+in+our+Useful+Tools+section%2C+many+major+online+learning+institutes+are+having+sales+on+their+courses+during+these+social+distancing+periods.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E esult+in+a+poorer+quality+of+service+or+output+quality._linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ENo+compromise+on+quality+and+capability%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cul%3E_linebreak_%3Cli%3ESouth+Africa+has+a+unique+offshoring+value+proposition+-+high+quality+software+development+at+a+competitive+price+point.%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3Cli%3EWe+match+onshore+capabilities+in+problem-solving%2C+engagement+and+quality%2C+but+at+a+lower+cost.%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3Cli%3EOur+capabilities+are+broader%2C+and+we+can+manage+complex%2C+large+deliveries%2C+as+well+as+provide+a+higher+level+of+quality+delivery+compared+to+traditional+offshoring+destinations+in+eastern+Europe+and+South-East+Asia.%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3Cli%3EA+favourable+exchange+rate+further+creates+price+advantage.%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3C%2Ful%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EBusiness-friendly+environment%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cul%3E_linebreak_%3Cli%3ESouth+Africa+has+a+growing+talent+pool+with+an+increasing+number+of+people+going+through+software+development+training+at+grassroots+and+tertiary+levels%2C+at+globally+accredited+institutions.%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3Cli%3EModernised+information+and+communications+technology+infrastructure+and+the+growing+adoption+of+next-gen+technology+have+resulted+in+South+Africa%26rsquo%3Bs+commendable+ascent+on+the+Ease-of-Doing-Business+index.%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3Cli%3EThe+country+also+has+a+solid+legal+system+that+respects+privacy+and+intellectual+property+rights%2C+creating+a+safe+and+business-friendly+environment+for+international+investors.%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3C%2Ful%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ECultural+match%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cul%3E_linebreak_%3Cli%3ESouth+Africa+has+a+highly+collaborative%2C+results-oriented+workforce+with+a+strong+cultural+affinity+with+markets+like+Europe%2C+Australia+and+the+US.%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3Cli%3ESouth+Africans+are+resourceful+and+entrepreneurial%2C+and+the+country%26rsquo%3Bs+IT+professionals+thrive+on+solving+business+problems.%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3Cli%3EThe+country+has+a+native+English-speaking+workforce+with+a+strong+education+system.%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3Cli%3ECountries+with+strong+educational+systems%2C+particularly+in+the+sciences+and+at+tertiary+levels+tend+to+produce+a+consistent+supply+of+IT+talent.+South+Africa+has+a+strong+university+education+system+with+international+alignment+and+accreditations.%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3Cli%3ESouth+Africa+has+a+central+time+zone+%28GMT%2B2%29+and+therefore+has+some+part+of+the+workday+overlapping+with+all+foreign+countries.%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3C%2Ful%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EAccolades%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cul%3E_linebreak_%3Cli%3EGSA+Awards+named+South+Africa+the+Global+Offshoring+Destination+of+the+Year+twice+in+the+last+five+years.%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3Cli%3ESouth+Africa+has+jumped+7+positions+in+the+World+Economic+Forum%26rsquo%3Bs+Global+Competitiveness+Index+during+the+2018-19+period%2C+indicative+of+its+position+as+a+highly+preferred+business+destination.%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3Cli%3ESouth+Africa+has+a+world-leading+financial+services+sector%2C+with+technology+being+a+major+focus+and+enabler+for+banking%2C+insurance+and+wealth+management.+South+African+technology+companies+are+at+the+forefront+of+this.%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3Cli%3EThese+factors+have+already+attracted+major+global+brands+like+Accenture%2C+IBM%2C+Amazon+and+Capital+One%2C+and+won+the+nation+numerous+industry+awards.%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3C%2Ful%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E Entelect+taking+on+international+offshore+projects ogy+services.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3EThese+capabilities+include+management+consulting%2C+technology+leadership%2C+design%2C+user+experience+engineering+and+architecture.+Beyond+implementation%2C+capabilities+further+extend+to+quality+assurance%2C+as+well+as+infrastructure+and+support.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3EOur+teams+are+tailored+to+meet+the+context+of+each+engagement%2C+giving+our+customers+assurance+that+Entelect+can+deliver+the+right-size+off%26shy%3Bshoring+solution+under+one+roof.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ECulture%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3EEntelect+is+a+culture-first+organisation+and+is+recognised+as+a+magnet+for+outstanding+technology+talent.+We+look+after+our+people+so+they+will+look+after+you.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3EOur+teams+are+personally+invested+in+the+outcomes.+We+will+challenge+your+thinking+in+order+to+gain+a+proper+understanding+of+your+business%2C+and+engineer+solutions+that+deliver+real+returns%2C+in+collaboration+with+your+own+onshore+teams.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3EWe+get+things+done+when+we+say+we+will%2C+and+have+a+deep+understanding+of+what+it+takes+to+deliver+in+off%26shy%3Bshore+engagements.%3C%2Fp%3E
