ul+behaviour%2C+cultural+biases%2C+and+%26%2339%3Bus+and+them%26%2339%3B+attitudes.%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3Cli%3EInvolve+both+sides+of+the+border+in+planning%2C+estimations%2C+decision+making+and+social+interactions+where+possible.%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3C%2Ful%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E2.+Assign+team+ambassadors%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cul%3E_linebreak_%3Cli%3EMake+the+one-team+mindset+somebody%26%2339%3Bs+core+responsibility%2C+on+both+sides.%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3Cli%3ERelationship+building+activities+are+the+bedrock+of+trust%2C+respect+and+a+highly+collaborative+work+environment.%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3Cli%3EThis+is+a+full-time+job+that+requires+two+willing+parties+to+own+the+following+responsibilities%3A_linebreak_%3Cul+style%3D%22margin-left%3A+40px%3B%22%3E_linebreak_%3Cli%3ETo+own+and+manage+the+delivery+and+expectations+on+both+sides.%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3Cli%3ETo+act+as+ambassadors+for+their+teams+and+people+to+the+other+side%2C+to+ensure+that+cross-border+trust%2C+alignment+and+affinity+is+cared+for+throughout+the+engagement.%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3C%2Ful%3E_linebreak_%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3C%2Ful%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E3.+Encourage+many-to-many+relationships%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cul%3E_linebreak_%3Cli%3ELet+problem-solvers+on+both+sides+talk+directly+with+those+who+can+help+on+the+other+side.+Don%26rsquo%3Bt+let+hierarchy+or+process+prevent+people+from+building+natural%2C+synchronous+and+useful+relationships+that+help+them+get+their+work+done.%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3Cli%3EAllow+for+communication+to+flow+openly+between+team+members+across+shores+and+avoid+strict+communication+protocols+that+filter+everything+through+a+single+person.%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3Cli%3EMake+sure+the+teams+understand+what+communication+tools+are+available+to+them%2C+and+when+they+are+appropriate.%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3Cli%3EPrioritise+face-time+between+teams+regularly.+This+requires+sacrifices+on+both+sides+due+to+time-zone+differences+and+busy+calendars%2C+but+it+is+necessary+to+maintain+alignment+and+to+prevent+drifting+expectations.%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3C%2Ful%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E4.+Be+explicit+in+your+ways+of+working%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cul%3E_linebreak_%3Cli%3EStandards%2C+processes+and+tools+need+to+be+discussed+and+agreed+upon+clearly+by+everyone+using+them.%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3Cli%3EIf+this+mindset+is+shared+by+your+onshore+and+offshore+teams%2C+you+generate+buy-in%2C+compliance%2C+and+eliminate+misunderstanding.%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3Cli%3EA+singular+team%2C+means+a+singular+method+of+operation+unless+otherwise+prescribed.%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3Cli%3EAt+the+start+of+a+new+offshoring+engagement%2C+expect+to+take+a+bit+of+pain+to+onboard+a+new+delivery+team+into+your+ways+of+working.%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3Cli%3ESpend+time+defining%2C+sharing+and+campaigning+for+your+ways+of+working+on+an+ongoing+basis.+This+can+be+driven+by+the+team-ambassadors+on+both+sides.%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3C%2Ful%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Ch4%3E%3Cstrong%3EDesign+workflow+for+asynchronicity%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fh4%3E_linebreak_Operating+software+teams+remotely+and+across+conflicting+time+zones+requires+us+to+adapt+our+delivery+processes+and+commit+time+differently+to+getting+it+right+in+an+asynchronous+setup._linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E1.+Plan+and+deliver+differently%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cul%3E_linebreak_%3Cli%3EYou+cannot+make+decisions+as+quickly+or+easily+as+when+you+have+everyone+co-located+in+the+same+time+zone.+That+does+not+mean+that+you+cannot+be+agile+and+change+direction%2C+it+means+you+just+need+more+discipline+to+adhere+to+your+sprint+plan.%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3Cli%3EPlan+features+so+that+dependencies+are+minimised+where+possible.+Alternatively%2C+you+can+do+this+by+creating+modularised+work+packages+that+can+be+tackled+independently.%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3Cli%3ETurnaround+times+on+questions+can+be+a+major+obstacle%2C+and+so+you+need+to+manage+technical+questions+and+resolution+as+a+matter+of+process.+A+useful+way+to+do+this+is+to+use+your+issue+tracking+system+to+create+tickets+for+questions+and+manage+accountability+as+with+any+other+task.%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3Cli%3EMake+decisions+transparent+and+available.+Teams+on+both+sides+of+an+offshore+engagement+will+benefit+from+recording+their+conversations+and+making+them+available+to+the+other+team+to+go+through+when+they+come+online.+The+story+and+context+behind+decision+making+is+important+for+offshore+team+members+to+grasp%2C+and+apply+correctly+in+their+work.%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3C%2Ful%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E2.+Meet+and+interact+differently%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cul%3E_linebreak_%3Cli%3EIf+possible%2C+set+daily+stand-up+and+stand-down+meetings+with+the+teams+at+the+beginning+and+end+of+each+work+day.+The+goal+of+the+meeting+should+be+handover+or+alignment+of+work+done+and+work+to+be+done+for+that+day.+This+should+also+be+used+as+an+opportunity+to+discuss+and+eliminate+impediments.%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3Cli%3EIf+you+can%26rsquo%3Bt+find+an+overlap+to+hold+joint+stand-ups%2C+you+may+have+to+rely+on+a+fully+asynchronous+communication+approach+like+email%2C+persistent+chat+or+recorded+video%2Faudio+for+operational+activities.%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3Cli%3EPrepare+to+have+late+night+or+early+morning+demos.+Real-time+conversation+is+critical+for+your+offshore+team+to+get+feedback+and+gauge+sentiment.%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3Cli%3EMaintain+a+standby+duty+roster%2C+where+someone+from+the+off-duty+team+will+be+available+to+field+calls%2C+escalations+or+matters+of+urgency+on+both+sides+if+needed.%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3C%2Ful%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Ch4%3E%3Cstrong%3EGetting+the+right+start%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fh4%3E_linebreak_Leaders+on+both+sides+of+a+remote+engagement+need+to+pay+heightened+attention+in+the+initial+weeks+to+ensure+things+are+working+well%2C+and+adapt+away+from+things+that+aren%26%2339%3Bt._linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E1.+Actively+solicit+feedback+in+the+early+stages%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cul%3E_linebreak_%3Cli%3EAsk+for+granular+status+reporting+on+projects.+This+will+arm+you+with+delivery+performance+data+and+help+you+to+understand+any+underlying+process+or+collaboration+issues%2C+as+well+as+to+inform+your+remedial+actions+more+precisely.+In+addition+to+this%2C+it+will+help+to+drive+productive+and+spontaneous+conversations+between+team+members+about+process%2C+culture+and+collaboration+issues+that+are+impeding+delivery.%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3Cli%3EKeep+your+finger+on+the+pulse+of+sentiment+with+tactical+face-time.+Set+up+check-in+sessions+with+team-members+on+both+sides+of+the+engagement.+This+will+allow+you+to+understand+how+well+your+culture+campaign+is+working%2C+and+will+inform+any+cultural+remediation+actions+that+may+be+necessary.%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3C%2Ful%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E2.+Lead+with+candid+conversation%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cul%3E_linebreak_%3Cli%3EShare+progress+and+issues%2C+threats+and+wins+openly+in+the+team.+This+will+create+alignment+on+delivery+and+culture+issues+between+teams%2C+team+ambassadors+and+executive+sponsors%2C+especially+in+the+early+stages+of+each+engagement.+Don%26%2339%3Bt+be+afraid+to+hold+difficult+conversations+in+an+open-format.+This+approach+will+allow+you+to+reach+an+optimum+state+quickly.%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3Cli%3ECreate+a+safe+space+for+honest+and+constructive+conversation+about+what+is+working+and+what+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+for+teams+on+both+sides%2C+by+rewarding+and+encouraging+those+who+do+so+publicly.%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3C%2Ful%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E3.+Crystallise+context%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E_linebreak_Useful+tools+for+maintaining+transparency+and+alignment+in+offshoring+engagements%3A%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cul%3E_linebreak_%3Cli%3EA+%3Cstrong%3E%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fprojectcanvas.entelect.co.za%2F%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3Eproject+canvas%3C%2Fa%3E+%3C%2Fstrong%3Ecan+be+a+valuable+tool+to+keep+the+team+aligned+and+build+a+common+understanding+of+the+project+that+they+are+endeavouring+to+deliver+together.+The+goal+of+a+project+canvas+exercise+is+for+the+execution+team+to+clearly+and+collaboratively+define+the+project+goals%2C+success+criteria%2C+milestones%2C+stakeholders%2C+constraints+and+risks.+This%2C+along+with+the+business+canvas+becomes+a+living+public+document+available+for+any+team+member+to+revisit+and+consider+in+their+daily+decision+making+process.%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3Cli%3EA+%3Cstrong%3Ebusiness+canvas+%3C%2Fstrong%3Eis+a+tool+for+creating+understanding+about+how+your+business+works+and+can+help+drive+better+decision+making+in+project+teams.+The+goal+of+the+business+canvas+is+for+the+product+owners+or+executive+sponsors+to+introduce+the+execution+team+to+the+fundamentals+of+their+business+-+revenue+streams%2C+customer+segments%2C+value+proposition%2C+objectives%2C+partners+and+sales+channels.+This+context+creates+an+affinity+and+common-understanding+of+the+business+dynamics+outside+of+the+immediate+project.%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3Cli%3EA+%3Cstrong%3Eteam+charter+%3C%2Fstrong%3Eis+a+document+that+describes+core+principles+for+how+teams+interact+and+work+with+each+other%2C+and+can+be+useful+for+driving+collaboration+and+the+goals+of+the+work+that+is+underway.+Team+charters+are+public+assets+that+can+be+displayed+on+walls%2C+desks+at+home+and+in+the+office%2C+or+virtual+backgrounds.+They+are+most+effective+when+created+collaboratively+with+all+team+members+on+both+sides+of+the+engagement.%3C%2Fli%3E_linebreak_%3C%2Ful%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E Working+alongside+remote+teams+requires+a+shift+in+mindset%2C+process+and+flexibility.+Here+are+three+recommendations+based+on+our+experience+of+operating+offshore+delivery+teams. ["Publications"] Making internationally remote projects work
Avoiding+disaster+in+a+software+outsource+relationship %3Cstrong%3EDo+due+diligence+on+your+potential+partner%3C%2Fstrong%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Not+doing+a+proper+due+diligence+check+on+a+potential+business+partner+is+probably+the+biggest+mistake+one+can+make.+You%26rsquo%3Bre+under+pressure+and+the+person+you%26rsquo%3Bre+dealing+with+seems+impressive+and+knowledgeable%2C+so+you+go+for+it+%26ndash%3B+only+to+find+down+the+line+that+deadlines+have+been+missed+because+of+all+sorts+of+issues+and+excuses%2C+despite+your+partner+having+the+best+intent+at+the+project+outset.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Choosing+the+right+partner+should+not+be+done+hastily.+Meet+the+directors+of+the+company+and+do+your+homework+on+them%3B+check+for+judgements%2C+get+SARS+clearance+certificates%2C+phone+clients+for+references+and+physically+visit+the+company%26rsquo%3Bs+premises+and+meet+key+staff.+Ascertain+if+the+company+has+the+appropriate+support+structures%2C+ensure+there+is+a+culture-fit+with+your+organisation+and%2C+most+importantly%2C+review+CV%26rsquo%3Bs+and+meet+the+people+who+will+be+working+on+your+project.+Understand+how+the+potential+partner+manages+projects+similar+to+yours+%26ndash%3B+ask+for+evidence+or+get+expert+consultants+to+conduct+appropriate+audits+if+need+be.+It+is+also+important+to+ensure+that+the+company+is+in+a+strong+enough+financial+position+to+carry+the+costs+of+default+if+contract+milestones+are+not+met.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Note+the+quality+of+the+proposal%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Make+sure+that+the+potential+partner+writes+a+high+quality+proposal%2C+understands+your+requirements+and+has+accurately+presented+them.+The+most+senior+staff+are+typically+responsible+for+writing+proposals%2C+and+the+quality+of+the+proposal+will+tell+you+a+lot+about+the+company+and+its+people.+Engage+with+the+supplier+in+this+process+and+ensure+that+they+are+on+the+same+page+as+you.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EOwn+the+source+code%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+If+a+software+product+can%26rsquo%3Bt+be+demonstrated%2C+or+is+not+demonstrably+rolled+out+to+a+number+of+clients%2C+you+can+safely+assume+that+the+vendor+is+designing+and+developing+a+custom+built+solution.+Most+corporate+systems+have+a+significant+amount+of+custom+requirements+because%2C+more+often+than+not%2C+systems+are+tailored+around+a+business%2C+not+the+other+way+around.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Unless+a+solution+is+truly+pre-packaged+and+supported%2C+insist+on+owning+the+source+code+and+ensure+that+this+is+stipulated+in+the+terms+of+your+agreement.+Also+ensure+that+appropriate+technical+documentation+is+delivered+on+handover%2C+and+that+it+is+written+in+a+way+that+it+can+be+maintained+by+an+alternative+development+team+if+need+be.+I+have+seen+a+number+of+companies+being+held+over+a+barrel+for+exorbitant+licence+fees+for+a+system+that+was+developed+exclusively+for+them%2C+has+been+paid+for+in+full%2C+and+then+they+still+pay+development+fees+for+software+upgrades+that+they+don%26rsquo%3Bt+own.%26nbsp%3B+Solutions+that+demand+licence+fees+are+typically+highly+commoditised+with+large+footprints%2C+such+as+accounting%2C+relationship+management%2C+web+management+or+online+retail+packages.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Make+sure+you+are+charged+a+fair+hourly+rate%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+If+you+are+using+an+independent+contractor+that+has+been+supplied+by+a+labour+brokerage%2C+then+it+is+fair+to+add+a+15%25+to+30%25+margin+on+the+actual+fee+paid+to+the+contractor%2C+this+fee+is+often+negotiable.+The+recruitment+agency+typically+needs+to+recover+the+costs+of+advertising%2C+sourcing+the+candidate%2C+negotiating+contracts+and+paying+salaries.+Independent+contractors+demand+higher+hourly+fees+as+the+contract+risk+is+on+them.+Bear+in+mind+that+bringing+in+%26ldquo%3Bbodies%26rdquo%3B+from+agencies+and+having+teams+effectively+under+your+management+does+have+more+risk+associated+with+it+as+there+is+little+recourse+in+the+event+of+poor+quality+output.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Alternatively%2C+if+you+engage+with+a+software+vendor+as+a+supplier%2C+a+premium+can+be+charged+with+the+proviso+that+more+value+will+be+delivered+than+just+a+team+of+contractors.+The+best+form+of+engagement+in+our+experience+is+for+the+vendor+to+take+ownership+of+the+delivery+of+a+project.+In+this+instance%2C+ensure+that+the+vendor+has+all+the+right+credentials%2C+supporting+infrastructure%2C+design+processes%2C+technologies+and%2C+most+importantly%2C+academically+qualified+software+engineers+or+computer+scientists.+Would+you+hire+an+unqualified+engineer+to+build+and+sign+off+a+bridge%3F+The+same+level+of+engineering+professionalism+should+apply+in+the+design+and+delivery+of+a+piece+of+software+%26ndash%3B+in+particular+if+it+is+core+to+one%26rsquo%3Bs+business.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+To+mitigate+risks+on+a+project+I+would+recommend+that+the+software+vendor+commits+to+a+fixed+price+based+on+the+delivery+of+specific+milestones.+For+bigger+systems%2C+an+initial+%26ldquo%3Bpaid+for%26rdquo%3B+audit+is+usually+conducted%2C+with+the+outcome+being+milestone-based+pricing%2C+a+project+plan%2C+functional+specifications+and+an+application+level+architecture+design.+The+quality+of+this+document+can+also+serve+as+further+security+in+the+competence+of+the+vendor+before+launching+into+a+project.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EIs+it+cheaper+or+lower+risk+to+hire+your+own+software+staff+or+to+outsource%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+If+you+perform+the+equation+%26ldquo%3B%28time+to+delivery%29+times+%28hourly+fees%29+over+%28quality+as+a+percentage%29%26rdquo%3B%2C+a+good+software+outsource+partner+should+come+out+at+a+lower+number+than+if+the+project+was+performed+by+your+in-house+development+staff.+By+quality+I+refer+to+a+product+that+is+easy+to+maintain%2C+user+friendly+and+bug+free.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+One+large+client+of+ours+conducted+an+independent+productivity+audit+on+some+of+our+teams+and+the+results+were+quite+staggeringly+in+our+favour+when+compared+to+output+levels+of+their+in-house+teams+%28after+all+why+pay+more+when+you+can+hire+your+own+cheaper%3F%29.+There+are+a+number+of+reasons+for+this+that+are+too+lengthy+to+cover+in+this+article%2C+suffice+to+say+that+the+output+levels+of+a+specialist+design+house+will+always+be+higher+than+one+whose+core+business+is+something+else.+After+all%2C+would+you+go+to+the+headache+of+sourcing%2C+hiring+and+managing+permanent+staff+to+electrify+and+cable+your+expensive+offices+or+would+you+use+the+services+of+a+specialist+electrical+and+cabling+company%3F+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Over+and+above+complete+project+outsourcing%2C+we+have+had+huge+successes+where+we+have+taken+over+technical+leadership+and+ownership+of+delivery+of+projects%2C+often+working+side+by+side+with+existing+in-house+support+teams+%26ndash%3B+where+often+all+that+is+required+to+speed+delivery+up+is+some+specialist+input+and+guidance.+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+What+is+the+make-up+of+a+good+software+outsource+team%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In+our+experience%2C+the+best+outsource+projects+work+where+the+software+vendor+is+given+full+ownership+of+design+and+delivery+%28assuming+the+right+partner+of+course%29.%26nbsp%3B+Notwithstanding%2C+a+successful+project+requires+a+project+champion+on+the+client+side+to+facilitate+access+to+key+business+and+technical+people.+In+our+experience%2C+a+typical+outsource+development+team+usually+compromises+a+team+lead+who+handles+the+client+engagement%2C+staff+management+and+full+life+cycle+of+the+project.+The+team+lead+must+have+strong+prior+development+experience+to+lead+effectively.+A+technical+lead+%28or+architect%29+needs+to+be+involved+during+the+initial+design+phases%2C+while+the+rest+of+the+team+is+usually+made+up+of+a+senior+software+engineer+who+is+a+development+environment+specialist%2C+followed+by+intermediate+and+junior+level+software+engineers+with+proven+problem+solving+ability+and+qualification.+We+have+found%2C+even+with+the+best+design+process+and+methodology%2C+the+single+most+important+factor+in+a+software+project+is+the+quality+of+the+people+on+the+job%2C+both+from+an+attitude+and+problem-solving+perspective.+A+good+outsource+partner+should+have+a+knack+for+consistently+identifying%2C+retaining+and+managing+such+people%3B+otherwise+it%26rsquo%3Bs+a+case+of+hit-and-miss.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EFinally%2C+how+is+it+possible+to+gauge+if+the+software+partner+is+doing+a+good+job%3F+%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In+our+experience%2C+the+best+way+to+ensure+that+a+project+is+on+track+is+to+follow+an+%26ldquo%3Bagile%26rdquo%3B+approach%2C+i.e.%2C+set+lots+of+small+targets+and+make+sure+that+these+are+met+and+continually+aligned+with+the+project+plan.+Weekly+progress+report+meetings+are+important+because+software+projects+are+never+exactly+defined+up-front+and+involve+some+iteration.+Expecting+a+business+owner+to+define+a+detailed+specification+in+advance+is+not+reasonable+in+a+complex+system%2C+so+a+level+of+on-going+refinement+in+the+build+phase+is+part+of+the+process.+We+often+create+by+seeing%2C+so+this+level+of+flexibility+must+be+allowed+by+the+software+partner.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Getting+the+architectural+basics+right+at+the+outset+of+a+project+is+the+most+critical+part+of+the+project.+If+there+is+any+doubt+about+a+vendor%26rsquo%3Bs+ability%2C+it+is+at+this+time+%26ndash%3B+before+development+work+starts+%26ndash%3B+that+a+technical+audit+should+be+done+to+see+if+the+design+is+a+good+one.+Building+a+system+on+a+weak+foundation+that+has+not+been+designed+with+change+in+mind%2C+is+a+recipe+for+disaster.+A+good+software+partner+should+understand+where+the+system+%28and+business%29+can+potentially+go+and+should+cater+for+this+at+design+time.%26nbsp%3B+After+all%2C+all+large+scale+systems+evolve+just+like+a+good+business%21%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E Comment+by+Charles+Pritchard%2C+CEO+of+Entelect%3A+We+often+hear+horror+stories+about+companies+appointing+a+software+partner+and%2C+many+millions+of+rands+later%2C+deadlines+are+missed+and+excuses+are+made+for+non-delivery.+I+have+personally+seen+it+happen+with+companies+that+have+invested+in+good+business+plans%2C+only+to+be+stumped+by+a+software+project+gone+wrong.+With+big+blue-chip+companies+who+have+comprehensive+support+structures%2C+the+same+can+happen%3A+project+deadlines+keep+getting+missed%2C+often+with+unrecoverable+costs+to+the+business.+So+how+does+one+go+about+choosing+the+right+partner+to+ensure+delivery+in+software+projects%3F ["Software best practices"] 11244.jpg
Technical+debt+reversal+%E2%80%93+development+process+most+effective+solution According+to+Matthew+Butler%2C+GM+of+Projects+at+Entelect%2C+%26ldquo%3BTechnical+debt+reversal+is+definitely+something+we+are+starting+to+see+more+of+with+Chief+Information+Officers+%28CIO%29+and+Development+Managers.+In+our+experience%2C+technical+debt+remains+one+of+our+most+challenging+points+of+contention.+Whether+engaged+in+fully+outsourced+work%2C+or+more+flexible+resource+or+co-source+engagements%2C+technical+debt+is+unavoidable.%26rdquo%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Technical+debt+can+be+quite+simply+described+as+having+two+primary+causes%3A+poor+code+quality+resulting+in+the+systemic+decay+of+the+software%26rsquo%3Bs+ability+to+perform+as+required+or+functional+and+system+requirements+flexing+and+shifting+too+far+away+from+the+original+goals+of+the+software%26rsquo%3Bs+architecture%2C+and+again+hampering+its+ability+to+support+the+new+requirements+adequately.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+clear+that+in+cases+where+both+have+happened%2C+the+symptoms+can+be+quite+dire.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26ldquo%3BWe+assist+our+clients+with+how+to+process+this+debt%3B+which+involves+describing+what+it+is+and+why+it+is+there+in+the+first+place.+Justifying+the+additional+expense+required+to+do+any+kind+of+work+again+is+especially+challenging+in+the+South+African+context+as+budgets+are+often+tight.+In+most+cases%2C+business+may+not+understand+the+impact+or+risk+of+the+debt+and+are+often+comfortable+carrying+it.+Internally%2C+with+outsourced+projects%2C+the+same+exists%2C+with+the+only+difference+being+that+we+can+more+easily+measure+and+manage+it%2C%26rdquo%3B+says+Butler.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Technical+debt+is+very+often+seen+to+only+affect+legacy+systems%2C+or+software+that+may+need+to+integrate+with+them.+This+is+a+common+misconception+and+it+is+important+to+recognise+that+technical+debt+is+definitely+not+limited+to+these+legacy+systems.+%26ldquo%3BIt+not+only+affects+newer+and+more+modern+systems+but+applies+to+systems+still+in+development%2C+and+extends+to+our+philosophy+that+every+line+of+code+written+is+a+liability+as+soon+as+it+is+compiled.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+a+scary+thought%2C+incurring+technical+debt+on+such+a+micro+level%2C+but+not+as+bad+as+it+sounds+when+you+have+the+tools+to+understand+and+mitigate+against+it%2C%26rdquo%3B+adds+Butler.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+There+are+a+number+of+solutions+and+methods+for+addressing+technical+debt.+Firstly%2C+along+with+the+trend+of+awareness+surrounding+technical+debt%2C+the+focus+on+tools+to+detect+it+and+the+improvement+of+the+development+environment+has+emerged+as+a+principle+area+of+focus.+There+are+a+number+of+tools+that+assist+with+static+code+analysis+and+package+management+which+make+life+substantially+easier.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Secondly%2C+process+is+key+%26ndash%3B+especially+development+process.+%26ldquo%3BA+considered+approach+to+development%2C+with+either+a+fully+agile+methodology%2C+or+at+least+an+appreciation+for+incremental+and+iterative+delivery%2C+is+in+our+experience%2C+by+far+the+most+effective.+By+taking+your+time+to+evaluate+the+situation%2C+business+rule+conflicts+are+detected+earlier+and+less+pressure+means+code+quality+stabilises+at+the+team%26rsquo%3Bs+true+capability.+The+central+point+here+is+that+once+the+problem+is+well+understood%2C+the+build+itself+is+easy.+With+problems+solved%2C+emphasis+can+be+put+on+future-proofing%2C+and+code+quality+as+required%2C%26rdquo%3B+explains+Butler.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Another+effective+option+is+to+enable+the+business+stakeholders+to+identify+technical+debt+themselves.+Awareness+and+understanding+at+that+level+goes+a+long+way+in+reducing+friction+between+business+and+IT%2C+and+makes+for+open+communication+and+planning+as+a+team.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26ldquo%3BTesting+is+also+a+much+advertised+answer+to+this.+Testing+at+all+levels+makes+measurement+of+technical+debt+easier+and+provides+a+clear+point-in-time+picture+of+the+health+of+the+system.+However%2C+it+only+goes+so+far%2C+and+in+our+experience%2C+technical+debt+is+a+hazard+that+is+only+visible+with+some+amount+of+retrospect.+In+other+words%2C+you+can%26rsquo%3Bt+measure+the+debt+before+it+is+incurred%2C%26rdquo%3B+explains+Butler.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26ldquo%3BThe+last+effective+mitigation+involves+standards.+Having+a+set+of+technical%2C+process%2C+tooling+and+technology+standards+is+an+important+part+of+a+healthy+development+team+and+also+contributes+positively+to+reducing+technical+debt.+With+the+team+being+able+to+refer+to+both+examples+and+standards%2C+code+quality+improves+and+time+is+less+impacted%2C+which+can+then+be+spent+on+code-+or+architecture-reviews+and+more+valuable+feedback%2C%26rdquo%3B+concludes+Butler. %3Cstrong%3EMatthew+Butler+%28GM%3A+Projects%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E+%3Cbr%2F%3E%3Cbr%2F%3E+The+recent+Deloitte+Tech+Trends+2014+report+highlighted+one+of+the+key+trends+for+2014+as+%E2%80%98Technical+Debt+Reversal%E2%80%99. ["Software best practices"] Matthew.jpg
The+%27in-memory%27+future Lately%2C+it+is+hard+to+read+an+IT+business+magazine+without+encountering+an+article+on+how+%26lsquo%3Bin-memory%26rsquo%3B+is+going+to+change+everything.+While+the+recent+developments+around+in-memory+analytics+and+processing+are+indeed+very+promising%2C+it+is+worth+having+a+look+at+the+underlying+technologies%2C+before+jumping+on+the+bandwagon.+The+discussions+on+in-memory+often+include+one+or+more+of+the+following%3A%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Big+data%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Flash+memory%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In-memory+analytics%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In-memory+transactional+processing.%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EBig+data%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26lsquo%3BBig+data%26rsquo%3B+is+itself+a+buzzword.+5GB+of+relational+banking+transactional+data+a+week+is+not+big+data+but+on+the+other+hand%2C+CERN%26rsquo%3Bs+Large+Hadron+Collider%26rsquo%3Bs+experimental+results%2C+at+6GB%2Fsecond%2C+are+much+more+in+the+big+data+category.+At+its+core%2C+big+data+refers+to+data+that+is+too+large%2C+too+fast+and%2For+too+varied+to+be+processed+with+traditional+data-processing+methods.+It+is+not+just+about+size%2C+big+data+implies+that+there+is+a+lot+of+data%2C+that+it+is+accumulating+quickly+and+that+it+is+unstructured.+While+big+data+may+be+processed+using+in-memory+techniques%2C+as+a+result+of+the+size+of+the+data+involved%2C+it+is+not+likely+to+be+stored+in+memory.+Aggregations+may+be+stored+in+memory%2C+temporarily+or+permanently%2C+but+not+the+data+itself.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EFlash+memory%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+When+talking+about+in-memory%2C+it+is+important+to+distinguish+what+kind+of+memory+is+being+spoken+of.+Flash+memory+is+a+high-speed%2C+non-volatile+storage+technology.+It+is+what+is+used+in+Solid+State+Hard+Drives+%28SSDs%29.+While+significantly+faster+than+traditional+magnetic+media%2C+flash+memory+is+still+a+storage+technology.+However%2C+it+can+be+used+to+extend+a+server%26rsquo%3Bs+main+memory+as+in+the+case+of+SQL+Server+2014%26rsquo%3Bs+Buffer+Pool+Extensions.+Generally%2C+flash+memory+is+used+to+reduce+or+remove+the+IO+latency+from+applications+that+store+and+retrieve+large+amounts+of+data%2C+like+relational+database+engines.+Since+flash+storage+in+the+form+of+SSDs+appear+as+regular+drives%2C+the+applications+using+them+need+no+special+code+or+changes+to+handle+them.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EIn-memory+analytics+%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In-memory+analytics+allows+for+very+fast+querying+and+analysis+of+data.+It+encompasses+applications+such+as+Tableau+and+the+PowerPivot+plugin+for+Microsoft%26rsquo%3Bs+Excel.+In-memory+analytics+will+often+store+data+in+columnar+format%2C+as+opposed+to+the+traditional+row-based+storage+seen+in+relational+databases.+Columnar+storage+enables+a+very+high+compression+rate%2C+allowing+for+high+speed+analytics.+The+high+compression+means+that+large+data+sets+can+be+worked+on+in-memory.+Typically%2C+the+data+is+stored+on+durable+storage+and+processed+in-memory.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EIn-memory+transactional+processing%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+With+in-memory+OLTP+engines%2C+the+data+is+stored+in+volatile+memory+and+persisted+at+intervals+to+durable+storage+%28flash+memory+or+traditional+magnetic+drives%29.+In-memory+OLTP+allows+for+extremely+fast+transactional+processing%2C+making+it+suitable+for+applications+that+need+very+high+insert+rates+and+to+execute+huge+numbers+of+small+transactions.+Examples+of+this+are+stock+market+trading%2C+telephone+exchanges+and+on-line+stores.+Solutions+in+this+area+include+the+Hekaton+feature+in+Microsoft+SQL+Server+2014+%28renamed+as+In-memory+OLTP%29+and+Oracle%26rsquo%3Bs+TimesTen+In-Memory+Database+engine.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3ERight+solution+in+the+right+place+%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Whichever+form+of+in-memory+solution+is+being+considered%2C+it+is+critically+important+that+it+not+be+implemented+as+a+%26lsquo%3Bsolution+looking+for+a+problem%26rsquo%3B.+The+problems+the+various+in-memory+solutions+solve+are+very+different+from+one+another.+There+is+no+gain+from+deploying+in-memory+solutions+for+the+sake+of+doing+so.+Any+solution+must+be+carefully+considered+in+the+light+of+what+problem+it+is+expected+to+solve+and+what+gains+it+is+expected+to+give.+Like+with+most+areas+of+technology%2C+there+is+unfortunately+no+magic+solution+for+all+problems+to+be+found+here. %3Cstrong%3EGail+Shaw+%28Entelect+Technical+Lead%3A+SQL+Server%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E+%3Cbr%2F%3E%3Cbr%2F%3E+Recent+developments+around+in-memory+analytics+and+processing+are+very+promising+but+the+underlying+technologies+need+to+be+understood.+These+include+big+data%2C+flash+memory%2C+in-memory+analytics+and+in-memory+transactional+processing. ["Software best practices"] Gail.jpg
How+to+effectively+engage+with+a+software-services+provider Failed+engagements+can+be+costly+in+terms+of+effort%2C+time+and%2C+of+course%2C+money.+Meaningful+relationships%2C+on+the+other+hand%2C+can+save+you+all+three+of+these+but+they+require+commitment+from+both+sides.+Following+these+steps+will+ensure+that+you+start+these+engagements+on+the+right+foot.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+1.+Find+the+right+partner+%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Identifying+the+right+partner+is+an+exercise+that+can+cause+an+organisation+to+reflect+on+its+own+culture+and+objectives.+Identifying+a+partner+whose+values+align+with+your+own+company%26rsquo%3Bs+is+important+because+the+individuals+who+embrace+those+values%2C+will+be+an+integral+part+of+your+project+teams.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+To+determine+which+service+provider+is+best+suited+to+your+company%26rsquo%3Bs+goals%2C+there+are+a+few+questions+you+need+to+ask+to+determine+how+serious+the+provider+is+about+its+staff+and+approach%3A+%3Cul+id%3D%22careersList%22%3E+%3Cli%3EHow+strong+is+the+company+culture+and+identity%3F%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EDoes+the+provider+performance-manage+its+staff+in+a+structured+and+meaningful+way%3F%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EHow+does+the+supplier+drive+positive+behaviour+in+its+organisation%3F%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EWhat+kind+of+continuous-improvement+and+career-development+processes+does+the+provider+have+in+place+for+its+staff%3F%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EDoes+the+provider+have+technical+expertise+on+your+technology+platform+and+implementing+the+type+of+solution+that+you+are+expected+to+deliver%3F%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EDoes+the+provider+have+a+strong+track+record+of+delivery+with+companies+similar+to+yours%3F%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EWhat+other+services+and+value-adds+does+the+company+provide%3F%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+answers+to+these+questions+should+inform+your+decision+on+partnerships.+Without+well-thought-out+programmes+covering+these+areas%2C+your+provider+could+end+up+being+nothing+more+than+a+labour+broker.+Companies+whose+core+function+it+is+to+connect+talent+with+end-users+are+more+likely+to+let+borderline+candidates+slip+through+the+process+in+order+to+meet+your+demand.+More+importantly%2C+they+may+not+be+able+to+effectively+solve+software-development+environment+challenges.+There+is+generally+a+very+weak+retention+rate+at+these+companies+and+a+poor%2C+or+even+absent%2C+sense+of+employee+engagement.+This+means+that+their+HR+challenges+become+your+HR+challenges+and+their+churn+becomes+your+churn.+With+large-scale+offshore+companies%2C+this+problem+is+further+exacerbated+by+visa+and+immigration+issues%2C+sometimes+poor+technical+quality+as+well+as+communication+and+cultural+barriers.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+There+are+some+software-development+companies+that+have+a+well-defined+company+culture+and+a+comprehensive+collection+of+experience+that+comes+from+managing+large-scale+software+projects+across+multiple+industries.+Forging+a+strong+partnership+with+an+experienced+software+company+will+allow+you+to+leverage+a+deep+technical+skill+set+as+well+as+a+dynamic+collection+of+experience%2C+distilled+from+years+of+working+with+peers+and+competitors.+Whether+it+is+effective+knowledge-sharing+through+collaborative+techniques%2C+formal+training+programmes+or+implementing+DevOps%2C+these+suppliers+can+guide+you+through+the+process+and+will+be+incentivised+to+do+so+if+the+relationship+is+meaningful+to+both+parties.+At+Entelect%2C+we+often+find+that+clients+who+recognise+the+value+of+our+relationship+and+leverage+our+experience+often+gain+the+benefits+of+a+more+flexible+model%2C+optimised+rates+and+an+implicit+advisory+relationship.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+size+of+the+company+can+play+an+important+role%2C+too.+Larger+service+providers+have+a+focus+on+scale+and+aggressive+growth.+The+upside+of+such+providers+is+that+they+can+offer+scale+where+smaller+companies+cannot.+This+can%2C+at+some+levels%2C+lead+to+an+%26lsquo%3Banyone-goes%26rsquo%3B+approach+because+the+scramble+to+assemble+teams+at+scale+can+pose+a+challenge.+However%2C+the+strategy+is+usually+to+compensate+for+the+weaker+individuals+on+the+team+by+placing+strong%2C+experienced+team+leaders+and+development+managers+to+pick+up+the+slack+and+act+as+quality+gatekeepers+on+the+project.+Smaller+companies+usually+place+a+greater+emphasis+on+growing+cautiously+with+the+right+fit+of+individual+and+technical+skill+set+because+their+ability+to+take+on+risk+is+limited.+These+companies+will+also+have+different+priorities.+As+a+growing%2C+young+company%2C+the+focus+will+be+on+maturing+internal+processes%2C+building+a+company+brand+and+identity+and+delivering+on+a+smaller+number+of+key+accounts.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E2.+Begin+with+the+intention+of+partnering%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+One+thing+is+certain%3A+you+will+be+competing+for+priority+regardless+of+the+service+provider+you+choose.+It+is+always+a+good+idea+start+your+discussions+by+making+it+clear+that+you+are+interested+in+forging+a+partnership+that+will+be+mutually+beneficial+to+both+companies.+If+the+provider+is+not+the+right+partner%2C+this+will+become+clear+with+time.+It+is+perfectly+acceptable+to+start+with+a+thin+initial+commitment+as+long+as+there+is+an+understanding+that+there+is+a+partnership+on+the+line+at+the+end+of+that+contract.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Most+software+development+companies+have+the+challenge+of+demand+outstripping+supply+and+they+have+to+prioritise+their+resources+across+multiple+clients+while+balancing+their+commitments+to+their+clients+and+to+their+business.+This+means+that+they+need+to+be+sure+that+they+are+making+the+best+decision+for+sustainable+business+in+terms+of+where+to+invest+their+efforts+and+resources.+When+clients+are+looking+for+short-term%2C+quick-win+relationships%2C+they+are+more+unlikely+to+prioritise+the+requirement.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3BA+successful+partnership+requires+transparency+on+both+sides%2C+and+your+partner+should+be+held+accountable+for+its+performance.+Things+do+not+always+go+to+plan+in+these+partnerships+and+providers+do+not+always+get+it+right+%26ndash%3B+having+a+partner+who+is+willing+to+recognise+failure+and+take+meaningful+remediation+steps+quickly+will+be+a+great+asset+to+you.+Whether+it+is+having+a+dedicated+account+manager+who+is+always+available+to+take+your+call%2C+or+a+direct+line+to+a+senior+manager%2C+having+access+to+swift+and+flexible+remediation+options+will+help+you+to+deal+effectively+with+turbulence+and+to+hold+your+partners+accountable.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E%26nbsp%3B3.+Deploy+careful+negotiation+tactics%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Negotiating+engagement+terms+and+rates+is+healthy+and+a+great+way+to+manage+the+performance+of+your+partnership.+However%2C+it+is+something+that+should+be+done+carefully%2C+and+in+such+a+way+that+takes+into+account+the+scale%2C+potential+and+value+of+your+current+relationship.+If+priority+and+quality+are+your+concern%2C+you+may+want+to+hold+off+on+aggressive+negotiation+tactics+until+your+partnership+has+matured+because+this+could+have+a+very+real+and+direct+impact+on+prioritisation+and+the+level+of+service+that+you+receive.+On+the+other+hand%2C+if+you+are+not+happy+with+your+service+provider%2C+you+can+use+aggressive+negotiation+tactics+to+motivate+the+provider+to+a+better+place+of+service.+As+a+client+procuring+services%2C+you+have+the+unique+ability+to+motivate+and+manage+the+performance+of+your+provider+through+opportunity+and+negotiation.+Using+metrics+such+as+market-related+rates%2C+opportunities%2C+performance+of+individuals+and+service+levels+are+all+great+inputs+to+the+negotiation+process.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E4.+Provide+a+fast+track+through+the+red+tape%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Most+corporate+IT+divisions+have+internal+screening+processes+that+include+a+combination+of+online+automated+tests%2C+assignments+and+interviews.+The+process+can+be+complicated+and+protracted%2C+and+is+a+main+reason+why+candidates+take+up+offers+at+competitors+or+service+providers.+This+can+also+be+a+turn-off+for+software+development+companies+as+it+means+spending+more+billable+time+pushing+through+red+tape.+More+importantly%2C+your+screening+process+might+focus+on+different+strengths+from+your+providers%2C+which+means+that+you+may+screen+out+potentially+great+candidates+whom+your+provider+highly+recommends.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3BIf+you+are+comfortable+with+the+level+of+service+from+your+providers%2C+it+can+be+hugely+beneficial+to+use+a+fast+track+through+the+red+tape.+Of+course%2C+your+provider+must+first+earn+this+privilege+by+proving+a+strong+track+record+of+providing+high-calibre+resources+and+services+to+you.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Attributes+such+as+strong+problem+solving%2C+a+solid+foundation+in+computer+science+and+object-oriented+programming+principles+are+important+for+software+companies+who+operate+across+multiple+technology+platforms+and+industries.+A+corporate+IT+division+that+utilises+specific+frameworks+may+look+for+individuals+with+specialised+experience+on+that+platform+or+framework%2C+and+potentially+screen+out+provider+resources+without+adequate+experience+on+that+platform.+There+may+be+a+differing+ideology+here+that+puts+you+and+your+provider+at+loggerheads+%26ndash%3B+specialist+versus+generalist.+Given+that+the+provider+has+your+interests+in+mind%2C+it+may+be+time+to+have+that+discussion+with+them+in+order+to+understand+why+they+believe+that+generalist+skills+will+work+in+your+environment+and+to+be+on+the+same+page+with+your+approach.+Being+open+to+stretching+your+technology+skills+requirements+might+play+to+your+advantage+and+allow+you+to+build+stronger+teams%2C+faster.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Resource+availability+can+last+anything+from+minutes+to+days+in+the+software+engineering+world%2C+but+seldom+weeks+or+months.+A+company%26rsquo%3Bs+priority+is+to+make+firm+commitments+on+its+resources+as+quickly+as+possible+and+to+minimise+bench-time.+This+can+often+lead+to+a+first-come+first-served+scenario.+If+you+have+been+sent+a+proposal+for+a+team+of+developers%2C+try+to+turn+it+around+as+quickly+as+possible+to+secure+the+resources.+If+your+provider+is+being+slow+and+non-committal%2C+do+not+hesitate+to+hold+the+company+accountable+for+your+deliveries+%26ndash%3B+the+provider+has+an+obligation+to+enable+your+organisation.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E5.+Own+the+relationship%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+HR+departments+are+great+at+facilitating+the+recruitment+process+for+staff+but+they+tend+to+be+disruptive+when+dealing+with+specialist+resource+providers%2C+such+as+software+companies.+In+some+cases%2C+this+comes+down+to+a+combination+of+poor+relationship+management+%28remember%2C+they+are+dealing+with+a+high+volume+of+recruiters%2C+candidates%2C+clients+and+providers%29%2C+lack+of+prioritisation+%28in+certain+circumstances+they+are+providing+HR+and+recruitment+services+for+many+business+units%29+and+a+conflict+of+interest.+The+relationship+with+your+provider+needs+to+be+managed+carefully+in+order+to+maintain+value+and+priority+and+to+deal+with+issues+or+concerns+effectively.+If+you+are+in+a+position+to+transform+the+way+the+HR+works+with+strategic+service+providers%2C+you+will+benefit+by+training+them+on+the+challenges+you%2C+as+an+IT+department%2C+face+and+the+value+of+certain+provider+relationships.+In+this+case%2C+involving+HR+in+the+process+and+%26lsquo%3Bcoaching%26rsquo%3B+them+to+facilitate+the+relationship+may+introduce+a+cultural+change+that+could+result+in+better+provider+management+within+your+company.+If+you+do+not+have+a+say+in+how+services+are+procured+or+managed%2C+a+better+approach+is+to+maintain+a+direct+channel+with+your+service+provider+and+be+a+buffer+between+the+provider+and+HR.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E6.+Integrate+contractors+into+your+team%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+When+the+team+is+on+the+ground+and+it+is+a+co-sourced+mix+%28both+permanent+staff+and+contractors%29%2C+your+next+challenge+is+to+ensure+that+everyone+operates+as+a+single+team%2C+unified+under+the+same+vision+and+goal.+Unfortunately%2C+some+leaders+openly+voice+their+objections+regarding+contract+staff+and+this+can+be+extremely+damaging+to+your+provider+relationships%2C+team+dynamics+and+the+contractors+themselves.+Understanding+why+contractors+are+a+necessary+asset+to+your+company+will+help+to+maintain+an+integrated+culture.+Conversely%2C+and+equally+important%2C+is+that+your+provider+has+a+responsibility+to+ensure+that+its+resources+are+technically+capable+and+a+good+cultural+fit+for+your+organisation.+This+combined+message+and+understanding+will+ensure+that+all+parties+involved+are+invested+in+your+company%26rsquo%3Bs+overall+success.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In+a+market+where+talented+software+engineers+are+progressively+scarce+to+come+by+and+even+harder+to+retain%2C+software+engineering+partners+can+be+an+incredibly+valuable+asset+to+a+corporate+IT+division.+Recognising+the+importance+of+the+elastic+workforce%2C+industry+and+technology+agnostic+expertise%2C+and+leveraging+this+through+a+mutually+beneficial+relationship+can+help+give+a+new+slick+of+paint+to+your+IT+culture%2C+vision+and+ability+to+deliver+on+that+mountain+of+project+work+in+the+pipeline.+Investing+some+time+in+the+relationships+with+your+providers+may+be+the+most+important+thing+you+do+in+2015. %3Ch3%3E+Tim+Kroon+%28Entelect+Software%3A+General+Manager%29%3C%2Fh3%3E+%3Cbr%2F%3E%3Cbr%2F%3E+As+a+decision+maker+within+your+company%2C+you+may+be+faced+with+the+challenge+of+whether+or+not+to+bring+in+a+software-resourcing+partner%2C+and+how+to+effectively+utilise+this+partnership+to+structure+a+software+development+division+that+incorporates+your+goals%2C+priorities+and+values. ["Software best practices"] Tim.jpg
Taking+cybercrime+seriously This+figure+is+sure+continue+to+rise+in+parallel+to+the+continued+rapid+expansion+of+the+Internet+%26ndash%3B+the+technological+phenomenon+which%2C+although+becoming+available+for+commercial+use+just+two+decades+ago%2C+now+plays+an+integral+part+in+both+our+personal+and+professional+lives.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+South+African+government%26rsquo%3Bs+State+Security+Agency+%28SSA%29+has+expressed+growing+concerns+around+Internet+usage+and+the+extent+to+which+both+private+individuals+and+businesses+have+begun+to+rely+on+it.+%26lsquo%3BWith+Wi-Fi+being+implemented+almost+anywhere%2C+being+online+is+as+important+as+running+water+and+electricity+nowadays%2C%26rsquo%3B+says+Entelect%26rsquo%3Bs+General+Manager+of+Business+Development%2C+Mark+Beets%2C+%26lsquo%3BMore+and+more+businesses+have+become+fundamentally+reliant+on+the+Internet+and+connectivity+in+order+to+operate.+The+importance+of+maintaining+the+integrity+of+these+systems%2C+not+only+for+their+customers+but+alo+for+business+continuity%2C+has+become+one+of+the+biggest+challenges.%26rsquo%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+While+increasing+mobility+is+celebrated+for+rapidly+enhancing+our+daily+lives+and+business+processes%2C+it+is+also+creating+more+complex+security+threats.+%26lsquo%3BWhile+many+cybercriminals+still+practise+the+more+%26ldquo%3Bsmall-time%26rdquo%3B+crime+of+hacking+individual+computers+or+devices%2C+the+masses+of+information+now+stored+and+run+through+cloud-based+and+connected+servers+have+also+seen+a+marked+increase+in+cybercriminals+attacking+organisation+infrastructure+through+online+touch-points%2C%26rsquo%3B+Beets+explains.+%26lsquo%3BThis+poses+a+substantial+threat+to+any+individual+with+personal+or+sensitive+information+stored+digitally%2C+across+any+number+of+devices%2C+as+well+as+to+large+businesses+that+have+based+their+systems+on+digital+platforms+and+infrastructure.%26rsquo%3B+The+primary+goals+of+cybercrime+include+theft%2C+extortion+and+fraud%2C+which+all+have+potentially+devastating+consequences+for+victims.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Further+increasing+the+risk+to+personal+information+is+the+continued+growth+of+the+Internet+of+things+%28IoT%29.+%26lsquo%3BWith+information+constantly+being+sent+and+received+by+a+massive+number+of+sources%2C+ranging+from+your+office+equipment+and+personal+devices+to+your+refrigerator+at+home+and+even+your+clothes%2C+means+that+the+amount+of+data+being+stored+in+the+cloud+by+any+individual+is+increasing+exponentially.+As+a+result%2C+the+risk+of+data+breaches+is+increasing+in+parallel%2C%26rsquo%3B+explains+Beets.+%26lsquo%3BSoon+the+use+of+Internet+will+be+extremely+difficult+to+avoid+because+the+IoT+is+becoming+the+modus+operandi+of+many+companies+and+individuals+for+their+day+to+day+processes%2C+and+as+such%2C+education+on+data+security+is+becoming+more+and+more+crucial.%26rsquo%3B+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.timeslive.co.za%2Fthetimes%2F2015%2F05%2F27%2FA-hacker-is-on-the-line%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3EVodacom%26rsquo%3Bs+Chief+Technology+Security+Officer%3C%2Fa%3E%2C+Vernon+Fryer%2C+has+been+quoted+as+saying+that+South+Africa+is+the+fourteenth+most+popular+target+for+cybercriminals%2C+with+South+Africans+underestimating+how+at+risk+they+are+when+sharing+information+and+using+the+Internet.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Among+a+variety+of+troublesome+trends%2C+which+were+flagged+in+the+CISCO+2014+Annual+Security+Report%2C+Android+mobile+devices+bore+the+brunt+of+99+per+cent+of+all+mobile+malware+%28malicious+software%29.+Furthermore%2C+the+report+indicated+a+shortage+of+more+than+one+million+security+professionals+across+the+globe+in+2014.+%26lsquo%3BMost+organisations+at+the+moment+do+not+have+the+required+systems+or+skills+to+be+able+to+monitor+networks+and+detect+infiltrations%2C+and+then+apply+protections+in+a+timely+and+effective+manner%2C%26rsquo%3B+Beets+continues.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+According+to+Beets%2C+software+organisations+can+play+an+important+role+because+they+have+the+ability+to+empower+their+clients+and+educate+them+regarding+the+potential+risks+to+their+businesses.+%26lsquo%3BA+proper+understanding+creates+the+opportunity+to+proactively+take+the+necessary+precautions+to+protect+themselves+from+cybercrime%2C+which+is+vital+to+the+survival+of+most+modern+businesses+and+the+protection+of+their+sensitive+or+personal+information.%26rsquo%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Based+on+the+most+notorious+cybercrimes%2C+Beets+offers+the+following+advice+to+companies+and+individuals%3A%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EBeware+of+unrecognisable+links%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3A+do+not+click+on+these+links+when+they+are+sent+to+you.+This+is+a+tactic+used+by+hackers+called+phishing.+Phishing+is+the+fraudulent+practice+of+sending+emails+purporting+to+be+from+reputable+companies+in+order+to+get+individuals+to+reveal+personal+information+online.+These+emails+could+be+spam+and+expose+you+to+fraudulent+activity.+Your+systems+can+also+be+infiltrated+by+hackers+when+you+download+content+from+unknown+sites%2C+which+can+be+triggered+automatically+by+clicking+on+these+suspicious+links.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EUpdate+your+passwords+regularly%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E+up+to+three+times+per+month.+This+is+crucial+to+ensure+your+online+information+is+secured+at+all+times.+Do+not+use+birth+dates%2C+graduation+years%2C+or+your+mother%26rsquo%3Bs+maiden+name+as+security+answers+to+access+your+online+accounts+%26ndash%3B+this+makes+a+hacker%26rsquo%3Bs+job+even+easier.+By+generating+strong+passwords+you+can+make+it+much+harder+for+hackers+to+break+into+your+computer+via+the+back-end+code+of+the+system.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EUnderstand+that+identity+theft+is+real%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3A+identity+theft+has+become+increasingly+common+and+is+something+everyone+needs+to+worry+about.+Identity+theft+is+when+a+criminal+accesses+data+about+a+person%26rsquo%3Bs+bank+accounts+and+bank+cards%2C+social+security+and+other+sensitive+information%2C+to+siphon+money%2C+engage+in+contracts+or+to+make+purchases+in+the+victim%26rsquo%3Bs+name.+Always+logout+of+your+accounts+properly+%26ndash%3B+this+is+a+good+policy+to+protect+yourself+against+identity+theft+and+cyberfraud%2C+which+is+the+distribution+of+rogue+security+software+to+conduct+fraudulent+transactions.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EProtect+against+malware%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3A+malware+is+Internet-based+software+or+programs+that+are+used+to+disrupt+a+network+and+steal+sensitive+data%2C+often+causing+damage+to+software+present+in+the+system.+Malware+can+be+installed+in+a+variety+of+forms%2C+from+Trojan+horses+and+spyware+to+viruses+and+worms.+Investing+in+reputable+security%2C+firewall+and+anti-virus+systems+is+crucial%2C+and+even+with+these+in+place%2C+it+is+advised+that+you+make+use+of+public+wireless+internet+providers+sparingly.+These+Wi-Fi+networks+that+are+available+in+airports%2C+coffee+shops+and+hotels+often+do+not+require+encryption+of+data+traveling+between+laptops+and+the+Internet.+This+means+that+all+your+information+is+unsecured+to+hackers.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EAvoid+sharing+devices+with+others%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E+if+you+must+and+want+your+personal+information+to+be+undetectable+by+the+person+with+whom+you+are+sharing%2C+you+can+browse+incognito+through+the+use+of+Google+Chrome.+By+using+Chrome%2C+your+browsing+history+and+cookies+will+not+show+up+in+the+history+stored+on+device+programmes.+However%2C+incognito+mode+does+not+hide+your+IP+address%2C+which+means+that+your+location%2C+browser%2C+operating+system%2C+as+well+as+your+own+address%2C+are+not+hidden+by+using+this+mode.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EScramble+your+information%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3A+one+way+to+do+this+is+to+make+use+of+a+Virtual+Private+Network+%28VPN%29.+VPNs+allow+users+to+make+sure+that+all+information+that+passes+between+your+device+and+the+network+is+subjected+to+extreme+encryption%2C+making+data+safer.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26lsquo%3BWhile+we+are+aware+of+a+certain+number+of+cybercrimes%2C+hackers+develop+new+techniques+constantly+to+trick+you+into+unwittingly+sharing+your+personal+information%2C%26rsquo%3B+warns+Beets%2C+%26lsquo%3BKnowing+how+to+protect+yourself+can+significantly+add+value+and+safety+to+your+life+online.+Be+cautious%21%26rsquo%3B+he+concludes. %3Ch3%3E+Mark+Beets+%28Entelect+General+Manager+of+Business+Development%29%3C%2Fh3%3E+%3Cbr%2F%3E+%3Cbr%2F%3E+According+to+a+cybercrime+report+compiled+by+global+internet+security+firm%2C+Norton%2C+South+Africa+lost+R3.7+billion+in+2012+as+a+result+of+cybercrime. Building+projects+and+products+%E2%80%93+is+there+a+difference%3F At+Entelect+it+is+apparent+that+awareness+of+the+differences+between+these+two+concepts+needs+to+be+promoted%2C+mainly+because+the+mind-set+and+approach+required+for+each+are+different%2C+and+using+the+wrong+combination+means+guaranteed+friction+and%2For+an+engagement+failure+that+could+have+been+avoided.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+It+is+very+important+to+note+that+software+solutions+do+not+need+to+be+polarised+into+either+the+project+or+product+category.+Each+solution+or+engagement+falls+into+the+spectrum+somewhere+between+the+%26lsquo%3Bquick+and+dirty%26rsquo%3B+project+and+the+full-blown+product.+With+this+in+mind%2C+let%26rsquo%3Bs+first+look+at+some+of+generally+understood+differences%2C+which+most+project+managers+or+product+owners+will+already+know%3A+%3Col+id%3D%22careersList%22%3E+%3Cli%3EAudience%3A+Projects+will+generally+have+a+more+specific%2C+internal+functionality+set%2C+tailored+to+a+certain+audience%2C+such+as+one+department+or+one+customer.+It+is+not+a+stretch+to+stereotype+projects+as+customer-specific+software.+Products+need+to+leverage+broader+functionality+for+often+a+larger+and%2For+external+audience.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EDelivery%3A+A+project+typically+needs+to+provide+only+a+specific+set+of+deliverables.+Examples+could+include+a+workflow+system+customised+to+a+business+process%2C+or+a+new+online+capture+form+for+customer+feedback.+A+product+must+provide+a+viable+solution+for+ongoing+business%2C+which+is+likely+to+include+preparation+and+planning+for+the+product+life+cycle%3A+growth%2C+adaptation%2C+enhancement+and+decline+from+the+software+development+perspective.+Good+examples+of+this+include+Salesforce.com+and+the+Uber+mobile+apps.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3ETime%3A+Projects+should+be+time-limited+while+products+generally+have+a+roadmap%2C+but+only+loosely+defined+timelines+up+front.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EReturn%3A+Projects+will+often+have+an+indirect+return+on+investment+through+efficiencies+gained%2C+load+reduction+on+teams%2C+reduced+operational+or+staff+requirements+and+so+forth.+Products+typically+need+to+have+a+direct+return+on+investment+in+such+a+way+that%2C+over+a+period+of+time%2C+the+product+generates+direct+revenue+to+pay+for+its+own+development+and+enhancement.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EDevelopment%3A+Projects+are+often+outsourced+as+contained+pieces+of+work.+Products+are+not+usually+outsourced%2C+especially+not+for+core+business+IP+or+competency.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Fol%3E+Added+to+this+list%2C+there+are+other+important+differences+that+are+not+as+well+understood+and+can+at+times+be+overlooked%3A+%3Col+id%3D%22careersList%22%3E+%3Cli%3EUsers%3A+Projects+regularly+have+a+focused+feature+set+and+a+controlled+set+of+users.+Control+in+this+case+means+you+know+specifically+who+the+users+are+%28often+they+might+have+no+choice+but+to+use+the+software+as+part+of+their+work%29.+At+the+very+least%2C+you+can+chat+to+them+and+get+direct+feedback.+Software+products+often+need+a+large+user+base+to+be+successful+and+this+can+impact+many+other+decisions+during+the+development+process+%26ndash%3B+we+will+see+this+influence+coming+through+in+the+points+below.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EQuality%3A+As+a+consequence+of+a+larger%2C+and+less-controlled+user+base%2C+products+need+to+prioritise+quality.+For+any+product%2C+things+such+as+first+impressions%2C+performance+and+user+experience+are+critical+for+adoption+and+brand+value.+Another+aspect+is+longevity.+Code+quality+is+crucial+for+products+because+should+the+product+be+successful+in+the+marketplace%2C+existing+source+code+will+need+to+be+worked+on+for+the+foreseeable+future.+However%2C+this+is+not+to+say+that+quality+does+not+matter+in+a+project%2C+but+it+is+less+important.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3ETechnology%3A+When+developing+a+software+project+for+a+specific+customer%2C+generally+technology+choices+are+constrained+to+what+tools+and+platforms+are+already+in+place.+With+product+development%2C+often+the+best+and+latest+tools+and+technologies+are+needed+to+give+the+product+the+best+chance+it+has+in+the+marketplace.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EArchitecture%3A+There+is+an+industry-wide+buzz+around+building+%26lsquo%3Bsoftware+as+a+service%26rsquo%3B+%28SaaS%29+systems.+Although+the+topic+is+beyond+the+scope+of+this+article%2C+the+point+is+that+architecture+must+suit+the+intended+usage+of+the+solution.+Large+products+will+require+broad%2C+and+sometimes+complex%2C+infrastructure+to+allow+for+things+such+as+multi-tenants%2C+data+partitioning%2C+high+availability%2C+elastic+resources+and+shared+caching.+Projects+tend+to+be+more+predictable.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EAdaptability%3A+Software+products+%28think+Microsoft+Office+or+Eclipse+IDE%29+have+demands+from+multiple+customers%2C+so+they+need+to+adapt+to+varying+customer+requirements+both+now+and+in+the+future.+This+requirement+is+far+more+muted+for+projects.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3ETesting%3A+With+a+project%2C+%26lsquo%3Bjust+good+enough%26rsquo%3B+will+more+often+than+not+suffice+for+the+intended+purpose.+However%2C+as+a+consequence+of+the+user+base%2C+products+require+the+accommodation+of+more+hardware+and+software+configurations.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EInvestment%3A+It+is+probably+clear+now+from+the+differences+tabled+so+far+that+building+custom+software+products+is+expensive.+More+time+is+required+for+planning+and+executing+a+good+software+product+solution+that+caters+for+the+variability%2C+quality%2C+testing%2C+user+breadth%2C+and+the+other+product+features+mentioned%2C+and+time+is+the+key+cost+factor+for+software+development.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Fol%3E+At+Entelect%2C+we+like+to+use+a+set+of+questions+to+help+stimulate+the+thought+process+to+guide+the+project%2Fproduct+owner+to+an+understanding+of+where+on+the+spectrum+their+solution+lies%3A+%3Cul+id%3D%22careersList%22%3E+%3Cli%3EIs+it+for+your+company+%28internal+system%29%2C+or+is+it+for+users+whom+you+would+consider+customers%3F%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EDo+you+want+to+make+a+direct+income+from+the+solution%3F%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EAt+the+moment%2C+are+there+any+users+of+the+system+that+you+do+not+yet+know+of%3F%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EIs+there+a+market+demand+for+your+system+%26ndash%3B%26nbsp%3Bwould+anybody+else+want+to+use+it%3F+If+so%2C+would+you+expect+them+to+use+it+as-is+or+would+you+need+to+tailor+it%3F%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EDoes+the+solution+represent+a+%26lsquo%3Bcore+competency%26rsquo%3B+%26ndash%3B+would+this+software+solution+be+the+key+revenue+driver+for+the+business%3F%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EDoes+the+system+need+to+be+highly+adaptable%3F%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+If+you+are+answering+%26lsquo%3Byes%26rsquo%3B+to+these+questions%2C+it+means+the+solution+leans+more+to+the+product+side+and+answering+%26lsquo%3Bno%26rsquo%3B+pushes+it+more+to+the+project+side.+This+really+is+a+key+point+to+establish+as+early+as+possible+in+process.+With+this+positioning+known%2C+the+next+steps+will+feel+more+natural+for+the+topics+above.+You+can+proceed+with+more+confidence+with+your+technology+roadmaps%2C+scoping%2C+test+planning%2C+competitor+analysis%2C+project+vision%2C+architecting+and+budgeting.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Successful+projects+and+products+start+with+positioning+the+solution+or+idea+on+the+project-product+spectrum+and+then+tackling+all+of+the+topics+raised+%28particularly+approach%2C+budget+and+timelines%29+in+a+way+that+is+tailored+to+that+position.+Ultimately%2C+when+building+software%2C+and+especially+when+looking+to+outsource%2C+knowing+whether+you+are+building+a+project+or+a+product+is+a+great+head+start+for+setting+expectations%2C+vision+and+driving+decisions. %3Ch3%3E+Matthew+Butler+%28Entelect+Software+General+Manager%29+%3C%2Fh3%3E+When+building+software+solutions%2C+whether+internally+or+outsourced%2C+much+of+the+focus+is+often+on+enforcing+budget+and+deadlines%2C+or+on+risks%2C+such+as+choosing+and+implementing+the+right+methodologies%2C+technologies+and+platforms.+Included+in+this+list+of+pitfalls+is+a+topic+that+does+not+get+as+much+airtime+as+it+deserves%3A+understanding+the+differences+between+developing+a+software+project+and+developing+a+software+product. ["Software best practices"] Matthew.jpg
Next+level+analytics+competency+%E2%80%93+part+one %3Cp%3EThe+presentation+addressed+the+main+issues+in+the+shift+from+data+as+an+IT+asset%2C+to+data+as+a+main+asset+for+decision+making.%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+I+took+a+look+at+traditional+business+intelligence+ecosystems+and+how+we+all+thought+it+was+going+to+be+done%3A+the+perfect+situation+of+taking+data+from+source+systems%2C+creating+a+unified+data+model+and+data+store+and+thereafter%2C+having+a+set+of+business+users+accessing+only+that+data+model.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+reality+is+that+business+has+never+really+been+happy+with+this+approach.+This+approach+can+cause+a+lot+of+red+tape%2C+and+rightfully+so.+Incorporating+a+new+source+system+into+a+data+warehouse%2C+requires+a+lot+of+planning%2C+data+analysis%2C+identifying+business+rules%2C+cleaning+data+and+ultimately%2C+making+it+available+to+business.+The+red+tape+almost+makes+me+happy+%26ndash%3B+it+means+that+data+warehouses+or+business+intelligence+environments+are+mission-critical+systems%2C+changing+them+shouldn%26rsquo%3Bt+be+an+easy+process+and+they+should+be+treated+as+core+business+systems.+The+by-product+of+the+red+tape+however%2C+is+that+now%2C+organisations+typically+have+several+rogue+MIS+systems+that+IT+departments+often+have+no+knowledge+about.+Sometimes%2C+these+systems+are+running+on+local+machines+and+have+no+backup+or+business+continuity+strategies.+This+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+a+bad+thing+by+any+means+and+if+anything%2C+it+shows+that+people+are+willing+to+break+the+rules+to+ensure+they+can+make+data-driven+decisions.%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+So+what+are+the+steps+to+creating+a+data+driven+culture%3F+Eric+Schmidt+of+Google+says%2C+%26ldquo%3BWe+run+the+company+by+questions+and+not+answers%2C%26rdquo%3B+and+this+speaks+to+the+first+step+in+the+process%2C+which+is+to+to+define+the+question.%26nbsp%3BWe+then+need+to+choose+the+right+data+to+get+what+we+are+looking+for.+Big+Data+is+about+finding+an+answer+to+a+question+that+we+never+knew+we+had+%26ndash%3B+pick+the+right+subset+of+data+and+use+just+that.+Don%26rsquo%3Bt+bloat+your+initiatives+with+too+much+data+from+too+many+data+sources.+For+example%2C+if+you+don%26rsquo%3Bt+need+users%26rsquo%3B+tweets+to+get+to+the+answer+you+are+looking+for%2C+then+don%26rsquo%3Bt+include+them+in+the+data+set+you+are+analysing.+The+last+three+steps+in+the+process+are+self-explanatory+and+are+repeated.+We+need+to+analyse+the+data%2C+present+it+through+an+intuitive+interface+and+make+the+decision.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In+the+second+part+of+my+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.entelect.co.za%2FNews%2FDisplayNewsItem.aspx%3Fniid%3D53113%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3Epresentation%3C%2Fa%3E%2C+I+looked+at+different+ways+in+which+organisations+can+develop+analytical+talent+as+well+as+how+to+transform+culture%2C+capabilities+and+technology.%3C%2Fp%3E The+latest+on+cybercrime+and+cybersecurity+in+South+Africa %3Cdiv%3ECybersecurity+remains+a+huge+issue+throughout+the+world+and+South+Africa+is+no+exception.+Currently%2C+the+South+African+government+in+the+process+of+passing+new+legislation+%26ndash%3B+the+Cybercrimes+and+Cybersecurity+Bill.+The+new+bill+will+allow+it+to+define+the+offences+for+such+attacks%2C+with+the+list+of+offences+being+drastically+expanded%2C+and+the+fines+for+existing+infringements+being+increased.+This+goes+hand+in+hand+with+ensuring+that+electronic+service+providers+carry+out+certain+obligations+relating+to+and+impacting+cybersecurity.+In+addition+to+this%2C+the+president+is+adding+legislation+that+will+allow+him+to+collaborate+with+foreign+states+in+order+to+combat+cybercrime+in+an+official+capacity.%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3EFor+a+long+time%2C+the+United+Kingdom+has+striven+to+be+one+of+the+safest+destinations+to+do+online+business.+The+country%26rsquo%3Bs+vision+for+2015+was+to+tackle+cybercrime+head-on%2C+be+more+impervious+to+cyber+attacks+and+to+create+an+open%2C+unwavering+and+pulsating+cyberspace+that+the+public+could+use+without+fear%2C+a+cyberspace+that+supports+open+societies.+To+this+end%2C+the+United+Kingdom+had+to+have+the+know-how+in+terms+of+the+latest+skills%2C+knowledge+and+capabilities+in+order+to+meet+its+cybersecurity+objectives.+It+also+meant%3A%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cul+id%3D%22careersList%22%3E+%3Cli%3EThe+public+has+had+to+know+how+to+protect+itself+online%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EBusinesses+in+the+United+Kingdom+have+had+to+be+up+to+date+on+how+to+fight+cybercrime+and+have+done+this+by+working+with+their+government+and+using+its+strengths+to+do+this.+This+has+encouraged+businesses+to+operate+securely+in+cyberspace%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EThe+United+Kingdom%26rsquo%3Bs+government+has+had+to+improve+its+law+enforcement+response+to+cybercrime%2C+its+defences+and+infrastructure+to+detect+and+combat+cybercrime%2C+as+well+as+education+and+skills%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EThe+United+Kingdom%26rsquo%3Bs+government+has+had+to+help+its+country+to+take+opportunities+to+provide+the+cybersecurity+services+that+is+needed+across+the+world.+These+have+allowed+the+country+to+build+relationships+with+other+countries%2C+organisations+and+business+around+the+globe+in+order+to+create+an+open+and+bustling+cyberspace.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cdiv%3EIn+response+to+this+new+draft+bill%2C+South+Africa+has+already+started+collaborating+with+United+Kingdom+and+the+European+Council+on+Cybercrime+to+achieve+the+following%3A%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cul+id%3D%22careersList%22%3E+%3Cli%3EA+Computer+Emergency+Response+Team+%28CERT%29+in+case+of+a+terrorist+attack+on+critical+governmental+information+infrastructures+%26ndash%3B+the+United+Kingdom+has+the+experience+and+has+made+it+its+mission+to+assist+other+countries+with+all+issues+relating+to+cybersecurity%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EA+Standard+Operating+Procedure+%28SOP%29+is+being+written+for+the+cybercrime+labs+in+cooperation+with+the+European+Council+on+Cybercrime.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cdiv%3EThus%2C+based+on+this+collaboration+in+cybersecurity+and+governance%2C+best+practices+and+policy+goals+with+the+United+Kingdom+and+the+European+Council+on+Cybercrime%2C+South+Africa%26rsquo%3Bs+new+Cybercrimes+and+Cybersecurity+Bill+was+drafted.+In+response+to+this%2C+the+National+Prosecuting+Authority+%28NPA%29+is+also+gearing+itself+towards+this+bill+by+sending+its+state+attorneys+and+advocates+on+NQF6+and+NQF8+Cybercrime+courses.%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cdiv%3EAs+it+stands%2C+many+security+experts+have+cautiously+welcomed+the+new+bill%2C+stating+concerns+that+privacy+and+constitutional+rights+may+be+infringed+upon.+Leading+cybercrime+expert%2C+Professor+Basie+von+Solms%2C+states+it+is+still+%26ldquo%3Ba+step+in+the+right+direction%2C%26rdquo%3B+even+though+%26ldquo%3Bthere+were+issues+that+had+to+be+addressed.%26rdquo%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+It+has+become+increasingly+clear+that+in+order+to+fight+cybercrime+and+stay+current+in+all+matters+relating+to+cybersecurity%2C+South+Africa+will+have+to+partner+with+other+countries%2C+businesses%2C+organisations+and+most+important+of+all%2C+local+ICT+companies.+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cdiv%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fdiv%3E+%3Cdiv%3EAs+software+engineers%2C+we+must+work+with+government+in+order+to+guide+it+on+all+the+technical+aspects+of+cybercrime+and+cybersecurity+in+order+to+help+them+to+understand+and+implement+the+correct+legislation+by+considering+the+moral%2C+ethical+and+legal+aspects+relating+to+IT.+It+is+the+duty+and+responsibility+of+the+private+sector+to+comment+on+laws+that+apply+directly+to+it.+After+all%2C+what+is+the+point+of+the+new+legislation+if+there+is+no+one+to+enforce+it%2C+and+no+one+from+the+IT+sector+to+assist+government+in+implementing+it%3F%3C%2Fdiv%3E Christoff+Smith+%28Senior+Software+Engineer%3A+Entelect+Software%29%3Cbr%2F%3E%3Cbr%2F%3E+In+today%E2%80%99s+fast-moving+world%2C+technological+advances+happen+faster+than+legislation+can+keep+up%2C+and+will+continue+to+do+so+for+many+years+to+come.+As+software+engineers%2C+the+onus+lies+on+us%2C+not+only+to+apply+ethical+behaviour+to+the+implementation+of+these+new+technologies+but+also+to+enforce+cybersecurity.+This+can+be+accomplished+only+if+software+companies+liaise+with+governments+to+enforce+new+legislation+that+protects+a+country%E2%80%99s+citizens+from+falling+victim+to+cybercrimes+relating+to+new+technologies. Next+level+analytics+competency+%E2%80%93+part+two %3Cp%3EThere+are+two+aspects+to+analytics%3A+technical+and+capabilities.+Firstly%2C+you+need+to+be+able+to+get+the+data+and+visualise+it+%26ndash%3B+this+is+the+technical+side+of+analytics.+You+then+need+to+know+what+to+look+for+%26ndash%3B+this+is+the+capabilities+aspect.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBefore+we+can+understand+the+capabilities+side+of+analytics%2C+we+need+to+grasp+the+technical+aspect.+Today%2C+there+is+a+whole+host+of+Massively+Open+Online+Courses+%28MOOCs%29+available+to+the+general+public%2C+including+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.edx.org%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3EEDX%3C%2Fa%3E%2C+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.coursera.org%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3ECorsera%3C%2Fa%3E+and+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fbigdatauniversity.com%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3EBigDataUniversity%3C%2Fa%3E.+These+MOOCs+provide+a+wide+variety+of+free+and+paid-for+courses+that+can+assist+people+in+developing+their+talent+and+enabling+them+to+reach+their+analytics+capability.+Another+option+is+to+pick+up+some+technologies+and+give+them+a+try.+Most+new+technologies+for+data+analytics+are+very+intuitive+and+do+not+require+a+massive+amount+of+technical+ability+to+get+out+a+proof+of+concept.+For+example%2C+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fnodexl.codeplex.com%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3ENodeXL%3C%2Fa%3E+is+a+great+Excel+plugin+that+you+can+use+to+quickly+get+out+social+media+statistics%2C+while+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.tableau.com%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3ETableau%3C%2Fa%3E+and+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.qlik.com%2F404%3Fitem%3D%252fexplore%252fproducts%252fsense%26amp%3Buser%3Dextranet%255cAnonymous%26amp%3Bsite%3DQlik%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3EQliksense%3C%2Fa%3E+both+provide+a+useful+desktop+platform+to+connect+to+data+sources+and+quickly+create+a+data+discovery+dashboard.+IBM%26rsquo%3Bs+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.ibm.com%2Fsmarterplanet%2Fus%2Fen%2Fibmwatson%2Fwhat-is-watson.html%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3EWatson%3C%2Fa%3E+is+also+an+option.+If+you+want+a+lightweight+cloud+version+that+you+can+throw+some+data+at+and+get+some+great+insights%2C+it+is+quite+affordable.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3BSo+who+do+we+hire+in+the+new+world+of+analytics%3F+The+technologies+we+are+using+are+far+too+young+for+someone+to+be+an+expert+in+them.+When+I%26rsquo%3Bm+hiring+people+for+a+relatively+new+technology+stack%2C+I+like+to+look+at+the+person%26rsquo%3Bs+online+profile%3A+does+he+or+she+have+a+blog+that+is+respected+within+the+community%3B+has+he+or+she+published+articles%3B+what+is+his+or+her+status+on+forums%3F+In+the+interview%2C+I+try+to+gauge+the+applicant%26rsquo%3Bs+passion+for+data+and+analytics.+Because+the+technologies+are+so+young%2C+I+look+for+a+pseudo+track+record+that+will+provide+confidence+in+abilities+and+not+necessarily+a+commercial+track+record.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhen+you+are+looking+to+outsource+certain+components+of+your+analytics+strategy%2C+use+the+same+methodology+for+the+service+provider%26rsquo%3Bs+staff.+Public+profile%2C+transparent+training+programmes+and+track+records+are+key+when+it+comes+to+bleeding-edge+technologies.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+terms+of+developing+people+in+the+realm+of+analytics%2C+not+the+technical+side%2C+there+is+no+hard-and-+fast+method+for+this.+My+best+advice+is+to+read+as+many+industry+case+studies+as+possible%2C+keep+up+to+date+with+global+trends+within+your+sector%2C+and+try+to+use+some+of+this+learning+to+apply+internally.+Many+people+outside+of+your+organisation+are+investing+a+lot+of+money+into+these+case+studies+and+it%26rsquo%3Bs+an+easy+win.+I+also+try+to+read+relevant+research+papers+from+Masters+and+PhD+students+from+around+the+world.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+one+point+I+must+stress+is+that+locally+relevant+domain+knowledge+is+crucial.+Understanding+the+industry+and+business+is+a+critical+component+to+achieving+analytics+success.+I+have+mentioned+this+before+but+I+always+look+for+the+%26lsquo%3BMiss+Congenialities%26rsquo%3B+of+organisations.+These+people+have+been+at+the+company+for+many+years%2C+worked+in+several+departments+and+are+likely+to+have+more+domain+knowledge+than+most.+Always+try+to+leverage+these+people+when+going+down+your+analytics+journey.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFrom+a+capabilities+point+of+view%2C+there+are+two+additional+key+points+organisations+need+to+take+into+account.+Firstly%2C+the+relationships+with+external+parties%2C+which+include+vendors%2C+suppliers+and+universities.+These+people+are+paid+to+keep+up+to+date+with+industry+trends%2C+research+what+the+next+big+thing+is+and+are+more+than+willing+to+share+that+knowledge.%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Universities+in+particular+are+great+channels+for+assisting+with+analytics+capabilities+because+their+research+departments+are+on+the+cutting+edge+of+what+is+coming+next.+They+are+also+in+need+of+corporate+sponsorship.+Many+graduates+are+doing+great+work+and+are+worth+talking+to+about+ideas+you+may+have+to+take+your+organisation+to+the+next+level.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+second+point+is+to+%26lsquo%3Binvest+time+in+wasting+time%26rsquo%3B.+This+is+one+of+the+most+important+things+you+can+do+to+keep+yourself+abreast+of+what+is+going+on+in+the+world+of+data+analytics.+Gather+a+team+and+sit+and+watch+YouTube+videos+for+an+hour+or+two+on+relevant+technologies%2Ftopics%2C+spend+time+reading+the+case+studies+and+just+talking+about+possibilities+and+ideas.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+the%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.entelect.co.za%2FNews%2FDisplayNewsItem.aspx%3Fniid%3D53151%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3E+third%3C%2Fa%3E+and+final+part+of+this+series%2C+I+will+look+at+the+best+case+structure+for+a+high+performing+analytics+strategy.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
