Next+level+analytics+competency+%E2%80%93+part+three %3Cp%3EEach+company+has+its+own+unique+culture+and+this+drives+how+things+are+done+in+the+organisation.+To+transform+analytics%2C+make+sure+you+are+out+of+your+comfort+zone+%26ndash%3B+we+cannot+stick+to+the+same+way+of+doing+things+as+we+have+done+in+the+past.+Make+sure+innovation+is+encouraged+and+incentivised.+Support+from+an+executive+within+the+company+is+also+crucial.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETransforming+technology+is+a+longer+process.+Companies+have+to+be+open+to+embracing+new+technologies+and+allowing+rogue+analytics+to+occur.+Forget+about+governance+%28to+a+certain+extent%2C+of+course%29+because+organisations+need+to+encourage+playing+around+with+new+technologies+and+they+should+not+wrap+up+the+process+in+red+tape.+Lastly%2C+and+good+news%2C+the+new+technologies+are+not+that+expensive.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFrom+a+capabilities+point+of+view%2C+embrace+the+online+courses+available+and+form+strategic+partners+with+vendors%2C+suppliers+and+universities+because+these+are+the+people+who+will+assist+you+in+getting+the+most+out+of+your+efforts.+Remember+to+invest+time+in+wasting+time+%26ndash%3B+watch+YouTube+videos%2C+read+case+studies+and+keep+up+to+date+with+industry+and+global+analytics+trends.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EI+believe+that+every+organisation+needs+an+analytics+steerco.+This+committee+should+be+made+up+of+people+who+are+both+internal+and+external+to+the+organisation.+There+should+be+an+internal+executive+who+chairs+the+meetings.+It+is+also+necessary+that+all+business+units+are+represented+in+this+steerco.+From+an+external+point+of+view%2C+technology+vendors%2C+outsourced+suppliers+as+well+as+students+from+local+universities+should+be+included.+With+a+team+of+the+above+individuals%2C+an+organisation+should+quickly+be+able+to+identify+a+strategy+of+analytics+that+will+target+small+pockets+of+work+that+can+prove+a+concept+and+show+a+value+add.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOnce+the+steerco+is+set+up%2C+an+analytics+centre+of+excellence+is+needed.+This+should+comprise+of+people+who+are+passionate+about+technology+and+analytics.+These+people+will+be+responsible+for+executing+the+ideas+that+are+put+forward+by+the+analytics+steerco.+This+is+by+no+means+a+full+time+role%2C+once+the+analytics+strategy+is+solidified+it+will%2C+however%2C+warrant+the+dedicated+resources.%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+To+summarise%2C+let%26rsquo%3Bs+take+a+look+at+the+process+for+an+analytics+Utopia+within+an+organisation.+Firstly%2C+there+needs+to+be+an+executive+heading+up+the+entire+process.+The+analytics+steerco+is+tasked+with+meeting+monthly+to+determine+what+questions+are+going+to+drive+the+strategy.+The+steerco+then+hands+the+ideas+to+the+analytics+centre+of+excellence%2C+which+executes+the+ideas+and+gives+feedback+to+the+steerco.+If+an+idea+is+deemed+to+be+valuable%2C+the+centre+of+excellence+hands+this+to+the+internal+BI%2FMIS+team%2C+which+then+formalises+the+new+analytics.+The+BI%2FMIS+team+implements+the+correct+data+governance%2C+adds+it+to+existing+structures+and+automates+the+processes+with+the+relevant+visualisations.+This+is+then+exposed+to+the+business+and+the+cycle+starts+again.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+All+of+these+steps+require+weekly+progress+updates%2C+monthly+meetings+as+well+as+a+huge+emphasis+on+change+management.+Business+users+need+to+understand+what+value+the+new+analytics+will+bring+to+the+table%2C+when+it+is+going+to+be+implemented+and+how+it+will+impact+the+day+to+day+running+of+the+business.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+All+in+all%2C+the+conference+was+successful+and+I%26rsquo%3Bm+sure+everyone+who+was+there%2C+took+away+something+from+the+conference+that+they+could+implement+within+their+organisations.+We+are+in+an+extremely+exciting+time%2C+with+everyone+racing+to+be+excellent+at+analytics+and+provide+a+better+experience+for+customers%2C+staff+and+ultimately%2C+their+organisations.%3C%2Fp%3E Ryan+Naud%C3%A9+%28Manager%3A+Data+Solutions%2C+Entelect+Software%29%3Cbr%2F%3E%3Cbr%2F%3E+In+the+first+two+parts+of+my+presentation%2C%E2%80%98Scaling+your+Organisation+for+the+Next+Level+of+Analytics%E2%80%99%2C+which+I+presented+at+the+TCI+Banking%3A+Big+Data+and+Analytics+Conference%2C+I+looked+at+the+three+main+pillars+of+transforming+analytics+competency+within+an+organisation%3A+culture%2C+technology+and+capabilities.+In+the+final+part+of+my+presentation%2C+I+looked+at+the+ideal+structure+for+setting+up+an+analytics+centre+of+excellence.+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.entelect.co.za%2FNews%2FDisplayNewsItem.aspx%3Fniid%3D53020%22%3EView+Parts+One%3C%2Fa%3E+%3Ca+href%3Dhttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.entelect.co.za%2FNews%2FDisplayNewsItem.aspx%3Fniid%3D53113%3Eand+Two%3C%2Fa%3E Delivering+a+quality+service+%E2%80%93+getting+it+right %3Cp%3EThere+are+many+mechanisms+available+to+support+a+company%26rsquo%3Bs+service-delivery+goals+and+effective+implementation+of+these+may+be+critical+in+achieving+those+goals.+They+include+technology+and+systems%2C+standard+operating+procedures%2C+industry+best+practices+and+standards+body+certifications.However%2C+many+companies+neglect+to+recognise+the+impact+of+the+softer+elements+of+service+delivery%3A+the+human+element.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EInterpersonal+relationships+can+take+a+mediocre+experience+and+turn+it+into+something+exceptional.+People+like+to+do+business+with+those+whom+they+trust+and+trust+is+an+emotional+response+to+a+positive+%28or+negative%29+experience+with+another+individual.+Having+all+the+checks+and+balances+in+place+cannot+guarantee+a+positive+outcome+if+interaction+at+a+personal+level+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+taken+care+of+effectively.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+obvious+answer+to+this+is+to+hire+the+right+people+but+this+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt+really+tell+us+much.+If+competence+is+assured%2C+what+are+some+of+the+key+behavioural+characteristics+of+individuals+required+to+deliver+a+quality+service%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EShow+a+sense+of+urgency%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EClients+want+to+know+that+you+are+taking+them+seriously.+This+can+best+be+done+by+showing+a+sense+of+urgency%2C+which+means+understanding+and+acknowledging+their+requests+or+concerns%2C+acting+immediately+and+providing+regular+feedback.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EBe+reliable%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EReliability+is+a+requirement+for+trust.+Building+strong+relationships+requires+us+to+honour+our+commitments%2C+whether+made+in+passing+conversation+or+as+part+of+a+larger+project+plan.+Simple+things%2C+such+as+not+returning+a+phone+call+when+promised%2C+not+arriving+for+a+meeting+and+lack+of+attention+to+detail+resulting+in+a+rework%2C+can+erode+the+trust+in+relationship.+If+you+can%26rsquo%3Bt+honour+a+commitment%2C+then+explain+the+circumstances%2C+provide+alternatives+and+present+a+revised+plan+of+action+that+is+agreeable+to+all+parties.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EBe+objective%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEmotional+biases+are+typically+triggered+by+our+past+experiences+or+when+challenged.+They+may+result+in+being+defensive%2C+sugar+coating+or+making+unreasonable+promises+that+can%26rsquo%3Bt+be+kept.+Do+not+let+emotional+biases+get+in+the+way+of+presenting+information.+Always+present+the+facts+as+you+understand+them%2C+then%2C+and+only+if+asked+or+obliged%2C+provide+your+opinion+based+on+the+facts.+As+professionals%2C+we+owe+it+to+our+clients+to+first+present+factual+information%2C+irrespective+of+how+we+feel+about+a+particular+situation.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ECommunicate+frequently%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhen+it+comes+to+delivering+a+quality+service%2C+keep+all+those+involved+in+the+project+informed+with+regular+and+frequent+communication.+This+reiterates+a+%26lsquo%3Bsense+of+urgency%26rsquo%3B+and+shows+that+your+client%26rsquo%3Bs+requirements+are+a+priority.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EValue+over+ego%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBe+humble+in+your+interactions+with+a+client+and+spend+more+time+listening+than+talking.+This+opens+the+door+for+a+better+understanding+of+their+needs+and+builds+a+stronger+interpersonal+relationship%2C+which%2C+in+turn%2C+builds+more+trust.+Going+into+a+discussion+hoping+to+learn+something+rather+than+teach+something%2C+ultimately+positions+you+to+provide+more+value+to+your+client%26rsquo%3Bs+business+in+the+long-term.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThose+businesses+that+continue+to+prioritise+technology+and+processes+over+the+human+element+to+address+service+delivery+goals+will+always+fall+short+of+delivering+a+quality+service+to+their+clients.+Assuming+you+have+a+solid+product+and+the+ability+to+complete+the+job%2C+it+is+the+quality+of+the+interpersonal+experiences+that+leave+a+lasting+impression+and+build+a+better+relationship.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E Doug+Crawford+%28Entelect+Manager%3A+Service+Delivery%29+%3Cbr%2F%3E%3Cbr%2F%3E+Delivering+a+quality+service+can+make+or+break+a+business%2C+especially+those+in+the+professional+services+space+where+the+product+is+the+service.+The+level+of+service+provided+to+clients+can+become+a+key+differentiator+and%2C+more+often+than+not%2C+determines+whether+a+client+will+partner+with+a+service+provider+for+the+long-term+or%2C+at+a+minimum%2C+refer+the+service+provider+to+other+potential+clients. Adaptation+in+software+development+processes%3A+Learn%2C+detach+and+transcend. %3Cp%3EIn+the+world+of+building+software%2C+best+practices+are+considered+a+field-proven+technique+for+solving+a+known+problem.+They+should+be+a+guide.+A+mechanism+that+sets+boundaries+and+establishes+clear+roles%2C+process+and+measurements.+As+software+professionals%2C+we+want+these+processes%2C+practices+and+methodologies+to+tell+us+how+to+get+big+teams+to+work+together+effectively%2C+how+to+measure+%28and+report%29+progress+and+how+to+collectively+deliver+great+quality+software.+This+sounds+right%2C+however%2C+best+practices+should+not+be+used+as+a+prescriptive%2C+singular+approach.+At+some+point%2C+every+problem+becomes+unique+and+common+sense+offers+additional+value.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EVoltaire+famously+said+in+1764+that+%26ldquo%3BCommon+sense+is+not+so+common%26rdquo%3B.+This+just+indicates+that+we+can%26rsquo%3Bt+rely+on+common+sense+to+make+decisions+as+perspectives+are+not+always+shared.+Instead%2C+we+should+foster+a+shared+understanding%2C+a+consensus+on+a+position+and+perception+which+allows+groups+of+people+to+reach+the+same+conclusion.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ELooking+at+the+two+concepts%2C+there+is+a+clear+relationship.+It+seems+that+we+go+about+creating+and+documenting+practices+in+this+endless+desire+to+pen+down+common+sense%2C+to+articulate+things+that+we+often+feel+are+obvious+with+retrospect%2C+the+Agile+revolution+is+a+stand-out+example+of+this.+Perhaps+the+real+goal+is+to+know+how+to+sequence+and+blend+practices+to+service+a+specific+software+development+scenario+-+a+cocktail+of+experience%2C+maturity%2C+structure%2C+influence+and+intent.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EI%26rsquo%3Bm+regularly+confronted+by+frustrated+software+engineers+who+are+baffled+by+the+seeming+absence+of+common+sense+being+applied+in+their+development+environments.+The+frustration+of+engineers+and+development+managers+share+an+interesting+degree+of+overlap.+The+developer+is+confused+at+either+the+lack+or+excess+of+process%2C+and+the+development+manager+is+frustrated+at+the+lack+of+adoption+of+the+processes%2C+or+the+uncertainty+of+which+process+to+use.+Dealing+with+these+situations+takes+some+insight.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EI+like+to+think+of+best+practices%2C+or+strict+methodologies+as+a+set+of+rules+to+get+you+going.+First+we+need+to+learn+and+master+these+rules+and+their+application%2C+this+is+experience%2C+thereafter+we+can+experiment.+An+opinion+with+experience+carries+a+lot+more+weight.+People+aren%26%2339%3Bt+naturally+good+at+using+common+sense+in+complex+and+quickly+developing+areas%2C+so+it+feels+intuitive+to+start+with+a+documented+approach%2C+and+not+rely+on+our+own+individual+sense.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIntention+is+also+important.+Identify+the+actual+objective+of+the+practice.+For+example%2C+a+strict+process+that+govern+changes+to+a+software+product+could+feel+encumbered+and+unnecessary%2C+but+the+intention+is+to+protect+the+company+and+the+users%2C+which+makes+sense.+In+this+example+my+argument+would+be+to+first+master+the+process%2C+and+prove+beyond+a+doubt+that+you%26rsquo%3Bre+capable+of+adhering+to+it%2C+and+then+start+a+process+of+change+from+your+position+of+proven+knowledge.+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWith+the+application+of+experience+and+mastery%2C+we+can+know+when+and+how+to+break%2C+or+evolve%2C+the+rules+to+better+suit+the+people%2C+the+product+or+the+objectives.+This+is+the+%26lsquo%3Bcommon+sense%26rsquo%3B+many+will+rush+to+claim+prematurely.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EGiven+this+understanding%2C+it+stands+to+reason+that+industries+current+set+of+best+practices+are+the+combination+of+experience+from+experts+who+have+come+before+us%2C+but+also+that+once+we+reach+a+level+of+experience+and+mastery%2C+our+own+common+sense+can+inspire+adaptation.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThere+is+a+Japanese+martial+arts+concept+called+%26lsquo%3BShuhari%26rsquo%3B+which+roughly+translates+to+%26ldquo%3Bfirst+learn%2C+then+detach%2C+and+finally+transcend%26rdquo%3B+which+is+an+enlightening+approach+to+developing+best+practice+that+is+relevant+every+time.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAt+Entelect+we%26rsquo%3Bre+constantly+selecting%2C+applying+and+measuring+development+practices+to+find+what+works.+As+engineers%2C+processes+are+important+to+us+and+the+development+of+rules+helps+streamline+problem-solving+to+some+degree.+But+that+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt+mean+we+operate+SCRUM+by-the-book+on+every+project.+Every+problem+really+is+unique%2C+mostly+because+of+the+people%21+Part+of+successfully+applying+best+practice+requires+establishing+a+consensus+on+a+position+and+perception+between+development+managers+and+engineers.+At+which+point%2C+the+team+can+%26lsquo%3Blearn%2C+detach+and+transcend%26rsquo%3B+and+the+resulting+application+of+common+sense+can+add+real+value+to+best+practice+solutions.%3C%2Fp%3E Matthew+Butler+%28Entelect+General+Manager%3A+Managed+Services%29+%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E+As+software+professionals%2C+we+embrace+best+practices+and+processes+that+allow+us+to+do+our+jobs+more+effectively.+But+every+problem+is+unique.+The+ability+for+a+team+to+%27learn%2C+detach+and+transcend%27+can+add+immeasurable+value+to+the+software+solutions+it+delivers. %3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EToday%2C+just+about+anything+can+be+learnt+via+the+internet%2C+enabling+people+all+over+the+world+the+chance+to+develop+skills+in+virtually+any+field.+Considering+the+fast+growth+of+the+technology+industry%2C+this+presents+exciting+opportunities%3B+placing+opportunity+in+the+hands+of+anyone+dedicated+to+learning+a+new+skill.+As+such%2C+the+rock+stars+of+today+are+no+longer+traditional+jocks%2C+they+are+geeks+with+laptops.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+shift+is+even+more+relevant+in+the+software+industry.+Anyone+technically+inclined+can+learn+how+to+write+software+if+they+spend+enough+time+on+Google.+And+with+a+keen+eye+for+innovation%2C+anyone+can+come+up+with+a+great+concept+that+has+the+potential+to+disrupt+life+the+way+Facebook+did.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ENo+doubt%2C+there+have+been+some+truly+amazing+software+solutions+built+in+this+informal+fashion%2C+but+the+difference+between+a+great+concept+and+a+beautifully+built+piece+of+software+that+complies+with+best+practices+and+quality+standards%2C+is+a+lot+of+hard+work.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+media+and+Silicon+Valley+glamorize+stories+of+the+%26lsquo%3Blone+genius+coder%26rsquo%3B%2C+those+superstars+depicted+in+films+such+as+The+Social+Network+and+Mr.+Robot.+But+the+truth+is%2C+there+is+no+shortcut+to+building+great+software.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ELike+any+industry%2C+there+are+isolated+geniuses+who+build+out+products+that+fundamentally+disrupt+our+lives.+But%2C+like+football+millionaires+and+music+artists%2C+these+stories+are+exceptional+and+are+only+a+fraction+of+the+people+who+contribute+to+their+industries.+Silicon+Valley+for+example%2C+employs+only+8%25+of+coders+in+the+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.wired.com%2F2017%2F02%2Fprogramming-is-the-new-blue-collar-job%2F%22%3EUS%3C%2Fa%3E.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESo%2C+what+does+the+bigger+picture+look+like%3F+For+starters%2C+while+many+coders+and+engineers+across+the+world+are+self-taught%2C+most+have+had+formalized+training+behind+them.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESecondly%2C+most+software+engineers+in+the+industry+build+out+products+that+answer+a+business+need.+Many+work+for+businesses%2C+big+or+small%2C+or+consultancies+where+a+large+part+of+the+job+is+helping+to+identify+the+problem+and+best+fit+solution.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDo+they+receive+the+same+glory+and+recognition+on+the+global+stage%3F+No.+But+often+the+solutions+that+engineers+develop+to+resolve+various+challenges+provide+a+greater+sense+of+purpose.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAs+traditional+industries+shift+towards+technology+solutions%2C+engineers+can+find+themselves+working+to+build+time-effective%2C+secure+banking+solutions+that+help+make+your+day-to-day+life+easier%3B+or+healthcare+solutions+that+help+people+identify+early+onset+of+diseases%2C+or+agriculture+solutions+that+help+farmers+monitor+the+health+of+their+crop+or+livestock.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOften+these+are+small+shifts%2C+but+they+can+have+a+dramatic+impact+on+the+livelihoods+of+the+communities+around+us.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHowever%2C+within+these+environments+there+can+be+inconsistencies+between+the+capabilities+of+those+software+engineers+with+formalized+or+non-formalized+training.+Not+every+company+requires+a+graduate+degree+for+example.+Equally%2C+even+within+academia%2C+there+can+be+discrepancies+regarding+the+different+levels+of+practical+experience+obtained%2C+making+a+significant+difference+to+the+engineers%26rsquo%3B+ability+to+build+the+right+solution+for+the+problem+at+hand.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhen+building+software%2C+engineers+need+to+consider+issues+such+as+maintainability%2C+quality%2C+stability%2C+performance%2C+consistent+standards%2C+security%2C+and+scalability.+To+build+a+perfect+solution+requires+the+engineer+to+do+all+these+things+in+parallel%2C+which+is+true+craftsmanship+and+takes+years+of+experience.%26nbsp%3B+It+requires+significant+thought+to+be+applied+to+the+architecture+and+design%2C+the+ability+to+apply+computer+science+principles+%28such+as+OO%29%2C+and+a+strong+problem+solving+ability.+As+such%2C+mastering+the+skills+required+to+deliver+great+software+is+a+highly+adapted+talent.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEntelect+understands+the+complexities+of+todays%26rsquo%3B+business+challenges+in+software+engineering%2C+and+this+has+informed+our+hiring+strategy.+We+believe+that+a+degree+in+Information+Technology%2C+Engineering+or+Mathematics+equips+a+prospective+candidate+with+the+foundation+required+to+become+a+great+software+engineer.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFor+our+graduates%2C+we+build+on+their+academic+learning+with+an+intensive+6+week+graduate+bootcamp+to+convert+the+academic+learning+into+practical+real-world+experience.+We+then+invest+heavily+in+continued+training+to+ensure+all+our+staff+are+constantly+at+the+forefront+of+software+engineering+trends+and+best+practices.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EUnfortunately%2C+however%2C+in+South+Africa+the+software+engineering+field+is+predominately+unregulated.+Compared+to+traditional+engineering+disciplines+and+law%2C+there+are+a+lack+of+governing+bodies+and+professional+organisations.+This+makes+it+harder+for+potential+clients+or+employers+to+spot+the+average+coders+from+outstanding+talent.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhile+this+is+improving+globally%2C+we+are+in+the+midst+of+a+societal+shift+towards+citizen-driven+access+to+knowledge+that+is+up-ending+our+traditional+regulatory+systems.+Legislation+needs+to+understand+how+to+work+with+these+shifts+and+apply+quality+controls+accordingly%2C+but+this+will+take+time.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThat+anyone+can+teach+themselves+to+code+via+google+is+fantastic.+It+gives+this+growing+industry+a+low+barrier+to+entry%2C+making+it+inclusive+and+meaning+that+anyone+can+discover+their+potential.+However%2C+transitioning+from+a+self-taught+coder+to+a+software+engineer+capable+of+true+craftsmanship+takes+years+of+experience+and+formalized+training.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIf+you%26rsquo%3Bre+determined+to+become+a+superstar+coder%2C+then+you+should+commit+to+continued+learning+including+some+formalized+training+and+understand+that+there+are+no+short+cuts%2C+just+a+lot+of+hard+work+and+true+dedication+to+your+craft.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E Building+a+high+impact+leadership+development+framework %3Cp%3EGlobally%2C+companies+spend+millions+on+formal+Leadership+Development+initiatives+to+try+and+fast+track+and+invest+in+their+leadership+pipeline.+A+typical+Harvard+Business+School+Executive+Leadership+Development+Program+can+easily+cost+in+excess+of+%2440%26nbsp%3B000%2C+with+local+programs+being+a+bit+more+affordable%2C+ranging+from+R60%26nbsp%3B000+for+short+courses+to+an+excess+of+R300%26nbsp%3B000+for+executive+focused+programmes.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIrrespective+of+the+type+of+programme%2C+they+all+have+a+common+goal+in+mind%3A+to+develop+the+next+set+of+leaders+inside+our+organisations.+However%2C+we+sometimes+miss+the+mark+by+not+delivering+a+good+balance+between+targeted+outcomes+compared+to+the+amount+of+time%2C+effort+and+money+put+in.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+other+words+we+are+not+getting+the+needed+bang+for+our+buck.+But+there+are+some%26nbsp%3Bcommon+mistakes+we+make+when+starting+these+initiatives%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E1%29+Failing+to+properly+define+expected+ROI+metrics+and+later+benchmarking+against+them.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E2%29+Failing+to+select+the+correct+programme%2C+course+or+service+provider+that+fits+the+current+needs%2C+goals+and+culture+of+the+organisation.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E3%29+Not+selecting+the+right+attendees.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAs+we+all+know%2C+there+are+no+shortcuts+to+developing+our+staff%2C+be+it+technical+development+or+leadership+development.+What+we+need+is+a+well+thought+through+approach+that+will+help+us+navigate+the+dynamic+world+of+business.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETime%2C+effort%2C+commitment+and+follow+through%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EForm+a+managerial+level%2C+we+need+to+spend+time+and+effort+to+take+stock+of+what+our+organisational+needs+are.+For+example%2C+do+we+prioritise+technical+skills+over+leadership+skills%3F+Do+we+get+an+external+service+provider+to+present+new+content+or%2C+do+we+develop+our+own%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe+need+to+commit+to+our+training+and+development+initiatives+as+part+of+a+continual+learning+process.+We+do+this+by+actively+managing+expectations+and+actual+outcomes.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFinally%2C+we+need+follow+through.+We+need+to+measure%2C+assess+and+be+able+to+illustrate+the+true+impact+the+program+has+had%2C+not+only+on+the+organisation+as+a+whole%2C+but+specifically+on+the+individual.+That+is+ultimately+our+goal%2C+improving+the+individual.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EA+framework%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETo+help+you+structure+your+skills%2C+and+leadership+development+programmes+it+is+worth+thinking+of+it+in+terms+of+a+hierarchy+of+needs.+Different+groups+of+employees+have+different+needs%2C+at+different+times+of+their+careers%2C+where+each+layer+supports+and+builds+up+to+the+next+layer.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EA+typical+hierarchy+of+needs+triangle+can+illustrate+how+you+could+structure+some+of+your+initiatives+to+achieve+maximum+impact.+Each+level+targets+a+specific+need+or+group+in+the+business%2C+and+will+be+tailored+accordingly.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E1.+Culture+and+Values%3A+As+a+starting+point+the+cultural+elements+as+well+as+the+core+values+of+the+organisation+needs+to+be+defined%2C+communicated+and+regularly+reinforced.+One+of+the+many+functions+of+this+layer+is+to+set+and+communicate+your+commitment+to+caring+for+and+growing+your+staff.+Initiatives+in+this+layer+can+be+broader+in+focus+and+can+be+targeted+to+larger+groups+within+the+organisation.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E2.+The+Core+Technical+Competencies+layer+focusses+on+equipping+your+staff+with+the+needed+skills+and+knowledge+to+be+able+to+effectively+perform+their+duties.+In+other+words%2C+your+staff+needs+to+have+the+ability+to+perform+per+the+expected+standard+of+excellence.+Training+programs+that+fall+into+this+layer%2C+should+have+a+direct+impact+on+the+daily+operations+of+the+business.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E3.The+Technical+Specialities+layer+focusses+on+the+specialist+skillsets+that+will+help+drive+your+business+forward%2C+ensuring+that%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIt+remains+relevant+in+the+market+place+in+terms+of+technical+capability+%28such+as+technology+changes%2C+competition%2C+client+demands%29.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIt+can+take+on+new+opportunities+that+arise+over+time+as+result+of+a+changing+market+conditions+%28such+as+emerging+technologies%2C+new+markets%29.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIt+can+differentiate+itself+from+its+competitors+%28via+niche+or+specialist+skills%29%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E4.+New+Leadership+Development+focusses+on+developing+new+leaders+and+helping+them+transition+from+technical+experts+into+leaders+in+your+organisation.+This+is+especially+difficult+to+achieve%2C+especially+in+strong+technical+environments+where+a+lot+of+value+and+status+is+assigned+to+your+technical+and+specialist+ability+as+an+individual.+What+is+important+to+note%2C+and+incorporate%2C%26nbsp%3B+into+initiatives+for+this+layer+is+the+differentiation+between+technical+ability+and+leadership+ability+as+distinct+disciplines.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EInitiatives+in+this+layer+are+less+broad%2C+and+some+specialisation+needs+to+be+done+by+identifying+sub+groups%2C+such+as+inexperienced+leaders+vs+experienced+leaders.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E5.+Targeted+Leadership+Development+needs+to+ensure+that+you+nurture+and+grow+your+key+leaders+in+the+organisation.+What+needs+to+be+recognised+is+that+just+as+you+would+mentor+your+staff+on+technical+competencies%2C+leaders+need+specific+leadership+focused+mentorship+in+order+to+develop+their+leadership+ability+further.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EResearch+has+shown+that+people+who+have+been+mentored+by+multiple+mentors%2C+have+shown+greater+levels+success+than+those+who+have+only+been+mentored+by+a+single+mentor.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EInitiatives+in+this+layer+needs+to+be+focused+on+the+individual+and+tailored+to+their+specific+needs+and+situation.+If+they+are+group+based%2C+the+groups+must+be+smaller+and+individuals+needs+to+be+grouped+according+to+their+leadership+development+needs.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EUltimately%2C+the+outcomes+and+impact+of+training+and+development+initiatives+needs+to+be+measurable+and+illustratable+to+be+able+to+assess+the+value+of+the+amount+of+time%2C+effort+and+money+put+in.+But+similarly%2C+the+appropriate+selection+and+%26lsquo%3Bfit%26rsquo%3B+of+employees+to+each+training+course+is+important.+You+need+to+ensure+that+the+initiative+will+cater+to+the+needs+of+the+specific+group+or+person%2C+and+that+the+expected+outcomes+will+match+your+goals+for+the+organisation.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBy+applying+our+minds+and+defining+a+structured+approach+to+how+we+implement+our+training+leadership+development+initiatives+we+can+start+the+journey+of+not+only+caring+for%2C+and+growing+our+staff+more+effectively%2C+but+also+delivering+true+value+to+the+organisation+without+blowing+the+budget.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E A+case+for+unpleasant+design+in+software+development %3Cp%3EIn+the+world+of+software+development%2C+user+experience+%28UX%29+design+is+a+hot+topic.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EResearch+has+shown+that+UX+design+can+significantly+enhance+the+customer+experience%2C+by+focusing+design+efforts+on+improving+usability%2C+accessibility+and+the+user+journey.+In+the+age+of+mobile%2C+the+user%26rsquo%3Bs+experience+can+have+a+huge+impact+on+whether+your+app+will+be+a+success+or+failure%3A+the+difference+between+millions+of+downloads+and+none.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EI+recently+listened+to+a+podcast+about+%26lsquo%3BHostile+Architecture%26rsquo%3B+and+started+thinking+about+how+we+can+employ+this+concept+in+shaping+users%26rsquo%3B+behaviour%3B+pushing+them+away+from+certain+behaviours+and+towards+others.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ELet%26rsquo%3Bs+have+a+look+at+what+is+meant+by+%26lsquo%3BHostile+Architecture%26rsquo%3B%2C+also+known+as+%26lsquo%3Bunpleasant+design%26rsquo%3B.+In+architecture%2C+unpleasant+design+has+manifested+itself+in+a+wide+variety+of+areas.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHere+are+some+common+examples%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cul%3E+%3Cli%3EUsing+metal+spikes+or+protrusions+to+prevent+people+from+sitting+or+sleeping+on+sidewalks+and+in+front+of+shop+windows%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EDesigning+seats+in+a+way+that+prevents+people+from+sitting+comfortably+for+long+periods%2C+such+as+at+bus+and+train+stations%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EAt+airports%2C+arm+rests+are+designed+in+a+way+that+prevents+people+from+lying+down%2C+forcing+them+to+sit%2C+straight+up%2C+knees+facing+forward+%26ndash%3B+not+the+most+comfortable+position+for+a+wary+traveller%21%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EThe+use+of+pink+lighting+outside+shops+accentuates+skin+blemishes+and+therefore+discourages+teenagers+from+congregating+outside%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EThe+use+of+ultraviolet+lighting+under+city+bridges+and+in+public+restrooms+makes+it+difficult+for+drug+users+to+locate+their+veins+to+inject+drugs%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cp%3EWhat%26rsquo%3Bs+important+to+note+is+that%2C+in+all+these+examples%2C+the+core+problem+was+not+resolved%2C+but+rather+shifted.+It+forced+vagrants+to+find+other+places+to+sit+or+sleep%2C+teenagers+to+find+other+spots+to+congregate+at%2C+that+didn%26rsquo%3Bt+highlight+their%2C+well%2C+spots.+Drug+users+were+forced+to+find+other+places+to+get+high.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+point+is+that+unpleasant+design+is+meant+to+deter+or+frustrate+the+user+to+such+an+extent+that+the+undesirable+behaviour+is+either+ceased+or+displaced.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ESo+how+do+we+apply+this+to+UX+design%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETypically%2C+if+you+wanted+to+change+your+users%26rsquo%3B+behaviours%2C+you+probably+wouldn%26rsquo%3Bt+opt+to+frustrate+them.+You+might+argue+that+you+would+rather+use+an+incentive+model+to+elicit+the+desired+behavioural+change.+However%2C+there+are+a+few+examples+where+unpleasant+design+might+come+in+handy%2C+such+as+in+fraud+prevention+and+monitoring.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAs+part+of+bigger+enterprise-level+systems%2C+some+activities+are+considered+higher+risk+than+others.+For+instance%2C+users+of+a+payments+administration+platform+might+be+able+to+update+or+change+a+creditor%26rsquo%3Bs+banking+details.+By+manipulating+these+details%2C+payments+could+potentially+be+funnelled+away+from+the+intended+recipient+into+a+fraudster%26rsquo%3Bs+account.+If+details+are+changed+back+after+a+payment+has+been+processed%2C+and+in+the+absence+of+proper+control+mechanisms%2C+the+fraud+could+go+undetected.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ELet%26rsquo%3Bs+assume+that+all+the+typical+control+mechanisms+and+processes+are+in+place+to+prevent+fraud+but+that+there+are+functions+on+the+system+that+are+vulnerable+to+abuse.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EHow+do+we+design+a+system+that+highlights+and+actively+discourages+these+high-risk+actions%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOne+approach+could+be+to+apply+the+concept+of+unpleasant+design%2C+with+the+purpose+of+deterring+or+frustrating+the+user+to+avoid+certain+undesirable+or+high-risk+behaviours.+For+example%2C+the+high-risk+behaviour+on+the+system+is+highlighted+by+making+the+typical+audit+trail+data+visible+to+the+users.+By+doing+this%2C+the+user+is+made+acutely+aware+of+his+actions+and+behaviour+on+the+system%2C+as+well+as+the+fact+that+this+behaviour+is+being+tracked+and+monitored.+And+so%2C+you+rely+on+the+resulting+psychological+effect+as+the+deterrent%3A+the+fear+of+being+caught.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EUnderstanding+your+client+and+their+business%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESoftware+engineers+need+to+constantly+look+for+ideas+and+find+inspiration+from+other+environments+and+industries+to+help+drive+innovation+and+rejuvenate+our+way+of+thinking+about+how+we+design+and+build+systems.%3C%2Fp%3E Jaco+Grant+%28Entelect%2C+Delivery+Manager%29+%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E+UX+design+can+significantly+enhance+customer+experience.+But+recently+a+slightly+unconventional+approach+known+as+%27hostile+architecture%E2%80%99+is+being+used+to+shape+consumer+behaviour.+So%2C+how+can+you+apply+this+to+UX+design+effectively%3F ["Software best practices"] Jaco Grant.jpg
Let%E2%80%99s+do+Agile+right %3Cp%3EAgile+is+an+approach+that+companies+must+be+prepared+to+live%2C+breathe+and+consistently+practise+to+realise+the+full+value+of+the+methodology.+This+means+full+buy-in+and+in+most+instances%2C+a+mind-shift+across+the+entire+organisation.+Add+the+rapid+pace+of+industry+caused+by+the+Digital+Age%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+easy+to+see+why+every+organisation+needs+a+software+development+workforce+to+stay+up-to-date+and+competitive.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETraditional+product+development+lifecycles+just+don%26rsquo%3Bt+cut+it+anymore.+These+processes+can+delay+a+great+idea+by+12+months%2C+meaning+your+organisation+quickly+loses+its+position+against+it+competitors.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+Agile+methodology+was+designed+to+help+organisations+respond+more+efficiently+in+a+dynamic+market+environment.+But+there+are+critical+success+factors+to+Agile.+If+you+don%26rsquo%3Bt+adhere+to+these%2C+then+you%26rsquo%3Bre+probably+not+seeing+the+benefits+and+wondering+what+all+the+fuss+is+about.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EHow+to+do+Agile+right%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E1.+To+do+Agile+%26lsquo%3Bright%26rsquo%3B%2C+requires+the+organisation+to+foster+a+culture+of+innovation.+Agile+creates+a+%26lsquo%3Bstart-up%26rsquo%3B+vibe%2C+which+inspires+employees.+It+is+widely+understood+that+a+great+idea+can+come+from+any+facet+of+a+business%2C+and+most+certainly+from+any+employee.+Challenging+the+status+quo+is+a+characteristic+that+is+at+the+heart+of+Agile.+An+organisation+that+encourages+its+employees+to+constantly+challenge+the+status+quo+is+going+to+inspire+innovative+thinking+as+part+of+its+culture.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E2.+The+team+structure+is+critical.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+the+responsibility+of+the+product+owner+in+an+Agile+squad+to+ensure+that+the+right+people+are+in+the+right+seat.+A+squad+normally+comprises+of+the+following+roles%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Product+owner%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Scrum+master%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Technical+lead%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Squad+members+%28developers%2C+designers%2C+testers%2C+data+analysts+and+analysts%29%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+squad+should+then+be+supported+by+a+scrum+coach%2C+engineering+coach%2C+and+people+coach.+Coaches+may+seem+like+an+unnecessary+second+layer+but+the+coaches+are+essential.+They+are+there+to+support%2C+guide%2C+and+teach+the+tools+and+principles+for+successful+Agile+implementation.+Without+them%2C+your+squad+will+not+have+the+benefit+of+previous+experience.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E3.+Provide+plenty+of+training.+The+dynamic+nature+of+Agile+means+that+teams+must+be+constantly+learning%2C+evolving+and+adapting.+Teams+need+a+vast+array+of+skills+and+experience+to+deliver+on+an+Agile+project.+It+is+important+to+equip+the+squad+with+the+necessary+skills+and+knowledge+to+make+the+correct+calls.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EWhy+Agile+goes+wrong%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThere+are+several+reasons+Agile+in+organisations+fails+before+it+gets+going.+Often+it+is+the+lack+of+simple+but+essential+team+features.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E1.+Autonomy.+The+product+owner+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt+allow+or+encourage+autonomy+in+the+squad.+The+squad+must+be+encouraged+to+make+decisions+and+consequently+take+ownership.+Only+when+people+feel+a+sense+of+ownership+can+they+have+the+greatest+impact+on+a+project.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E2.+The+scrum+master+must+sustain+performance.+When+scrum+masters+don%26rsquo%3Bt+drive+performance%2C+or+demonstrate+any+creativity+to+improve+team+dynamics%2C+communication+breaks+down+and+this+ultimately+breaks+the+quality+and+culture+in+the+squad.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E3.+Compiling+a+team+with+the+wrong+skills.+In+a+bid+to+get+an+Agile+team+in+place%2C+corporates+often+compile+a+squad+without+the+right+complement+of+skills+and+expertise.+The+result+is+that+the+team+falls+back+into+its+old+habits.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E4.+The+product+must+be+designed%2C+spec%26rsquo%3Bd+and+estimated+before+it+is+passed+to+the+Agile+squad+to+build.+Thereby+fitting+a+waterfall+project+into+an+Agile+development+drive+train%2C+but+not+allowing+Agile+methodology+to+build+the+product+as+you+go.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EHow+to+start+Agile+in+a+corporate%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EA+top-down+approach+is+always+the+best+place+to+start.+No+doubt+that+buy-in+from+executives+and+senior+management+really+help+to+cement+a+new+approach.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHire+smart.+Ensure+you+have+the+correct+people+with+the+correct+skills+on+the+team.+Importantly%2C+make+sure+you+have+a+Scrum+master+who+can+keep+the+team+running+on+a+solid%2C+even%2C+and+efficient+pace.+This+person+must+be+the+heartbeat+of+the+team.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EStart+with+a+fresh+project+with+minimal+dependencies.+This+will+allow+you+to+experience+the+strength+of+doing+Agile+%26lsquo%3Bright%26rsquo%3B%2C+and+doing+it+right+first+time+will+give+you+a+solid+base+for+your+next+Agile+project.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDon%26rsquo%3Bt+forget+to+look+after+your+people.+The+environment%2C+having+the+right+tools+for+the+job+%26ndash%3B+and+plenty+of+coffee+-+all+play+a+big+part.+The+team+must+be+exceptionally+cohesive.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFinally%2C+be+committed+to+the+process.+The+ship+turns+slowly+at+first%2C+but+keep+it+turning+and+your+business+will+find+a+pace+that+will+allow+it+to+be+more+dynamic+than+its+competitors.%3C%2Fp%3E Nico+Mulder+%28Entelect%2C+Delivery+Manager%29+%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E+Agile+was+designed+to+help+organisations+respond+more+efficiently+in+a+dynamic+marketplace.+But+to+do+Agile+right+requires+a+culture+that+encourages+innovation+and+continual+learning%2C+and+well+structured+teams. ["Software best practices"] Nico Mulder-10.jpg
Developing+a+natural+interest+in+STEM+through+open+source+software %3Cp%3EDuring+another+power+cut+in+a+poor+area+of+Brazil%2C+a+mechanic+sat+in+the+dark+and+wondered+how+he+could+light+up+his+house+without+electricity.+He+came+up+with+the+idea+of+pouring+bleach+and+water+into+a+two-litre+plastic+bottle%2C+which+refracted+sunlight+through+a+hole+in+the+roof+and+lit+up+his+house+during+the+day.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAlfredo+Moser%26rsquo%3Bs+invention+has+provided+a+simple+lighting+solution+to+millions+of+people+who+live+in+off-grid+areas+around+the+world.+Others+have+since+improved+on+his+design%2C+by+attaching+solar+panels+so+that+it+can+also+provide+light+at+night-time.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+is+a+real-world+example+of+the+value+and+beauty+of+open+source+design%2C+more+commonly+spoken+about+in+the+context+of+software+development.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EGreater+good%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDesigners%2C+inventors+and+engineers+put+their+ideas+out+into+the+world+in+the+hopes+that+they+will+inspire+others+to+improve+on+their+designs+and+create+something+that+we+can%26rsquo%3Bt+live+without.+Open+source+collaboration+works+so+well+because+the+community+is+committed+to+making+every+iteration+better+and+more+secure+than+the+last.+They+take+pride+in+what+they+do+and+work+together+to+produce+high-quality+solutions.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EThey%26rsquo%3Bve+gotten+it+right+in+the+software+space%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EA+few+years+ago%2C+proprietary+business+and+creative+software+was+prohibitively+expensive+for+many+people.+But+the+unstoppable+rise+of+the+open+source+movement+has+democratised+software+and+information+to+the+point+where+%26ndash%3B+no+matter+what+type+of+software+you+need+%26ndash%3B+it%26rsquo%3Bs+likely+you%26rsquo%3Bll+find+a+free%2C+high+quality+and+substantially+cheaper+alternative+to+the+top-of-the-range%2C+paid-for+options.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEven+enterprises+are+increasingly+putting+their+trust+in+open+source+software%2C+like+Apache%2C+Linux+and+MySQL%2C+and+the+big+guys%2C+like+Microsoft%2C+are+releasing+a+lot+of+their+source+code+to+open+source+platforms.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMany+of+us+don%26rsquo%3Bt+actually+realise+how+much+open+source+software+we+use+every+day+%26ndash%3B+or+the+impact+these+solutions+have+had+on+our+lives.+If+you+watch+videos+through+VLC+Media+Player%2C+you%26rsquo%3Bre+using+open+source+software.+If+you+use+Mozilla+as+an+email+or+web+browsing+client%2C+you%26rsquo%3Bre+using+open+source+software.+If+you+use+GIMP+to+edit+images+or+Drupal+to+build+websites+%26ndash%3B+you+get+the+point.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ENow+imagine+the+impact+of+equally+high+quality+education+software+in+the+lives+of+children+in+rural+or+under-resourced+areas.+Imagine+the+difference+in+learning+outcomes+between+children+studying+out+of+outdated%2C+dog-eared+textbooks%2C+versus+engaging+with+world-class%2C+interactive+and+relevant+digital+content+that+immerses+learners+in+topics+that+excite+them%2C+rather+than+imposing+structured%2C+predetermined+and+%26ndash%3B+let%26rsquo%3Bs+face+it+%26ndash%3B+boring+curricula+on+them+just+because+that%26rsquo%3Bs+the+way+it%26rsquo%3Bs+always+been+done.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EA+new%2C+effective+approach+to+STEM%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+is+how+we%26rsquo%3Bll+get+children+interested+in+science%2C+technology%2C+engineering+and+mathematics+%28STEM%29+%26ndash%3B+effortlessly+and+effectively.+Not+by+lowering+pass+rates+or+making+these+subjects+optional+in+schools.+The+truth+is%2C+if+we+keep+teaching+STEM+subjects+the+way+we+always+have%2C+children+will+never+be+excited+about+them.+But+let+them+tinker+around+with+IoT+and+the+free+resources+on+sites+like+Wyliodrin+Studio%2C+or+encourage+them+to+contribute+to+the+open+source+projects+on+Village+Science%2C+and+watch+a+love+of+STEM+develop+naturally.%3C%2Fp Recovering+from+failure inancial+impact+of+failed+projects%2C+but+most+importantly+there+is+a+huge+loss-of-opportunity+cost.+This+can+range+from+a+basic+loss+of+income+caused+by+not+being+able+to+capitalize+on+your+ideas+or+initiatives%2C+to+making+bad+business+decisions+by+not+having+sufficient+insight+into+your+own+business+data.+Bad+decisions+can+cost+you+your+business.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EFailure%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESo%2C+when+things+do+go+wrong+and+don%26rsquo%3Bt+work+out+as+expected%3B+what+then%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWell%2C+depending+of+the+severity+of+the+failure%2C+your+first+action+might+be+to+Google+The+Seven+Stages+of+Grief+%28Shock%2C+Denial%2C+Anger%2C+Bargaining%2C+Depression%2C+Testing%2C+Acceptance%29.+And+then+you+realize+that+ironically+a+lack+of+Testing+and+Acceptance+is+probably+what+got+you+into+this+mess+in+the+first+place%21%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThen+as+the+shock+fades+you+turn+your+attention+back+to+the+task+at+hand.+What+now%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAs+a+start%2C+it+is+to+be+expected+that+your+client+will+most+probably+be+very+angry+and+may+need+an+outlet+to+vent+their+frustration.+Don%26rsquo%3Bt+see+this+as+a+negative+aspect+of+the+experience.+The+important+point+to+note+here+is+to+listen+and+show+the+client+that+you+care%2C+not+that+you+are+just+sympathetic%2C+but+that+you+are+deeply+empathetic+as+to+what+has+transpired.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EOwn+your+mistakes%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBy+building+meaningful+relationships+with+your+clients%2C+it+will+create+room+for+experimentation+and+ultimately+create+tolerance+for+mistakes.+It+is+important+to+own+your+mistakes+and+to+never+underestimate+the+value+of+saying+you+are+sorry.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EConsider+all+the+information+at+hand+before+responding+to+your+client%26rsquo% Kicking+off+the+first+squad %3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhen+our+squad+started+the+engagement+with+our+client%2C+it+was+August+2016.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe+had+to+deliver+an+MVP+in+16+weeks.+This+included+client+interviews%2C+story+mapping+with+UX+designs%2C+setup+of+the+delivery+pipeline+for+the+squad%2C+Continuous+Integration%2C+Continuous+Delivery%2C+deployments%2C+identifying+and+implementing+communication+channels+such+as+Slack%2C+with+integrations+into+the+delivery+pipeline.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+first+squad+is+always+the+hardest.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOvertime+is+required%2C+there+are+many+internal+walls+that+need+to+be+broken+down%2C+and+internal+business+processes+require+adjustment+for+Agile+delivery.+Business+will+require+quick+feedback+and+they+want+to+see+value+within+the+first+2+sprints%26hellip%3B+the+pressure+was+on.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe+knew+this+going+in+though.+We+also+knew+that+for+any+squad+to+be+successful%2C+the+market+research+and+discovery+phase+in+sprint+zero+is+vitally+important.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EThe+importance+of+sprint+0%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+discovery+phase+defines+the+MVP+and+the+feature+pipeline+which+sets+the+roadmap+for+the+squad.+What+we+built+had+to+be+tangible%2C+achievable%2C+disruptive+and+attractive+to+business.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+discovery+phase+%28Sprint+0%29+sets+the+tone+for+the+team+and+is+usually+the+hardest+to+show+value.+Most+of+the+work+done+in+sprint+0+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt+have+much+of+a+tangible+value+to+it%2C+so+we+knew+it+would+be+important+to+show+the+experience.+Make+it+visible.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAn+outcome+of+sprint+0+is+to+have+the+work+aligned+for+the+first+2+sprints.+All+the+stories+should+be+groomed%2C+any+designs+should+be+done+by+the+UX+designer%2C+so+that+the+squad+can+kick-off+the+development+with+ease.+It+sets+the+standard+for+working+in+an+Agile+manner.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhile+the+discovery+phase+didn%26rsquo%3Bt+need+the+full+squad%2C+we+made+sure+we+had+a+representative+from+each+of+the+core+skillsets+to+cover+all+possible+bases+from+the+get-go.%26nbsp%3B+These+included%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Business+%28the+Product+Owner%29%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Analysts+%28to+assist+with+the+design%2C+user+story+grooming%2C+client+interviews+and+environment+analysis%29%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+UX+Designer+%28to+analyze+the+customer+journey+and+experience%29%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Engineers+%28to+kick-off+with+the+technical+integrations%2C+setting+up+of+the+CI%2FCD+and+delivery+pipeline%29.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EGetting+this+team+structure+right+upfront+was+vitally+important+to+the+developers+and+the+success+of+the+product.+You+can+even+throw+in+a+small+teambuilding+exercise+to+ensure+everyone+knows+each+other+and%2C+to+build+culture.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOnce+the+discovery+phase+was+complete%2C+we%26rsquo%3Bd+defined+the+MVP%2C+completed+the+User+Story+grooming%2C+and+laid+out+the+first+2+to+3+sprints%2C+we+were+ready+to+get+the+rest+of+the+team+to+join+in.+And+they+hit+the+ground+running.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EAdjusting%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+2nd%26nbsp%3Bsquad+kicked+off+after+the+first+16-week+phase.+We+used+the+learning+from+the+first+squad+to+kick-start+the+2nd%26nbsp%3Bteam+and+drive+the+delivery+from+the+start.+The+walls+broken+down+by+squad+1%2C+allowed+for+an+easier+kick-off+and+start+for+the+2nd+squad.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEven+after+the+2nd+squad+had+kicked+off%2C+we+realized+the+biggest+challenge+would+be+to+get+the+client+business+to+adjust+to+an+Agile+methodology%3A+to+be+more+hands+on+and+thoroughly+invested+in+the+processes%2C+not+just+a+by-stander+overseeing+the+agile+transformation.+They+needed+to+join+the+transformation+and+live+and+breathe+agile+it+on+a+daily+basis.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETo+help+client+adjust+would+mean+a+very+hands-on+approach+from+our+side.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe+invited+the+client+to+spend+time+within+our+dev+squads%2C+understanding+why+Agile+was+so+important+for+building+services+and+products+in+today%26rsquo%3Bs+market+place.+The+hierarchy+of+the+person+is+irrelevant.+The+important+thing+is+for+them+to+understand+why+it+worked.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOnce+we+had+buy-in+and+understanding%2C+we+were+able+to+grow+to+six+squads+all+compiled+by+Agile+Coaches%2C+Product+Owners%2C+Tech+Leads%2C+Software+Engineers%2C+Analysts%2C+Data+Scientists%2C+UX+Designers%2C+UI+designers%2C+and+Testers.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EThe+stakes%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOf+course%2C+there+were+risks.+Any+integration+into+legacy+systems+or+existing+applications+that+still+run+in+waterfall+delivery+could+affect+the+efficiency+and+effectiveness+of+the+squad.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBut+we+were+prepared+for+this.+So%2C+our+approach+was+to+tackle+these+dependencies+upfront.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIt%26rsquo%3Bs+well+understood+that+the+first+squad+is+tough.+There+are+development+and+integration+challenges%2C+but+also+buy-in%2C+and+very+often+an+organizational+mind+shift+required+to+adopt+Agile+methodologies.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOne+solution+we+worked+with+was+to+have+one+or+two+software+engineers+from+other+integration+teams+join+the+squad.+This+helped+with+knowledge+sharing%2C+IP%2C+and+buy-in+where+integrations+and+changes+to+existing+services+are+needed.+It+also+removed+the+old+approach+of+%26lsquo%3Bthrowing+work+over+the+fence%26rsquo%3B+and+waiting+for+feedback%21+%26%2339%3BThrowing+work+over+the+fence%26rsquo%3B+should+be+long+gone%2C+and+banned+from+any+custom+development.+The+software+vendor+must+build+the+software+with+the+client%2C+getting+continuous+feedback%2C+and+living+the+journey+together.+%26nbsp%3BThat%26%2339%3Bs+why+Entelect+had+such+great+success%2C+because+we+formed+a+business+partnership+instead+of+the+client%2Fsupplier+relationship.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EThings+worth+sharing%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBeing+people-focused%3B+setting+up+career+paths+and+performance+appraisals+that+allow+the+engineers+to+grow+and+have+short-+or+long-term+targets+for+themselves+is+beneficial+to+the+entire+squad.+Corporate+reviews+are+just+too+restrictive%2C+each+member+of+the+team+needs+their+own+defined+path+for+growth.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMonthly+check-ins+between+the+scrum+master+and+each+person+on+the+squad+creates+regular+health+checks+and+opportunities+for+mentoring.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIt%26rsquo%3Bs+also+vital+for+squads+to+have+the+buy-in+from+an+Executive+or+Director+to+open+doors+and+remove+any+blockers+that+may+be+there.+Organizational+adjustment+to+Agile+is+a+big+deal+and+must+be+a+team+effort.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EGive+the+squad+the+freedom+to+be+bold%2C+to+grow%2C+and+take+chances%2C+knowing+that+they+will+be+accountable+for+the+delivery+as+a+squad.+Make+sure+they+see+and+get+the+support+from+business.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EThe+next+%26lsquo%3Bfirst+squad%26rsquo%3B%3F%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIt%26rsquo%3Bll+be+tough%2C+they+always+are.+But+we%26rsquo%3Bll+use+everything+we%26rsquo%3Bve+learnt+to+refine%2C+adapt%2C+and+take+our+client+into+an+exciting+new+space+for+Agile+development.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E The+importance+of+context+in+creating+a+good+IA %3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EBy+Samantha+Winfield+%28Entelect%2C+UX%2FUI+Designer%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EContext+is+important+in+all+areas+of+design+and+can+be+a+make+or+break+factor.+This+is+especially+the+case+in+information+architecture.+There+are+many+techniques+and+methods+used+by+UX+designers+to+establish+the+information+architecture+for+a+product+but+overlooking+something+as+important+as+context+can+mean+the+difference+between+a+successful+product+and+a+failure.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EConsider+the+following+statement%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAshley+is+running+to+the+ball.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhat+was+the+first+idea+that+appeared+in+your+mind%3F%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhat+if+I+were+to+tell+you+that+Ashley+was+wearing+a+ball+gown%3F+Does+that+change+your+initial+perception+of+the+statement%3F+What+if+I+said+Ashley+was+a+professional+rugby+player+or+that+she+was+a+5+year+old+playing+with+her+friends+in+the+street%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ENotice+how+the+introduction+of+a+small+amount+of+extra+information+can+completely+change+the+meaning+of+the+statement%3F+Context+refers+to+the+who%2C+what%2C+where+and+when+of+a+situation+and+provides+us+with+important+insights+which+influence+our+perception+of+that+information.+Without+these+insights%2C+we+are+forced+to+make+assumptions+and+come+to+our+own+bias+conclusions+about+what+a+statement%2C+object%2C+or+situation+means.+By+setting+the+scene+and+providing+context%2C+we+remove+ambiguities%2C+reduce+the+chances+of+assumptions+and+can+therefore+start+relying+on+the+correct+interpretation+and+perception+of+information.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+UX+our+main+goal+is+to+interact+with+users+in+order+to+remove+biases+and+assumptions+and+create+a+product+that+our+target+market+can+use+and+interact+with+effectively.+In+this+space%2C+context+is+used+to+inform+the+user+as+to+what+something+means+and+what+to+do+next.+Similarly%2C+information+architecture+involves+arranging+the+parts+of+a+product+to+be+understandable.+Together%2C+context+and+information+architecture+aim+to+achieve+a+similar+goal%3A+to+guide+the+user+to+complete+the+necessary+tasks+effectively+and+efficiently.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBuilding+a+solid+foundation+is+critical+to+the+user%26rsquo%3Bs+interaction+with+a+product%2C+therefore+the+information+architecture+should+be+carefully+considered.+UX+designers+typically+use+card+sorting+as+the+method+of+interacting+with+users+to+establish+the+information+architecture.+Card+sorting+involves+presenting+parts+of+the+content+for+your+product+to+the+user+as+separate+parts+and+asking+them+to+group+and+categorise+them.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EConsider+the+simple+example+below%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FCardSorting1.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+710px%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhen+given+to+a+user+in+a+card+sorting+exercise%2C+the+result+may+be+similar+to+the+example+below%3A%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FCardSorting2.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+712px%3B+height%3A+545px%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ENow%2C+let%26rsquo%3Bs+change+the+context+slightly%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FCardSorting3.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+939px%3B+height%3A+474px%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+user+may+group+this+collection+as+follows%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FCardSorting4.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+939px%3B+height%3A+504px%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+example+above+highlights+how+a+small+change+in+the+context+of+the+content+can+result+in+a+very+different+grouping+and+categorisation+of+the+information.+It+is+therefore+essential+that+the+content+presented+to+users+is+proportionate+to+the+content+you+need+to+present+in+your+product+and+is+representative+of+the+correct+context+for+that+product.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIt+is+always+a+good+idea+to+perform+a+tree+test+%28reverse+card+sort%29+with+users+after+the+initial+card+sorting+exercise+in+order+to+ensure+that+the+resultant+information+architecture+makes+sense%2C+is+usable+and+understandable.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E By+Samantha+Winfield+%28Entelect%2C+UX%2FUI+Designer%29+%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E+Why+context+can+be+a+make+or+break+factor+in+IA ["Software best practices"] Samantha.Winfield.jpg
From+mobile+first%2C+to+customer+first+%E2%80%93+how+to+build+a+mobile+app+with+longevity+and+appeal %3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FEntelect_1-3.jpg%22+style%3D%22width%3A+650px%3B+height%3A+349px%3B%22+%2F%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EBy+Doug+Crawford+%28Entelect%2C+General+Manager+%3A+Service+Delivery%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMobile+adoption+is+changing+the+way+we+do+business+in+South+Africa.+%26nbsp%3BIn+2016%2C+almost+70%25+of+South+Africans+have+browsed+the+web+from+a+mobile+device.+%26nbsp%3BGoing+beyond+content%2C+mobile+apps+are+providing+an+invaluable+mechanism+for+companies+to+engage+with+customers+and+businesses+must+carefully+consider+mobile+in+their+digital+strategies.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+align%3D%22center%22%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Cem%3E%26nbsp%3BThe+global+average+for+app+user+retention+rate+is+only+3%25+after+a+month.%3C%2Fem%3E%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%26nbsp%3B+%3Cp%3EGetting+customers+to+try+your+app+is+easy.+%26nbsp%3BKeeping+them+for+longer+than+a+week+is+a+different+story.+%26nbsp%3BAccording+to+Quettra%2C+drop+off+rates+for+daily+active+users+are+as+high+as+77%25+after+3+days%2C+and+80%25+of+apps+are+only+used+once+before+being+deleted.+%26nbsp%3BThe+global+average+for+app+user+retention+rate+is+only+3%25+after+a+month.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EWhat+practical+considerations+should+we+take+into+account+when+building+mobile+apps+and+how+do+we+keep+customers+engaged%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cstrong%3E+%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EProvide+utility%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+An+app+offers+a+channel+to+an+underlying+product+-+a+means+to+an+end%2C+rather+than+the+end+itself.+%26nbsp%3B%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fitunes.apple.com%2Fapp%2Fid1107656326%3Fmt%3D8%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3EOrderIn%3C%2Fa%3E%26nbsp%3Bprovides+a+delivery+service.+The%26nbsp%3B%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fitunes.apple.com%2Fza%2Fapp%2Ffnb-banking-app%2Fid450094779%3Fmt%3D8%2C%3F%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3EFNB+app%3C%2Fa%3E%26nbsp%3Bprovides+access+to+banking+services.%26nbsp%3B%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fitunes.apple.com%2Fus%2Fapp%2Fuber%2Fid368677368%3Fmt%3D8%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3EUber%3C%2Fa%3E%26nbsp%3Boffers+ride+services.+Customers+rate+the+product%2C+not+the+app%2C+and+it%26rsquo%3Bs+the+underlying+product+that+drives+app+usage.+%26nbsp%3BWithout+a+well-crafted+value+offering%2C+the+app%26rsquo%3Bs+shelf-life+will+be+short.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+choice+of+whether+to+create+one+monolithic+app+that+serves+many+purposes%2C+or+to+unbundle+the+functionality+into+several+smaller+apps+can+have+pros+and+cons+on+both+sides.+%26nbsp%3B%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fitunes.apple.com%2Fza%2Fapp%2Fdiscovery%2Fid458077762%3Fmt%3D8%26amp%3Bls%3D1%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3EDiscovery%3C%2Fa%3E%2C+for+example%2C+includes+all+their+products+within+a+single+app+framework%2C+offering+a+central+point+for+the+customer+to+experience+the+brand.+For+Discovery%2C+this+probably+makes+sense+given+the+integrated+nature+of+their+products.+%26nbsp%3BUber%2C+on+the+other+hand%2C+provides+an+app+for+ride+sharing+and+a%26nbsp%3B%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fitunes.apple.com%2Fus%2Fapp%2Fuber%2Fid1058959277%3Fmt%3D8%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3Eseparate+app+for+food+delivery%3C%2Fa%3E%2C+requiring+the+user+to+download+both+if+they%26rsquo%3Bre+wanting+to+order+food+whilst+riding+in+an+Uber+from+the+airport+to+the+hotel.+They+do+however+still+share+a+single+user+account.+Ultimately%2C+the+app+experience+should+deliver+value+to+the+customer+in+the+easiest+way+possible%2C+having+a+clear+purpose+that+addresses+an+immediate+need.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+align%3D%22center%22%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Cem%3ECustomers+rate+the+product%2C+not+the+app%2C+and+it%26rsquo%3Bs+the+underlying+product+that+drives+app+usage.%3C%2Fem%3E%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FEntelect_1-4.jpg%22+style%3D%22width%3A+450px%3B+height%3A+424px%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EOffer+a+compelling+user+experience%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Aesthetics+are+important%2C+but+this+needs+to+extend+to+a+compelling+user+experience+to+truly+gain+acceptance.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cul+type%3D%22disc%22%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Cem%3EOn-boarding%3C%2Fem%3E%3C%2Fstrong%3E%26nbsp%3B-+make+the+sign+up+process+as+frictionless+as+possible.+%26nbsp%3BBe+ruthless+when+cutting+the+cruft+and+be+creative+in+how+you+balance+the+need+for+gathering+data+versus+getting+your+user+productive.+%26nbsp%3BAdd+value+at+the+earliest+opportunity.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Cem%3ENavigation%3C%2Fem%3E%3C%2Fstrong%3E%26nbsp%3B-+give+the+user+a+%26lsquo%3Bsense+of+knowing%26rsquo%3B+where+they+are+in+the+app+and+make+sure+the+core+functionality+is+front+and+centre.+%26nbsp%3BOptimise+the+flow+and+minimise+cognitive+load+required+to+achieve+a+task.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Cem%3EPerformance%3C%2Fem%3E%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cstrong%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fstrong%3E-+streamline+activities+on+the+critical+path+and+minimise+back-end+dependencies+that+clog+up+the+experience+with+twirly+animations.+%26nbsp%3BEven+better%2C+cache+everything+locally+and+sync+up+asynchronously+where+feasible.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Cem%3ELess+is+more%3C%2Fem%3E%3C%2Fstrong%3E%26nbsp%3B-+unsure+whether+a+feature+is+important%3F+%26nbsp%3BIf+you+already+have+your+core+functionality+sorted%2C+then+put+it+on+ice.+%26nbsp%3BGiving+users+less+choice+lets+them+navigate+more+quickly+through+the+important+features+without+thinking+too+much+about+how+to+get+there.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Cem%3EAvoid+indirect+competitors%3C%2Fem%3E%3C%2Fstrong%3E%26nbsp%3B-+anything+that+distracts+your+users+whilst+using+the+app+is+considered+an+%26%2339%3Bindirect+competitor%26rsquo%3B%2C+which+can+be+detrimental+to+increasing+adoption.+%26nbsp%3BAsking+users+to+enter+a+confirmation+code+sent+to+their+email+app%2C+for+example%2C+detracts+from+the+overall+user+experience+and+introduces+an+indirect+competitor+into+the+mix.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ERespond+to+analytics%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+align%3D%22center%22%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Cem%3EQuantitative+data+is+key+to+gaining+usage+insights%2C+allowing+you+to+respond+quickly+whilst+extending+your+mobile+strategy+over+the+long+term.+The+right+data+is+important%3A+it+must+be%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fem%3Eactionable%3Cem%3E.%3C%2Fem%3E%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMeasure+user+engagement+through+in-app+analytics+and+other+channels+to+determine+usage+patterns+and+where+user+drop-off+may+be+limiting+stickiness+-+such+as+app+crashes%2C+poor+performance+or+a+UI+choice+that+may+not+gel+with+a+broader+audience.+%26nbsp%3BQuantitative+data+is+key+to+gaining+usage+insights%2C+allowing+you+to+respond+quickly+whilst+extending+your+mobile+strategy+over+the+long+term.+The+right+data+is+important%3A+it+must+be%26nbsp%3B%3Cem%3Eactionable%3C%2Fem%3E.+%26nbsp%3BMeasuring+number+of+downloads+is+meaningless+from+a+customer+experience+perspective+since+it+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt+reflect+engagement+or+retention%2C+or+drop-off.+%26nbsp%3BMeasuring+number+of+crashes%2C+however%2C+is+useful+and+immediately+actionable.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+We+start+our+day+with+an+app+and+we+end+our+day+with+an+app.+%26nbsp%3BCompeting+for+attention+in+a+crowded+space+means+going+above+and+beyond+the+norm%2C+giving+customers+a+compelling+reason+to+return+for+more+by+creating+something+useful%2C+good+to+look+at+and+easy+to+use.+%26nbsp%3BMobile+first+is+here+and+a+digital+strategy+without+mobile+is+missing+the+boat.+Providing+functionality+in+a+customer%26rsquo%3Bs+pocket+is+not+a+competitive+advantage%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+a+necessity+to+stay+relevant+and+businesses+should+be+working+non-stop+to+reach+and+retain+customers+on+their+mobile+devices.%3C%2Fp%3E Beware+of+bolt-on+digital+transformations+-+the+short-term+thinking+trap %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FArticle-02R.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EBeware+of+bolt-on+digital+transformations+-+the+short-term+thinking+trap.%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDigital+transformation+%28DX%29+is+%3Cem%3Ethe%3C%2Fem%3E+initiative+every+corporate+talks+about+and+spends+vast+resources+on%2C+it+hardly+needs+to+be+mentioned+at+this+point.+With+this+level+of+investment%2C+all+these+organisations+should+be+well+down+the+path+of+becoming+digital+right%3F+A+2017+study+done+by+Forrester+Consulting+for+Microsoft+has+explored+this+topic+in+some+depth+and+highlights+that+only+the+minority+of+enterprises+have+actually+embraced+digital+transformation+as+it+is+envisioned%3B+effectively+stating+that+although+there+was+a+strategy+%28and+it+got+priority%29%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+made+little+to+no+difference.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETo+begin%2C+let%26rsquo%3Bs+attempt+to+define+what+digital+transformation+is.+The+fundamental+principle+behind+DX+is+the+integration+of+digital+technology+into+all+areas+of+a+business.+This+alone+is+incomplete+without+the+culture+shift+this+change+implies.+A+business+needs+to+be+agile+in+its+approach+to+evolving%2C+the+bloat+and+inflexibility+associated+with+corporates+are+widely+considered+one+of+the+primary+reasons+DX+is+not+implemented+correctly.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Forrester+Consulting+coined+the+term+%26ldquo%3BBolt-On%26rdquo%3B+digital+transformation%2C+which+refers+to+enterprises+that+attempt+to+run+digital+initiatives+as+projects+without+actually+realising+the+need+to+change+the+core+organisational+culture+along+with+the+integration+of+digital+technology+right+across+their+businesses.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+South+Africa+there+is+no+difference%2C+this+is+an+unfortunate+reality+across+the+majority+of+large+organisations.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+not+uncommon+at+all+to+see+a+fully+thought+out+straight-through-process+beautifully+described%2C+only+to+find+an+extremely+labour+intensive+process+propping+the+automated+process+up+behind+the+scenes.+This+is+a+strong+indication+that+digital+initiatives+are+bolted-on+as+opposed+to+thinking+about+DX+more+strategically+and+looking+for+true+transformation.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETwo+major+culprits+behind+these+bolt-on+%26ldquo%3Btransformation%26rdquo%3B+strategies+are+cost-saving+measures+and+an+analogue+culture.+Leadership+in+enterprises+is+well+aware+of+the+benefits+of+digital+transformation+but+have+often+proceeded+without+consideration+for+culture+and+the+drivers+mentioned.+This+results+in+them+consistently+battling+to+keep+up+with+the+smaller+companies+who+are+taking+their+market+share.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EGiven+the+focus+and+investment+in+digital+transformation+across+South+African+businesses%2C+one+can+be+optimistic+that+we%26rsquo%3Bre+at+least+going+in+the+right+direction+as+a+collective%3B+we%26rsquo%3Bre+tending+towards+a+truly+transformed+industry.+Our+large+companies+are+inherently+slow+to+change+due+to+the+size%2C+and+that%26rsquo%3Bs+before+taking+compliance+into+account.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EStill%2C+we+must+persevere+or+inevitably+fail.+So%2C+while+bolting-on+some+digital+services%2C+processes+or+products+could+offer+short-term+relief%2C+statistics+show+clearly+that+it+will+stunt+future+potential.+Instead%2C+take+the+hard+road+to+create+and+install+digital+culture+in+the+minds+and+hearts+right+across+the+business.+Create+a+supportive+environment+where+it+becomes+natural+to+think+this+way+repeatedly+and+continuously.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E Digital+transformation+%28DX%29+is+the+initiative+every+corporate+talks+about+and+spends+vast+resources+on%2C+it+hardly+needs+to+be+mentioned+at+this+point.+With+this+level+of+investment%2C+all+these+organisations+should+be+well+down+the+path+of+becoming+digital+right%3F+A+2017+study+done+by+Forrester+Consulting+for+Microsoft+has+explored+this+topic+in+some+depth+and+highlights+that+only+the+minority+of+enterprises+have+actually+embraced+digital+transformation+as+it+is+envisioned%3B+effectively+stating+that+although+there+was+a+strategy+%28and+it+got+priority%29%2C+it%E2%80%99s+made+little+to+no+difference. The+true+value+of+having+a+code+review+culture %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FThetruevalueofhavingacodereviewculture-FINAL.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ECode+reviews+are+often+seen+as+a+waste+of+time.+This+is+due+to+the+perception+that+if+you%26rsquo%3Bre+not+creating+code%2C+you%26rsquo%3Bre+not+being+productive.+Done+right%2C+a+code+review+promotes+greater+quality+software%2C+stronger+teamwork%2C+and+more+inspiration+for+creativity.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+benefits+of+doing+code+reviews+reach+much+further+than+improved+code+quality.+For+a+well-functioning+team+of+software+engineers%2C+reviewing+the+work+of+peers+and+applying+constructive+criticism+is+the+most+focused+form+of+communication.+Understanding+why+a+code+review+process+is+necessary%2C+knowing+how+to+find+reviewers%2C+and+responding+to+reviews+correctly%2C+are+three+core+elements+of+an+effective+code+review+culture.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E1.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BUnderstanding+why+a+code+review+process+is+necessary%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%3Cstrong%3E%26nbsp%3BCode+reviews+are+the+most+powerful+form+of+sharing+knowledge%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Sharing+knowledge+helps+development+teams+in+several+ways.+Reviewers+may+have+a+better+understanding+about+the+various+practices%2C+standards+and+techniques+in+the+code+base+that+can+help+improve+or+consolidate+changes.+Frequent+positive+interaction+presented+in+small+amounts+strengthens+social+bonds+and+builds+trust+between+team+members.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B%3Cstrong%3ECode+is+produced+at+a+higher+standard%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+When+software+engineers+know+their+code+will+be+reviewed+by+their+peers%2C+they+are+naturally+motivated+to+clean+up+their+code+and+keep+consistency.+Sharing+work+and+inviting+critical+feedback+creates+a+culture+of+taking+healthy+pride+in+work+that+passes+the+test+first+time.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B%3Cstrong%3EThe+style+of+code+becomes+consistent%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+There+are+often+very+different+ways+to+write+code+and+different+solutions+to+the+same+problem.+Consistency+in+a+code+base+makes+code+easier+to+interpret%2C+helps+prevent+bugs%2C+and+facilitates+collaboration+between+software+engineers.+Most+importantly%2C+consistent+code+can+be+easily+maintained%2C+and+code+reviews+present+a+natural+and+easy-to-operate+safety+net+which+promotes+consistency.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BIt+helps+being+familiar+with+the+project+in+its+entirety%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+When+a+team+works+on+a+project%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+highly+unlikely+that+every+member+is+working+on+every+part+of+the+application.+Sometimes+one+software+engineer+will+work+exclusively+on+a+single+part+of+the+system%2C+while+another+is+working+on+something+else+entirely.+Code+reviews+help+software+engineers+familiarise+themselves+with+code+they+haven%26rsquo%3Bt+written%2C+but+might+be+asked+to+maintain+in+the+future.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BCode+reviews+make+for+better+estimates%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+As+new+features+are+added+to+the+existing+code%2C+having+an+established+code+review+culture+in+place+increases+the+accuracy+of+estimations.+Having+multiple%2C+informed+inputs+with+context+from+different+areas+of+the+code+base%2C+ensures+estimates+are+more+reliable.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E2.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BFinding+reviewers%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+When+establishing+the+guidelines+for+%26ldquo%3Bwho+reviews+who%26rdquo%3B%2C+seniority+should+not+be+the+main+consideration.+Having+juniors+review+the+code+of+experienced+software+engineers+is+a+great+learning+experience+for+the+reviewer.+Not+only+does+it+give+a+great+reference+for+design%2C+coding+style+and+architectural+decisions%2C+but+it+also+shows+how+to+apply+these+in+the+actual+project+the+more+junior+reviewer+is+actively+working+on.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESenior+software+engineers+should+leverage+the+fact+that+new+team+members+lack+the+context+they+have+built+up+over+the+years.+This+can+help+push+senior+members+of+the+team+to+think+about+problems+differently.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ECreating+great+software+is+a+team+effort.+Whether+someone+is+a+junior+or+senior+software+engineer%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+important+to+make+everyone+aware+that+their+input+is+valued.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E3.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BResponding+to+reviews%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Having+an+established+code+review+culture+in+place+will+ensure+that+communication+lines+are+open+and+that+everyone+can+handle+criticism.+Even+so%2C+it+takes+practice+to+become+a+great+code+reviewer.+When+capturing+feedback+on+a+review+or+commenting+on+a+pull-request%2C+reviewers+should+be+focused+on+objectivity.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+reviewer%26rsquo%3Bs+job+is+to+critically+evaluate+the+work+for+understandability%2C+suitability%2C+quality+and+consistency.+Where+feedback+is+offered%2C+it+should+explain+any+confusion%2C+ask+questions%2C+offer+recommendations+and+explore+ideas%2C+as+opposed+to+being+destructive+or+hostile.+Having+this+process+in+place+will+ensure+that+reviewees+aren%26rsquo%3Bt+offended+by+suggested+changes%2C+and+that+they+take+suggestions+seriously+even+if+they+don%26rsquo%3Bt+agree.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIf+teams+skip+or+avoid+the+review+process%2C+they+are+missing+out+on+one+of+the+shortest+feedback+loops+in+software+development+and+an+excellent+growth+mechanism+for+all+team+members.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ECreating+a+code+review+culture+is+more+than+just+the+process+of+verifying+source+code.+Promoting+interaction+and+creating+an+atmosphere+that+encourages+knowledge+sharing+is+what+is+truly+valuable.+Code+reviews+with+clear+examples+and+objective+feedback%2C+within+an+atmosphere+of+trust%2C+is+a+proven+way+to+build+better+software%2C+better+teams+and+better+engineers.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E ["Software best practices"] The true value of having a code review culture - F...
