%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FStopsabotagingyourtechnologyprojects-33.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETechnology+teams%2C+departments+and+industry+still+hold+a+reputation+for+failed+projects%2C+where+customers+and+product+owners+spend+too+much+for+too+little%2C+or+where+results+pale+in+comparison+to+expectations+held.+We+hear+about+these+unmet+expectations+all+the+time%2C+followed+by+budgets+blown+on+project+extensions+and+scope+changes.+We+also+hear+about+customers+who+%26ldquo%3Bdon%26rsquo%3Bt+know+what+they+want%26rdquo%3B%2C+or+who+%26ldquo%3Bkeep+changing+their+minds%26rdquo%3B.+Sound+familiar%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMany+of+these+projects+are+unknowingly+sabotaged+before+they+start.+This+is+because+expectations+are+mismatched+out+the+starting+blocks%2C+and+there+is+little+chance+that+the+solution+could+ever+go+on+to+solve+the+meaningful+problems+faced+in+reality.+This+is+a+scary+situation+which+traps+all+parties+in+projects+which+are+destined+to+fail.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+worth+spending+the+time+upfront+to+clarify+expectations+and+give+your+projects+the+best+possible+chance+of+success.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHere+are+four+important+concepts+to+help+you+avoid+self-sabotage+by+communicating+your+requirements+effectively%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E1.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BDescribe+the+problem%2C+not+the+solution%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+You+know+your+business+best.+Instinctively%2C+you+would+want+to+explain+how+you+would+solve+the+problems+your+business+is+experiencing.+However%2C+this+often+causes+more+harm+than+good.+Describing+your+requirements+as+solutions+will+deprive+you+of+the+opportunity+to+explore+multiple+different+solutions+with+your+development+team+which+might+have+stemmed+from+a+clear+problem-statement.+We+need+to+recognise+that+we%26rsquo%3Bre+usually+not+all+that+great+at+explaining+what+we+need+but+are+probably+quite+good+at+explaining+our+problems.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFocus+on+the+problem+space+instead.+Spend+the+effort+clearly+describing+the+challenges+which+exist%2C+and+what+success+would+look+and+feel+like.+Let+the+experts+contribute+to+the+problem-solving+process+%26ndash%3B+it%26rsquo%3Bs+why+they%26rsquo%3Bre+there+and+it%26rsquo%3Bs+what+they%26rsquo%3Bre+good+at.+When+combining+good+requirements+and+good+problem+solving%2C+you+allow+optimisation+for+time%2C+scope+and+quality+%28and+a+great+overall+solution%29.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2F01.Requirements.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E2.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BTry+not+to+hide+complexity%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+When+compiling+requirements%2C+it+is+important+not+to+mix+concepts+or+priorities+in+a+way+which+will+disorient+your+audience.+Priority+should+flow+from+top+to+bottom%2C+and+requirements+should+be+clustered+around+the+problems+they%26rsquo%3Bre+linked+to.+What+you+may+consider+to+be+a+very+complex+need+may+in+fact+be+a+simple+feature.+In+contrast%2C+one+innocuous+line+in+a+requirements+brief+could+ultimately+account+for+a+disproportionate+amount+of+the+work.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHidden+complexity+leads+to+time+bombs+ticking+away+in+your+backlog.+Requirements+should+be+logically+grouped%2C+and+clear+enough+for+your+audience+to+easily+spot+this+hidden+complexity+so+you+can+clarify+it+and+defuse+the+bomb+before+getting+started.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2F02.Detail.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E3.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BManage+expectations%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Expectations+must+be+shared+and+discussed+early+and+often.+Seasoned+project+managers+and+experienced+software+engineers+know+that+expectation+management+is+an+important+part+of+any+successful+software+development+project.+There+needs+to+be+a+communication+culture+to+ensure+that+there+are+shared+perspectives+of+the+end+result.+The+tree+swing+analogy+depicts+how+different+parties+interpret+and+implement+requirements+during+the+development+process.+When+there+is+a+lack+of+shared+understanding+during+these+processes%2C+stakeholders+often+genuinely+think+they+are+interpreting+requirements+correctly%2C+but+disaster+ensues+once+results+are+visible+and+material.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2F03.Expectations.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E4.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BPrioritisation+is+key%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Once+there+is+a+clear+set+of+requirements%2C+it+is+important+to+rank+them.+Requirements+will+vary+wildly+in+complexity%2C+time+and+cost%2C+which+makes+a+shared+understanding+of+priority+fundamental+to+success.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EPrioritisation+should+weigh+up+what%26rsquo%3Bs+important+versus+what%26rsquo%3Bs+urgent%2C+consider+the+right+mix+of+functionality+and+differentiation%2C+and+take+value+versus+effort+into+account.+Techniques+like+the+MoSCoW+method+can+be+used+to+build+this+prioritisation+puzzle+to+create+a+solution+that+maximises+time%2C+cost%2C+customer+and+business+value%2C+and+operational+objectives.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BMust+have%3A+Non-negotiable+product+needs+that+are+mandatory+to+complete+the+project%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BShould+have%3A+Important+features+that+aren%26%2339%3Bt+vital%2C+but+add+significant+value%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BCould+have%3A+Nice-to-have+features+that+would+only+have+a+small+impact+if+left+out%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BWon%26%2339%3Bt+have%3A+Features+that+aren%26%2339%3Bt+a+priority+for+the+current+scope%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+allows+the+development+team+to+arrange+the+project+into+phases%2C+plan+for+minimum+viable+product+%28MVP%29+releases+when+necessary+and+have+the+%26ldquo%3Bnice-to-have%26rdquo%3B+requirements+in+scope+for+future+phases.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2F04.Moscow.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Requirements+are+often+the+primary+medium+of+communication+throughout+development.+Communicating+them+effectively+is+clearly+not+a+trivial+exercise.+Describing+needs+well+means+agreeing+on+expectations+between+parties+from+the+very+different+perspectives+held+by+technology%2C+business%2C+product+and+strategy.+It+also+means+that+dissonance+is+managed+and+dispelled+as+early+as+possible+in+the+process.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EStop+sabotaging+your+projects.+Detail+your+challenges+more+so+than+your+preconceived+solutions%2C+try+not+to+hide+complexity%2C+work+to+establish+shared+expectations%2C+and+be+clear+about+what+is+important+versus+what+is+urgent.+Set+yourself+up+for+success.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E ["Software best practices"] Stop sabotaging your technology projects-33.png
Sizing+up+UX%3A+Motivating+for+UX+budget+and+scoping+design+time+effectively %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FSizingUpUX-FINAL.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cem%3ESizing+for+user+experience+%28UX%29+is+a+complex+topic+and+poses+challenges+to+business+development+and+delivery+management+teams%2C+as+well+as+UX+engineers+%28UXEs%29+themselves.+We%26rsquo%3Bll+look+at+some+of+those+challenges%2C+as+well+as+methods+to+overcome+them+and+scope+projects+effectively.%3C%2Fem%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%230000CD%3B%22%3E%3Cstrong%3EChallenge+01%3A+Organisational+UX+maturity%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMany+of+the+challenges+UXEs+face+when+sizing+UX+tasks+relate+directly+back+to+the+UX+maturity+of+their+organisations.+UX+maturity+is+how+far+along+an+organisation+is+in+its+adoption+of+UX+as+a+fundamental+part+of+the+software+delivery+process.+While+good+UX+is+crucial+to+the+success+of+any+digital+product%2C+in+many+organisations+work+still+needs+to+be+done+to+fully+integrate+UX+into+the+software+development+lifecycle+%28SDLC%29.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2F01.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIf+a+company+is+in+the+early+stages+of+UX+adoption%2C+simply+motivating+for+UX+research+and+design+to+be+part+of+a+project%26rsquo%3Bs+scope+is+a+challenge.+To+organisations+with+low+UX+maturity%2C+UX+may+seem+more+academic+than+practical+due+to+its+research-intensive+nature.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhile+the+value+of+user+research+and+user-centred+design+has+proved+itself+over+time+among+Fortune+500+companies%2C+it%26%2339%3Bs+still+seen+as+redundant+by+many+stakeholders.+These+stakeholders+often+feel+they+know+their+users+better+than+their+users+know+themselves.+This+makes+actually+receiving+any+budget+to+consider+UX+more+of+a+challenge+than+scoping+accurately.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%230000CD%3B%22%3E%3Cstrong%3EChallenge+02%3A+Giving+definite+sizes+to+iterative+processes%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+second+challenge+is+giving+finite+timelines+to+tasks+that+form+part+of+iterative+design+processes.+Iterative+design+uses+cyclical+processes+of+research%2C+prototyping+and+testing+to+optimise+and+refine+design+over+time.+Based+on+insights+gleaned+from+user+testing+results%2C+the+UXE+will+often+change+and+adapt+their+prototypes+to+either+validate+or+challenge+their+design+decisions.+A+prototype+might+go+through+three+or+four+iterations%2C+or+it+may+take+months+of+rework%2C+ideation+and+testing+to+truly+answer+a+user%26rsquo%3Bs+needs.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2F02.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%230000CD%3B%22%3E%3Cstrong%3EThe+solution%3A+Prove+the+value+of+UX+without+going+over+budget%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhile+challenges+will+always+present+themselves%2C+the+UXE+needs+to+be+strategic+in+their+selection+of+research+and+design+methods+to+optimise+delivery+and+stay+within+budget.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+a+tricky+balance+that+requires+negotiation%2C+paired+with+advocacy+and+education+around+UX+to+convince+resistant+stakeholders.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cem%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%230000CD%3B%22%3E%3Cstrong%3EThe+power+of+open+dialogue%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fem%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIt+is+essential+to+engage+in+candid+discussions+prior+to+the+procurement+phase+and+well+before+project+kick-off.+One+way+to+do+this+is+to+include+product+owners+and+other+decision-makers+in+design+thinking+workshops.+These+workshops%2C+such+as+the+now+well-known+Design+Sprint%2C+should+be+conducted+prior+to+planning+and+budgeting.+This+is+where+design%2C+business+and+technology+representatives+will+work+together+to+map+out+the+business+landscape+and+define+mutual+goals+for+the+project%2C+ensuring+strategic+alignment+and+understanding.+If+you+don%26rsquo%3Bt+engage+with+your+stakeholders%2C+crucial+research+or+testing+exercises+will+be+excluded+from+the+project+due+to+a+lack+of+understanding.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIf+successfully+advocated+for%2C+the+UXE+can+make+use+of+a+strategic+arsenal+of+research+and+design+methods+to+output+effective+software%2C+and+in+turn%2C+prove+the+value+of+UX.+This+exercise+may+need+to+happen+several+times+before+it+is+institutionalised%2C+but+once+an+organisation+sees+direct+business+value%2C+it+will+become+easier+to+negotiate+scope+on+future+projects.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%230000CD%3B%22%3E%3Cstrong%3EYou%26rsquo%3Bve+got+the+buy+in%2C+now+it%26rsquo%3Bs+time+to+size+your+UX+tasks%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ELet%26rsquo%3Bs+assume+you%26rsquo%3Bve+successfully+advocated+for+UX%2C+motivated+for+budget+and+developed+a+solid+research+strategy.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+now+time+to+size+the+various+UX+tasks+you+feel+you%26rsquo%3Bll+need+to+complete+the+project+accurately.+The+importance+of+sticking+to+defined+timelines+is+crucial+to+engender+trust+with+your+stakeholders.+This+is+particularly+true+on+fixed-price+projects+where+there+is+little+room+for+error+and+so+you+need+to+estimate+with+a+high+degree+of+confidence.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe+can%26rsquo%3Bt+account+for+the+sizing+of+all+UX+tasks+in+a+single+article+as+that+would+require+a+book%26rsquo%3Bs+worth+of+content%2C+but+we+can+look+at+some+key+tasks+as+examples.+For+the+purposes+of+this+article%2C+we%26rsquo%3Bll+look+at+the+sizing+of+qualitative+and+quantitative+UX+research.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%230000CD%3B%22%3E%3Cem%3E%3Cstrong%3EQualitative+research+scoping+example%3A+Contextual+inquiries%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fem%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe%26%2339%3Bll+start+with+a+well-established+qualitative+research+method%2C+the+contextual+inquiry.+This+is+because+it%26%2339%3Bs+a+semi-structured+interview+method%2C+making+it+difficult+to+estimate+for.+Contextual+inquiries+are+intentionally+less+structured%2C+as+it+allows+users+to+go+about+their+regular+activities+in+their+context+of+use.+The+UX+researcher+uses+observation%2C+as+well+as+periodic+and+pointed+questions+to+uncover+key+insights.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhen+sizing+contextual+inquiries+or+other+forms+of+user+research%2C+there+are+two+approaches+you+can+use.+The+first+is+a+dedicated+time-box%2C+in+which+you+would+conduct+as+many+inquiries+as+you+can+within+a+given+timeframe.+The+second+is+to+decide+on+how+many+users+you+would+like+to+observe+and+then+pre-define+how+long+you+would+need+with+each.+Let%26%2339%3Bs+use+the+second+example%2C+as+it+is+a+bit+more+complex.+We%26rsquo%3Bll+work+with+a+single+user%2C+then+scale+it+to+form+part+of+a+full+study.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+time+you+require+to+observe+a+user+is+dependent+on+the+complexity+of%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3Ea.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BThe+system+they+use%3Cbr+%2F%3E+b.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BThe+tasks+they+need+to+complete%3Cbr+%2F%3E+c.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BThe+access+to+users+themselves%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ELet%26%2339%3Bs+use+a+theoretical+example+of+a+task+that+takes+a+user+30+minutes+to+complete.+We%26%2339%3Bll+then+need+to+double+that+time%2C+to+account+for+introducing+yourself+and+the+work+you%26rsquo%3Bre+intending+to+do%2C+as+well+as+getting+consent+to+observe+the+user.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2F03.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EYou+now+need+to+repeat+this+exercise+with+at+least+5+participants+to+make+your+research+effective.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2F04.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWith+the+added+complexity+of+travel+and+setup%2C+we+can+anticipate+this+task+will+take+a+full+day.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2F05.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFurther+to+that+is+preparation+time%3A+Writing+up+consent+forms%2C+logistics+and+travel+arrangements%2C+as+well+as+any+background+research+that+might+be+required.+For+this+entire+preparatory+exercise%2C+one+might+want+to+bank+at+least+2+days.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFollowing+this+is+transcribing%2C+collating+and+analysing+the+data%2C+which+may+take+as+much+time+as+the+research+itself.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2F06.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe+can+now+see+that+qualitative+research+has+many+dynamics+that+affect+its+timing.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+not+much+different+from+investigative+journalism+or+in-store+consumer+research%2C+so+ensure+you%26%2339%3Bre+accounting+for+all+aspects+of+your+research+when+scoping.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%230000CD%3B%22%3E%3Cstrong%3EQuantitative+research+scoping%3A+User+surveys%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ELet%26rsquo%3Bs+now+look+at+a+passive+research+method%2C+the+user+survey.+Surveys+can+take+many+forms+and+can+use+both+qualitative+and+quantitative+methods+to+gain+results.+The+advantage+of+a+survey+is+the+same+as+its+disadvantage%2C+in+that+the+researcher+need+not+be+present.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDuring+the+survey%2C+the+most+time+spent+is+on+setup+and+analysing+the+findings+afterwards%2C+but+the+actual+survey+is+relatively+quick.+If+done+through+an+online+form%2C+the+survey+can+be+conducted+without+the+involvement+of+the+UXE%2C+meaning+passive+data+collection.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2F07.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+sizing+of+a+survey+is+dependent+on+the+number+of+questions+needed+to+account+for+the+relative+complexity+of+a+system+or+user.+If+a+user+or+the+system+they+use+is+particularly+nuanced%2C+one+might+need+to+develop+a+variety+of+questions+over+a+few+days.+The+following+explores+what+goes+into+creating+and+sizing+a+survey%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000080%3B%22%3E%3Cstrong%3E1.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BDefining+the+users+you+would+need+to+survey+to+achieve+your+research+aims%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMeet+with+your+product+owner+or+an+equivalent+subject+matter+expert+%28SME%29+to+determine+who+would+be+participating+in+the+survey+and+what+questions+you+will+need+answered.+You+will+need+to+define+the+following%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3Ea.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BIs+there+a+single+user+group+or+many+distinct+groups+requiring+separate+surveys%3F%3Cbr+%2F%3E+b.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BRun+a+research+gap+analysis%3A+What+don%26%2339%3Bt+you+know+about+your+users%3F%3Cbr+%2F%3E+c.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BWhat+is+the+complexity+of+the+system+you+are+designing+for%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+total+time+spent+on+your+survey+preparation+can+range+from+a+single+day+to+several+days.+Let%26rsquo%3Bs+assume+the+user+base+is+somewhat+homogenous+and+the+system+is+relatively+simple.+In+this+case%2C+you+will+only+need+a+day+or+two+of+preparation.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000080%3B%22%3E%3Cstrong%3E2.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BWriting+your+survey+and+choosing+the+appropriate+technology%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EYou+now+have+the+necessary+background+information+and+stakeholder+alignment+on+your+research+aims+and+therefore+shouldn%26rsquo%3Bt+need+to+spend+more+than+a+day+writing+your+survey.+Use+online+survey+tools+such+as+Google+Forms%2C+which+offers+data+visualisation+and+CSV+exports+to+assist+in+your+analysis+%28it%26rsquo%3Bs+also+free%29.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000080%3B%22%3E%3Cstrong%3E3.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BDetermining+how+long+should+you+run+your+survey%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOnce+you%26rsquo%3Bve+sent+an+email+of+your+survey+out+to+your+chosen+participants%2C+you%26rsquo%3Bll+need+at+least+10%25+of+them+to+respond.+If+the+survey+is+internal%2C+you+can+aim+for+a+30+%26ndash%3B40%25+response+rate.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIf+you+hit+your+response+target%2C+you+can+use+the+law+of+diminishing+returns+to+decide+whether+to+continue+your+survey+or+begin+analysing+your+results.+If+sent+using+a+well-marketed+email%2C+you%26rsquo%3Bll+generally+have+a+large+uptake+in+the+beginning+of+your+survey.+After+a+few+weeks%2C+your+respondents+will+plateau+before+they+drop+off+entirely.+You%26rsquo%3Bll+want+to+close+your+survey+and+begin+analysing+your+results+before+the+responses+plateau.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2F08.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000080%3B%22%3E%3Cstrong%3E4.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BAnalysing+your+survey+data%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOnce+you%26rsquo%3Bve+gathered+all+your+data%2C+you%26rsquo%3Bll+need+to+spend+a+fair+bit+of+time+combing+through+results+and+trying+to+find+patterns.+The+time+spent+will+be+dependent+on+how+disparate+or+diverse+your+results+are.+If+the+survey+answers+are+one-sided%2C+then+you+won%26rsquo%3Bt+have+to+spend+much+time+on+analysis.+Let%26%2339%3Bs+extend+our+example+of+a+relatively+homogenous+user+base+and+assume+the+following%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3Ea.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BWe+created+a+simple+survey+made+up+of+10+multiple-choice+and+yes%2Fno+questions%3Cbr+%2F%3E+b.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BWe+included+2+or+3+qualitative+questions+that+will+need+to+be+read+and+interpreted%3Cbr+%2F%3E+c.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BWe+received+200+out+of+2000+responses+over+a+period+of+one+week%3Cbr+%2F%3E+d.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BWe+found+most+answers+have+a+distinct+pattern+with+minor+disparities%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBased+on+the+example+above%2C+we+can+assume+our+analysis+and+reporting+won%26rsquo%3Bt+take+more+than+2+days.+The+total+active+time+spent+on+the+survey+would+therefore+be+around+4+days%2C+while+the+total+time+required+would+be+approximately+two+weeks.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000080%3B%22%3E%3Cstrong%3EEstimating+design+time%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Once+research+is+complete%2C+you+will+need+to+apply+your+findings.+This+means+coming+up+with+prototypes+that+truly+represent+and+integrate+your+research.+The+scoping+of+prototyping+is+often+defined+by+the+research+outcomes+and+is+therefore+a+bit+tricky+on+fixed-price+projects.+You+often+don%26rsquo%3Bt+know+what+you%26rsquo%3Bll+be+designing+until+you+do+the+research.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIf+you%26rsquo%3Bre+in+a+situation+where+you+need+to+define+the+scope+of+design+before+having+conducted+research%2C+you+will+need+to+analyse+work+you%26rsquo%3Bve+done+on+previous+projects.+For+example%2C+you+may+have+designed+a+similar+system+in+the+past+or+you+may+have+been+a+user+of+a+system+not+much+different+from+the+one+you%26rsquo%3Bre+required+to+design.+With+this+type+of+knowledge%2C+you+can+begin+to+estimate+the+following%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3Ea.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BThe+number+of+screens+that+would+make+up+the+user-flow%3Cbr+%2F%3E+b.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BThe+relative+complexity+of+the+system%3Cbr+%2F%3E+c.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BThe+features+that+the+user+would+need+to+achieve+their+goals%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000080%3B%22%3E%3Cstrong%3EImplementation+and+measuring+success%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Once+your+prototypes+have+been+designed%2C+tested+and+refined%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+time+to+hand+over+to+the+development+team+to+implement+the+design+vision.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+crucial+you+put+measurements+in+place+to+track+the+success+of+your+system%2C+as+this+will+be+fundamental+in+negotiating+scope+on+future+projects.+Success+metrics+will+also+assist+in+UX+adoption+more+broadly+at+your+organisation.+We+can+therefore+add+a+few+more+steps+to+our+iterative+design+thinking+model%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2F09.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+800px%3B+height%3A+325px%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIt%26rsquo%3Bs+certainly+a+complex+task+going+from+advocacy+for+UX%2C+to+the+negotiation+of+budgets+and+resources%2C+and+finally+executing+your+design+strategy.+Keep+the+following+in+mind+when+unpacking+this+process%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cul%3E+%3Cli%3EAlign+all+stakeholders+from+the+start%2C+under+a+user-centred+goal%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EEstimate+research+and+design+time+as+accurately+as+possible%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EDefine+measurements+of+success+to+prove+value+of+over+time%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%230000CD%3B%22%3E%3Cstrong%3EIn+the+end+it%26rsquo%3Bs+all+about+advocating+for+the+user%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESizing+for+UX+and+negotiating+budgets+all+relates+back+to+the+UXE%26rsquo%3Bs+central+purpose+of+user+advocacy.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+the+UXE%26rsquo%3Bs+job+to+give+the+user+a+voice+and+bring+them+into+business+and+technology+discussions+when+planning+a+delivery+schedule.+This+means+that+the+UXE+needs+to+push+back+if+there+is+a+real+chance+of+under-delivery%2C+due+to+lack+of+user+research+and+testing.+If+you+fail+to+provide+a+good+user+experience%2C+the+cost+saved+on+research+methods+will+be+outweighed+by+lack+of+user+adoption+and+failed+user+experiences.+As+the+saying+goes%2C+%26lsquo%3Bthere+is+never+enough+time+to+do+it+right%2C+but+there+is+always+enough+time+to+do+it+over.%26rsquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E Sizing+for+user+experience+%28UX%29+is+a+complex+topic+and+poses+challenges+to+business+development+and+delivery+management+teams%2C+as+well+as+UX+engineers+%28UXEs%29+themselves.+We%E2%80%99ll+look+at+some+of+those+challenges%2C+as+well+as+methods+to+overcome+them+and+scope+projects+effectively. pdates+are+days+apart%2C+distribution+costs+are+near+zero%2C+and+the+new+battlefronts+are+scale%2C+experience+and+value.+Marketing+won%26%2339%3Bt+save+a+bad+product%2C+so+the+tech+we+ship+to+customers+really+needs+to+stand+out.+%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+It+is+becoming+obvious+that+the+teams+succeeding+in+this+arena+are+those+who+collectively+realise+the+benefits+of+an+unrestrained+cross-functional+team+culture.+A+culture+and+process+that+allow+skills+to+blend+and+overlap%2C+and+where+responsibility+is+both+fluid+and+shared.+There+are+no+walls+to+throw+work+over+to%2C+and+no+150-page+design+documents+to+create+a+paper+trail+of+safety+and+a+pointless+lattice+of+hard+deadlines.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+A+cross-functional+team+means+the+product+owner+doesn%26%2339%3Bt+have+to+create+requirements+on+their+own.+The+QA%2C+developers%2C+data+team+and+UX+team+are+all+in+the+same+boat%2C+and+are+just+as+responsible+for+the+quality+of+requirements.+Every+person+in+the+team+functionally+applies+their+niche+skillset+in+the+creation+of+the+product%2C+but+intellectually+contributes+to+the+entire+process.+This+doesn%26%2339%3Bt+just+spread+accountability%2C+it+creates+buy-in%2C+a+shared+sense+of+purpose+which+is+an+unbeatable+force+for+quality+and+delivery.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FCFTimage.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+800px%3B+height%3A+445px%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMixed+teams+like+this+also+solve+the+lazy+capacity+problem+overnight.+There+is+no+such+thing+as+a+design+team+with+no+work+because+everything+is+snagged+upstream%2C+or+a+QA+team+who+are+waiting+for+the+next+UAT+cycle.+All+of+these+roles+are+mixed+into+the+cross-functional+teams+where+they+carry+responsibilities+from+day+one+right+through+to+the+sunset+of+the+product.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETeams+in+almost+every+other+field+work+together+against+a+common+goal.+In+football%2C+the+strikers+are+allowed+to+defend%2C+and+the+goalkeeper+can+score.+We+need+to+follow+this+same+approach+in+the+technology+world+because+it+works+the+same+way.+Pull+your+teams+together+for+a+given+product+and+give+them+a+single+problem+to+solve+as+a+unit.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EJust+being+physically+seated+together+doesn%26%2339%3Bt+count+as+a+cross-functional+team.+To+get+this+right%2C+our+teams+need+to+have+mixed+expertise+with+everybody+pulling+in+the+same+direction%2C+at+the+same+time.+This+means+product+owners%2C+designers%2C+developers+and+testers+should+be+participating+in+the+same+brainstorming+sessions%2C+and+allocated+to+the+same+user+stories.+Everybody+should+contribute+their+own+specialised+talents+in+parallel%2C+while+feeling+that+their+expert+views+are+considered+equal+in+the+team.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIf+your+teams+are+feeding+work+to+each+other%2C+then+you%26%2339%3Bre+still+operating+with+one+foot+in+the+stage-gated+waterfall+world.+Cross-functional+teams+will+change+the+game+and+unlock+the+real+value+that+agile+can+offer+your+organisation.+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E We%E2%80%99ve+finally+reached+a+post-waterfall+world%2C+where+iterative+problem-solving+processes+have+all+but+eclipsed+traditional+models.+Almost+every+tech+business%2C+IT+department+and+start-up+will+tell+you+they+are+%22wall-to-wall%22+agile%2C+and+have+embraced+Scrum%2C+Kanban+or+one+of+the+numerous+scaled+delivery+frameworks.+Even+so%2C+non-delivery+is+still+common+because+we%27ve+not+yet+learned+to+consistently+build+and+drive+cross-functional+teams. Stop+disorienting+business+with+elaborate+processes %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FBusinessprocesses800.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAs+technology+specialists%2C+we+often+find+our+teams+focusing+on+processes+and+working+models.+These+processes+are+the+basis+of+how+we+solve+problems+and+we+often+like+to+share+%28in+detail%29+how+we+work.+However%2C+even+though+these+elaborate+processes+are+important+to+achieve+the+end+goal%2C+our+stakeholders+often+have+no+interest+in+these+models+they+do+not+understand.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+does+not+mean+that+your+process+or+recipe+for+success+is+not+important.+In+fact%2C+the+right+process+can+make+or+break+a+project.+The+lesson+here+is+to+avoid+focusing+on+granular+processes+and+rather+focus+on+the+outcomes+instead+when+dealing+with+customers%2C+or%26nbsp%3B+stakeholders+from+business+or+product+areas.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EYou+need+to+adapt+to+their+language+%26ndash%3B+not+the+other+way+around.%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Your+method+of+working+is+important+to+you+and+your+team%2C+but+it%26rsquo%3Bs+more+important+to+have+conversations+with+your+stakeholders+in+their+language.+This+is+especially+meaningful+at+the+start+of+a+project.+Rather+than+trying+to+sell+a+detailed+process+of+how+your+team+is+going+about+solving+each+problem%2C+gain+their+trust+by+showing+that+you+understand+their+business+and+objectives+instead.+Reciprocating+an+understanding+of+context%2C+circumstances+and+business+objectives+is+a+real+confidence+builder.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIt%26rsquo%3Bs+easier+to+communicate+with+business+when+there+is+a+shared+frame+of+reference+in+place.+This+way%2C+clear+expectations+are+created.+The+below+table+has+some+examples+on+how+to+translate+your+method+into+a+valuable+message+that+your+stakeholders+will+understand.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FResultsGRAPH800.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EYour+process+is+generic.+Rather+acknowledge+your+client%26rsquo%3Bs+specific+problem.%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+If+you+consider+a+method+such+as+design+thinking%2C+it+can+solve+practically+any+problem+when+applied+correctly.+Your+stakeholders+don%26rsquo%3Bt+want+to+know+about+a+process+you%26rsquo%3Bve+used+multiple+times+before%2C+because+it+comes+across+as+a+generic+solution+and+not+something+tailored+to+their+unique+problem.+Focusing+on+the+process+rather+than+the+result+is+usually+a+sign+of+not+knowing+the+client+or+problem+well+enough.+Your+customer+knows+that+it%26rsquo%3Bs+much+easier+to+talk+about+a+process+that+you+are+familiar+and+comfortable+with.+If+you+have+spent+enough+time+and+energy+to+do+targeted+research+and+ask+questions+about+the+business+context+and+objectives%2C+it+becomes+easier+to+focus+on+the+outcome.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EDon%26rsquo%3Bt+sell+your+process+%26ndash%3B+let+them+experience+it.%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Ultimately+if+you+succeed%2C+customers+and+stakeholders+will+naturally+enquire+about+the+processes+you+followed+to+achieve+it.+Once+they+start+enquiring+about+it%2C+they+will+start+advocating+for+it+themselves+and+do+the+selling+on+your+behalf.+Telling+your+customer+how+great+your+process+is%2C+is+one+thing%2C+but+having+them+telling+others+about+your+methods+is+substantially+more+valuable.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEmphasising+the+value+in+your+process+is+not+always+useful%2C+describing+business+outcomes+is.+Technology+teams+should+make+the+effort+to+adapt+to+business+and+gain+their+confidence+by+showing+interest+in+results%2C+rather+than+trying+to+make+a+sale+in+a+language+they+don%26rsquo%3Bt+understand.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E As+technology+specialists%2C+we+often+find+our+teams+focusing+on+processes+and+working+models.+These+processes+are+the+basis+of+how+we+solve+problems+and+we+often+like+to+share+%28in+detail%29+how+we+work.+However%2C+even+though+these+elaborate+processes+are+important+to+achieve+the+end+goal%2C+our+stakeholders+often+have+no+interest+in+these+models+they+do+not+understand. The+priority+gap%3A+Why+engineering+teams+have+to+stop+delivering+to+themselves+in+early+project+milestones %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FThePriorityGap.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+majority+of+modern+technology+teams+following+a+Lean-Agile+path+are+familiar+with+the+%26ldquo%3Bdeliver+early+and+often%26rdquo%3B+approach.+Even+though+continuous+milestone+delivery+is+a+common+focus%2C+directing+efforts+to+put+something+in+the+client%26rsquo%3Bs+hands+as+early+as+possible+to+build+trust%2C+is+not.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EToo+often+development+teams+get+stuck+in+delivering+to+%26ldquo%3Bthemselves%26rdquo%3B+and+prioritising+technology.+This+alienates+the+product+owner%2C+analysts%2C+sponsor+and+any+non-developers+who+really+need+to+see+progress+and+problems+being+solved+in+a+way+they+can+understand+%26ndash%3B+especially+in+the+beginning+of+the+project.+Odds+are%2C+the+business+spent+months%2C+if+not+years%2C+trying+to+sell+the+project+internally+before+being+able+to+bring+on+a+development+team.+When+the+project+finally+kicks+off%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+only+natural+that+the+business+feels+some+excitement+and+nervousness.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EWhat+normally+goes+wrong%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Development+teams+are+technically-inclined%2C+so+they+will+naturally+focus+on+the+foundational+technology+in+the+beginning.+This+is+important%2C+but+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt+have+intrinsic+business+value.+The+time+spent+on+algorithms+and+the+back-end+is+difficult+to+showcase+to+non-technical+stakeholders%2C+and+will+often+be+seen+as+invisible+work.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBusiness+loses+interest+if+there+is+too+much+focus+on+engineering+preferences+in+early+milestones.+This+will+cause+stakeholders+to+feel+overwhelmed+and+isolated+from+the+project.+At+the+other+end%2C+if+an+effort+is+made+to+include+the+business+at+the+start+of+the+project+and+the+focus+is+on+business+priorities%2C+stakeholders%26rsquo%3B+sentiments+will+increase+and+trust+will+grow.+The+difference+between+these+two+scenarios+create+a+priority+gap+between+business+and+the+development+team.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FPGGraph.png%22+%2F%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EDelivering+something+that+keeps+stakeholders+engaged%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+It%26rsquo%3Bs+important+to+gain+the+business%26rsquo%3B+trust+while+relationships+are+still+new+by+involving+everybody+in+initial+phases+instead+of+diving+into+deep+tech+work.+Technology+teams+should+show+that+they+are+keeping+the+stakeholders%26rsquo%3B+priorities+and+concerns+top+of+mind+%26ndash%3B+even+if+the+technologists+don%26rsquo%3Bt+share+those+particular+concerns.+The+priority+gap+causes+the+business+to+feel+disillusioned+and+no+longer+in+control+of+their+project%2C+which+leads+to+mistrust+early+on+in+the+project%2C+before+the+relationships+are+there+to+lean+on.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEngineering+teams+need+to+be+empathetic+and+reciprocate+their+concerns+of+what+the+business+feels+the+key+risks+are+in+the+project.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+important+to+demonstrate+these+concerns+early+on+in+the+project+and+in+a+%3Cstrong%3E%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.entelect.co.za%2FNews%2FDisplayNewsItem.aspx%3Fniid%3D65511%22%3Elanguage+that+the+business+and+stakeholders+will+understand%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fstrong%3E.+This+can+often+be+done+with+visual+outputs%2C+or+workshops%2C+findings+and+models+which+speak+directly+to+those+top+priorities%2C+instead+of+new+ones+which+the+business+doesn%26%2339%3Bt+understand+or+worry+about.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+third+principle+from+the+Agile+manifesto+tells+us+to+deliver+early+and+often.+However%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+not+always+clear+%3Cstrong%3E%3Cem%3Ewhat+%3C%2Fem%3E%3C%2Fstrong%3Eneeds+to+be+delivered+early+and+often+during+the+early+phases+of+a+project%3A+business+value.+Business+value+is+often+just+about+reciprocating+priorities+and+sharing+empathy+with+stakeholders.+When+development+teams+prove+that+they%26rsquo%3Bre+focused+on+providing+business+value%2C+the+priority+gap+closes.+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E Deconstructing+requirements%3A+Why+you+need+to+spend+more+time+in+the+problem+space he+problems+will+mostly+stay+the+same.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EThe+less+contingencies+you+have%2C+the+easier+it+is+to+create+accurate+estimates%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Less+contingencies+means+more+accurate+time+and+resource+estimates.+If+you+spend+enough+time+listening+to+what+the+business+needs%2C+you+sometimes+realise+that+you+don%26rsquo%3Bt+even+need+a+solution+or+that+the+results+you+need+are+completely+different+to+what+you%26rsquo%3Bd+expect.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESpending+time+and+exploring+business+context%2C+history%2C+competitors+and+strategy+takes+patience+and+rigor.+Working+on+the+solution+is+more+appealing+because+it%26rsquo%3Bs+new+and+unchartered.+But+when+too+much+focus+is+placed+on+demos%2C+planning+new+workflows+and+designing+MVPs%3B+time+and+budget+end+up+wasted+on+redundant+features.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ETechnology+teams+have+the+ability+to+detect+more+complex+problems%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Your+engineering+teams+are+experts+in+their+field%2C+and+have+the+ability+to+help+you+find+and+unpack+hindrances+that+the+business+might+not+be+aware+of.+The+business+team+and+tech+team+need+to+spend+time+together+in+this+space+to+discover+these+complexities+early+on+in+the+project+roadmap.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EUse+this+time+to+collectively+map+out+the+business+context%2C+vision+and+landscape+in+detail+so+that+both+teams+are+able+to+answer+questions+in+future%2C+and+can+become+self-sufficient.+If+everyone+fundamentally+understands+what+the+business+requirements+are%2C+they+can+short-circuit+themselves+by+having+the+information+at+hand.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EShowing+empathy+will+create+customer+buy-in%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Spending+more+time+truly+understanding+the+business+context+and+constraints+of+the+environment+demonstrates+empathy.+Engineering+teams+need+to+show+the+customer+that+they+care+about+their+vision+and+objectives%2C+and+that+they%26rsquo%3Bre+putting+themselves+into+the+customer%26rsquo%3Bs+frame+of+reference.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+a+relationship-building+exercise+that+gives+the+customer+confidence+in+their+abilities.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAs+an+analogy%2C+consider+visits+to+the+doctor.+The+doctor+ideally+takes+an+interest+in+examining+your+worries+and+exploring+the+causes+with+you.+The+added+time+and+patience+the+doctor+takes+to+listen+to+your+concerns%2C+understand+your+background%2C+and+interpret+how+you+feel%2C+is+what+instils+confidence.+When+you+feel+listened+to+and+know+that+the+doctor+has+all+the+information+needed%2C+you+are+more+inclined+to+trust+the+diagnosis.+The+same+is+applicable+in+any+complex+problem-solving+relationship.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAs+engineering+teams%2C+we+are+naturally+more+drawn+to+the+interesting+and+magnetic+work+in+the+solution+space%2C+and+sometimes+skip+over+the+problem+space+without+even+realising.+However%2C+putting+extra+effort+into+exploring+the+business+model+and+success+criteria+to+detect+hidden+complexities%2C+unpack+granular+subproblems%2C+create+better+estimates+and+show+empathy+will+result+in+a+solution+that+solves+actual+problems+when+it+is+ready.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E What+are+we+testing%3A+Chasing+metrics+versus+actual+software+quality %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FWhatarewetesting-Banner.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+100%25%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMany+engineering+teams+are+focused+on+redundant+input+metrics+as+an+indication+of+the+success+of+%26ldquo%3Bquality+assurance%26rdquo%3B+on+their+technology+implementation+projects.+Are+we+so+busy+measuring+the+number+of+test+cases%2C+pass+rates%2C+code+coverage+and+bugs+discovered+that+we+have+forgotten+what+real+quality+means+in+the+eyes+of+our+users%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAre+we+blinded+by+automation%2C+following+widely+advertised+and+theoretical+best-practices+in+the+pursuit+of+quality%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe+should+actually+be+working+backwards+from+the+outcome+we+want%2C+and+applying+tools+best+fit+to+measure+only+those+outcomes.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FPullquote1.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+100%25%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+the+broader+sense%2C+quality+means+that+a+solution+meets+the+following+requirements%3A%3Cbr+%2F%3E+1.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BThe+system+is+robust+and+reliable%3Cbr+%2F%3E+2.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BIt+does+what+it+says+on+the+box%3Cbr+%2F%3E+3.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BIt+does+not+frustrate+its+users%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESeems+obvious%2C+right%3F+But+do+our+measurements+actually+speak+to+these+requirements+or+are+we+simply+ticking+predefined+boxes%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+surge+of+DevOps+has+allowed+us+to+streamline+and+automate+the+entire+software+development+lifecycle.+DevOps+assumes+that+just+about+everything%2C+and+certainly+testing%2C+can+be+completely+automated.+Automation+has+made+processes+easier+to+implement+and+standardise%2C+but+standardisation+blinds+us+from+the+real+objectives.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+easy%2C+and+that%26rsquo%3Bs+where+the+danger+lies.+We+are+forgetting+to+work+backwards+from+results%2C+and+to+think+critically+about+the+quality+we%26rsquo%3Bre+putting+forward.+Instead%2C+we+are+at+risk+of+using+analysis+tools+and+automation+as+a+crutch.+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESimilarly%2C+code+coverage+has+also+been+idolised+as+a+way+to+ensure+that+all+code+is+functional+end-to-end.+Looking+back+at+how+we+defined+quality+above%2C+it+is+clear+that+while+this+gives+the+development+team+confidence%2C+it+does+little+for+the+users.+The+truth+is%2C+we+don%26rsquo%3Bt+actually+need+100%25+code+coverage.+Code+coverage+might+be+proportional+to+quality%2C+but+it+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt+guarantee+quality.+If+our+code+coverage+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt+speak+to+the+end+goal%2C+we+may+cover+all+our+code+and+have+a+perfect+system+that+won%26rsquo%3Bt+break%2C+but+can+still+have+a+system+that+frustrates+our+users+and+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt+do+what+it%26rsquo%3Bs+intended+to.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FPullquote2.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+100%25%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhy+are+we+not+specifically+determining+what+software+quality+actually+means+for+each+unique+system%2C+and+testing+for+that%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETesting+the+right+things%2C+while+balancing+time%2C+money+and+value+is+what+matters.+We+shouldn%26rsquo%3Bt+spend+time+testing+boilerplate+code+or+unit+testing+other+frameworks.+There+is+a+degree+of+assumption+that+we%26rsquo%3Bre+allowed+to+make+and+not+all+failures+are+equal.+Testing+high-risk+functionalities+such+as+price+calculations+for+insurance+premiums+is+crucial%2C+because+the+damage+it%26rsquo%3Bll+cause+to+both+the+system+and+the+business+when+it+breaks+is+immeasurable.+In+2016%2C+a+system+error+from+the+NHS+caused+300+000+heart+patients+to+receive+the+wrong+medication+%26ndash%3B+something+that+could+have+been+prevented+by+thorough+testing.+However%2C+investing+time+testing+low-impact+and+cosmetic+%26lsquo%3Bfeatures%26rsquo%3B+can+just+be+wasteful.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETesting+in+an+empathetic+frame+of+mind+will+allow+us+to+deliver+to+the+users+instead+of+ourselves.+The+%26lsquo%3Bassurance%26rsquo%3B+component+of+QA+is+not+intended+for+the+engineering+team%2C+because+quality+is+not+for+our+own+sake%2C+but+for+the+success+of+the+product+and+happiness+of+our+users.+Many+of+these+metrics+do+instil+confidence+which+does+carry+some+value%2C+but+actual+quality+should+be+measured+from+our+users%26rsquo%3B+experiences+with+our+systems.+Sometimes+it%26rsquo%3Bs+acceptable+to+have+a+nervous+engineering+team+and+a+satisfied+user+base.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe+should+aspire+to+confidence+for+both%2C+an+achievable+goal+if+we+start+with+a+clear+outcomes-defined+basis+for+quality%2C+and+structured+in+a+way+which+can+be+measured+from+both+perspectives.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E Many+engineering+teams+are+focused+on+redundant+input+metrics+as+an+indication+of+the+success+of+%E2%80%9Cquality+assurance%E2%80%9D+on+their+technology+implementation+projects.+Are+we+so+busy+measuring+the+number+of+test+cases%2C+pass+rates%2C+code+coverage+and+bugs+discovered+that+we+have+forgotten+what+real+quality+means+in+the+eyes+of+our+users%3F Unpacking+hypothesis-driven+development %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FUnpackinghypothesis-drivendevelopment-Banner%281%29.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+100%25%3B%22+%2F%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIf+you+ever+had+to+take+science+classes+in+university+or+high+school%2C+you%26rsquo%3Bd+be+familiar+with+the+concept+of+educated+guesses.+Before+an+experiment%2C+you+were+likely+asked+to+come+up+with+an+assumption+that+could+be+tested+%26ndash%3B+a+scientific+hypothesis.+The+basic+idea+of+a+hypothesis+is+that+there+is+no+pre-determined+outcome+%26ndash%3B+and+is+usually+shrouded+in+uncertainty.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIf+we+see+building+technology+solutions+as+experiments+to+learn+what+customers+want+and+what+is+good+for+a+business%2C+we+can+similarly+treat+any+of+these+programmes+as+a+series+of+experiments.+A+sequence+of+hypotheses%2C+working+towards+a+sequence+of+goals.+The+hypothesis+is+the+building+block+in+the+scientific+method%2C+and+should+be+in+agile+development+too.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+modern+agile-inspired+approaches%2C+teams+need+to+deliver+newer%2C+better%2C+and+more+robust+features+to+customers+in+increasingly+shorter+timeframes.+The+work+being+carried+out+is+usually+determined+by+a+product+owner+and+often+assumed+as+%26ldquo%3Bproven%26rdquo%3B+before+testing+it+with+real+users.+These+features+frequently+accumulate+into+mammoth+applications+where+the+full+breadth+of+functionality+is+not+utilised%2C+or+the+application+is+not+user+friendly+%26ndash%3B+or+more+severely+%26ndash%3B+the+solution+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt+truly+solve+problems+for+customers.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FHypothesis%281%29.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+100%25%3B%22+%2F%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETo+facilitate+learning+what+actually+solves+problems%2C+hypotheses+should+be+considered+and+documented+for+every+feature+being+built+to+create+clarity+in+purpose.+Engineering+teams+should+experiment+early+and+often%2C+receive+feedback+from+customers%2C+and+make+data-driven+decisions+based+on+the+findings+from+every+experiment.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EEstablish+hypotheses+that+can+teach+you+things%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Clear+and+predetermined+requirements%26nbsp%3B+are+only+valuable+when+several+possible+solutions+have+already+been+tested+and+validated.+However%2C+when+you+are+exploring+an+initiative+with+a+high-level+of+uncertainty+%28which+most+digital+projects+are%29%2C+using+atomic+hypotheses+to+guide+what+features+development+teams+build+will+ultimately+result+in+building+the+right+thing+as+you+continually+adapt+away+from+failed+experiments+and+towards+the+successful+ones.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETo+form+a+useful+hypothesis%2C+focus+on+pieces+of+functionality+from+a+user%26rsquo%3Bs+perspective.+How+will+they+interact+with+the+solution%2C+and+what+fundamental+problem+is+it+solving+for+the+user%3F+Ensure+that+these+pieces+of+the+solution+are+small+enough+to+develop+within+a+sprint%2C+and+be+tested+with+real-world+users+directly+after+that+sprint.+This+will+allow+you+to+focus+on+what+works%2C+and+parking+or+discarding+the+rest.+Keep+in+mind+that+the+larger+the+feature%2C+the+more+effort+and+cost+is+involved+in+maintaining%2C+testing%2C+and+working+around+the+feature.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EUse+technology+to+validate+%28or+invalidate%29+your+hypothesis%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Once+you+have+an+agreed-upon+hypothesis+in+place%2C+you%26rsquo%3Bll+need+to+iteratively+prove+or+disprove+it+throughout+the+development+phases+using+the+tools+at+your+disposal.+These+validations+can+be+as+simple+as+workshops+or+focus+groups%2C+or+may+take+a+little+more+user+research+against+prototypes+to+find+a+conclusive+result.+In+some+instances%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+worth+building+a+proof+of+concept+to+pilot+in+the+market+%28or+pilot+as+a+feature+within+a+larger+system%29.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAn+effective+step+towards+validation+is+having+smaller%2C+cross-functional+teams+that+are+able+to+complete+the+full+cycle+themselves%2C+internally.+Any+requirement+to+%26lsquo%3Bhand+off%26rsquo%3B+work+into+other+teams+for+research+and+feedback+will+put+the+brakes+on+the+experiment+as+context+is+lost+and+priorities+aren%26rsquo%3Bt+shared.+Cross-functional+teams+include+engineers%2C+designers%2C+and+analysts+%26ndash%3B+a+multi-skilled+team+allows+searching+for%2C+manifesting+and+learning+viable+ideas+quickly.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EAdapt+your+solution+via+a+series+of+experiments%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Let%26rsquo%3Bs+consider+an+example+where+a+business%26rsquo%3B+sign-up+rate+for+their+eCommerce+platform+is+surprisingly+low+given+the+large+volume+of+visitors+they+receive.+To+understand+the+product+take-up+problem+given+that+marketing+seems+to+be+working%2C+they%26rsquo%3Bd+need+to+lay+down+several+hypotheses+which+can+be+tested.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E1.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fstrong%3E%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B%3Cstrong%3EHypothesis+1%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E+Users+are+getting+fatigued+by+sign-up+form+capture+taking+too+long+and+losing+interest.+Experiment%3A+Cut+sign-up+requirements+to+the+bare+minimum+needed+to+transact%2C+and+allowing+users+to+finish+their+profile+at+a+later+stage.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E2.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fstrong%3E%26nbsp%3B+%3Cstrong%3EHypothesis+2%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E+The+product+is+too+expensive%2C+so+although+there+is+huge+interest+in+it%2C+a+low+percentage+of+consumers+are+willing+to+spend+the+money.+Experiment%3A+Offer+a+slightly+cheaper+version+of+the+product%2C+with+several+cut-back+features%2C+and+measure+take-up.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E3.%3C%2Fstrong%3E%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%3Cstrong%3EHypothesis+3%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E+There+is+a+lack+of+trust+in+the+product%2C+and+visitors+are+unwilling+to+sign+up+%28or+provide+personal+details%29+until+they+have+experienced+it.+Experiment%3A+Dramatically+lower+the+barrier+to+entry+by+allowing+guest-transacting+and+only+requiring+users+to+register+once+they%26rsquo%3Bve+completely+taken+up+the+product.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWith+these+experiments+in+play+%28albeit+pilot+versions%2C+with+potentially+a+small+customer+base%29+the+business+can+go+revisit+each+hypothesis+to+establish+whether+any+or+all+of+them+were+true+or+false%2C+and+then+further+invest+in+the+solutions+which+have+proven+demonstrably+more+effective+at+driving+product+uptake.%26nbsp%3B+This+process+can+repeat+as+the+product+evolves.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETesting+atomic+ideas+quickly+is+advantageous+in+finding+better+solutions+for+businesses+%2C+and+should+be+utilised+as+often+as+possible.+This+approach+works+well+with+agile-based+development+due+to+the+short+release+cycles+and+ability+to+adapt+quickly.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+hypothesis-driven+development%2C+every+major+feature+is+an+experiment%2C+and+every+experiment+must+start+with+an+educated+guess.+Your+goal+should+be+to+establish+a+clear+hypothesis+for+each+initiative%2C+and+then+focus+engineering+efforts+to+prove+or+disprove+it.+This+way%2C+you%26rsquo%3Bll+build+products+that+ultimately+succeed+in+delivering+against+a+clear+and+measurable+user+or+business+goal.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E Is+industry+becoming+irrelevant+to+digital+success%3F %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FIsindustrybecomingirrelevant_Bannercopy4-102.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+100%25%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3EThe+majority+of+present-day+digital+and+innovation+projects+typically+involve+digitising+products+and+services+to+combine+or+reach+across+traditional+sectors.+Enterprises+are+changing+%28shortening%29+traditional+customer+journeys+or+creating+new+digital-only+products+which+have+no+obvious+spot+on+the+value+chain.+There+is+a+theme+here%3A+industry+irrelevance.+The+lines+are+increasingly+blurred%2C+and+we%26rsquo%3Bre+seeing+industries+learning+from+each+other%2C+as+technology+components+mature+and+techniques+are+normalised+in+a+way+that+can+be+applied+the+same+way+to+banking%2C+agriculture%2C+retail+and+media.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3EConsider+industry-leading+technology+companies+that+have+pushed+the+boundaries+on+innovation+over+the+last+decade.+The+likes+of+Uber%2C+Airbnb%2C+Netflix%2C+Amazon+%28and+locally%2C+Takealot%29+are+prominent+not+because+they+knew+their+sectors+better+than+their+competitors%2C+but+rather+because+their+execution+of+technology+and+digital+customer+experience+was+beyond+what+was+on+the+market.+These+platforms+are+fast%2C+intuitive%2C+easy-to-use+and+responsive%2C+so+they+go+viral.+These+are+the+traits+we+want+in+our+solutions%2C+and+they+didn%26rsquo%3Bt+come+from+some+hidden+industry+experience%2C+but+rather+a+marriage+of+solving+real+problems+and+excellence+in+technology+execution.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FIndustry-PULLQUOTE-19-19.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+100%25%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EExecution+is+more+important+than+industry+knowledge%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E_linebreak_Broad+expertise+in+technology+execution+is+the+difference+between+good+and+great.+Teams+need+to+have+diversity+in+experience+across+varied+sectors%2C+and+thus+the+knowledge+to+tailor+problem-solving+towards+different+scenarios.+There+is+more+to+be+gained+from+lessons+in+building+similar+systems+in+multiple+sectors%2C+than+by+knowing+one+inside+out.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3EIf+you+want+to+be+competitive%2C+you+have+to+be+the+best.+This+means+that+you+can%26rsquo%3Bt+solely+rely+on+industry+standards+and+norms.+You+have+to+learn+from+and+build+upon+what+the+market+is+doing+in+all+sectors%2C+all+the+time.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3EIf+you%26rsquo%3Bre+an+insurer+creating+a+self-service+digital+product+for+customers%2C+you+should+have+an+engineering+team+who+is+an+expert+in+self-service+digital+products+%26ndash%3B+not+a+team+who+is+an+expert+in+insurance.+You+are+the+insurance+expert+that+will+be+guiding+the+team+in+industry+practices%2C+and+business+operating+context.+You+want+a+team+that+has+seen+it+all%2C+and+offer+ideas+that+challenge+the+industry+norms.+Not+just+because+it+will+result+in+delivery%2C+but+because+it+creates+the+opportunity+for+innovation.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EMissing+industry+knowledge+is+not+why+tech+projects+fail%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E_linebreak_Tech+projects+rarely+fail+due+to+missing+industry+knowledge+or+experience%2C+but+rather+due+to+missing+technology+experience%2C+awareness%2C+practices+and+pragmatism+in+execution.+These+are+things+which+are+universal+to+projects+in+any+industry.+Having+a+technology+team+with+some+experience+in+the+industry+will+certainly+help+%26ndash%3B+but+it+won%26%2339%3Bt+make+or+break+project.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3EThe+reality+is+that+most+failures+are+borne+from+issues+in+delivery+that+have+little+to+do+with+industry+expertise.+Weak+or+non-existent+technical+leadership%2C+planning%2C+fundamental+skills%2C+tools%2C+practices+are+the+culprits+here.+A+veteran+team+with+lessons+in+delivery+of+complex+solutions+in+multiple+scenarios+can+navigate+any+project.+They+can+learn+each+context+rapidly%2C+and+surmount+the+real+killers+of+delivery%3A+expectation+management%2C+collaboration%2C+productivity+and+technical+know-how.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EThe+narrow+expertise+bias%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E_linebreak_Teams+who+have+been+deeply+embedded+in+a+single+industry+often+develop+%26ldquo%3Bblinkers%26rdquo%3B%2C+hiding+possible+solutions+which+are+obscured+by+repetitive+industry+system+norms.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3EOur+brains+are+naturally+wired+to+find+patterns+in+seas+of+information.+When+engineering+teams+are+biased+because+of+their+narrow+experience+within+a+single+business+or+industry%2C+they+risk+boxing+themselves+in%2C+hiding+alternative+ideas+for+how+problems+can+be+solved+with+technology.+With+diversified+experience%2C+teams+can+challenge+your+thinking+and+bring+new%2C+innovative+ideas+from+different+industries%2C+teams+and+platforms.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3ETeams+with+a+broader+view+of+technology%2C+domain%2C+and+business+processes+have+a+hunger+to+learn+and+to+solve+problems.+Broad+technology+practice+trumps+narrow+industry+expertise%2C+clinging+to+industry+standards+will+prevent+you+from+differentiating+your+business%2C+and+remaining+competitive.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E perience+across+every+channel%2C+and+can+harness+economies+of+scale+in+non-functional+areas+like+security+and+performance.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3EOrganisations+of+practically+any+size+will+benefit+from+a+strategy+like+this%2C+which+is+why+it+is+becoming+so+popular%3A%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E1.+Be+faster+to+market%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E_linebreak_Platform-oriented+IT+allows+business+units+to+focus+on+what+they+are+good+at.+It+seems+like+an+obvious+approach+to+reuse+the+tools+that+are+already+available%2C+but+the+truth+is%2C+most+business+units+in+the+enterprise+are+still+treated+as+silos+to+avoid+dependencies+and+politics.+They+just+build+what+they+need+from+scratch%2C+top+to+bottom.+Creating+new+IT+foundations+for+every+initiative+might+be+liberating%2C+but+it+is+also+wasteful+and+slow.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3EThere+are+some+among+us+who+have+learned+how+to+pick+the+granularity+that+makes+sense+and+offer+minimal+friction+in+a+dependency+tree.+The+idea+so+to+create+and+offer+shared+data%2C+services%2C+DevOps+and+infrastructure+that+the+teams+actually+want+to+use+and+are+readily+available.+This+saves+development+time%2C+releasing+it+for+valuable+product+validation%2C+testing+and+iteration+time+on+core+features.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E2.+Offer+a+more+consistent+customer+experience%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E_linebreak_Customers+expect+the+same+treatment+when+dealing+with+different+offerings+under+your+brand.+They+aren%26rsquo%3Bt+interested+in+the+fact+that+different+services+have+different+processes%2C+and+generally+expect+a+level+of+consistency+when+interacting+with+multiple+departments.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3EThis+is+a+question+of+execution+in+digital+customer+experience.+It+is+hard+enough+to+create+beautiful%2C+intuitive+and+memorable+user+journeys+once%2C+why+exaggerate+that+problem+by+forcing+every+new+team+and+project+to+do+it+alone%2C+and+again%3F+Re-using+channels+which+are+designed+to+accommodate+a+variety+of+%26lsquo%3Btenants%26rsquo%3B+does+require+more+planning%2C+and+technical+skill+upfront%2C+but+is+clearly+a+better+long-term+approach+to+consistency+for+your+customers.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E3.+Make+non-functionals+a+shared+investment%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E_linebreak_While+it+is+very+difficult+to+justify+costly+security%2C+performance%2C+or+infrastructure+upgrades+for+a+single+product%2C+pooling+these+investments+make+enormous+financial+sense.+In+a+platform-oriented+IT+structure%2C+each+business+unit+receives+the+benefit+of+communal+investments+into+non-functional+characterises+of+their+shared+platform.+All+for+a+small+premium+required+to+support+the+shared+team%2C+tooling+and+technology+required.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3EWhen+platforms+are+segmented+correctly%2C+privacy%2C+security+and+scalability+changes+can+be+implemented+across+all+departments+that+need+to+use+it+%26ndash%3B+without+the+concern+that+a+certain+unit+does+not+have+current+capacity+to+do+them.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FInternalplatform-23.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+100%25%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3EInternal+platforms+are+the+secret+weapon+behind+rapidly+growing+tech+companies%2C+and+also+one+of+the+keys+to+leverage+limited+technology+talent+in+an+enterprise.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+a+no-brainer+to+share+core+IT%2C+API+and+customer+journey+capabilities+across+the+organisation.+For+the+computer+scientists%2C+platform-orientation+for+businesses+is+like+object+orientation+for+software+architectures.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3EWe+need+to+take+the+%3Cem%3Ebad+flexibility%3C%2Fem%3E+away+%28total+control+top+to+bottom%29+in+order+to+promote+the+good+kind%3A+customer-centricity%2C+shared+services+faster+time+to+market.+Start+moving+towards+platform-oriented+IT%2C+centralising+your+internal+IT+thinking%2C+and+easily+drive+compliance+and+security+consistency.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
