However%2C+many+seemingly+%26lsquo%3Bproudly+South+African%26rsquo%3B+businesses+are+choosing+to+outsource+their+technology+and+software+solution+requirements+to+countries+such+as+India%2C+China+and+the+United+States%2C+directly+damaging+the+local+industry.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26lsquo%3BInvestment+in+local+skills+and+technology+is+crucial%2C+and+much+of+our+country%26rsquo%3Bs+future+growth+is+expected+to+stem+from+these+fields%2C%26rsquo%3B+says+Shashi+Hansjee%2C+CEO+of+Entelect%2C+one+of+South+Africa%26rsquo%3Bs+most+successful+software+solutions+companies%2C+%26lsquo%3BIn+that+case%2C+it+is+important+to+explore+the+reasons+why+businesses+are+not+advancing+their+resources+to+our+own+local+workforce.%26rsquo%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+According+to+Hansjee%2C+South+Africa+boasts+some+of+the+world%26rsquo%3Bs+most+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.entelect.co.za%2FNews%2FDisplayNewsItem.aspx%3Fniid%3D45183%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3Ecutting-edge%2C+impressive+and+broadly+experienced+information+and+communication+technology+%28ICT%29+professionals%3C%2Fa%3E.+Hansjee+says%2C+%26lsquo%3BCities+such+as+Cape+Town+and+Johannesburg%2C+where+many+of+South+Africa%26rsquo%3Bs+most+prominent+businesses+are+based%2C+have+already+proven+to+be+hubs+for+technological+innovation%2C+yet+businesses+are+still+sending+their+opportunities+outside+of+our+borders.%26rsquo%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Some+key+differentiators+that+South+Africa%26rsquo%3Bs+ICT+skills+base+offers+in+comparison+with+service+providers+abroad%2C+include+the+fact+that+using+local+talent+naturally+facilitates+stronger+communication+between+project+stakeholders.+%26lsquo%3BThis+ultimately+increases+the+overall+success+rate+and+shortens+the+delivery+timeframes%2C%26rsquo%3B+says+Hansjee%2C+%26lsquo%3BWe+have+also+seen+a+number+of+case+studies+that+showcase+how+South+African+ICT+providers%26rsquo%3B+strong+communication+principles+and+agile+methodologies+positively+differentiate+us+from+overseas+competitors.+In+fact%2C+many+South+African+developed+software+projects+have+translated+into+successful+and+viable+products+and+businesses.%26rsquo%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Hansjee+suggests+that+in+the+past%2C+companies+seeking+ICT+services+elsewhere+may+have+been+put+off+by+problems+such+as+trying+to+locate+and+train+local+talent+to+the+point+where+they+are+able+to+become+part+of+a+mobilised+workforce%2C+and+so+the+seemingly+safer+and+more+familiar+option+of+outsourcing+took+preference.+%26lsquo%3BMany+feel+that+education+standards+may+not+be+up+to+international+standards%2C+particularly+as+a+result+of+South+Africa%26rsquo%3Bs+low+global+rankings+in+the+maths+and+science+fields%2C%26rsquo%3B+he+explains%2C+%26lsquo%3BHowever%2C+remarkable+improvements+and+developments+have+taken+place+around+access+to+ICT+education+in+recent+years%2C+and+we+do+not+believe+that+is+the+case+today.+We+are+privileged+at+Entelect+to+be+exposed+to+some+of+the+world%26rsquo%3Bs+finest+tech+experts+on+a+daily+basis.%26rsquo%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Hansjee+does%2C+however%2C+concede+that+some+disparities+do+occur+in+our+local+education%2C+but+rather+than+take+their+business+elsewhere%2C+South+African+organisations+should+see+this+as+an+opportunity+to+invest+in+and+improve+on+our+educational+systems.+%26lsquo%3BIt+is+crucial+that+businesses+recognise+how+vastly+different+and+exponentially+improved+today%26rsquo%3Bs+local+technology+expertise+is%2C+compared+with+just+a+few+years+ago%2C+and+see+the+potential+that+lies+within+our+own+population%2C%26rsquo%3B+says+Hansjee%2C+%26lsquo%3BIf+big+corporates+and+organisations+take+the+pioneering+steps+of+showing+confidence+in+our+local+talents%2C+their+example+will+open+up+a+veritable+floodgate+of+opportunity+and+growth%2C+attracting+more+local+%26ndash%3B+and+even+international+%26ndash%3B+business+opportunities.%26rsquo%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+CEO+concludes%2C+%26lsquo%3BWith+thousands+of+jobs+expecting+to+be+opening+up+in+the+ICT+sectors+for+South+African+businesses%2C+a+key+goal+for+the+country+as+a+whole+should+be+to+foster+a+culture+of+addressing+local+business+needs+using+local+expertise.%26rsquo%3B South+Africa+has+been+making+waves+in+the+technology+innovation+world+and+the+country%E2%80%99s+wealth+of+young+talent+in+the+technology+and+software+space+creates+the+ideal+skills+pool+for+local+businesses+to+tap+into. ["Teams and culture"] Shashi.jpg
Growing+pains+of+an+ICT+company These+two+challenges+are+coupled+with+the+fact+that+companies+are+rapidly+exploding+from+10+employees+to+more+than+200+%26nbsp%3Bin+relatively+short+timeframes.+With+all+this+in+mind%2C+the+human+capital+of+a+company+is+its+most+vital+component+and+it+determines+overall+business+success+or+failure.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Career+development+and+performance+management+in+a+small+company+is+easy%2C+often+senior+management+is+operationally+involved+and+the+roles+and+responsibilities+are+generally+unstructured+or+loose.+Most+people+in+early+startups+accept+that+they+do+whatever+needs+to+be+done+on+the+path+to+success%2C+even+if+that+means+fixing+the+printer+when+they+are+developers+by+trade%21%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+As+the+company+grows%2C+senior+management+starts+becoming+less+and+less+operationally+involved+%26ndash%3B+and+this+is+when+things+start+becoming+tricky.+It+is+at+this+point+that+processes+and+policies+need+to+be+created.+These+are+both+critical+to+the+overall+growth+of+the+company.+At+Entelect%2C+our+core+value+has+always+been+focussed+around+our+employees+and+we+have+made+numerous+efforts+to+ensure+we+succeed+in+managing+their+performance+and%2C+most+importantly%2C+that+our+employees+are+continuously+growing.+As+with+any+process%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+about+learning+and+these+are+just+some+of+the+lessons+that+we%26rsquo%3Bve+learnt+along+the+way%3A+%3Cul+id%3D%22careersList%22%3E+%3Cli%3EEnsure+that+key+performance+indicators+and+career+paths+are+well+defined%2C+easily+accessible+and+part+of+the+company+culture.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3ETake+the+time+to+continually+evolve+your+performance+appraisal+process.+We+have+done+this+numerous+times+over+the+last+ten+years+and+it+has+made+a+massive+positive+impact%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EDo+not+rely+solely+on+the+feedback+captured+during+the+performance+appraisal+process+but+rather+over+time%2C+document+and+consolidate+as+much+information+around+an+employee%2C+including+the+number+of+hours+worked%2C+client+commendations+received+and+training+attended.+All+of+this+information+will+give+you+a+more+accurate+reflection+of+the+employee%26rsquo%3Bs+performance+when+required%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EAs+senior+management%2C+you+should+not+be+afraid+to+let+go+of+the+performance+appraisal+function%2C+especially+if+you+get+to+the+point+where+you+cannot+give+each+employee+the+adequate+amount+of+attention+he+or+she+deserves.+Make+sure+the+person+who+has+this+responsibility+is+armed+with+the+necessary+tools+and+information%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EGrow+a+strong+base+of+staff+leadership+that+have+capacity+to+give+each+employee+the+time+he+or+she+deserves%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+As+your+company+grows%2C+you+will+continue+to+face+many+challenges%3A+embrace+them%2C+continue+to+adapt+and+remain+relevant+to+your+staff%26rsquo%3Bs+needs. Yatish+Parshotam+%28Entelect+General+Manager%3A+Communications%29+%3Cbr%2F%3E%3Cbr%2F%3E+Software+development+companies+across+South+Africa+are+faced+with+many+ongoing+challenges+but+the+two+that+are+of+utmost+importance%2C+are+people+focused%3A+recruiting+and+maintaining+a+strong+pool+of+developers+to+help+fuel+the+high+demand+for+work+in+the+industry. ["Teams and culture"] Yatish.jpg
High+Performance+Teams The+coders+worked+in+teams+of+six+to+ten+people+and+looking+at+the+success+of+the+end+products%2C+the+competition+raised+the+question%3A+What+constitutes+a+%26lsquo%3Bhigh+performance+software+development+team%26rsquo%3B%3F%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E1.+The+right+individuals%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+level+of+ability+%28or+potential+ability%29+and+experience+of+members+is+crucial%2C+and+an+individual%26rsquo%3Bs+selection+will+depend+on+the+nature+of+the+project.+Attitude%2C+however%2C+trumps+ability+every+time.+In+coding%2C+there+are+two+types+of+individual%3A+those+who+find+problems+and+those+who+find+solutions.+Choose+members+who+have+a+bias+for+finding+solutions+%26ndash%3B+they+will+bring+energy+to+a+team+that+is+normally+drained+by+problem+finders.+A+positive+mindset+and+can-do+attitude+go+a+long+way.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+A+team+leader+will+emerge+naturally%2C+especially+where+there+are+varying+degrees+of+experience+in+the+team.+Whether+explicitly+identifying+an+individual+as+team+lead+or+letting+natural+selection+play+its+course%2C+leaders+who+display+the+characteristics+of+servant-leaders+%28those+who+look+to+enable+the+full+potential+of+those+in+their+team%2C+rather+than+taking+an+autocratic%2C+command-and-control+style%29+are+better+suited+to+leading+high-performance+teams.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E2.+The+right+combination%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Collaboration+is+king+in+high-performance+teams+but+finding+the+right+combination+of+individuals+is+significantly+more+challenging.+Team+dynamics+come+into+play+and+the+myriad+of+behavioural+habits+and+thinking+preferences%2C+and+combination+thereof%2C+can+be+difficult+to+assess+up+front.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Identify+the+combination+of+individuals+that+will+communicate+effectively.+Assemble+a+cross-functional+team+that+has+all+the+skills+necessary+to+get+the+job+done%2C+eliminating+external+dependencies+wherever+possible.+Once+collaboration+and+skill+sets+are+addressed%2C+shift+the+focus+to+providing+the+right+environment+%28location%2C+tooling+and+so+on%29+and+trust+the+team+to+do+the+job.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E3.+Setting+the+stage%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Having+a+well-defined+purpose+is+a+strong+motivator.+Individuals+who+understand+the+big+picture+and+who+buy+into+the+objectives+of+what+the+project+is+trying+to+achieve%2C+will+naturally+aim+to+maximise+the+value+of+their+contribution.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Success+often+comes+only+after+a+number+of+failures.+If+you+are+looking+for+innovation+from+your+team%2C+tolerate+failure.+Create+a+%26lsquo%3Bsafe%26rsquo%3B+environment+in+which+the+team+can+experiment+with+ideas%2C+new+technologies+and+approaches.+Encourage+the+team+to+explore+uncharted+territory+and+stretch+the+boundaries+of+what+is+possible.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E4.+Involvement+%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+As+the+project+sponsor%2C+product+owner+or+any+other+direct+stakeholder+having+a+vested+interest+in+the+success+of+the+project%2C+become+involved.+Show+an+interest+in+the+successes+and+failures+of+the+team+and+be+a+champion+for+the+project+and+team+across+other+business+units.+High-performance+teams+are+proud+of+their+work+and+recognition+for+their+efforts+will+directly+impact+their+level+of+motivation.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+A+high-performance+team+is+a+crucial+element+in+delivering+a+successful+product+and+once+you+know+what+constitutes+a+winning+team%2C+it+could+be+the+start+of+something+game-changing. Doug+Crawford+%28Entelect+Manager%3A+Service+Delivery%29+%3Cbr%2F%3E%3Cbr%2F%3E+Earlier+this+year%2C+Entelect+was+invited+to+FNB%E2%80%99s+inaugural+%23CodeFest.+The+event+sees+coders+prototyping+innovative+ideas+and+it+culminates+in+a+24-hour+coding+marathon%2C+turning+those+ideas+into+something+tangible. ["Teams and culture"] Doug.jpg
What+makes+a+great+software+engineer%3F %3Cp%3EThe+following+observations+and+institutional+learnings+are+based+on+years+of+working+in+and+with+software+teams+of+different+sizes%2C+across+a+number+of+industries%2C+technologies+and+architectural+complexities.+They+are+in+no+particular+order+because+in+reality%2C+priorities+for+each+of+these+will+shift+based+on+context.+What+is+important+though%2C+is+that+these+are+all+positive+traits%2C+and+engineers+who+display+these%2C+would+almost+certainly+be+productive+and+most+likely+to+accelerate+through+their+career.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EAttitude+over+aptitude%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E+A+great+attitude+can+take+decades+of+personal+development+but+becoming+technically+competent+takes+a+fraction+of+that+time.+A+competent+team+will+have+the+resources+to+rapidly+teach%2C+mentor+and+develop+a+junior+engineer+who+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt+necessarily+start+out+with+the+sharpest+technical+skills.+A+negative+attitude+will+invariably+prevent+or+hinder+learning.+Building+competencies+for+people+with+tertiary-level+education+is+usually+far+less+onerous+than+changing+their+attitude.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAn+ability+to+relate+on+a+personal+level+to+colleagues+and+clients+is+crucial%2C+so+to+be+a+great+engineer%2C+you+need+to+be+the+engineer+whom+everyone+wants+to+work+with.+Being+a+technical+guru+is+insufficient+if+nobody+wants+to+work+with+you.+Great+software+engineers+avoid+condescension%2C+narcissism+and+an+inflated+ego.+In+communications%2C+this+means+they+are+able+to+listen+attentively%2C+be+assertive+and+concise.+Great+engineers+also+able+to+present+themselves+without+aggression.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EAwareness+and+analytical+nature%3A+%3C%2Fstrong%3ESome+engineers+struggle+with+%26lsquo%3Btunnel+vision%26rsquo%3B+into+the+solution+space%2C+where+they+focus+too+much+on+the+solution+without+properly+evaluating+the+problem.+Great+software+engineers+are+astute%2C+able+to+place+requirements+in+context+and+maintain+awareness+of+the+problem-space+while+working+through+the+solution.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+awareness+should+pervade+all+aspects+of+their+work%2C+especially+the+ability+to+be+aware+of+what+already+exists+in+a+given+solution%2C+and+how+it+can+be+reused+to+solve+requirements+more+efficiently+or+in+ways+that+weren%26rsquo%3Bt+directly+suggested.+One+of+the+hallmarks+of+great+software+engineers+is+a+shrewd+talent+for+solving+problems+on+their+feet+in+meetings%2C+workshops+and+pair-programming+scenarios.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EMaturity+in+approach%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E+Great+software+engineers+apply+their+mind+to+all+aspects+of+the+engineering+process+in+a+considered+and+non-selfish+way.+Here+are+a+few+examples+of+what+this+means+in+practice%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cul+id%3D%22careersList%22%3E+%3Cli%3ESeeking+constructive+criticism+%26ndash%3B+great+engineers+ask+what+they+could+be+missing+in+a+design%2C+how+would+it+not+work+and+whether+it+is+understandable+to+the+users+and+the+rest+of+the+team%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EAsking+for+the+background+of+a+requirement+to+see+how+it+fits+into+things+and+seeing+the+%26lsquo%3Bbig+picture%26rsquo%3B+%26ndash%3B+great+engineers+look+to+stabilise+requirements+before+rushing+ahead+with+development.+For+example%2C+similar+work+items+should+be+checked+to+see+if+there+is+an+overlap%2C+offering+an+opportunity+to+combine+or+reuse%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3ETaking+initiative+%26ndash%3B+when+working+on+a+specific+requirement%2C+great+engineers+will+explore+ways+to+improve+the+solution+beyond+the+exact+provided+requirement%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3ECommunicating+regularly+%26ndash%3B+status+reports%2C+stand-up+meetings+and+involvement+in+the+broader+software+and+client+context+are+all+easy+ways+to+be+noticed+though+excellent+service.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ECareer-path+intuition%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E+A+career+in+software+engineering+is+vibrant+and+varied+so+it+is+difficult+to+have+a+template+for+growth+that+can+be+applied+to+junior+engineers+in+a+blanket+fashion.+Being+senior+is+less+about+how+many+years+you+have+worked+and+more+about+your+maturity%2C+competence+and+value+you+can+provide+to+a+team.+The+best+software+engineers+see+this+for+what+it+is+%26ndash%3B+an+opportunity.+Furthering+a+career+in+the+field+is+about+understanding+the+context+and+demonstrating+an+insight+into+what+makes+a+software+engineer+a+%26lsquo%3Bsenior%26rsquo%3B+or+a+%26lsquo%3Blead%26rsquo%3B+within+that+organisation.+Armed+with+that+knowledge%2C+great+software+engineers+can+tailor+their+skills+and+initiative+to+push+themselves+further.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EUltimately%2C+what+separates+great+engineers+from+good+engineers+is+a+natural+maturity+in+approach%2C+personality+and+attitude+that+goes+beyond+the+expected+competence+in+the+technical+aspects+of+the+software+craft.+This+might+seem+counterintuitive+given+the+implied+technical+depth+in+the+job+and+to+be+fair%2C+in+many+positions%2C+an+expert+level+technical+competency+is+an+absolute+minimum.+However%2C+the+point+is+that+often%2C+technical+strength+will+only+get+you+through+the+door%2C+where+these+%26lsquo%3Bsofter%26rsquo%3B+aspects+then+take+over.%3C%2Fp%3E Matthew+Butler+%28Entelect+Software%3A+General+Manager%3A+Managed+Solutions%29+%3Cbr%2F%3E%3Cbr%2F%3E+When+compared+to+disciplines+such+as+mechanical%2C+civil+and+industrial+engineering%2C+software+engineering+as+a+craft+is+still+young%2C+despite+its+rapid+growth+over+the+last+two+decades.+Much+of+this+growth+has+been+driven+by+Twitter%2C+Facebook%2C+Google+and+Microsoft%2C+all+of+which+have+generated+substantial+interest+in+the+field.+As+a+result+of+this+surge+in+interest%2C+software+engineering+has+become+an+attractive+career+option+and+it+draws+in+people+with+a+wide+variety+of+talent%2C+personality%2C+knowledge+and+attitude.+Given+these+variations%2C+it+is+worthwhile+looking+at+the+traits+that+make+a+great+software+engineer. ["Teams and culture"] Matthew.jpg
Employee+loyalty+programmes%3A+a+Band-Aid%C2%AE+for+a+gaping+wound %3Cp%3ESouth+African+companies+are+not+only+competing+within+a+national+context+for+top-tier+software+talent+but+they+are+also+up+against+international+organisations+on+their+own+soil.+These+organisations+have+cut+their+teeth+in+far+more+competitive+markets+and+have+decades+of+experience+in+managing+software+environments+on+the+South+African+companies.+It+is+not+breaking+news+either+that+there+is+a+very+limited+pool+of+skills+to+draw+on%2C+and+to+top+it+off%2C+in+South+Africa%2C+there+is+a+through-the-roof+demand+on+enterprise+developers+in+all+sectors.+This+dangerous+combination+and+a+heavily+imbalanced+supply-and-demand+picture+has+forced+software-service+companies+and+corporates+to+take+a+closer+look+at+their+retention+rates+and+invest+in+programmes+designed+to+improve+these+figures%2C+or+suffer+churn+as+the+talent+is+pulled+towards+the+highest+bidder.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+problem+with+this+approach+is+that+companies+are+designing+loyalty+programmes+to+mitigate+that+fact+and+as+a+result%2C+they+avoid+the+tough+questions+that+examine+the+organisational+causes+of+staff+churn.+When+used+in+this+way%2C+loyalty+programmes+are+the+equivalent+of+sweeping+the+problem+under+the+carpet.+They+cannot+solve+fundamental%2C+underlying+issues+that+require+investment+and+political+will+to+transform%2C+much+in+the+same+way+that+a+Band-Aid+cannot+stop+arterial+bleeding.+Giving+employees+a+free+smoothie+is+not+going+to+keep+them+working+for+you%2C+let+alone+engaged+with+their+work+if+they+have+a+poor+relationship+with+their+team%2C+have+very+little+input%2C+control+or+ownership+of+their+work%2C+or+work+in+the+basement+of+a+dilapidated+building+with+poor+ventilation.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+power+of+a+loyalty+programme+lies+in+its+ability+to+enhance+what+is+already+a+working+organisational+culture%2C+and+to+incentivise+positive+behaviour.+Loyalty+programmes+are+incredibly+useful+tools+for+this+purpose+and+the+benefits+of+this+approach+have+been+well+studied+and+documented%2C+some+of+which+you+can+read+about+on+the+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.encentivize.co.za.%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3EEncentivize%3C%2Fa%3E+website.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESo+how+then+do+we%2C+as+the+businesses+who+depend+on+these+individuals%2C+move+ourselves+into+the+future+with+a+predictable+strategy+for+retaining+and+attracting+top+software+talent%3F+The+answer+is+not+easy%2C+nor+is+it+the+same+for+everyone+in+the+game.+However%2C+at+Entelect%2C+we+know+that+it+begins+with+self-reflection.+For+a+retention+programme+to+be+effective%2C+it+cannot+simply+be+a+rewards+system.+At+worst%2C+it+needs+to+be+a+comprehensive+overhaul+of+the+organisational+culture%2C+processes+and+management+practices+of+a+company.+We+have+identified+some+common+success+factors+within+teams+that+have+high+retention+rates+and+although+not+universal%2C+there+is+generally+a+shift+towards+empowerment%2C+autonomy%2C+transparency+and+inclusivity+in+all+the+teams.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EKnowing+where+to+start+can+be+tricky.+In+our+business+of+software+services%2C+customers+and+staff+are+two+sides+of+the+same+equation+and+success+is+an+exercise+in+identifying+our+value+proposition+for+our+staff%2C+and+working+just+as+hard+to+balance+that+equation+as+we+do+for+our+customers.+Embarking+on+this+journey+has+taught+us+that+retention+in+the+world+of+software+development+means+taking+a+long+hard+look+in+the+mirror+at+who+you+are+as+a+company+and+committing+to+improving+yourself%2C+for+your+staff.%3C%2Fp%3E Tim+Kroon+%28Entelect+Software%3A+General+Manager%3A+Professional+Services%29+%3Cbr%2F%3E%3Cbr%2F%3E+In+2014%2C+Entelect+Software+won+the+Deloitte+Best+Company+To+Work+For+award+and+this+year%2C+the+company+was+was+awarded+with+a+Gold+Achiever+Award+in+the+Deloitte+Best+Company+to+Work+For+survey.+Of+course%2C+the+company+celebrated+these+accolades+but+they+also+gave+them+an+oppotunity+to+pause+and+reflect+on+the+reasons+why+Entelect+has+seen+a+suprisingly+low+staff+churn+and+high+satisfaction+rating+over+the+past+few+years. Why+candidate+liability+clauses+are+bad+for+business %3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+time+of+year+is+critical+for+recruitment.+Many+companies+are+actively+searching+universities+all+over+the+country+to+secure+the+best+candidates+to+join+their+graduate+programmes.+Similarly%2C+many+graduates+are+entering+the+job+market+for+the+first+time+and+are+navigating+their+way+around+the+recruitment+space%2C+looking+for+the+right+recruitment+agent+to+help+them+identify+the+best+career+opportunity.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHowever%2C+in+recent+years+there+has+been+an+increasing+trend+by+recruiters+to+ask+candidates+to+sign+what+has+been+called+a+Candidate+Liability+Clause.+Given+that+a+large+number+of+graduate+candidates+are+new+to+the+recruitment+industry%2C+many+assume+that+all+components+of+these+agreements+are+standard+practice.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+most+contentious+component+of+these+agreements+is+that+if+a+candidate+reneges+on+an+offer+after+written+acceptance%2C+the+recruitment+agency+claims+damages+against+the+candidate.+Usually%2C+the+agency+demands+from+the+candidate+an+amount+equal+to+the+commission+or+fee+they+would+have+earned+upon+successful+placement.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhile+this+practice+is+not+common%2C+it+has+been+in+existence+for+some+years.+In+2012%2C+the+Federation+of+African+Professional+Staffing+Organisations+%28APSO%29+amended+its+Code+of+Ethical+and+Professional+Practice%2C+banning+the+use+of+the+Candidate+Liability+Clause.+As+such%2C+it+required+all+members+of+APSO+to+adhere+to+this+ban+and+provided+a+candidate+notification+that+informed+candidates+that+an+agency%26rsquo%3Bs+only+right+would+be+to+seek+damages+in+line+with+their+legal+rights.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHowever%2C+the+frequency+of+this+Candidate+Liability+Clause+practice+suggests+that+there+is+still+a+lack+of+clarity+around+this+issue+and+what+is+permitted.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ECarmen+Williams%2C+General+Manager%3A+Talent+Acquisition+at+Entelect%2C+says%2C+%26ldquo%3BAt+this+time+of+year%2C+graduates+are+planning+for+their+first+job.+Many+of+them+will+be+stepping+into+the+recruitment+space+for+the+first+time.%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EShe+believes+it+is+critical+that+candidates+understand+how+the+recruitment+industry+works+so+that+they+are+not+misled+by+unethical+practices.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26ldquo%3BSuccessful+placements+can+only+exist+when+a+candidate+wants+to+join+a+company%2C+not+because+the+candidate+feels+intimidated+into+joining+by+the+prospect+of+incurring+damages+fees+if+they+don%26rsquo%3Bt.%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAPSO+has+also+joined+the+discussion+in+an+attempt+to+provide+clarity+on+the+issue.+While+APSO+recognises+that+some+members+may+wish+to+seek+damages+in+certain+instances%2C+it+expressly+prohibits+recruitment+agencies+using+a+Candidate+Liability+Clause+as+a+means+of+recovering+these+damages.+Part+of+the+problem%2C+explains+Roly+Boardman%2C+chairman+of+the+APSO+Ethics+Committee%2C+is+that+there+is+currently+no+requirement+for+recruitment+agencies+to+be+members+of+an+industry+body+such+as+APSO.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26ldquo%3BMembership+of+APSO+would+serve+to+monitor+unethical+practices+and+give+candidates+recourse+when+a+dispute+occurs%2C%26rdquo%3B+he+says.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESo%2C+why+is+this+practice+bad+for+business%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFirstly%2C+contracting+a+candidate+to+cover+damages+should+they+decide+to+change+their+mind+on+an+offer+is+not+conducive+to+a+successful+placement.+A+candidate+who+feels+bound+to+a+job+offer+through+fear+of+incurring+damages+fees+is+likely+to+enter+that+position+in+a+negative+state+of+mind+and+feel+cheated+out+of+their+preferred+choice.+Jobs+that+start+like+this+do+not+last+and+replacing+these+employees+incurs+more+expense+in+the+longer+term.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESecondly%2C+a+large+number+of+companies+are+not+aware+that+potential+candidates+are+asked+to+sign+this+document.+Consequently%2C+it+can+be+a+poor+reflection+on+the+companies+these+agencies+represent%2C+not+to+mention+that+this+practice+may+be+in+stark+contrast+with+the+values+of+the+organisations+they+serve.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThirdly%2C+this+practice+can+result+in+a+poorly+matched+placement.+On+the+one+hand%2C+a+company+may+lose+out+on+an+excellent+candidate+because+he+or+she+is+unable+to+change+their+mind.+On+the+other%2C+a+company+may+take+on+an+employee+who+would+have+preferred+to+join+another+company.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWilliams+has+a+good+view+of+both+sides+of+the+industry+and+believes+that+this+issue+points+to+the+role+of+the+recruiter.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26ldquo%3BThe+role+of+the+recruitment+agent+is+to+help+both+the+candidate+and+the+company+make+the+best+decision%2C%26rdquo%3B+she+explains.+%26ldquo%3BIf+the+recruiter+is+prepared+to+nurture+this+part+of+the+process%2C+damages+fees+should+not+be+an+issue.%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhat+should+company%26rsquo%3Bs+and+candidates+look+for%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E1.+When+it+comes+to+identifying+the+right+candidate+for+the+right+role%2C+the+onus+is+on+the+recruiter+to+perform+greater+due+diligence+throughout+the+recruitment+process.+Boardman+supports+this+view+by+asking+the+question%2C+%26ldquo%3BSurely+we+cannot+employ+people+without+personal+interaction%3F%26rdquo%3B+He+firmly+believes+that+we+need+to+bring+personality+back+into+the+recruitment+process%2C+saying%2C+%26ldquo%3BWe+simply+cannot+afford+to+miss+out+on+good+candidates+because+the+right+information+was+not+discovered.%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E2.+Part+of+a+recruiter%26rsquo%3Bs+process+is+to+counsel+candidates+on+what+to+do+in+case+of+a+counter+offer%2C+helping+them+understand+the+pros+and+cons+of+accepting+a+counter+offer.+It+is+in+the+interest+of+all+parties+involved+that+the+candidate+takes+the+best+career+opportunity+available+to+realise+a+successful+recruitment+process.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E3.+Candidates+and+companies+should+ask+a+potential+recruitment+agent+whether+they+are+a+member+of+APSO.+This+way+they+know+a+code+of+ethics+is+being+followed%2C+and+should+there+be+any+cause+for+recourse+or+dispute%2C+all+parties+involved+have+the+support+of+an+independent+party.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhen+engaging+a+recruitment+agency%26rsquo%3Bs+service%2C+companies+and+candidates+should+find+out+what+the+terms+of+engagement+are.+If+an+agency+does+indeed+apply+a+damages+fee%2C+then+companies+need+to+consider+how+this+may+affect+them.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26ldquo%3BA+candidate+must+be+free+of+coercion+of+any+sort+to+make+the+right+decision+for+them%2C%26rdquo%3B+concludes+Williams.+%26ldquo%3BIt+is+important+that+companies+start+to+determine+the+kind+of+practices+they+want+from+the+recruitment+industry%2C+and+start+demanding+it%2C+or+only+work+with+those+recruiters+who+share+your+organisation%26%2339%3Bs+values.%26quot%3B%3C%2Fp%3E %3Cp%3EAs+software+engineers%2C+we+need+to+stay+on+top+of+a+continuously+evolving+industry+-+the+stronger+and+more+diverse+our+community+network+of+engineers+and+developers%2C+the+greater+chance+we+have+to+remain+relevant.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ECommunities+are+popping+up+in+all+areas+of+our+lives+because+people+no+longer+just+do+one+job+or+hobby%2C+they+have+a+number+of+passion+projects+and+interests.+Increased+connectivity+and+social+media+have+enabled+this.+Finding+a+good+community+is+like+finding+your+perfect+match%3B+when+it%26%2339%3Bs+good%2C+the+most+amazing+innovations+can+emerge+from+your+collaborations+with+like-minded+people.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe+often+think+of+communities+as+formally+established+groups+but+communities+can+also+be+much+smaller+groups+of+people+that+share+similar+ideologies.%26nbsp%3B+Often+these+people+choose+to+define+their+connection+in+a+way+that+reflects+their+social+identity+and+practice.+The+most+rewarding+thing+about+communities+can+be+the+knowledge+sharing+and+the+personal+networks+that+develop+from+them.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAt+first%2C+it+may+seem+obvious+as+to+why+it+can+be+valuable+to+interact+with+the+larger+development+community%3B+to+share+knowledge.+But%2C+there+are+other+advantages+that+are+not+always+obvious+until+you+are+part+of+a+development+community.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E1.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+Sharing+passions%2C+ideas%2C+and+goals%2C+can+accelerate+your+personal+growth+exponentially.+But+the+first%2C+most+important%2C+trick+to+getting+the+most+out+of+a+community+is+not+to+look+at+it+for+what+you+can+get+out+of+it%2C+but+rather+look+at+what+you+can+offer.+Networking+is+a+two-way+street+and+the+second+you+can+show+yourself+to+be+someone+who+is+always+willing+to+help+and+share+knowledge%2C+the+quicker+you+will+be+able+to+build+your+network.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E2.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+The+software+industry+moves+at+an+incredible+pace.+While+developers+may+be+exposed+to+many+of+these+trends+in+their+day+jobs%2C+there+is+always+more+to+learn.+For+instance%2C+have+you+considered+ember.js+as+a+tool+when+you+hit+the+limits+of+your+current+Single+Page+Application+framework+and+do+you+know+what+pitfalls+to+look+out+for%3F+Or%2C+do+you+know+what+options+exist+for+bringing+your+next+application+into+the+augmented+reality+or+virtual+reality+world+of+the+future%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E3.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+In+the+same+vein%2C+because+of+the+continuous+evolution+of+the+industry%2C+troubleshooting+is+as+much+a+learning+curve+as+learning+new+languages+and+technologies.+Communities+provide+software+engineers+with+an+experimental+space+to+learn+and+also+troubleshoot+with+like-minded+people.%26nbsp%3BThe+advantages+of+having+a+space+to+troubleshoot+don%26%2339%3Bt+just+apply+to+work+in+community+forums%2C+but+also+problems+you+may+come+up+against+in+your+day-to-day+working+environments.%26nbsp%3B+You%26rsquo%3Bll+find+you+are+able+to+work+through+problems+more+quickly%2C+which+will+ultimately+add+value+to+both+your+career+and+the+projects+that+your+employer+is+undertaking.+Not+to+mention+the+insights+you+will+bring+to+your+community+will+increase+exponentially.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E4.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+One+of+the+less+obvious+but+most+compelling+advantages+of+being+part+of+a+community+is+that+it+can+give+guidance+to+your+career.+Being+in+touch+with+the+latest+changes+in+the+industry+will+help+you+to+make+strategic+decisions+about+your+future+career%3B+where+you+want+to+be+three+years+from+now%2C+what+skills+you+need+to+get+there%2C+and+most+importantly%2C+how+to+stay+relevant.+Fostering+relationships+in+a+community+will+have+a+positive+effect+on+your+career%3B+who+knows+who+you+may+meet%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe%26rsquo%3Bre+lucky+in+South+Africa%3B+we+have+access+to+a+number+of+international+communities+such+as+GitHub+and+stackoverflow%2C+but+also+some+locally+emerging+communities+such+as+source.technology.+But+the+User+Groups+are+possibly+the+most+active.+Groups+including+DevUG%2C+Jozi-JUG%2C+and+Android+UG+are+all+very+active+and+have+a+high+number+of+developers+who+attend+events.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThere+are+also+a+number+of+conferences+in+South+Africa+which+are+being+created+by+the+community+such+as+DevConf+and+JSinSA.+Attendance+at+these+kind+of+events+is%26nbsp%3Bsky-rocketing.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWithin+companies%2C+Slack+is+also+becoming+hugely+popular%2C+and+channels+such+as+such+as+ZA+Developers+and+ZA+Tech+enable+smaller+communities+to+emerge+and+interact+all+the+time.+After+all%2C+a+community+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+an+official+group+with+a+name%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+a+collection+of+like-minded+people%2C+so+sub-communities+can+exist+anywhere.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe%2C+as+developers+and+leaders+in+the+industry%2C+need+to+take+ownership+to+drive+these+initiatives+and+lead+by+example.+We+have+so+much+knowledge+to+share+and+so+many+upcoming+developers+who+are+hungry+to+share+in+our+knowledge.+There+is+a+shortfall+in+good+developers+in+South+Africa+but+no+shortage+of+jobs+for+great+developers.+Let%26rsquo%3Bs+build+and+participate+in+communities+to+help+bridge+this+gap+and+grow+to+our+full+potential+%26ndash%3B+as+individuals%2C+and+as+an+industry.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E BI+developers+should+be+treated+like+gold %3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%3Cem%3EHave+you+considered+who+has+the+most+insight+into+your+business%3F+The+CEO%2C+CIO%2C+or+perhaps+the+CFO%3F+After+all%2C+these+are+the+people+making+the+biggest+decisions+about+the+business.+They+are+presented+with+all+the+necessary+information+to+make+strategic+business+decisions.+Right%3F+Not+necessarily.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fem%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3EActually%2C+the+people+with+the+greatest+insight+are+a+little+bit+lower+down+the+food+chain.+They+are+the+Business+Intelligence+%28BI%29+developer.+The+reality+is+that+we+may+not+have+considered+the+BI+developer+because+for+many+years%2C+these+people+have+been+left+in+situations+where+they+are+always+playing+catch+up+with+organisational+changes.+It+was+almost+a+reverse-fit%3B+the+organisation+uses+existing+data+insights+to+make+a+financial+decision+on+how+to+improve+efficiencies%2C+then+the+BI+developer+goes+in+to+engineer+the+support+system+around+that.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3EIt%26rsquo%3Bs+been+an+interesting+journey+for+BI+developers.+When+SQL+was+launched+in+2005%2C+the+only+conceivable+approach%2C+given+the+richness+of+each+the+feature+tools+in+the+BI+stack%2C+was+a+collection+of+specialists.+Then+came+the+next+generation+of+BI+developers%3B+the+generalists.+Those+guys+who+knew+enough+to+be+able+to+support%2C+maintain%2C+and+occasionally%2C+enhance+the+solution+implemented+by+the+specialists.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3EBut+things+have+changed%2C+significantly.+BI+developers+%28previously+the+%26lsquo%3Bgeneralists%26rsquo%3B%29%2C+have+now+acquired+something+that+no+one+else+in+the+business+has%3B+a+unique+and+holistic+view+of+the+business+systems+and+the+business+processes.+In+fact%2C+at+a+mid-+management+level+%28and+because+of+the+nature+of+their+role%29%2C+these+developers+have+a+unique+perspective+and+access+to+data+at+virtually+all+levels+of+the+organisation+and+across+all+functional+areas.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3EI+often+refer+to+them+as+the+%26%2339%3BMiss+congeniality%26%2339%3B%26nbsp%3Bof+organisations.+They+have+typically+been+in+the+organisation+for+a+long+time%2C+had+contact+with+almost+all+departments+and+are+well+liked+by+everyone.+The+result+is+that+as+a+BI+Developer%2C+they+have+the+capacity+to+inform+and+influence+strategic+business+decisions.%26nbsp%3B+They+are+becoming+the+%26lsquo%3BIntelligence+Engineers%26rsquo%3B+of+organisations.+Spending+less+time+on+technical+work+and+far+more+on+data+discovery%2C+predicting+trends%2C+understanding+influencers+and+advising+businesses+on+solutions+to+problems+they+never+knew+they+had.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3EBI+developers+should+be+treated+like+gold+and+nurtured.+They+have+so+much+intelligence+at+their+fingertips.+Losing+this+when+a+BI+developer+looks+for+greener+pastures%2C+or+more+challenging+opportunities%2C+could+significantly+damage+your+market+position.+Maybe+not+next+month%2C+but+certainly+before+the+next+BI+developer+has+got+his+or+her+feet+under+the+table.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3EConsider+retention+strategies%2C+make+sure+they+are+specific+to+the+resource+needs+and+growth+opportunities.+BI+developers+should+have+business+critical+skills%2C+domain+knowledge+across+industries+and+business+silos.+Even+ownership+in+the+business.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22text-align%3Ajustify%3B%22%3EThe+reality+is+that+if+these+guys+leave%2C+they+leave+with+an+exceptional+amount+of+knowledge+about+your+business.+So+don%26rsquo%3Bt+let+them+become+the+Intelligence+Engineer+of+another+organisation.%3C%2Fp%3E The+company+breakaway+%E2%80%93+old-fashioned+relic+or+indispensable+business+tool%3F %3Cp%3EThe+company+breakaway+is+often+dismissed+as+a+day+or+two+out+of+the+office+for+a+bit+of+fun+and+a+few+hours+of+discussion+about+the+business.+More+often+than+not%2C+the+phenomenal+ideas+that+seemed+so+innovative+around+the+table+never+materialise.+Lessons+learnt+are+quickly+forgotten+and+the+passionate+commitment+to+%26ldquo%3Bdoing+things+differently%26rdquo%3B+and+%26ldquo%3Bgoing+the+extra+mile%26rdquo%3B+soon+gets+swallowed+up+in+the+daily+grind.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBut+according+to+Doug+Crawford%2C+manager%3A+service+delivery+at+Entelect%2C+the+breakaway+is+still+highly+relevant+in+today%26rsquo%3Bs+business+environment.+In+fact%2C+he+believes+it%26rsquo%3Bs+more+relevant+than+ever.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEntelect+is+a+software+development+company+that+runs+teams+of+on-site+developers+across+a+range+of+clients+and+projects+throughout+South+Africa.+Each+project+is+operationally+independent%2C+which+means+there%26rsquo%3Bs+no+need+for+the+project+teams+to+interact+or+engage+with+each+other.+However%2C+from+a+strategic+and+developmental+perspective%2C+there+is+a+lot+they+can+learn+from+each+other.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26ldquo%3BEach+year+we+take+a+day+out+of+the+office+to+bring+together+our+project+team+leaders+from+across+the+country+%26ndash%3B+we+call+them+%26lsquo%3Bteam+leads%26rsquo%3B+%26ndash%3B+to+share+experiences+and+discuss+creative+and+innovative+ways+to+address+common+challenges+in+the+business%2C%26rdquo%3B+says+Crawford.+%26ldquo%3BMore+importantly%2C+the+sessions+give+team+leads+and+management+the+opportunity+to+interact+in+a+dedicated+and+focused+setting+that+allows+for+a+healthy+two-way+communication+that+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+easily+achieved+by+other+means.%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESounds+like+any+other+breakaway%2C+right%3F+But+Crawford+says+these+interventions+have+yielded+several+success+stories+over+the+years.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26ldquo%3BThe+breakaways+are+heavily+solutions-focused%2C%26rdquo%3B+he+explains.+%26ldquo%3BBefore+the+event+we+circulate+a+list+of+topics+or+tasks+that+will+be+unpacked+during+the+course+of+the+day.+Team+leads+are+required+to+make+notes+for+discussion+on+each+of+the+scenarios.+On+the+day+itself+we+divide+the+group+into+teams.+Each+team+is+allocated+one+of+the+topics+to+unpack+and+debate+in+the+morning+session.+Teams+then+present+their+solutions+to+the+group+in+the+afternoon.%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESome+of+the+challenges+from+the+last+Entelect+breakaway+were%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Create+a+toolbox+to+help+our+new+or+young+team+leads+run+effective+career%2C+growth+and+performance+discussions+with+their+team+members.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Create+an+on-boarding+pack+that+can+be+used+by+team+leads+and+other+team+members+to+ensure+new+members+joining+a+team+have+the+best+possible+experience+and+are+able+to+deliver+value+to+the+client+and+team+at+the+earliest+opportunity.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+How+do+we+maximise+visibility+across+the+company+of+the+technical+achievements+and+innovations+being+delivered+by+our+teams%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+How+can+I+inspire+a+sense+of+purpose+in+my+team+that+creates+a+common-ground+for+our+client%2C+staff+and+company+interests%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+How+do+we+ensure+teams+and+clients+are+aware+of+and+making+use+of+Entelect%26rsquo%3Bs+value-adding+services%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26ldquo%3BThe+depth+of+discussion+was+impressive%2C%26rdquo%3B+says+Crawford.+%26ldquo%3BAs+a+management+team+we+are+already+working+on+operationalising+a+number+of+the+ideas+that+came+out+of+the+most+recent+session.%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESome+of+these+are%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAn+on-boarding+toolbox+to+ensure+a+comprehensive+and+consistent+on-boarding+experience+for+new+team+members%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EA+discretionary+%26ldquo%3Bhappiness%26rdquo%3B+budget+for+each+team+to+spend+on+anything+that+will+make+them+happy%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETeam+CVs+that+list+capabilities+and+achievements+at+team+level+leading+to+awareness+and+boosting+profile+within+the+company%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EGenerating+thinking+around+value-add+activities%2C+e.g.+knowledge+sharing%2C+training%2C+events+and+workshops%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+sessions+also+play+a+very+important+role+when+it+comes+to+internal+mentorship.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26ldquo%3BWe+currently+have+44+team+leads+in+the+business%2C%26rdquo%3B+explains+Crawford.+%26ldquo%3BBreakaways+provide+the+ideal+forum+for+the+whole+team+to+network+and+form+relationships.+Some+people+in+the+team+are+very+experienced%2C+while+others+are+new+to+the+role+or+to+the+business.+During+the+breakaways+we+actively+encourage+connections+between+newer+and+more+experienced+team+members%2C+which+serve+as+informal+mentorship-type+relationships.%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIt%26rsquo%3Bs+not+only+management+that+sees+value+in+these+sessions.+Team+leads+themselves+gave+some+really+positive+feedback+after+the+most+recent+breakaway.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26ldquo%3BI+really+enjoyed+the+day+as+a+whole%2C%26rdquo%3B+says+Jonathan+Counihan%2C+who+works+on+one+of+Entelect%26rsquo%3Bs+teams+based+at+Sage.+%26ldquo%3BI+like+the+fact+that+our+input+is+valued+and+some+actionable+items+come+out+of+it.+I+think+the+networking+aspect+is+also+very+good%2C+as+it+gives+the+leads+a+chance+to+touch+base+and+build+support+structures.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26ldquo%3BI+really+feel+part+of+the+team+the+way+the+Entelect+management+keeps+us+in+the+loop+about+the+company+strategy+and+vision.%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESchalk+Wolhuter%2C+who+leads+the+Entelect+team+at+Discovery+Vitality+RSA%2C+says%2C+%26ldquo%3BPut+a+group+of+highly+motivated+and+bright+individuals+in+a+room%2C+shake+them+a+bit+and+out+comes+ideas+and+solutions.+This+is+what+happens+at+an+Entelect+Team+Lead+breakaway.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26ldquo%3BA+properly+thought-out+scenario+list%2C+a+room+full+of+team+leads%2C+a+great+venue%26hellip%3B+and+the+only+thing+that+can+happen+is+that+problems+will+be+solved.%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E Why+we+fail+to+find+the+right+job %3Cp%3EAccording+to+a+2013+Gallup+study%2C+70%25+of+the+American+workforce+are+not+engaged+at+work.+Around+the+world%2C+across+142+countries%2C+the+proportion+of+employees+who+feel+engaged+at+work+is+just+13+percent.+LinkedIn+estimates+that+66%25+of+its+350+million+users+are+actively+or+passively+seeking+a+job.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESo+why+is+it+that+so+many+people+are+unhappy+in+their+jobs%3F+For+me+the+answer+is+simple-+people+make+career+decisions+based+on+the+wrong+reasons.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDuring+my+past+8+years+in+recruitment+I+have+interviewed+hundreds+of+people%2C+most+of+which+couldn%26rsquo%3Bt+tell+me+why+they+were+really+looking+for+a+new+job%2C+what+they+were+looking+for+in+their+next+job+or%2C+what+type+of+culture+or+environment+would+best+suit+them.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EPeople+should+be+asking+why+do+they+want+to+leave.+In+data+analytics+a+%26lsquo%3Bwhy%26rsquo%3B+analysis+goes+a+long+way.+The+process+is+to+keep+asking+%26lsquo%3Bwhy%26rsquo%3B+until+you+get+to+the+very+core+of+why+you+want+to+leave+so+that+you+can+understand+what+will+make+you+feel+fulfilled.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOften+we+take+the+first+offer%2C+or+move+just+for+more+money.+In+fact+money+is+far+too+often+associated+with+success+%26ndash%3B+we+think+if+we%26rsquo%3Bre+earning+more+money+then+it%26rsquo%3Bs+a+measure+of+how+successful+we+are.+But+a+salary+is+not+going+to+determine+how+much+you+will+be+challenged+in+your+job+or+whether+you+will+feel+fulfilled+by+the+day-to-day+work.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+the+book+%26ldquo%3BIn+Drive%3A+The+Surprising+Truth+About+What+Motivates+Us%2C%26rdquo%3B+Daniel+Pink%2C+says+that+knowledge+workers+are+motivated+by+three+things%3A+autonomy%2C+mastery+and+purpose.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAutonomy%3A+when+we+are+in+control+of+what+we+do%2C+how+we+do+it%2C+and+when+we+do+it.+That+should+always+be+the+case+in+a+true+Agile+working+environment.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMastery%3A+when+we+are+constantly+learning+and+evolving%2C+becoming+better+professionals+and+better+human+beings.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EPurpose%3A+when+we+feel+that+our+job+is+important+and+we+are+contributing+to+make+things+better%2C+instead+of+just+doing+what+we+are+told+without+understanding+why.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETherefore%2C+we+see+that+people+work+for+recognition%2C+not+money.+Understandably%2C+money+does+feature+in+the+decision+making+process.+However%2C+we+need+to+be+more+strategic+about+our+choice+and+view+money+as+one+element+rather+than+the+most+important+element.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+my+experience%2C+people+never+leave+a+job+because+they+dislike+their+salary%2C+they+become+unhappy+because+they+are+not+feeling+fulfilled+in+other+areas+of+their+role+and+then+the+salary+compounds+the+issue.+Growth+%28mastery%29%2C+a+sense+of+independence+%28autonomy%29+and+fulfilment+that+your+job+makes+a+significant+impact+on+the+lives+of+others+somehow+%28purpose%29+are+the+defining+factors.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+the+technology+industry%2C+these+issues+are+compounded+by+the+fact+that+the+industry+is+fast-paced+and+growing+exponentially.+There+are+many+new+jobs+emerging+all+the+time%2C+so+this+can+make+it+harder+to+make+your+decision.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESo+next+time+you+go+for+an+interview%2C+why+not+change+the+questions+you+prepare+for+the+interviewer+to+be+focused+on+autonomy%2C+mastery+and+purpose+and+appreciate+the+interesting+conversation+that+unfolds.+The+money+will+follow.%3C%2Fp%3E Performance+appraisals%3A+Helping+you+reach+your+full+potential %3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EPerformance+appraisals+have+a+bad+rap.+They+are+the+meetings+that+many+of+us+dread.+But%2C+the+truth+is%2C+performance+reviews+present+some+great+opportunities+if+you+know+how+to+get+the+most+out+of+them.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAppraisals+are+there+to+identify+your+potential+and+help+you+realise+your+goals.+Entelect+want+to+give+our+staff+both+the+challenges+and+tools+you+need+to+be+successful.+Appraisals+are+simply+a+great+platform+to+discuss+this+so+that+you+can+become+the+best+at+what+you+do.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+first+thing+to+remember+is+that+there+are+three+main+purposes+of+appraisals+which+are+always+constructive%3A+Alignment%2C+growth%2C+and+the+opportunity+to+have+crucial+conversations.+The+reality+is+that+everyone+comes+from+different+career+backgrounds+with+different+experiences.+While+we+all+join+a+company+with+great+capabilities%2C+our+experiences+are+different%2C+and+so+aligning+ourselves+to+the+company+and+teams+as+well+as+ensuring+we%26rsquo%3Bre+continuously+growing+is+critical.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+order+to+get+the+most+out+of+your+appraisal%2C+it+is+important+to+understand+the+expectations+of+the+session.+We+often+approach+performance+reviews+as+something+that+happens+to+us.+But+it%26rsquo%3Bs+a+two-way+street+and+our+role+in+the+appraisal+discussion+is+crucial+to+shaping+it+fully.+Specifically%2C+this+is+your+opportunity+to+let+your+manager+or+team+lead+know+what+your+goals+and+aspirations+are.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESo%2C+take+the+time+to+prepare+carefully.+If+you+review+yourself+critically%2C+consider+the+values+or+principles+that+are+important+to+you%2C+and+if+you+can+articulate+this+clearly%2C+you+will+find+the+session+far+more+constructive.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+structure+of+reviews+at+Entelect+mean+they+are+quarterly.+There+are+two+%26lsquo%3Bmajor%26rsquo%3B+sessions%3B+in+May+and+November%2C+and+then+two+%26lsquo%3Bminor%26rsquo%3B+sessions+in+March+and+August.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+%26lsquo%3Bmajor%26rsquo%3B+reviews+are+structured+to+be+%26lsquo%3B360%26rsquo%3B%2C+which+means+they+survey+your+colleagues+and+clients+throughout+your+day-to-day+role+in+order+to+obtain+a+full+view+of+your+professional+development.+This+is+done+via+an+online+tool+and+then+discussed+in+person+with+your+Account+Manager+or+Team+Lead.+Listening+is+crucial+in+this+session%2C+as+your+team+lead+will+have+taken+the+time+to+synthesise+your+%26lsquo%3B360%26rsquo%3B+feedback+and+draw+themes.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAlways+remember+that+when+someone+offers+you+feedback+%26ndash%3B+positive+or+negative+-+it+demonstrates+an+interest+and+investment+in+your+growth.+Whether+your+feedback+is+positive+or+negative%2C+learn+to+respect+all+feedback+and+understand+it+as+someone+showing+an+interest+in+your+growth+and+you+will+start+getting+more+out+of+the+sessions.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+person%26rsquo%3Bs+objective+is+to+help+you+progress+and+meet+your+full+potential.+We+all+have+blind+spots%3A+areas+of+development+that+hadn%26rsquo%3Bt+occurred+to+us.+If+these+arise+then+listening+closely+is+extremely+valuable+and+will+help+us+to+work+out+ways+to+apply+the+learnings+and+development+areas.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOf+equal+importance+is+for+the+reviewee+to+share+his+or+her+personal+experiences.+Our+personal+interpretations+of+our+workplace+are+shaped+by+our+own+experiences.+It+is+essential+that+we+are+open+and+honest+about+these+too%2C+to+help+inform+how+life+at+Entelect+looks+from+the+perspective+of+every+employee.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIndeed%2C+some+of+the+best+performance+advice+we+can+receive+is+from+our+peers.+They+work+with+us+every+day%3B+see+our+strengths+and+weaknesses%2C+wins+and+frustrations.+Therefore%2C+it+is+important+to+dedicate+enough+time+to+reviewing+your+peers+and+providing+them+with+the+kind+of+constructive+feedback+you+would+want+to+receive.+Raising+issues+is+not+something+to+shy+away+from%2C+as+long+as+they+are+substantiated+and+show+opportunity+for+growth.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEntelectuals+strive+to+be+challenged%2C+receive+recognition+for+work+well+done%2C+and+aspire+to+the+best+they+can+be.+Appraisals+will+help+you+reach+your+full+potential.+So%2C+don%26rsquo%3Bt+dread+reviews.+Be+prepared%2C+take+control+of+the+session%2C+and+apply+the+learnings+to+help+accelerate+your+career+and+be+the+best+you+can+be.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETips+on+ways+you+can+prepare+for+your+review%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Set+aside+at+least+an+hour+to+complete+your+online+form.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Don%26rsquo%3Bt+rush+it.+Find+a+quiet+place+where+you+can+think+clearly.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Be+honest%2C+open+and+thorough.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Remember+that+ratings+mean+nothing+without+comments.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Take+the+time+to+read+your+team+members+feedback%2C+and+identify+the+points+that+stick+out.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+Prepare+a+set+of+notes+for+your+discussion+to+ensure+you+cover+everything+that+is+important+to+you+and+to+help+guide+the+conversation.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E Tim+Kroon+%28Entelect%3A+Chief+Operations+Officer%29+%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E+Performance+appraisals+can+be+a+stressful+time.+But+if+you+know+how+to+get+the+most+out+of+them+they+can+present+you+with+great+opportunities+to+discover+your+potential. How+software+engineering+candidates+can+create+an+impact+in+a+highly+competitive+market %3Cp%3EDemand+for+software+engineering+skills+continues+to+rise.+According+to+a+report+issued+by+The+Joburg+Centre+for+Software+Engineering+%28%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.wits.ac.za%2Fmedia%2Fwits-university%2Fnews-and-events%2Fimages%2Fdocuments%2FJCSE%2520Skills%2520Survey.pdf%22%3EJCSE+Skills+Survey%3C%2Fa%3E%29%2C+a+University+of+Witwatersrand+partnership+with+government+and+industry%2C+there+is+%26lsquo%3Ban+immediate+unsatisfied+need+for+skills+in+the+ICT+sector%26hellip%3B%26rsquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAt+the+end+of+2015%2C+a+paper+from+Empirica+%28%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.empirica.com%2Fhome.html%22%3Eempirica%3C%2Fa%3E%29+indicated+that%2C+%26lsquo%3Bthe+European+market+could+absorb+756+000+ICT+practitioners+by+2020+if+sufficient+supply+was+available%26rsquo%3B.+And+in+June+2016%2C+Cisco+announced+that+it+will+invest+%2410+million+over+two+years+in+a+scholarship+programme+to+increase+the+pool+of+talent+%28%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Finvestor.cisco.com%2Finvestor-relations%2Fnews-and-events%2Fnews%2Fnews-details%2F2016%2FCisco-Launches-10-Million-Global-Cybersecurity-Scholarship-to-Increase-Talent-Pool-Introduces-New-and-Updated-Certifications%2Fdefault.aspx%22%3Einvestor.cisco%3C%2Fa%3E%29.+Locally%2C+the+May+2016+edition+of+the+Career+Junction+Index+showed+that+Software+Development+remained+the+most+sought-after+skillset+on+the+Career+Junction+website+and+just+25%25+of+those+jobs+available+in+December+2016+were+filled+%28%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Finvestor.cisco.com%2Finvestor-relations%2Fnews-and-events%2Fnews%2Fnews-details%2F2016%2FCisco-Launches-10-Million-Global-Cybersecurity-Scholarship-to-Increase-Talent-Pool-Introduces-New-and-Updated-Certifications%2Fdefault.aspx%22%3ECJI+Executive+Summary%3C%2Fa%3E%29.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+reality+is+that%2C+large+software+engineering+companies+are+competing+for+skills+and+resources+to+deliver+against+the+business+opportunities%2C+which+are+being+driven+by+traditional+industries+such+as+financial+services%2C+insurance+and+healthcare+sectors.+But+the+competition+is+tough.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ECompanies+competing+in+the+IT+space+are+continuously+looking+for+ways+to+set+themselves+apart+from+their+competitors%2C+which+is+resulting+in+increased+demand+for+high-quality+software+engineering+candidates.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+year%2C+Entelect+took+on+40+of+the+top+Computer+Science+and+Engineering+candidates+in+the+country%2C+up+from+30+in+2016.+On+an+average+month%2C+Entelect+employ+anywhere+between+5-10+full-time+employees%2C+which+is+testament+to+the+number+of+opportunities+out+there+at+the+moment.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBut+unlike+many+other+industries%2C+the+South+African+Software+industry+should+be+considered+as+having+a+supply+issue%2C+rather+than+a+demand+issue.+That+means+the+industry+simply+cannot+fill+the+jobs+available+with+the+necessary+skills.+Computer+Science+and+Engineering+is+still+listed+by+the+Department+of+Higher+Education+and+training+as+a+scarce+skill+%28%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.dhet.gov.za%2FGazette%2FGovernment%2520Gazette%2520No%252039604%2C%252019%2520January%25202016.%2520List%2520of%2520Occupations%2520in%2520High%2520Demand%25202015.pdf%22%3EDHET+scarce+skills%3C%2Fa%3E%29+and+although+graduates+are+increasing%2C+it+is+not+at+the+pace+the+industry+needs.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+our+view%2C+the+most+sought-after+skills+in+the+industry+at+the+moment+include+Java%2C+C%23+and+Angular%2C+and+typically%2C+candidates+with+these+skills+are+in+high-demand.+However%2C+it+would+be+wrong+to+assume+that+because+there+is+a+supply+challenge%2C+this+means+it+is+easy+to+get+a+job+in+software+engineering.+The+reality+is+that+continuous+increases+in+security%2C+big+data+and+consumer+lifestyles+makes+this+industry+the+backbone+of+many+other%2C+more+established+industries.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHence%2C+this+supply+issue+places+a+challenge+on+the+companies+because+service+standards+must+remain+high.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESoftware+engineers+need+to+demonstrate+technical+accuracy+and+extremely+high+levels+of+craftsmanship+in+every+aspect+of+their+job.+The+industry+moves+too+quickly+to+absorb+mistakes+and+technical+errors+so+candidates+must+demonstrate+exceptional+skills.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHowever%2C+technical+accuracy+alone+is+not+enough.+Candidates+are+also+required+to+demonstrate+other%2C+softer+skills%2C+which+will+positively+impact+their+ability+to+deliver+effective+solutions+in+teams%2C+but+these+are+often+overlooked+by+candidates+when+selling+themselves+in+an+interview.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ECraftsmanship%3A+The+drive+to+transform+what+is+currently+a+skill+into+an+art+of+exceptional+ability.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEQ%3A+Self-awareness+and+having+a+deep+understanding+of+oneself+is+an+important+skill+when+managing+teams+and+clients+effectively.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EArticulate%3A+The+ability+to+express+ideas+clearly+and+with+a+high-energy+drive+efficiencies+and+productivity+in+the+workplace%2C+especially+when+working+on+tough+projects+with+tight+deadlines.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETeam+spirit%3A+People+who+have+a+strong+team+spirit+tend+to+be+collaborative%2C+which+is+critical+for+identifying+the+best+solution+for+the+project+or+problem.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EConfidence+and+passion%3A+These+traits+drive+behaviours+such+as+the+desire+to+learn+new+skills%2C+techniques+or+technologies+quickly%2C+to+go+above+and+beyond+your+daily+tasks+and+to+bring+creative+flair+to+their+role.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOnce+a+candidate+can+demonstrate+that+they+have+the+exceptional+skills+to+create+an+impact%2C+the+opportunities+available+as+an+employee+in+this+industry+are+extensive.+Apart+from+exposure+to+cutting-edge+innovation%2C+there+are+many+other+less+obvious+benefits+that+candidates+will+be+exposed+to+which+are%2C+arguably%2C+unique+to+this+industry.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFirstly%2C+in+a+new+industry+there+are+many+opportunities+to+create+new+solutions+and+address+new+problems.+This+means+that+the+occasion+to+practice+autonomy+is+far+greater+than+in+well-established+industries+where+there+are+pre-defined+best+practices+and+rules+of+engagement.+Autonomy+is+a+significant+growth+accelerator.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESecondly%2C+there+is+the+opportunity+to+become+a+master+in+your+field.+The+competitive+nature+of+the+software+industry+means+that+companies+are+looking+for+true+crafts+men+and+women.+Being+exceptional+is+the+flavour+of+the+day.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThirdly%2C+purpose.+Employees+today+are+looking+for+purpose+in+their+jobs.+Software+engineering+is+often+considered+the+backbone+of+many+industries+and+as+such%2C+every+problem+software+engineering+solves+will+ultimately+better+or+improve+the+lives+of+others+somehow.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EGiven+this%2C+when+recruiters+talk+about+%26lsquo%3Bopportunities%26rsquo%3B+in+software+engineering%2C+they+are+not+just+talking+about+the+number+of+jobs+available+in+the+market%2C+although+this+is+very+true.+They+are+talking+about+the+opportunities+for+growth%2C+personal+development+and+purpose+which+are+presented+by+a+relatively+new+industry+that+is+at+the+forefront+of+innovation.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EUndoubtedly%2C+the+future+of+the+software+industry+is+on+an+exciting+trajectory.+The+pace+of+innovation+means+that+competition+will+remain+extremely+high.+Candidates+that+can+reap+the+rewards+of+this+industry+are+those+who+can+offer+exceptional+craftsmanship+and+understand+the+value+of+the+softer+skills+in+the+delivery+of+the+most+agile+and+effective+services+and+solutions+a+client+can+employ.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIt+is+important+to+consider+what+additional+skills+you+can+offer+a+software+company+that+will+help+set+them+apart+from+their+competitors.+Understand+the+marketplace%2C+and+your+position+in+it.+There+are+many+good+software+developers%2C+but+exceptional+ones+are+far+fewer+between.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E Carmen+Williams+%28Entelect+General+Manager%2C+Talent+Acquisition%29+%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E+The+IT+industry+continues+to+grow+and+with+it%2C+the+demand+for+software+engineering+skills.+But+how+can+software+engineering+candidates+create+in+an+impact+in+a+highly+competitive+market. ["Teams and culture"] Carmen.jpg
The+journey+to+becoming+a+Data+Scientist. %3Cp%3EThe+role+of+the+data+scientist+is+one+of+the+broadest+roles+in+the+software+engineering+field+at+the+moment+with+the+expectations+on+these+individuals+being+extremely+high.+However%2C+there+is+growing+controversy+around+the+roles+and+responsibilities+of+a+Data+Scientist+and+at+what+point+can+you+fairly+call+yourself+a+Data+Scientist.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETo+begin%2C+we+need+to+be+cognisant+that+the+industry+itself%2C+especially+in+South+Africa%2C+is+in+its+infancy.+So+industry+standards+which+outline+the+breadth+of+knowledge+required+on+Big+Data+and+Analytics+technologies+have+yet+to+be+defined.+Although%2C+fundamentally%2C+the+role+of+the+Data+Scientist+is+closely+linked+to+being+Big+Data+developers+and+implementers+of+solutions+that+encompass+large+amounts+of+structured+and+unstructured+data.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHowever%2C+when+hiring+Data+Scientists%2C+we+need+to+understand+that+there+are+only+a+handful+of+people+with+experience+across+the+board.+Organisations+are+mostly+hiring+people+with+pockets+of+knowledge+or%2C+graduates+or+juniors+with+the+right+passion.+In+reality%2C+Data+Scientists+have+many+years+of+experience+and+a+breadth+and+depth+of+knowledge+that+is+relatively+unique.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAt+Entelect%2C+we+believe+the+journey+to+Data+Scientist+begins+as+either+a+Big+Data+Engineer+or+a+Big+Data+Analyst%2C+and+there+is+an+important+distinction+between+the+two+roles.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+Engineers+are+traditionally+from+a+Software+Engineering+background.+They+have+spent+some+time+in+the+trenches+learning+Linux%2C+networking+and+the+Hadoop+ecosystem.+I%26rsquo%3Bm+not+limiting+the+Engineer+role+to+the+Apache+technologies%2C+most+vendors+are+releasing+amazing+solutions+that+would+classify+them+into+the+Big+Data+field%3B+however%2C+they+are+leveraging+the+initial+architecture+and+concepts+of+Hadoop.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+Analysts+typically+come+from+a+Maths+and+Statistics+background.+They+have+been+tinkering+with+databases%2C+ETL%26rsquo%3Bs+and+ELT%26rsquo%3Bs+as+well+as+basic+data+mining+models.+These+guys+understand+the+difference+between+supervised+and+unsupervised+learning%2C+what+a+random+forest+is%2C+and+a+vast+array+of+other+analytics+techniques.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBoth+these+roles+set+extremely+strong+foundations+on+the+path+to+becoming+a+Data+Scientist+thanks+to+their+problem-solving+skills%2C+both+technical+and+logical.%26nbsp%3B+At+this+point%2C+these+individuals+are+now+set+to+start+moving+up+the+ranks+in+terms+of+Data+Science.+However%2C+there+are+still+a+number+of+learning+imperatives+required+before+becoming+a+Data+Scientist.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAt+Entelect%2C+we+have+established+a+training+path+to+take+these+individuals+towards+the+end+goal+of+being+a+Data+Scientist.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EMoving+to+junior+or+intermediate+level%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThere+are+several+decisions+the+engineers+and+analysts+need+to+make.+Initially%2C+a+lot+of+them+are+related+to+breadth+versus+depth+of+knowledge.+I+have+always+believed+you+should+develop+a+vast+breadth+of+knowledge+across+all+relevant+technology+stacks+and+then+focus+on+achieving+depth+of+knowledge+in+relevant+areas+over+time.+If+you+are+really+committed%2C+this+means+you+end+up+with+both+breadth+and+depth+of+knowledge.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETo+tackle+this%2C+the+data+solutions+side+of+Entelect+created+a+roadmap+designed+to+take+a+Big+Data+Engineer+or+Analyst+through+a+structured+programme+to+provide+the+breadth+across+the+engineer+and+analyst+role.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+is+similar+to+the+Entelect+Graduate+Bootcamp+%28https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DsFNj6fzOIAc%29%2C+where+graduates+or+juniors+are+provided+with+an+overview+of+the+main+stream+technologies%2C+which+helps+them+develop+a+breadth+of+skill+and+from+there%2C+the+Graduates+can+move+into+specific+areas+of+software.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFor+the+data+solutions+training+programme%2C+we+leverage+a+few+of+the+MOOC%26rsquo%3Bs%2C+a+host+of+our+internal+training+material+but+most+importantly+we+use+something+known+as+a+Structured+Incubators+approach.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+Structured+Incubators+provide+real-world+scenarios+filled+with+mini+challenges+designed+to+expose+everyone+to+all+aspects+of+the+Big+Data+environment.+It+covers+everything+from+installing+and+configuring+Linux+clusters%2C+all+the+way+through+to+running+their+first+data+mining+model.+Several+technologies+are+used%2C+however+the+concepts+learnt+during+these+incubators+are+the+key+to+success.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+most+important+key+to+a+successful+incubator+is+constant+mentoring.+At+Entelect+we+have+attracted+several+Big+Data+Engineers+and+Analysts+and+provide+constant+support+to+aspiring+Data+Scientists.+Constant+feedback+loops+are+given+to+the+participants+though+various+mediums%2C+frequent+show+and+tell+sessions+are+conducted%2C+and+several+ad+hoc+challenges+are+given+to+the+participants%2C+ranging+from+taking+2+days+out+to+enter+a+Kaggle+competition+all+the+way+through+to+producing+some+real-world+analytics+on+relevant+subjects+%28http%3A%2F%2Fsource.technology%2Fpolitical-party-analysis%29.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ERegardless+of+experience+in+the+field%2C+the+initial+training+programme+must+be+followed+by+all+our+engineers.+If+a+person+has+experience+in+setting+up+clusters+they+are+still+required+to+complete+the+entire+incubation+period+to+ensure+that+everyone+is+on+the+same+minimum+level.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe+have+seen+great+success+with+this%2C+constantly+pushing+the+guys+out+of+their+comfort+zone%2C+throwing+them+in+the+deep+end+and+making+sure+we+provide+the+support+for+them+to+float.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+initial+period+takes+roughly+10+weeks+to+achieve+a+broad+overview.+At+this+stage+the+individual+is+still+operating+at+a+Big+Data+engineer+or+analyst+level.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EMoving+to+intermediate+level%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+field+changes+far+too+quickly+for+anyone+to+stand+still+and+rest+on+their+laurels+for+6+months+so+growth+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+optional.+We+strive+to+help+our+engineers+and+analysts+experience+a+variety+of+industry+verticals+and+technologies+to+support+their+growth.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAt+this+point%2C+data+engineers+and+analysts+start+finding+their+passion+and+gaining+a+depth+of+knowledge+in+a+certain+area.+This+is+not+a+career+direction%2C+but+more+a+career+enhancement.+The+learning+paths+change+slightly+and+more+focus+is+given+to+the+relevant+area+of+interest.+However%2C+growth+in+the+other+areas+never+stop.+If+someone+enjoy+doing+the+data+analysis+we+would+focus+the+training+roadmap+more+on+R%2FMachine+Learning%2FPython+aspects.+However%2C+there+will+still+be+investment+in+furthering+the+knowledge+on+the+engineering+side+and+vice+versa.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+roadmap+for+career+growth+is+a+long+one.+We+estimate+roughly+two+years+of+part-time+focus+to+achieve+solid%2C+well-rounded+knowledge+to+become+a+Junior+Data+Scientist.+This+would+encompass+understanding+SQL%2C+NoSQL+HQL%2C+Linux%2C+Windows%2C+Spark+and+another+90+technologies+relevant+to+data+science.+All+of+this+needs+to+be+coupled+with+real+world+experience+across+various+industry+domains+to+develop+the+entire+picture+of+implementations%2C+use+cases+and+critical+success+factors+of+big+data+projects.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ESo+now+you+are+a+junior+data+scientist%2C+what%26rsquo%3Bs+next%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAt+this+point+you+should+be+able+to+take+a+blank+slate%2C+setup+a+big+data+environment%2C+ingest+data%2C+execute+useful+analytics+and+provide+a+presentation+layer+to+any+organisation+you+are+at.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+next+step+is+to+continue+deepening+your+knowledge%2C+the+focus+is+then+put+on+advanced+statistics%2C+graph+theory%2C+advanced+data+structures%2C+streaming+analytics+and+finally+we+move+into+the+Probabilistic+Modelling+and+Deep+Learning.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOnce+you+have+proven+competency%2C+a+solid+track+record+and+a+vast+breadth+and+depth+of+knowledge%2C+at+this+point+you+are+considered+a+Data+Scientist.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAs+the+industry+becomes+more+established%2C+we+expect+to+see+this+path+to+Data+Scientist+becoming+more+commonplace.+At+Entelect%2C+we+use+the+roadmap+to+ensure+our+Data+Scientists+are+true+craftsmen+in+their+field+and+can+consistently+provide+the+highest+quality+service+and+solutions+to+their+clients+at+all+times.%3C%2Fp%3E Loyalty%3A+A+morphing+concept+in+the+age+of+a+fluid+workforce %3Cp%3EFor+many+years%2C+loyalty+in+the+business+environment+was+measured+by+tenure+or+resignations.+However%2C+this+is+the+age+of+the+fluid+workforce.+That+which+motivates+Millennials+to+stay+or+leave+a+company+is+driven+by+many+things%2C+several+which+are+largely+out+of+the+hands+of+HR+managers.+Unless+they+reframe+their+understanding+of+loyalty.%26nbsp%3B+Says+Yatish+Parshotam%2C+Chief+People+Officer%2C+Entelect.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+baby+boomer+generation+tended+to+stay+in+one+job+for+their+entire+working+career.+My+dad+is+a+great+example+of+this+having+been+a+shipping+manager+for+a+company+for+25+years.+His+previous+job+was+for+15+years.+In+neither+job%2C+did+he+receive+fancy+perks+or+bonuses%2C+there+were+no+%26lsquo%3Bpause%26rsquo%3B+areas+or+coffee+machines.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHowever%2C+fast+forward+to+the+Millennials+workforce+and+we%26rsquo%3Bre+seeing+a+dramatic+shift+in+the+mind-sets+of+our+employees.+The+pace+of+employee+needs+and+demands+in+the+workplace+has+changed.+Along+with+their+expectations+of+management.+For+some+while%2C+the+phrase+%26lsquo%3Bpeople+leave+their+managers+not+the+company%26rsquo%3B+may+have+been+true%2C+but+it+does+not+sufficiently+address+the+reason+for+leaving.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAccording+to+a+recent+industry+surveys%2C%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+29%25+of+millennials+are+engaged+at+work%2C+16%25+are+actively+disengaged%2C+55%25+are+not+engaged+%28gallup%29%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+21%25+of+millennials+say+they%26%2339%3Bve+changed+jobs+within+the+past+year%2C+more+than+3x%26nbsp%3Bthe+number+of+non-millennials+%28gallup%29%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+44%25%26nbsp%3Bof+Millennials+say%2C+if+given+the+choice%2C+they+expect+to+leave+their+current+employers+in+the+next+two+years+%28deloitte%29%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMany+companies+today+have+adopted+new+policies+and+practices+to+provide+an+environment+that+supports+and+encourages+Millennials.+There+are+great+work+opportunities%2C+succession+planning%2C+well-defined+growth+paths%2C+autonomy%2C+health+programmes%2C+training+and+mentorship.+But+employees+still+leave.+Why%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDoes+this+mean+that+employees+today+are+not+loyal+or%2C+should+we+be+redefining+our+definition+of+loyalty%3F+Our+reality+is+that+we+live+in+an+age+of+a+Fluid+workforce+so+can+loyalty+still+exist+and+if+so%2C+what+drives+loyalty+in+this+environment%3F+In+my+opinion%2C+employee+engagement+is+one+of+the+key+factors.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETypically%2C+people+leave+because+there+is+a+deeper+cultural+misalignment+with+the+company.+Companies+need+to+recognize+that+loyalty+is+a+two-way+street.+That+means+not+only+providing+employees+with+growth+and+development+opportunities+but+also+taking+the+time+to+engage+with+them+personally+and+understand+their+aspirations.+This+is+most+authentic+when+the+support+offered+is+entirely+selfless.+Sometimes%2C+that+means+encouraging+people+to+follow+their+passions+even+if+that+means+they+move+out+of+your+organization.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+reality+is+people+will+leave.+That+is+the+nature+of+today%26rsquo%3Bs+fluid+workforce.+However%2C+loyalty+is+something+that+begins+within+the+organisation%2C+but+it+could+reach+far+beyond+the+four+walls+of+your+business.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhen+people+leave+our+company%2C+they+do+so+for+many+reasons%2C+some+of+which+are+personal+and%2C+which+no+counter-offer+can+address.+But+if+that+person+knew+there+was+an+authentic%2C+selfless+interest+in+their+personal+development+and+growth%2C+then+they+will+remain+loyal+to+your+company+beyond+their+duration+with+you.+Because+employees+who+move+on%2C+do+so+with+the+value+you%26rsquo%3Bve+contributed+to+them.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFor+the+past+three+years%2C+Entelect+have+participated+in+the+Deloitte+Best+Company+Survey.+This+past+year%2C+our+results+reflected+some+of+this+thinking%2C+specifically+around+building+loyalty+with+employees+in+a+way+that+reaches+beyond+the+four+walls+of+this+business%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+93%25+of+respondents+felt+that+in+the+last+year+they%26rsquo%3Bd+had+the+opportunity+to+grow+and+learn%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+94%25+of+employees+believed+that+this+company+cares+about+developing+people+for+long-term+careers%2C+not+just+the+current+job%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+95%25+said+they+could+identify+with+the+values+of+the+organization%2C+and%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B+94%25+said+there+is+a+feeling+of+trust+throughout+the+organisation%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+real+terms%2C+practices+that+achieve+results+like+these+means+your+employees+will+likely+continue+to+be+your+brand+ambassador+beyond+their+time+with+you.+And+that+they+will+do+so+out+of+a+genuine+appreciation+for+the+value+you+have+contributed+to+their+growth.+They+may+wish+to+return+to+your+company%2C+provide+high+quality+referrals+or%2C+you+may+find+that+strategic+business+partnerships+emerge+that+could+have+far+reaching+benefits+for+the+future.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+my+role%2C+working+for+a+software+engineering+company%2C+my+greatest+excitement+comes+from+not+only+helping+people+grow+in+their+roles+but+as+people+in+their+personal+lives+as+well.+When+they+move+on%2C+their+relationship+with+our+organization+remains+strong+because+of+the+value+we+have+contributed+to+them+professionally%2C+and+personally.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ECompanies+must+demonstrate+loyalty+to+their+employees+by+treating+and+investing+in+them+as+though+they+will+be+with+you+forever.+You+will+never+be+able+to+control+the+market%3B+competitor+hiring+strategies%2C+economic+downturns%2C+or+consumer+trends.+But+if+you+focus+on+the+individuals%2C+your+company+will+be+far+stronger.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEngage+with+your+employees+on+a+personal+level+and+selflessly+put+their+growth+first.+This+is+where+loyalty+starts.+But+there+is+no+reason+loyalty+should+end+here.+Employees+valued+in+this+way+will+remain+loyal+to+your+organization+for+a+very+long+time+and+the+relationship+could+grow+into+something+more+than+either+of+you+expected.%3C%2Fp%3E
