The+importance+of+socialization+at+work %3Cp%3EWhat+is+the+purpose+of+socialization%3F+For+many+years%2C+socialization+in+the+workplace+was+a+way+to+help+employees+%26lsquo%3Blet+their+hair+down%26rsquo%3B+after+a+long+week.+Friday+night+bar+or+braai+was+a+way+to+give+back+to+employees.+But+company+culture+is+going+through+a+transition.+Employees+now+expect+more+connectedness+with+their+company.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAccording+to+Professor+Matthew+Lieberman%2C+human+interaction+is+a+basic+human+need%2C+which+he+equates+to+our+need+for+food+and+shelter.+%26ldquo%3BBeing+socially+connected+is+our+brains+lifelong+passion%26rdquo%3B+says+Prof+Lieberman.+As+such%2C+socialization+has+several+purposes+and+outcomes+which+should+not+be+dismissed+when+we+shift+into+a+business+environment.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+simple+truth+is+that+fostering+friendships+at+work+helps+employee+engagement.+It+creates+a+positive+environment+where+employees+feel+connected+and+can+develop+a+sense+of+purpose+with+their+peers.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOften%2C+socialization+takes+place+within+obvious+groups+such+as+project+teams.+But+it+should+also+be+encouraged+across+traditional+business+boundaries+to+help+stimulate+a+sense+of+connectedness+with+the+company.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBoundaries+can+be+created+around+teams%2C+hierarchical+groups%2C+personal+interest+groups+or+career+goals.+Sometimes+they+are+obvious%2C+sometimes+far+less+apparent.+But+socialization+is+something+that+can+traverse+any+boundary%3B+a+junior+to+a+senior+on+another+team%2C+two+people+striving+for+promotions+in+different+sectors%2C+or+weekend+interests.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHowever%2C+developing+communities+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+easy.+It+requires+a+company+to+provide+platforms+and+environments+that+support+and+promote+relationship+building.+This+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+just+Friday+night+bar%2C+although+those+kind+of+events+does+serve+a+purpose.+The+initiatives+must+be+part+of+a+bigger+strategic%2C+thought-through%2C+program+to+promote+relationship+building+across+various+%26lsquo%3Bboundaries%26rsquo%3B.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhat+should+be+the+true+intent+of+Socialization%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+true+intent+of+socialization+is+two-fold%3B+to+create+camaraderie+which+serves+to+drive+accountability+and+delivery+in+the+work+place%2C+but+also+employee+engagement+which+leads+to+job+satisfaction+and+a+sense+of+personal+fulfillment.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHowever%2C+these+goals+can+fall+apart+if+the+company+in+question+does+not+appreciate+that+relationships+are+not+merely+a+means+to+an+end%2C+but+an+end+in+itself%3B+one+that+must+be+authentic.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ECamaraderie+is+a+key+feature+of+a+successful+team+because+it+creates+a+sense+of+mutual+accountability+and+responsibility.+Employees+who+have+a+sense+of+accountability%2C+responsibility%2C+and+self-fulfillment+are+more+likely+to+stay+engaged+in+the+workplace.+Hence+it+can+logically+be+considered+to+have+a+positive+effect+on+retention%2C+as+these+features+relate+to+personal+development.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESo%2C+what+should+your+company+do+to+promote+community+and+socialization%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWithout+knowing+it%2C+socialization+starts+on+your+first+day%3B+introductions%2C+onboarding.+Already+there+is+a+connection+made+in+those+first+few+hours+and+days+as+people+get+to+know+each+other.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThen+there+are+the+connections+made+as+people+join+project+teams+and+begin+to+integrate+themselves+into+roles+and+take+on+responsibilities.+However%2C+very+often%2C+this+is+where+socialization+begins+to+fade.+The+pressures+of+the+project+deadlines+mean+that+work+becomes+the+focus+and+socialization+quickly+moves+to+second+place.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOne+should+realize+that+socialization+is+an+ongoing+practice+that+never+ends.+Once+you%26rsquo%3Bve+settled+into+your+team%2C+there+are+opportunities+to+socialize+with+new+employees%2C+or+form+a+relationship+with+your+client%2C+which+leads+to+more+opportunities+to+socialize+and+engage+with+clients+from+different+departments.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAlthough+after+work+drinks+can+be+a+great+social+tool+in+its+simplest+form%2C+relationship+building+at+work+serves+the+greater+purpose+of+providing+personal+and+professional+support.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ECompanies+must+spend+considerable+thinking+time+dedicated+to+establishing+various+and+multiple+social+opportunities.+In+some+instances%2C+this+may+feature+as+part+of+an+appraisal+or+a+less+formal+growth+objective%2C+where+the+employee+makes+a+considerable+effort+to+attend+the+social+activities+or+even+manage+arrange+the+social+activities.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ENon-traditional+examples+of+socialization+initiatives+include+community+events+such+as+User+Groups+and+Entelect%26rsquo%3Bs+DevDay.+Social+investment+initiatives%2C+such+as+the+Entelect+Foundation%2C+or+sports+events+are+more+typical+activities+that+companies+such+as+Entelect+use+to+help+break+down+traditional+boundaries+in+the+work+place+and+encourage+their+staff+to+create+relationships+across+teams%2C+projects+or+hierarchies.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAt+Entelect+the+Social+Clubs+are+run+by+employees%2C+where+they+have+full+ownership+and+autonomy+of+their+clubs.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETake+the+mountain+climbing+club+for+example.+They+meet+once+a+month+whereby+the+venue+will+either+be+indoor+or+outdoor+and+the+tools+required+for+climbing+are+sponsored+by+Entelect.+A+typical+day+would+include+10-20+people+including+the+spouse+or+plus+1.+Then+you+have+a+good+3-4+hours+of+community+building%2C+cross-team+teamwork+and+support+for+their+fellow+climbers.+The+day+after+the+event%2C+pictures+are+shared+on+the+internal+social+platform+and+plenty+of+jokes+and+chatter+around+the+day+and+events+as+they+transpired.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESocialization+however%2C+is+also+very+personal.+Some+people+prefer+to+socialize+in+large+groups+where+there+is+lots+of+energy+such+as+the+climbing+club.+Whereas+other+people+prefer+to+socialize+in+small+groups+or+one-on-one.+Companies+need+to+find+ways+to+support+and+facilitate+these+different+connecting+styles%2C+otherwise+company+culture+will+become+exclusive+rather+than+inclusive%2C+which+is+ultimately+the+goal.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EA+good+example+of+a+way+to+engage+with+people+who+prefer+smaller+groups+is+to+invite+a+fellow+employee+from+a+different+team+on+a+coffee+run.+Or+to+join+the+Chess+Club+at+Entelect%2C+where+they+meet+bi-monthly.+These+interactions+present+less+social+pressure+and+can+often+result+in+making+a+stronger+connection+as+it%26rsquo%3Bs+one-on-one.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EGiven+the+importance+of+socialization%2C+many+companies+should+make+sure+that+it+is+a+key+part+of+their+culture.+Whenever+someone+asks+me%2C+why+do+I+drive+the+social+culture+in+a+company+as+much+as+much+as+I+do%2C+my+response+always+comes+down+to+the+following%3B+One-third+or+more+of+your+day+are+spent+at+the+office.+You+can+just+as+well+build+relationships+and+community%2C+as+it+is+so+much+more+fulfilling+in+your+working+environment+when+you+collaborate+and+feel+that+you+belong.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEmployees+expectation+of+companies+is+most+certainly+shifting%2C+and+companies+need+to+view+an+employees+desire+to+belong+as+positive.+While+this+places+a+few+extra+demands+on+a+company+to+ensure+they+are+providing+relationship+development+opportunities+for+every+type+of+personality%2C+they+must+remember+that+creating+camaraderie+in+the+workplace+and+improving+employee+engagement+will+lead+to+job+satisfaction+and+a+sense+of+personal+fulfillment+for+everyone+in+the+workplace.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E Why+you+should+be+uncomfortable+as+a+manager %3Cp%3EI+built+an+oscilloscope+the+other+day.+I%26rsquo%3Bm+not+sure+what+I%26rsquo%3Bm+going+to+do+with+it+but+the+point+is+that+I+built+it+and%2C+in+doing+so%2C+I+learnt+a+few+things%2C+including+how+to+present+information+meaningfully+on+a+small+device%2C+which+is+becoming+more+relevant+in+the+field+of+software+development.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFor+a+few+hours%2C+I+was+out+of+my+comfort+zone+but+I+was+learning%2C+researching+and+understanding+new+concepts.+The+fact+that+I+had+an+oscilloscope+to+show+for+it+was+a+bonus+but+what+really+mattered+was+the+journey+of+creating+something%2C+of+problem-solving%2C+and+that+incomparable+sense+of+achievement+when+it+was+finally+finished.+Even+if+it+was+3am+and+I+knew+the+kids+would+be+looking+for+breakfast+in+a+few+hours.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+process+of+learning+and+creating+got+me+thinking+about+leadership+in+the+fast-moving+technology+space.+In+the+new+age%2C+our+comfort+zone+is+the+danger+zone%2C+and+if+we+don%26rsquo%3Bt+occasionally+step+out+of+the+boundaries+of+what+we+know%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+impossible+to+stay+relevant+and+to+keep+our+finger+on+the+pulse+of+this+dynamic+industry.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EGet+comfortable+with+being+uncomfortable%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EToo+often%2C+managers+get+bogged+down+by+administrative+tasks%2C+performance+reviews+and+growing+the+business.+While+this+is+important+because+it+keeps+our+heads+above+the+trees%2C+we+also+risk+losing+touch+with+the+industry+because+we+can%26rsquo%3Bt+see+the+wood+for+those+trees.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ELearning+is+one+of+the+driving+cultural+principles+at+Entelect.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+how+we+increase+our+value+to+our+peers%2C+colleagues+and+clients.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+how+we+find+new+and+novel+approaches+to+problems+and+services.+But+most+importantly%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+how+we+stay+relevant+in+our+field.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ELearning+forces+you+to+think+outside+of+the+boundaries+of+what+you+deal+with+on+a+daily+basis%2C+exposing+you+to+new+technologies+and+industries%2C+and+giving+you+an+opportunity+to+apply+your+knowledge+and+systems+to+other+problems.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EColour+outside+the+lines%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EManagers+often+reach+a+level+where+engagement+with+junior+staff%2C+potential+and+existing+clients%2C+and+the+industry+as+a+whole+is+not+possible+because+their+focus+is+on+business+development.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBut+what+if+I+told+you+that+the+business+development+we+strive+for+is+just+on+the+outside+of+our+comfort+zone%3F+It%26rsquo%3Bs+on+the+ground%2C+among+the+coders+who+are+deploying+systems+and+meeting+deadlines%3B+it%26rsquo%3Bs+on+social+media%2C+connecting+with+people+who+share+your+passion+for+home+automation+and+can+help+you+figure+out+why+your+swimming+pool+light+won%26rsquo%3Bt+turn+off+automatically.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+in+the+audience+at+a+Bitcoin+conference%2C+even+though+you+work+for+an+environmental+NGO.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBy+spending+time+on+site%2C+managers+not+only+get+a+chance+to+see+what+coders+are+working+on+and+to+get+a+better+appreciation+of+the+challenges+they+face%2C+but+they+also+have+an+opportunity+to+connect%2C+to+share+ideas+and+knowledge%2C+and+to+identify+opportunities+to+do+things+differently+or+to+elevate+a+task+to+become+a+standard.+By+pulling+ideas+from+the+learner%2C+the+hobbyist+and+the+person+in+the+delivery+stream%2C+managers+will+instinctively+know+how+and+where+to+grow+the+business.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+new+comfort+zone+for+managers+is+not+behind+a+desk%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+on+the+ground%2C+fetching+coffee+and+pizza+while+the+team+works+towards+deadlines.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+among+the+coders+and+tinkerers+at+user+groups+and+dev+days.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+attending+industry+conferences+on+topics+we+know+little+about.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+engaging+on+social+media%2C+forming+relationships+with+like-minded+people+and+building+trust.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETechnology+changes+rapidly.+Getting+comfortable+with+the+way+things+are+and+by+only+operating+within+the+boundaries+of+our+business+is+dangerous+territory+and+puts+us+on+a+fast-track+to+irrelevancy.+But+by+engaging%2C+learning%2C+sharing%2C+having+an+opinion+and+finding+a+creative+outlet%2C+we+earn+the+trust+and+respect+of+our+colleagues+and+clients%2C+and+there%26rsquo%3Bs+no+substitute+for+that+in+the+professional+services+industry.+You+might+end+up+with+a+pile+of+useless+oscilloscopes%2C+but+I+promise+the+journey+of+getting+there+will+be+worth+it.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ENow%2C+excuse+me+while+I+figure+out+how+to+automate+my+swimming+pool+light+before+the+kids+wake+up+for+breakfast.%3C%2Fp%3E How+software+communities+can+create+jobs+and+stimulate+the+economy %3Cp%3EThe+South+African+economy+is+at+a+tipping+point.+Slow+economic+growth+and+the+recent+downgrading+of+the+sovereign+rating+has+dire+consequences+for+job+creation+and+business+growth.+In+times+like+these%2C+businesses+start+looking+at+where+they+can+cut+costs+and+jobs+are+usually+the+first+on+the+chopping+block.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBut+the+software+industry+is+well-positioned+to+buck+this+trend%2C+to+create+jobs+through+learning+opportunities+and+to+spearhead+innovation+that+can+help+businesses+cut+costs+and+improve+efficiencies+in+other+areas.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDigital+transformation+has+become+a+massive+focus+in+recent+years.+Spend+in+the+e-business+sector+continues+to+rise%2C+with+BMI+TechKnowledge+putting+spend+on+IT+services+at+R63+billion+in+2016%2C+up+from+R56.9+billion+in+2015.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EReasons+for+this+shift+include+increased+access+to+the+internet%3B+the+Internet+of+Things+changing+how+people+are+interacting+with+business%3B+access+to+data%3B+and+the+ability+to+analyse+and+respond+to+data+intelligence.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAccording+to+WEF%2C+South+Africa+is+classified+as+an+efficiency+economy%3B+however%2C+the+growth+of+industries+in+the+knowledge+economy+keeps+South+Africa+competing+with+top-performing+international+markets+such+as+Australia%2C+Europe+and+the+US.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDemand+vs+supply%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EUnfortunately%2C+unemployment+in+South+Africa+is+at+one+of+the+worst+levels+ever+recorded.+Youth+unemployment+is+particularly+drastic+and+worsening.+According+to+Stats+SA%2C+30.1%25+of+youth+aged+15+to+24+are+not+in+employment%2C+education+or+training%2C+which+is+a+percentage+point+increase+on+the+previous+year.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESouth+Africa+desperately+needs+job+opportunities+for+young+and+recently+matriculated+students+so+that+they+can+enter+the+job+market+and+stimulate+our+economy.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHowever%2C+job+creation+requires+two+things.+Firstly%2C+jobs%2C+but+secondly%2C+the+technical+skills+to+meet+functional+job+requirements.+Without+both%2C+job+creation+remains+a+theoretical+discussion.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFor+the+software+industry+to+be+properly+supported%2C+we+need+the+required+skills+in+the+market.+The+South+African+economy+will+benefit+the+most+if+the+required+work+is+completed+locally+without+the+need+to+outsource+these+skills+from+international+markets.+Ideally%2C+the+resulting+skills+should+come+from+a+well-balanced+diversification+that+is+representative+of+our+country%26rsquo%3Bs+demographics.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EUnfortunately%2C+we%26rsquo%3Bre+just+not+there+yet.+According+to+a+recent+Career+Junction+report%2C+demand+does+not+meet+supply.+That+is+to+say%2C+more+than+30%25+of+jobs+in+demand+come+from+the+IT+sector+but+less+than+7%25+of+job+placements+have+fed+the+IT+sector%2C+indicating+that+job+growth+in+the+tech+sector+is+misaligned+to+the+skills+and+talent+coming+through+the+education+system.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAlthough+there+are+some+excellent+graduates+coming+through+the+South+African+varsity+system%2C+there+is+a+vast+amount+of+untapped+talent+that+does+not+reside+in+the+formal+education+system.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThose+on+the+periphery+of+the+software+talent+pool+may+be+there+for+several+reasons%3A+their+parents+do+not+understand+the+industry+well+enough+to+be+able+to+recommend+it+as+a+career+choice+for+their+children%3B+disadvantaged+youths+may+not+have+access+to+computers+to+kindle+that+desire%3B+or+it+may+also+be+that+girls+are+simply+not+encouraged+to+enter+a+male-dominated+field.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+power+of+communities%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EInformal+knowledge+environments+such+as+tech+and+software+communities+can+help+bridge+this+gap.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ECommunities+serve+a+multitude+of+purposes%3A+they+provide+events+where+like-minded+people+can+come+together+and+mentor+one+another%3B+they+provide+a+platform+to+explore+new+ideas+and+troubleshoot+problems%2C+thereby+increasing+learning+experiences+and+knowledge+bases.+But+further+to+this%2C+they+serve+as+a+forum+for+thought-leadership+that+can+help+improve+the+technology+capabilities+and+development+of+cutting-edge+solutions%2C+thus+keeping+the+South+African+software+industry+on+par+with+its+international+competitors.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+software+development+industry+is+continuously+breaking+down+boundaries+and+paving+the+way+in+innovation.+Entrepreneurs+and+innovators+don%26rsquo%3Bt+need+to+wait+for+government+policy%3B+individuals+can+push+ahead+and+define+their+own+future.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EEven+within+the+context+of+large+corporates%2C+students+with+degrees+in+applied+maths+no+longer+go+straight+into+a+modelling+role.+They+can+consider+statistical+market+analysis%2C+data+analysis+and+data+science%2C+to+name+a+few.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhen+we+consider+this+in+the+African+context%2C+there+are+countless+opportunities%2C+given+that+the+continent+is+so+diverse+and+that+there+are+endless+opportunities+in+social+entrepreneurship%2C+medical+healthcare%2C+logistics%2C+retail+and+banking.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ERegardless+of+your+formal+training+or+your+working+environment%2C+as+a+developer%2C+one+thing+remains+true%3A+the+software+engineering+industry+is+evolving+at+a+pace+not+seen+in+many+other+industries.+South+Africa%26rsquo%3Bs+greatest+challenge+will+be+to+meet+those+opportunities+with+the+skills+and+talent+necessary+to+deliver+on+those+jobs.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFor+this+pace+of+innovation+to+be+sustained%2C+industry+thought+leaders+and+influencers+need+to+help+guide+young%2C+talented+individuals+via+mentorship+and+learning+opportunities+to+help+them+compete+effectively+in+the+industry.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBy+putting+more+emphasis+and+support+behind+communities%2C+we+can+not+only+bring+these+mentors+and+mentees+together%2C+but+help+inform+parents+about+software+engineering+as+a+career+prospect%2C+give+girls+the+confidence+they+need%2C+and+provide+a+forum+where+eager+youngsters+can+access+devices+to+start+developing+and+feel+pride+at+what+they+have+created.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIt+makes+good+business+sense+to+leverage+the+power+of+communities+to+help+bridge+the+gap+in+formal+training+and+get+youngsters+into+jobs+to+stimulate+South+Africa%26rsquo%3Bs+economy.%3C%2Fp%3E %3Cp%3EFor+many+software+engineers%2C+there+comes+a+time+when+they+must+decide+whether+to+remain+technical+or+pursue+a+role+that+primarily+requires+managing+others.+%26nbsp%3BThey+are+no+longer+solely+responsible+for+their+own+contributions%2C+but+also+that+of+others+and+the+team+as+a+whole.%26nbsp%3B+The+transition+to+%26%2339%3Bmanager+of+others%26%2339%3B+must+certainly+be+one+of+the+more+stressful+milestones+in+one%26rsquo%3Bs+career+-+a%26nbsp%3Bhypothesis+partly+supported+by+the+numerous+articles+online+on+this+topic.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHowever%2C+very+little+is+said+from+the+perspective+of+those+responsible+for+promoting+an+individual+into+a+leadership+role.%26nbsp%3B+What+are+some+of+the+common+challenges+and+fears+facing+new+managers%2C+and+what+can+leaders+of+leaders+do+to+support+them+during+the+transition%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EAreas+of+discomfort+for+new+managers%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESoftware+engineers+%26mdash%3B+especially+the+high+achievers%2C+those+most+likely+to+be+promoted+into+a+leadership+role+%26mdash%3B+are+natural+%26lsquo%3Byes%26rsquo%3B+people%2C+willing+to+take+on+a+new+challenge+without+always+knowing+what%26rsquo%3Bs+on+the+other+side+of+the+door.%26nbsp%3B+There+is+plenty+to+debate+about+whether+moving+into+a+management+position+is+indeed+a+step-up+on+the+career+ladder%2C+but+let%26rsquo%3Bs+assume+it%26rsquo%3Bs+happening%2C+and+for+the+right+reasons.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EInfluence+over+control%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+most+notable+adjustment+is+shifting+from+a+position+of+control+to+a+position+of+influence.%26nbsp%3B+As+a+%26lsquo%3Bdoer%26rsquo%3B+of+the+work%2C+you+are+in+direct+control+of+what+you%26rsquo%3Bre+building.%26nbsp%3B+Your+responsibilities+are+task+oriented%2C+hands-on%2C+and+your+actions+have+an+immediate+and+tangible+effect+on+your+output.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAs+a+manager+of+others%2C+your+job+is+to+influence.%26nbsp%3B+Leadership+style+plays+a+large+part+in+your+effectiveness+as+a+manager%2C+and+often+requires+the+new+manager+to+cede+a+significant+level+of+control+of+how+the+job+gets+done.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ELosing+technical+skills%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESpending+more+time+managing+delivery+and+team+members+naturally+takes+away+time+from+being+able+to+practice+the+technical+skills+that+have+been+part+of+your+technical+career+until+now.%26nbsp%3B+This+is+a+real+fear+many+new+managers+face+%26mdash%3B+their+livelihood+has+been+anchored+on+these+technical+skills+for+most%2C+if+not+all%2C+of+their+career+up+until+this+point.+Addressing+this+fear+is+important+to+avoid+regret+later+down+the+line.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EHolding+others+to+account%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EGiving+constructive+feedback+to+others%2C+both+positive+and+negative%2C+is+something+that+many+new+managers+can+find+extremely+uncomfortable.+It+takes+part+skill+and+part+courage+and+includes+holding+others+to+account+for+not+meeting+expectations.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EPriorities%2C+time+management+and+context+switching%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETechnical+individuals+will+naturally+gravitate+towards+technical+tasks+since+this+is+where+they+feel+most+comfortable.+They+have+a+high+level+of+confidence+that+they+will+succeed%2C+and+believe+that+technical+tasks+is+where+their+time+is+best+spent.+Plus%2C+there+is+a+common+misconception+that+time+not+spent+designing+a+solution+or+writing+code+is+time+wasted.+However%2C+this+also+happens+to+require+larger+chunks+of+focus+time%2C+which+is+a+luxury+that+managers+don%26rsquo%3Bt+always+have.+So%2C+the+ability+to+prioritize+what%26rsquo%3Bs+important+and+context+switch+appropriately+in+the+new+role+is+a+common+challenge+faced+by+most+new+managers.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EDealing+with+imprecise+elements%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESoftware+engineers+are+used+to+binary+outcomes%3A+it+either+works+or+it+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt%2C+and+the+timeframes+for+feedback+on+these+outcomes+in+the+software+world+are+fairly+instant.%26nbsp%3B+As+a+manager%2C+the+focus+shifts+from+binary+outcomes+to+one+of+motivating+others%2C+building+relationships%2C+making+decisions+with+limited+information+and+planning+more+than+one+or+two+sprints+ahead.+%26nbsp%3BNew+managers+from+a+technical+background+often+struggle+to+adjust+to+making+long-view+decisions%2C+especially+with+imperfect+information.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ESupporting+the+transition+to+management%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIt%26rsquo%3Bs+easy+to+assume+an+individual+who+excelled+in+a+technical+role+will+naturally+perform+at+a+similar+level+in+a+leadership+role%2C+especially+if+they+are+career+driven%2C+enthusiastic%2C+and+eager+to+take+on+new+challenges.%26nbsp%3B+Ideally+they%26rsquo%3Bve+been+operating+with+some+or+all+of+these+responsibilities+before+taking+full+accountability%2C+but+this+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+always+practical+given+the+current+demand+for+both+technical+and+leadership+skills+in+the+software+development+world.%26nbsp%3B+What+can+we+do+as+leaders+of+leaders+to+better+support+them+in+their+new+role%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EFirst+be+a+mentor%2C+then+a+boss%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESoftware+engineers+come+from+a+learning+process+of+reading+books%2C+doing+online+courses%2C+experimenting+with+code+and+tools+and+on+the+job+experiences.%26nbsp%3B+A+large+part+of+their+growth+comes+from+interacting+with+other+team+members+discussing+technical+designs+and+the+merits+of+one+approach+over+another.%26nbsp%3B+The+soft+skills+required+for+a+leadership+role+cannot+easily+be+digested+through+the+same+learning+approach.%26nbsp%3B+Providing+a+hands-on%2C+mentorship+role+during+the+early+stages+can+help+g Six+leadership+activities+to+sustain+high-performance+software+teams %3Cp%3EHigh+Performing+Teams+%28HPTs%29+are+the+pinnacle+of+many+businesses+today.+This+is+especially+true+in+the+software+space%2C+where+competition+for+talent+and+skills+is+prominent.+HPTs+are+those+that+take+on+a+life+of+their+own+and+are+largely+self-sustaining+%2810+Leadership+Techniques%29.+However%2C+this+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt+happen+by+accident.+Teams+can+only+be+self-sustaining+if+they%26rsquo%3Bre+operating+in+an+environment+that+fosters+certain+leadership+features.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESuccessful+leaders+build+their+teams+around+one+simple+goal%3A+to+create+a+space+where+people+are+charged+with+energy%2C+can+thrive%2C+have+a+sense+of+belonging%2C+and+love+to+work+as+a+team+%28Forbes%29.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+the+software+industry%2C+the+pressure+to+deliver+flawless+software+craftsmanship+is+intense.+As+such%2C+building+HPTs+is+essential%2C+but+sustaining+those+teams+and+ensuring+job+satisfaction+and+the+promise+of+meaningful+work+is+what+can+keep+a+solid+team+together+and+delivering+consistently.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHere+are+six+activities+leaders+can+perform+to+create+these+spaces+to+help+sustain+their+HPTs%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E1.+Set+goals+for+individuals+and+the+team+as+a+whole%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOnce+you%26rsquo%3Bve+built+an+HPT%2C+it%26%2339%3Bs+important+to+understand+that%2C+in+order+for+the+team+to+remain+so%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+best+to+adopt+iterative+processes+%26ndash%3B+with+each+new+project%2C+deadline+or+team+member.+Using+team+goal+frameworks+can+help+you+identify+areas+for+improvement+and%2C+ultimately%2C+lead+to+growth+and+increased+job+satisfaction.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOur+team+has+had+great+success+using+good+ol%26rsquo%3B+SWOT+%28strengths%2C+weaknesses%2C+opportunities%2C+threats%29+analysis.+Conducting+individual+SWOT+analyses+and+discussing+each+team+member%26rsquo%3Bs+personal+analysis+provides+a+better+idea+of+perceptions+in+the+team+and+where+energy+should+be+focused%3A+It+can+be+informative+to+see+how+people+interpret+their+own+situations.+Using+this+in+my+own+team+has+helped+me+identify+areas+to+improve+team+dynamics.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAnother+well-known+framework+is+SMART+%28specific%2C+measurable%2C+achievable%2C+relevant%2C+timely%29+goals.+Develop+SMART+goals+collaboratively+with+your+team+to+build+inclusive+objectives.+Your+team%26%2339%3Bs+goals+need+to+be+in+the+back+of+everyone%26%2339%3Bs+mind%2C+whether+you+reiterate+your+goals+in+stand-ups%2C+display+progress+on+a+dashboard+or+communicate+them+regularly.+Keep+track+of+people%26%2339%3Bs+goals+and+SWOT+analyses+as+this+will+form+the+backbone+for+planning+their+personal+development+and+guide+performance+conversations.+At+Entelect%2C+we+have+an+internal+platform+I+use+for+capturing+conversations+like+this%2C+but+Google+Docs+or+Evernote+also+work+well.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E2.+Articulate+and+share+your+strategy%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EShare+your+strategy+with+the+team.+This+is+often+overlooked+in+favour+of+goals%2C+but+goals+are+not+strategies.+Goals+define+the+destination%3B+strategies+define+the+path+taken%2C+trade-offs+and+unique+activities+involved+in+executing+a+plan+to+reach+your+goals.+Sharing+strategy+includes+the+team+in+a+joint+vision+to+strive+towards+and+may+help+in+increasing+motivation+and+accountability+to+achieve+a+higher+goal.+Understanding+the+twists+and+turns+involved+in+following+a+strategy+also+provides+team+members+with+added+meaning+in+their+work%2C+which+in+turn+stimulates+job+satisfaction.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOften%2C+technical+teams+are+the+last+ones+to+hear+about+new+innovations%2C+products+or+integrations+in+their+pipeline.+If+you+want+the+choir+to+sing+on+pitch%2C+get+everyone%26%2339%3Bs+buy-in+and+follow+a+unified+strategy.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+no+secret+that+leaders+can+grow+and+retain+great+people+by+helping+them+have+their+say+about+the+company+or+product%26rsquo%3Bs+long-term+vision.+Sometimes%2C+the+most+unexpected+people+have+the+most+awe-inspiring+input+to+give.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E3.+Optimise+operational+efficiency%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOperational+efficiency+is+key+to+executing+your+strategy.+But+operational+efficiencies+are+not+static+processes.+They+too+are+iterative+and+require+constant+review+and+diagnosis.+There+are+a+few+areas+where+you+can+help+to+optimise+general+operations.+Positive+changes+to+these+areas+will+help+create+a+space+where+people+can+focus+on+their+strengths+and+grow.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOn-boarding%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOn-boarding+can+be+one+of+the+best+ways+to+create+a+good+first+impression+in+any+team+environment.+In+an+HPT%2C+the+on-boarding+process+must+convert+new+team+members+into+fully+functioning+team+members+as+quickly+as+possible.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESome+of+the+essential+activities+for+new+members+of+High+Performing+Teams+are%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cul%3E+%3Cli%3E%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+Becoming+comfortable+working+together+and+accomplishing+tasks+with+minimal+hand-holding.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+Communicating+well+in+the+team+and+utilising+their+tools+and+practices.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+Picking+up+the+business+domain+relatively+quickly+and+interacting+with+key+stakeholders+with+confidence.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EConsider+using+tools+to+help+your+new+teammate+progress+through+their+on-boarding%2C+such+as+a+Trello+board+%28here%29.+My+team+and+I+introduced+an+on-boarding+process+using+Trello+at+one+of+our+big+corporate+clients+where+we+on-board+30-plus+people+throughout+the+year.+It+helped+us+keep+track+of+where+our+team+members+are+at+and+quickly+see+if+someone+needs+help.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EKnowledge+sharing%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ECentralised+and+structured+knowledge+sharing+greatly+improves+productivity+and+efficiency.+In+larger+companies+and+teams%2C+you+often+find+a+lot+of+duplicated+efforts+because+of+weak+or+non-existent+knowledge-sharing+facilities+or+practices.+Be+sure+to+share+standards+and+tools+used+across+the+company+and+team+to+reduce+rework+and+build+on+solid+foundations+contributed+by+others.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe+have+used+wikis+to+great+success+to+create+ad+hoc+specification%2C+document+startup+guides+for+developers+and+business+analysts%2C+share+nifty+SQL+scripts%2C+document+go-to+guys+and+business+owners+in+our+teams+and+partners+-+pretty+much+anything+that+would+be+of+value+for+someone+else%2C+we+try+and+offload+here.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EInstill+the+values+in+your+team+to+look+after+their+collective+knowledge+and+you%26rsquo%3Bll+add+to+their+sense+of+job+satisfaction+and+help+sustain+the+level+of+quality+delivery+and+pace+that+an+HPT+is+renowned+for.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ECommunication%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EProvide+high-bandwidth%2C+low-latency+communication+tools.+High-bandwidth+communication+channels+allow+a+great+amount+of+information+to+be+transferred+between+parties+but+often+have+long+delays+associated+with+it.+Email+is+a+prime+example+of+this.+Low-latency+communication+channels+allow+for+quick+turnaround+times.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHelp+your+team+to+find+a+balance+and+the+tools+to+improve+the+quality+of+communication.+Recently%2C+our+team+had+the+opportunity+to+work+closely+with+teams+on+different+continents+and+in+different+timezones.+With+this+new+challenge%2C+we+had+to+re-evaluate+our+communication+tools+to+promote+shorter+feedback+loops+and+provide+an+adequate+level+of+detail.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EProcess+and+red+tape%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ERigid+and+formal+rules+can+kill+a+team%26rsquo%3Bs+productivity.+Eliminate+processes+that+diminish+your+team%26rsquo%3Bs+autonomy+and+authority.+This+definitely+speaks+to+the+agilist+in+that+you+need+to+value+people+over+process.+Put+principles+in+place+that+allow+people+to+adapt+quickly+and+deliver+quality.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E4.+Empower+people+to+make+decisions%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMany+business+leaders+overestimate+their+abilities+to+build+teams+and+make+decisions+for+them.+If+you+fail+to+realise+that+you+should+not+be+the+centre+of+all+decision+making%2C+you+will+never+be+able+to+retain+HPTs.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ECreate+an+environment+for+growth+and+empowerment.+Empowerment+means+giving+people+the+means+and+mandate+to+make+more+decisions+that+influence+their+work+on+a+daily+basis.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ELeaders+often+mistake+their+roles+as+being+the+ones+who+direct+the+daily+operations+and+tasks+that+get+dished+out+to+team+members.+But+true+leaders+create+an+environment+where+other+forms+of+leadership+can+emerge+organically+and+flourish.+Nurture+and+encourage+leadership+of+all+kinds.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHere+are+some+basic+rules+for+empowering+your+team+members%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E1.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+It+should+always+be+incremental+-+Don%26%2339%3Bt+dump+someone+in+a+situation+that+could+be+overwhelming.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E2.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+There+should+be+appropriate+control+in+place+-+Facilitate+and+moderate+appropriately.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E3.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+Replace+control+with+accountability+-+as+ability+increases%2C+loosen+your+control+and+hand+over+responsibility+AND+accountability.+There+is+no+responsibility+without+accountability.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E5.+Apply+situational+leadership+techniques%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThere+is+a+wide+range+of+leadership+styles+and+almost+everyone+possesses+leadership+qualities+that+can+be+tapped+into.+One+way+to+look+at+these+leadership+styles+is+to+classify+them+according+to+their+strengths+in+the+three+components+outlined+by+Gerald+M.+Weinberg+in+%26ldquo%3BBecoming+a+technical+leader%26rdquo%3B%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMotivational+leadership+-+a+leader+who+can+motivate+a+team+due+to+his+or+her+technical+ability.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOrganisational+leadership+-+a+leader+who+can+help+create+an+environment+for+the+team+to+perform+at+a+high+level+%28think+tools%2C+processes%2C+mentorship+and+culture%29%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EInnovation+leadership+-+a+leader+who+controls+the+flow+of+new+ideas+and+encourages+innovation.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EJuggling+these+styles%2C+given+the+situation+and+individuals+at+hand%2C+can+give+your+team+the+edge+it+needs+to+outperform.+We+have+a+handful+of+extremely+talented+and+technical-minded+developers+in+our+team.+Giving+them+the+opportunity+to+lead+our+initiatives+on+a+technical+front+has+enabled+us+to+adopt+new+technologies+quickly%2C+with+the+confidence+that+our+top+guys+and+girls+have+approved+the+team%26rsquo%3Bs+move.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E6.+Promote+constant+learning+and+improvement%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIndividual+and+team+development+plans+can+help+you+carve+out+a+path+for+growing+your+team.+Do+you+invest+time%2C+money+and+energy+into+your+own+people%3F+Do+you+give+them+the+same+focus+and+attention+you+want+them+to+provide+your+company%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+most+important+thing+a+leader+can+do+for+their+team+members+is+to+facilitate+continuous+feedback.+Promoting+constant+learning+and+improvement+makes+people+more+likely+to+stay+on+board+and+engaged%3B+remaining+loyal+and+helping+your+company+on+its+journey.+The+threat+of+people+leaving+your+organisation+will+always+be+there.+However%2C+the+key+is+to+make+a+concerted+effort+to+invest+in+each+employee+and+make+them+feel+like+a+valuable%2C+indispensable+asset+%28while+they%26rsquo%3Bre+there%29.+Spend+time+with+them%2C+nurture+them%2C+and+watch+as+the+magic+happens.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThese+six+leadership+activities+all+include+constant+review+and+diagnosis.+Nothing+can+be+static.+An+HPT+can+only+be+sustained+if+it+is+constantly+evolving.+Fostering+the+values+outlined+here+will+not+only+build+High+Performance+Teams+but+also+increase+retention.+These+practices+may+seem+daunting+to+implement%2C+but+start+to+incorporate+them%2C+one-by-one%2C+in+your+team.+Remember%2C+small+steps+add+up+to+big+improvements+over+time.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EPerhaps+ask+yourself%2C+what+vital+principles%2C+practices+or+values+have+your+teams+benefitted+from+most%3F%3C%2Fp%3E Frederick+van+Staden+%28Entelect%2C+Team+Lead%29+%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E+Building+High+Performance+Teams+is+the+ultimate+goal+for+many+business.+But+once+built%2C+what+leadership+features+need+to+be+in+place+to+sustain+its+performance+for+the+longer+term%3F Differentiate+your+company+with+a+candidate-centric+approach+to+interviews %3Cp%3EIn+a+market+suffering+from+a+skills+shortage%2C+companies+competing+for+software+skills+need+to+think+about+how+to+separate+themselves+among+potential+candidates.+To+differentiate+your+company+amidst+a+skills+shortage%2C+start+to+treat+the+interview+as+an+opportunity+to+let+potential+candidates+experience+your+culture.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOne+way+to+do+this+is+by+positioning+your+company+as+an+employer+of+choice.+Often%2C+the+difference+between+a+successful+business+and+a+very+successful+business+is+the+vision+to+treat+its+candidates+the+way+it+treats+its+employees.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EFeeding+frenzy%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDue+to+stiff+market+competition%2C+employers+are+interviewing+at+an+incredible+rate%2C+meaning+the+company+encounters+potential+candidates+daily.+But%2C+because+the+race+is+on+to+find+the+best+skills+and+eliminate+unsuccessful+candidates%2C+companies+take+a+pragmatic+approach+to+interviews+and+fail+to+recognise+the+brand-building+opportunity+an+interview+can+provide.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe+don%26rsquo%3Bt+often+think+about+an+interview+from+a+candidate%26rsquo%3Bs+perspective%3A+It%26rsquo%3Bs+a+stressful+time.+Companies+usually+treat+the+interview+as+a+process.+But+despite+all+the+noise+and+rationale+around+customer-centricity%2C+few+companies+have+considered+building+an+interview+process+that+is+candidate-centric.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAfterall%2C+culture+is+not+defined+from+when+someone+joins+your+organisation%2C+but+from+when+they+first+interact+with+it.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EIn+their+shoes%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EA+candidate-centric+interview+would+mean+understanding+what+the+candidate+needs+from+the+potential+employer+to+make+them+feel+like+they+have+had+a+rounded+and+fulfilling+experience%2C+no+matter+what+the+outcome.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESo%2C+while+there+are+some+basic+interview+faux+pas+that+no+one+should+rely+on%2C+such+as+smart+software+algorithms+to+narrow+down+the+top+candidates+or+the+CV+itself+%28you%26rsquo%3Bre+not+trying+to+hire+the+best+writers%29%2C+there+are+also+several+game-changers+that+could+separate+your+business+from+the+crowd%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E1.+First+impressions+count%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EConsider+that+an+experience+of+your+culture+can+begin+at+your+office%26rsquo%3Bs+reception.+A+culture+is+not+a+list+of+values+that+hangs+on+the+wall%3B+it%26rsquo%3Bs+something+that+each+employee+lives+and+breathes.+Therefore%2C+the+first+interaction+a+candidate+has+with+brand+%26ndash%3B+that+is%2C+with+the+company+receptionist+%26ndash%3B+should+reflect+your+culture.+Was+she+friendly%3F+Did+she+make+the+candidate+feel+comfortable%3F+Was+she+expecting+the+candidate%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThese+small+engagements+can+give+an+immediate+impression+of+the+company+and+put+the+candidate+at+ease+during+what+is+often+a+nerve-wracking+time.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E2.+Break+with+interview+tradition%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFind+creative+ways+to+interview+people.+Often%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+only+in+relaxed+situations+that+you+can+pinpoint+a+person%26rsquo%3Bs+attitude%2C+ambitions+and+drive.+Consider+a+15-minute+Skype+conversation%2C+a+hackathon+or+a+speed-dating+session.+And+vary+the+opportunities+to+interact+with+people%3A+some+people+are+better+in+one-on-one+environments+but%2C+despite+their+quiet+dispositions%2C+can+be+little+packages+of+dynamite.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ERemember+that+your+offer+might+not+be+the+only+one+a+candidate+gets.+The+interview+may+be+their+only+experience+of+your+company+and%2C+therefore%2C+could+seal+the+deal+when+they+are+considering+competing+offers.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E3.+Courtesy+goes+a+long+way%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+interview+experience+should+not+be+drawn+out.+Make+decisions+quickly+but+be+considerate+and+respectful+of+your+candidate.+That+means+providing+direct%2C+constructive+and+personal+feedback.+Generic+template+rejections+are+impersonal+and+can+leave+the+candidate+feeling+anonymous+to+your+organisation%2C+even+though+they+may+have+put+their+best+foot+forward.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EMapping+the+candidate+journey%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESo%2C+what+can+companies+do+to+turn+an+interview+process+into+a+candidate-centric+brand+experience%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOne+tactic+that+companies+can+introduce+to+help+ensure+an+interview+experience+to+surpass+all+others%2C+is+by+outlining+a+candidate+journey+map.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ECreating+a+candidate+journey+map+considers+the+experience+of+the+interviewee+throughout+the+interview+process+and+aims+to+understand+their+feelings+at+each+stage.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+includes%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cul%3E+%3Cli%3EThe+interactions+a+candidate+will+have%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EThe+emotions+they+may+feel+during+these+phases%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3EThe+impressions+that+may+be+created%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAnalysing+their+step-by-step+journey+more+closely+can+help+you+understand+the+candidate%26rsquo%3Bs+experience+of+your+company+and+culture.+After+all%2C+workplace+dynamics+are+shifting+and+culture+is+more+important+than+ever.+Great+offers+can+be+turned+down+by+great+candidates+if+their+experience+of+your+brand+is+poor.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ECompanies+should+remember+that+each+interview+is+the+beginning+of+a+business+relationship.%26nbsp%3B+Even+if+the+candidate+is+unsuccessful+on+this+occasion%2C+he+ Make+peer+review+a+cornerstone+of+your+SDLC %3Cp%3EIt%26rsquo%3Bs+well+accepted+these+days+that+the+peer+or+code+review+is+an+important+part+of+any+development+team%26rsquo%3Bs+Software+Development+Lifecycle+%28SDLC%29.+The+basic+premise+being+that+at+a+certain+stage+colleagues+in+the+team+look+over+and+review+code+being+written%2C+typically+before+it+is+released+into+a+more+formal+test+phase.+The+core+driver+behind+the+peer+review+is+the+early+detection+of+bugs%2C+with+the+theory+being+that+the+earlier+you+can+catch+an+issue%2C+the+cheaper+it+is+to+resolve+and+the+less+disruptive+it+is+to+the+timeous+delivery+of+the+feature+set.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDespite+such+a+compelling+argument+for+peer+reviews+it+is+my+experience+that+teams+still+struggle+to+implement+and+maintain+an+effective+review+process.+Reviews+are+often+deprioritised+or+rushed+when+there+is+pressure+to+deliver%2C+developers+form+review+cliques+to+review+each+other%26rsquo%3Bs+code+and+reviewing+someone+else%26rsquo%3Bs+code+is+often+seen+as+not+as+important+as+delivering+your+own+code.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EThe+wider+benefits+of+code+reviews%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThere+are+many+different+forms+that+the+review+process+can+take+and+choosing+the+correct+one+for+your+team+will+depend+on+lots+of+factors+including%3B+team+size%2C+type+of+software+being+built+and+development+methodology+being+followed.+Independent+of+the+exact+process+though+I+believe+there+are+wider+benefits%2C+not+always+acknowledged%2C+that+the+review+process+can+bring+to+a+team.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E-%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%3Cstrong%3EEducation%3C%2Fstrong%3E+%26ndash%3B+A+peer+review+is+an+excellent+time+for+people+to+learn+from+each+other.+Seniors+in+the+team+can+use+the+forum+to+educate+colleagues+on+best+practices+and+patterns+they+would+like+to+see+adopted+and+a+peer+review+gives+juniors+a+stage+to+ask+questions%2C+learn+and+show+what+they+are+capable+of.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E-%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%3Cstrong%3EImprove+team+communications%3C%2Fstrong%3E+%26ndash%3B+If+done+right+the+simple+act+of+getting+developers+together+to+discuss+the+code+they+are+writing+will+help+promote+an+environment+of+openness+and+collaboration+%26ndash%3B+key+elements+of+a+well-functioning+team.+Using+these+sessions+as+a+vehicle+for+celebrating+success+is+also+a+great+way+to+grow+a+stronger+team+dynamic.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E-%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%3Cstrong%3ERaise+maturity+in+the+team%3C%2Fstrong%3E+%26ndash%3B+For+people+new+to+the+process+being+told+you+could%2Fshould+have+done+something+differently+is+not+easy+to+accept+at+first.+However%2C+with+some+coaching+to+highlight+the+benefits+most+people+quickly+come+onboard.+In+a+professional+environment+being+mature+enough+to+have+these+discussions+is+key.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E-%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%3Cstrong%3EReduce+key+person+dependencies%3C%2Fstrong%3E+%26ndash%3B+Peer+reviews+are+a+way+of+lowering+the+key+person+dependency+on+the+code+being+written.+Spreading+the+knowledge+of+what+is+being+developed+in+the+wider+team+ensures+that+the+team+is+better+placed+to+deal+with+people+taking+unforeseen+leave.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E-%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%3Cstrong%3EDrive+improvements%3C%2Fstrong%3E+%26ndash%3B+What+happens+in+the+reviews+should+feedback+into+the+team%26rsquo%3Bs+push+for+continual+improvements.+Patterns+in+the+sorts+of+comments+being+made+can+drive+training+in+the+team+or+the+adoption+of+a+tool+to+run+static+code+analysis.+Looking+at+bugs+raised+later+in+the+development+lifecycle+can+also+be+used+to+update+the+review+process+to+look+out+for+certain+issues.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E-%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%3Cstrong%3EPromote+team+ownership%3C%2Fstrong%3E+%26ndash%3B+Socialising+their+code+as+part+of+a+review+process+should+be+the+beginning+of+a+transition+from+code+being+solely+owned+by+the+author+to+a+point+where+the+team+feels+joint+ownership+for+that+code.+This+is+quite+subtle+and+not+something+that+is+always+discussed+in+teams+but+I+think+is+key.+The+review+should+not+be+about+poking+holes+in+another+person%26rsquo%3Bs+work%2C+rather+a+discussion+along+the+lines+of+%26ldquo%3BIs+the+team+willing+to+take+responsibility+for+this+new+code%3F%26rdquo%3B+After+all%2C+once+this+code+is+in+production+the+norm+tends+to+be+that+any+member+of+the+team+will+be+asked+to+support+it+in+future+weeks.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EHealth+check+your+reviews%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EI+believe+there+are+warning+signs+that%2C+despite+being+a+mandatory+part+of+your+SDLC%2C+your+peer+review+process+might+not+be+adding+the+value+it+could.+Developer+apathy+towards+them+is+a+sure+sign+that+the+review+is+not+the+first-class+citizen+it+should+be.+Are+the+same+people+doing+the+reviews+all+the+time%3F+While+you+will+naturally+find+some+people+to+be+more+engaged+its+vital+that+reviews+are+done+by+everyone+in+the+team+so+you%26rsquo%3Bre+getting+the+best+possible+coverage+and+input+to+the+process.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHow+long+are+people+reviewing+for+and+how+big+are+the+commits%3F+Recently+a+colleague+of+mine+mentioned+flippantly+%26ldquo%3Bfor+a+single+line+change+you%26rsquo%3Bll+often+get+3+comments+and+then+0+comments+on+the+next+review+which+happens+to+be+2000+lines+long%26rdquo%3B.+Keeping+commit+sizes+down+is+vital.+Studies+have+shown+that+there+is+a+bell+curve+when+it+comes+to+%26lsquo%3Bvelocity+%28lines+of+code+per+hour%29+vs+time+spent%26rsquo%3B+with+reviews%5B1%5D.+If+your+colleagues+are+taking+longer+than+60+mins+for+a+review+you%26rsquo%3Bre+likely+getting+a+diminishing+return+on+that+investment.+Review+fatigue+is+a+real+thing%21%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EWays+to+power+up+your+reviews%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAcknowledging+that+the+review+process+has+so+much+more+to+bring+to+your+team+than+simple+%26lsquo%3Bchecks+and+balances%26rsquo%3B+is+key.+Where+possible+reduce+friction+for+the+team+around+the+review+process%2C+invest+in+tooling+that+supports+reviews%2C+such+as+Atlassian%26rsquo%3Bs+BitBucket+and+consider+formalising+slots+in+people%26rsquo%3Bs+diaries+where+they+are+expected+to+be+reviewing+and+not+working+on+their+own+code.+Empower+senior+developers+in+the+team+to+leverage+reviews+as+a+way+of+educating+and+promoting+best+practice+and+ask+them+to+train+your+team+on+actually+how+to+review+effectively.+Consider+the+metrics+you+can+put+in+place+to+measure+the+effectiveness+of+the+review+process+and+share+that+information+across+the+team+so+the+process+can+evolve.+Perhaps+most+importantly+engage+in+dialog+with+your+team+to+make+sure+everyone+buys+into+and+contributes+to+the+reviews.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESources%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%5B1%5D+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Frhodecode.com%2Fblog%2F69%2Fcode-review-how-to-convince-a-skeptic%22%3Ehttps%3A%2F%2Frhodecode.com%2Fblog%2F69%2Fcode-review-how-to-convince-a-skeptic%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fp%3E Tech+entrepreneurship%3A+you+are+not+prepared %3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EBy+Matthew+Butler+%28Entelect%2C+General+Manager%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThese+days%2C+new+mobile+app+ideas%2C+modern+social+tools%2C+automation%2C+digital+transformation+of+the+enterprise%2C+rapid+prototyping%2C+and+new+businesses+can+be+born+overnight+with+just+a+website.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe+read+about+the+successful+ideas+all+the+time+in+the+news%2C+but+we+don%26%2339%3Bt+often+get+sight+of+the%26nbsp%3Bcomposition%26nbsp%3Bof+these+businesses.+What+below-the-surface+decision+making+went+down%3F+We+rarely+get+to+peer+behind+the+curtain+to+see+an+honest+record+of+their+journey.+From+dreaming+and+designing+to+budgeting%2C%26nbsp%3Bbuilding+and+shipping+and+the+complexities+monetising+their+technology.+Press-releases+show+the+highlights%2C+but+they+paper+over+the+cracks+and+often+obfuscate+the+real+story.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EI%26%2339%3Bll+get+to+the+point.+Building+software-defined+technology+products+from+an+idea%2C+is+not+as+trivial+as+it+might+seem+from+the+outside.+With+adequate+planning%2C+awareness+and+caution%2C+almost+all+these+risks+can+be+mitigated+and+understood.+Without+them%2C+the+attraction+can+be+a+financially+%28and+reputationally%29+dangerous+trap.+New+technology+businesses+have+potential+for+terrifying+operational%2C+legal%2C+financial+and+skills-depth+behind+the+veil%2C+and+these+aren%26%2339%3Bt+the+kinds+of+things+you+want+to+be+learning+about+and+tackling+half-way+through+your+execution%2C+and+your+budget%21%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ELet%26%2339%3Bs+look+at+a+widely+known+example%2C+Uber.%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EA+groundbreaking+idea+which+is+simple+for+anybody+to+grasp.+The+premise+is+to+use+a+smartphone+application+to+call+a+taxi+to+your+location%2C+which+is+conveniently+available+from+the+on-device+GPS%2C+take+the+ride%2C+and+then+pay+electronically.+It+is+one+of+those+ideas+where+we+think+to+ourselves+%26quot%3Bwhy+hasn%26%2339%3Bt+it+been+done+before%26quot%3B.+This+is+where+it+starts.+When+something+sounds+too+good+to+be+true%2C+it+probably+is%21+Uber+lost+%241.46+billion+in+Q3+2017+alone%2C+I+wonder+how+many+know+that%3F+It%26%2339%3Bs+not+an+exception+either.+The+business+lost+more+than+a+billion+dollars+in+Q2%2C+and+%24708+million+in+the+first+quarter.+So+where+are+all+these+costs+coming+from+if+Uber+is+just+an+app%3F%21%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThere+is+a+misconception+for+some+of+the+less-technical+among+us+that+tech+products+are+a+scheme+where+the%26nbsp%3Bidea+comprises+everything.+That+the+first-to-market+wins+and+implementation+doesn%26%2339%3Bt+need+much+attention.+There+is+a+blind-spot+to+other+aspects+of+an+application%2C+website+or+technology+which%2C+while+usually+not+deliberately+ignored%2C+are+just+not+thought+of.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+reality%2C+there+is+hidden+complexity+in+building+a+product%2C+or+a+business%2C+out+of+software+beyond+both+the+idea+and+the+technical+implementation.+The+purpose+isto+share+and+explore+a+few+of+the+most+common+ones+to+invigorate+your+thought+process.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EThe+complex+areas+to+tackle+when+starting+a+business.%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ECosts%3A+%3C%2Fstrong%3EThis+is+a+tricky+topic%2C+primarily+because+of+just+how+context-sensitive+%28and+ambition-sensitive%29+costs+can+be.+It+is+important+to+research+the+input%2C+time+and+technology+costs+which+might+be+applicable.+Seemingly+small+details+such+as+designs%2C+third+parties%2C+lead-times%2C+or+where+previously+unknown+components+of+a+project+%28e.g.+licensing%2C+specialised+tools+and+hosting%29+all+introduce+unplanned+capital+or+operational+budget+impact.+This+information+is+powerful+when+negotiating%2C+so+doing+the+research%2C+and+gathering+input+from+individuals+or+partners+with+experience+should+be+one+of+the+first+steps+taken.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ESkills%3A+%3C%2Fstrong%3ETechnology+is+supple+and+subjective%2C+but+even+so%2C+not+all+implementation+teams+are+the+same.+Talented+engineers%2C+project+managers%2C+specialists+and+designers+are+very+hard+to+find%2C+this+is+evident+by+the+rampant+growth+in+demand+for+software+engineers+globally.+For+the+same+money+and+time%2C+different+teams+will+achieve%26nbsp%3Bvastly%26nbsp%3Bdifferent+results.+This+makes+it+important+to+research%2C+network+and+take+care+when+creating+your+own+internal+teams+or+outsourcing+development.+Technical+and+product+teams+need+to+be+aligned%2C+communicating+freely+with+no+loss+of+understanding%2C+and+share+a+common+sense+of+direction%2C+passion+and+urgency.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EOperations%3A+%3C%2Fstrong%3EOnce+your+app%2C+website+or+service+is+built+and+launched%2C+who+will+operate+it%3F+When+customers+have+questions%3A+who+do+they+talk+to%3F+How+do+they+contact+them%3F+How+will+you+manage+partners+and+third+parties+who+have+a+role+to+play%3F+Tech%26rsquo%3B+businesses+still+need+a+finance+team+and+operational+teams.+People+are+still+critical+in+the+healthy+functioning+of+any+technology.+Google+has+a+search+page+which+should+be+fully+automated+right%3F+Type+something+in+and+some+computers+do+the+work+and+send+back+results.+How+many+people+could+you+possibly+need%3F%26nbsp%3BGoogle+employed+more+than+70+000+staff+in+2017.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ELegal+and+compliance%3A+%3C%2Fstrong%3ECompliance+is+messy%2C+and+made+worse+by+technologies+that+have+to+operate+across+borders+and+regulatory+or+legal+jurisdictions.+Around+the+world%2C+governments+have+different+laws+regulating+privacy%2C+security+and+data.+Seek+advice+here%2C+explore+previous+examples+and+learn+from+them.+This+one+is+often+left+until+last%2C+whether+out+of+priority+or+ignorance%2C+and+can+delay+a+launch%2C+cripple+an+idea+or+incur+costly+technology+changes.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ETime%3A+%3C%2Fstrong%3ESome+things+just+take+the+fullness+of+time.+Ideas+need+to+settle%2C+systems+need+to+harden%2C+team%26%2339%3Bs+need+to+storm+and+form%2C+people+need+to+build+trust+and+feedback+follows+a+cycle.+Larger+teams+don%26%2339%3Bt+work+proportionally+faster+%28nine+women+cannot+deliver+a+baby+in+one+month%21%29.+Rushing+blinds+us%2C+and+can+cause+teams+to+make+compromises+they+didn%26%2339%3Bt+fully+understand.+By+no+means+is+%26%2339%3Blethargic%26%2339%3B+a+viable+business+strategy+but+sustainable+pacing+is.+Iterating+frequently+and+learning+from+failures+are+powerful+tools+in+a+product+development+arsenal.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EPurity+of+vision%3A+%3C%2Fstrong%3ESo+much+is+made+possible+in+a+technology-based+service+or+product%2C+because+it+is+malleable.+Product+owners+can+become+trapped+in+paralysis%2C+stuck+between+great+ideas.+Running+too+many+tasks+in+parallel+and+never+quite+reaching+a+point+of+commercial+or+practical+completion.+This+process+can+pull+projects+apart+when+even+meaningful+and+independently+brilliant+ideas+start+to+distract+attention+from+a+core+vision.+Something+Twitter+initially+managed+superbly.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThese+are+the+real+threats%2C+but+there+are+more%3A+preparing+for+scale%2C+marketing%2C+user+experience%2C+hosting+and+infrastructure%2C+market+research%2C+technological+possibilities%2C+and+more.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EInterestingly%2C+and+perhaps+surprisingly%2C+managing+these+aspects+doesn%26%2339%3Bt+actually+need+to+cost+more.+So%26nbsp%3BLean+Startup%26nbsp%3Bfans+rejoice.+A+combination+of+foresight%2C+avoiding+certain+expensive+but+avoidable+emergencies%2C+and+methodical+work+typically+result+in+a+higher+quality+product.+This+means+that+in+the+end+its+not+at+all+about+making+a+larger+upfront+investment.+It+comes+down+to+moving+through+the+investment%2C+aligned+to+a+plan%2C+with+more+insight+and+confidence.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+objective+here+is+not+to+scare+people+away.+Technology+is+a+magical+key+which+unlocks+ideas+and+businesses+in+remarkable+ways.+Instead%2C+the+ambition+is+to+encourage+new+product+owners%2C+entrepreneurs%2C+analysts+and+project+managers+to+go+into+these+projects+with+more+clarity%2C+a+bit+more+caution%2C+and+a+better+knowledge+of+the+journey.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIf+starting+a+journey+like+this+or+developing+an+idea+which+could+be+the+next+big+tech+story%2C+become+informed%2C+ask+these+questions+and+feel+confident+in+your+preparation+to+handle+operational+hurdles+and+legal+arguments.+Be+sure+you%26%2339%3Bve+got+the+right+team+and+protect+your+vision.+Explore+and+manage+your+own+expectations+for+the+journey.+Those+who+aspire+to+create+technology+products+will+be+well+served+by+mixing+this+kind+of+awareness+into+their+excitement+and+anticipation.%3C%2Fp%3E Career+lessons+from+centre+stage %3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EBy+Tim+Kroon+%28Entelect%2C+COO%29+%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETo+be+upfront%2C+it+is+not+my+intention+to+bestow+sagely+wisdom+upon+aspiring+entrepreneurs+and+software+professionals%2C+rather+I+thought+this+would+be+a+fun+exploration+of+how+business-endeavors+in+the+realm+of+music+could+parallel+some+of+what+we+see+in+the+tech+industry.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EPresentation+of+credentials+forthcoming%3A%2C+in+a+former+life+I+fronted+a+rock-band+that+toured+South+Africa+for+many+years.+We+had+some+measure+of+success+with+local+fans+and+radio+but+I+can%26rsquo%3Bt+say+that+we+imprinted+ourselves+upon+the+zeitgeist.+We+put+out+a+couple+of+records%2C+worked+with+some+great+people+and+played+a+few+hundred+shows+around+the+country.+We+didn%26%2339%3Bt+have+a+tour-bus%2C+we+had+a+tour-bakkie.+But%2C+there+is+something+special+about+forming+a+band%2C+defining+a+mission+and+embarking+on+it+as+a+team+and+I+hope+you+find+some+of+these+insights+valuable+if+not+entertaining.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EFundamentals+over+fashion%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EGood+song+writing+is+something+that+although+on+the+surface+appears+to+have+changed+dramatically+over+the+decades%2C+when+you+listen+a+little+closer+it+is+very+much+the+same+from+the+Beatles+to+Taylor+Swift.+A+good+song+allows+you+to+ignore+all+its+imperfections+and+predictability+because+it+grabs+you+with%26nbsp%3Bresonance+-%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3Ba+combination+of+three+characteristics%3A+honesty%2C+vulnerability+and+musicality.+One+of+the+reasons+that+U2+have+been+a+mainstay+for+over+40+years+is+because+of+their+commitment+to+this+principle%2C+they+still+bring+stadiums+of+people+to+tears+%28happy+tears+for+the+fans%2C+sad+tears+for+the+bono-haters%29+with+the+sounds+of+guitars%2C+drums+and+voice.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhen+looking+for+advice+on+how+to+steer+our+products+or+businesses%2C+you%26rsquo%3Bll+most+certainly+be+met+with+pages+and+pages+of+neatly+bulleted+lists%2C+littered+with+tech+buzzwords+and+inspirational+tokens+like+reinvention%2C+disruption+and+innovation.+Now+I+don%26rsquo%3Bt+have+a+bad+thing+to+say+about+innovation+in+the+tech+business%2C+however+I+do+question+why+it+is+always+so+high+on+our+priority+list+when+there+are+so+many+other+more+important+problems+we+face.+Some+things+that+just+as+important+as+innovation+are+the+fundamentals+of%26nbsp%3Bon-time%26nbsp%3Band%26nbsp%3Bquality+service+delivery%2C+practical%26nbsp%3Bproblem+solving%26nbsp%3Band+honest%2C+friendly%26nbsp%3Bcustomer+service.+My+take+on+this+one+is+become+great+at+your+core+business+before+you+try+and+change+it.%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EPerseverance+is+paramount%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EI+first+heard+Snow+Patrol%26rsquo%3Bs+%26ldquo%3BFinal+Straw%26rdquo%3B+in+my+dorm+room+in+2002%2C+and+it+was+around+2005+that+their+music+started+hitting+the+international+airwaves.+You%26rsquo%3Bll+be+surprised+to+hear+that+for+a+band+that+achieved+such+phenomenal+global+success+at+the+time%2C+they+had+been+recording+and+touring+for+12+years+already%2C+playing+mostly+in+pubs+and+university+campuses+to+a+handful+of+people.+Their+2005+release+%26ldquo%3BEyes+Open%26rdquo%3B+saw+their+situation+change+dramatically+with+support+from+a+%26lsquo%3BGrey%26rsquo%3Bs+Anatomy%26rsquo%3B+song+placement%2C+their+album+became+an+%26ldquo%3Bovernight+success%26rdquo%3B.+There+was+nothing+%26ldquo%3Bovernight%26rdquo%3B+about+their+success+though+and+their+story+is+not+unique%2C+it+is+shared+by+many+other+artists.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EI+haven%26rsquo%3Bt+heard+of+a+formula+that+makes+success+any+easier+to+achieve%2C+but+I%26nbsp%3Bdo+know+that+those+who+have+been+successful%2C+have+had+to+stick+it+out+for+a+while.+Sure%2C+there+are+elements+to+the+success+equation+that+are+not+entirely+in+our+control%2C+for+example+natural+ability+or+talent+is+more+a+product+of+nature+than+it+is+anything+else.+This+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt+put+those+of+us+who+aren%26rsquo%3Bt+naturally+gifted+out+of+the+running+though%2C+it+just+means+that+we+may+have+to+work+a+little+harder+and+stay+a+little+longer+to+get+there.+True%2C+aspirational+success+is+a+rare+confluence+of+opportunity%2C+talent+and+circumstance.+The+longer+you%26rsquo%3Bre+in+the+game%2C+the+more+likely+you+are+to+experience+it.+I+see+this+with+the+exceptional+individuals+in+our+business+and+customers.+There+are+so+many+different+products%2C+companies+and+technologies+to+work+with+out+there+in+the+market+and+it%26rsquo%3Bs+hard+to+decide+which+horse+to+hitch+your+wagon+to.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+harder+to+know+when+to+leave+and+when+to+stay+with+your+company%2C+when+to+admit+failure+and+move+on+with+your+venture.+What+I+can+say+is+this%3A+make+sure+you%26rsquo%3Bre+where+you%26rsquo%3Bre+meant+to+be%2C+and+when+you+are%2C+put+your+faith+in+your+team%2C+company+or+colleagues+and+saddle+in+for+the+long+haul.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EEgo+is+your+enemy%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOut+of+check+egos+have+been+responsible+for+robbing+us+of+many+of+our+favourite+bands+over+the+years+%28Guns+%26lsquo%3Bn+Roses%2C+The+Police%2C+Oasis+to+name+only+a+few%29.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+easy+to+understand+how+emotions+can+get+the+better+of+you+when+you%26rsquo%3Bre+being+worshiped+by+thousands+of+people+every+night%2C+and+they+all+want+a+piece+of+you.+I+remember+seeing+Oasis+live+in+2009+and+one+of+the+magnetic+aspects+of+their+performance+was+Liam%26rsquo%3Bs+obvious+disdain+for+the+audience.+He+was+the+true+embodiment+of+a+narcissistic+rock-star+and+it+was+almost+romantic.+We+wanted+that+from+him%2C+we+paid+for+it.+Liam%26rsquo%3Bs+narcissism+however+was+not+just+a+performance%2C+it+was+a+disease+which+ended+up+destroying+his+relationship+with+his+band+and+brother.+Although%2C+you+have+to+admit+that+he%26%2339%3Bs+got+a+sense+of+humour+about+it.+An+excerpt+from+the+book+of+Gallagher%3A+%26quot%3BI+suppose+I+do+get+sad%2C+but+not+for+too+long.+I+just+look+in+the+mirror+and+go%2C+%60What+a+%28expletive%29%26nbsp%3Bgood-looking%26nbsp%3B%28expletive%29%26nbsp%3Byou+are.%60+And+then+I+brighten+up.%26quot%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESelf-confidence+is+attractive%2C+and+it+builds+confidence+in+the+people+we+interact+with.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+also+healthy+for+us+to+respect+our+own+opinions+and+methods.+A+good+dose+of+it+is+absolutely+necessary+for+success+but+be+careful+not+to+drink+too+deeply.+Teams+that+exhibit+a+deeper+sense+of+respect+for+each-other%26rsquo%3Bs+contributions%2C+opinions+and+personalities+are+far+better+equipped+to+weather+the+storm+while+those+who+succumb+to+ego+and+delusion+will+dissolve.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EHave+fun%2C+be+interesting+and+break+some+stuff%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ERock+bands+remind+us+that+it%26rsquo%3Bs+important+to+question%2C+break+the+rules+and+let+loose+from+time+to+time.+Whether+it%26rsquo%3Bs+punk%2C+grunge%2C+metal+or+pop%2C+people+are+usually+drawn+to+it+for+similar+reasons.+We+want+to+know+what+it%26rsquo%3Bs+like+on+the+other+side%2C+to+live+a+little+vicariously%2C+be+a+part+of+a+movement+and+maybe+even+be+reminded+that+we%26rsquo%3Bre+in+control+of+our+own+lives.+And+the+industry+needs+examples+and+stories+of+risk-takers%2C+rule-breakers+and+mad-men+-+people+who+push+and+test+limits+to+show+us+what%26%2339%3Bs+possible.%26nbsp%3BLegends%2C+pariahs+and+martyrs+who+show+us+what+we+can%2C+can%26rsquo%3Bt%2C+should+and+shouldn%26rsquo%3Bt+do.+I%26rsquo%3Bm+not+advocating+bat-biting+%28Ozzy+Osbourne%29+or+throwing+grand+pianos+into+hotel+pools+%28Keith+Moon%29%2C+but+the+world+would+be+a+much+duller+place+without+them.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETo+close+with+a+quote+from+our+very+own+industry%2C+while+discussing+the+prospect+of+Bitcoin%26rsquo%3Bs+price+reaching+%24500%2C000+in+the+next+3+years+-+McAfee+%26amp%3B+Associates+founder+John+McAfee+said+%26quot%3BIf+not%2C+I+will+eat+my+own%26nbsp%3B%28insert+part+of+male+anatomy+here%29%26nbsp%3Bon+national+television%26quot%3B.+Now+there+is+someone+who+is+willing+to+put%26nbsp%3Bmore%26nbsp%3Bthan+their+money+where+their%26nbsp%3Bmouth%26nbsp%3Bis.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E What+have+I+learned+about+running+remote+teams%3F %3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EBy%3C%2Fstrong%3E+%3Cstrong%3EMatthew+Longden+%28Entelect%2C+Delivery+Manager%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAs+far+back+as+1964+Arthur+C+Clarke+predicted+the+digital+nomad+trend+was+coming+to+the+work+place.+%3Cem%3E%26ldquo%3BPerhaps+only+50+years+from+now+a+man+%5Bmay%5D+conduct+his+business+from+Tahiti+or+Bali+just+as+well+as+he+could+from+London%26rdquo%3B.+He+went+further%3A+%26ldquo%3BMen+will+no+longer+commute%3B+%3Cstrong%3Ethey+will+communicate%2C+%5B%26hellip%3B%5D+They+will+only+travel+for+pleasure.%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fem%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIt%26%2339%3Bs+just+over+50+years+later%2C+and+while+we%26rsquo%3Bre+perhaps+not+fully+nomadic+in+our+choice+of+where+to+work%2C+the+idea+of+remote+work+is+more+and+more+prevalent%2C+certainly+in+the+IT+sector.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFor+several+years%2C+Entelect+has+been+implementing+a+version+of+remote+work%2C+essentially+our+offsite+project+model+is+that.+We+gather+requirements+for+a+system+and+then+we+proceed+to+design+and+build+it+with+teams+based+at+our+offices+in+Melrose+Arch%2C+Centurion+and+Cape+Town.+As+we%26rsquo%3Bre+advocates+of+Agile+SDLCs+we+try+to+communicate+progress+frequently+and+prefer+a+high+level+of+interaction+with+product+owners+or+client+stakeholders+to+get+prompt+feedback+on+development.+We%26rsquo%3Bre+good+at+this+model+and+we%26rsquo%3Bve+provided+many+high-quality+systems+to+our+clients+in+this+way.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EMore+recently+though+we%26rsquo%3Bve+been+engaging+with+clients+and+colleagues+in+different+ways.+For+instance%2C+when+a+colleague+decided+to+move+to+Eastern+Europe+last+year+he+continued+to+work+for+us%2C+producing+mobile+dev%2C+for+the+first+six+months+of+his+new+life+there.+We+now+have+several+engagements+where+we+have+expanded+our+onsite+team+augmentation+model+to+include+remote+teams.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EIt%26rsquo%3Bs+this+remote+augmentation+model+that+I+am+particularly+interested+in.%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFirst%2C+let+me+paint+the+perfect+remote+augmentation+picture+from+my+point+of+view.+Teams+that+really+nail+this+will+be+able+to+onboard+and+work+with+colleagues+who+are+not+coming+into+the+same+office+as+them.+Being+able+to+learn+the+domain%2C+access+systems%26nbsp%3Band+communicate+with+the+wider+team%2C+will+not+be+impacted+by+lack+of+physical+presence.+Remote+members+of+a+team+will+contribute+and+be+valued+in+exactly+the+same+way+as+their+colleagues+and+they+will+undertake+all+the+same+tasks+as+the+core+team.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+idea+of+such+a+team+is+attractive+to+me+as+a+Delivery+Manager+because+it+opens+up+possibilities+to+support+our+clients+in+new+ways.+By+tapping+into+the+major+commercial+hubs+in+South+Africa+we+can+find+the+best+composition+of+skillsets+and+experience+to+help+them+achieve+their+development+aims.+No+doubt%2C+it+has+to+be+better+for+our+economy+and+the+growth+of+South+Africa%26rsquo%3Bs+IT+industry+to+recruit+people+in+this+country+rather+than+looking+abroad%2C+and+as+the+IT+skills+pool+is+relatively+isolated+in+this+country+we+need+to+be+flexible+in+our+approaches+to+teams.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EWhat+have+I+learned+so+far%3F%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETo+assume+that+remote+augmentation+will+work+in+just+the+same+way+local+augmentation+does+%28we+all+just+use+jira+and+get+on+with+it%2C+right%3F%29+is+simplistic+in+the+extreme.+By+its+nature%2C+augmenting+into+a+team+typically+requires+much+closer+interaction%2C+both+in+terms+of+frequency+of+communication+and+in+the+nature+of+tasks+being+taken+on.+It+should+be+perfectly+normal+for+the+person+sitting+400km+away+to+develop+the+service+tier+which+the+front+end+developer%26nbsp%3Bsitting+locally+will+consume%2C+or+visa+versa.+However%2C+achieving+this+is+not+always+trivial.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E%28The+right%29+tech+can+help%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETech+has+been+the+enabler+of+people+working+remotely+so+its+unsurprising+that+it+sits+at+the+center+of+any+solution+to+remote+working.+Its+vital+to+have+the+correct+array+of+communication+mediums+available+and+that+the+team+members+are+able+to+use+them+appropriately.+The+humble+telephone+still+has+a+huge+part+to+play+but+provisioning+a+team+with+IM%2C+video+conferencing%2C+group+messaging+such+as+Slack%2C+as+well+as+the+now+common+tools+like+Jira+and+BitBucket+is+key+removing+the+inherent+friction+in+communicating+from+a+remote+location.+Products+such+as+Basecamp+are+also+available%2C+they+aim+to+provide+a+single+platform+off+which+you+can+run+a+distributed+team.+It+goes+without+saying+that+high+speed%2C+stable+network+access+for+the+remote+teams+is+a+%26lsquo%3Bmust%26rsquo%3B+as+well.+Security+policies%2C+especially+of+corporates%2C+need+to+align+to+allow+remote+workers+access+to+all+the+systems+they+need+to+do+their+job.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EThe+remote+team+is+not+a+second+class+citizen%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+ideal+here+is+that+remote+colleagues+simply+pull+tasks+off+the+same+backlog+as+the+core+team.+I+have+seen+instances+though+where+the+core+team+allocate+simpler+tasks+to+the+remote+team+under+the+reasoning+that+they%26rsquo%3Bll+be+easier+to+do+in+isolation+%28this+is+also+a+common+model+when+dealing+with+high+capacity+offshore+teams+in+places+like+India+and+the+Philippines%29.+This+sets+a+tone+where+the+remote+guys+feel+like+they+are+never+given+access+to+the+more+complex%2C+interesting+work.+Over+time+this+will+lead+to+them+feeling+disengaged+and+is+likely+to+lead+to+frustrations+around+their+ability+to+contribute+to+the+development+effort.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EMaking+it+work+is+also+a+people+problem%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EI+find+the+really+insightful+part+of+Clarke%26rsquo%3Bs+1964+prediction+not+to+be+the+idea+of+remote+work+itself+but+that+of+people+needing+to+communicate.+Despite+the+fact+that+we+grow+up+with+so+many+ways+of+communicating+these+days+we+are+generally+still+very+bad+at+communicating+effectively%2C+especially+when+not+working+face-to-face.+This+is%2C+and+will+remain+for+some+time%2C+the+main+barrier+to+how+well+any+given+remote+team+will+work+in+my+opinion.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+an+industry+not+known+for+high+EQ+levels+across+the+workforce%2C+it+is+especially+important+to+make+sure+there+are+nominated+people+in+both+the+local+and+remote+teams+that+will+help+facilitate+excellent+communications.+This+will+ensure+expectations+across+the+team+boundaries+are+managed.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EManagement+support+and+buy+in%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EI+encounter+managers+who+are+open+to+trying+a+remote+team+however+they+feel+there+is+no+extra+overhead+needed+to+make+the+engagement+a+success.+In+addition+to+the+above+points+around+tech%2C+equality+between+teams+and+great+communication+pathways%2C+it+is+important+that+the+management+team+themselves+are+clear+in+where+potential+issues+may+lie+and+are+proactive+in+dealing+with+them.+My+experience+of+remote+augmentation+is+that+when+things+do+start+to+go+wrong+you+really+need+strong+leadership+to+act+quickly+to+put+plans+in+place+to+address+the+issues+at+hand.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EBeing+able+to+build+teams+that+can+operate+in+this+fashion+does+require+different+skills%2C+approaches+and+tech+than+simply+running+a+local+team.+If+you+manage+to+get+it+right+though+the+potential+to+unlock+talent+pools+in+other+South+African+cities%2C+and+ultimately+further+afield%2C+is+an+exciting+prospect+for+Development+Managers+struggling+to+find+the+skills+they+need+locally.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E
