Nobody+Reads+Anymore+Right%3F %3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EBy+Shashi+Hansjee+%28Entelect%2C+CEO%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWe+have+a+few+questions+that+we+ask+people+joining+our+company%2C+to+get+to+know+them+better.+One+of+which+is+their+favourite+book.+Granted%2C+we+are+a+technology+company+and+so+naturally+will+have+a+larger+than+average+number+of+readers%2C+but+pretty+much+every+person+speaks+passionately+about+one+or+two+particular+books+that+really+spoke+to+them.+Of+course%2C+most+of+these+are+fiction%2C+but+when+people+say+that+nobody+reads+anymore%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+not+true.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EOne+of+my+favourite+quotes+is+from+Warren+Buffet.+When+asked+about+the+key+to+success%2C+he+said+%26ldquo%3BRead+500+pages+every+day.+That%26rsquo%3Bs+how+knowledge+works.+It+builds+up%2C+like+compound+interest.%26rdquo%3B+He+also+followed+up+that+statement+with+%26ldquo%3BAll+of+you+can+do+it%2C+but+I+guarantee+not+many+of+you+will+do+it.%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFrom+a+business+reading+perspective%2C+I+never+manage+to+get+through+as+many+books+as+I%26rsquo%3Bd+like+to%2C+but+I+do+manage+to+read+at+least+one+or+two+per+month.+I%26rsquo%3Bve+found+there+are+a+few+tricks+to+developing+a+concentrated+reading+list%2C+compared+to+the+four+or+five+per+month+many+other+thought-leading+executives+seem+get+through.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFirstly%2C+experiment.+Amazon+have+an+enormous+range+of+books+and+their+recommendations+generally+work+well.+Reading+reviews%2C+checking+out+the+contents+and+reading+the+first+chapter+before+you+buy+will+help+you+identify+those+books+that+are+outside+the+obvious+bestsellers+and+can+offer+amazing+insights.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESecondly%2C+be+aware+and+be+%3Cem%3Ecreative%3C%2Fem%3E.+If+you+take+just+one+idea+from+a+book+and+apply+it+to+your+business%2C+then+the+time+spent+is+worth+it.+At+times%2C+it+might+not+be+obviously+applicable%2C+but+being+aware%2C+and+thinking+outside+the+box+when+reading%2C+has+led+to+some+of+the+most+successful+initiatives+in+our+business+today.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFinally%2C+variety+is+important.+Generally%2C+people+get+hung+up+on+reading+one+type+of+book+%26ndash%3B+either+strategy%2C+or+other+peoples%26rsquo%3B+success+stories%2C+or+topics+that+are+only+applicable+to+their+area+or+role.+Variety+is+key+to+expanding+the+mind+and+promoting+creativity.+Some+of+the+more+technical+or+specialised+subject+matter-focussed+books+are+a+heavier+read%2C+but+often+that+extra+detail+and+depth+can+yield+the+most+practical+ideas.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESo%2C+invest+in+your+knowledge+by+reading+regularly.+Challenge+your+existing+knowledge+by+picking+up+books+that+sit+outside+of+your+comfort+zone+and+think+laterally+while+reading.+There+is+no+rule+as+to+where+a+creative+solution+to+a+business+problem+can+come+from.+What+is+certain%2C+is+that+you+don%26rsquo%3Bt+have+to+be+at+executive+level+to+bring+a+great+idea+into+a+business+or+your+team+and+change+the+way+things+are+done+for+the+better.%3C%2Fp%3E Don%E2%80%99t+be+a+commodity+in+your+career.+Stop+doing+and+start+growing. %3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EBy+Matthew+Butler+%28Entelect%2C+General+Manager+%3A+Managed+Solutions%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EYou+could+coast+through+a+career+of+40+years%2C+or+become+formidable+in+5.+This+is+a+look+at+two+mechanisms+to+stay+on+the+accelerator%2C+grow+as+a+professional+and+make+an+impact+wherever+you+are.+These+mechanisms+are+your+attitude+towards+learning%2C+and+your+willingness+to+understand+context.+These+are+two+stand-out+concepts+I%26%2339%3Bve+learnt+and+observed+in+my+own+journey+from+junior+to+leadership.+It+is+scary+how+this+conventional+wisdom+is+lost+or+diluted+in+many+companies.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Essentially+these+do+boil+down+to+critical+thinking%2C+but+let%26rsquo%3Bs+take+a+moment+to+explore+learning+and+context+as+two+of+the+easier+ways+to+change+your+mindset+towards+your+work%2C+get+ahead+of+your+peers%2C+and+stand+out%21+We+individually+have+control+of+these+areas+of+our+professional+lives.+In+particular%2C+attitudes+or+mindsets+like+these+have+nothing+to+do+with+industry+knowledge%2C+experience+or+technical+skill.+Your+stance+is+your+key+to+a+massively+accelerated+career%2C+if+you+want+it.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+We+land+in+our+roles+full+of+uncertainty+but+ambitious+because+of+it.+We+are+motivated+to+learn+and+are+terrified+of+underperformance.+The+mystery+of+a+new+career+energises+us+greatly+through+new+purpose+and+problems.+We+must+justify+our+selection+to+join+a+team+and+hold+a+position.+Does+this+sound+familiar%3F%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Sometime+into+your+role+you+learn+the+recipe.+You+solve+many+of+the+mysteries%2C+and+deeply+understand+how+a+team+or+organisation+operates.+Through+this+clarification+the+novelty+of+the+role+wears+off%2C+and+human+nature+dictates+that+we+start+to+lose+interest.+We+stop+pushing+ourselves+as+our+expectations+align+with+our+customer%26rsquo%3Bs+or+employer%26rsquo%3Bs+expectations.+We+stop+growing+and+start+doing.+As+these+external+factors+-+new+people%2C+new+expectations+and+environments+wear+off%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+time+for+internal+factors+to+kick+in..%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+So+here+they+are%2C+two+dynamos+which+you+can+apply+to+change+your+perspective%3B+to+stop+doing+and+start+growing%3A%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3EOne%3A+learn+on+your+own+time.%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+This+is+self-investment.+You%26rsquo%3Bre+not+waiting+for+your+employer+to+force+you+on+training+or+sponsor+you%2C+you%26rsquo%3Bre+doing+it+on+your+own+time+and+your+own+dime.+You%26rsquo%3Bre+realising+that+you+are+the+captain+of+your+career+and+have+an+obligation+to+do+this+for+yourself.+It+also+accelerates+you+within+your+organisation+because+you+can+offer+more+%28incidentally+why+you+were+attractive+to+an+organisation+in+the+first+place%29.+If+you+are+clearly+investing+in+yourself+it+sends+a+critical+message+to+your+team+and+management+that+you+care+about+your+productivity+in+a+vacuum.+If+you+aren%26rsquo%3Bt+relying+on+your+employer+to+carry+you%2C+it+sets+a+very+different+balance+of+power.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+People+who+invest+in+themselves+regardless+of+circumstance%2C+employer+or+project+are+independent.+They%26rsquo%3Bre+keeping+themselves+ahead+of+the+curve%2C+which+is+a+hugely+magnetic+concept.+You+probably+want+to+work+with+other+people+like+this%2C+because+they+have+so+much+to+offer.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+not+just+wisdom+or+skill+either.+Independence+breeds+positivity+and+focus%2C+characteristics+which+help+projects+succeed+and+businesses+grow.+If+you+commit+openly+with+yourself%2C+your+team+and+your+company+to+spend+your+own+time+learning+and+developing+yourself%2C+you+become+a+giver+and+not+a+taker%2C+a+transformation.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3ETwo%3A+obsess+over+context.%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+This+one+is+a+little+more+complex+but+still+nothing+ground-breaking.+The+idea+here+is+to+always+remember+why+you%26rsquo%3Bre+doing+something.+Some+call+this+big+picture+thinking+but+I+believe+it+is+more+nuanced.+Context+is+about+self-awareness%3B+it%26rsquo%3Bs+about+business+sense%2C+selflessness+and+objective+thinking.+Introspect+for+a+second%2C+ask+yourself+if+everything+you%26rsquo%3Bre+doing+and+saying+right+now+within+your+current+project+is+in+the+best+interests+of+the+success+of+that+project%3F+Does+your+attitude+show+a+care+for%2C+and+understanding+of+circumstances%3F+Business+environment%2C+customers%2C+budget+demands%2C+time+pressures.+Does+your+team+and+leadership+absolutely+trust+you+to+think+for+yourself%3B+have+you+demonstrated+that+you+can%3F%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+This+is+harder+to+balance+because+what+we+need+to+do+or+say+in+the+best+interests+of+the+project+may+not+align+so+perfectly+with+our+personal+measurement+of+things.+This+is+also+a+common+perspective+%28or+measurement%29+of+maturity+-+our+ability+to+put+personal+agenda+aside+in+these+circumstances+and+to+prioritise+the+team+or+business%26rsquo%3Bs+needs.+Once+context+is+mixed+into+the+picture%2C+motivation+will+come+more+naturally+as+we+demonstrate+a+balanced+intent+and+clarity+of+purpose.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Another+introspection+for+you+to+try%3A+when+the+dust+settles%2C+what+will+your+contribution+be%3F+Douglas+Kruger+talks+about+this+in+his+book+%26ldquo%3BOwn+your+Industry%26rdquo%3B+%28a+cool+read+by+the+way%29.+He+talks+about+speaking+the+language+of+results+when+we+are+trying+to+sell+something.+He+encourages+us+to+think+about+outcomes+as+what+people+and+businesses+are+attracted+to%2C+as+opposed+to+the+input%2C+features+or+tasks.+If+you+%26ldquo%3Bdo+a+thing%26rdquo%3B+you%26rsquo%3Bre+a+commodity%2C+if+you+%26ldquo%3Bget+a+result%26rdquo%3B+you%26rsquo%3Bre+a+in+a+position+of+power.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+These+two+mindsets+are+made+even+more+interesting+because+they+present+a+curious+balance+of+their+own.+Self-investment+can+be+considered+selfish+and+unrelated+to+your+role%2C+but+context+is+100%25+selfless+and+focused+on+the+narrow+agenda.+The+important+realisation+is+that+our+stance+when+it+comes+to+these+two+elements+of+ourselves+are+powerful+levers+to+pull.+They+influence+how+we+are+perceived+in+our+roles+and+should+be+understood+to+be+taken+advantage+of.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Coast+along+a+career+through+the+slow+march+of+time%2C+or+force+some+perspective.+Motivate+yourself+to+continuously+learn+for+your+own+sake%2C+and+remember+to+deliberately+empathise+with+business+objectives.+Make+a+bigger+impact%2C+get+noticed%2C+grow.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E trong%3E3.+Building+capability%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+This+is+especially+powerful+for+technical+teams.+By+sharing+a+new+process+or+solution+through+an+employee+story+%28sharing+key+actions%2C+lessons+learned+and+the+honest+frustrations+experienced+getting+to+the+end+point%29%2C+we+allow+other+employees+to+gain+knowledge+through+a+very+reliable+source.+This+generates+confidence+for+both+the+storyteller+and+those+who+can+learn+from+them.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E4.+Employee+engagement+and+connection%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+By+sharing+something+deeply+personal+or+a+story+that+stirs+emotions%2C+a+storyteller+can+build+connections+across+the+business+and+bring+everyone+together+through+shared+empathy.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cstrong%3E5.+A+new+business+process%2Fprocedure%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+A+communications+area+that+is+usually+delivered+in+a+dry+way+can+be+far+more+engaging+when+delivered+by+employees+who+can+authentically+share+the+benefits+they+have+gained+or+will+gain+from+the+new+process.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+There+are+various+ways+to+find+and+capture+these+stories%2C+although+maybe+surprisingly%2C+the+simplest+way+works+wonders.+Openly+asking+all+employees+to+contribute+can+be+powerful%2C+especially+if+it+is+to+highlight+the+great+work+of+others.+People+in+leadership+positions+can+also+highlight+top+performers+as+a+source+of+engaging+stories+to+share+across+the+business.+It+is+important+to+ensure+that+the+key+messages+are+shared+beforehand%2C+so+the+team+knows+what+to+look+out+for%2C+but+as+much+as+possible+let+employees+tell+the+story+in+their+own+words.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Guiding+the+narrators+to+tell+compelling+stories%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Not+everyone+is+a+natural+storyteller+in+written+or+spoken+form%2C+so+it+is+vitally+important+for+companies+to+give+the+right+support+and+guidance+to+empower+employees+to+deliver+their+best+stories+authentically.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Regardless+of+the+format%2C+there+are+a+few+critical+elements+that+will+help+frame+the+narrative.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BWho+is+the+audience%3F+i.e.+their+team%2C+division%2C+or+the+entire+business%3F%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BWhat+is+the+key+moral+of+the+story%3F%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BWhy+will+the+audience+find+this+useful%3F%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BHow+did+I+achieve+the+success+I+am+going+to+share%3F+What+were+the+biggest+challenges+I+faced%3F%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BWhat+would+I+find+most+interesting+about+my+story+that+I+think+others+might+find+engaging%3F%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+last+point+is+quite+powerful+because+if+you+have+employees+aligned+to+the+same+objectives%2C+an+employee+will+know+what+others+will+find+empowering+and+inspirational.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+If+it+is+a+story+that+is+being+shared+by+a+live+presentation+or+video%2C+consider+offering+public+speaking+or+presentation+coaching+beforehand+to+build+confidence.+Also%2C+having+experienced+speakers+available+to+positively+share+feedback+during+practice+runs+will+allow+companies+to+develop+a+stable+of+great+storytellers+across+the+business+over+time.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Use+this+great+asset+within+your+business+%26ndash%3B+your+people%2C+empower+them+and+guide+them+towards+narrating+their+own+stories+of+learning%2C+achievement+and+success.+This+is+a+technique+organisations+can+use+to+create+and+share+much+more+engaging+and+memorable+messaging.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Let+your+people+tell+your+story+for+you.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E s+to+find%2C+so+retaining+staff+has+become+vitally+important%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+last+challenge+naturally+leads+to+the+discussion+around+employee+retention%2C+but+also+how+powerful+employee+advocacy+is+in+a+digital+world.+With+global+tech+companies+such+as+Apple%2C+Google+and+Facebook+leading+the+way+with+free+food+around+the+clock%2C+massage+therapists%2C+games+rooms+and+even+sleep+pods%2C+companies+small+and+large+are+by+necessity+looking+at+all+kinds+of+ways+to+make+the+employee+experience+as+enjoyable+as+it+can+be.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EUser+experience+%3D+Employee+experience%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAs+the+world+becomes+more+connected+than+ever%2C+sharing+experiences+with+others+can+have+immense+reach.+Leading+companies+such+as+Microsoft+are%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fblog.impraise.com%2F360-feedback%2Fmicrosoft-throws-stack-ranking-out-the-window%22+target%3D%22_blank%22%3E+reimagining+the+way+performance+reviews+%3C%2Fa%3Eare+processed.+There+is+a+growing+movement+globally+to+phase+out+the+traditional+style+of+annual+performance+reviews+against+a+numerical+scale%2C+to+a+style+of+frequent%2C+informal+employee+feedback+during+regular+check-ins%2C+and+adjusting+how+merit-based+pay+increases+are+assessed.+This+allows+for+bugbears+to+be+regularly+ironed+out.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThere+are+countless+examples+of+negative+customer+service+going+viral+on+social+media.+Websites+such+as+Glassdoor+allow+employees+to+review+their+working+experiences+in+a+public+forum%2C+giving+insight+into+what+it+is+like+to+work+for+any+company.+Companies+have+no+influence+over+what+is+published+and+it+is+totally+anonymous.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThis+is+one+of+the+many+critical+reasons+why+HR+functions+should+embrace+and+empower+their+people+with+the+ability+to+give+feedback+on+issues+outside+of+the+traditional+review+processes%2C+and+addressing+those+concerns+through+continual+leadership+communications.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EBeing+connected+through+digital%2C+starts+and+ends+with+engaged+people%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAs+the+custodians+of+the+most+important+but+arguably+the+most+complex+resource+within+a+business%2C+HR+functions+need+to+be+connected+throughout+a+business.+It+comes+with+its+fair+share+of+challenges%2C+but+these+can+be+overcome+if+HR+functions+focus+on+the+empowerment+of+people+through%3A%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26middot%3B+Aligning+all+individual+objectives+to+those+of+the+overall+business+and+ensuring+everyone+understands+their+contribution+to+achieving+these%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26middot%3B+Fostering+a+culture+of+open+and+continuous+feedback+that+is+embraced+and+actioned+by+leaders+all+year+round%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26middot%3B+Be+the+champions+of+change+to+processes%2C+to+free+up+resources+to+focus+on+things+that+drive+business+outcomes+and+for+leaders+to+support+their+people+in+their+growth%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26middot%3B+Partner+with+IT+and+expert+agencies+to+evolve+legacy+systems+to+save+resources+and+digitise+the+employee+experience+end-to-end%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26middot%3B+Embrace+digital+as+a+positive+catalyst+for+connecting+all+functions+of+the+business+to+a+common+goal+%26ndash%3B+with+HR+taking+a+central+role+in+that+connection%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAt+Entelect%2C+we+pride+ourselves+in+being+aligned+with+the+global+trend+of+identifying+ways+to+deliver+a+connected%2C+digital+employee+experience+through+our+empowered+HR+function.+But+we+take+it+one+step+further.+We+ensure+that+our+performance+reviews+are+designed+to+cultivate+talent+and+not+merely+provide+a+review.+We+don%26%2339%3Bt+see+the+traditional+HR+function+as+the+rest+of+the+world+sees+it%2C+but+rather+as+a+people+function.+We+see+our+valued+people+as+individuals+who+we+look+to+constantly+grow%2C+and+this+is+what+sets+us+apart.%3C%2Fp%3E ["Teams and culture"] The world is changig so is HR.png
Performance+reviews+which+make+a+real+difference g+with+commendations.+Joshua+has+had+an+even+better+review+period%2C+but+what+motivates+him+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+success+%26ndash%3B+it%26rsquo%3Bs+mastery+and+the+depth+of+the+technical+challenges+he+has+faced+and+come+out+on+top+of.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIn+these+scenarios%2C+both+Daniel+and+Joshua+have+done+amazing+work.+If+we+as+managers+just+highlight+the+achievements+and+don%26rsquo%3Bt+offer+a+way+forward+or+don%26rsquo%3Bt+understand+their+motivators%2Fcareer+aspirations%2C+we+are+doing+a+disservice+to+the+excellent+individual+that+stands+before+us.+For+someone+that+hasn%26rsquo%3Bt+had+a+good+review+period%2C+if+we+focus+only+on+the+faults+without+explaining+the+implications+and+providing+actionable+feedback%2C+guidance+or+opportunities%2C+we+are+not+doing+our+jobs+of+cultivating+talent.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIt%26rsquo%3Bs+important+to+focus+on+the+positives+and+the+negatives%2C+regardless+of+the+performance+of+the+individual.+That+is+how+you+guide+people+to+grow.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EBefore+we+can+discuss+how+to+prepare+for+a+review%2C+we+need+to+understand+what+the+outcomes+of+a+review+should+be%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EPart+of+our+responsibility+as+managers+is+to+cultivate+talent%2C+grow+the+people+we+work+with+and+provide+a+clear%2C+actionable+path+for+people+to+go+down+on+in+their+careers.+We%26rsquo%3Bre+focused+on+the+perspective+of+the+reviewer+and+not+the+reviewee+in+this+article%2C+but+it+is+important+to+note+that+it+is+the+responsibility+of+both+the+reviewer+and+the+reviewee+to+make+sure+that+a+review+is+beneficial.+%26nbsp%3B%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EThe+following+list+of+outcomes+should+be+a+focus+of+any+performance+review%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cul%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3EGet+a+sense+of+individual+achievements%3C%2Fstrong%3E.+People+want+to+be+recognised+for+the+great+work+they+do.+Give+them+the+recognition+they+deserve.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3EUnderstand+the+challenges+the+person+may+have+or+has+overcome.%3C%2Fstrong%3E+If+someone+is+still+experiencing+the+challenges%2C+identifying+what+they+are+is+a+great+way+to+become+an+enabler+for%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+them.+Knowing+the+challenges+they+have+overcome+helps+to+remind+them+of+the+growth+they+experienced+over+the+review+period.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3EIdentify+the+strong+skills+the+individual+has+and+help+to+leverage+those.%3C%2Fstrong%3E+By+highlighting+the+strengths+people+have+and+explaining+how+important+those+are+in+one%26rsquo%3Bs+career%2C+reinforces+great+behaviour+and+shows+an+understanding+of+what+the+individual+has+to+offer.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3EIdentify+the+skills+that+need+refinement.%3C%2Fstrong%3E+Nobody+is+great+at+everything%2C+so+there+will+always+be+skills+that+need+refinement+or+growth+as+one+moves+down+their+career+path.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3ESetting+and+tracking+goals+set+out+by+the+person%3C%2Fstrong%3E.+Setting+goals+is+multifaceted.+You+could+use+a+goal+as+an+opportunity+to+grow+a+skill+identified+earlier%2C+or+help+the+individual+do+something+that+they+are+passionate+about+that+is+outside+of+their+work.+Goal+setting+helps+put+together+something+actionable+to+achieve+but+helps+for+accountability+too.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3EGauge+sentiment.%3C%2Fstrong%3E+This+one+is+simple%2C+find+out+if+the+person+is+happy+in+the+role+they+are+in%2C+the+work+they+are+doing+or+the+interactions+they+have+with+their+team.+Action+something+if+the+person+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+happy.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3EDeepen+a+relationship+with+the+individual%3C%2Fstrong%3E.+This+going+without+saying%2C+building+strong+relationships+with+your+team+is+a+must.+It+helps+to+be+honest%2C+to+understand+the+people+on+the+team%2C+what+inspires+them%2C+how+to+communicate+with+them%2C+where+they+come+from%2C+and+what+is+important+to+them.+It+shows+that+you+care.+It+also+improves+your+credibility+as+a+manager.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EHow+to+deliver+the+feedback%2C+career+guidance+and+support+in+the+review%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWhen+one+leaves+a+review%2C+they+should+feel+as+though+they+have+been+able+to+speak+their+mind%2C+talk+about+what+is+important+to+them%2C+have+a+clear+understanding+of+the+next+steps+and+feel+excited+about+the+challenges+ahead.+Effective+performance+feedback+looks+both+backward+and+forward%2C+speaks+to+behaviours+and+skills+as+attributes%2C+not+the+person%2C+and+explains+the+impact+and+consequences+of+those+attributes.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EThe+following+guidelines+should+be+exercised+when+providing+feedback%3A%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cul%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3EListen+first+and+ask+questions+to+clarify+understanding.%3C%2Fstrong%3E+Most+people+crave+the+opportunity+to+talk+and+share+their+views%3B+to+feel+as+though+they+are+listened+to.+It+is+a+discussion%2C+not+a+lecture.+Be+clear+in+your+understanding+of+what+the+reviewee+is+saying+and+don%26rsquo%3Bt+make+assumptions.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3EBe+constructive+by+reviewing+a+skill+and+not+the+person.+%3C%2Fstrong%3EFeedback+should+be+seen+as+an+opportunity+to+learn+more+about+yourself+professionally%2C+not+be+personal.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3EGive+specific+and+concrete+examples+where+performance+was+good+or+poor.%3C%2Fstrong%3E+Saying+things+like+%26ldquo%3Byou+are+a+very+good+communicator%26rdquo%3B+vs+%26ldquo%3Byou+are+great+at+explaining+very+technical+terms+to+non-technical+people+and+ensuring+that+everyone+in+the+room+understands+the+way+forward+while+making+people+feel+part+of+the+team%26rdquo%3B+is+very+different.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3EExplain+the+impact+of+good+and+poor+behaviour.%3C%2Fstrong%3E+You+don%26rsquo%3Bt+know+what+you+don%26rsquo%3Bt+know.+Talk+about+the+reasons+why+something+impacts+the+team+or+the+project+so+that+the+reviewee+gains+experience+and+develops+insight.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3EProvide+opportunities+or+ways+to+stretch+and+improve+skills.%3C%2Fstrong%3E+If+you+don%26rsquo%3Bt+give+an+opportunity+or+a+clear+way+to+achieve+a+goal%2C+most+people+get+stuck+and+say+that+the+opportunities+don%26rsquo%3Bt+exist+in+the+current+work+environment.+There+is+always+an+opportunity%2C+one+simply+needs+to+explain+what+it+is+and+the+measurables+from+it.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3EProvide+the+appropriate+support.%3C%2Fstrong%3E+Support+comes+in+many+formats.+Providing+training%2C+having+face+time+to+soundboard+ideas%2C+removing+blockers+or+introducing+the+right+people+at+the+right+time.+Be+available+and+offer+support+to+achieve+goals.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3EExercise+EQ.%3C%2Fstrong%3E+This+one+is+tricky%2C+but+the+gist+of+it+is+that+in+a+review%2C+your+feedback+and+tone+need+to+be+adjusted+to+each+person+you+are+reviewing.+Feedback+often+comes+with+emotions%2C+but+when+the+intent+is+to+be+constructive%2C+honest+and+to+grow+the+person%2C+delivery+of+the+feedback+becomes+much+easier.%3C%2Fli%3E+%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3EExercise+accountability.+%3C%2Fstrong%3EOften+review+feedback+requires+tough+conversations.+Accountability+is+only+effectively+achieved+when+there+is+an+agreement+in+place%2C+a+clear+understanding+of+the+boundaries+and+knowing+how+to+measure+success.+Don%26rsquo%3Bt+be+afraid+to+hold+people+accountable.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fli%3E+%3C%2Ful%3E+%3Cp%3ELet%26rsquo%3Bs+explore+how+this+strategy+played+out+with+Daniel+and+Joshua.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDaniel+is+a+rock+star+engineer%2C+and+a+natural+leader+in+the+team%2C+even+though+he+is+relatively+early+in+his+career.+His+review+started+out+as+a+highlights+reel+where+we+discussed+all+his+achievements+and+the+impact+that+he+has+made+to+the+project+and+client+%3Cstrong%3E%28listen+first%2C+recognise+achievements%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E.+We+spoke+about+his+strong+technical+skills%2C+such+as+estimations+in+his+own+work+and+his+ability+to+problem-solve+%3Cstrong%3E%28identify+strong+skills%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E%2C+but+also+identified+that+he+doesn%26rsquo%3Bt+know+how+to+estimate+other+people%26rsquo%3Bs+throughput+%3Cstrong%3E%28identify+skills+to+refine%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E.+This+resulted+in+him+setting+deadlines+he+couldn%26rsquo%3Bt+meet+and+then+pouring+his+heart+and+soul+into+the+project+to+make+sure+it+got+delivered+on+time+%3Cstrong%3E%28explain+the+impact%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAlthough+admirable+in+his+desire+to+get+things+done+and+see+things+through%2C+it+meant+that+Daniel+wasn%26rsquo%3Bt+dedicating+time+to+his+other+passion%2C+rock+climbing%2C+and+he+would+ultimately+suffer+burnout+%3Cstrong%3E%28understanding+his+challenges%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E.+We+put+together+a+dedicated+meeting+slot+to+review+every+estimation+made+on+his+own+work+and+that+of+the+others+on+the+team+to+see+how+he+would+improve+over+time+and+adjust+accordingly+%3Cstrong%3E%28provide+the+appropriate+support%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E.+We+also+agreed+that+he+should+do+the+things+he+is+passionate+about+and+that+I+would+call+him+out+if+he+didn%26rsquo%3Bt+do+at+least+one+trip+to+the+nearest+indoor+rock+climbing+gym+once+a+month+%3Cstrong%3E%28agreeing+to+a+goal+and+shared+accountability%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EJoshua%2C+our+technically-minded+defender+of+quality+and+champion+of+best+practices+entered+the+room+and+didn%26rsquo%3Bt+say+much.+Highlighting+all+the+achievements+and+technical+brilliance+he+brought+to+the+team+from+my+point+of+view+is+how+the+review+started+%3Cstrong%3E%28recognise+achievements%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E.+We+proceeded+to+talk+about+the+solutions+he+was+delivering+on+the+project+and+if+he+still+felt+as+though+the+work+was+challenging+%3Cstrong%3E%28gauging+sentiment%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E.+He+was+very+happy+and+felt+as+though+he+was+still+adding+huge+value.+The+next+thing+we+spoke+about+was+his+career+path.+He+wants+to+go+down+the+path+of+being+a+Solutions+Architect%3B+so+we+chatted+about+the+need+to+grow+the+skills+of+influencing+change+and+being+able+to+address+non-technical+people+%28identifying+skills+to+grow%29.+These+skills+would+be+grown+by+running+project+planning+workshops%2C+and+joining+the+analysis+meetings+with+the+business+analysts+%3Cstrong%3E%28provide+the+right+opportunities+to+improve+skills%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E.+His+strengths+in+holding+people+accountable+would+provide+the+legitimacy+in+a+room+of+non-technical+people+as+being+the+trusted+advisor+on+the+team+%3Cstrong%3E%28leveraging+strong+skills%29%3C%2Fstrong%3E.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EPreparation+and+clear+feedback+are+key.+Think+of+the+outcomes+you+want+to+achieve+from+a+performance+review+before+it+starts.+Providing+great+tactile+feedback+gives+clear+direction+and+makes+a+review+meaningful.+To+take+it+a+step+further%2C+share+your+intent%2C+and+get+the+reviewee+to+prepare+for+the+review+following+the+same+guidelines.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3EAt+Entelect%2C+we+are+all+about+staying+true+to+our+core+values+through+our+performance+reviews.+Through+being+open+%26amp%3B+honest+and+building+meaningful+relationships+during+reviews+means+that+%3Cem%3Erelationships+set+us+apart%3C%2Fem%3E.+By+providing+clear+actionable+feedback%2C+we+ensure+that+for+those+within+our+organisation%2C+%3Cem%3Egrowth+isn%26rsquo%3Bt+optional%3C%2Fem%3E.%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E nding+the+reasoning+behind+the+roadblock+will+make+it+easier+to+compromise+and+collectively+come+up+with+a+solution.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWithout+proper+communication+and+leveraging+each+other%26rsquo%3Bs+skillsets%2C+the+user+experience+provided+will+lack+efficiency%2C+engagement%2C+and+value.+Promoting+transparency+on+tasks+and+timelines%2C+and+nurturing+a+feedback+culture+within+the+team+as+a+whole%2C+is+critical+to+ensure+you%26rsquo%3Bre+creating+great+products+with+the+best+user+experience+possible%2C+without+compromising+on+robustness+and+maintainability.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E %3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FCodingCommunity-FINAL.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EPresident+Barack+Obama+asked+in+his+State+of+the+Union+address+that+%26ldquo%3Bwe+live+in+a+time+of+extraordinary+change%2C+change+that%26rsquo%3Bs+affecting+the+way+we+live+and+the+way+we+work.+New+technology+replaces+any+job+where+work+can+be+automated.%26nbsp%3B+Workers+need+more+skills+to+get+ahead.%26nbsp%3B+These+changes+aren%26rsquo%3Bt+new%2C+and+they%26rsquo%3Bre+only+going+to+accelerate.%26nbsp%3B+So%2C+the+question+we+have+to+ask+ourselves+is%2C+%26lsquo%3BHow+can+we+make+sure+everyone+has+a+fair+shot+at+success+in+this+new+economy%3F%26rsquo%3B%26rdquo%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3BThe+answer+is+coding+and+computer+science+education.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+good+news+is+that+if+you+are+not+able+to+attend+courses+or+university+after+school%2C+or+if+you+are+in+a+different+role+and+want+to+upskill+in+software+development%2C+there+are+many+organisations+today+assisting+people+at+all+levels+to+get+involved+in+the+world+of+code.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+In+South+Africa+alone%2C+there%26rsquo%3Bs+a+strong+IT+community+with+a+plethora+of+knowledge-sharing+events+to+attend%2C+if+you+know+about+them.+There+are+also+several+different+organisations+assisting+and+growing+individuals+in+this+space.+So%2C+who+exactly+are+they+and+how+can+you+get+involved%3F%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B%3Cstrong%3EGirlCode%3C%2Fstrong%3E+is+a+social+enterprise+that+aims+to+empower+young+girls+and+women+through+technology.+Their+vision+is+to+impact+10-million+women+across+Africa+in+10+years%2C+starting+with+getting+young+girls+interested+in+STEM.+It+aims+to+do+this+through+strategic+partnerships+with+the+public+sector%3B+strengthening+collaboration+with+similar+organisations%3B+and+leveraging+corporate+assets+in+the+development+of+ICT+facilities%2C+infrastructure+and+networks+within+schools+in+disadvantaged+communities.+GirlCode+run+workshops+throughout+the+year%2C+which+are+aimed+at+the+community+and+are+positioned+to+accommodate+all+skill+levels+in+various+technologies%2C+such+as+HTML%2C+CSS%2C+JavaScript+and+more.+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fgirlcode.co.za%2F%22%3Ehttps%3A%2F%2Fgirlcode.co.za%2F%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B%3Cstrong%3EGeekulcha%3C%2Fstrong%3E+is+where+young%2C+skilled%2C+creative+and+ambitious+tech+minds+meet+to+connect+with+each+other%2C+share+knowledge%2C+collaborate+on+projects%2C+network+with+industry+leaders%2C+obtain+training+to+further+improve+and+enhance+their+skills+and+to+put+that+newly+acquired+skill+to+work.+The+platform+has+over+11+200+tech+enthusiasts+and+innovators+across+Africa.+Their+focus+is+on+empowering+young+geeks+through+ICT+skills+development+and+training+while+giving+them+a+taste+of+what+awaits+them+in+the+big+world+through+industry+exposure.+Their+ultimate+goal+is+to+help+the+young+innovators+with+skills+for+employment+and+innovation+development.+Geekulcha+provides+a+variety+of+platforms+and+events+for+growth+while+being+exposed+to+the+corporate+world.+All+Geekulcha+events+are+free.+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fgeekulcha.com%2Fevents%22%3Ehttps%3A%2F%2Fgeekulcha.com%2Fevents%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B%3Cstrong%3EUser+Groups.+%3C%2Fstrong%3ELocal+and+international+organisations+have+also+realised+the+need+to+help+facilitate%2C+train+and+assist+in+the+education+and+upskilling+of+the+community%2C+especially+here+in+South+Africa+where+the+skills+shortage+is+prevalent.+We+value+building+relationships+and+the+community+around+us+and+believe+that+if+you+can+network+with+peers+in+the+industry%2C+you+can+learn+from+what+they+are+doing.+Participating+in+user+groups+is+a+great+way+to+improve+technical%2C+presentation+and+networking+skills.+They+are+free+to+attend+and+anyone+can+join+in.+Visit+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fculture.entelect.co.za%22%3Ehttps%3A%2F%2Fculture.entelect.co.za%3C%2Fa%3E+or+sign+up+on+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.meetup.com%22%3Ehttps%3A%2F%2Fwww.meetup.com%3C%2Fa%3E+to+view+events.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26bull%3B%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3B%3Cstrong%3EThe+Entelect+Foundation+%3C%2Fstrong%3Eis+an+initiative+designed+to+provide+support+to+the+underprivileged+in+the+community%3B+be+it+financial+aid%2C+schoolwork+or+counselling.+The+primary+focus+of+Foundation+is+on+educating+the+community+to+equip+them+with+skills+that+will+help+them+become+self-sufficient.+On+Saturday+mornings+Entelectuals+volunteer+to+help+tutor+the+learners+from+our+offices%2C+having+put+many+children+through+better+schools+with+better+results+in+the+past+year.+Through+the+Entelect+Foundation%2C+we+even+helped+one+learner+through+high+school+and+university%2C+who+then+finally+joined+Entelect+as+a+graduate+software+engineer.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFor+more+information+or+to+get+involved%2C+visit+%3Ca+href%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.culture.entelect.co.za%22%3Ewww.culture.entelect.co.za%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FNews.jpg%22+style%3D%22width%3A+800px%3B+height%3A+243px%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E Forganization%2Four-insights%2Fis-there-a-payoff-from-top-team-diversity%22%3EMcKinsey+%26amp%3B+Company%3C%2Fa%3E+study+across+Germany%2C+France%2C+the+United+Kingdom+and+the+United+States+that+included+180+companies%2C+found+that+those+with+more+diverse+workforces+enjoyed+significantly+higher+earnings+and+returns+on+equity.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThose+that+outperformed+were+able+to+make+the+right+decisions+faster+which+is+an+obvious+advantage+in+any+industry.+This+ultimately+led+to+higher+profits.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3E3.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BGreater+economic+and+employment+benefits+for+the+wider+market%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+European+Institute+for+Gender+Equality+%28EIGE%29+has%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Feige.europa.eu%2Fgender-mainstreaming%2Fmethods-tools%2Fabout%22%3E+analysed+multiple+data+sources%3C%2Fa%3E+across+the+European+Union+and+its+member+states+to+extrapolate+two+key+positive+economic+outcomes+for+STEM+within+the+EU.+Although+the+European+Union+is+a+vastly+different+market+to+Africa%2C+we+believe+the+tangential+benefits+for+Africa+would+be+very+similar.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22margin-left%3A+160px%3B%22%3Ea.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BIncreasing+the+participation+of+women+in+STEM+subjects+will+have+a+strong+positive+GDP+impact+at+EU+level.+Closing+the+gender+gap+in+STEM+would+contribute+to+an+increase+in+EU+GDP+per+capita+by+2.2+to+3.0%25+in+2050.+In+monetary+terms%2C+closing+the+STEM+gap+leads+to+an+improvement+in+GDP+by+%26euro%3B610+-+%26euro%3B820+billion+in+2050.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22margin-left%3A+160px%3B%22%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp+style%3D%22margin-left%3A+160px%3B%22%3Eb.%26nbsp%3B%26nbsp%3B+%26nbsp%3BClosing+gender+gaps+in+STEM+education+would+have+a+positive+impact+on+employment.%26nbsp%3B+Total+EU+employment+would+rise+by+850+000+to+1+200+000+by+2050.+These+jobs+are+forecasted+mostly+in+the+long+term+as+employment+rates+will+rise+only+after+more+women+studying+STEM+finish+their+education.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+There+are+many+factors+impacting+education%2C+skills+and+career+development.+We+need+to+understand+these+factors+so+that+inclusivity+opportunities+can+be+addressed.+If+these+are+not+addressed%2C+it+will+drive+further+inequality+among+these+workforces.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+An+equal+workforce+in+STEM+is+vital+for+many+reasons%2C+however+it+is+not+a+simple+problem+to+solve.+If+we+are+committed+to+evolving+our+workforce+to+be+more+gender-equal%2C+and+ensure+diversity+of+thought%2C+we+need+to+take+the+correct+steps+towards+achieving+this.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Government%2C+business%2C+and+society+need+to+work+together+in+order+to+make+this+viable.+Starting+in+homes%2C+parents+will+need+to+understand+what+STEM+careers+are+available+to+their+children+and+encourage+them+to+get+into+these+fields+after+school.+Companies+need+to+get+more+involved+with+educating+the+community+by+reskilling+and+upskilling%2C+and+government+needs+to+speed+up+the+roll-out+of+STEM+%26ndash%3B+in+particular+technology+in+schools+throughout+South+Africa.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+The+future+workforce+can+be+an+equal+one+but+the+work+must+start+now+to+drive+these+changes%2C+in+order+for+this+to+become+a+reality+sooner+rather+than+later.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E 5+lessons+in+continuity+for+distributed+technology+teams %3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FDistributedTeams.png%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFew+can+argue+that+2020+hasn%26rsquo%3Bt+been+full+of+worldwide+rollercoasters+%26ndash%3B+the+biggest+being+the+global+COVID-19+pandemic.+Due+to+the+accelerated+spread+of+the+virus%2C+many+organisations+have+been+forced+to+adapt+to+a+remote+working+model.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ETechnology+companies+have+been+working+with+distributed+teams+for+years.+For+most+organisations%2C+this+hasn%26rsquo%3Bt+been+by+choice%2C+but+rather+due+to+the+shortage+of+skills+in+the+industry.+In+such+a+globalised+world%2C+building+the+right+technology+team+with+the+right+skills%2C+experience+and+chemistry+is+very+unlikely+to+happen+in+one+location.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAt+Entelect%2C+we+have+been+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.entelect.co.za%2FNews%2FDisplayNewsItem.aspx%3Fniid%3D59112%22%3Erunning+distributed+and+remote+teams%3C%2Fa%3E+for+some+time+now%2C+and+so+are+fortunate+enough+to+not+be+too+disrupted+by+these+unforeseen+changes.+Below+are+5+lessons+we%26rsquo%3Bd+like+to+share+with+others+in+industry+who+are+perhaps+finding+themselves+in+unfamiliar+territory%3A%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ELesson+1%3A+Your+technological+workforce+will+adapt+easily.+Be+sure+to+pay+attention+to+non-technical+team+members+who+might+need+support.%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Developers%2C+technologists+and+tinkerers+are+usually+content+with+working+in+solitude.+They+are+used+to+installing+and+configuring+tools%2C+and+having+their+workload+managed+via+a+virtual+SCRUM+board+on+Jira+or+Azure+DevOps.+This+means+their+workflow+is+the+least+impacted+in+a+remote+delivery+environment.+On+the+other+hand%2C+analysts%2C+scrum+masters%2C+product+owners%2C+subject-matter+specialists+and+other+less+technical+roles+have+a+disproportionately+harder+challenge+being+as+effective+as+they+would+have+been+in+a+fully+co-located+working+model.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDuring+disruptive+times+like+these%2C+it%26rsquo%3Bs+important+to+establish+what+degree+of+frequent+communication+is+required.+A+well-balanced+distributed+team+should+have+low-comms+roles+making+an+effort+to+support+the+high-comms+roles%2C+and+recognise+that+this+might+be+a+more+difficult+adjustment+for+them.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ELesson+2%3A+Ensure+there%26rsquo%3Bs+someone+to+bridge+the+gap.%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+When+running+a+distributed+team%2C+there+is+often+a+gap+between+the+remote+team+and+the+on-site+business+team.+This+gap+can+cause+anything+from+delays+in+feedback+from+business+to+overall+patchy+communication+between+the+teams.+Having+somebody+%26ldquo%3Bon+the+inside%26rdquo%3B+is+critical+for+all+distributed+teams.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EAlthough+it%26rsquo%3Bs+not+always+logistically+possible%2C+there+should+ideally+be+at+least+one+allocated+person+from+the+distributed+team+who+is+physically+based+at+the+business.+This+person+needs+to+be+specifically+tasked+with+helping+the+remote+team+by+working+closely+with+the+business%2C+and+acting+as+a+translator+and+clarification+layer+between+your+distributed+engineering+team+and+the+business.+When+urgent+feedback+is+required+or+if+there+are+blockers+preventing+progress+during+the+project%2C+having+an+ally+to+receive+mandates+or+requirements+is+immeasurably+valuable.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ELesson+3%3A+Culture+is+critical.%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+If+you%26rsquo%3Bre+completely+new+to+running+a+remote+team%2C+focusing+on+culture+is+probably+more+important+now+than+ever.+Switching+to+distributed+model+is+not+an+easy+transition+%26ndash%3B+especially+if+it%26rsquo%3Bs+done+abruptly.+Digital+tools+will+go+a+long+way+during+these+transitions%2C+but+focusing+on+team+culture+will+take+it+a+lot+further.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EDon%26rsquo%3Bt+disregard+the+importance+of+how+people+interact+to+solve+problems%2C+socialise+and+support+each+other.+This+might+be+a+good+time+to+relook+at+your+team+charter+and+ensure+that+the+unique+attributes+that+kept+your+team%26rsquo%3Bs+culture+alive+are+still+implemented%2C+even+when+working+remotely.+Over+time%2C+this+will+result+in+a+culture+of+delivery+regardless+of+which+working+model+you%26rsquo%3Bre+using.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ELesson+4%3A+Collaboration+is+easy%2C+communication+is+hard.%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Teams+often+have+a+big+push+towards+collaboration+when+working+remotely.+There+is+no+need+to+start+stressing+about+collaboration.+It%26rsquo%3Bs+only+as+difficult+as+it+always+was%2C+and+only+as+good+as+your+communication.+This+is+why+you+need+to+focus+on+communication+instead.+Communication+in+distributed+or+remote+teams+is+extremely+challenging%2C+and+therefore+collaboration+becomes+more+difficult.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EGood+collaboration+flows+from+good+communication%2C+and+if+you+spend+time+and+effort+on+improving+comms+in+your+team%2C+you%26rsquo%3Bll+naturally+get+better+at+collaborating.+The+biggest+communication+challenges+in+running+distributed+teams+are+availability+and+responsiveness.+You+need+to+establish+when+each+team+member+is+available+during+the+day+and+agree+on+how+frequently+everyone+responds+to+requests+or+enquiries.+Lack+of+availability+and+responsiveness+in+teams+create+bottlenecks+that+will+delay+the+success+of+the+project.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThe+challenge+here+is+not+the+administrative+tasks+of+potentially+moving+your+project+backlog+to+a+virtual+application+or+using+digital+tools+to+collaborate.+It+is+rather+fostering+a+communication+environment+that+allows+for+availability+and+responsiveness+to+thrive.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Cstrong%3ELesson+5%3A+Mistakes+will+be+made.%3C%2Fstrong%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+Change+is+difficult+and+can+often+be+frustrating.+Very+rarely+will+teams+pick+up+a+new+working+model+without+some+hurdles+along+the+way+%26ndash%3B+and+that%26rsquo%3Bs+okay.+Learning+to+use+new+communication+tools+and+facing+other+difficulties+like+portraying+tone+and+body+language+correctly+will+be+an+adaptation+for+any+team.+Have+patience+with+each+other+and+go+through+these+changes+as+a+team.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFor+many+organisations+who+are+currently+not+using+a+remote+working+model+by+choice+but+rather+due+to+circumstances%2C+this+is+the+ideal+opportunity+to+see+the+potential+this+model+has+to+offer.%26nbsp%3B+When+you%26rsquo%3Bre+capable+and+confident+in+how+you+operate+projects+with+a+distributed+workforce%2C+scaling+teams+becomes+substantially+easier+because+you+can+source+and+manage+them+anywhere.+There+is+also+value+in+running+the+right+distributed+team+versus+the+wrong+co-located+team.+Don%26rsquo%3Bt+view+a+remote+working+model+as+a+present+complication%2C+but+rather+as+an+opportunity+to+prove+your+team%26rsquo%3Bs+determination+when+faced+with+challenges%2C+and+prepare+your+business+for+new+ways+of+working.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E Few+can+argue+that+2020+hasn%E2%80%99t+been+full+of+worldwide+rollercoasters+%E2%80%93+the+biggest+being+the+global+COVID-19+pandemic.+Due+to+the+accelerated+spread+of+the+virus%2C+many+organisations+have+been+forced+to+adapt+to+a+remote+working+model. Innovation+thrives+in+a+culture+of+cultures %3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FInnovationthrivesinacultureofcultures.png%22+%2F%3E%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EInnovation+as+a+business+concept+has+many+definitions.+At+its+core%2C+the+central+theme+of+innovation+is+the+successful+delivery+of+an+idea+that+brings+positive+value+to+a+company+and+its+customers.+However%2C+where+there+is+a+large+diversity+of+thought+when+it+comes+to+the+subject%2C+is+how+to+successfully+build+a+%26ldquo%3Bculture+of+innovation%26rdquo%3B.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EIs+it+implementing+new+processes%3F+Is+it+investing+in+collaboration+technologies+and+services%3F+Is+it+ensuring+employees+have+the+freedom+to+fail%3F+Is+it+setting+up+innovation+labs%3F+Or+is+it+the+CEO+purely+stating+the+company+will+now+%26ldquo%3Binnovate%26rdquo%3B%3F%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EThere+is+no+silver+bullet+and+most+of+the+above+can+be+parts+of+a+greater+strategy+to+foster+a+culture+of+innovation.+%28Side+note+%26ndash%3B+leadership+is+critical+but+it+is+an+ongoing+commitment%2C+not+a+singular+sermon+from+above.%29+But+like+so+many+things+in+business%2C+innovation+starts+with+the+makeup+of+the+people+within+a+business.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EInnovation+starts+with+people+coming+up+with+great+ideas.+The+nature%2C+quality+and+quantity+of+these+ideas+can+be+impacted+by+multiple+factors+%26ndash%3B+the+underlying+company+culture%2C+access+to+technology+and+resources%2C+the+ever-important+factor+of+time+to+ideate+amongst+many+others+%26ndash%3B+but+always+comes+back+to+the+source%2C+which+is+people.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EWith+the+starting+point+being+people%2C+what+is+the+best+strategy+of+ensuring+that+the+initial+idea+factory+of+business+is+in+the+best+position+to+drive+a+culture+and+output+of+innovation%3F+The+quantity+and+quality+of+ideas+are+most+positively+impacted+by+a+diversity+of+thought+and+this+is+achieved+through+the+diversity+of+your+people.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EFocusing+on+evolving+the+diversity+of+the+people+within+your+business+across+all+the+usual+factors+of+demographics%2C+education+and+experience+will+organically+diversify+and+strengthen+the+ideation+process.+This+allows+your+people+to+bring+their+exposure+from+different+cultures+that+they+have+experienced+throughout+their+personal+and+professional+lives.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EHowever%2C+that+is+just+one+part+of+it.+It+is+arguably+even+more+important+to+ensure+within+any+ideation+process%2C+session+or+project+to+bring+in+people+from+multiple+disciplines+even+if+their+roles+and%2For+expertise+don%26rsquo%3Bt+naturally+fit.+A+technology-focused+ideation+project+for+an+app-based+development+team+may+not+seem+like+the+place+for+the+brand+marketing+intern+to+come+up+with+an+amazing+idea+or+feature.+Through+their+experience+as+a+frequent+app+user+who+spent+six+months+travelling+through+Europe+before+starting+their+role%2C+for+example%2C+will+give+them+a+far+different+perspective.+This+will+allow+them+to+provide+an+insight+that+a+room+of+app+developers+would+probably+never+come+up+with%2C+but+those+developers+than+then+use+their+expertise+to+take+the+idea+and+make+it+the+next+major+feature+release.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3EYou+can+interchange+%26ldquo%3Bbrand+marketing+intern%26rdquo%3B+with+anyone+within+a+business+as+ideas+don%26rsquo%3Bt+come+from+a+qualification+but+a+lifetime+of+experiences+unique+to+each+person.+The+more+diverse+those+experiences+and+exposure+to+varied+cultures+only+widens+the+scope+of+thinking+within+a+team.%3Cbr+%2F%3E+%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3ESo+when+thinking+of+how+to+create+a+culture+of+innovation+that+thrives%2C+start+with+your+people%2C+create+an+environment+to+foster+thinking%2C+give+them+the+time+and+the+tools+to+create%2C+look+at+the+cultures+they+have+experienced+and+always+expand+the+diversity+of+these+cultures+to+foster+a+successful+one+unique+to+your+business.%3C%2Fp%3E+%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E Innovation+as+a+business+concept+has+many+definitions.+At+its+core%2C+the+central+theme+of+innovation+is+the+successful+delivery+of+an+idea+that+brings+positive+value+to+a+company+and+its+customers.+However%2C+where+there+is+a+large+diversity+of+thought+when+it+comes+to+the+subject%2C+is+how+to+successfully+build+a+%E2%80%9Cculture+of+innovation%E2%80%9D. gineering+to+the+processes+of+product+design+and+requirements+specification.+Technology+teams+need+to+be+able+to+make+informed+decisions+no+matter+the+situation+they+find+themselves+in.+They+are+closer+to+business+than+ever%2C+they+have+access+to+customers%2C+and+are+making+more+and+more+decisions+themselves+internally.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3EIndividuals+who+can+learn+faster+but+without+the+requisite+tech+experience+may+outperform+average+or+weak+team+members+with+perfect+tech+experience%2C+in+a+short+period+of+time.+We+need+to+consider+different+competencies+in+the+new+skills+profile+for+tech+teams.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%3Ciimg+alt%3D%22%22+src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.myactive.co.za%2Fwm-462416-cmsimages%2FSkillsprofile-28.png%22+style%3D%22width%3A+100%25%3B%22+%2F%3E%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3EWhen+recruiting%2C+organising+and+training+your+technology+teams%2C+there+needs+to+be+a+renewed+understanding+of+which+skills+really+are+critical%2C+and+which+would+be+a+perk.+The+new+face+of+technology+skills+prioritises+thinking%2C+engagement+and+problem+solving.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E1.+Individuals+need+to+have+the+ability+to+solve+problems+and+show+a+rational+thought+process.+This+is+determined+by+seeing+whether+they+can+articulate+decisions+made+on+their+current+or+previous+projects.+Presenting+ideas+and+communicating+a+vision+is+imperative%2C+as+is+listening+and+understanding+concepts+in+a+team.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E2.+A+well-rounded+team+member+needs+to+understand+the+fundamentals+of+their+craft+%28development%2C+analysis%2C+data%2C+UX+etc%29.+For+team+members+this+means+truly+understanding+core+process%2C+tools+and+pattern+from+their+own+perspective+%28not+the+textbook%29.+For+analysts%2C+this+could+be+requirements+elicitation%2C+communication+and+documentation%2C+and+for+software+engineers+it+could+be+languages%2C+data+structures+and+algorithms+or+design+patterns.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E3.+Culture-fit+is+important%2C+many+softer+skills+will+make+team+members+much+easier+to+work+with.+Coachability%2C+approachability+and+empathy+are+key+ones+here.+As+collaboration+extends+beyond+the+traditional+IT+borers+and+into+business%2C+product%2C+ops+and+even+outside+the+organisation%2C+these+people-oriented+skills+are+now+critical+to+engineering+productivity.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3ESmaller%2C+self-organising+teams+and+high+pace+delivery+models+are+becoming+the+norm+because+it+means+better+products+which+are+in+the+market+sooner.+The+type+of+skills+required+for+these+teams+is+dramatically+different+to+what+we+needed+just+5+years+ago.+We+need+to+deprioritise+focusing+solely+on+industry+experience+and+technical+expertise.+The+skills+profile+for+our+technology+delivery+teams+has+changed%2C+and+we+need+to+rethink+how+we+train%2C+recruit+and+orient+our+cultures+towards+these+new+skillsets.%3C%2Fp%3E_linebreak__linebreak_%3Cp%3E%26nbsp%3B%3C%2Fp%3E The+way+we+build+software+is+changing.+The+way+we+run+our+processes+is+changing.+The+reason+is+simple%3A+we+have+to+deliver+faster.+As+pressure+to+compete+for+customers+in+the+digital+world+continues+to+mount%2C+we+have+been+re-arranging+our+ways+of+work+to+embrace+the+chaos+in+modern+industry%2C+with+shortened+delivery+cycles. ["Teams and culture"] Changing face of skills-LinkedIn, Twitter, Faceboo...
